instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsalted butter (½cup)、whole milk (2cups)、granulated sugar (½cup)、active dry yeast (2 ¼teaspoons)、flour (5cups)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、salt (2teaspoons)
instructions:
0: Generously butter two disposable foil pie/cake pans.
1: In a large bowl, whisk together warm milk, melted butter, and granulated sugar. The mixture should be just warm, registering between 100-110˚F (37-43˚C). If it is hotter, allow to cool slightly.
2: Sprinkle the yeast evenly over the warm mixture and let set for 1 minute.
3: Add 4 cups (500g) of all-purpose flour to the milk mixture and mix with a wooden spoon until just combined.
4: Cover the bowl with a towel or plastic wrap and set in a warm place to rise for 1 hour.
5: After 1 hour, the dough should have nearly doubled in size.
6: Remove the towel and add an additional ¾ cup (95g) of flour, the baking powder, and salt. Stir well, then turn out onto a well-floured surface.
7: Knead the dough lightly, adding additional flour as necessary, until the dough just loses its stickiness and does not stick to the surface.
8: Roll the dough out into a large rectangle, about ½-inch (1 cm) thick. Fix corners to make sure they are sharp and even.
9: Spread the softened butter evenly over the dough.
10: Sprinkle evenly with brown sugar and a generous sprinkling of cinnamon.
11: Press the mixture into the butter.
12: Roll up the dough, forming a log, and pinch the seam closed. Place seam-side down. Trim off any unevenness on either end.
13: Cut the log in half, then divide each half into 7 evenly sized pieces. About 1½ inches (8cm) thick each.
14: Place 7 cinnamon rolls in each cake pan, one in the center, six around the sides. Cover with plastic wrap and place in a warm place to rise for 30 minutes.
15: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
16: To prepare the frosting. In a medium-size mixing bowl, whisk together cream cheese, butter, whole milk, vanilla, and powdered sugar, until smooth.
17: Remove plastic wrap. Bake the cinnamon rolls in a preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, until golden brown.
18: While still warm, drizzle evenly with frosting.
19: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:hot water (2tablespoons)、sugar (2tablespoons)、instant coffee powder (2tablespoons)、milk、ice
instructions:
0: Add the hot water, sugar, and instant coffee to a bowl.
1: Either hand whisk or use an electric mixer until the mixture is fluffy and light.
2: To serve, spoon a dollop over a cup of milk with ice in it and stir.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flour (4cups)、baking powder (4tablespoons)、milk (4cups)、butter (¾cup)、egg yolks、egg whites、maple syrup
instructions:
0: Whisk together the flour and baking powder in a large bowl.
1: In a separate bowl, add the butter, milk, and egg yolks, stirring to combine.
2: In a third bowl, use a hand mixer to beat the egg whites until soft peaks form.
3: Pour the milk mixture into the flour mixture and stir with rubber spatula until just combined. Add the beaten egg whites and gently fold to combine.
4: Heat an 8-inch (20cm) nonstick skillet over low heat. Pour 1 ½ cups of pancake batter into the skillet, smooth out the top, then cover with a lid. Cook until golden brown on the bottom and a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 20 minutes. Transfer the pancake to a plate and repeat, making 3 more pancakes with the remaining batter.
5: Serve with maple syrup.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:whole milk (2cups)、sugar (½cup)、unsalted butter (8tablespoons)、active dry yeast (2 ¼teaspoons)、all-purpose flour (5cups)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)
instructions:
0: Make the dough: In a large bowl, whisk together the warm milk, sugar, and melted butter. The mixture should be just warm, registering between 100-110˚F (37-43˚C). If any warmer, allow to cool slightly.
1: Sprinkle the yeast evenly over the milk mixture, stir, and let sit in a warm place for about 10 minutes until the yeast has bloomed.
2: Add 4 cups (500 g) of flour to the milk mixture and stir with a wooden spoon until just combined.
3: Cover the bowl with a kitchen towel or plastic wrap and let rise in a warm place for 1 hour, until nearly doubled in size.
4: Generously butter 2 9-inch (23 cm) round baking pans and set aside.
5: Make the filling: In a medium bowl, combine the brown sugar, butter, and cinnamon. Mix well, then set aside.
6: Remove the plastic wrap from the dough and add the remaining cup of flour, baking powder, and salt. Stir well, then turn out onto a clean surface. Leave a bit of flour nearby to use as needed, but try not to incorporate too much.
7: Knead the dough for at least 10 minutes, adding more flour as necessary, until the dough just loses its stickiness and does not stick to the surface or your hands. The dough should be very smooth and spring back when poked.
8: Roll the dough out into a large rectangle, about ½-inch (1 cm) thick. Fix the corners with a bench scraper or a spatula to make sure they are sharp and even.
9: Spread the filling evenly over the dough.
10: Starting from one short end, roll up the dough into a log and pinch the seam closed. Place seam-side down. Trim any uneven ends.
11: Using unflavored dental floss, cut the log into evenly pieces, about 1½ inches (8cm) thick. Place the cinnamon rolls in the prepared pans, 1 in the center and about 5 around the sides. Cover with a towel and let rise in a warm place for 35-45 minutes, until expanded by about half of their original volume. If you’re saving the cinnamon rolls for later, cover with plastic wrap and freeze for up 3 months.
12: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
13: Bake the cinnamon rolls for 25-30 minutes, until golden brown.
14: While the cinnamon rolls are baking, make the frosting: In a medium bowl, whisk together the cream cheese, melted butter, milk, and vanilla extract until smooth. Gradually add the powdered sugar and whisk until homogenous and runny.
15: When the cinnamon rolls are finished, let cool for about 10 minutes.
16: Drizzle the frosting over the cinnamon rolls, using the back of a spoon to spread if desired.
17: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ripe bananas、eggs、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、quick-cook oats (½cup)、cinnamon (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Mash bananas in a large bowl until smooth. Mix in eggs and vanilla until well combined, then mix in oats and cinnamon.
1: Heat a skillet to medium and add in a scoop* of the pancake batter. Smooth out to form an even layer. Cook for about 2-3 minutes until you start to see bubbles releasing from the top of the batter. Flip and cook until the other side is golden brown, about 1-2 minutes.
2: Garnish your pancakes with your favorite toppings! We used banana slices, chopped walnuts & maple syrup.
3: *Note: Use ½ cup (65) for scooping the batter to yield 4 thicker pancakes; Use ⅓ cup (40 g) to yield 6 smaller pancakes.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all-purpose flour (2 ½cups)、sugar (3tablespoons)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、baking soda (1teaspoon)、buttermilk (2 ½cups)、unsalted butter (8tablespoons)、eggs、unsalted butter (1tablespoon)、blueberry、chocolate chip、maple syrup
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, add the flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, and baking soda and whisk to combine.
1: In a medium bowl or liquid measuring cup, add the buttermilk, melted butter, and egg yolks and whisk to combine.
2: Add the buttermilk mixture to the dry ingredients and gently fold with a rubber spatula until just combined.
3: Add the egg whites and fold until just combined. Be sure not to overmix. Some lumps are okay.
4: Let the batter rest for 15-30 minutes at room temperature.
5: Add the butter to a cast iron skillet and heat over medium low heat. Once the butter has melted and is bubbling, reduce the heat to medium-low and add ⅓ cup (75 g) of batter to the pan.
6: Cook for 2-3 minutes, until bubbles start to appear on the surface. If adding any toppings like chocolate chips or blueberries, sprinkle over the pancake. Flip the pancake over and cook for another 1-2 minutes, until golden brown. Repeat with the remaining batter.
7: Serve the pancakes with butter and maple syrup.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all-purpose flour (2cups)、sugar (2tablespoons)、kosher salt (½teaspoon)、baking powder (½teaspoon)、baking soda (½teaspoon)、buttermilk (2cups)、eggs、unsalted butter (3tablespoons)、unsalted butter (½teaspoon)、maple syrup
instructions:
0: In a bowl, add the flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, and baking soda, and whisk to combine.
1: In a bowl or measuring cup, whisk the buttermilk, eggs, and melted butter until smooth.
2: Add the buttermilk mixture to the dry ingredients, gently incorporating with a spatula. Make sure not to overmix, as that will result in dense pancakes.
3: Add the butter to a pan over medium low heat. Once the butter begins to bubble, add ⅓ cup (80 ml) of batter to the pan.
4: Cook until the top side begins to bubble and the bottom is golden brown. Flip the pancake and cook until the underside is golden brown. Repeat with the remaining batter.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:rolled oats (½cup)、banana、milk (1cup)
instructions:
0: Add rolled oats to a blender and blend until the oats are the size of a fine crumb.
1: Add the banana and milk and blend well.
2: Pour in a glass.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flour (1cup)、organic sugar (2tablespoons)、baking powder (1tablespoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、non-dairy milk (1cup)、apple cider vinegar (1tablespoon)、vanilla (1teaspoon)、maple syrup
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, add the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt, and stir to combine.
1: In a medium bowl or liquid measuring cup, add almond milk, apple cider vinegar, and vanilla, and stir to combine
2: Pour the liquid mixture into the dry mixture and whisk until smooth.
3: Let batter rest for 5 minutes.
4: Pour about ½ cup (65 grams) of batter onto a nonstick pan or griddle over medium heat.
5: When the top begins to bubble, flip the pancake and cook until golden.
6: Serve warm with maple syrup.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:creamy peanut butter (⅔cup)、old fashion oat (1cup)、honey (1 ½tablespoons)、mini chocolate chips (¼cup)、flax seed (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Mix all ingredients in a bowl until well-combined.
1: Cover with plastic wrap and chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
2: Once done chilling, roll into approximately 1 inch (2.5 cm) balls. (Cover hands in a light layer of butter or oil to facilitate rolling and avoid getting sticky hands.)
3: Lay out a thin layer of oats and chocolate chips on a cutting board or work surface and roll the balls in the mixture. Finish off by rolling each ball between your hands to pack in the oats and chocolate chips.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ripe bananas、eggs、2% plain greek yogurt (½cup)、honey (⅓cup)、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、baking soda (1teaspoon)、wheat flour (1 ½cups)、blueberry (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: In a medium bowl, mash bananas. Mix eggs, yogurt, honey, vanilla extract, and baking soda into mixture.
2: Add flour and mix.
3: Add blueberries and gently fold into mixture.
4: Pour the batter into a greased 9 x 5-inch (23 x 13 cm) bread pan. Bake for about 50 mins, or until a toothpick comes out clean from the middle of the bread. (Baking times may vary, so keep an eye on the bread.)
5: Allow to cool for 15 minutes before serving.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bread (1slice)、butter (½tablespoon)、egg、shredded cheese (3tablespoons)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: With a spoon, press down on the center of the bread to form a pocket.
1: Line the edges of the bread with butter, and crack an egg into the pocket.
2: Line the edges of the bread with shredded cheese.
3: Sprinkle on salt and pepper, and bake at 400°F (204°C) for 10-15 min. 10 min will have a runny yolk whereas 15 min will have a firmer yolk.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:banana、eggs、cinnamon (¼teaspoon)、maple syrup
instructions:
0: In a bowl, mash the banana with a fork.
1: Add eggs and cinnamon. Mix until combined.
2: Heat a nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add a spoonful of batter and cook for 3-4 minutes, then flip and cook for an additional 3-4 minutes.
3: Serve with maple syrup or honey.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all-purpose flour (2cups)、eggs、butter (¼cup)、granulated sugar (3tablespoons)、milk (3cups)、hazelnut spread (½cup)、strawberries、powdered sugar
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, combine flour, eggs, butter, and sugar, stirring until ingredients are slightly mixed.
1: Add the milk ½ cup (120 ml) at a time, stirring vigorously, making sure the milk is completely incorporated into the batter and that the batter is smooth before adding more milk.
2: Repeat with the rest of the milk. The batter should be very liquidy and have no lumps.
3: In a pan over medium heat, pour ⅓ cup (95 grams) of the batter in the center and swirl the batter around the edges of the pan until set.
4: To know when the crepe is ready to flip, lift up one of the edges about ⅓ of the way. The bottom side should be golden brown. Flip the crepe.
5: Cook until the edges are starting to slightly crisp.
6: Remove from heat and cover with a paper towel to make sure the crepes stay moist.
7: Spread half of the chocolate hazelnut spread on half of the crepe.
8: Lay half of the strawberries on the chocolate spread.
9: Fold the other half of the crepe on top of the strawberries, then fold the crepe in half.
10: Repeat with the other crepe.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large ripe bananas、eggs、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、cinnamon (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: In a bowl, mash bananas.
1: Mix in the egg, then vanilla and cinnamon.
2: Pour pancake batter in ¼ cup (60 ml) amounts on a griddle or skillet over medium-high heat.
3: Cook until bubbles pop on the surface of the pancake, then flip and cook the other side.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (6tablespoons)、milk (3cups)、eggs、flour (2 ¼cups)、sugar (7tablespoons)、red food coloring、orange food coloring、yellow food coloring、green food coloring、blue food coloring (1tablespoon)、purple food coloring、whipped cream (6cups)
instructions:
0: In a bowl, whisk flour and sugar. Mix in eggs, then gradually mix in butter and warm milk, alternating between the two.
1: Evenly divide the batter into 6 bowls. Add a few drops of food coloring to each bowl, and whisk until fully incorporated and the batter is colored.
2: On a nonstick skillet over medium heat, pour ⅓ of the purple crepe batter, and tip the pan to cover the entire bottom surface. Cook the crepe begins to gently bubble and cook through, then flip. Repeat until all of the different color crepe batter is used.
3: Stack crepes on top of each other, starting with purple, then blue, green, yellow, orange, and red, with whipped cream between each layer.
4: Cover the crepe cake in whipped cream, so that it’s fully white on the outside.
5: Slice, and serve.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sandwich bread (10slices)、butter (3tablespoons)、brown sugar (3tablespoons)、cinnamon (2tablespoons)、eggs、milk (1tablespoon)、cinnamon (½teaspoon)、vanilla extract (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Roll each slice of bread flat with a rolling pin. Carefully cut off crusts
1: In a bowl, combine melted butter, brown sugar, and 2 tablespoons cinnamon. Spread onto each bread slice, and roll up.
2: In a bowl, combine eggs, milk, ½ teaspoon cinnamon, and vanilla.
3: Dip each roll-up in egg mixture, and pan fry in a buttered skillet until all sides are golden brown.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flour (2cups)、baking powder (2teaspoons)、salt (¼teaspoon)、eggs、milk (1 ½cups)、maple syrup (2tablespoons)、butter (2tablespoons)、chocolate chips (2tablespoons)、raspberries、blueberry (¼cup)、banana
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375ºF (190ºC).
1: In a large bowl, combine flour, baking powder, and salt.
2: Add in eggs, melted butter, and maple syrup. Whisk. Add in milk and whisk until all ingredients are incorporated.
3: Evenly distribute the batter in a 12-cup nonstick muffin tin. Top with fruit and chocolate chips.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:strawberry (2cups)、banana、milk (1 ½cups)、plain greek yogurt (1cup)
instructions:
0: Put fruit in a freezer bag. Seal and store in freezer for up to 8 -12 months.
1: When ready to use, put milk, Greek yogurt, and frozen fruit into a blender and mix until consistency is smooth.
2: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsalted butter (1tablespoon)、brown sugar (2tablespoons)、cinnamon (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Make the filling: In a small bowl, combine the melted butter, brown sugar, and cinnamon. Make the dough: In a medium bowl, whisk together the egg, vanilla, sugar, and milk until combined. Add the pancake mix and stir with a rubber spatula until mostly incorporated.
1: Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead briefly until mostly smooth. Roll the dough out to an 8 x 6-inch rectangle.
2: Spread the filling over the dough. Starting with a long edge, tightly roll the dough into a log. Cut in half crosswise.
3: Grease 2 12-ounce mugs with nonstick spray. Place 1 cinnamon roll in each mug with the cut side facing up. Spoon 1 teaspoon of water into each mug. Working 1 at a time, microwave the cinnamon rolls on medium power for 1 minute and 45 seconds. Let cool for 1 minute.
4: Make the icing: In a small bowl, stir together the powdered sugar and milk until smooth.
5: Drizzle the icing over the cinnamon rolls before serving.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large egg whites、large egg yolks、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、salt、pepper、fresh chive
instructions:
0: Separate the egg whites and the egg yolks in two separate bowls. You’ll only need 3 yolks, so discard the other 2 or reserve for another use.
1: Whisk the egg yolks until they become homogenous and pale in color. Set aside.
2: Transfer the egg whites to a large bowl and whisk until they triple in size and become white with medium peaks.
3: Carefully fold the egg yolks into the egg whites until fully incorporated.
4: Pour the egg mixture into a medium nonstick frying pan with a lid. Cook over medium-low heat until bottom of omelet has set, about 5 minutes.
5: Lift up each side of the omelette and drop a tablespoon of butter underneath.
6: Cover the pan and cook for another 5 minutes, or until the top of the omelet has set.
7: Remove the lid and season the omelet with salt and pepper. Remove the pan from the heat.
8: Fold the omelette onto a plate and sprinkle with chives.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:rolled oats (½cup)、almond milk (⅓cup)、greek yogurt (¼cup)、maple syrup (1teaspoon)、cocoa powder (1teaspoon)、strawberries
instructions:
0: In a mason jar, fill with rolled oats, almond milk, Greek yogurt, cocoa powder, and maple syrup. Stir until well combined.
1: Place diced strawberries on top and seal jar.
2: Soak the oats overnight.
3: Place in fridge until ready to eat.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:egg yolks、sugar (¼cup)、milk (½cup)、pancake mix (¾cup)、egg whites、butter、syrup、assorted berry (1cup)
instructions:
0: Mix together the egg yolks, sugar, milk, and pancake mix in a very large bowl until it is smooth with no large lumps.
1: In another large bowl, beat the egg whites with a hand mixer until stiff peaks form when lifted.
2: Carefully fold the egg whites into the pancake batter, until just incorporated, making sure not to deflate the batter.
3: Grease two 3.5-inch (9 cm) metal ring moulds and set them in the middle of a pan over the lowest heat possible.
4: Fill the moulds about ¾ of the way full with the batter, then cover the pan and cook for about 10 minutes, until the center of the pancakes are slightly jiggly.
5: Release the pancakes from the bottom of the pan with a spatula, then carefully flip them over, making sure not to spill any batter inside.
6: Cover and cook for another 5 minutes, then serve with butter, syrup, and berries!
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flour (4cups)、water (½cup)、milk (½cup)、sugar (¼cup)、salt (2teaspoons)、instant dry yeast (1packet)、unsalted butter (3tablespoons)、cold unsalted butter (1 ¼cups)、egg、sweetened chocolate bar (2bars)
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, mix the flour, water, milk, sugar, salt, yeast, and butter.
1: Once the dough starts to clump, turn it out onto a clean counter.
2: Lightly knead the dough and form it into a ball, making sure not to over-knead it.
3: Cover the dough with plastic wrap and refrigerate for one hour.
4: Slice the cold butter in thirds and place it onto a sheet of parchment paper..
5: Place another piece of parchment on top of the butter, and beat it with a rolling pin.
6: Keeping the parchment paper on the butter, use a rolling pin to roll the butter into a 7-inch (18 cm) square, ½-inch (1 cm) thick. If necessary, use a knife to trim the edges and place the trimmings back on top of the butter and continue to roll into a square.
7: Transfer the butter layer to the refrigerator.
8: To roll out the dough, lightly flour the counter. Place the dough on the counter, and push the rolling pin once vertically into the dough and once horizontally to form four quadrants.
9: Roll out each corner and form a 10-inch (25 cm) square.
10: Place the butter layer on top of the dough and fold the sides of the dough over the butter, enclosing it completely.
11: Roll the dough with a rolling pin to seal the seams, making sure to lengthen the dough, rather than widening it.
12: Transfer the dough to a baking sheet and cover with plastic wrap. Refrigerate for 1 hour.
13: Roll out the dough on a floured surface until it’s 8x24 inches (20x61 cm).
14: Fold the top half down to the middle, and brush off any excess flour.
15: Fold the bottom half over the top and turn the dough clockwise to the left. This completes the first turn.
16: Cover and refrigerate for one hour.
17: Roll out the dough again two more times, completing three turns in total and refrigerating for 1 hour in between each turn. If at anytime the dough or butter begins to soften, stop and transfer back to the fridge.
18: After the final turn, cover the dough with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight.
19: To form the croissants, cut the dough in half. Place one half in the refrigerator.
20: Flour the surface and roll out the dough into a long narrow strip, about 8x40 inches (20x101 cm).
21: With a knife, trim the edges of the dough.
22: Cut the dough into 4 rectangles.
23: Place the chocolate on the edge of the dough and roll tightly enclosing it in the dough.
24: Place the croissants on a baking sheet, seam side down.
25: Repeat with the other half of the dough.
26: Brush the croissants with the beaten egg. Save the rest of the egg wash in the fridge for later.
27: Place the croissants in a warm place to rise for 1-2 hours.
28: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
29: Once the croissants have proofed, brush them with one more layer of egg wash.
30: Bake for 15 minutes or until golden brown and cooked through. Serve warm.
31: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bread (4slices)
instructions:
0: Whisk eggs, cinnamon, vanilla and milk together in medium-large bowl to create egg wash.
1: In medium bowl mix cream cheese, vanilla, sugar, lemon juice and heavy cream (optional).
2: Take 2 slices of bread and spread mixture on both.
3: Press sliced strawberries on both slices & press together.
4: Dunk in egg wash.
5: Melt butter in a skillet on medium-low heat and cook bread for 2-3 minutes or until crumbs are crispy and bread is more solid.
6: Stack and garnish with strawberries and confectioners sugar. Add maple syrup to preference.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:eggs、cream of tartar (⅛teaspoon)、cream cheese (3tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 300°F (150°C).
1: Separate the eggs into two bowls.
2: Add the cream of tartar to the egg whites and whip into stiff peaks.
3: Add the cream cheese or yogurt into the yolks and mix until combined.
4: Fold half of the egg whites into the yolks until just combined. Add the rest and fold again until incorporated.
5: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and place six dollops of the mixture on the tray.
6: Spread out the circles with a spatula to about ½ inch (1 cm) thick.
7: Bake for 30 minutes or until golden.
8: Allow to cool for at least 1 hour.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:eggs、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: In a measuring cup, beat the eggs until smooth.  Set aside.
2: In a greased muffin tin, place your desired combination of fillings into each muffin cup.
3: Season each cup with salt and pepper.
4: Pour the beaten eggs into each muffin cup until the liquid almost reaches the top.
5: Bake for 20 minutes, until set.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all-purpose flour (1cup)、baking powder (2teaspoons)、sea salt (½teaspoon)、almond milk (1cup)、maple syrup (2tablespoons)、vegan margarine (3tablespoons)、light brown sugar (5tablespoons)、ground cinnamon (2teaspoons)、vegetable oil
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt. In a small bowl or measuring cup, whisk together the almond milk and maple syrup.
1: Add the wet ingredient to the dry and whisk to combine. Do not overmix.
2: In a small bowl, mix together the margarine, brown sugar, and cinnamon. Transfer to a pastry bag or plastic zip-top bag and snip off one corner.
3: Lightly grease a large nonstick skillet or griddle and heat over medium heat. When the pan shimmers, measure out ¼ cup (35 g) of the batter (or eyeball it) and pour it onto the skillet. Pipe a circular swirl of the cinnamon mixture into the batter. Repeat to fill the skillet.
4: When small bubbles appear in the center of the pancakes, after about 4 minutes, flip.
5: Cook on the other side for about 1 minute more, until lightly browned and cooked through. Repeat with the remaining batter, adding more oil to the skillet between batches as needed.
6: In a small bowl, combine the confectioners’ sugar and water and whisk until smooth.
7: Drizzle the pancakes with the glaze and serve.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:strawberry (½cup)、raspberry (½cup)、blackberry (1cup)、banana、greek yogurt (½cup)、almond milk (¼cup)、peanut butter (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Add the berries, banana, Greek yogurt, almond milk, and peanut butter to a blender and blend until smooth.
1: Top with your favorite toppings.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:warm water (1 ¼cups)、honey (1 ½teaspoons)、active dry yeast (1 ½teaspoons)、whole wheat flour (2cups)、all-purpose flour (1 ⅓cups)、oil (2tablespoons)、salt (1 ½teaspoons)
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, whisk the water, honey, and yeast. Let sit for 5 minutes, until the yeast has bloomed.
1: NOTE: It may be tempting to use all whole wheat flour in this recipe, but, in our testing, that method resulted in dense, tough, squat breads that barely rose when we tried to proof them.  Using some all-purpose flour was necessary to give us the rise and soft, pillowy texture we wanted in a good sandwich bread.
2: Pour in the wheat flour, all-purpose flour, oil, and salt, and mix until the dough comes together in a ball that does not stick to your fingers.
3: NOTE: You can also do the first 2 steps in a standing mixer fitted with a dough hook attachment, mixing on low speed until the dough no longer sticks to the sides.
4: On a lightly floured surface, knead the dough a few times until it really starts to form a tight ball.
5: Form the dough into a ball shape and transfer to a greased bowl, turning the dough to coat it in grease. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap or a wet towel and store in a warm place for 1 hour.
6: Allow the dough to proof until it has doubled in size. Save the plastic wrap or towel as you’ll be using it again.
7: Transfer the proofed dough to a lightly floured surface and press the dough – don’t stretch – into a 7x7-inch (18x18 cm) square.
8: Fold the top 3rd of the square down, and the bottom 3rd up to form an even rectangle. Pinch the top fold to seal the dough.
9: Roll the dough over so that the seal faces upward and fold both ends up toward the center, so that the dough has formed an even log shape about the size of your loaf pan.
10: Transfer the dough to a greased loaf pan and cover with with the same plastic wrap or towel used before.
11: Let the dough rise for 1 hour, until it has poofed over the edge of the loaf pan about 1½ inches (4 cm).
12: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
13: Remove the plastic wrap or towel and transfer to the oven and bake for 50-55 minutes, until the dough has browned slightly and formed a light brown crust.
14: Immediately remove the loaf from the pan and set aside to cool for at least 1 hour before slicing.
15: Store in an airtight container or bag. The bread can be stored in freezer up to 6 months.
16: Enjoy!

ingredients:bacon (6slices)、eggs、salt、pepper、shredded cheddar cheese (¼cup)、chive
instructions:

1: Place the slices of bacon in the muffin tin, wrapping in a circle.
2: Bake the bacon for 10 minutes.
3: Remove the bacon from the oven and pour out any excess grease, if desired. Crack 1 egg into each of the cups, then sprinkle with salt, pepper, and cheddar cheese.
4: Bake for another 10 minutes, or until the egg yolks reach your desired consistency.
5: Run a knife around the edge of each cup to loosen and remove. Sprinkle with chives, if desired.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:russet potatoes、baking soda (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、olive oil (¼cup)、garlic (2tablespoons)、fresh rosemary (2tablespoons)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、salt、pepper、fresh parsley leaf (1small handful)
instructions:
0: Fill a large pot with water and boil. Add salt, baking soda, and potatoes, and stir.
1: Return to a boil, reduce to a simmer, and cook for 10 minutes after returning to a boil. A fork should easily pierce the potato pieces by the end. Drain and let sit one minute while moisture evaporates.
2: Combine olive oil, rosemary (or thyme), garlic, and a few grinds of black pepper in a small saucepan and heat over medium heat. Stir constantly until garlic just begins to turn golden, about 2-3 minutes.
3: Immediately strain oil through a fine-mesh strainer over the potatoes. Add salt and pepper to taste, and mix.
4: Shake the pot that the potatoes are in so that they slam against all sides of the pot, this will loosen the outer layer of the potatoes to form a mashed layer around each potato piece.
5: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
6: Transfer potatoes to a large rimmed baking sheet and separate them, spreading them out evenly.
7: Transfer to oven and roast, without moving, for 30-35 minutes.
8: Using a thin, flexible metal spatula flip potatoes. Continue roasting until potatoes are deep brown and crisp all over, turning and shaking them a few times during cooking, 30 to 40 minutes longer.
9: Transfer potatoes to a large bowl and add the garlic-rosemary mixture (optional) and minced parsley. Toss to coat and season with more salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately.
10: Enjoy!

instructions:

4: Serve with your favorite breakfast sides.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray、all purpose flour (5 ¼cups)、whole milk (1 ¾cups)、unsalted butter (1stick)、large egg、granulated sugar (½cup)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、salt (2teaspoons)、instant yeast (2teaspoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Grease a 9-inch square baking dish with nonstick spray.
1: Make the dough: In a large bowl, combine the flour, milk, melted butter, egg, granulated sugar, baking powder, salt, and yeast. Mix with a rubber spatula until a shaggy dough forms. Turn out onto a clean surface and knead for about 1 minute, until mostly smooth and the dough springs back when poked. Return the dough to the bowl, cover with a kitchen towel, and let rest while you make the filling.
2: Make the filling: In a medium bowl, mix together the brown sugar, melted butter, and cinnamon until combined.
3: Roll the dough out on a lightly floured surface to a 12 x 16-inch rectangle.
4: Spread the filling evenly over the dough. Starting with a the long edge, tightly roll the dough into a log. Cut the log into 9 even pieces.
5: Transfer the cinnamon rolls to the prepared baking pan. Bake for 25 minutes, until light golden brown around the edges.
6: While the cinnamon rolls bake, make the frosting: In a medium bowl, combine the cream cheese, powdered sugar, and vanilla. Beat with an electric hand mixer on medium speed until smooth and creamy.
7: Let the cinnamon rolls cool for 10 minutes, then cover with the frosting.
8: Enjoy!

instructions:
0: In a large bowl, mix together yolks and sugar, while still whisking, add milk
1: Carefully fold in whipped egg whites.

instructions:
0: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together ricotta cheese, egg yolk, milk, vanilla extract, and lemon zest. Whisk until smooth, then add flour and baking powder. Mix this until fully combined.

7: Enjoy!

instructions:

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cream cheese (8oz)、powdered sugar (¼cup)、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、flour、puff pastry (2sheets)、strawberry、raspberry、blackberry
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC), and prepare two cookie sheets with parchment paper.
1: In a bowl, mix cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla until fully combined.
2: Lightly flour the surface and roll out puff pastry on top to flatten.
3: Cut each sheet of puff pastry into 9 equal squares.
4: On the top right and bottom left of the pastry, cut an L shape approximately ½ inch (1 cm) from the edge.
5: NOTE: This L shape should reach all the way down and across the square, however both L shapes should not meet at the ends. Your pastry should look like a picture frame with two corners still intact.
6: Take the upper right corner and fold down towards the inner bottom corner. You will now have a diamond shape.
7: Place 1 to 2 teaspoons of the cream cheese filling in the middle, then place berries on top.
8: Repeat with the remaining pastry squares and place them onto the parchment covered baking sheet.

ingredients:all purpose flour (2cups)、baking powder (2teaspoons)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、whole milk (1cup)、buttermilk (½cup)、unsalted butter (4tablespoons)、vanilla extract (½teaspoon)、large eggs、sugar (⅓cup)、nonstick cooking spray、butter、maple syrup

4: Serve the waffles hot, with butter and maple syrup alongside.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:yukon gold potato (2lb)、cold water、kosher salt (1 ½tablespoons)、top sirloin steak、freshly ground black pepper (1 ½teaspoons)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、canola oil (1tablespoon)、small yellow onion、cremini mushroom (8oz)、small red bell pepper、fresh oregano (1teaspoon)、cherry tomato (1cup)、large eggs、fresh parsley (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Add the potatoes to a large pot and fill with enough cold water to cover by 1 inch (2 ½ cm). Season with 1½ teaspoons of salt and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Boil for 5 minutes, then drain and run under cold water to stop the potatoes from cooking further. Dry the potatoes with paper towels and set aside.
1: Place a rack in the lower third of the oven. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)
2: Blot the steak dry with a paper towel and season on both sides with 1½ teaspoons of salt and 1 teaspoon black pepper.
3: Heat a 10-inch (25 cm) cast iron skillet over high heat until smoking. Reduce the heat to medium-high. Add 1 tablespoon of butter and the canola oil to the pan and melt the butter completely, about 1 minute. Add the seasoned steak and cook, without disturbing, for 2 minutes on each side. The steak will be rare, but will finish cooking in the oven. Transfer to a cutting board to rest for at least 5 minutes before slicing into ¼-inch (6 mm) strips.
4: Reduce the heat to medium and melt the remaining tablespoon of butter in the same skillet. Add the onion, mushrooms, red bell pepper, and ½ teaspoon of salt. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the onions are slightly caramelized and the mushrooms have released their liquid, 8–10 minutes.
5: Add the potatoes to the skillet and season with the remaining teaspoon of salt, ¼ teaspoon black pepper, and the oregano. Stir to combine and cook, without disturbing, for 4 minutes, until the potatoes are golden brown and crisp on one side. Add the cherry tomatoes and stir to combine.
6: Make 4 wells in the hash using the back of a spoon and carefully crack an egg into each well.
7: Scatter the sliced steak on top of the hash and transfer to the oven. Bake for 10 minutes, or until the egg whites are set but the yolks are still runny.
8: Remove the hash from the oven and season with the remaining ¼ teaspoon pepper. Garnish with the parsley.
9: Serve warm.
10: Enjoy!

ingredients:french bread (12oz)、granny smith apples、brown sugar (1cup)、cornstarch (2teaspoons)、eggs、milk (2cups)、vanilla (1teaspoon)、cinnamon (1teaspoon)、maple syrup (¼cup)、powdered sugar、whipped cream
instructions:
0: Cut the bread into 1-inch (2 ½ cm) cubes.
1: Dice peeled apples into small bite-size pieces.
2: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
3: In a medium bowl, mix together the bread, apples, sugar, and cornstarch.
4: In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon.
5: Pour egg mixture into the bread bowl.
6: Give the ingredients a good stir, then pour into a 9x13-inch (33 cm X 23 cm) greased baking tray.
7: Drizzle with maple syrup.
8: Bake for 45 minutes or until golden brown.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:banana、egg、honey (¼cup)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、cinnamon (1teaspoon)、nutmeg (½teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、vanilla (1teaspoon)、greek yogurt (½cup)、oats (1 ½cups)、milk (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350ºF (180ºC).
1: In a medium bowl, mash the banana until mostly smooth. Add the egg and stir to combine.
2: Add the honey, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, vanilla and Greek yogurt and mix well. Fold in the oats, then stir in the milk.
3: Fill each cup of a greased 6-cup muffin tin ¼ of the way full. Add your additions of choice, then fill the muffin cups to the top with the rest of batter and top with more fruit or nuts.
4: Bake the muffins for 30 minutes, or until risen slightly and golden brown around the edges.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all-purpose flour (2cups)、granulated sugar (3tablespoons)、large eggs、unsalted butter (¼cup)、whole milk (3cups)、chocolate hazelnut spread (10tablespoons)、whipped cream (1cup)、banana、strawberries
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, stir together the flour, sugar, eggs, and melted butter.
1: Add ½ cup (120 ml) of milk at a time, stirring vigorously, making sure that each addition is completely incorporated and that the batter is smooth before adding more milk.
2: Strain the batter through a fine mesh sieve into another large bowl. The batter should be very liquidy and have no lumps. Rest in the fridge for at least 30 minutes, up to overnight.
3: In a medium nonstick pan over medium heat, pour ⅓ cup (80 ml) of the batter in the center, and swirl the batter around to reach the edges of the pan.
4: Cook the crêpe until bubbles rise to the surface and the bottom is golden brown, about 3 minutes. Flip and cook on the other side until the edges start to crisp slightly, about 1 minute more.
5: Transfer the crêpe to a wire rack to cool. Repeat with the remaining batter.
6: Cut the crêpes in half. Spread chocolate hazelnut spread or whipped cream evenly over each crepe half, then place a slice of banana or strawberry half on the right edge. Fold up the bottom of the crêpe, then fold toward the left side to make triangular shape. Repeat with the remaining ingredients.
7: Serve with whipped cream.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:funfetti cake mix (1box)、large egg、neutral oil (¼cup)、water (½cup)、rainbow sprinkle、milk of choice
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Line 3 baking sheets with parchment paper.
1: In a large bowl, whisk together the cake mix, egg, oil, and water until well combined w. Transfer the batter to a piping bag or a large zip-top bag fitted with a small round tip.
2: Pipe the batter into 1-inch donut shapes onto the prepared baking sheets, spacing about ½ inch apart. Dip a finger in water and smooth the tops of the donuts as needed.
3: Bake for 7–8 minutes, or until the donuts are cooked through and lighten golden brown. Let cool completely on the pans. Poke a straw through any centers that may have closed during baking, then transfer to wire racks.
4: Make the glaze: Sift the powdered sugar and meringue powder into a large bowl. Whisk in the water and food coloring until the glaze is smooth. Add more water as needed, 1 teaspoon at a time, until the glazes reaches your desired consistency.
5: Spoon the glaze over a few donuts, then top with sprinkles while the glaze is still wet. Repeat with the remaining donuts. Let the glaze dry for 1 hour before serving.
6: Divide the donut cereal between bowls and pour milk over. Serve immediately.
7: Enjoy!

instructions:
0: Mix sausage, salt, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, and dried parsley in a bowl until well combined.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sausage patties、ham (2slices)、eggs、milk (1splash)、salt、pepper、bacons、english muffins、cheddar cheese (5slices)、fresh spinach
instructions:
0: On a large plate, arrange the sausage and the ham in a circle, then place a microwaveable mug in the center.
1: Crack the eggs into the mug, season with salt, pepper, and add a splash of milk. Stir until evenly mixed.
2: Microwave the entire plate for about 2 minutes until the egg is cooked through, making sure it does not bubble over.
3: Remove the plate and microwave the bacon strips on a separate plate for about 4-7 minutes. Check the bacon at 4 minutes, then every minute or so to make sure it doesn’t burn.
4: Drain the bacon of its fat, then set aside.
5: Invert the mug with the egg, then slice the egg cylinder into 5 equal rounds. You may have to run a knife around the mug first to ensure that the egg comes loose in one solid piece.
6: To assemble, layer your sandwich as you’d like with the meat, egg, cheese, and spinach.
7: Wrap each sandwich in a damp paper towel, then with parchment paper. Place the sandwiches in a large zip top bag, then freeze for up until 1 month.
8: When ready to eat, remove a sandwich from the freezer, unwrap the parchment, and microwave for about 2 minutes. Cool for 1 minute, then unwrap the paper towel.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:texas toast (1loaf)、eggs、milk (1cup)、butter (3tablespoons)、vanilla (1teaspoon)、cinnamon (1teaspoon)、sugar (2tablespoons)、salt、cooking spray
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (180˚C).
1: Spray a large baking sheet with cooking spray.
2: Stack and slice the Texas toast into thirds.
3: In a large bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, butter, vanilla, cinnamon, salt, and sugar.
4: Dunk each strip of bread into the mixture, allow the excess to drip off, then place on prepared baking sheet. Repeat with remaining strips.
5: Bake for 15-20 minutes, flipping halfway.
6: Remove from oven and serve.
7: NOTE: To freeze, let the sticks cool slightly and transfer baking sheet to freezer. Once frozen, after 1-2 hours, transfer to a freezer bag for easy storage.
8: To reheat, preheat oven to 350°F (180˚C) and bake for 10-15 minutes until heated through. OR transfer frozen sticks to a plate and microwave 45-60 seconds.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all-purpose flour (¼cup)、puff pastry (2sheets)
instructions:
0: On a lightly floured surface, roll out the puff pastry sheets to 9x12-inch (23x30-cm) rectangles. Set one pastry sheet aside and fold the other in half lengthwise, then in half crosswise twice, to form creases for 8 pockets. Unfold the pastry sheet on the prepared baking sheet.
1: Make the Strawberries ‘n’ Cream filling: In a small bowl, combine the cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla, and mix until smooth.
2: Make the Very Berry filling: In a small bowl, mash the raspberries, then add the blueberries, sugar, lemon juice, and lemon zest. Mix with a fork.
3: Spoon the berry mixture over the center of 2 of the 8 rectangles.
4: Use a spatula to spread the chocolate hazelnut spread over the center of 2 more rectangles, then top with the banana slices.
5: Use a spatula to spread the cream cheese mixture in the center of 2 more rectangles, then top with the strawberries.
6: Place apples slices in the center of the remaining 2 rectangles, then sprinkle with the brown sugar and cinnamon.
7: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
8: Brush the egg wash over the pastry around the edges and between each filling, then top with the remaining puff pastry sheet. Use your fingers to press the pastry down around each filling. Once tightly pressed, use a pizza cutter or knife to cut out each pocket.
9: Seal the outside edges with a fork. Poke the top of each pocket with a fork 3-4 times to ventilate. Brush the tops with egg wash.
10: Bake for 25 minutes, or until golden brown.
11: Make the glaze: In a medium bowl, combine the powdered sugar, milk, and vanilla. Stir until smooth and thick.
12: Remove the pockets from the oven and let cool for 5 minutes. Decorate with the glaze, then serve immediately, or wrap in wax paper and freeze for up to a week. Reheat in the toaster oven.
13: Enjoy!

instructions:

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large sweet potato、olive oil、salt、pepper、large eggs、milk (1 ½cups)、garlic (1clove)、jarred sun-dried tomato (4oz)、baby spinach (3oz)、goat cheese (4oz)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
1: Poke a few slits through the skin of the sweet potato with the tip of a knife, then microwave on high for 1 minute. Let cool.
2: Cut off the ends of the sweet potato, then peel. Thinly slice the sweet potato into ⅛ inch (3 mm) thick slices.
3: Add the sweet potato slices to a bowl and toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
4: Arrange the sweet potato slices in a 9-inch (23 cm) round baking dish, slightly overlapping so they cover the sides and bottom.
5: Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the potatoes are softened.
6: In a medium bowl, beat the eggs, salt, and pepper. Add the milk, garlic, and sun-dried tomatoes and whisk to combine.
7: Spread the spinach over the sweet potato crust. Pour in the egg mixture. Top with goat cheese crumbles.
8: Bake for 30 minutes, or until the center of the dish is set and no longer jiggles.
9: Cool for 10 minutes before slicing.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instructions:

3: Place the egg patty on the English muffin and top with the sliced avocado.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:broccoli (2cups)、potato (3cups)、shredded cheddar cheese (1 ½cups)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、eggs、broccoli (1cup)、tomato、small onion、half & half (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: In a bowl, add broccoli, potatoes, 1 cup (100 g) cheddar, ½ teaspoon salt salt, and ¼ teaspoon pepper. Stir to combine.
2: Grease a 9-inch (23 cm) nonstick tart pan with olive oil. Pour the broccoli mixture into the pan. Press evenly into the pan and the sides of the pan until firm using a measuring cup.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flax meal (¼cup)、water (¾cup)、rolled oats (6cups)、quinoa (6cups)、baking powder (4teaspoons)、salt (1teaspoon)、maple syrup (1cup)、refined coconut oil (½cup)、vanilla extract (2teaspoons)、ripe bananas
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
1: To make the flax eggs, combine the flax meal and water in a small bowl and mix well. Set aside for 10 minutes to gel.
2: In a large bowl, combine the oats, quinoa, baking powder, salt, maple syrup, coconut oil, vanilla, flax eggs, and bananas, and mix until well-combined.
3: Divide the base dough equally between 4 medium bowls.
4: Add the peanut butter and chocolate chips to 1 bowl and mix until combined.
5: Add the apple, walnuts, cinnamon, and nutmeg to another bowl and mix until combined.
6: Add the carrots, cinnamon, nutmeg, and almond butter to another bowl and mix until combined.
7: Add the almond butter, strawberries, raspberries, and blueberries to the last bowl and mix until combined.
8: Grease 2 9x13-inch (23x33-cm) baking pans with nonstick spray. Transfer the bar mixtures to the pans, packing each mixture into half of a pan with a spoon or spatula.
9: Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the edges are slightly golden brown.
10: Remove the pans from the oven and let the bars cool for 20 minutes, then refrigerate for at least 30 minutes, or up to 5 days. Gently cut each flavor into 6 bars, then remove from the pans with a spatula.
11: Enjoy!

instructions:

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pancake mix (6cups)、strawberry、blueberry、banana、chocolate chip、maple syrup
instructions:
0: Prepare pancake mix per box instructions.
1: Heat a nonstick pan or pancake griddle on medium heat. For large pancakes, pour 1 cup (235 ml) of batter onto the pan. For small pancakes, pour a little less than ¼ cup (60 ml) of batter onto the pan. For medium pancakes, pour ⅓ cup (80 ml) of batter onto the pan.
2: Allow to cook until bubbles form and begin to pop all around the pancake. The pancake will also lose its shiny sheen and begin to look more matte. Flip and cook on the other side for 2-3 minutes, or until the bottom is lightly browned.
3: For the lion pancake, you’ll need 1 large pancake, 1 small pancake, sliced strawberries for the mane and nose, blueberries for the eyes, and chocolate chips for the mouth.
4: For the monkey pancake, you’ll need 1 large pancake, 2 small pancakes, 1 medium pancake, blueberries for the eyes and nose, and chocolate chips for the mouth.
5: For the owl pancake, you’ll need 1 large pancake, sliced bananas for the eyes and feathers, blueberries for the eyes, and sliced strawberries for the beak and wings.
6: For the pig pancake, you’ll need 1 large pancake, 1 small pancake, chocolate chips for the snout, blueberries for the eyes, and sliced strawberries for the ears.
7: Make your favorite animal pancakes and top with syrup, or another favorite pancake topping.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:eggs、oil (½cup)、pumpkin puree (1cup)、honey (⅔cup)、water (2tablespoons)、whole wheat flour (1 ¾cups)、ground cinnamon (1 ½teaspoons)、ground nutmeg (1 ½teaspoons)、ground ginger (½teaspoon)、baking soda (1teaspoon)、salt (1pinch)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: In a large bowl, combine the eggs, oil, pumpkin, honey, and water, and whisk until thoroughly combined.
2: Sprinkle the whole wheat flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, baking soda, and salt over the wet ingredients and fold until the batter is well combined.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:bacon、sausage、baby red potato (1.5lb)、red bell pepper、yellow onion、salt、pepper、eggs、shredded cheese (1bag)、green onion (1bunch)、flour tortilla、parchment paper
instructions:
0: In a large skillet over medium heat, cook bacon (in batches if necessary) until crispy. Remove the bacon to a paper towel lined plate - leave to cool.

2: In the same saucepan, cook sausage until browned and cooked through. Remove to a paper towel lined bowl.
3: Reduce heat to medium/low and pour beaten eggs into the skillet. Fold and stir eggs occasionally until cooked but still soft and moist. Remove from pan.

5: To assemble the burritos, lay out a tortilla and start with a base of eggs followed by desired toppings and finish with cheese.
6: To wrap, fold in both sides and then fold the bottom up and over all the ingredients. Roll up tightly.
7: NOTE: If you find the tortillas are tearing, heat them up - a few at a time - for 20 seconds in the microwave before assembling.
8: Wrap up in parchment paper. Place the parchment-wrapped burritos in a 1 gallon freezer bag and place in the freezer to store for up to one month.
9: To Reheat: Remove the frozen burrito from the freezer. Unwrap from parchment paper and wrap the frozen burrito up in a damp paper towel. Place on a microwave safe plate and microwave for 3 minutes.
10: Remove from microwave and rest for one minute before unwrapping. Remove the paper towel, serve with hot sauce, salsa, or sour cream!
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instructions:

instructions:

2: Cover and cook for 4-16 minutes, depending on preference (4-6 minutes for soft-boiled, 8-10 minutes for medium-boiled, 12-16 minutes for hard-boiled). In the meantime, fill a large bowl with ice and cold water, creating an ice bath.
3: Once eggs reach desired cook-time, immediately remove the eggs from pot and place in the ice bath. Allow eggs to cool for 10-15 minutes.
4: To peel, lightly tap the eggs on a flat surface, then gently roll back and forth (taking extra care with soft-boiled eggs).
5: Pull away the loosened shell and peel any remaining pieces.
6: Serve as is or incorporate into your favorite recipe that requires hard-boiled eggs.
7: Enjoy!

ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、yellow onion、McCormick® Paprika (1 ½teaspoons)、salt (1teaspoon)、McCormick® black pepper (½teaspoon)、potato (3cups)、fresh spinach (2large handfuls)、eggs、fresh chive
instructions:
0: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a skillet over medium-low heat. When the oil is hot, add the diced onion, McCormick paprika, salt, and pepper. Cook onions, stirring occasionally, until softened, about 5 minutes. Add in frozen shredded potatoes and the remaining tablespoon of olive oil. Cook, stirring occasionally, until potatoes start to turn golden and crisp up a bit.
1: Within the skillet, divide the potatoes into two piles and place a large, circular cookie cutter ring around each pile. Scoop any potatoes that are outside of the cookie cutters into the center of the rings. Use a spatula to pat down the piles inside the rings to form patties. Turn heat down to low and cook until bottom of hash browns are crispy. Use tongs to remove cookie cutter rings and carefully flip the hash browns to crisp up the other side. Once crispy, remove from the pan.
2: In the same pan, add the baby spinach and wilt down over low heat. Remove spinach from the pan.
3: Hollandaise: Place egg yolks and lemon juice in a blender. Blend for 10 seconds, then slowly stream in the hot, melted butter (while blender is still running). Sauce will thicken by the time all of the butter has been added. Blend in salt.
4: Assembly: Place a hash brown on each plate. Top with spinach, then a poached egg. Spoon hollandaise over the eggs. Garnish with chives.
5: Enjoy!

6: In a nonstick pan, fry the egg mixture over high heat for 1 minute, then reduce to a low heat for 2-4 minutes.
7: Cover the pan with a large plate and carefully turn the omelet out onto the plate.
8: Slide the omelet back into the pan and fry for a further 3-5 minutes over low heat. To check the omelet is cooked, gently press on the centre of the omelet. If the surface springs back, it is ready.
9: Repeat step 8 to remove omelet from the pan.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:self-rising flour (1 ¾cups)、greek yogurt (1cup)、egg、everything seasoning (4tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F(200°C).
1: In a large bowl, mix the self-rising flour and greek yogurt until it comes together to form a ball.
2: Transfer the dough ball to a lightly floured work surface and use your hands to begin flattening and shaping the rough into a roughly 8-inch (20 cm) disk.
3: Using a bench scraper or knife, cut the dough into 4 equal pieces.
4: One at a time, roll each piece of dough into a log roughly 8 inches (20 cm) long. Shape the log into a ring and transfer to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
5: Brush the tops of the bagels with egg wash and sprinkle generously with everything seasoning.
6: Bake for 20-25 minutes, until the bagels are golden brown.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:natural peanut butter (½cup)、honey (1tablespoon)、McCormick® Ground Cinnamon (½teaspoon)、McCormick® vanilla extract (¼teaspoon)、strawberries、banana、whole wheat tortillas、unsalted butter (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, whisk together the peanut butter, honey, cinnamon, and vanilla.
1: Cut off the stems from the the strawberries, then slice. Slice the banana.
2: On a cutting board, lay out the tortilla and spread ½ of the peanut butter mixture across the top ½ of the tortilla. Arrange strawberry and banana slices over the peanut butter, then fold the other side of the tortilla over the fruit. Repeat with the remaining ingredients
3: In a large pan over medium heat, melt ½ tablespoon butter. Place the quesadilla in the hot pan and cook until golden, about 2 minutes. Flip and continue cooking until golden on the other side, 1–2 minutes more. Remove from the heat and repeat with the other quesadilla.
4: Cut each quesadilla into 4 pieces, then serve. Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsalted butter (3tablespoons)、medium white onion、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、garlic (3cloves)、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、nutmeg (¼teaspoon)、all purpose flour (2tablespoons)、vegetable stock (1cup)、heavy cream (¾cup)、parmesan cheese (¾cup)、frozen spinach (20oz)、fresh lemon juice (2teaspoons)、large eggs、black pepper (½teaspoon)、toast
instructions:
0: Melt the butter in a 9-inch (23 cm) cast-iron skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and ½ teaspoon of salt. Cook for 6–8 minutes, until the onions are softened and translucent.
1: Add the garlic, red pepper flakes, and nutmeg and cook for 2 minutes, until the garlic is fragrant.
2: Sprinkle the flour into the pan and mix well to incorporate it into the butter and remove any clumps. Cook for 2–3 minutes, until the flour is cooked and beginning to turn light brown in color.
3: Pour in the vegetable stock and heavy cream and stir well to combine. Bring to a simmer and cook for 2–3 minutes, until slightly thickened. Stir in the Parmesan cheese and the remaining ½ teaspoon of salt and cook the cheese until it melts, stirring continuously, about 2 minutes.
4: Stir in the lemon juice and spinach. Remove the pan from the heat.
5: Using a fine-mesh sieve, strain each egg to remove the outer egg white, the thinner layer of the egg white that tends to spread when an egg is cracked into a pan. Add each egg to its own small bowl.
6: Using a ¼ cup (30 g) measure, create 4 divots in the spinach mixture and carefully pour a strained egg into each space. Sprinkle each egg with the pepper and a pinch of Parmesan.
7: Return the pan to medium heat and cover. Cook for 5 minutes, until the egg whites are starting to set.
8: Meanwhile, turn the broiler to high. Remove the lid from the pan and broil for 2-3 minutes to cook off any excess moisture that may have accumulated and to brown the cheese.
9: Remove the pan from the oven and let cool for 10 minutes before serving with toast.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large eggs、milk (1 ½cups)、applesauce (½cup)、sunflower butter (¼cup)、maple syrup (¼cup)、vanilla extract (2teaspoons)、old fashion oat (3cups)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、ground cinnamon (1teaspoon)、fine salt (½teaspoon)、topping of your choice
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Place milk, applesauce, nut butter, maple syrup, vanilla, and eggs in a medium-sized bowl. Whisk until combined.
2: Add oats, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt. Stir quickly to make sure everything is well-hydrated.
3: Pour batter into a greased muffin tin, and add toppings of your choice. Bake for 20–25 minutes or until the middle springs back when gently pressed.
4: Oatmeal cups can be enjoyed immediately and/or frozen in an airtight container (once completely cool) to be enjoyed later by microwaving for 2 minutes.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:onion、potatoes、olive oil (2cups)、eggs、salt (1pinch)
instructions:
0: Heat up the olive oil in a really hot pan.
1: Thinly slice the onion.
2: Slice the potatoes into 3-millimeters thick pieces.
3: Fry the vegetables in the olive oil over high heat for 10-15 minutes until they caramelize.
4: Drain the vegetables and save the olive oil for later use.
5: Add 6 eggs to a bowl and whisk. Add the fried vegetables, stir, and leave to set for 15-20 minutes.
6: In a nonstick pan, fry the egg mixture over high heat for 1 minute, then reduce to a low heat for 2-4 minutes.
7: Cover the pan with a large plate and carefully turn the omelet out onto the plate.
8: Slide the omelet back into the pan and fry for a further 3-5 minutes over low heat. To check the omelet is cooked, gently press on the centre of the omelet. If the surface springs back, it is ready.
9: Repeat step 8 to remove omelet from the pan.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:frozen shredded hash brown (20oz)、shredded cheddar cheese (1 ¼cups)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、eggs、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: In a bowl, combine hash browns, one cup of cheddar (100 g), salt, pepper, and olive oil.
1: Divide hash brown mixture into the cups of a 12-cup muffin tin. Press the hash browns down firmly along the shape of the cups. Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 20 minutes to set the cups.
2: Crack an egg into each cup and sprinkle some salt, pepper, and the remaining cheddar on top. Bake again at 350°F (180°C) for 13-15 minutes, or until the egg whites have set.
3: After they have cooled, remove cups by running a knife along their edges. Serve with all the toppings you desire!
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:plain flour (1 ¾cups)、sugar (3tablespoons)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、salt (1pinch)、milk (1cup)、butter (2tablespoons)、egg、blueberry (1cup)、sugar (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Mix the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt together in a large bowl.
1: Preheat oven to 190°C (375°F).
2: In a smaller bowl, mix the milk, butter, and egg until combined. Whisk into the flour mix until a smooth batter is formed.
3: In an ovenproof pan, melt a tablespoon of butter and swirl around to grease. Pour in the batter, and scatter blueberries over evenly. Sprinkle over more sugar.
4: Bake for 25 minutes.
5: Serve with icing sugar, blueberry jam, and whipped cream.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:banana、oats (½cup)、vanilla yogurt (½cup)、cinnamon (1teaspoon)、agave nectar (1tablespoon)、coffee (1cup)、cashew milk (1cup)、ice (2cups)
instructions:
0: Add the banana, oats, yogurt, cinnamon, agave, coffee, cashew milk, and ice to a blender.
1: Blend until smooth.
2: Serve in a glass topped with a sprinkle of cinnamon.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:whole milk (2cups)、unsalted butter (½cup)、granulated sugar (½cup)、active dry yeast (1pack)、flour (5cups)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、salt
instructions:
0: Generously butter 2 cast-iron skillets or disposable foil cake pans.
1: In a large bowl, whisk together the warm milk, melted butter, and sugar. The mixture should be just warm, registering between 100-110˚F (37-43˚C). If it is hotter, allow to cool slightly.
2: Sprinkle the yeast evenly over the warm milk mixture and let sit for 1 minute.
3: Add 4 cups (500g) of flour to the milk mixture and mix with a wooden spoon until just combined.
4: Cover the bowl with a towel or plastic wrap and set in a warm place to rise for 1 hour.
5: After 1 hour, the dough should have nearly doubled in size.
6: Remove the towel and add an additional ¾ cup (95g) of flour, baking powder, and salt. Stir well, then turn out onto a well-floured surface.
7: Knead the dough lightly, adding additional flour as necessary, until the dough just loses its stickiness and does not stick to the surface.
8: Roll the dough out into a large rectangle, about ½-inch (1 cm) thick. Fix corners to make sure they are sharp and even.
9: In a medium bowl, combine softened butter, brown sugar, and pumpkin spice mix, and stir well.
10: Spread the mixture onto the rolled dough.
11: Roll up the dough, forming a log, and pinch the seam closed. Place seam-side down. Trim off any unevenness on either end.
12: Cut the log in half, then divide each half into 7 evenly sized pieces, about 1½ inches (4 cm) thick.
13: Place 7 cinnamon rolls in each skillet or cake pan, one in the center, six around the sides. Cover with plastic wrap and place in a warm place to rise for 30 minutes.
14: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
15: To prepare the frosting, in a medium mixing bowl, whisk together powdered sugar, coffee, and milk until smooth.
16: Remove the plastic wrap, then bake the cinnamon rolls for 25-30 minutes, until golden brown.
17: While still warm, drizzle evenly with frosting.
18: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:yogurt (½cup)、granola (½cup)、mixed berries (1cup)、honey
instructions:
0: In a jar, layer yogurt, granola, and berries. Top with honey (optional).
1: Refrigerate up to 2 days. If you don’t want soggy granola, wait til you’re ready to eat the parfait to add it.
2: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:egg、bacon (2slices)、chive、parmesan cheese
instructions:
0: Separate the yolk from egg whites.
1: In a chilled metal bowl, whisk the whites until stiff peaks form. Mix in whatever you want. We use bacon, chives and parmesan cheese.
2: Spoon the whites into even piles on a baking sheet and create a well in the center of each pile with the back of the spoon.
3: Bake at 450°F (230°C) for 3 minutes.
4: Put a yolk in each well, bake another 3 minutes.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large sweet potatoes、large eggs、salt、black pepper
instructions:
0: Use a fork to pierce holes all over the sweet potatoes.
1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
2: Microwave the potatoes for 7 minutes until they have softened significantly.
3: Slice the potatoes in half and use a spoon to scrape out the inner flesh, making sure to leave at least a ¼-inch (6 mm) thick border on each side, saving the scooped out potato parts to use for side dishes.
4: Transfer the potatoes to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
5: Fill each of the potatoes with 1 egg and an assortment of fillings for whatever flavor combinations you’d like. Season each potatoes with salt and pepper.
6: Bake for 8-12 minutes, until the egg has cooked to preferred doneness.
7: Top the potatoes and side dishes with your choice of topping and garnishes and serve.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:blueberry (1cup)、raspberry (1cup)、strawberry (1cup)、milk (2cups)
instructions:

2: When ready, mix milk and fruit in a blender until consistency is smooth.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:raspberry (1cup)、blackberry (1cup)、maple syrup (2tablespoons)、black raspberry liqueur (1tablespoon)、cream cheese (4oz)
instructions:
0: Make the filling: Add the raspberries, blackberries, black raspberry liqueur, and 1 tablespoon of maple syrup to a large bowl. Stir and let sit for 10 minutes for the berries to macerate.
1: In a medium bowl, mix together the cream cheese and remaining tablespoon of maple syrup until smooth.
2: Spread the filling evenly over the 4 slices of bread. Arrange some of the berries on 2 slices of the bread and top with the other slices of bread. Press to seal the pieces together.
3: In a shallow dish, whisk together the milk, egg, black raspberry liqueur, and salt.
4: Melt the butter on a griddle or in a large skillet over medium heat. Quickly dip both sides of the bread pockets in the milk mixture, then transfer to the pan and fry on each side for about 3 minutes, until golden brown.
5: In a large bowl, beat the heavy cream until soft peaks form. Add the maple syrup and continue beating until the cream holds medium peaks.
6: Serve the stuffed French toast with a dollop of maple whipped cream and a scoop of macerated berries with their soaking liquid.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:white bread (8slices)、eggs、milk (2tablespoons)、vanilla extract (2teaspoons)、cinnamon (¼teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Mix the filling ingredients together in a small bowl until consistency is smooth. Chill 30 minutes.
1: Roll each slice of bread flat with a mason jar or rolling pin.
2: Put about 1 tablespoon of filling in the center of a slice. Place another slice directly on top, as if you were making a sandwich.
3: NOTE: Be careful not to press down on the center so the filling doesn’t spread.
4: Using a wide-mouth mason jar lid or biscuit/cookie cutter, press firmly down on the sandwich and remove the crust around the lid.
5: Use a knife to refine the edges of the circle. Gently release pocket from lid.
6: Press down firmly on the outer edges of the pocket with a fork to make indentations.
7: Repeat steps 3-8 for each pocket. Set pockets aside.
8: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
9: Line baking sheet with parchment paper. Place baking rack on top of parchment paper and coat with cooking spray.
10: Whisk eggs, milk, vanilla extract, and cinnamon together in a small bowl.
11: Separately dip each pocket in egg mixture, flipping to ensure it gets entirely coated. Let excess drip off.
12: Arrange 4 pockets on baking rack. Bake for 15-25 minutes or until golden brown.
13: Let cool 5-10 minutes.
14: Garnish with powdered sugar and syrup.
15: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:yukon gold potato (2lb)、yellow onion、eggs、garlic (2tablespoons)、cornstarch (1tablespoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、cheddar cheese (½cup)、monterey jack cheese (½cup)、breadcrumb meal (⅓cup)、olive oil (¼cup)、sour cream、green onion
instructions:
0: Using a box grater, shred the potatoes into a towel in a bowl and squeeze out as much liquid as possible.
1: Set aside and grate the onion.
2: Add the grated potatoes and grated onion onion to a large bowl. Add in the eggs, garlic, cornstarch, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese, monterey jack, and breadcrumbs and mix until combined.
3: Take ½ cup of the potato mixture and form into a thin patty, about ⅓-inch thick.
4: Heat cooking oil over medium-high heat and place potato patty into the skillet. Cook for 3-5 minutes on each side, or until golden brown and crispy on the outside. Repeat with remaining patties.
5: Serve with sour cream and green onions on top, and enjoy!
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:greek yogurt (⅔cup)、ripe banana、oats (½cup)、egg、vanilla extract (1tablespoon)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、cinnamon (½teaspoon)、fresh blueberry (½cup)
instructions:
0: In a blender, blend everything besides the blueberries.
1: Pour pancake batter on a griddle or skillet over medium-high heat, and place blueberries on the pancake.
2: Cook until bubbles pop on the surface of the pancake, then flip and cook the other side.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2teaspoons)、red bell pepper、canned black bean (¼cup)、frozen corn (¼cup)、small yellow onion、eggs、salt (¼teaspoon)、ground black pepper (¼teaspoon)、shredded cheddar cheese (¼cup)、whole wheat tortilla
instructions:
0: Heat olive oil in a nonstick skillet over medium heat.
1: Add the bell pepper, black beans, corn, and onions, and cook until caramelized, about 5 minutes.
2: Remove the vegetables from the pan and set aside.
3: Reduce heat to low, and eggs, and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring constantly, until barely set, about 2 minutes.
4: Place the vegetables, scrambled eggs, and cheese in the center of a tortilla, and fold the sides into the center, completely covering the filling.
5: Add the quesadilla, seam side down, to the skillet and cook over medium heat until the outside is toasted and cheese is melted.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:pineapple (1cup)、orange、mango、milk (1 ½cups)、plain greek yogurt (1cup)
instructions:
0: Put fruit in a freezer bag. Seal and store in freezer for up to 3 months.
1: When ready to use, put milk, Greek yogurt, and frozen fruit into a blender and mix until consistency is smooth.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
