instructions:
0: Toast bread and top with avocado slices. Drizzle with Sriracha if desired.
1: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bacon (4slices)、garlic (2cloves)、large eggs、scallions (¼cup)、salt、pepper、yellow potatoes、all-purpose flour (¾cup)、shredded cheddar cheese (1cup)、egg、fresh parsley、ketchup
instructions:
0: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, cook the bacon until crispy, 4-6 minutes. Remove the bacon from the pan and drain on a paper towel-lined plate.
1: In the same pan, add the garlic. Cook over low heat for about 30 seconds, or until it starts to brown. In a medium bowl, beat 8 eggs and add to the pan, along with the scallions, salt, and pepper. Scramble the eggs until mostly set but still a little wet, about 3 minutes. Remove the pan from the heat.
2: Peel the potatoes and grate on the large holes of a box grater onto a clean kitchen towel set over a bowl. Wring out any excess liquid.
3: Transfer the shredded potatoes to a clean, large bowl and add the remaining egg, the flour, and ½ cup (50 g) cheddar cheese, and season with salt and pepper. Mix to combine.
4: Line a 4-inch (10 cm) diameter bowl with plastic wrap.
5: Place ½ cup (75 g) of the grated potato mixture in the bowl. Use the back of a spoon to smooth the potatoes against the sides of the bowl in an even layer, creating a divot in the center.
6: Fill the well with a bit of cheddar cheese, a spoonful of scrambled eggs, a bit of bacon, and top with another sprinkle of cheese.
7: Pick up the sides of the plastic wrap, twisting to create a sealed ball. Repeat with the remaining ingredients.
8: Chill the potato balls for 20 minutes.
9: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or foil and grease with nonstick cooking spray.
10: Unwrap the balls, place them on the prepared baking sheet, and brush with egg wash. Bake for 35-45 minutes, or until the potatoes are crispy and brown.
11: Sprinkle with parsley and serve with ketchup on the side.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large eggs、nonstick cooking spray、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、freshly ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、sausage patties、cheddar cheese (2slices)
instructions:
0: In a liquid measuring cup, lightly beat the eggs.
1: Grease a 10-inch (23 cm) pan with nonstick spray. Place 2 mason jar lids in the pan and heat over medium heat. Add ¼ of the beaten eggs to each lid and season each with ¼ teaspoon salt and ⅛ teaspoon pepper. Cover the pan with a lid and cook for 3–4 minutes, until the eggs are fluffy and set. Repeat with the remaining eggs, salt, and pepper.
2: Add the sausage patties to the pan and cook over medium heat for 1-2 minutes, flipping once, until browned and warmed through.
3: Trim the cheddar cheese slices to fit the size of the mason jar lid.
4: To assemble the sandwiches, stack the sausage and cheddar on 2 of the egg rounds. Top with the other egg rounds.
5: Serve warm.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:dashi powder (⅛teaspoon)、salt (⅛teaspoon)、soy sauce (¼teaspoon)、sugar (½tablespoon)、water (¼cup)、eggs、oil
instructions:
0: In a small bowl, combine the dashi, salt, soy sauce, sugar, and water. Mix until everything is dissolved.
1: In a medium bowl, beat the eggs and add the seasoning mixture. Mix until well-combined.
2: Heat a tamagoyaki pan over medium-high heat. Brush a thin layer of oil on the pan.
3: Pour a third of the egg mixture into pan and quickly swirl to cover the entire pan. When the egg is half-set, gently roll the egg.
4: With the rolled egg still in the pan, pour in another third of the egg mixture. Lift up the rolled egg and let the mixture to flow under it. When the egg is half-set, roll the omelette toward you. Repeat with the rest of the egg mixture.
5: Slice into bite-sized pieces.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:fresh blueberry (3tablespoons)、oat flour (¼cup)、baking powder (½teaspoon)、honey (2tablespoons)、egg white、nutmeg (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Mix together egg white and honey in a greased coffee mug.
1: Add oat flour, baking powder, and nutmeg, and mix until combined.
2: Add in fresh blueberries.
3: Microwave on high for 90 seconds (times may vary).
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bread (4slices)、butter (1tablespoon)、graham cracker (4crackers)
instructions:
0: Whisk eggs, cinnamon, vanilla and milk together in medium-large bowl to create egg wash.
1: Crush graham crackers into crumbs.
2: Dunk bread in egg wash then cover in crumbs until evenly coated.
3: Melt butter in a skillet on medium-low heat and cook bread for 2-3 minutes or until crumbs are crispy and bread is more solid.
4: Once you flip them over once spread fluff on one slice and melted chocolate on the other.
5: Press slices together and stack.
6: Garnish with mini marshmallows, mini chocolate chips (optional) and chocolate syrup.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:gluten-free oats (1 ½cups)、milk (1cup)、large egg、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、baking powder (½teaspoon)、salt
instructions:
0: Place the oats in the bowl of a food processor or blender and pulse until finely ground. Set aside.
1: In a large bowl, combine the milk, egg, vanilla, ground oats, baking powder, and a pinch of salt and whisk until well incorporated and smooth.
2: For pancakes, pour ½ cup of batter in a nonstick skillet over medium heat. Fry until the sides begin to set, then flip the pancake and fry the other side for about 2 minutes. Remove from heat.
3: For waffles, pour 1 heaping cup of batter into a greased waffle iron set to high heat. Close the waffle press and cook until set, about 4 minutes.  Carefully remove from waffle iron.
4: Top the pancakes or waffles with maple syrup and fruit as desired.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:rolled oats (2 ½cups)、large eggs、full-fat greek yogurt (1cup)、honey (¾cup)、lemon juice (¼cup)、lemon zest (1teaspoon)、poppy seeds (¼cup)、baking powder (2 ¼teaspoons)、salt (1pinch)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C.)
1: Using a food processor, grind the rolled oats until they have become a fine powder.  Set aside.
2: In a large bowl, whisk the eggs until pale and foamy.
3: Add the Greek yogurt to the eggs and whisk until the mixture is smooth.
4: Add in the honey, lemon juice, and lemon zest and whisk until well combined.
5: Sprinkle the oat flour, poppy seeds, baking powder, and salt. Fold the ingredients together until no dry oat flour appears.
6: Pour the batter into a greased loaf pan.
7: Bake for 30-35 minutes, until a golden-brown crust has started to form and the loaf springs back when touched.
8: Let the loaf cool for 15 minute before removing it from the pan.
9: Slice and serve.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:vegan margarine (¼cup)、soy milk (½cup)、sunflower oil (2tablespoons)、plain flour (2cups)、caster sugar (½cup)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Gently melt the butter over a low-medium heat. Add milk and 2 tablespoons of sunflower oil and mix together. Once combined, take off the heat and set aside.
1: In a separate bowl, combine the flour, half of the sugar, baking powder and salt with a fork. Make a well in the centre.
2: Pour the butter mixture into the well. Combine gradually until a thick dough forms.
3: Using your hands, roll dough into little flat balls and with your thumb, press a hole in the centre of each doughnut. (You may need to flour your hands for this part to avoid getting sticky!)
4: Heat up the litre of oil in a pan. To know when it's hot enough, fry a little bit of bread in the oil. If it goes brown and floats to the top, in 45-50 seconds the oil will be ready!
5: Gently lay the doughnuts into the oil using a spatula. Fry for about 3-5 minutes on each side, until golden brown.
6: Transfer the doughnuts onto some tissue paper to soak up any excess oil. Then roll into a bowl of the remaining sugar.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray、ripe bananas、large eggs、nonfat greek yogurt (¾cup)、honey (½cup)、vanilla extract (1 ½teaspoons)、whole wheat flour (2 ¼cups)、baking soda (1 ½teaspoons)、walnuts (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C). Grease a bundt pan with nonstick spray.
1: In a large bowl, mash the bananas. Add the eggs, yogurt, honey, and vanilla and whisk to combine.
2: Add the flour and baking soda and stir with a rubber spatula to incorporate. Fold in the walnuts.
3: Pour the batter into the prepared bundt pan. Smooth the top with a spatula.
4: Bake for about 50 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Baking times may vary, so keep an eye on the bread.
5: Invert the cake onto a wire rack set over a baking sheet and let cool completely.
6: Make the frosting: In a small bowl, mix together the powdered sugar and 2 tablespoons of Greek yogurt. Add more yogurt as needed until your desired consistency is reached.
7: Pour the frosting over the bread. Quickly sprinkle more walnuts on top before the frosting sets.
8: Slice and serve.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bananas、granulated sugar (⅓cup)、brown sugar (1tablespoon)、vanilla extract (2teaspoons)、milk (1 ½cups)、cornmeal (2cups)、salt (1teaspoon)、baking powder (2teaspoons)、cinnamon (2teaspoons)、butter (1teaspoon)、butter、honey
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, mash the bananas. Add the granulated sugar, brown sugar, and vanilla and whisk until evenly incorporated.
1: Add the milk and whisk to combine.
2: Sift in the cornmeal, salt, baking powder, and cinnamon and whisk until fully incorporated.
3: In a medium pan over medium heat, melt the butter and add ⅓ cup (40 g) of pancake batter.
4: Cook for 3-5 minutes, or until lightly golden brown, then flip. Cook for 2-3 minutes more on the other side, then remove from the pan. Repeat with the remaining batter.
5: Serve with honey and butter.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:white bread (8slices)、ham (8slices)、cheddar cheese (4slices)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、garlic (2cloves)、large eggs、salt、pepper、fresh chive
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Lay out the bread on a work surface and use a glass or a rolling pin to flatten.
2: Place a circle of ham in the middle of 4 slices of bread. Top with one circle of cheddar and another slice of ham.
3: Place the remaining slices of bread on top and, using the lid of a mason jar or a cookie cutter, press down to create 4 pockets. Make sure the seams are closed, pinching to seal if necessary. Reserve the bread with the circle cut-outs.
4: Place the pockets on a baking sheet.
5: In a small bowl, mix the melted butter and garlic. Brush the pockets with garlic butter.
6: Bake for 15 minutes, or until toasted.
7: Place the reserved bread on a baking sheet and brush with the remaining garlic butter.
8: Crack 1 egg into each circle, and season with salt and pepper.
9: Bake for 5 minutes, or until the yolk is cooked to your preference.
10: Serve the egg bread with the ham and cheese pockets and sprinkle with chives.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cream cheese (16oz)、powdered sugar (1cup)、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、brioche bread (10slices)、eggs、strawberry (16oz)、milk (⅓cup)、granulated sugar (2teaspoons)、cinnamon (1teaspoon)、maple syrup、powdered sugar (⅓cup)
instructions:
0: Make the filling: In a large bowl, use a spatula to combine the cream cheese, powdered sugar, and the vanilla extract. Mix together until fluffy and smooth.
1: Lay out a piece of plastic wrap and arrange 4 rows of 2 whole slices of brioche bread. Cut 2 pieces of brioche bread in half and add to the end of each row.
2: Beat 1 egg in a small bowl. Brush egg wash on the left side of each piece of bread, except for the farthest left pieces in each row. Overlap the right edges over the egg wash and press to adhere. Brush egg was along the bottom of each row of bread, except for the bottom row. Overlap the top edges of each row over the egg wash and press to adhere.
3: Use a spatula to spread an even layer of the filling over the bread. Distribute the strawberries over the filling.
4: Using the plastic wrap for help, roll up the bread. Twist the ends of the plastic to seal.
5: Freeze for 1 hour.
6: In a medium bowl, whisk together the remaining 3 eggs, the milk, sugar, and cinnamon.
7: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
8: Remove the roll from the freezer. Remove plastic wrap and transfer to a greased baking sheet. Brush all over with the cinnamon egg mixture.
9: Bake for 12 minutes, or until golden brown.
10: Remove from oven. Dust with powdered sugar, slice, and serve with a drizzle of maple syrup.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:eggs
instructions:
0: Bring a pot of water to a rapid boil.
1: Gently lower the eggs into the water and cover. Cook the eggs for exactly 6 minutes for soft-boiled eggs, 8 minutes for medium-boiled eggs, and 11 minutes for hard-boiled eggs.
2: Once time has elapsed, scoop out the eggs and immediately transfer to an ice bath to chill.
3: Peel the eggs.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pancake mix (4cups)、eggs、milk (2cups)、banana、chocolate chips (¾cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚C).
1: Pour pancake mix, milk, and eggs into a bowl and mix just until combined.
2: Pour batter onto a parchment-lined baking sheet and spread to the edges.
3: Place banana slices on top of the batter, followed by the chocolate chips.
4: Bake for 15 minutes, or until golden brown.
5: Cut into squares and serve immediately, or freeze up to 1 month. To reheat, place on a microwave-safe plate and heat for 20 seconds per pancake on the plate.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:vegetable oil (1cup)、corn tortillas、black beans (14oz)、mexican blend cheese (1cup)、pico de gallo (1 ½cups)、eggs、red enchilada sauce (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat your oven to 375˚F (190˚C)
1: In vegetable oil, lightly fry your corn tortillas. Drain on a paper towel.
2: In a 9 inch (25cm) cast iron skillet, arrange your lightly fried tortillas so they cover the bottom of the skillet.
3: Add black beans evenly over tortillas. (Some will fall in-between the tortillas, thats ok!)
4: Sprinkle Mexican blend cheese over the black beans.
5: Add pico de gallo on top of the cheese.
6: Using the back of a large spoon, create 6 wells in the pico de gallo for the eggs to rest in.
7: Crack one egg into each well (6 wells for 6 eggs).
8: Pour enchilada sauce over everything!
9: Bake for 20-25 minutes. Check on it often to make sure your yolks don’t overcook!
10: Top with your favorite huevos rancheros toppings.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all-purpose flour (2 ½cups)、brown sugar (¼cup)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、McCormick® Ground Cinnamon (1 ¾teaspoons)、McCormick® allspice (¼teaspoon)、ground nutmeg (½teaspoon)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、baking soda (1teaspoon)、buttermilk (2cups)、unsalted butter (1stick)、large eggs、carrot (1 ½cups)、unsalted butter (5tablespoons)、walnuts (¼cup)、cream cheese (10tablespoons)、maple syrup (10teaspoons)
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour,  brown sugar, salt, cinnamon, allspice, baking powder, and baking soda.
1: In a medium bowl or liquid measuring cup, whisk together the buttermilk, melted butter, and eggs.
2: Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and fold with a rubber spatula until just combined. 4. Gently fold in the grated carrots.
3: Let the batter rest for 15-30 minutes at room temperature.
4: Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a medium skillet over medium-low heat. Once the butter is bubbling add ⅓ cup (75 g) of batter to the pan. Cook for 2-3 minutes, until bubbles start to appear on the surface. Flip the pancake over and cook for another 1-2 minutes, until golden brown and cooked through. Repeat with the remaining batter, adding more butter as needed. As you cook the pancakes, keep them warm in a low oven or cover with foil.
5: Serve the pancakes with a pat of cream cheese, a drizzle of maple syrup, and a sprinkling of walnuts.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:dinner rolls or Hawaiian sweet rolls、eggs、ham (6slices)、white cheddar cheese (6slices)、cooked bacon (6strips)、baby spinach (3oz)、butter (2tablespoons)、black pepper (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Slice the rolls in half lengthwise. Place the bottom half in a 9 x 13-inch (23 x 33 cm) rimmed baking dish. Spread the eggs evenly over the rolls, then add the ham, cheddar, bacon, and spinach. Top with the remaining rolls.
2: Brush the tops of the rolls with melted butter and sprinkle the pepper on top. Bake for 20 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown. Slice into individual sliders, then serve.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil、yellow onion (1cup)、orange bell pepper、salt、pepper、cumin (½teaspoon)、paprika (½teaspoon)、garlic (3cloves)、crushed tomatoes (28oz)、bay leaf、fresh baby kale (1 ½cups)、large eggs、feta cheese (¼cup)、bread
instructions:
0: Heat a large cast iron skillet over medium-low heat.
1: Once the pan is hot, add the olive oil and swirl to coat the pan. Add the onion, bell pepper, salt, and pepper. Sauté 5 minutes, or until the onion is almost translucent.
2: Add the cumin, paprika, and garlic. Sauté 2-3 minutes, or until the garlic is slightly brown.
3: Pour in the crushed tomatoes and add the bay leaf. Simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until the mixture has thickened.
4: Stir in the baby kale until wilted.
5: Reduce the heat to low, then carefully crack the eggs into the sauce. Cover and simmer until the egg whites are set, about 10-12 minutes.
6: Top with the feta cheese and remove the pan from the heat.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients: quaker rolled oat (½cup)、fresh pasteurized milk (3fl oz)、natural yogurt (¼cup)、lemon  zest (1teaspoon)、raspberry (⅓cup)
instructions:
0: Add all of the ingredients except for the raspberries in a clean mason jar.
1: Stir everything together.
2: Add the raspberries.
3: Put a lid on the mason jar and refrigerate overnight in 40°F (5°C).
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (½cup)、brown sugar (¾cup)、cinnamon (1teaspoon)、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、bananas
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: Over medium-high heat, melt butter and stir together brown sugar, cinnamon, and vanilla. Bring to a simmer and add the sliced bananas.
2: In a large bowl, whisk 8 eggs, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, vanilla, heavy cream, and milk.
3: Add the cubes of French bread, and gently stir until the bread has soaked up all the liquid.
4: Pour the bread into a greased 9x13 inch (23x33 cm) baking dish. Top with the banana and sugar glaze.
5: Bake for 45-50 minutes until golden brown and slightly crispy around the edges and top.  (Times and temperatures may vary based on oven).
6: Serve with powdered sugar on top.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:whole wheat flour (1 ½cups)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、almond milk (⅔cup)、unsweetened applesauce (1 ¼cups)、eggs、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、blueberry、strawberry、dark chocolate chip、banana
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
1: In a bowl, mix whole wheat flour and baking powder.
2: Add in milk, applesauce, egg, and vanilla extract. Mix until well combined.
3: Pour pancake mix on a greased baking sheet and evenly spread out.
4: Add desired toppings onto the whole pan or place in different corners for a variety.
5: Bake for 15 minutes.
6: Cut into squares. Serve now or freeze for up to a month.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bread flour (3 ½cups)、instant yeast (1package)、salt (1tablespoon)、white sugar (2tablespoons)、warm water (1 ½cups)、water (6qt)、barley malt syrup (1 ½tablespoons)、egg
instructions:
0: In a food processor, add the flour, yeast, salt, and sugar. Pulse until incorporated.
1: While running, slowly add the warm water until the dough balls up. You may not need all the warm water.
2: Carefully push the dough back into the blade’s path and continue to process for an additional 30 seconds or until the dough is firm and stretchy, but not sticky nor squishy.
3: Gently round the dough into a ball and place in a lightly oiled bowl. Cover with a damp, warm towel for an hour or until the dough has doubled in size.
4: Add the barley malt syrup to about 6 quarts of water and bring to a boil.
5: Place a tray with about 2 quarts of water on the bottom shelf of the oven. Preheat to 425°F (220°C).
6: Place the dough onto a lightly floured surface and divide into 6 equal pieces (roughly 5 ounces (140 g) a piece if you use a scale). Cover the pieces with a damp towel.
7: One at a time, form the dough into a ball, pinching the seams together at the bottom. Place the dough seam side down and–cupping your hand over the dough–apply gentle pressure, working the ball in circles until the seams on the bottom are smoothed out. Gently reshape the edges of the ball into a circle.
8: Using your thumb, press down into the center of the ball to the counter. Working in a circle, carefully stretch the dough into a ring until the hole at the center is about 2 inches (5 cm) in diameter.
9: Place the dough rings under a damp towel and let rise for 10 minutes.
10: Working in batches of two, place the bagels in the boiling water/syrup. They should float at the surface. Let them boil for 30 seconds, then flip and boil for an additional 30 seconds.
11: Remove the bagels from the water/syrup and gently pat dry with a clean towel.
12: Brush the tops with the beaten egg. Optionally, if you want toppings, dip the egg-washed side of the bagel into the mixture of your choice.
13: Place the bagels on a parchment paper-covered baking sheet. Bake until golden brown, about 15 to 20 minutes.
14: Transfer to a wire rack to cool.
15: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bread (1slice)、egg、milk (2tablespoons)、cheddar cheese (1pinch)、salt、pepper、fresh spinach (1small handful)、red pepper、tomato
instructions:
0: Slice bread into cubes.
1: In a bowl, add egg, milk, cheese, salt, and pepper, and mix.
2: In a microwave-safe mug, place half of the cubed bread and desired amount of spinach and red pepper.
3: Place the rest of the bread and fixins and pour the egg mixture into the mug.
4: Microwave for 1½ minutes or until egg is fully cooked.
5: Sprinkle with some tomatoes, if desired.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:heavy cream (1cup)、dark chocolate (1cup)、egg yolks、white sugar (2tablespoons)、butter (3tablespoons)、milk (1 ½cups)、all-purpose flour (2cups)、baking powder (2teaspoons)、salt (1teaspoon)、egg whites
instructions:
0: Add the dark chocolate into the heated heavy cream. Mix both together until the chocolate fully melts forming a chocolate ganache.
1: Pour the ganache into mason jar lid rings that are laying on a parchment paper-lined sheet tray. Freeze the chocolate ganache for at least 15 minutes to firm up.
2: In a large bowl, add the egg yolks, sugar, and melted butter, whisk until smooth. Add in the milk, whisk again. Then sift in the flour, baking powder and salt.
3: Whisk the dry ingredients into the wet until as smooth as possible. Small lumps are perfectly fine.
4: Beat the egg whites until stiff peaks form and then fold them into the pancake batter until just combined.
5: In a small skillet, melt butter until bubbling and then add your pancake batter. Take chocolate ganache disc straight from the freezer and place on top of the batter and press in down to the center. Put another layer of batter over the top. 
6: Cover the skillet with a lid and let the pancakes cook on low heat for 20-30 minutes or until the top has full set. Then flip the pancake and cook the other side for 2 minutes on medium heat to color the other side.
7: Serve with butter, maple syrup, powdered sugar, or berries (optional).
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:red onion、salt、vinegar (1cup)、plantains、water (5cups)、canola oil (2cups)、dominican frying cheese (12slices)、flour (1cup)、dominican salami (18slices)、butter (6tablespoons)、eggs、avocado
instructions:
0: Place the sliced onions in a medium bowl with a heavy pinch of salt and vinegar. Let soak while preparing the other ingredients, about 1 hour.
1: Peel the plantains and cut into quarters. Place the plantains in a large pot with enough water to cover them by 1 inch (2 cm). Add salt to taste. Bring the plantains to a boil over high heat and cook until they are very tender, about 30 minutes.
2: Meanwhile, in a medium skillet, heat the canola oil to 350°F (180°C) over high heat.
3: Coat each slice of Dominican frying cheese in flour, and then place the slices in 1¾ cups (420 ML) canola oil and fry until both sides are golden brown, about 3 minutes. Remove from skillet and transfer to a paper towel-lined plate.
4: Add another tablespoon of oil to the skillet and fry the salami until brown and crispy on both sides, 4 minutes. Remove from the skillet, transfer to a paper towel-lined plate.
5: Wipe out the skillet, and add another tablespoon of oil to the pan. Pour in the onions and their soaking liquid. Sauté until the onions are soft and bright pink, about 10 minutes.
6: Once the plantains are tender, scoop them out from the water and place in a separate large bowl, and keep the starchy boiling liquid warm on the stove.
7: Add the butter and about 1 cup (240 ml) of the hot starchy plantain liquid. Mash the cooked plantains together until it is creamy and smooth. Add more liquid as needed.
8: Serve the mangú with the fried cheese, fried salami, avocado, and fried eggs. Garnish with pickled onions.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:hash brown (1lb)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、vegetable oil (1tablespoon)、eggs、heavy cream (⅓cup)、bacons、cheddar cheese (1cup)、fresh chives (1tablespoon)、ketchup
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350˚F (175˚C).
1: In a medium bowl, season hash browns with salt, pepper, and paprika. Toss until fully incorporated.
2: In a medium skillet, cook six slices of bacon until crispy. Set bacon aside and remove excess fat from the pan.
3: Heat oil in skillet, then spread hash browns so they take the shape of the pan and form a nest.
4: Cook hash browns for roughly 7 minutes on medium so that the bottom forms a crispy crust.
5: In a medium bowl, whisk eggs, milk, chopped bacon, and cheddar cheese.
6: Pour egg mixture over hash browns and spread evenly.
7: Bake for 20 minutes, or until the surface is golden brown and eggs are cooked through.
8: Sprinkle fresh chives, slice, and serve while hot. (This dish is delicious with ketchup or hot sauce, but that’s optional.)
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:russet potato (4lb)、salt、pepper、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、cayenne pepper (¼teaspoon)、onion powder (1teaspoon)、shredded parmesan cheese (1cup)、olive oil (¼cup)、cheddar cheese (12slices)、deli ham (12slices)、large eggs、fresh chive
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Grease a 9x13-inch (23x33-cm) baking dish with non-stick cooking spray
1: Peel the potatoes, then shred on the large holes of a box grater. Transfer to a large bowl of water and swirl around to remove excess starch. Drain and rinse, then place the potatoes in a clean kitchen towel and squeeze until they’re completely dry.
2: Add the shredded potatoes to a clean, large bowl with the salt, pepper, garlic powder, cayenne, onion powder, Parmesan cheese, and olive oil. Toss until fully combined.
3: Transfer the potato mixture to the baking dish. Spread evenly.
4: Bake for 1½  hours, or until the potatoes are tender throughout and golden brown on the top and bottom.
5: Press the bottom of a glass into the potato mixture to create 6 evenly spaced wells.
6: Shingle slices of cheddar cheese and ham around the wells, then crack an egg into each one.
7: Bake for 15 minutes more, or until the cheese melts and the egg whites are set. The egg yolks should still be slightly soft.
8: Serve and sprinkle with chives, if desired.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pre-sliced sandwich bread (6slices)、streaky bacon (12slices)、butter (¼cup)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 190°C (375°F).
1: Cut the crusts off the bread.
2: Slice the bacon in half lengthways, and wrap a piece around each crust. Place them on a baking tray.
3: Brush cupcake tin with melted butter. Press the bread into the muffin tin, then brush more butter onto the bread.
4: Bake the bacon soldiers for 10 minutes til they are about halfway cooked and starting to render their fat.
5: At the same time, bake bread cups for 10 minutes or until the bread is turning golden brown.
6: Flip the bacon. Crack an egg into each bread cup. Season with salt and pepper.
7: Bake the bacon soldiers for another 10-12 minutes until the bacon is crispy. At the same time, bake the eggs for another 10-12 minutes until they are just cooked.
8: Dip and Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all purpose flour (¼cup)、granulated sugar (2tablespoons)、dark brown sugar (2tablespoons)、kosher salt (¼teaspoon)、ground cinnamon (½teaspoon)、unsalted butter (3tablespoons)、walnuts (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Make the walnut streusel: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Line a baking sheet with a nonstick mat.
1: In a medium bowl, combine the flour, granulated and brown sugars, salt, and cinnamon. Work the butter into the dry ingredients with a fork until crumbly. Add the chopped walnuts and mix well.
2: Spread the streusel on the prepared baking sheet and bake for 20 minutes, stirring halfway, until golden brown. Remove from the oven and let cool slightly, then crumble and let cool completely before using. The streusel will keep in an airtight container for 1 week.
3: Make the French toast: In a large baking dish, beat the eggs, then add the milk, cream, vanilla, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt and whisk well to combine.
4: Add the bread in a single layer and press down gently into the custard. Let soak for 5 minutes, then flip and soak for another 10 minutes.
5: Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in a large skillet over medium heat. When the foaming subsides, carefully transfer 2 slices of bread from the custard to the pan and cook until golden brown, about 2 minutes per side. Repeat with remaining butter and soaked bread.
6: Top the French toast with the walnut streusel and maple syrup.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:coconut milk (1 ½cups)、fresh spinach (1cup)、vanilla protein powder (1scoop)、mango (1 ½cups)、pineapple (1 ½cups)
instructions:
0: Put milk and spinach into a blender and blend until spinach is fully incorporated into the milk.
1: Add in remaining ingredients and blend until smooth.
2: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:vegan margarine (¼cup)、soy milk (½cup)、sunflower oil (2tablespoons)、plain flour (2cups)、caster sugar (½cup)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Gently melt the butter over a low-medium heat. Add milk and 2 tablespoons of sunflower oil and mix together.
1: Once combined, take off the heat and set aside.
2: In a separate bowl, combine the flour, half of the sugar, baking powder and salt with a fork.
3: Make a well in the center and pour in the butter mixture. Combine gradually until a thick dough forms.
4: Using your hands, roll dough into little flat balls and with your thumb, press a hole in the center of each doughnut. (You may need to flour your hands for this part to avoid getting sticky!)
5: Heat up oil in a pan. To know when it's hot enough, fry a little bit of bread in the oil. If it goes brown and floats to the top, in 45-50 seconds the oil will be ready!
6: Gently lay the doughnuts into the oil using a spatula. Fry for about 3-5 minutes on each side, until golden brown.
7: Transfer the doughnuts onto some tissue paper to soak up any excess oil.
8: Roll the doughnut into a bowl of the remaining half of sugar.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:whole wheat bread (9slices)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、large white onion、red bell peppers、garlic (3cloves)、salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (1teaspoon)、cumin (1teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、cayenne (½teaspoon)、chili powder (½teaspoon)、chopped tomato (28oz)、large eggs、fresh parsley (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C). Set a wire rack over a baking sheet.
1: Arrange the bread slices on the wire rack, then bake for 8 minutes, until slightly toasted.
2: Heat the olive oil in a large cast-iron skillet over high heat. Add the onion and cook for 5 minutes, until softened.
3: Add the red pepper and cook for 5 minutes, or until softened.
4: Add the garlic, salt, pepper, cumin, paprika, cayenne, chili powder, and tomatoes. Stir occasionally for 15 minutes, or until thickened.
5: Spoon the shakshuka sauce onto the bread. Spread evenly.
6: Make a small well in the center of the sauce on each slice of bread. Carefully add an egg to each well.
7: Season the eggs with salt and pepper.
8: Bake for 20 minutes, or until the egg whites are set and the yolks are cooked to your liking.
9: Sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve warm.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:rolled oats (1cup)、salt、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、dates、water (4cups)
instructions:
0: Place the rolled oats in a blender.
1: Add salt to taste. For sweetness, add the vanilla extract and/or the pitted dates, if you’d like.
2: Add the water and blend on high for 1 minute.
3: Double strain the liquid into a medium-sized container using a cheesecloth-lined strainer.
4: Serve immediately or refrigerate in a sealed container for up to 3 days.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pineapple (1cup)、mango (1cup)、banana、milk (2cups)
instructions:
0: Mix fruits together in a plastic bag.
1: Seal bag and place in freezer for up to 6 months.
2: When ready, mix milk and fruit in a blender until consistency is smooth.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pancake mix (6cups)、eggs、milk (3cups)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚C).
1: In a large bowl, combine pancake mix, eggs and milk being careful not to over-mix.
2: Divide batter evenly onto two parchment paper-lined 17x11 inch baking sheets. Spread evenly and bake for 15 minutes.
3: In a large bowl, combine eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour the eggs onto a parchment paper-lined 17x11 inch baking sheet. Spread evenly and bake for 15-17 minutes.
4: Line another 18x13 inch baking sheet with parchment paper and spread out the sausage from corner to corner. Decrease oven temperature to 350˚F (180˚C) and bake for 20 minutes.
5: Drain fat, and sprinkle cheese on top of the sausage. Bake for another 5 minutes at the same temperature.
6: On a cutting board, layer the sandwich starting with a pancake, followed by sausage, egg, and the second pancake. Slice into breakfast size sandwiches and serve immediately, or wrap in parchment and freeze in a container for up to 1 month.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:black tea (1cup)、almond milk (½cup)、vanilla protein powder (1tablespoon)、plain yogurt (½cup)、banana、blueberry (1cup)、ice (2cups)、sliced almond
instructions:
0: Add the black tea, almond milk, protein powder, yogurt, banana, blueberries, and ice to a blender.
1: Blend until smooth.
2: Serve in a glass topped with sliced almonds.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large cucumber、mint leaf (¼cup)、green apple、honey (1tablespoon)、avocado、ice (1 ½cups)
instructions:
0: Place the cucumber, mint, apple, honey, and avocado in a blender or food processor and blend until just combined.
1: Add in the ice and continue to blend until the mixture is smooth.

output:

ingredients:oat flour (1cup)、vanilla protein powder (2scoops)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、cinnamon (1teaspoon)、egg white (¾cup)、low-fat greek yogurt (4tablespoons)、coconut oil (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: In a bowl, mix oat flour, protein powder, baking powder, and cinnamon until fully blended.
1: Add egg whites and Greek yogurt to the bowl and mix until a batter-like consistency is reached.
2: Melt coconut oil in a skillet over medium-high heat and wipe down to prevent the pancakes from sticking.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ham (6slices)、eggs、egg yolks、white vinegar (½teaspoon)、butter (½cup)、lemon juice (4tablespoons)、salt、black pepper、english muffins
instructions:
0: Egg Cups: Grease a large muffin tin. Place a slice of ham in each tin, then crack an egg over each slice of ham. Cover with tin  foil, then bake at 350˚F (175˚C) for 8-10 minutes (eight minutes if you like your yolk very runny).
1: Hollandaise sauce: Fill the bottom of a double boiler part-way with water. Make sure that the water doesn’t touch the top bowl. Bring water to a gentle simmer. In the top of the double boiler, whisk together three egg yolks and ½ tsp white vinegar until well mixed.
2: Slowly pour the melted butter in the egg yolk mixture, a little at a time, while constantly whisking. If you pour too much too quickly without whisking, the mixture might not thicken or mix properly. If the hollandaise gets too thick, add a teaspoon or two of hot water. Continue whisking until all the butter is incorporated.
3: Remove from heat, whisk in lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
4: Place a toasted English muffin half down, layer the ham and egg cup on top of the English muffin, then drizzle your hollandaise sauce over the egg.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:lemon、almond milk (½cup)、whole wheat pastry flour (2 ½cups)、organic cane sugar (½cup)、baking powder (1tablespoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、poppy seeds (2tablespoons)、food-grade lavender (1tablespoon)、coconut oil (½cup)、large egg、powdered sugar (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: Zest the lemon into a small bowl and set aside.
2: Juice the lemon and set aside 1 teaspoon for the glaze. Combine the rest with ½ cup (120 ml) of almond milk and set aside for 5-10 minutes while you make the rest of the dough. (The almond milk will curdle, that’s okay! This creates a dairy-free substitute for buttermilk.)
3: In a large bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, poppy seeds, and lavender. Whisk well.
4: Add the coconut oil and cut it into the flour mixture with a pastry cutter, a fork, or your fingers until the flour mixture is crumbly and there are no large chunks left.
5: Add the lemon zest, curdled almond milk, and egg. Fold the ingredients until the dough forms.
6: Transfer the dough to a lightly floured surface. Sprinkle with just enough flour to keep the dough from sticking as you form it into a disc about 1½-2 inches (4-5 cm) thick.
7: Cut the dough into 8 triangular scones. Transfer the scones to the prepared baking sheet, spacing evenly.
8: Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until golden brown. Let cool.
9: Make the glaze: In a small bowl, combine powdered sugar, remaining 1-2 teaspoons of almond milk, and the reserved teaspoon of lemon juice. Whisk until smooth.
10: Drizzle the glaze over the cooled scones and let it harden, 5-10 minutes.
11: Serve with hot tea.
12: Enjoy!

instructions:

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instructions:

instructions:
0: Heat olive oil on medium heat in a 4-quart chicken fryer. Add sweet potatoes, onion, pepper, salt, pepper, paprika, and cumin, and stir. Cook for 10 minutes, occasionally stirring.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instructions:

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:white sandwich bread (36slices)、cream cheese (12oz)、granulated sugar (⅓cup)、lemon zest (1tablespoon)、whole milk (1cup)、heavy cream (¾cup)、light brown sugar (½cup)、large eggs、vanilla extract (2teaspoons)、ground nutmeg (¼teaspoon)、ground cinnamon (5teaspoons)、strawberry preserve (¼cup)、blueberry preserves (¼cup)、raspberry preserves (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: Stack three pieces of bread on top of each other and use a rolling pin to flatten. Trim the crusts, then separate the individual slices. Repeat with the remaining bread.
2: In a medium bowl, combine the cream cheese, ⅓ cup (65 g) granulated sugar, and the lemon zest. Mix well, then set aside.
3: In a separate medium bowl, whisk together the the milk, cream, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, nutmeg, and 2 teaspoons of cinnamon. Set aside.
4: Using an offset spatula, spread about 2 teaspoons of the cream cheese filling across a slice of flattened bread. Top with 1 teaspoon of strawberry preserves and spread across the bread. Spread 11 more slices of bread with the cream cheese filling and strawberry preserves, then repeat with the blueberry preserves and raspberry preserves.
5: Starting from the bottom, tightly roll up each slice of bread, then place seam-side down so they stay closed.
6: In a small bowl, mix together the remaining 2 tablespoons of granulated sugar and remaining 3 teaspoons of cinnamon.
7: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and set a 3-inch (7.5 cm) wide bowl in the center of the pan.
8: Dip each roll up in the custard, allowing any excess to drip off. Arrange 12 roll ups around the bowl on the prepared baking sheet. Brush all over with custard and sprinkle with the cinnamon sugar. Repeat stacking, brushing, and sprinkling with the remaining roll ups. Remove the bowl from the center of the ring.
9: Bake the French toast ring for 22-25 minutes, until golden brown.
10: Replace the bowl in the center of the ring and fill with the maple syrup. Dust the ring with the powdered sugar. Garnish with strawberries, blueberries, and raspberries.
11: Enjoy!

instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).

instructions:

1: In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, heavy cream, 1 teaspoon of salt, and the ricotta. Set aside.
2: Heat a 12-inch (30 cm) cast-iron or stainless steel skillet over medium-high heat. Add the bacon and cook until crisp, 3-5 minutes. Using tongs, transfer the bacon from the pan to a paper towel-lined plate, leaving the rendered bacon fat in the pan.
3: Add the onion to the pan and cook until caramelized, 8-10 minutes.
4: Add the garlic and red pepper flakes and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add the zucchini and sauté until starting to soften, 2-3 minutes.
5: Add the corn and cook for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the zucchini softens further but is still bright green. Season with the remaining teaspoon of salt and the pepper.
6: Pour the egg mixture over the vegetables, then top with the bacon.
7: Transfer the skillet to the oven and bake for 12-15 minutes, until the top is puffed and the eggs are cooked through.
8: Garnish with parsley, then serve directly from the skillet.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:rolled oats (4cups)、raisin (1cup)、peanuts (1cup)、sunflower seeds (½cup)、chia seeds (2tablespoons)、cinnamon (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Combine the rolled oats, raisins, peanuts, sunflower seeds, chia seeds, and cinnamon in a large bowl until evenly mixed.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cauliflower (1head)、grated parmesan cheese (½cup)、garlic powder (¼teaspoon)、salt (¾teaspoon)、eggs、milk (1cup)、feta cheese (½cup)、pepper (½teaspoon)、olive oil (½tablespoon)、asparagus (8spears)、baby spinach (4cups)、green onions
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
1: Add the cauliflower to the bowl of a food processor and pulse until finely crumbled.
2: Place in microwave-safe dish and microwave for 5 minutes. Allow to cool completely.
3: Place cooked cauliflower into a towel and squeeze out as much water as possible. Discard liquid.
4: Add the cauliflower to a bowl with 1 egg, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, and ¼ teaspoon salt in a bowl.
5: Press crust mixture evenly into tart plate, making sure to go up the sides of the plate.
6: Bake for 15-18 minutes, until golden. Set aside to cool.
7: Reduce oven temperature to 375°F (190°C).
8: In a separate bowl, whisk together 5 eggs, milk, crumbled feta cheese, ½ teaspoon salt, and pepper.
9: In a medium skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add asparagus pieces and cook until slightly tender.
10: Add the spinach and cook until wilted.
11: Place asparagus and spinach mixture on the bottom of the cooked cauliflower crust. Pour egg and cheese mixture over the top and sprinkle with green onions.
12: Bake for 45 minutes, or until quiche is set and slightly golden.
13: Let cool for 15 minutes before serving.
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:heavy cream (4cups)、sugar (1 ¼cups)、cinnamon (1tablespoon)、large egg yolks、vanilla extract (2teaspoons)、brioche bread (18slices)、strawberry (½lb)、whipped cream (1cup)
instructions:
0: Pour the heavy cream into a 9x13-inch (23x33 cm) baking dish.
1: Mix 1 cup of sugar (200 g) and the cinnamon in a small bowl and add to the cream, followed by the egg yolks and vanilla. Whisk well to combine.
2: Dip each slice of bread into the cream mixture, coating both sides well. Place the dipped bread on the wire rack set over the baking sheet. Bake for 15 minutes, flip the bread over, then bake for another 15 minutes, until slightly crispy.
3: Slice the strawberries into decorative shapes of your choosing. For a strawberry rose, place a strawberry stem side down and carefully make thin slices around the outer edge of the strawberry, making sure not to cut all the way through. Continue cutting and rotating the strawberry until you get to the center. Fan out the “petals”.
4: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and set a wire rack on top.
5: For a strawberry fan, lay a strawberry on its flattest side. Tilt the knife at a 45˚ angle and make thin, angled slices through the strawberry, keeping the top of the strawberry connected and slicing all the way through the bottom of the berry. Fan out the slices.
6: Sprinkle the remaining sugar on top of the bread and broil on high for 3 minutes, until the sugar has melted and browned, or carefully use a kitchen torch to brûlée the sugar.
7: Top with whipped cream and strawberries and serve.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sausage patty、egg、salt、pepper、milk (1teaspoon)、cheddar cheese (2slices)、frozen waffles
instructions:
0: Place a sausage patty and a mug or ramekin on a large microwaveable-friendly plate.
1: Crack the egg into the mug. Season with salt and pepper. Add a splash of milk, if desired. Whisk until well-mixed.
2: Microwave the entire plate for 1½-2 minutes, or until the egg is cooked through.
3: Invert the mug with the egg. You may have to run a knife around the mug first to ensure that the egg comes loose in one solid piece.
4: Toast two frozen waffles.
5: After the waffles are toasted, layer 1 waffle, cheese, the cooked sausage patty, eggs, and the remaining waffle.
6: Fold the edges of a sheet of aluminum foil down by half an inch (1 cm). Place the sandwich in the middle.
7: Bring the top and bottom of the edges of the paper together over the center of the sandwich. Repeat folding in half-inch (1 cm) turns, creasing each time, until the fold is level with the top of the sandwich.
8: Starting on the left side, use your fingers to press the edges into the center to form a pleated triangle. Press down and crease the triangle's edges, including at the base of the sandwich, before carefully folding it underneath. Repeat this process on the other side of the sandwich.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:warm water (1cup)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、honey (2tablespoons)、salt (2teaspoons)、flour (3 ⅓cups)、yeast (1 ½teaspoons)
instructions:
0: Combine the water, olive oil, honey, salt, flour, water and yeast in a large bowl.
1: Mix well and knead for 10 -15 minutes, until the dough is elastic.
2: Transfer the dough into a well-oiled bowl.
3: Cover with a towel or plastic wrap and let rise for 1 hour in a warm place, until the dough has doubled in size.
4: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
5: Cut the dough into 8 portions and shape into balls. Cover with a towel or plastic wrap. Set aside.
6: Combine the butter, brown sugar, cinnamon, honey and salt in a small bowl and mix well.
7: Spread the brown sugar mixture onto the bottom and sides of a cast iron pan. Line pecans on top of the mixture, and place the dough balls on top.
8: Bake for 20-30 minutes
9: Remove the sticky buns from the oven and allow to cool for 10-15 minutes before inverting onto a plate.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:warm water (1 ¼cups)、active dry yeast (1package)、vanilla cake mix (1box)、flour (2 ¼cups)、rainbow sprinkles (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Pour yeast evenly over the warm water and let it bloom for 5 minutes.
1: In a bowl, combine cake mix and 2 cups (255 g) of flour, then pour in the yeast mixture. Stir until it starts to come together, then add the sprinkles. Gently knead the dough together into a ball.
2: Cover with a towel and let the dough rise for 1 hour in a warm place.
3: Place dough on a floured surface and sprinkle with remaining ¼ cup (30 g) of flour. Knead until it is no longer sticky (some extra flour may be needed).
4: Roll out the dough into an oval shape and spread butter on one side of the dough. Then, dust with cinnamon, brown sugar, and rainbow sprinkles.
5: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
6: Starting at the bottom of the widest end, roll dough and cut into 1½ to 2-inch (4 to 5 cm) pieces and place in a baking dish. Cover with plastic wrap, and rest for 30 minutes. Bake for 15 minutes, or until golden brown.
7: To make the frosting, mix powdered sugar and milk in a bowl until smooth.
8: Drizzle rolls with frosting and extra sprinkles.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:water (1 ⅓cups)、egg、salt (1pinch)、chive
instructions:
0: Bring a medium pot with about 1 cup (240 ml) of water, just enough to cover the bottom of the pan by an inch (2 cm), to a boil.
1: Add the beaten egg to a ramekin and sprinkle in a pinch of salt.
2: While slowly stirring with a fork, pour in the remaining water.
3: Cover with foil and place the ramekin into the boiling water. Cover and steam for 12 minutes. Uncover, carefully remove the ramekin, and take off the foil.
4: Top with chives if you like.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray、granulated sugar (½cup)、ground cinnamon (1teaspoon)、refrigerated cinnamon rolls (2cans)、cream cheese (4oz)、brown sugar (½cup)、unsalted butter (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Grease 12-cup fluted bundt pan with nonstick spray.
1: In a small bowl, mix together the sugar and cinnamon.
2: Open the cans of cinnamon rolls. Cut each roll in half, then flatten each piece into a circle with your fingers. Place a piece of cream cheese in the center of the dough round. Fold the dough over the cream cheese to seal and roll into a ball. Toss in the cinnamon sugar. Place in the prepared bundt pan. Repeat with remaining dough pieces.
3: In a small bowl, whisk together the brown sugar and melted butter until smooth. Pour the mixture over the filled cinnamon roll balls.
4: Bake the monkey bread for 35–40 minutes, or until golden brown. Let cool in the pan for 5–10 minutes, until cool to the touch, then invert onto a serving platter.
5: Add the frosting from the cans of cinnamon rolls into a small microwave-safe bowl. Warm in the microwave for 30 seconds to loosen.
6: Drizzle the icing over the monkey bread. Serve warm.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instructions:

4: Top each cup with strawberries, blueberries and dark chocolate chunks.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsalted butter (1cup)、water (1 ¼cups)、milk (1 ¼cups)、granulated sugar (¼cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、all-purpose flour (1cup)、whole wheat flour (½cup)、baking powder (2teaspoons)、large eggs、vanilla extract (2teaspoons)、rainbow sprinkles (⅓cup)、canola oil (8cups)
instructions:
0: In a large pot over medium heat, combine the butter, water, milk, sugar, and salt. Whisk until the butter is melted and the mixture is steaming, about 5 minutes.
1: Quickly whisk the all-purpose and whole wheat flours and the baking powder into the hot milk mixture. Continue cooking, stirring constantly, for 5 more minutes. Remove the pot from heat and stir with a spatula to cool the dough.
2: When the dough is no longer hot to the touch, add the eggs one at a time, stirring to incorporate before adding the next.
3: Add the vanilla and sprinkles and stir to distribute evenly.
4: Transfer the dough to a piping bag or zip-top bag fitted with a large star tip.
5: On a parchment-lined baking sheet, pipe 4-inch (10-cm) circles of dough. Chill in the freezer until solid, about 20 minutes.
6: Meanwhile, make the glaze: In a large bowl, combine the powdered sugar, milk, vanilla, and cream cheese. Whisk until smooth and runny. Set aside.
7: Heat the oil in a large pot until it reaches 350°F (180°C).
8: Carefully add the crullers to the hot oil. Fry about 3 at a time for 4-5 minutes, flipping halfway, until golden brown. The fried crullers should feel much lighter than they were originally. Transfer the fried crullers to a wire rack set over a baking sheet.
9: While still warm, dip one side of the crullers in the glaze. Return to the wire rack and allow excess glaze to drip off. Top with sprinkles.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:bacon (2lb)、shredded cheddar cheese (3 ½cups)、green onion (½cup)、small onion、garlic powder (2teaspoons)、eggs、milk (1 ½cups)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、medium flour tortillas、fresh cilantro、avocado、grape tomato (1cup)、salsa
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, combine bacon, 2 cups (200 grams) of cheese, onions, and garlic powder. Distribute half of the mixture to a small bowl.

2: Fold the ends of the tortilla over the mixture and continue to roll, tightly.
3: Place tortillas seam side down into a greased casserole dish.
4: In medium bowl, whisk together remaining bacon mixture, 6 eggs, milk, salt, and pepper.
5: Pour egg mixture over the top of the rolled tortillas.
6: Cover with foil, and store in fridge overnight, or until ready to bake.
7: Preheat oven to 350°F (180˚C).
8: Bake enchiladas for 35-40 minutes, or until eggs are fully cooked.
9: Remove the foil and top enchiladas with 1 ½ cups (150 grams) of shredded cheese.
10: Bake for an additional 5 minutes, or until cheese is melted.
11: Top with cilantro and avocado, if desired.
12: Serve warm with tomatoes and salsa, if desired.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:shredded mozzarella cheese (1cup)、feta cheese (1cup)、pizza dough (1lb)、olive oil (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚C).
1: In a small mixing bowl combine the mozzarella and feta and set aside.
2: On a large floured surface, roll out the pizza dough to an oval roughly 10 inches (25 cm) in length.
3: Transfer the dough to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
4: Cover surface of dough with olive oil and spoon on cheese mixture leaving a 1 inch (2 cm) margin around the outside of the dough.
5: Fold in the 1 inch (2 cm) margin creating a crust around the cheese.
6: Brush the crust with egg wash.

8: Remove the baking sheet from oven and with a knife spread out some of the melted cheese in the center of the pizza boat and crack an egg into it.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground pork (1lb)、McCormick® fresh sage (1tablespoon)、McCormick® fresh thyme (1teaspoon)、maple syrup (2tablespoons)、kosher salt (2 ½teaspoons)、McCormick® ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、McCormick® Fennel Seeds (1teaspoon)、McCormick® Paprika (1teaspoon)、McCormick® Garlic Powder (1teaspoon)、medium eggs、roma tomato、flaky sea salt
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: In a large bowl, combine the ground pork, sage, thyme, maple syrup, salt, pepper, fennel, paprika, and garlic powder. Mix with your hands until evenly combined.
2: Divide the sausage mixture evenly between the wells of a 12-cup muffin tin. Using your fingers, press the mixture against the bottom and up the sides of the cups in an even layer that is flush with the tops of the cups.
3: Crack 1 egg into each sausage well, then top with tomato slice and season with flaky salt.
4: Bake for 30 minutes, or until the sausage is golden brown and cooked through and the egg is set. Remove from the oven and let cool slightly.
5: Serve immediately or cool completely and freeze for up to 1 month. To reheat, microwave the cups for x minutes, until warmed through.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:oil、whole wheat flour (1 ½cups)、organic sugar (⅓cup)、baking soda (1 ½teaspoons)、baking powder (1 ½teaspoons)、ground cinnamon (1tablespoon)、ground cardamom (1teaspoon)、ground ginger (2teaspoons)、ground cloves (½teaspoon)、kosher salt (½teaspoon)、quick oat (½cup)、shredded carrots (3cups)、crushed pineapple (1 ½cups)、large eggs、butter (¼cup)、walnuts (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C). Generously grease a 9 x 4 (22 x 10 cm) loaf pan with oil.
1: In a large bowl, sift together the flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, cardamom, ginger, cloves, and salt. Add the oats and whisk to combine.
2: In a separate large bowl, combine the shredded carrots, pineapple, eggs, and melted butter. Mix well.
3: Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and stir until there are no dry clumps left. Gently fold in the walnuts, if using.
4: Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan and smooth the top.
5: Bake for 1 hour, until a toothpick inserted in the center of the bread comes out clean.
6: While the bread is baking, make the Greek yogurt “frosting”: In a small bowl, combine the Greek yogurt, maple syrup, and 2 tablespoons of the reserved pineapple juice. Stir until well incorporated. Chill in the refrigerator until ready to use.
7: Remove the bread from the oven and allow to cool for 10 minutes, until safe to handle. Remove from the loaf pan and let cool completely on a wire rack.
8: Slice the bread and serve with a smear of frosting.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Place the bacon, tomato, and broccoli in greased casserole dish.
2: Sprinkle hash browns and cheese on top.
3: In a large bowl, whisk together pancake mix, eggs, milk, salt, and pepper.
4: Pour pancake mixture over ingredients in the casserole dish.
5: Bake for 45 minutes.
6: Let cool for 5 minutes before serving.
7: Top with scallions, and serve.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large cauliflower (1head)、parmesan cheese (½cup)、fresh chives (⅓cup)、garlic (3cloves)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、dried basil (1teaspoon)、eggs、salt (1teaspoon)、black pepper (½teaspoon)、dipping sauce
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Using a coarse grater, grate the cauliflower until the entire head has crumbled down into small bit.
2: Transfer the cauliflower bits to a bowl and sprinkle over a ½ teaspoon of the salt. Mix the cauliflower to incorporate the salt and let sit for 20 minutes to draw out moisture.
3: Transfer the soaking cauliflower to another bowl lined with a large towel.  Wrap the towel closed and squeeze so that all of the excess liquid is strained.
4: Transfer the cauliflower back into the first bowl used and mix with the cheese, chives, garlic, olive oil, basil, black pepper, eggs and remaining ½ teaspoon of salt.
5: Turnover a large roasting tray and line with parchment paper - this helps prevent burning on the bottom of the hash browns.  Divide the cauliflower mixture into 6 even portions, place on the tray, and shape into hash browns.
6: Bake for 35-40 minutes, until golden brown.
7: Let the hash browns cool for about 15 minutes until they have set.
8: Serve with desired dipping sauce.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:frozen hash brown (3cups)、butter (3tablespoons)、salt (½teaspoon)、onion (¼cup)、seasoned sausage (½lb)、eggs、shredded cheddar cheese (1cup)、milk (½cup)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Mix hash browns with butter and salt, and press into a 9-inch (20cm) pie plate.
1: Bake at 450°F (230°C) for 20 minutes until golden brown.
2: Meanwhile, cook sausage and onions in a skillet until onions are clear and sausage is cooked and crumbled.
3: Transfer to a bowl and cool.
4: Add the eggs, cheese, milk, salt, and pepper. Mix.
5: Pour into the hash brown crust.
6: Bake at 350°F (175°C) for an additional 30 minutes, until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean.
7: Cut and serve with your favorite toppings.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsalted butter (½cup)、whole milk (2cups)、granulated sugar (½cup)、active dry yeast (1packet)、flour (5cups)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、salt (2teaspoons)
instructions:
0: Generously grease a 9-inch (23 cm) cast iron or cake pan.
1: In a large bowl, whisk together warm milk, melted butter, and granulated sugar. The mixture should be just warm, registering between 100-110˚F (40˚C). If hotter, allow to cool slightly.
2: Sprinkle the yeast evenly over the warm mixture and let sit for 1 minute.
3: Add 4 cups (500 grams) of all-purpose flour to the milk mixture and mix with a wooden spoon until just combined.
4: Cover the bowl with a towel or plastic wrap and set in a warm place to rise for 1 hour.
5: Preheat oven to 325˚F (160˚C).
6: After 1 hour, the dough should have nearly doubled in size. Remove the towel and add an additional ¾ cup (95 grams) of flour, the baking powder, and salt. Stir well, then turn out onto a well-floured surface.
7: Knead the dough lightly, adding additional flour as necessary, about ½ cup (60 grams), until the dough just loses its stickiness and does not stick to the surface.
8: Roll the dough out into a large rectangle, about ½-inch (12 mm) thick.
9: In a small bowl combine the strawberry preserves and butter, stir to combine.
10: Spread the filling mixture evenly over the rolled out dough, leave about 1½ inches (4 cm) from the edge.
11: Starting from the bottom roll the dough upward, being careful not to squeeze the filling out.
12: With a knife cut the rolled dough into 8 pieces.
13: Place strawberry roll in the prepared cast iron or cake pan and cover with plastic wrap. Place in a warm spot and leave to rise for 30 minutes. The strawberry rolls should expand to the edges of the pan during this time.
14: Bake for 45 minutes. Cover the rolls with foil to prevent the outside from burning, and bake for an additional 35 minutes.
15: While the strawberry rolls are baking, prepare the frosting. In a medium-size mixing bowl, whisk together cream cheese, butter, vanilla, whole milk, and powdered sugar, until smooth.
16: Remove the strawberry rolls from the oven and let cool in the pan for at least 20 minutes. Once cool, drizzle frosting over the rolls before serving.
17: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray、large eggs、applesauce (1cup)、greek yogurt (½cup)、milk (½cup)、maple syrup (½cup)、vanilla extract (2teaspoons)、muesli (3cups)、baking powder (2teaspoons)、salt (1pinch)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C). Grease a 12-cup muffin tin with cooking spray.
1: In a large bowl, thoroughly beat the eggs, then mix in the applesauce, Greek yogurt, milk, maple syrup, and vanilla until evenly combined.
2: Add 3 cups (240 g) of muesli, the baking powder, and salt. Mix well.
3: Divide the batter between the muffin cups.
4: Sprinkle the remaining 2 tablespoons of muesli over the tops of the muffins.
5: Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until golden brown.
6: Let cool, then serve or store in the fridge for up to a week.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sweet rice flour (1cup)、white sugar (¼cup)、water (1cup)、ice cream、whipped cream、chocolate syrup、raspberry
instructions:
0: Combine sweet rice flour, sugar, and water in a mixing bowl.
1: Cover and microwave for 3 ½ minutes. Stir to make sure everything is well combined. Cover and microwave for another 30 seconds. Stir until the mochi batter gets really stick.
2: If your waffle iron has settings, aim for medium heat. Spoon mochi batter into your waffle iron. Don’t add too much, the mochi batter melts and expands quite a bit. Leave the mochi batter in the waffle iron for about 4-5 minutes.
3: Remove the mochi waffle and let it cool, it will crisp up as it cools.
4: Add ice cream, whipped cream, chocolate syrup, raspberries or whatever else you like.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pancake mix (4cups)、eggs、milk (2cups)、peach、blueberry (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚C).
1: Pour pancake mix, milk, and eggs into a bowl and mix just until combined.
2: Pour batter onto a parchment-lined baking sheet and spread to the edges.
3: Place peach slices on top of the batter, followed by the blueberries.
4: Bake for 15 minutes, or until golden brown.
5: Cut into squares and serve immediately, or freeze up to 1 month. To reheat, place on a microwave-safe plate and heat for 20 seconds per pancake on the plate.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless skinless chicken thighs、kosher salt、freshly ground black pepper、buttermilk (1cup)、dill pickle brine (1cup)
instructions:
0: Marinate the chicken: Generously season the chicken thighs with salt and pepper, then place in a large zip-top bag. Pour in 2 cups (480 G) of buttermilk and the pickle brine. Close the bag and place inside a large bowl. Marinate the chicken thighs in the refrigerator for 6 hours, or up to overnight.
1: Make the biscuits: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
2: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
3: Using a pastry cutter or a fork, incorporate the butter into the dry ingredients, leaving large chunks.
4: Slowly pour in the buttermilk and fold with a rubber spatula until a thick dough forms.
5: Lightly dust a clean surface with flour and turn the dough out onto it. Bring the dough together into one large piece.
6: Adding more flour as needed, roll the dough out with a rolling pin to about 1 inch (2 ½ cm) thick. Using a 3-inch (7 cm) round biscuit cutter or small glass, cut out 6 biscuits and place them on the prepared baking sheet. It’s okay if the biscuits are touching.
7: Brush the biscuits with the melted butter and sprinkle with flaky salt. Reserve the remaining melted butter.
8: Bake the biscuits for 12–15 minutes, or until golden brown.
9: Fry the chicken: Remove the chicken from the refrigerator and let come to room temperature, about 30 minutes.
10: Heat the canola oil in a large pot until it reaches 350°F (180°C). Set a wire rack over a baking sheet.
11: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, onion powder, garlic powder, and salt. Add the buttermilk a bit at a time and stir with a rubber spatula to incorporate into the dry ingredients. It should be clumpy.
12: Transfer a chicken thigh directly from the marinade to the flour mixture. Evenly coat the chicken all over, pressing to adhere the dry ingredients. Set on the wire rack and repeat with the remaining ingredients.
13: Working 3 pieces at a time, add the chicken to the hot oil and cook until golden brown and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C), 5–7 minutes, turning occasionally to make sure the chicken browns evenly. Remove from the oil and let drain on paper towels. Season with salt.
14: Cut the biscuits in half and brush one side with the reserved melted butter. Top with a piece of fried chicken and the other half of the biscuit.
15: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:puff pastry (1sheet)、shredded cheese (½cup)、bacon (5slices)、tomato、eggs、salt、pepper、fresh basil
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)
1: Cut a large circle in the puff pastry sheet.
2: Sprinkle on cheese, and lay on the bacon.
3: Fold the edges of the puff pastry over themselves to make a rim—it doesn’t have to be perfect!
4: Bake for 10 minutes.
5: Remove from oven, and lay the tomatoes around the edge.
6: Crack eggs into the middle.
7: Bake for 15-20 additional minutes, depending on how runny you like your egg.
8: Remove from oven, and sprinkle with salt, pepper, and chopped basil.
9: Slice into pieces, however big you like!
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bagel、eggs、cheddar cheese (2tablespoons)、bacon (2strips)、green onion (1tablespoon)、milk (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
1: In a small bowl, mix cheese, bacon, and green onion.
2: In a small bowl, whip 2 eggs with milk.
3: Carefully hollow out 1 bagel with a small silver spoon. Place both bagel halves on a baking sheet.
4: Fill both bagel halves with cheese and egg mixtures. Bake in the oven for 25 mins, or until the egg is cooked.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large eggs、milk (1cup)、maple syrup (2tablespoons)、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、ground cinnamon (1teaspoon)、salt、whole wheat bread (8slices)、powdered sugar
instructions:
0: Preheat Griddler, fitted with the griddle plates, to 375°F (190°C), and grease with nonstick spray.
1: Use a whisk to beat the eggs in a 9x13-inch (23x33-cm) casserole dish until smooth.
2: Add the milk, maple syrup, vanilla, cinnamon, and salt, and whisk until smooth and well combined.
3: Dunk the bread in the batter, 4 slices at a time, until just soaked. Do not let the bread soak in the wet ingredients too long or it will become too wet and fall apart when you attempt to pick it up.
4: Transfer the soaked bread to the Griddler and cook for 10 minutes.
5: Sprinkle with powdered sugar, drizzle with maple syrup, and serve.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:breakfast sausage (1lb)、scallions、red bell pepper、fresh spinach (8cups)、large eggs、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (2teaspoons)、whole milk (2cups)、nonstick cooking spray、day-old country white bread (8cups)、shredded cheddar cheese (2cups)、chicken stock (½cup)、heavy cream (½cup)
instructions:
0: Add the breakfast sausage to a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Cook, breaking up with a spatula until no longer pink, 7-8 minutes.
1: Add the white and light green scallions, ½ of the bell pepper, and ½ of the spinach. Sauté for 2 minutes, until the spinach is wilted, then add the rest of the spinach and continue cooking until wilted. Remove the pan from the heat and let cool.
2: In a medium bowl, whisk together the eggs, salt, and garlic powder. Add the milk and whisk to incorporate.
3: Grease a 9 (22 cm) x 13-inch (33 cm) glass baking dish with nonstick spray.
4: Add the cubed bread to the baking dish. If you don’t have day-old bread, spread the cubed bread on a baking sheet and dry out in a 300˚F (150˚C) oven for 15-20 minutes.
5: Sprinkle 1 cup (100 G) of shredded cheese over the bread, then evenly spread the sausage mixture on top. Pour the egg mixture over the sausage mixture. Cover the baking dish with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 1 hour, or overnight.
6: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
7: In a liquid measuring cup or small bowl, combine the chicken stock and heavy cream.
8: Pour over the chilled bake. Sprinkle the remaining cup of cheese and remaining bell pepper over the top.
9: Cover with foil and bake for 45 minutes, then uncover and bake for another 15-20 minutes, until the custard is set and the cheese is golden brown. Remove from oven and let cool for 15 minutes.
10: Garnish with the dark green scallions, then slice and serve.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:egg、milk (2tablespoons)、oats (½cup)、baking powder (½teaspoon)、greek yogurt (½cup)、cinnamon (½teaspoon)、brown sugar (1tablespoon)、coconut oil (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: In a blender, blend the egg, milk, oats, baking powder, and Greek yogurt.
1: In a squirt bottle, combine cinnamon, brown sugar, and coconut oil.
2: On a griddle or pan over medium-high heat, pour pancake batter in ¼ cup (60 ml) amounts. Drizzle cinnamon sugar mixture over the pancake. When bubbles start to pop on the surface, flip and cook completely.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sweet potato、almond butter (2tablespoons)、banana (½slice)、almond (1tablespoon)、blueberry (1tablespoon)、honey (1teaspoon)
instructions:

1: Microwave on high for 10 minutes, or until the potato can be easily pierced with a knife.
2: Gently slice the sweet potato in half, lengthwise, and spread almond butter on each side. Top with banana slices, almonds, and blueberries, and drizzle with honey.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bananas、large eggs、whole milk (1cup)、heavy cream (½cup)、sugar (¾cup)、cinnamon (1teaspoon)、nutmeg (½teaspoon)、vanilla extract (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: Make the banana custard: In a large bowl, mash the bananas. Add the eggs, milk, and heavy cream and stir to combine.
2: In a medium bowl, combine the sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, and vanilla and mix with a fork.
3: Add the sugar mixture to the custard mixture and stir to combine.
4: Add the cubed bread, chocolate chips, and pecans to the custard mixture and toss well to coat. Let soak for 10 minutes.
5: While the bread is soaking, make the caramel base: In a medium microwave-safe bowl, microwave the butter for about 2 minutes, stirring every 30 seconds, until melted and hot.
6: Add the brown sugar and stir to combine. Microwave for another minute, stirring halfway, until the sugar is mostly dissolved.
7: Add the salt, vanilla, and pecans and stir to combine.
8: Pour the caramel into the bottom of a 9 (22 cm) x 13-inch (33 cm) baking dish and spread evenly. Arrange the bananas, cut side down, over the caramel.
9: Spoon the brioche-custard mixture evenly over the bananas.
10: Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes, then uncover and bake for 40-45 minutes longer, until the custard is set. Remove from the oven and let cool for 5 minutes.
11: Run a knife around the edges of the baking dish to loosen the bake, then invert onto a rectangular serving dish. Do not wait any longer than 5 minutes or the bake will stick to the pan.
12: Slice and serve.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bread (1slice)、egg、milk (2tablespoons)、cocoa powder (1teaspoon)、banana、chocolate chip
instructions:
