ingredients:large sweet potatoes、olive oil (1tablespoon)、salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (2teaspoons)、eggs、tomato、green onion (¼cup)、bell pepper、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、milk (½cup)、cooking spray、ham (10slices)、spinach (2cups)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
1: Using a mandolin, slice the sweet potatoes lengthwise into about 3-millimeter thick slices.
2: In a large bowl, combine the sliced sweet potatoes, oil, 1 teaspoon of salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper. Toss until well coated.
3: Lay out sweet potato slices on a baking sheet and bake for 10 minutes, until the edges start to crisp.
4: In a large bowl, combine the eggs, tomatoes, green onions, bell pepper, garlic powder, remaining teaspoon of salt, remaining teaspoon of pepper, and the milk. Whisk well.
5: Remove sweet potatoes from the oven and reduce the oven temperature to 400°F (200°C) .
6: Grease a 9 x 5-inch (23 x 13 cm) loaf pan. Line the sides and base of the pan with sweet potato slices, overlapping slightly.
7: Layer half of the ham slices over the sweet potato, then add the spinach, another layer of sweet potato, the egg mixture, the rest of the ham, and the rest of the sweet potato slices.
8: Fold the outside sweet potato slices over the loaf.
9: Bake for 30 minutes.
10: Invert the loaf onto a serving plate, then slice and serve.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:canola oil、cinnamon roll (1can)、all purpose flour、peach、sugar (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the grill to medium heat (350°F/180°C). Grease a 6–7-inch (16-17 cm) cast iron skillet with canola oil or butter.
1: Open the can of cinnamon rolls and set the icing aside. Arrange the rolls in 2 rows of 4 on a lightly floured surface. Gently press together to seal into one large piece. Flour the top of the cinnamon rolls and use a rolling pin to roll out to a 12 x 8-inch (30x20 cm)rectangle.
2: In a medium bowl, toss the diced peaches with the sugar.
3: Spread the peaches evenly over the cinnamon roll dough. Starting from a long end, roll up the dough, sealing the peaches inside.
4: Cut the dough log into 8 equal pieces and arrange in the prepared pan with the fruit facing up. Cover with aluminum foil.
5: Place the pan on the grill over indirect heat and cook for 30–35 minutes, until the cinnamon rolls are cooked through.
6: Remove the pan from the grill and drizzle the warm cinnamon rolls with the reserved icing.
7: Let cool for about 5 minutes before serving.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:coconut oil (1tablespoon)、turkey sausage (1lb)、cannellini bean (1can)、diced tomato (1can)、salt (½teaspoon)、black pepper (½teaspoon)、dried thyme (1teaspoon)、eggs、spinach (4cups)、greek yogurt、ripe avocados、whole wheat flour tortillas
instructions:
0: Heat the oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
1: Toss in the sausage and break up with a wooden spoon until brown.
2: Pour in the beans, tomatoes, salt, pepper, and thyme, and mix until everything has warmed through.
3: Move the contents of the pan out of the way to form an open well in the center of the pan. Pour the eggs into the well, and as the bottom of the eggs start to cook and solidify, use a spatula to gently scrape the cooked bits off the bottom and slowly mix with the other contents of the pan.
4: Add the spinach to the pan and mix.
5: Spoon a portion of the mixture onto a warmed tortilla, top with avocado slices and Greek yogurt, and roll the tortilla into a burrito.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:eggs、puff pastry (1sheet)、oil (3teaspoons)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 220°C (430°F).
1: Using a cup or mug with roughly the same diameter as the bottoms of your muffin tin, cut out 3 circles of puff pastry dough. Make sure you cut the circles out as closely as possible to save dough.
2: With the remaining dough, cut out strips to wrap around the inside of the muffin tin cups. The strips should be about three centimeters (1 inch) wider than the depth of the muffin tin cups.
3: Rub oil in the bottom of 3 to 4 cups in the center of your muffin tin. Place the puff pastry dough circles at the bottom of the cups, then wrap the dough strips along the walls of the cups. 
4: NOTE: The dough strips should come up a couple of centimeters (about an inch) taller than the wall of each muffin tin cup. 
5: Using your fingers, pinch and press the beginning and end of the strips together and then press the edges of the strips down near the edges of the circles to create one cohesive dough cup.
6: Crack one egg into each dough cup and then season with a pinch of salt and pepper.
7: Working carefully, pinch small sections of the tops of each dough wall together, crimping around the edge so that you bend the dough closer to the center and make five crimped crests on the top of each pie. You want to build a top to the pies but there will still be a circle in the middle with exposed egg.
8: Place the muffin tin on a center rack in the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the puff pastry is golden brown and the egg looks set. Remove from muffin tin.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:milk (⅓cup)、yeast (½teaspoon)、sugar (2tablespoons)、all purpose flour (1 ¼cups)、black food coloring、water
instructions:
0: In the bowl of a stand mixer, stir together the milk, yeast, sugar, and flour with a rubber spatula until the dough starts to come together.
1: Fit the stand mixer with the dough hook and mix the dough on medium-high speed for 10 minutes, until smooth.
2: Cover the dough with a wet towel and let rest for 1 hour.
3: Pull off about 2 tablespoons of dough and roll into a ball, then roll out into a log. Fold the outer ends of the log inward to overlap the center, then roll out into a log again. Repeat 2–3 more times, until the dough is very smooth.
4: Press into a flat disc. Roll 1 tablespoon of red bean paste into a ball, then place in the center of the disc. Wrap the dough around the red bean paste to seal, then roll the bun into a ball and set on a small square of parchment paper. Repeat to make 12 total buns, leaving some excess dough for decorating.
5: Add a bit of black food coloring to another portion of dough and roll out the dough as before, until the color is uniform.
6: Use a finger to slightly dampen the outside of a bun. Decorate with 2 pieces of black dough for the ears, 2 pieces for the eyes, and 1 piece for the nose. Repeat with the remaining buns.
7: Let the buns rest for 30 minutes.
8: Meanwhile, fill the bottom of a steamer with water and bring to a simmer over medium heat. (If you don’t have a steamer, fill a large pot with a bowl at the bottom with water, then place a plate on top of the bowl, making sure the water does not come over the edges of the plate.)
9: Add the buns to the steamer, leaving enough space for the buns to expand. Cover the pot and steam the buns for 9–10 minutes, or until the dough is cooked through. Turn off the heat and let the buns rest in the steamer for 5 minutes before serving.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、medium yellow onion、water (⅓cup)、cherry tomatoes (10oz)、kosher salt、freshly ground black pepper、large eggs
instructions:
0: Heat the olive oil in a small skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
1: Add the water and tomatoes and season with salt and pepper. Cover and cook until the tomatoes start to burst but still hold some of their shape, 5–7 minutes.
2: Using the back of a spoon, create 2 wells in the tomato mixture. Crack an egg into each well. Season with salt and pepper.
3: Cook uncovered for 5–6 minutes, until the egg whites are set but the yolks are still a bit runny.
4: Serve immediately.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray、large eggs、vegetable oil (1tablespoon)、buttermilk (¼cup)、shredded cheddar cheese (½cup)、McCormick® ranch dressing mix (2tablespoons)、kosher salt (½teaspoon)、baking soda (½teaspoon)、baking powder (½teaspoon)、all purpose flour (1cup)、fresh chives (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Grease 2 6-donut pans with nonstick spray.
1: Make the donuts: In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, vegetable oil, and buttermilk. Add the cheddar cheese, ranch dressing mix, salt, baking soda, baking powder, and flour and whisk to combine.
2: Fill each mold of the prepared donut pans with 3 tablespoons of the egg mixture.
3: Bake the donuts until puffed and cooked through, about 12 minutes. Carefully remove from the pans and transfer to a wire rack set over a baking sheet.
4: While the donuts bake, make the cheese sauce: Cook 4 strips of bacon in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat, turning often, until crispy, 7–8 minutes. Using tongs, transfer the bacon to a paper towel-lined plate to drain, leaving the rendered fat behind in the pan. Chop the bacon into fine crumbles, then set aside.
5: To the pan with the reserved bacon fat, add the flour and whisk to combine. Cook for 1–2 minutes, until lightly toasted. Slowly whisk in the milk. Cook, whisking constantly, until thick enough to coat the back of a spoon, 3–4 minutes. Stir in the cheddar and Parmesan cheese and whisk until melted and the sauce is smooth, about 2 minutes longer.
6: Top each donut with a large spoonful of the cheese sauce, the crumbled bacon, and a sprinkle of chives.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:whole wheat bread (1loaf)、honey (3tablespoons)、warm water (½cup)、milk (2cups)、eggs、vanilla extract (2teaspoons)、cinnamon (2teaspoons)、salt、blueberry (½cup)、raspberry (½cup)、blackberry (½cup)、maple syrup
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: Slice bread into quarters. Set aside.
2: In a large bowl, combine honey and warm water. Whisk until the honey dissolves. Add milk, eggs, vanilla extract, cinnamon, and salt. Whisk until well-combined.
3: Pour the bread into a greased 9x13 (23x33 cm) baking dish. Top with the egg mixture.
4: Toss the bread and egg mixture together to evenly coat the bread. Let the bread soak for 20 minutes.
5: Add the blueberries, raspberries, and blackberries evenly on top of the bread.
6: Bake for 45-50 minutes until golden brown and slightly crispy around the edges and top.
7: NOTE: Times & temperatures may vary based on oven.
8: Serve with maple syrup on top (optional).
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:oranges、mango、carrots、milk (½cup)
instructions:
0: Excluding the milk, combine all ingredients for each smoothie in a resealable bag and freeze.
1: NOTE: They can be kept in the freezer for up to 6 months!
2: Remove from freezer and pour your desired smoothie combination into the blender along with the milk. Blend until smooth, and add more milk if needed.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large egg whites、large egg yolk、small sweet potato、water (1cup)、small yellow onion、extra virgin olive oil (2teaspoons)、kosher salt、ground pepper、kale leaves (2cups)、blood orange
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C).
1: In a large bowl, beat the egg whites with an electric hand mixer until soft peaks form. 
2: Add the egg yolks and gently fold with a rubber spatula until incorporated. Refrigerate while you cook the vegetables.
3: In a large, nonstick, oven-safe skillet, combine the sweet potato and water. Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce the heat to low and simmer, stirring occasionally, until the water has evaporated and the sweet potato is soft on the outside, about 8 minutes.
4: Add the onion, olive oil, salt, and pepper. Increase the heat to medium and cook, stirring often, until the onion starts to soften, about 1 minute.
5: Add the chopped kale and cook, stirring often, until the kale is wilted and dark green, about 2 minutes more.
6: Spread the vegetables evenly over the bottom of the skillet, then pour the egg mixture on top and spread in an even layer.
7: Transfer the pan to the oven and bake until the frittata is puffed, cooked through, and very lightly browned on top, 5–6 minutes.
8: Let the frittata cool in the skillet for 5 minutes, then flip it onto a cutting board and cut in half.
9: Cut the frittata into wedges, then serve with orange slices. Let any leftovers cool completely, then store in an airtight container in the refrigerator.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:refrigerated biscuit (1can)、eggs、milk (1 ½cups)、pepper (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、chives (¼cup)、ham (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Cut each biscuit into 9 pieces. Set aside.
2: In a bowl, mix eggs, milk, pepper, salt, and chives.
3: In a 9x13 inch (23x33 cm) glass baking dish, evenly spread out the biscuit pieces and the ham.
4: Pour the egg mixture over everything.
5: Bake for 35 minutes.
6: To make the Hollandaise combine the egg yolks, lemon juice, salt, and cayenne in a blender. Gradually add the hot butter until fully mixed.
7: Slice and pour Hollandaise sauce over the bake. Top with chives
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:raspberry (¼cup)、blueberry (¼cup)、strawberry (½cup)、fresh spinach (½cup)、chia seed (2tablespoons)、cinnamon (½teaspoon)、almond butter (1tablespoon)、milk (1cup)
instructions:
0: Layer the raspberries, blueberries, strawberries, chia seeds, spinach, cinnamon, and almond butter in a mason jar.
1: Store in the freezer for up to 5 days.
2: When ready to serve, add the milk or water to a blender then add the contents of the mason jar.
3: Blend until smooth.
4: Pour smoothie back into the jar.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:warm water (⅓cup)、dried cranberries (⅓cup)、butternut squash purée (1can)、buttermilk (1cup)、large eggs、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、dark brown sugar (2tablespoons)、all purpose flour (1 ½cups)、baking soda (½teaspoon)、baking powder (½teaspoon)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、cinnamon (½teaspoon)、semi-sweet chocolate chips (⅓cup)、unsalted butter (8tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Add the warm water and dried cranberries to a small bowl. Set aside to soak for 10–15 minutes while you prepare the pancake batter, then drain well.
1: In a medium bowl, combine the butternut squash purée and buttermilk. Blend with an immersion blender until smooth. Add the eggs, vanilla, melted butter, and brown sugar and blend to combine.
2: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon.
3: Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and fold with a rubber spatula until just combined. Gently fold in the drained cranberries and chocolate chips.
4: Let the batter rest for 15–30 minutes at room temperature.
5: Meanwhile, make the toasted pecan maple syrup: Toast the pecans in a small saucepan over medium heat until fragrant and beginning to brown, 3–4 minutes. Add the maple syrup and butter and cook until the bubbling diminishes slightly, stirring throughout to keep from burning, 3–4 minutes. Remove the pot from the heat and keep warm until ready to serve.
6: Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in a medium skillet over medium-low heat. Once the butter begins to foam, add ⅓ cup (40 G)of pancake batter to the pan. Cook for 2–3 minutes, until bubbles start to appear on the surface. Flip the pancake and cook for another 2–3 minutes on the other side, until golden brown and cooked through. Transfer the pancake to a platter and repeat with the remaining batter, adding more butter as needed. As you cook the pancakes, keep them in the oven at 200°F (95°C) or cover with foil to keep warm.
7: Serve the pancakes warm with the toasted pecan maple syrup on top.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:fresh spinach (1cup)、banana、frozen mango (½cup)、frozen pineapple (½cup)、frozen blueberry (¼cup)、water (1cup)、blackberry (1small handful)
instructions:
0: Using a marker, draw a Frankenstein face on a glass jar.
1: Add all ingredients (except the berries) to a blender and blend until smooth.
2: Pour mixture into the glass jar and top with berries.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:Frank’s Red Hot® Sauce (¼cup)、brown sugar (1 ½tablespoons)、thick cut bacon (1lb)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 325°F (160°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: In a medium bowl, mix together Frank’s RedHot® and brown sugar together until fully incorporated.
2: Arrange the bacon on the prepared baking sheet. Bake for 15 minutes. Using a pastry brush, brush the bacon slices with the RedHot® mixture. Flip the bacon over and brush on the other side. Continue baking until the bacon is crisp and brown, 10-15 minutes more.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:brioche bread (1loaf)、granulated sugar (1cup)、heavy cream (8cups)、vanilla beans、large eggs
instructions:
0: Make the French toast: Using a paring knife, make a small slit in the side of each slice of bread, going almost to the other side, but not all the way through. Set aside.
1: In a large pot over medium heat, combine the granulated sugar, heavy cream, and vanilla bean seeds and bring to a simmer. Whisk until the sugar is dissolved and the mixture is warmed through, about 5 minutes.
2: Add the eggs to a large bowl. Slowly a ladleful of the cream mixture and whisk to temper the eggs so they do not scramble. Remove the cream mixture from the heat and slowly stream the egg mixture into the pot, whisking to combine. Let cool to room temperature.
3: Arrange the sliced brioche in a 9 x 13-inch (19 x 27 cm) baking dish. Pour the cooled custard mixture over the bread. Let soak for at least 1 hour.
4: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
5: Transfer the soaked brioche to a clean 9 x 13-inch (19 x 27 cm)  baking dish. Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until golden brown on top. Remove from the oven and let cool to room temperature.
6: While the toast bakes and cools, make the filling: In a medium bowl, combine the cream cheese, ricotta cheese, and strawberries. Beat with an electric hand mixer on medium speed until fully combined and fluffy. Transfer to a piping bag fitted with a large round tip and chill in the refrigerator until ready to use.
7: Make the macerated strawberries: In a separate medium bowl, combine the strawberries, lemon juice, sugar, and lemon zest. Stir well, then set aside to macerate for 10 minutes.
8: Make the chantilly cream: In a separate medium bowl, combine the heavy cream, sugar, and vanilla. Beat with an electric hand mixer on medium speed until soft peaks form.
9: Pipe the ricotta and cream cheese mixture into the center of each slice of French toast, being careful not to overfill.
10: Top each slice of French toast with a generous sprinkle of turbinado sugar. Brûlée the sugar with a kitchen torch until melted and golden brown.
11: Add the blueberries and maple syrup to the macerated strawberries and stir to combine.
12: Garnish each slice of brûléed French toast with a spoonful of the berry mixture, a dollop of chantilly cream, and a mint leaf. Serve immediately.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cold brew coffee (½cup)、avocado、vanilla extract (1tablespoon)、coconut milk (1cup)、vanilla yogurt (½cup)、ice (2cups)、coconut flake
instructions:
0: Add the cold brew coffee, avocado, vanilla, coconut milk, yogurt, and ice to a blender.
1: Blend until smooth.
2: Serve in a glass and top with coconut flakes.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:hash brown (3cups)、shredded sharp cheddar cheese (2cups)、egg (3cups)、salt (½teaspoon)、black pepper (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: For the gravy, heat the butter in a large sauce pan. Break up the sausage in the pan and let it brown for a few minutes.
1: Add in the flour and toss the sausage to toast for 1 minute.
2: Pour in the milk and stir constantly until the mixture has thickened, about 8 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3: Grease a 9" x13" (23cmx33cm) roasting pan.  Spread the hash browns evenly along the bottom of the pan and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Add the cheddar cheese in an even layer and top with scrambled eggs.
4: Pour the gravy on top of the eggs in the roasting pan.
5: For the biscuit dough, combine the flour, salt, baking powder, and baking soda in a large bowl.
6: Pour the melted butter into the cold buttermilk and stir gently with a spoon until the butter hardens and forms lumps.  Pour the milk mixture into the flour and mix until well-combined.
7: Pre-heat oven to 400°F (200°C).
8: Transfer the dough to a floured sheet of cling wrap and generously dust the dough with flour. Using a floured rolling pin, roll the dough into a rectangle that matches the size of your roasting pan.
9: Roll the dough onto the rolling pin and transfer to the roasting pan, then brush with melted butter.
10: Bake for 25-30 minutes.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chorizo (10oz)、eggs、shredded cheddar cheese (1cup)、onion (½cup)、bell pepper (1cup)、vegetable oil (2tablespoons)、biscuit dough (1tube)、egg wash、flour
instructions:
0: Heat the oil in a frying pan. Add the onion and stir until translucent. Add the chorizo.
1: NOTE: You don’t need to use more salt since chorizo has enough salt.
2: Cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the bell peppers and stir.
3: Beat the eggs until the yolks break and add them to the chorizo mix.
4: Stir until the eggs are just cooked.
5: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
6: Flour a surface and open a tube of biscuits. Place them close to each other. Roll them out with a rolling pin to create one single dough.
7: Sprinkle cheddar cheese over the rolled biscuit dough. Add the chorizo and eggs. Roll it up and pinch the edge to seal it to the roll.
8: Brush the roll with egg wash.
9: Using scissors, make slits in the dough about 2 inches (5 cm) apart from each other. Then twist them to alternating sides to create a braided look.
10: Bake for 25 minutes, or until golden brown.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:hard yellow candy、superfine granulated sugar (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Make the cotton candy: Let the machine heat for 10 minutes before using, then turn off.
1: Add the yellow hard candy and superfine sugar to the machine, then turn back on. When you see the cotton candy web begin, hold a wooden skewer into the center at a 45° angle and spin to collect the candy. Once some candy has accumulated, hold the skewer horizontally to collect the rest, moving from side to side for even distribution.
2: Secure the skewer with the cotton candy to a table sign holder and set aside.
3: Make the royal milk tea: Add the tea leaves into a small bowl. Pour the boiling water over the tea so the leaves are just covered. Steep for 2–3 minutes..
4: Add the milk, steeped tea, and sugar to a small pot over medium heat. Cover and bring to just below boiling. Uncover, stir, and strain to remove the tea leaves.
5: Meanwhile, pour hot water into a teacup. Let sit to warm the cup until ready to serve.
6: Pour the hot water out of the cup, then pour in the milk tea.
7: Set the teacup beneath the cotton candy cloud and watch the rain fall.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sugar (1cup)、water (3tablespoons)、double cream (1cup)、rock salt (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: In a small saucepan, add the sugar and water, carefully swirling the pan to make sure the water is covering all the sugar. Cook on a medium heat for 5 minutes, or until a deep amber colour, without stirring.
1: Turn off the heat and add the double cream, whisking until smooth. Stir in the salt and cool.
2: Preheat oven to 350˚F/(180°C).
3: In a large bowl, add the eggs, milk, sugar, vanilla extract, cinnamon, and most of the cooled salted caramel sauce and whisk until smooth.
4: Placed the chopped white bread into a greased heatproof dish and pour over the egg mixture. Sprinkle over chopped pecans and bake for 45 minutes. (If the top of the bread is burning, cover with foil halfway through baking.)
5: Serve with icing sugar and leftover salted caramel sauce.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unbleached all-purpose flour (3 ½cups)、salt (1teaspoon)、extra virgin olive oil (5tablespoons)、water (1 ¼cups)
instructions:
0: Make the flour tortilla: In a large bowl, combine the flour and salt. Add the olive oil and mix well. The texture should look like coarse cornmeal.
1: Add the water and knead until the dough comes together in a ball. If it is too wet, add more flour. Wrap the dough with plastic wrap or cover with a damp cloth.  Let rest for 10 minutes.
2: Make the sautéed vegetables: In a large skillet, heat the canola oil over medium heat. Add the onions and bell peppers. Season with the salt and oregano. Cook until the vegetables are soft, about 10 minutes. Remove from the pan and set aside.
3: Make the home fries: In a large skillet, heat the canola oil over medium heat. Add the potatoes. Season with the salt, pepper, and paprika. Cook until the outsides of the potatoes are slightly crispy, about 5 minutes. Set aside.
4: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
5: Grease 10-inch (25 cm) diameter Dutch oven well with olive oil.
6: Remove the dough from the fridge and transfer to a lightly floured surface. Using a rolling pin, roll out the dough to about ⅛ inch (3 mm) thick and 2 times larger than the Dutch oven.
7: Transfer the rolled out dough to the pot, pressing down around the edges so it forms to the inside of the pot and letting the excess hang over the sides.
8: Layer the home fries, bacon, cheese, spinach, breakfast sausages, sautéed vegetables, scrambled eggs and cooked Italian sausages over the dough. Fold the overhanging dough over the top.
9: Bake for 40 minutes, or until the top is golden brown. Let cool for 30 minutes.
10: Invert the timpano onto a cutting board and let cool for 10 more minutes before slicing.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cream cheese (8oz)、egg、heavy cream (2tablespoons)、sugar (⅓cup)、vanilla (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: For the cheesecake filling: in a small bowl, combine cream cheese, egg, heavy cream, sugar and vanilla. Beat until smooth.
2: For the French toast egg mixture, combine eggs, milk, heavy cream, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt in a large mixing bowl. Stir until well incorporated.
3: Dip slices of brioche in egg mixture.
4: Transfer brioche slices and cover bottom of a loaf pan, using a half or a quarter of a slice if necessary.
5: Cover the slices with cheesecake filling and spread evenly.
6: Layer another row of brioche slices and top with slices of strawberry and banana.
7: Layer one last row of brioche slices using small pieces of the bread to fill in the holes.
8: Bake for 30 minutes covered, then 10 minutes uncovered.
9: Let cool to room temperature.
10: Invert the loaf onto a parchment paper-lined baking tray.
11: Brush top of loaf with butter and sprinkle sugar over top.
12: Broil on high for 5 minutes or until sugar starts to carmelize.
13: Garnish with more strawberries, banana, and powdered sugar. Slice and serve.
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flour (2cups)、sugar (¼cup)、baking powder (4teaspoons)、baking soda (¼teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、milk (1 ½cups)、butter (¼cup)、vanilla (2teaspoons)、egg、pumpkin puree (1cup)
instructions:
0: Combine together the flour, sugar (or sweetener), baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a large-sized bowl.
1: Make a well in the centre and whisk in the milk, slightly cooled melted butter, vanilla and egg. Whisk in the pumpkin puree until smooth.
2: Heat a nonstick pan or griddle over low-medium heat and wipe over with a little butter to lightly grease pan.
3: Pour 1⁄4 cup of batter onto the pan and spread out gently into a round shape with the back of your ladle or measuring cup. When the underside is golden and bubbles begin to appear on the surface, flip with a spatula and cook until golden. Repeat with remaining batter.
4: Serve with your choice of topping.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:whole rolled oat (6cups)、kosher salt (½teaspoon)、water (¾cup)
instructions:
0: Place whole rolled oats into a large mixing bowl.
1: Scoop 2 cups (200 grams) of the rolled oats into a separate bowl and process in a blender or food processor until it becomes a fine powder.
2: Pour the blended oats into the bowl of whole rolled oats. Add salt and stir until evenly combined.
3: Add desired flavor additions then place the instant oatmeal mixture into an airtight container or divide into ½ cup (50 gram) single-serve portions.
4: When ready to eat, pour the boiling water or milk. Stir to combine and let sit for 3 minutes.
5: Enjoy!

ingredients:salt (¼teaspoon)、pepper (¼teaspoon)、chili powder (¼teaspoon)、sugar (¼teaspoon)、onion powder (½teaspoon)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、paprika (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Place the frying pan on the stove on medium heat. Add 3 tbsp of extra virgin olive oil and to this, add the 2 diced potatoes.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2cups)、russet potato (1lb)、medium onion、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、large eggs、freshly ground black pepper
instructions:
0: Heat the olive oil in a large, wide pan with high sides over medium-high heat until shimmering. Add the potatoes, onion, and 1 teaspoon salt. Add more olive oil as needed to ensure everything is submerged. Reduce the heat to medium and cook until the potatoes are fork tender, 5–7 minutes. Remove the pan from the heat.
1: Place a metal strainer over a large heatproof bowl. Carefully strain the potatoes and onion and set aside to cool. Reserve the cooking oil.
2: In a separate large bowl, whisk together eggs, 1 teaspoon of salt, and pepper until foamy, 2–3 minutes. Gently fold in the cooled potato and onion mixture and let sit at room temperature for 5 minutes.
3: Heat 3 tablespoons of the reserved oil in a 9 or 10-inch nonstick skillet over medium heat. When the oil is shimmering, pour in the egg and potato mixture and spread in an even layer. Cook, tilting the pan and lifting up the edges with spatula to let the uncooked egg run underneath, until the edges are pale yellow and lacy, 4–5 minutes.
4: Remove the pan from the heat and place a large heatproof plate over the skillet. Working quickly, invert the pan to flip the tortilla onto the plate.
5: Return the skillet to medium heat, add 1 tablespoon of the reserved oil, then slide the tortilla back into the pan with the uncooked side facing down. Use spatula to tuck in the sides of the tortilla. Cook until the bottom of the tortilla is browned and the center is cooked through, 2–3 minutes.
6: Slide the tortilla onto the plate and let rest for 5–10 minutes before slicing and serving.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:brioche bread (4slices)、large eggs、cinnamon (1tablespoon)、heavy cream (½cup)、honey (¼cup)、cinnamon crunch cereal (1cup)、whipped cream (2cups)、fresh blueberry (½cup)、fresh blackberry (½cup)、fresh strawberry 、fresh raspberry
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: Cut the loaf of bread in half crosswise. Flip one of the halves cut side up, and cut out the middle of the loaf, leaving about a ¼-inch (6 mm) border around the edge. From the outside of the loaf, about ½ -1 inch (1-2 cm) up from the bottom of one of the 4 sides, make a cut straight through to remove the center of the loaf.
2: Cut the center of the loaf in half and slice into approximately 1x3-inch (2x7-cm) cm sticks . Repeat with the second half of the loaf.
3: In a large bowl, whisk the eggs with the cinnamon, cream, and honey.
4: Place the hollowed-out loaf on the prepared baking sheet and brush all over with the egg mixture.
5: In a medium bowl, crush the cinnamon crunch cereal into coarse crumbs.
6: Dip the sliced toast sticks in the egg mixture, then dredge in the crushed cereal. Add to the baking sheet in a single layer.
7: Bake for 20 minutes, until golden brown.
8: To assemble, filling the toasted, hollowed loaves with French toast sticks and berries. Top with whipped cream and a drizzle of honey.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:plain unsweetened soy milk (1cup)、vegan butter (¼cup)、mashed sweet potato (1cup)、unbleached all-purpose flour (3cups)、granulated sugar (¼cup)、salt (½teaspoon)、active dry yeast (2 ¼teaspoons)、grapeseed oil (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: In a small saucepan, warm the soy milk and vegan butter over medium heat until the butter has melted. Do not boil it. Remove from the heat and stir in the mashed sweet potato.
1: In a large bowl, mix together the flour, granulated sugar, salt, and yeast. Pour the liquid ingredients into the dry and use a wooden spoon to combine. Once it gets too difficult to stir, use your hands to combine the ingredients.
2: Flour a clean work surface and transfer the dough onto the prepared work space. Knead it until you’ve got a smooth dough ball. Lightly oil a large bowl. Place the dough ball in it, cover with plastic wrap or a kitchen towel, and let rise for 1 hour. The dough should double in size.
3: Make the filling: In a small bowl, combine the brown sugar and cinnamon and set aside. Chop the pecans into small pieces and set aside. In a small saucepan, melt the vegan butter and set aside.
4: Once the dough has doubled in size, preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
5: Press the air out of the dough, then transfer it back onto your floured work space. Roll the dough until it is about ¼-inch (6 mm) thick. You should end up with a roughly rectangular oval, about 12x16 inches (30x40 cm).
6: Brush the dough with the melted butter, sprinkle with the cinnamon-sugar mix, and then top with the chopped pecans. Fold the short side of the dough over and roll tightly until you have a log.
7: Carefully cut the log into twelve 1-inch (2 cm) slices. Grease a large skillet or a 10-inch (25 cm) round baking dish and place the rolls in it cut-side down.
8: Bake for 25 minutes, or until they've expanded and turned slightly golden on top.
9: Meanwhile, make the frosting: Place all the ingredients in a food processor or standing mixer with the whisk attachment on high and blend until creamy.
10: Remove the rolls from the oven and let cool for 5 to 10 minutes. Top with the sweet potato frosting and serve immediately. They will stay fresh for up to 2 days, but they’re best eaten the day you bake them.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all purpose flour (3cups)、baking powder (2teaspoons)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、unsalted butter (½stick)、granulated sugar (1cup)、McCormick® Ground Cinnamon (1tablespoon)、large eggs、whole milk (¼cup)、unsalted butter (1stick)、turbinado sugar (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Make the biscotti: Preheat the oven to 325°F (160°C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.
1: In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt.
2: In a large bowl, combine the room temperature butter, granulated sugar, and 1 tablespoon cinnamon. Beat with an electric hand mixer on medium-high speed until fluffy, 2–3 minutes. Add the eggs, 1 at a time, beating well after each addition. Pour in the milk and beat until smooth. Add the dry ingredients and beat on low speed until just combined.
3: Divide the dough in half and place one portion on each prepared baking sheet. Shape each into a 3-inch wide, 8½–9-inch long flat log. Refrigerate the dough on the baking sheets for 20 minutes.
4: Transfer the baking sheets to the oven and bake until the logs are lightly browned around the edges, rotating the baking sheets from top to bottom and front to back halfway through, 30–35 minutes, Transfer the baking sheets to wire racks and let the logs cool for 15 minutes. Reduce the oven temperature to 300°F (150°C).
5: Carefully transfer each log to a cutting board and, using a serrated knife, slice crosswise into ½-inch-thick slices. Return the slices to the baking sheets, cut-side up, spacing evenly. Brush the slices on both sides with melted butter.
6: In a small bowl, mix together the turbinado sugar and remaining 2 teaspoons cinnamon. Sprinkle over one side of the biscotti.
7: Bake until the biscotti are light brown around the edges and dry, rotating the baking sheets from top to bottom and front to back halfway through, 15–20 minutes. Transfer the baking sheets to wire racks and let the biscotti cool to room temperature before serving. Leftover biscotti will keep in an airtight container in the freezer for up to 5 days.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:fresh cilantro (1handful)、green onions、cherry tomatoes、water (2cups)、milk (2cups)、eggs、sourdough bread
instructions:
0: Finely chop the cilantro. Slice the green onions. Chop the cherry tomatoes.
1: Add the water and milk to a medium pot and bring to a boil over medium heat.
2: Once boiling, crack the eggs into the pot. Without stirring, add the green onions and tomatoes. Let eggs cook for about 5 minutes, or until the egg yolks are just barely firm.
3: Scoop an egg into each bowl and ladle in more broth. Garnish with cilantro and serve with bread for dipping.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:brie cheese (3wheels)、pomegranate preserves (1tablespoon)、shredded mozzarella cheese (¼cup)、honey (1tablespoon)、pecan (¼cup)、shredded pepper jack  cheese (¼cup)、dijon mustard (1tablespoon)、shredded monterey jack cheese (¼cup)、prosciutto (3oz)、large egg、water (1tablespoon)、puff pastry (1sheet)、all purpose flour、baguette
instructions:
0: Arrange a rack in the lower third of the oven. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: Arrange the Brie wheels on a cutting board. Spread the pomegranate preserves over 1 wheel of Brie. Sprinkle the shredded mozzarella over the jam.
2: Place another wheel of Brie on top of the mozzarella. Spread the honey over the Brie. Top with the pecans, then the shredded pepper Jack.
3: Place the last wheel of Brie on top of the pepper Jack. Spread the Dijon mustard on top of the Brie. Top with the shredded Monterey Jack.
4: Drape the prosciutto over the Brie so that all sides are covered and the prosciutto overlaps on the top.
5: In a small bowl, beat the egg and water together.
6: On a lightly floured surface, roll out the puff pastry to a 12 x 14-inch (30 x 35 cm) rectangle.
7: Place the Brie tower in the center of the puff pastry. Fold the corners of the puff pastry up to the center, brushing each layer with egg wash to secure. Brush the entire tower with egg wash. Cut a few slits in the top of the tower to allow steam to escape.
8: Transfer the Brie tower to the prepared baking sheet and bake for 30–35 minutes, until golden brown. Let cool for 5 minutes before serving.
9: Serve with the toasted baguette.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick spray、eggs、whole wheat english muffin (1package)、tomato、avocado
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 325°F (170˚C).
1: Prepare a mason jar lid with oil or nonstick spray of choice to prevent sticking.
2: Place the mason jar lids upside down on a baking sheet.
3: Crack 1 egg into each mason jar lid.
4: Bake the eggs for 10-15 minutes.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:coconut oil (2teaspoons)、granny smith apples、quinoa (1 ½cups)、walnuts (½cup)、large eggs、unsweetened almond milk (3cups)、applesauce (½cup)、maple syrup (⅓cup)、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、cinnamon (1tablespoon)、ground nutmeg (½teaspoon)、salt (1pinch)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: In a large cast-iron skillet, melt 1 teaspoon of coconut oil over medium-low heat. Add the diced apples and let caramelize slightly, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes. Remove the apples from the skillet and set aside.
2: Melt the remaining teaspoon of coconut oil in the skillet, then add the quinoa and cook until it is well browned and smells toasty, about 10 minutes.
3: Return the apples to the skillet, along with the walnuts. Stir to combine, then remove the skillet from the heat and let cool.
4: In a medium bowl, lightly beat the eggs, then add the almond milk, applesauce, maple syrup, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt. Whisk well to combine.

8: Nutrition Information, per serving - Calories: 300, Carbs: 45 grams, Dietary fiber: 5 grams, Sodium: 52 mg, Total fat: 10 grams, Total sugar: 21 grams, Total protein: 8 grams

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:white bread、egg wash、eggs、milk (1cup)、butter (2tablespoons)、sugar (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, add eggs, milk, and sugar, and mix until smooth.
1: Cut out the inside of the bread: with a knife, cut into the loaf, about ½ inch away from the edge until you’re just about to the bottom. DO NOT CUT THROUGH. Cut all sides.

instructions:

instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:barlett pears、water (½cup)、cinnamon (½tablespoon)、ground nutmeg (½teaspoon)、ground allspice (¼teaspoon)、ground cloves (¼teaspoon)、sugar (¾cup)
instructions:
0: Make the pear butter: Add the pears, water, cinnamon, nutmeg, allspice, cloves, and sugar to a medium saucepan and stir to coat the pears. Bring to a simmer over medium-high heat, then reduce the heat to medium-low and cook, stirring occasionally, until the pears are tender, 35–40 minutes. Remove the pot from the heat. Using a potato masher, mash the pears until broken down to the consistency of a chunky applesauce. Set aside.
1: Make the waffles: Preheat a waffle iron according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
2: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, oil, cream, milk, and vanilla until smooth. Mix in the beaten eggs.
3: Ladle a scant ½ cup (55 G) of the waffle batter per waffle into the preheated waffle iron. Cook for 3–4 minutes, or until golden brown and cooked through. Repeat with the remaining batter. Keep the waffles warm in a low-heated oven until ready to use.
4: Make the whipped cream: Add the heavy cream, cinnamon, and powdered sugar to a large bowl. Whip with an electric hand mixer on medium speed until stiff peaks form, about 2 minutes. Refrigerate until ready to use.
5: Make the chicken: Heat the vegetable oil in a large, high-walled skillet over medium-high heat until it reaches 350°F (180°C).
6: In a large bowl, season the chicken with the lemon pepper, salt, and Ac’cent seasoning, tossing to coat well. Add the flour to a medium bowl. Dredge the chicken in the flour, shaking off any excess.
7: Working in batches, gently lower the chicken into the hot oil and fry until golden brown, 6–8 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C). Remove from the oil using tongs or a slotted spoon and transfer to a paper-towel lined plate to drain while you fry the remaining chicken.
8: Cut the waffles into triangles and arrange 3 on each plate. Top with 2 tablespoons of pear butter, 3 fried chicken strips, and a dollop of whipped cream. Garnish with a sprig of mint.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all-purpose flour (2tablespoons)、puff pastry (4sheets)、large egg、swiss cheese (16slices)、ham (7slices)
instructions:
0: Lightly flour a clean work surface. Flour a rolling pin and roll out each puff pastry sheet to flatten the seams. Lay the sheets 2 by 2.
1: Make a diagonal cut across the 2 bottom sheets of puff pastry from the lower right corner to the midpoint on the left side of the lower left sheet.
2: Make another diagonal cut across the 2 top sheets of puff pastry from the upper right corner to the midpoint on the left side of the upper left sheet.
3: Holding the bottom pieces together, rotate clockwise 180˚ and up, so that the left side of the bottom strip meets the left side of the lower middle strip.
4: Holding the top pieces together, rotate counterclockwise 180˚ and down, so that the left side of the top strip meets the left side of the up middle strip.
5: Seal the seams by brushing a bit of egg wash where the pieces of pastry meet, overlapping the pieces slightly, and pressing together.
6: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
7: Arrange the cheese slices in a single layer across the lower portion of the triangle. Top with a single layer of ham slices.
8: Roll up the puff pastry from the base of the triangle to the top point.
9: Place the croissant on the prepared baking sheet and cover with aluminum foil.
10: Bake for 45 minutes.
11: Remove the croissant from the oven, take off the foil, and brush the croissant with egg wash.
12: Bake for another 1 hour and 15 minutes, until the croissant is golden brown.
13: Let cool for 20 minutes, then slice and serve.
14: Enjoy!

0: Transfer the coconut milk to a clean 16-ounce (455 G) glass jar. 1 at a time, open the probiotic capsules and pour the powder into the coconut milk, stirring well with a non-metal utensil after each addition to evenly distribute.
1: Loosely cover the jar with cheesecloth and secure with a rubber band or kitchen twine. Leave the yogurt to ferment in a cool, dark place for at least 12 hours, up to 24 hours. The longer it ferments, the tangier the yogurt will be.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bread (18slices)、butter (3tablespoons)、swiss cheese (18slices)、ham (12slices)、spinach (4cups)、eggs、chive
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven broiler to high. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: On a cutting board, butter all the sandwich bread and transfer to the prepared baking sheet.
2: Using a glass, cut out the centers of 6 slices of bread.
3: Toast the bread under the broiler for 5 minutes, or until toasted. Keep a close eye on it so it doesn't burn.
4: Reduce the oven temperature to 350˚F (180˚C).
5: Make the Béchamel sauce: Melt the butter in a small saucepan over medium heat. Add the flour and whisk until it darkens slightly.
6: Add the milk and whisk to combine. Reduce the heat to low and simmer until reduced by half.
7: Remove the pot from the heat and add the salt, pepper, nutmeg, Gruyère, and Parmesan and stir until fully incorporated.
8: Line a 9 x 13-inch baking dish with parchment paper.
9: Lay 6 pieces of toast in the bottom of the dish. Top with 9 slices of Swiss cheese, 6 slices of ham, and 2 cups of spinach. Repeat to make another layer and top with the hollow-centered toast.
10: Crack an egg into each hole. Carefully ladle the Béchamel sauce over the bake, leaving the yolks exposed.
11: Cover and bake for 35 minutes, then uncover and bake for 10 minutes more, until the eggs are cooked to your liking and the Béchamel is starting to brown in spots.
12: Slice and serve garnished with chives, if desired.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:irish whiskey (⅓cup)、golden raisin (½cup)、all-purpose flour (2cups)、whole wheat flour (¾cup)、granulated sugar (3tablespoons)、baking powder (1 ½teaspoons)、baking soda (½teaspoon)、fine sea salt (1 ¼teaspoons)、unsalted butter (8tablespoons)、buttermilk (¾cup)、caraway seed (2teaspoons)、flaky sea salt
instructions:
0: In a small saucepan over medium heat, bring the whiskey to a simmer. Turn off the heat, add the raisins, and set aside for at least 15 minutes to allow the raisins to plump.
1: Drain and reserve the raisins and whiskey separately.
2: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200˚C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
3: In a large bowl, whisk together the all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and fine sea salt.
4: Add the butter and use your hands to pinch together the butter and flour mixture until coarse crumbs form.
5: Add the buttermilk to the mixture and mix just until a dough begins to form. Add the whiskey-soaked raisins and 1½ teaspoons of caraway seeds. Mix just to combine.
6: Shape the dough into a 7-inch (18 cm) round. Use a pastry brush to brush the top of the round with buttermilk. Sprinkle with the remaining ½ teaspoon caraway seeds and flaky salt
7: Cut the dough into 8 triangles and transfer to the parchment-lined baking sheet, spacing the scones 2 inches (5 cm) apart. Bake until golden, 20 to 25 minutes.
8: While the scones bake, make the whiskey butter: In a medium bowl, add the reserved whiskey to the butter, a little at a time, mixing after each addition until fully combined. Stir in the salt.
9: Serve the scones warm or at room temperature with the whiskey butter alongside.
10: Enjoy!

instructions:
0: Cut the sweet potato lengthwise into slices, about ¼ inch (6 mm) thick.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (3tablespoons)、whole wheat bread (4cups)、yellow onion、garlic (2cloves)、fresh spinach (6cups)、lemon  zest (½lemon)、red pepper flakes (1pinch)、fine sea salt、fresh ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、eggs、egg whites、whole milk (1 ½cups)、whole grain mustard (1 ½teaspoons)、grated parmesan cheese (¼cup)、fresh chives (3tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Oil a 9x9-inch (23x23-cm) baking dish with 1 tablespoon of the olive oil and add the bread cubes in a single layer.
1: In a large skillet set over medium heat, add the remaining 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Add the onions and garlic and cook until tender and starting to turn golden, 10-15 minutes.
2: In 2-3 batches, add the spinach and cook, tossing to wilt, 1-2 minutes.
3: Stir in the lemon zest and red pepper flakes and season with salt and pepper. Cook another 30 seconds then remove the pan from the heat and set aside to cool slightly.
4: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180˚C).
5: In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, egg whites, milk, and mustard. Season with salt and pepper and stir in ¼ cup (30 g) of the Parmesan.
6: Add the spinach mixture into the eggs. Stir in chives.
7: Transfer to the baking dish and mix gently to combine making sure the mixture is in an even layer. Top with remaining Parmesan.
8: Bake until the eggs are just set and the mixture doesn’t jiggle when you gently shake the pan, 35-40 minutes.
9: Serve warm or at room temperature.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:frozen blackberry (1cup)、almond milk (1cup)、almond butter (2tablespoons)、spinach (2cups)、banana
instructions:
0: Add blackberries, almond milk, almond butter, spinach, and banana to blender and blend until smooth.
1: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:silken tofu (1lb)、maple syrup (¼cup)、orange、mango、peach、soy milk (½cup)
instructions:
0: Add tofu and maple syrup to a mixing bowl and whisk together until smooth and no large lumps are present.
1: Transfer tofu mixture to ice tray and use a rubber spatula to evenly spread the mixture into each of the cube slots.
2: Freeze completely.
3: Place orange, mango, peach, 4 tofu cubes, and milk in a blender, making sure that the cubes sit on top of the fruit.
4: Blend until smooth.
5: Serve immediately.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cassava (2lb)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、coconut milk (1can)、canola oil (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Make the bammy: Add the cassava to a food processor and pulse until finely shredded. Transfer to a clean towel and squeeze to extract excess liquid until the cassava is fully dry.
1: Transfer to a medium bowl and break up the cassava. Sprinkle in the salt and stir to distribute.
2: Heat an 8-inch (20 cm) skillet over medium-low heat. Carefully pour half of the cassava into the pan. Use a silicone spatula to pat the cassava into a disc. Cook the bammy for about 6-8 minutes on each side, until light golden brown..
3: Transfer the bammy to a shallow dish filled with the coconut milk and let soak for 1 minute. Do not let soak too long, or the bammy will fall apart.
4: Add 1 tablespoon of canola oil to the skillet and carefully transfer the bammy back to the pan. Fry for another 5 minutes on each side, until light golden brown. Repeat with the remaining cassava. Set aside.
5: Make the ackee and saltfish: Rinse the salted cod in a bowl with 4 cups (960 ml)  of cold water. Drain and repeat twice more.
6: Add the rinsed cod to a small saucepan with 4 cups (960 ml) of water. Bring to a boil and cook for 15 minutes. Drain and repeat once more.
7: Transfer the fish to a medium bowl. Use 2 forks or your hands to flake the fish into chunks. Set aside.
8: Heat the canola oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Once shimmering, add the onion, red and green bell pepper, tomato, garlic, scotch bonnet, thyme, pepper, and salt. Sauté, stirring occasionally, for 8-10 minutes, until slightly softened.
9: Add the ackee, flaked saltfish, and scallions and carefully fold in to the vegetables. Sauté for 4-5 minutes more, until warmed through. Season to taste with more salt if needed.
10: Slice the warm bammies into quarters, then serve with the ackee and saltfish.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ready-made puff pastry (1sheet)、chocolate spread (4tablespoons)、chocolate (2tablespoons)、banana、strawberries、flaked almond (1tablespoon)、egg yolk、dark chocolate、icing sugar
instructions:
0: Roll out the sheet of puff pastry. Using a sharp knife, cut in half diagonally and then again horizontally to make 4 squares. Then cut each square diagonally to make 8 triangles.
1: Layer the triangles on a lined baking tray to make a star shape. In each triangle, spread on the chocolate spread (about ½ tablespoon per triangle will be enough).
2: Then, in the middle, scatter on the grated chocolate, banana, strawberries, and flaked almonds in a circle shape.
3: Fold over the triangles to meet in the middle. Glaze with some egg wash.
4: Bake in the oven at 180°C (350°F) for 25 minutes.
5: Cut out each triangle to make a serving.
6: Drizzle on some dark melted chocolate, icing sugar or with leftover strawberries and banana. Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:almond milk (⅓cup)、cantaloupe (¾cup)、banana (½cup)、mango (1cup)、ice (1cup)
instructions:
0: Add all the ingredients to a blender and mix on high.
1: Pour into a bowl or half a hollowed out cantaloupe, and top with desired fruit and other toppings.
2: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:russet potato (4lb)、salt (1tablespoon)、all-purpose flour (½cup)、shredded parmesan cheese (1cup)、onion powder (1tablespoon)、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Add the potatoes to a large pot. Cover the potatoes with cold water and season with 1 tablespoon of salt. Bring to a boil over high heat and cook until the potatoes are fork tender, about 20 minutes.
1: Make the sausage filling: Add the onion to a large skillet over medium heat and cook until translucent, about 3 minutes.
2: Add the peppers and cook until slightly tender, about 6 minutes.
3: Add the garlic and sausage. Cook until the sausage is browned, about 4 minutes.
4: Season with the paprika, cayenne, pepper, thyme, and salt and cook for another 5 minutes until seasoning is evenly distributed. Remove the pan from the heat.
5: Make the egg filling: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat, then sauté the spinach until fully wilted, about 5 minutes.
6: Add the eggs and scramble until cooked, about 3 minutes.
7: Add the bacon, pepper, and salt and mix to incorporate. Remove the pan from the heat.
8: Transfer the potatoes to a colander and run under cold water to cool. Pat dry.
9: Using the large holes on a cheese grater, shred the potatoes into a large bowl.
10: Add the flour, Parmesan, onion powder, garlic powder, pepper, and salt. Mix together thoroughly.
11: Transfer half of the hash brown mixture to a greased 13” x 18” (33 cm x 45 cm) baking sheet and spread evenly with a spatula.
12: On the left side of the tray, spoon the egg filling into 4 evenly spaced piles. On the right side of the tray, spoon the sausage filling into 4 evenly spaced piles. Top each pile of egg filling with a tablespoon of shredded cheddar cheese.
13: Top the piles of filling with the remaining hash brown mixture and use a spatula to carefully press down the hash browns, sealing the filling inside. Use the tip of the spatula to delineate between each pocket of filling.
14: Freeze for at least 2 hours.
15: In a large pot, heat oil until it reaches 380˚F (195˚C).
16: Remove the hash browns from the freezer and use a sharp knife to cut and separate each pocket.
17: Fry the hash brown pockets in batches for 5-7 minutes, or until browned on both sides. Drain the pockets on a wire rack set over a baking sheet lined with paper towels.
18: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:silken tofu (1lb)、maple syrup (¼cup)、banana、kiwi、mango、fresh spinach (1cup)、soy milk (½cup)
instructions:
0: Add tofu and maple syrup to a mixing bowl and whisk together until smooth and no large lumps are present.
1: Transfer tofu mixture to ice tray and use a rubber spatula to evenly spread the mixture into each of the cube slots.
2: Freeze completely.
3: Place banana, kiwi, mango, spinach, 4 tofu cubes, and milk in a blender, making sure that the cubes sit on top of the fruit.
