instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray、whole wheat flour (2cups)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、baking soda (½teaspoon)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、sugar (1pinch)、large eggs、buttermilk (1cup)、unsalted butter (5tablespoons)、turkey sausage (¾cup)、white onion (½cup)、bell pepper、sun-dried tomato (⅓cup)、shredded mozzarella cheese (1cup)、fresh spinach (1cup)、fresh basil (¼cup)、italian seasoning (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C). Grease a 12-cup muffin tin with nonstick spray.
1: Make the batter: In a large bowl, stir together the whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, pepper, and sugar. Set aside.
2: In a medium bowl, whisk together the eggs, buttermilk, and butter.
3: Add the turkey, onion, bell pepper, sun-dried tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, spinach, basil and Italian seasoning to the egg mixture and stir to combine.
4: Pour the egg mixture into the dry ingredients and fold to combine, being careful not to overmix the batter.
5: Using an ice cream scoop, divide the batter between the muffin cups, filling almost completely.
6: Bake for 18 minutes, rotating the muffin tin halfway through baking, until browned on top and a toothpick inserted in the center of a muffin comes out clean.
7: Let cool for 10 minutes before removing the muffins from the tin. Serve or store in the refrigerator for up to 5 days.
8: Enjoy!
9: Nutrition, per muffin - Calories: 188, Total fat: 9 grams, Sodium: 486 mg, Total carbs: 19 grams, Dietary fiber: 3 grams, Sugars: 2 grams, Protein: 10 grams

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil、mushroom (½cup)、tomato (½cup)、spinach (2cups)、garlic (1clove)、chickpea flour (¾cup)、nutritional yeast (1 ½tablespoons)、baking soda (½teaspoon)、turmeric (¼teaspoon)、pepper (⅛teaspoon)、black salt (⅛teaspoon)、apple cider vinegar (1teaspoon)、almond milk (¾cup)、salt
instructions:
0: Add olive oil to a heated pan. Toss in ½ cups (100 G) of tomatoes and mushroom. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add olive oil (if required) and stir. Mix in 2 cups (80 G) of spinach and 1 clove of garlic.
1: For the batter, add nutritional yeast, chickpea flour, baking soda, garlic powder and turmeric. Add salt and pepper to taste. You can also add black salt for an eggy flavor (optional). Next, add apple cider vinegar to almond milk and mix the batter thoroughly. On your heated pan, add a drizzle of olive oil and pour the freshly made batter carefully.
2: Once it has been cooked, add the sauteed veggies. Turn off the heat and let it steam for 5 minutes with the lid on.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:eggs、double cream (1cup)、icing sugar (1teaspoon)、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、bread (2slices)、strawberry jam
instructions:
0: Add the eggs, cream, icing sugar and vanilla extract to a bowl and whisk until smooth.
1: Dip two slices of bread into the mix, soaking them thoroughly.
2: Fry both slices until golden brown on both sides.
3: Cut paper heart out of baking paper.
4: Place paper heart on one slice of bread and cut a heart shaped hole into the bread using the paper as a guide.
5: Spread jam on the other slice of bread, then place the bread with the heart on top of this slice.
6: Place the paper heart back over the hole, and sprinkle with icing sugar. Then remove the paper heart.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:salted butter (¼cup)、bacon (12strips)、all-purpose flour (¼cup)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、milk (4cups)、dijon mustard (1tablespoon)、white bread (15slices)、ham (17slices)、shredded mozzarella cheese (3cups)、fresh chives (1teaspoon)、eggs
instructions:
0: In a medium pan over high heat, cook the bacon until browned, about 12 minutes. Transfer the bacon bits to a paper towel to drain and leave the bacon grease in the pan.
1: To the pan, add the flour, pepper, and salt and whisk to combine for 5 minutes. Add the milk and Dijon mustard and cook until thickened, about 5 minutes. Remove the béchamel sauce from the heat and cover to keep warm.
2: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Grease a bundt pan with the salted butter. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
3: With a rolling pin, roll out the bread to flatten and cut 8 slices in half.
4: Arrange the 7 whole slices around the outer sides of the bundt pan and 4 half slices around the inner ring. Place 5 slices of ham over the bread. Sprinkle 1 cup (100 g) of mozzarella and ⅓ of the chopped bacon on top of the ham.
5: Place 6 half slices of bread on top of the bacon layer. Top with 8 slices of ham, another cup of mozzarella, and another ⅓ of the chopped bacon. Top with another 4 slices of ham. Place 6 half slices of bread on top of the ham.
6: Bake for 25 minutes, or until golden brown.
7: Invert the ring onto the prepared baking sheet, remove the bundt pan, and brush the top of the ring with béchamel sauce. Sprinkle with the remaining cup of mozzarella and the rest of the bacon.
8: Broil for 10 minutes, until the cheese is melted and browned.
9: Sprinkle the ring with parsley. Transfer the rest of the béchamel sauce to a small bowl and place in the middle of the ring.
10: Slice the ring and serve warm with the sauce and sunny-side up eggs.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flax seed (1tablespoon)、cold water (3tablespoons)、ripe banana、non dairy milk (1 ½cups)、maple syrup (3tablespoons)、apple cider vinegar (1tablespoon)、refined coconut oil (2tablespoons)、vanilla extract (2teaspoons)、all-purpose flour (¾cup)、buckwheat flour (¾cup)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、baking soda (¼teaspoon)、kosher salt (½teaspoon)、nonstick cooking spray
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 200°F (95°C).
1: Make the pancakes: In a small bowl, combine ground flax meal and cold water. Stir well. Set aside to gel for 10 minutes while you prepare the rest of the batter.
2: In a large bowl, use the back of a fork to mash the banana until smooth. Add the nondairy milk, maple syrup, apple cider vinegar, coconut oil, vanilla, and flax egg and whisk to combine.
3: Sift in the all-purpose flour, buckwheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Using a spatula, stir well until there are no dry spots remaining.
4: Heat a griddle pan to 350°F (180°C). If using stovetop, place a frying pan over medium heat. Lightly grease the griddle or pan with nonstick spray.
5: Working in batches, use a ½ cup (120 ml) measure to scoop the batter onto the hot griddle. Cook the pancakes for 3–4 minutes, until bubbles form all over the surface and the bottom is golden brown and releases easily from the pan. Flip and cook for another 3–4 minutes on the other side, until golden brown and completely cooked through. Repeat with the remaining batter.
6: Place the cooked pancakes on a baking sheet and transfer to the oven to keep warm while you prepare the rest of the ingredients.
7: Make the grilled bananas: Increase the griddle temperature to 375°F (190°C). If using stovetop, place a frying pan over medium-high heat.
8: In a medium bowl, mix together the melted butter and maple syrup.
9: Brush each banana segment all over with the melted butter mixture. Working in batches, grill the bananas for 2–3 minutes on one side, then flip and grill for another 1–2 minutes, until golden brown grill marks appear and the banana is soft. Set aside until ready to serve.
10: Make the maple rum sauce: Add the walnuts to a small saucepan and turn the heat to medium-high. Toast the walnuts for about 1 minute, until fragrant and beginning to brown, then remove from the pan and set aside.
11: To the same saucepan, add maple syrup and brown sugar and cook until the brown sugar is melted and beginning to bubble, 3–4 minutes. Add the toasted walnuts and 6 tablespoons of butter to the pan and cook until the butter melts.
12: Reduce the heat to medium-low and add the rum. Cook for 1–2 minutes, until the alcohol cooks off. Remove the pot from the heat and add the remaining 2 tablespoons of butter and the salt. Stir to melt the butter. Let the sauce cool for 10 minutes before serving.
13: To serve, top the warm pancakes with the grilled bananas and maple rum sauce.
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:eggs、whole milk (1cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (¼teaspoon)、green onion (¼cup)、shredded cheddar cheese (¼cup)、pie crust、bacon (10slices)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C)
1: Add eggs to the bowl.
2: In a medium-sized bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, salt, and pepper.
3: Add in the green onions and cheddar, and mix again.
4: Pour the egg mixture into the pie crust and bake for 35-40 minutes or until set.
5: Increase the oven temperature to 400°F (200°C).
6: Lay the bacon on top of the pie and weave to make a lattice top.
7: Bake again for 20 minutes or until bacon is crispy. Broil for crispier bacon.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bread、spinach and artichoke dip (2tablespoons)、avocado、parmesan cheese (2tablespoons)、fresh parsley (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Spread spinach and artichoke dip on toast.
1: Top with sliced avocado and shaved Parmesan cheese, and sprinkle with parsley.
2: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breast、chipolata sausage、edam cheese (2slices)、bacon (2slices)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).
1: Prep all of the ingredients first to avoid touching things with chicken fingers. Slice the bacon, remove the cheese and sausage from their packaging, etc.
2: Mix together all of the seasonings.
3: Place the chicken breast on a sheet of clingfilm, then cut it horizontally 95% of the way through to butterfly it.
4: Wrap it in the clingfilm, then thin it out by bashing it with a rolling pin.
5: Season the chicken, then wrap the sausage in a slice of cheese and put in the centre of the flattened out chicken.
6: Roll it up, then season the other side of the chicken.
7: Wrap the chicken in one or two more slices of cheese and season the remaining side of the chicken.
8: Wrap the bacon around the cheesy chicken nice and tight.
9: Transfer to a tray and bake for 25 minutes.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flax meal (2tablespoons)、water (6tablespoons)、milk (¾cup)、maple syrup (½cup)、applesauce (½cup)、fruit and vegetable pulp (1cup)、apple cider vinegar (1teaspoon)、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、whole wheat flour (2cups)、rolled oats (1cup)、baking powder (2teaspoons)、baking soda (½teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、cinnamon (1teaspoon)、nutmeg (¼teaspoon)、nonstick cooking spray
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350ºF (180ºC).
1: Make the flax eggs: combine the flax meal with the water and set aside for 10 minutes to gel.
2: In a large bowl, combine the milk, maple syrup, flax eggs, applesauce, fruit and vegetable pulp, apple cider vinegar, and vanilla. Stir for about 30 seconds, until well-combined.
3: Add the flour, oats, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Stir for about 30 seconds, until combined.
4: Grease a 12-cup muffin tin with nonstick spray. Then, fill each cup with the batter about ¾ of the way full. Sprinkle the tops with oats.
5: Bake for 20-25 minutes, until a toothpick inserted in the center of a muffin comes out clean.
6: Let cool for at least 15 minutes, then serve.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sourdough bread slices、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、cheddar cheese slices
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C), and double line a large baking sheet with aluminum foil fitted with a wired rack; set aside.
1: In a small mixing bowl add maple syrup and brown sugar, then mix until combined with no lumps.
2: Place bacon strips evenly on the wired rack and generously brush maple syrup mixture over the top of the bacon and bake for 12 to 15 minutes. Remove from the oven, flip each strip and brush on the remaining mixture. Return to the oven and continue to cook for another 8-10 minutes or until it reaches your desired level of crispiness, then garnish with coarse black pepper.
3: Heat a skillet over medium heat. Butter one side of each slice of bread. Place the buttered side down on the skillet, add 2 slices of cheddar cheese then top with the remaining slice of bread, buttered side out.
4: Cook until bread is toasted and golden and cheese starts to melt, about 2 minutes. Flip, and cook until cheese melty and bread toasted and golden. Remove from heat, and set aside for 5 mins.
5: Cut each grilled cheese sandwich into even 1.5x1.5-inch squares, set aside.
6: Assemble each skewer starting with a grilled cheese square, then bacon strip, alternating until the end by spiralling the bacon strip in-between each square until finished. Serve and enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all purpose flour (1 ¼cups)、cornstarch (2tablespoons)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、baking soda (¼teaspoon)、kosher salt (¼teaspoon)、Sam's Choice® Premium Spiral-Cut Ham (½cup)、gruyère cheese (1 ½cups)、large eggs、buttermilk (1 ½cups)、vegetable oil (2tablespoons)、nonstick cooking spray
instructions:
0: Preheat an 8-inch waffle iron to medium-high heat.
1: In a large bowl, mix together the flour, cornstarch, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Add the finely chopped ham and 1 cup (100 G) shredded Gruyère, and toss to coat.
2: Add the egg yolks, buttermilk, and vegetable oil, and mix until well combined.
3: Add the egg whites to a medium bowl and whip with an electric hand mixer on medium speed until soft peaks form, 3–4 minutes.
4: Gently fold the egg whites into the batter until incorporated.
5: Grease the preheated waffle iron with nonstick spray, then pour a heaping ⅔ cup of batter into the iron, smoothing with a spatula to cover the iron evenly. Sprinkle the top with 2 tablespoons of shredded Gruyère cheese. Close the lid and cook for 7 minutes, or until the waffle is cooked through and golden brown. Repeat with the remaining batter and cheese.
6: Top each waffle with a pat of butter, a drizzle of maple syrup, and 2 tablespoons of chopped ham, then serve.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:egg yolks、salted butter (1cup)、fresh lemon juice (1tablespoon)、salt (¼teaspoon)、cayenne pepper、hot water (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: In a high-speed blender jug, add egg yolks, freshly squeezed lemon juice, salt, and cayenne pepper.
1: Melt butter in a microwave or on stove top, until completely melted and very hot to the touch.
2: Using high speed, blend the yolk mixture for 3-4 seconds, then gradually in a thin stream pour the hot melted butter into the blender jug, while it is still running on high speed. Check for desired consistency and taste, adding more salt, cayenne pepper as needed. The sauce will begin to thicken as the hot liquid begins to emulsify with the yolk mixture.
3: Start by making a base with the tater tots, then layer on the shredded cheddar cheese, crumbled Italian sausage, crumbled bacon, sunny-side up or poached egg. Season with salt and pepper to your desired preference, then top with hollandaise sauce and a garnish of green onion.
4: Serve while hot and enjoy.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:silken tofu (1lb)、maple syrup (¼cup)、blueberry (½cup)、raspberry (½cup)、strawberry (½cup)、soy milk (½cup)
instructions:
0: Add tofu and maple syrup to a mixing bowl and whisk together until smooth and no large lumps are present.
1: Transfer tofu mixture to ice tray and use a rubber spatula to evenly spread the mixture into each of the cube slots.
2: Freeze completely.
3: Place blueberries, raspberries, strawberries, 4 tofu cubes, and milk in a blender, making sure that the cubes sit on top of the fruit.
4: Blend until smooth.
5: Serve immediately.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:almond milk (1cup)、apple cider vinegar (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Combine almond milk and apple cider vinegar, and whisk together.
1: Let sit for 5-7 minutes to “curdle”.
2: Use as a substitute to buttermilk in a variety of recipes!
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flour (⅘cup)、cocoa powder (2tablespoons)、icing sugar (2tablespoons)、salt、eggs、milk (1cup)、water (⅕cup)、butter (2tablespoons)、frozen raspberry (¾cup)、vanilla ice cream、strawberry lace
instructions:
0: Sieve the flour, cocoa powder, icing sugar and salt into a large bowl
1: Make a well in the centre and whisk in the eggs
2: Combine the milk and water and slowly add it to the mixture while continuing to whisk.
3: Melt a small knob of butter in a large frying pan on a medium heat.
4: Spoon a ladle full of the mixture onto the pan and swirl it around to get a nice thin layer of batter.
5: Cook for approx. 2.5 minutes and flip the pancake once.
6: NOTE: You can go for it the cool way, or just use a spatula, we’re not judging you. ;)
7: Cook further for 60 more seconds and remove from the heat.
8: Pour the frozen raspberries into a pot and cook, along with 3 tbsp of water on the lowest setting with the lid on for 5-6 minutes. (You can also use fresh raspberries with 5-6 tbsp of water.)
9: Spoon a dollop of ice cream into the center of the pancake, and pour over a few spoons of the raspberries.
10: Wrap the pancake up around the ice cream and use a strawberry lace to tie it all together.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pancake mix (6cups)、large eggs、milk (4cups)、vegetable oil (3tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C). Line 3 11x17-inch (28x43-cm) baking sheets with parchment paper.
1: Make the pancake layer: In a large bowl, combine the pancake mix, eggs, milk, and vegetable oil. Whisk to combine, being careful not to overmix.
2: Divide batter between 2 of the prepared baking sheets. Spread evenly and bake for 10-15 minutes, until you can poke and no batter comes out
3: Make the egg layer: In a large bowl, combine the eggs, milk, salt, and pepper.
4: Pour the egg mix onto the remaining prepared baking sheet. Spread evenly and bake for 10-15 minutes, until the edges are completely set.
5: Line another baking sheet with 2 sheets of parchment paper.
6: Arrange the Canadian bacon slices in a row at the top of the baking sheet and lay spinach on top.
7: Place the chicken sausage patties in a row under the Canadian bacon and top with the American cheese slices.
8: Fold the bottom part half of the parchment paper over until you reach the patties to create a “barrier” between the meat toppings and the vegetarian toppings.
9: Place the vegetarian burgers on the bottom half of the baking sheet and top with the cheddar cheese.
10: Reduce the oven temperature to 350˚F (180˚C) and bake the toppings for 15-20 minutes, until the meat is warmed through and the cheese has melted.
11: On a cutting board, layer the sandwich starting with a pancake layer, followed by the egg layer. Arrange the bacon and other toppings in quadrants on the egg. Top the Canadian bacon and spinach with hollandaise sauce, if desired. Top with the second pancake layer.
12: Slice into 16 sandwiches and serve immediately, or wrap in parchment paper and freeze in an airtight container for up to 1 month and microwave on defrost for about 5 minutes, until it is warm.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all purpose flour、unbaked canned biscuits、creamy peanut butter (4teaspoons)、jelly of choice (2teaspoons)、water、ghee (2tablespoons)、powdered sugar
instructions:
0: On a lightly floured surface, roll each biscuit into a 5-inch (12.7 cm) circle.
1: Spread the peanut butter in the center of 2 biscuits and add the jelly to the center of the remaining 2 biscuits.
2: Use a pastry brush or your fingers to lightly dampen the edges of the biscuits with water; then fold the peanut butter biscuits over the jelly biscuits and press the edges together to seal well.
3: Use a 4-inch cutter to punch out the center of the biscuit sandwiches, making sure the edges are still sealed well. Discard the dough scraps.
4: Refrigerate the sandwiches for 30 minutes.
5: Melt 1 tablespoon of ghee in a medium nonstick skillet over medium-low heat. Add the sandwiches and cook for 4–5 minutes, until golden brown and crusty. Flip, add the remaining butter, and cook for 3–4 minutes more, until golden brown and crusty.
6: Dust with powdered sugar before serving.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:milk (⅓cup)、instant yeast (½teaspoon)、sugar (2tablespoons)、all purpose flour (1 ¼cups)、brown food coloring、black food coloring、water
instructions:
0: Make the dough: In the bowl of a stand mixer, stir together the milk, yeast, sugar, and flour with a rubber spatula until the dough starts to come together.
1: Fit the stand mixer with the dough hook and mix the dough on medium-high speed for 10 minutes, until smooth.
2: Cover the dough with a wet towel and let rest for 1 hour.
3: Meanwhile, make the filling: In a medium bowl, mix together the steamed taro, sugar, and butter until smooth. Chill in the refrigerator for 1 hour.
4: Pull off a bit more than half of the dough and add a few drops of brown food coloring. Roll into a ball, then roll out into a log. Fold the outer ends of the log inward to overlap the center, then roll out into a log again. Repeat 2–3 more times, until the dough is very smooth.
5: Pull off another small piece of dough and add a drop of black food coloring. Knead until the color is uniform.
6: Knead the remaining white dough until smooth.
7: Pull off about 2 tablespoons of white dough and press into a flat disc about ½ inch thick. Pull off about 3 tablespoons of brown dough and press into a flat disc about ½ inch thick, making sure it’s larger than the white dough portion.
8: Scoop about 1 tablespoon of taro paste into the center of the white dough and wrap about ¾ of the way. Smooth the bottom of the dough. Wrap the brown dough around the exposed filling, slightly dampening the edges of the brown and white dough with water to seal together. Set on a small square of parchment paper and repeat to make 10 total buns, leaving some excess dough for decorating.
9: Use a finger to slightly dampen the outside of a bun with water. Stick on 2 small dots of black dough for the eyes and a larger dot for the notes, then 2 balls of white dough for the ears. 2 smaller balls of white dough for the arms, and 2 more medium balls of white dough for the feet. Use kitchen shears to cut spikes in the brown dough. Repeat with the remaining buns.
10: Let the buns rest for 30 minutes.
11: Meanwhile, fill the bottom of a steamer with water and bring to a simmer over medium heat. (If you don’t have a steamer, fill a large pot with a bowl at the bottom with water, then place a plate on top of the bowl, making sure the water does not come over the edges of the plate.)
12: Add the buns to the steamer, leaving enough space for the buns to expand. Cover the pot and steam the buns for about 9 minutes, or until the dough is cooked through. Turn off the heat and let the buns rest in the steamer for 5 minutes before serving.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bread (10slices)、eggs、milk (1cup)、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、cinnamon (1tablespoon)、nutmeg (1teaspoon)、cream cheese (8oz)、powdered sugar (2tablespoons)、strawberry (1cup)、whipped cream
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Slice bread into bite-sized pieces.
2: In a bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, vanilla, cinnamon, and nutmeg until fully combined.
3: In a separate bowl, mix the cream cheese and powdered sugar until smooth.
4: Whisk the egg mixture into the cream cheese mixture, and add the strawberries.
5: Spread the bread evenly along the bottom of a greased 9x13 inch (23x33 cm) glass baking dish then pour the mixture over the bread.
6: Bake 45 minutes or until bread is getting slightly crunchy and golden brown on top and edges. Top with whipped cream if desired.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:Birch Benders Keto Pancake & Waffle Mix (2bags)、water (2 ½cups)、nonstick cooking spray、almond milk、strawberry (1 ½cups)、blueberry (1cup)、Birch Benders Keto Syrup
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, whisk together the Birch Benders Keto Pancake & Waffle Mix and water until smooth. Transfer half of the batter to a large piping bag. Cut about a ½ inch off the tip of the bag(s).
1: Make the pancakes: Heat a medium nonstick skillet over medium heat. Pipe 4–6 small pancakes, each about 1 inch wide, into the pan. Cook for 1–2 minutes on each side, or until golden brown. Use a spatula to carefully remove the pancakes from the skillet and repeat with the remaining batter.
2: Make the waffles: Preheat the waffle maker according to the manufacturer’s instructions. Grease with nonstick spray. Ladle a heaping ⅔ cup of the remaining batter into the waffle maker. Cook for 5 minutes, or until the waffle is golden brown on both sides. Remove the waffle from the iron and repeat with the remaining batter.
3: Using a 1-inch round cutter, cut out as many mini waffles from the larger waffles as possible, discarding the scraps or saving for a snack.
4: Divide the pancakes and waffles between 4 serving bowls. Pour the milk over the “cereal” and top with the strawberries, blueberries, and Birch Benders Keto Syrup. Serve immediately.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large egg、flax meal (2tablespoons)、riced cauliflower (2cups)、almond meal (1 ½cups)、garlic powder (1 ½teaspoons)、onion powder (1teaspoon)、kosher salt (1 ½teaspoons)、canola oil (2teaspoons)、nonstick cooking spray、topping of your choice
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: In a small bowl, whisk together the egg and flax meal. Let sit for at least 5 minutes to gel.
2: In a medium microwave-safe bowl, microwave the riced cauliflower for 3-4 minutes on medium power until steamed and mashable with a fork. Let cool for 5 minutes, or until safe to handle.
3: Transfer the cauliflower to a clean kitchen towel and wring out all of the moisture. You should be left with about 1½ cups (450 G) of cauliflower.
4: In a food processor, combine the cauliflower, almond meal, egg and flax mixture, garlic powder, onion powder and salt. Process for 30-60 seconds, until well combined.
5: Heat 1 teaspoon of canola oil in a small square cast iron skillet over medium heat. Add half of the cauliflower mixture to the pan, and spread in an even layer with a spatula dipped in water. Repeat with the remaining oil, skillet, and cauliflower mixture.
6: Bake for 12 minutes, until the bread begins to brown on top and is firm to the touch. Remove from the oven and turn the broiler to low.
7: Grease the tops of the cauliflower bread with nonstick spray. Return to the oven and broil for 3-4 minutes, until golden brown. Let cool in the pans for 10 minutes before topping as desired and serving.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:turkey bacon (9slices)、hawaiian roll (12oz)、large eggs、cheddar cheese (3slices)、butter lettuce (4large leaves)、medium tomatoes
instructions:
0: Preheat Griddler, fitted with the griddle plates, to 425°F (220°C) and grease with nonstick spray.
1: On a cutting board, arrange 4 slices of turkey bacon vertically directly next to each other. Weave the 5 remaining bacon slices horizontally through the vertical pieces.
2: Wrap the bacon weave onto a rolling pin, taking care to keep it intact. Carefully transfer the bacon to the griddle and carefully unroll in an even layer.
3: Close the Griddler and cook for 8 minutes, until the bacon is fully cooked and has begun to crisp up. Remove the bacon weave from the Griddler.
4: Use a bread knife to slice the intact loaf of rolls crosswise so that the bottoms can be separated from the tops. Set aside the top half.
5: Place the bacon weave on the bottom half of the rolls.
6: Distribute the scrambled eggs on top of the bacon weave, smoothing them into an even layer.
7: Place the cheese on top of the eggs, covering as much area as possible.
8: Place the lettuce on top of the cheese.
9: Place the tomato slices evenly on top of the lettuce leaves.
10: Replace the top half of the rolls and slice the individual sliders.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:jalapeño pepper (12oz)、cider vinegar (2cups)、sugar (6cups)、Ball® RealFruit™ Liquid Pectin (2pouches)
instructions:
0: Prepare boiling water canner. Heat jars in simmering water until ready for use. Do not boil. Wash lids in warm soapy water and set bands aside.
1: Purée peppers in food processor or blender with 1 cup (240 ml) cider vinegar until smooth. Do not strain purée.
2: Combine purée with remaining 1 cup (240 ml) cider vinegar and sugar. Bring to a boil over high heat. Boil 10 minutes, stirring frequently.
3: Add Ball® RealFruit™ Liquid Pectin, immediately squeezing entire contents from pouches. Continue to boil hard for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Skim foam if necessary.
4: Ladle hot jalapeño jelly into hot jars leaving ¼ inch (6 mm) headspace. Wipe rim. Center lid on jar. Apply band until fit is fingertip tight.
5: Process in a boiling water canner for 10 minutes, adjusting for altitude. Remove jars and cool. Check lids for seal after 24 hours. Lid should not flex up and down when center is pressed.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ice (⅓cup)、frozen raspberry (1cup)、medium banana、goji berry powder (1tablespoon)、fresh ginger、hemp seeds (3tablespoons)、non dairy milk (1cup)、goji berries (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Combine the ice, raspberries, banana, goji berry powder, ginger, hemp seeds, and nondairy milk in a high-powered blender. Blend on high speed for 1 minute, until completely smooth.
1: Pour the smoothie into a glass and top with goji berries and hemp seeds.
2: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:silken tofu (1lb)、maple syrup (¼cup)、bananas、fresh mint (⅓cup)、dark baker's chocolate (1oz)、cocoa powder (1teaspoon)、soy milk (1cup)
instructions:
0: Add tofu and maple syrup to a mixing bowl and whisk together until smooth and no large lumps are present.
1: Transfer tofu mixture to ice tray and using a rubber spatula to evenly spread the mixture into each of the cube slots.
2: Freeze completely.
3: Place bananas, mint, chocolate, 4 tofu cubes, cocoa powder, and milk in a blender, making sure that the cubs sit on top of the other ingredients.
4: Blend until smooth.
5: Serve immediately.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:broccoli floret (2cups)、shredded cheddar cheese (1cup)、eggs、bacon (5strips)、large red onion、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、chili powder (½teaspoon)、milk (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Heat oven to 400˚ (200˚C).
1: Mix eggs, milk, and spices in large mixing bowl.
2: Add broccoli, bacon, and cheese, and continue mixing until all ingredients are well incorporated.
3: Cut ends off the red onion and then slice in half. Gently pop out rings, using desired size.
4: Heat cast-iron pan on low and place onion rings in the pan.
5: Spoon in small amount of egg mixture and press on the onion ring create a seal, then repeat for all rings.
6: Pour the remaining mixture filling to just about the top of each ring.
7: Cover with foil.
8: Place in oven and cook for 25 minutes, or until eggs are cooked through and slightly puffed and onion rings are tender.
9: Remove from pan immediately and sprinkle with desired topping. (We used grated parmesan cheese.)
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large egg yolks、sugar (⅓cup)、cornstarch (3tablespoons)、unsweetened full fat coconut milk (1can)、McCormick® vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、coconut extract (2teaspoons)
instructions:
0: Make the coconut custard: In a medium bowl, whisk together the egg yolks, sugar, and cornstarch.
1: Pour the coconut milk into a small saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium-low heat.
2: Once the coconut milk is simmering, very slowly pour into the bowl with the egg mixture, whisking constantly to combine and temper the eggs.
3: Return the mixture to the saucepan over medium heat and cook, whisking constantly, until thickened, 2–3 minutes. Scrape the mixture into a clean medium bowl and whisk in the vanilla and coconut extracts.
4: Set the bowl over another bowl filled with ice water (make sure the water level is not so high that it gets into the custard) and let the custard cool for 10 minutes.
5: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
6: Once the custard has cooled, scoop onto the prepared baking sheet in 1-tablespoon discs, spacing evenly. You should have at least 20 custard discs. Transfer to the freezer for 90 minutes, until frozen.
7: Make the pancakes: In a medium bowl, whisk together the buttermilk, eggs, and pandan extract. Add the melted butter and whisk to combine.
8: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
9: Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients. Mix until just combined, being careful not to over-mix; some lumps are okay. Let the batter rest for 5 minutes.
10: Heat a large nonstick skillet or a pancake griddle over medium-low heat and grease with nonstick spray. Pour ¼ cup of batter into the pan and cook the pancake halfway, about 2-3 minutes. Place a disc of frozen coconut custard in the center, cover the custard with about 1 tablespoon more batter and flip. Cook until golden brown, 2–3 minutes more.  Remove from the pan and repeat with the remaining batter and coconut custard to make 20 pancakes total.
11: Serve with butter, maple syrup, and toasted coconut flakes.
12: Enjoy!
13: RECIPE BY: Mimo Ahmed

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:self-rising flour (2cups)、butter (¼cup)、sugar (¼cup)、milk (¼cup)、cinnamon (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 275°F.
1: Mix the sugar and butter together until it has a sandy texture. Then, add the self-rising flour and mix until cohesive and sticks to the bowl.
2: Shape scones in the shape of your choice and bake for 10 minutes.
3: Serve warm.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:whole milk (2 ½cups)、granulated sugar (½cup)、active dry yeast (2 ¼teaspoons)、bread flour (7cups)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、ground cinnamon (¼teaspoon)、dark cocoa powder (8tablespoons)、instant espresso powder (2teaspoons)、large eggs、unsalted butter (5tablespoons)、vanilla extract (1tablespoon)、peanut oil (2qt)、powdered sugar (½cup)
instructions:
0: Make the beignet dough: In a 4-cup measuring cup, whisk together 1½ cups of milk, the sugar, and yeast. Set in a warm place for 10 minutes, until the yeast blooms and the mixture is foamy.
1: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, kosher salt, cinnamon, and 6 tablespoons cocoa powder.
2: In a liquid measuring cup or small bowl, whisk together the remaining 1 cup of milk and the instant espresso powder until the espresso is dissolved.
3: In a medium bowl, whisk together the eggs, melted butter, and vanilla until smooth.
4: Add the egg mixture and the espresso-milk mixture to the yeast mixture and whisk until combined.
5: Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and stir with a wooden spoon until a shaggy dough forms.
6: Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead until it comes together and is no longer sticky, about 10 minutes. Transfer the dough to a clean large bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and let proof in a warm place until doubled in size, about 2 hours. Alternatively, transfer the dough to the refrigerator and let proof slowly overnight, or for up to 24 hours.
7: While the dough proofs, make the salted caramel: Add the sugar to a small saucepan and cook over medium heat, swirling the pan occasionally, but not stirring, until it starts to turn amber brown, 4–5 minutes. Add the butter and whisk until incorporated, 1–2 minutes. Slowly drizzle in the cream and whisk to combine. Boil for 1 minute, then remove the pot from the heat. Whisk in the vanilla and flaky salt. Transfer to an airtight container, straining through a fine-mesh sieve to remove any lumps, if needed, then refrigerate to thicken and cool completely before using, about 1 hour.
8: Fry the beignets: Heat the peanut oil in a 6-quart pot over medium-high heat to 360°F (182°C). Line a baking sheet with paper towels and set a wire rack on top.
9: In a small bowl, sift together the powdered sugar and remaining 2 tablespoons cocoa powder.
10: Turn the beignet dough onto a lightly floured surface and roll out to a 12-inch square, about ¼-inch-thick. Trim the edges, then cut into 16 3-inch squares, discarding any scraps.
11: Working 3–4 at a time, fry the beignets in the hot oil for 2–3 minutes on each side, until slightly darker in color around the edges. Remove from the oil using a slotted spoon or spider and transfer to the prepared baking sheet. Immediately dust with the powdered sugar mixture, then repeat with the remaining beignets.
12: Transfer the salted caramel into a piping bag fitted with a small round tip.
13: Using the tip of a small knife, poke a hole in the side of each beignet and slowly fill with the caramel.
14: Arrange the beignets on a platter and serve immediately.
15: Enjoy!
16: RECIPE BY: Breana Jackson

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all purpose flour (1 ¼cups)、kosher salt (½teaspoon)、unsalted butter (1stick)、ice water (3tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Add the flour and salt to a food processor. Pulse to combine. Add the butter and pulse 6–8 times until broken down into pea-sized pieces. Add the water and pulse 8–10 times, until the dough comes together. Turn the dough out onto a clean surface and shape into a disc. Tightly wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate for 30–60 minutes
1: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2: On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to a circle about ⅛-inch thick. Roll the dough onto the rolling pin and gently transfer to an 8-inch pie dish. Press the dough flush against the dish. Trim any excess dough around the edges. Fold the edges of dough back underneath itself, then crimp using an index finger knuckle on one hand and the thumb and index finger on the other hand.
3: Line the crust with parchment paper and fill with pie weights or dried beans. Bake for 10–15 minutes, until the crust is beginning to brown around the edges. Remove the crust from the oven and carefully lift out the parchment paper and baking beans.
4: Prick the bottom of the crust with a fork and return to the oven for another 3–5 minutes, until the bottom is beginning to brown. Remove from the oven and set on a rack to cool while you make the filling.
5: Fill a large, high-walled skillet with water and bring to a simmer over medium-high heat. Once simmering, season the water generously with salt. Prepare an ice bath in a large bowl and set nearby.
6: Blanch the asparagus in the simmering water for 30–60 seconds, until bright green and tender. Transfer to the ice bath to cool for 1–2 minutes, then drain and let dry on a paper towel or kitchen towel-lined baking sheet.
7: Reserve 8–10 spears of asparagus. Cut the rest into 1-inch pieces.
8: In a large bowl, whisk together the egg yolks, eggs, heavy cream, black pepper, salt, and nutmeg. Add the asparagus pieces and 2 tablespoons of chives and whisk to incorporate.
9: Spread 3 ounces of the goat cheese across the bottom.
10: Pour the filling into the crust. Arrange the reserved asparagus spears on top. Sprinkle with the remaining tablespoon of chives and dot with the remaining ounce of goat cheese.
11: Bake the quiche for 28–35 minutes, until the center is set, but still jiggles slightly when gently shaken.
12: Transfer the quiche to a wire rack to cool for 30 minutes before slicing and serving.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ripe plantains、eggs、whole milk (½cup)、smoked sausage (6oz)、red bell pepper、green bell pepper、large yellow onion、roma tomatoes、garlic (3cloves)、kosher salt、olive oil、fresh cilantro、avocado
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400-degrees. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: Toss plantain slices with 2 tablespoons olive oil and 1 teaspoon kosher salt in a large bowl and add to the prepared sheet in a single layer. Bake for 20 to 30 minutes until golden brown but soft on the inside. Set aside to cool.
2: In a large bowl whisk together the eggs and milk until evenly combined. Season with salt and pepper and set aside.
3: Meanwhile, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a 10-inch (25 cm) cast iron skillet over medium heat. Add sausage and cook until evenly browned, about 5 minutes. Remove from the pan and set aside.
4: Add peppers and onions to skillet and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
5: Add garlic and tomatoes; cook until garlic is fragrant, about 1 to 2 minutes.
6: Reduce heat to low and add egg mixture and cook for 1 to 2 minutes or until the edges start to set.
7: Remove from heat and top with cooked plantain slices.
8: Transfer to the oven and cook for about 15 to 20 minutes, just until the eggs are barely set.
9: Let cool for 10 to 15 minutes then garnish with cilantro and avocado slices.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:whole wheat (2cups)、baking powder (1tablespoon)、cinnamon (1teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、large eggs、milk (1cup)、olive oil (¼cup)、maple syrup (¼cup)、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、mashed sweet potato (1 ½cups)、oil
instructions:
0: Make the waffles: In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt.
1: In a separate large bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, olive oil, maple syrup, vanilla, and sweet potato until smooth.
2: Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and stir with a rubber spatula until just combined, making sure not to overmix the batter.
3: Heat a waffle iron and grease with oil.
4: Scoop enough batter to fill your waffle iron into the center. Close the iron and cook for 5-6 minutes, until the waffle is golden brown and cooked all the way through. Remove the waffle and repeat with the remaining batter.
5: Make the cranberry syrup: Add the cranberry sauce and orange juice to a blender and blend until smooth. The syrup should be thin enough to drizzle, but not liquidy. Add more orange juice as needed to reach the right consistency. Set aside.
6: Make the pecan topping: In a small saucepan, combine the apple, pecans, maple syrup, and water. Cook over medium-high heat until the syrup starts to glaze the pecans and the apples soften, about 10 minutes.
7: Serve the waffles warm with the pecan topping, cranberry syrup, and a few pieces of goat cheese, if desired.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:whole wheat bread (½loaf)、frozen blueberry (1 ½cups)、eggs、maple syrup (1tablespoon)、coconut  oil (2tablespoons)、vanilla extract (1tablespoon)、cinnamon (1teaspoon)、lemon、milk (2cups)、maple syrup、powdered sugar
instructions:
0: Slice bread into quarters and layer on bottom of a greased slow cooker.
1: Top with blueberries.
2: In a large bowl or measuring cup, whisk together eggs, maple syrup, coconut oil, vanilla extract, cinnamon, lemon zest, and milk.
3: Pour mixture over bread and stir.
4: Cook on low 7-8 hours.
5: Carefully remove lid and serve with maple syrup and powdered sugar.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:vanilla extract (1tablespoon)、honey (3tablespoons)、salt (1pinch)、water (4cups)
instructions:
0: Place 1 cup of cracked pistachios into a blender.
1: Add 1 tablespoon of vanilla, 3 tablespoons of honey, 1 pinch of salt, and 4 cups water to the blender.
2: Blend the mixture on high for 90 seconds.
3: Use a cheesecloth to strain the liquid into a pouring container.
4: (Optional) refrigerate 1-2 hours or serve immediately.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:Birch Benders Keto Pancake & Waffle Mix (2cups)、water (1cup)、unsalted butter (½stick)、breakfast sausage patties、cheddar cheese (4slices)、egg white (1 ⅓cups)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、freshly ground black pepper (1teaspoon)、olive oil (4teaspoons)、fresh spinach (2 ½cups)
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, whisk together the Birch Benders Keto Pancake & Waffle Mix and water until smooth.
1: In a small nonstick skillet, melt ½ tablespoon of butter over medium heat. Pour ¼ cup of the pancake batter into the pan and cook until golden brown and fully cooked through, about 2 minutes per side. The pancakes should be 3–3½ inches wide. Remove from the pan and repeat with the remaining batter, adding more butter each time, until you have 8 pancakes total.
2: In a medium skillet over medium heat, cook the breakfast sausage patties until browned and fully cooked through, according to the package instructions. Turn the heat off and place a slice of cheddar cheese on top of each patty. Let the residual heat melt the cheese, 3–5 minutes. Remove the patties from the pan and set aside.
3: In a small bowl, whisk together the egg whites, salt, and black pepper.
4: In the same skillet used to cook the breakfast sausage patties, sauté the spinach over medium-low heat until wilted, about 45 seconds. Remove the spinach from the pan.
5: Add 1 teaspoon of olive oil to the pan. Pour in ⅓ cup of the egg whites and tilt the pan to coat the bottom evenly. Cook until the top is set, 2 minutes. Add a quarter of the sautéed spinach to the center of the egg whites and fold the edges of the egg whites inward over the spinach to create a square shape. Repeat with the remaining egg whites, adding another teaspoon of olive oil to the pan for each batch.
6: To assemble, place a sausage patty on a pancake, then place an egg white and spinach packet and another pancake on top. Repeat to make 3 more stackers.
7: Serve warm.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:heavy cream (¾cup)、black tea bag、mascarpone cheese (1oz)、powdered sugar (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Infuse the milk tea cream: Add heavy cream and black tea bag to a small saucepan. Heat over low heat until the cream just barely begins to simmer, about 5 minutes. Transfer the infused cream and tea bag to a medium heatproof bowl, let cool to room temperature, then cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours, preferably overnight.
1: Make the boba with brown sugar syrup: Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Shake off any excess flour from the boba pearls, then add to the boiling water. Stir to separate the pearls, then reduce the heat to medium-low. Simmer gently, stirring occasionally, for about 20 minutes, until cooked through. Drain the boba and rinse with cold water to stop the cooking process. Transfer to a medium heatproof bowl.
2: Meanwhile, make the brown sugar syrup: Add the muscovado sugar and water to a small saucepan over medium heat. Cook until the sugar dissolves and the syrup thickens slightly, 5–7 minutes. Pour the syrup over the boba and stir to coat. Let sit for about 1 hour.
3: Make the pancakes: Add the milk, 4 tablespoons of butter, and the black tea bags to a small saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a gentle simmer and cook for 10 minutes. Do not let it come to a boil. Remove the pot from the heat and remove the tea bags, gently squeezing out any excess liquid. Transfer the tea milk to a medium heat-proof bowl and let cool to room temperature.
4: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, and baking soda.
5: In a medium bowl or liquid measuring cup, whisk together the cooled tea milk, vanilla, and egg yolk.
6: Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and gently fold with a rubber spatula until just combined. Add the egg white and fold until just combined. Do not overmix; some lumps are okay. Let the batter rest at room temperature for 15–30 minutes, until thickened.
7: Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in a medium nonstick skillet over medium-low heat. Once the butter begins to bubble, add about ¼ cup of the batter to the pan. Cook for about 4 minutes, until bubbles start to appear on the surface. Flip the pancake over and cook for another 1–2 minutes, until golden brown. Repeat with the remaining batter, adding more butter to the pan as needed. You should have about 8 pancakes.
8: Make milk tea cream: Remove the tea bag from the chilled infused cream. Pour ½ cup of the cream into a stand mixer fitted with the whisk attachment. Add the mascarpone and powdered sugar. Whip on medium speed until the mixture just barely starts to thicken, about 1 minute. It should still be a little runny.
9: When ready to serve, set 1 pancake on a plate and top with about 1 tablespoon of the boba pearls and syrup. Repeat to stack 3 more pancakes on top. Pour half of the milk tea cream over the top and garnish with 2 tablespoons of boba pearls. Repeat to make a second serving.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsalted butter (¼cup)、granulated sugar (3tablespoons)、large eggs、whole milk (3cups)、all-purpose flour (2cups)、salt (1pinch)、sugar (1tablespoon)、cinnamon (1teaspoon)、sweetened whipped cream
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, add the melted butter, sugar, and eggs. Whisk to combine, then add the milk and whisk to incorporate. Sift in the flour and salt and whisk until smooth.
1: Heat a small nonstick skillet over medium heat. Scoop ¼ cup (60 g) of the batter into the pan. Swirl the pan around until the batter evenly coats the bottom. Cook until the surface begins to bubble slightly and the edges brown, about 3 minutes.
2: Flip the crepe and cook on the other side for another 1-2 minutes. Remove from the skillet and set aside to cool. Repeat with the remaining batter.
3: Fold crepe in half 3 times, then cut out your desired shapes.
4: In a small bowl, mix together the cinnamon and sugar.
5: Coat the leftover cut-out shapes with cinnamon sugar.
6: Spread whipped cream on another crepe and sprinkle with cinnamon sugar.
7: Unfold the the cut-out crepe and place on top of the whipped cream crepe.
8: Place coated cut-out shapes on top of the crepe stack. Repeat with the rest of the crepes.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:warm water (1cup)、active dry yeast (1packet)、bread flour (2 ½cups)、grapeseed oil (4tablespoons)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the dough hook, combine the warm water and yeast and let sit for 10 minutes, until foamy. Add the flour, 2 tablespoons grapeseed oil, and salt and mix on medium speed until the dough comes together in a ball, about 10 minutes. Cover the bowl with a kitchen towel or plastic wrap and let the dough rest at room temperature for 1½ hours, or until doubled in size.
1: While the dough is rising, make the filling: In a small bowl, mix together the walnuts, maple syrup, turbinado sugar, salt, and vanilla.
2: Divide the dough into 8 portions. Roll each piece into a ball, then flatten it into a 4–5-inch-wide disc. Scoop a heaping teaspoon of filling onto the center of each disc, then pinch the dough up and over the filling to encase and roll into a ball again.
3: Heat 2 tablespoons of grapeseed oil in a medium nonstick or cast iron pan over medium-high  heat. Once the oil is shimmering, place a dough ball in the pan and immediately flatten with a hotteok press or spatula into a 4–5-inch-wide disc, about ¼ inch thick. Continue to press down on the disc until the bottom is golden brown, about 2 minutes. Flip the hotteok and cook until the other side is golden brown, 2 minutes more. Repeat with the remaining hotteok, adding more oil to the pan as needed.
4: Serve hot.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flour (2cups)、baking powder (4teaspoons)、salt (1teaspoon)、baking soda (¼teaspoon)、shortening (2tablespoons)、butter (2tablespoons)、buttermilk (1cup)、country ham (15slices)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C).
1: In a bowl, whisk together the dry biscuit ingredients.
2: Cut in the butter and shortening until mixture is crumbly.
3: Mix in buttermilk and knead until it forms a dough.
4: Cut dough into 5 cylinders, 4 inches (10 cm) in diameter. Place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
5: Bake 15-20 minutes, until golden brown.
6: In another bowl, mix the mayo, honey, and Sriracha.
7: Split the biscuits in half.
8: Spread honey Sriracha mayo on one half.
9: Lay 3 slices of country ham on the other half.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:instant oatmeal (2cups)、moringa powder (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Add the moringa powder to the cooked oatmeal and stir to combine.
1: Serve in a bowl with the toppings of your choice.
2: But before that, take a photo and post it on Instagram.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:crushed ripe peaches (2 ¼lb)、water (⅓cup)、lemon juice (2tablespoons)、sugar (1cup)、Ball® RealFruit™ Low or No-Sugar Needed Pectin (3tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Prepare boiling water canner. Heat jars in simmering water until ready to use. Do not boil. Wash lids in warm soapy water and set aside with bands.
1: Combine crushed peaches, water, lemon juice, and sugar in a medium saucepan. Gradually stir in Ball® RealFruit™ Low or No-Sugar Needed Pectin. Bring mixture to a full rolling boil that cannot be stirred down. Boil hard for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Skim foam if necessary.
2: Ladle hot jam into a hot jar leaving a ¼-inch headspace. Remove air bubbles. Wipe jar rim. Center lid on jar and apply band. Adjust to fingertip tight. Place jar in boiling water canner. Repeat until all jars are filled.
3: Process jars 10 minutes, adjusting for altitude. Turn off heat, remove lid, then let jars stand 5 minutes. Remove jars and cool 12–24 hours. Check lids for seal. They should not flex when center is pressed.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sweet potato、almond butter、blueberry (1handful)、pomegranate seeds (1handful)
instructions:
0: Cut sweet potato into thin slices, about ¼ inch (6 mm) thick.
1: Place in toaster and set it to the maximum cook time. When it pops, flip the sweet potato slices over and toast 1 more time. Depending on the strength of your toaster and your preferences, you may need to toast it 1 more time after that.
2: Remove from toaster and let cool enough to handle.
3: Spread almond butter evenly across sweet potato toast.
4: Top with fresh blueberries, pomegranate seeds.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground cinnamon (2teaspoons)、ground ginger (1 ½teaspoons)、ground allspice (½teaspoon)、ground cloves (¼teaspoon)、ground nutmeg (¼teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Make the apple spice blend: in a small bowl, stir together the cinnamon, ginger, allspice, cloves, and nutmeg.
1: Make the muffins: In a medium bowl, whisk together 1 cup (125 G) all-purpose flour, the whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and 1 tablespoon of the spice blend.
2: In a large bowl, use an electric hand mixer on medium speed or whisk to beat the butter until light yellow and aerated, about 2 minutes. Add the granulated and brown sugars and continue beating until light, fluffy, and nearly doubled in volume, 2 minutes more. Add the eggs, 1 at a time, beating well after each addition.
3: Add the applesauce and shredded apple and stir with a rubber spatula to incorporate.
4: Add half of the dry ingredients to the wet and gently fold to combine, being careful not to overmix. Add 1¾ cups of the diced apples to the remaining dry ingredients and toss to coat, then add to the wet ingredients and gently fold to combine. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 1 hour, up to overnight.
5: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a 6-cup jumbo muffin tin with paper liners and lightly grease with nonstick spray.
6: In a medium bowl, toss together the remaining ¾ cup diced apples, melted butter, remaining 1 tablespoon flour, and remaining 1½ teaspoons of apple spice blend.
7: Evenly divide the batter between the prepared muffin cups. Top each muffin with some of the apple topping and sprinkle with the demerara sugar.
8: Bake the muffins for 15 minutes, then rotate the muffin tin 180° and bake for 12–15 minutes more, until the muffins are puffed and golden brown and a cake tester inserted into the center comes out clean.
9: Let cool for 15–20 minutes before serving.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:salted butter (2tablespoons)、large egg、back bacons、maple syrup (2tablespoons)、montreal style bagel、canadian cheddar (2slices)、all dressed chips、tomato slouse
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400F
1: In a large non-stick frying pan over medium heat, melt 1 tbsp butter.  Crack in egg, season with salt and pepper and fry for 3-4 minutes.  Add peameal bacon halfway through, cooking about 1 minute per side.  Drizzle maple syrup over top of bacon and egg and continue cooking for an additional 2-3 minutes, flipping bacon to become coated in maple syrup.
2: Cut open the Montreal style bagel and spread each side with remaining salted butter.  Place butter side up on a baking sheet.  Place a slice of cheddar on each half.  Transfer to a 400F oven for 3-4 minutes or until the cheese has melted.
3: Remove from the oven.  Stack bacon, egg and tomato on one bagel half, season tomato with salt and pepper.  Finally add all dressed chips and top with the remaining bagel half, enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large eggs、whole milk (2cups)、heavy cream (⅓cup)、dark brown sugar (¼cup)、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、ground cinnamon (1teaspoon)、ground nutmeg (¼teaspoon)、kosher salt (½teaspoon)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、brioche bread (12slices)、maple syrup (¾cup)
instructions:
0: Make the French toast: In a medium bowl, beat the eggs. Add the milk, cream, brown sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt and whisk to combine.
1: Grease a 9 x 13-inch (22 x 33 cm) ceramic or glass baking dish with butter.
2: Working in batches, dip the brioche into the custard to coat both sides. Arrange the brioche in the prepared baking dish, overlapping slightly. Pour the remaining custard over the top. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, up to overnight.
3: Meanwhile, make the walnut streusel: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Line a baking sheet with a nonstick mat.
4: In a medium bowl, combine the flour, granulated and brown sugars, salt, and cinnamon. Work the butter into the dry ingredients with a fork until crumbly. Add the chopped walnuts and mix well.
5: Spread the streusel on the prepared baking sheet and bake for 20 minutes, stirring halfway, until golden brown. Remove from the oven and let cool slightly, then crumble and let cool completely before using. The streusel will keep in an airtight container for 1 week.
6: Unwrap the French toast. Cover with foil and bake for 25 minutes, then uncover and bake until the top is golden brown and crunchy, 20-25 minutes more. Remove from the oven and let sit for 10 minutes. Top with the walnut streusel and serve with maple syrup.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:stuffing (3cups)、eggs、turkey (1cup)、carrot (½cup)、green onion (⅓cup)、shredded cheddar cheese (1cup)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350° F (180° C).
1: Whisk together 12 eggs in a large bowl.
2: Shred the turkey and dice the carrots and green onions.
3: Add turkey, carrots, green onions, cheese salt, and pepper. Mix.
4: Scoop stuffing into a greased square baking pan. Push it down with a spoon to make an even layer for crust.
5: Pour egg mixture evenly into the pan.
6: Bake for 45 mins.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large eggs、large egg whites、plain greek yogurt (½cup)、salt、pepper、garlic powder (½tablespoon)、fresh spinach (½cup)、tomato (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: Prepare each mason jar with oil or nonstick spray of choice to prevent sticking.
2: In a medium mixing bowl, add all ingredients. Mix well.
3: Add the egg mixture to the jars, filling them ¾ of the way full. Do not add the lids.
4: Place the mason jars on a small baking sheet and bake 25-30 minutes.
5: Remove jars from the oven, then cool 5-10 minutes before serving.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:raw cashews (1 ½cups)、hot water (2cups)、cold filtered water (¾cup)、lemon juice (2teaspoons)、kosher salt (⅛teaspoon)、vegan probiotic capsules
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, combine the cashews and hot water. Cover and soak the cashews for at least 4 hours, up to overnight. Drain the cashews and discard the soaking water.
1: Add the drained cashews, cold water, lemon juice, and salt to a high-powered blender. Blend on high speed for 1 minute, until the mixture is completely smooth and creamy.
2: Transfer the cashew mixture to a clean 16-ounce (455 G) glass jar. One at a time, open the probiotic capsules and pour the powder into the jar, stirring well with a non-metal utensil after each addition to evenly distribute.
3: Loosely cover the jar with cheesecloth and secure with a rubber band or kitchen twine. Leave the yogurt to ferment in a cool, dark place for at least 12 hours, up to 24 hours. The longer it ferments, the tangier the yogurt will be.
4: Transfer the yogurt to the refrigerator to cool completely, about 2 hours. Store in the fridge for up to 1 week.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all purpose flour、frozen puff pastry (2packages)、large egg
instructions:
0: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: Lay a puff pastry sheet flat on a lightly floured surface. Use a pastry brush to cover the sheet completely with the beaten egg. Fold the sheet into thirds along the creases, like a letter, and place on the prepared baking sheet. Repeat with the remaining 3 sheets of puff pastry.  Refrigerate until stiff and completely chilled, about 1 hour.
2: Preheat the air fryer to 350°F (180°C) for 20 minutes. Set a wire rack over a baking sheet.
3: Remove the puff pastry from the refrigerator and use a 3-inch round cutter to cut out 12 rounds, 3 per sheet. Use a 1-inch round cutter to cut out the center of each pastry round. Remove and discard the scraps, or air fry for chef’s snacks.
4: Working in batches, place the donuts in the air fryer, spacing 1 inch apart, and cook until the donuts have puffed completely and are golden brown all over, about 15 minutes. Transfer to the wire rack.
5: Make the icing: In a medium bowl, stir together the frosting and milk until smooth. Transfer the mixture to a small piping bag and cut a hole in the tip. Pipe the icing on the top of the donuts.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:premade pie crusts、flour (2tablespoons)、dried bean (2cups)、eggs、zucchini (¼cup)、tomato (1cup)、shredded mozzarella cheese (¼cup)、pepper (¼teaspoon)、salt (¼teaspoon)、heavy cream (1cup)、ham slice (10slices)、cheese slice (15slices)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (177°C).
1: On a floured surface, trim the pie crusts to fit a 9x9-inch (23x23-cm) square pan.
2: Overlap the pie crusts slightly and use a rolling pin to roll out until smooth.
3: Place the large pie crust onto the parchment paper-lined square pan, so that the edges hang over the sides of the pan
4: Line the asparagus stalks along the edge of the pan.
5: Cover the asparagus border with pie the crust, trimming any excess.
6: Place a parchment paper square at the base of the pie crust and add dried beans.
7: Bake the pie crust for 40 minutes.
8: In a bowl, whisk the eggs.
9: Add in the asparagus, zucchini, tomatoes, mozzarella, pepper, salt, and heavy cream, whisking to combine.
10: Pour the mixture into the baked pie crust and bake for another 40 minutes.
11: On a sheet of parchment paper, assemble the ham and cheese lattice.
12: Lay the lattice on top of the quiche.
13: Bake for another 20 minutes.
14: Remove the parchment paper and cut the quiche into 9 servings.
15: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sweet potato (4cups)、mushroom (1cup)、red bell peppers、broccoli floret (1cup)、tomato (1cup)、white onion、spinach (2cups)、eggs、egg whites、milk (¾cup)、pepper、salt、shredded cheddar cheese (1cup)
instructions:
0: Layer half of the sweet potatoes on the bottom of a greased slow cooker.
1: Layer half of the mushrooms, red bell peppers, broccoli florets, tomatoes, onions, and spinach.
2: Repeat the layers with the remaining sweet potatoes, mushrooms, red bell peppers broccoli florets, tomatoes, onions, and spinach.
3: In a large bowl or measuring cup, whisk together the eggs, egg whites, milk, salt, and pepper.
4: Pour the egg mixture over the vegetables.
5: Top with cheddar cheese.
6: Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours.
7: Carefully remove lid and serve hot.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:leftover cranberry sauce (1cup)、grated orange zest (1tablespoon)、grated lemon zest (1teaspoon)、maple syrup (2tablespoons)、fine sea salt
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 425°F (225°C).
1: In a small saucepan set over medium-low heat, add leftover cranberry sauce.
2: Stir in the orange zest, lemon zest, and maple syrup.
3: Season with a pinch of salt.
4: Stir together and heat until warmed through.
5: Remove the pan from the heat and set aside.
6: In a blender, combine the eggs, milk, flour, salt, and vanilla bean seeds. Blend until frothy, about 1 minute.
7: Add the butter to a 10-inch (25 cm) cast iron skillet and place in the oven to melt. Once the butter is melted and bubbling, carefully remove the pan from the oven, tilting to coat the pan evenly.
8: Dollop the cranberry sauce into the pan and pour the Dutch baby batter overtop; immediately return the skillet to the oven.
9: Bake until puffed and golden around the edges, 18 to 22 minutes.
10: Remove the Dutch baby from the oven and dust with Confectioners’ sugar.
11: Serve immediately with maple syrup, if desired.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sourdough bread (1large loaf)、cheddar cheese (10slices)、large eggs、salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (2teaspoons)、bacon (½lb)、shredded cheese blend (1cup)、broccoli (1cup)、fresh scallion (1tablespoon)、heavy cream (2cups)、cherry tomatoes (1cup)、mixed greens salad
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Line baking sheet with aluminum foil and place a sheet of parchment paper over the foil.
1: With a serrated knife, cut off the top half-inch (1 cm) of the sourdough loaf. Cut around the edge of the bread, then use your fingers to remove the center and set aside for later.
2: Line the inside of the bread bowl with the sliced cheddar cheese.
3: Place the bread bowl on the baking sheet and wrap the outside with the parchment and foil.
4: Bake for 8 minutes, or until the cheese is melted.
5: In a large bowl, combine the eggs, salt, pepper, bacon, shredded cheese blend, broccoli, scallions, and heavy cream.  Whisk until smooth, then add the cherry tomatoes.
6: Pour the egg mixture into the bread bowl, leaving a half-inch (1 cm) of space at the top. Cover the bread bowl with foil.
7: Bake for 1 hour and 40 minutes, or until the center of the quiche has set
8: Let cool for at least 30 minutes before slicing. Serve with a mixed green salad.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:banana、old fashion oat (½cup)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、chocolate chips (¼cup)、milk (½cup)、honey (1tablespoon)、vanilla (½teaspoon)、peanut butter (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400° F and line a miniature iron skillet, pie dish or cake pan with parchment paper or non-stick cooking spray
1: Cut up a few slices of a banana for later and mash the rest in a medium sized bowl with a fork
2: Add the oats, baking powder, and chocolate chips to the mashed banana and stir. Then, combine the milk, honey, vanilla, and peanut butter and fold mixture into an oat bowl.
3: Transfer mixture to your prepared dish and bake for 20 minutes.
4: Top with banana slices and peanut butter and serve.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:frozen blueberry (1cup)、frozen strawberry (½cup)、blackberry (½cup)、milk (½cup)
instructions:
0: Blend together ingredients listed above until smooth and thick.
1: Top with desired toppings and serve.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cream cheese (4oz)、sugar (¼cup)、cinnamon (1teaspoon)、eggs、heavy cream (½cup)、french bread (14oz)、blueberry (1cup)、maple syrup
instructions:
0: In a bowl, combine softened cream cheese, sugar, and cinnamon.
1: Add eggs and heavy cream and whisk until well combined. Set aside.
2: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
3: Cut a rectangle along the top of the loaf of french bread and pull out the part you cut along with the soft inside of the loaf. Set the “bread boat” aside.
4: Tear apart the rectangle and soft inside of the bread that you removed into little bite-size pieces.
5: Gently, fold the bread pieces and blueberries into the egg mixture until all of the liquid is absorbed.
6: Place the “bread boat” on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and pour in the bread and egg mixture.
7: Bake for 30-40 minutes or until the top is golden brown. If the top is browning too quickly, cover the top of the boat in foil for the remaining time.
8: Let cool before cutting into slices and serve with maple syrup.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ripe avocado、oil、salt、egg、bacon (1strip)、sriracha sauce
instructions:
0: Preheat gas grill on high heat.
1: Using a sharp knife, slice the avocados in half by cutting in a straight line around the pit.
2: Place the avocado half containing the pit in your hand and face it away from you. Gently stick the tip of the knife into the side of the pit and carefully pry it out of the avocado.  For a ripe avocado, the pit will pop out with little effort. You can hold a kitchen towel in your hand and place the avocado in the towel for added protection from the edge of your knife.
3: Place the avocado halves on a tray. Using a pastry brush, brush oil on each of the avocado halves.
4: Season avocados with salt.
5: Place the avocados on the grill, flesh side down, and grill for 3-4 minutes, until grill marks appear.
6: Remove the avocados and stuff with scrambled eggs, bacon crumbles, and Sriracha sauce.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:potato (3cups)、breakfast sausage (2cups)、green bell pepper、white onion、spinach (2cups)、eggs、garlic powder (2teaspoons)、salt、pepper、milk (1cup)、shredded cheddar cheese (1cup)、salsa
instructions:
0: Layer the potatoes on the bottom of a greased slow cooker.
1: Add the sausage, green bell peppers, onion, and spinach.
2: In a large bowl or measuring cup whisk together the eggs, garlic powder, salt, pepper, and milk.
3: Pour egg mixture over the potatoes, sausage, and vegetables. Top with cheddar cheese.
4: Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours
5: Carefully remove lid and serve filling on a tortilla and add salsa.
