instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:heavy cream (1cup)、powdered sugar (2tablespoons)、McCormick® vanilla extract (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Make the vanilla whipped cream: In a medium bowl, combine the heavy cream, powdered sugar, and McCormick® Vanilla Extract. Using an electric hand mixer, whip on medium-high speed until thickened and medium peaks form, 3–4 minutes. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.
1: Make the salted caramel: Combine the granulated sugar and butter in a small pot. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly with a rubber spatula or wooden spoon, until the butter melts, 2–3 minutes. Once the butter has melted, continue to cook until golden, stirring occasionally. Slowly pour in the heavy cream and whisk until smooth.
2: Remove the pot from the heat and stir in the salt and McCormick® Vanilla Extract. Set aside until ready to serve (the caramel will thicken as it cools).
3: Make the French toast: In a large bowl, whisk together the milk, granulated sugar, egg, salt, and McCormick® Vanilla Extract until smooth. Whisk in the flour and baking powder until incorporated.
4: Heat a large, nonstick skillet over medium-high heat and grease with nonstick spray. Working in batches, dip the croissant halves in batter, allowing any excess to drip off, then arrange in a single layer in the skillet. Cook until golden brown, 3–5 minutes per side.
5: Top the bottom croissant halves with a scoop of whipped cream. Cover with the top croissant halves. Drizzle with salted caramel and garnish with the pecans and powdered sugar.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:white bread (8pieces)、large eggs、eggnog (½cup)、light brown sugar (1teaspoon)、ground cinnamon (½teaspoon)、ground nutmeg (½teaspoon)、all purpose flour (½teaspoon)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Using a rolling pin, roll out each piece of white bread to about ⅛ inch (3 mm) thick. Slice off the crusts so each slice of bread is a perfect square.
1: In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, eggnog, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, and flour until well combined.
2: In a small bowl, mix together the cream cheese, maple syrup, and sage until smooth.
3: Make the maple sage sausage roll-ups: Spread 2 heaping teaspoons of the cream cheese mixture in a strip on the bottom half of a bread square. Place a breakfast sausage on top of the strip of cream cheese, then carefully roll into a tight log. Repeat to make 3 more sausage roll-ups.
4: Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in a medium nonstick pan over medium heat.
5: Gently dip each sausage roll in the eggnog mixture, being careful to keep the seam sealed.
6: Place the sausage rolls, seam-side down, in the pan and cook until browned all over, 3–4 minutes total.
7: Drizzle with maple syrup, then serve.
8: Make the pomegranate raspberry roll-ups: Spread 1 teaspoon of butter in a strip on one side of a bread square, then top with 1 teaspoon of raspberry jam. Place 2 raspberries on their sides on top of the jam, one at the top and one at the bottom of the strip. Sprinkle 1 teaspoon of pomegranate seeds between the raspberries Using your fingers to keep the pomegranate seeds tucked in, carefully roll into a tight log. Repeat to make 3 more pomegranate raspberry roll-ups.
9: Melt the remaining tablespoon of butter in the same pan over medium heat.
10: Gently dip each pomegranate raspberry roll in the eggnog mixture, being careful to keep the seams sealed .
11: Place the pomegranate raspberry roll-ups, seam-side down, in the pan and cook until browned all over, 3–4 minutes total.
12: Serve with a dollop of whipped cream and a few pomegranate seeds.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (2tablespoons)、leek、red pepper、ackee (1cup)、garlic puree (1tablespoon)、red chilli、salt (½teaspoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、fresh parsley、spring onion、hot pepper sauce
instructions:
0: Saute leek in butter for 8-10 mins until caramelised
1: Add pepper and cook for 4 mins until soft and Add chilli & garlic, season with salt & pepper
2: Add the ackee and cook for a couple of minutes until warmed through, being careful not to break it up too much
3: Pop a lid on to keep warm whilst you make the fried bread
4: Butter bread on both sides and pop into a pan over a medium-low heat with a splash of olive oil.
5: Cook on medium-low until golden brown, flip and cook the other side.
6: Top bread with the scramble, garnish with parsley and spring onion, and a splash of hot sauce, if desired.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsalted butter (4tablespoons)、granulated sugar (3tablespoons)、large eggs、whole milk (3cups)、all-purpose flour (2cups)、salt (1pinch)、natural peanut butter (1cup)、raspberry jam (½cup)、fresh raspberries
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, add the melted butter, sugar, and eggs. Whisk to combine, then add the milk and whisk to incorporate. Sift in the flour and salt and whisk until smooth.
1: Heat a small nonstick skillet over medium heat. Scoop ¼ cup (60 g) of the batter into the pan. Swirl the pan around until the batter evenly coats the bottom. Cook until the surface begins to bubble slightly and the edges brown, about 3 minutes.
2: Flip the crepe and cook on the other side for another 1-2 minutes. Remove from the skillet and set aside to cool. Repeat with the remaining batter.
3: Place a crepe on a plate and spread some peanut butter in the center. Fold in the edges to make a small square pouch.
4: Top with another crepe, fill with raspberry jam, and fold to make a pouch. Top with one more crepe, fill with peanut butter, and fold.
5: Cut another crepe into thin strips, separate the strips, then place a dollop of jam onto the center of each strip and fold each end of the strip to meet the jam in the center. Place the folded strips on top of each other to create a bow.
6: Top with a raspberry and place on top of the peanut butter and jam pouches. Repeat with the rest of the crepes.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:potato (2cups)、mashed potato (1 ⅕cups)、flour (2cups)、butter (2tablespoons)、salt、pepper、grated cheddar cheese、bacon、sour cream、scallion、butter
instructions:
0: Peel and grate the raw potato, then wrap in a clean towel and squeeze out as much of the liquid as you can.
1: Put the grated potato into a large bowl and stir in the cooked mashed potato and the flour.
2: Stir in the melted butter and season if necessary.
3: Add a bit of milk and stir, then add a bit more milk - keeping doing this until all of the milk is combined into the mixture and you have a somewhat sticky dough, if it’s too wet add a bit more flour.
4: Dust your hands and work surface in flour and grab a palm sized amount of the mixture, flattening it out to about 1-cm (¼ in) thick.
5: Spoon some grated cheese and some bacon bits into the center and drop another flattened out dough mixture piece on top.
6: Cut into a nice round shape using a cookie cutter making sure it’s fully sealed. NOTE: Try not to make these too thick or they might not cook all the way through, if they are thick, lower the temperature to a low-medium heat instead.
7: Fry in butter over a medium heat for about 4-6 minutes on each side until golden brown.
8: Serve topped with a tablespoon of soured cream and a few bits of scallions.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:mixed berries (4cups)、lemon juice (1 ½tablespoons)、Ball® RealFruit™ Low or No-Sugar Needed Pectin (3tablespoons)、agave syrup (¾cup)
instructions:
0: Prepare boiling water canner. Heat jars in simmering water until ready to use. Do not boil. Wash lids in warm soapy water and set aside with bands.
1: Place crushed berries and lemon juice in a saucepan. Sprinkle pectin evenly over berries, and bring mixture to a full rolling boil that cannot be stirred down, over high heat, stirring constantly.
2: Whisk in agave syrup. Return mixture to a full rolling boil. Boil hard for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Skim foam if necessary.
3: Ladle hot jam into a hot jar, leaving a ¼-inch headspace. Remove air bubbles. Wipe jar rim. Center lid on jar and apply band, adjust to fingertip tight. Place jar in boiling water canner. Repeat until all jars are filled.
4: Process jars 10 minutes, adjusting for altitude. Turn off heat, remove lid, let jars stand 5 minutes. Remove jars and cool 12–24 hours. Check lids for seal. They should not flex when center is pressed.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sweet potato、ricotta cheese、pear (2slices)、honey
instructions:
0: Cut sweet potato into thin slices, about ¼ inch (6 mm) thick.
1: Place in toaster and set it to the maximum cook time. When it pops, flip the sweet potato slices over and toast 1 more time. Depending on the strength of your toaster and your preferences, you may need to toast it 1 more time after that.
2: Remove from toaster and let cool enough to handle.
3: Spread ricotta evenly across sweet potato toast.
4: Slice pear thinly and place on top of ricotta. Drizzle with honey.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:medium onion、garlic (4cloves)、ground beef (1lb)、cream of celery (1can)、peas (1can)、milk (¼cup)、sour cream (½cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、onion powder (½teaspoon)、shredded sharp cheddar cheese (2cups)、frozen tater tot (1bag)
instructions:
0: Sauté your garlic and onion in a splash of olive oil until soft. Add beef and brown thoroughly.
1: Place mixture in a casserole dish. To this, add all other ingredients except cheese and tater tots. Stir to combine.
2: Top with cheese, then top with tots. Spray with cooking spray.
3: Bake at 375°F for 25 minutes. Then, broil for 3-5 minutes or until brown.
4: Serve warm.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ice (⅓cup)、sweet potato (¾cup)、medjool dates、frozen riced cauliflower (½cup)、maca powder (1teaspoon)、ground tumeric (¼teaspoon)、ground cinnamon (¼teaspoon)、nondairy milk (1cup)
instructions:
0: Combine the ice, sweet potato, dates, riced cauliflower, maca powder, turmeric, cinnamon, and nondairy milk in a high-powered blender. Blend on high speed for 1–2 minutes, until completely smooth.
1: Pour the smoothie into a glass and top with a sprinkle of cinnamon and chopped dates.
2: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:

instructions:
0: Top toast with cantaloupe, prosciutto, and a sprinkle of feta.
1: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:fresh berries (2cups)、water (1teaspoon)、granulated sugar (2tablespoons)、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Make the berry compote: Add the berries and water to a small saucepan over medium heat. Once bubbling, reduce the heat to medium-low and use a wooden spoon to muddle and mash the fruit. Continue cooking for 10–12 minutes, occasionally stirring and mashing the berries, until most of the liquid has evaporated. Remove the pot from the heat and stir in the sugar and vanilla. Transfer the compote to a heat-proof container and let cool completely, then refrigerate for at least 1 hour.
1: Make the almond paste: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2: Spread the sliced almonds in an even layer on a rimmed baking sheet. Toast for about 5 minutes, or until the almonds just begin to turn golden brown.
3: In a food processor, combine the toasted almonds, flour, brown sugar, and salt. Pulse until the almonds break down to medium crumbs. Add the butter and process until a smooth paste forms. Add the egg and vanilla and continue to process until the egg is fully incorporated. Transfer the almond paste to a small bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes, or up to 1 week.
4: Make the dough: Add the warm milk to the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment and sprinkle the yeast on top. Let sit for about 3 minutes, until the mixture is frothy.
5: Add the eggs, melted butter, salt, and brown sugar and mix on medium-low speed to combine. Add the flour and mix on low speed until combined. Turn off the mixer and let the dough rest for 5 minutes.
6: After resting, scrape the dough off the paddle attachment and attach the dough hook to the mixer. Mix on medium speed for 3 minutes, adding up to ½ cup more flour if needed to form a smooth and elastic dough. The dough should not be sticky, but may still stick to the sides of the bowl slightly.
7: Grease a large bowl with nonstick spray. Transfer the dough to the bowl and cover with a clean kitchen towel. Let rise at room temperature for about 1 hour, or until doubled in size.
8: Turn out the dough onto a generously floured surface and flour a rolling pin. Roll the dough out to a roughly 18 × 14-inch rectangle. Spread the almond paste over the dough, all the way to the edges. Top with the berry compote, spreading evenly. Starting from a long end, roll the dough up tightly. Transfer the roll to the refrigerator for 30 minutes (this will make cutting easier).
9: Use a serrated knife to cut the dough roll into even 9 pieces, then transfer to an 8-inch square baking dish. Cover the pan with a kitchen towel and let the rolls rise for about 30 minutes, or until expanded slightly.
10: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
11: Add the heavy cream to a microwave-safe bowl and microwave for about 30 seconds, until warm, but not scalding.
12: Once the rolls have risen, pour the heavy cream over the top of the rolls, allowing it to soak into and around the rolls.
13: Bake the rolls for 20–22 minutes, until light golden brown and the center rolls are cooked through. Remove from the oven and let cool slightly.
14: While the rolls are baking, make the frosting: Add the butter and cream cheese to a medium bowl. Cream with an electric hand mixer on medium speed until light and airy. Add the powdered sugar and mix on low speed to combine. Add the vanilla and mix on medium-high speed for 1–2 minutes, until the frosting is fluffy.
15: Spread the frosting over the rolls, then top with sliced almonds and more berries.
16: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all purpose flour (4cups)、baking powder (4teaspoons)、baking soda (½teaspoon)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、unsalted butter (16tablespoons)、buttermilk (1 ¼cups)、Great Value® Finely Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese (½cup)、TBJ® Classic Uncured Bacon Jam (9oz)、large eggs
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
2: Using your hands or a pastry cutter, work the butter into the dry ingredients, leaving large chunks.
3: Add the buttermilk and fold with a rubber spatula until fully incorporated and the dough comes together in a ball.
4: Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and roll out to about 2 inches (5 cm) thick.
5: Using a round pastry cutter, divide the dough into 12 pieces and place on the prepared baking sheet. Top each biscuit with cheddar cheese.
6: Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until the tops are golden brown.
7: Serve the biscuits with bacon jam and soft-boiled eggs.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Grease an 8 x 13-inch baking dish with nonstick spray.
1: Make the streusel topping: In a medium bowl, combine the butter, brown sugar, flour, oats, cinnamon, nutmeg, and baking powder. Mix with your fingers, massaging the butter into the dry ingredients, until well combined and loosely clumpy.
2: Make the cake: In a large bowl, cream the butter and brown sugar with an electric hand mixer on medium speed until light and fluffy, 2 minutes. Add the apple butter, sour cream, eggs, and vanilla and mix until fully combined, about 3 minutes.
3: Add the flour, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, baking soda and salt to the wet ingredients. Mix until completely combined, about 4 minutes total.
4: Fold in the apples with a rubber spatula until just incorporated.
5: Make the cream cheese filling: In a medium bowl, beat together the cream cheese, heavy cream, sugar, and vanilla with an electric hand mixer on medium-low speed until smooth, 2 minutes.
6: Pour half of the batter into the prepared baking dish, spreading evenly. Sprinkle half of the streusel on top. Add the remaining batter, spreading to cover the streusel. Spread the cream cheese filling over the batter and top with the remaining streusel.
7: Bake the cake for 45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. Let cool for 10 minutes before serving.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:Planet Oat Unsweetened Oat Milk (2cups)、medjool date (1cup)、quick oat (1 ½cups)、chia seeds (2teaspoons)
instructions:
0: Heat the Planet Oat Unsweetened Oat Milk in a medium saucepan over medium high heat until nearly boiling. Add the dates and turn off the heat. Cover the pan and let the dates soak for 15 minutes.
1: Pour the dates and oat milk into a blender and blend on high speed until smooth, then strain through a fine-mesh sieve into a large bowl or large container with a lid.
2: Stir in the oats and chia seeds, then cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours, or overnight, until the oats are soft and creamy and the liquid is absorbed.
3: Use the overnight oats.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray、large eggs、heavy cream (¼cup)、whole milk (¼cup)、Private Selection™ Himalayan Pink Salt (½teaspoon)、Private Selection™ Black Pepper (¼teaspoon)、pre-made pie crust、Private Selection™ Handpicked Broccoli Florets (½cup)、Private Selection™ Center Cut Bacon (4strips)、red onion (3tablespoons)、Private Selection™ Vermont Extra Sharp White Cheddar Cheese Bar (½cup)、fresh chives (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Grease a silicone 24-cup mini muffin tin with nonstick spray.
1: In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, heavy cream, milk, Himalayan Pink Salt, and Black Pepper until smooth. Pour into a spouted liquid measuring cup.
2: Unroll the pie crust and punch out circles the same size as the bottom of the muffin cups. Place the circles in the muffin tin and press down slightly.
3: Chop the Handpicked Broccoli Florets and divide evenly between the muffin cups.
4: Chop the Center Cut Bacon and divide evenly between 8 of the muffin cups. Add the diced red onion to another 8 muffin cups, leaving the remaining 8 cups with just broccoli.
5: Pour the egg mixture into each of the muffin cups until just filled.
6: Top each muffin cup with a sprinkle of Vermont Extra Sharp White Cheddar Cheese.
7: Bake the mini quiches for 40 minutes or until the edges just start to turn golden and the centers are set. Remove from the oven and let cool completely.
8: Pop the mini quiches out of the muffin tin. Garnish with the chives and season with Himalayan Pink Salt and Black Pepper before serving.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:raw hazelnuts (1cup)、vanilla extract (1tablespoon)、honey (2tablespoons)、unsweetened cocoa powder (2tablespoons)、salt (1pinch)、water (6cups)
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, soak raw hazelnuts in 2 cups (475 ml) of water overnight.
1: Drain the bowl of water and place the hazelnuts in a blender.
2: Add 1 tablespoon vanilla, 2 tablespoons honey, 2 tablespoons unsweetened cacao powder, 1 pinch of salt, and 4 cups (945 ml) of water to the blender.
3: Blend the mixture on high for 90 seconds.
4: Use a cheesecloth to strain the liquid into a pouring container.
5: (Optional) refrigerate 1-2 hours or serve immediately.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:steak (1lb)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、chili powder (½teaspoon)、dried oregano (½teaspoon)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、cumin (½teaspoon)、eggs、salt、pepper、butter (1tablespoon)、small flour tortillas、hard taco shells、grated cheddar cheese (1cup)
instructions:
0: Combine the cumin, chili powder, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper in a small bowl.
1: Rub all over the steak.
2: Heat a large sauté pan over high heat until very hot. Add a splash of vegetable oil.
3: Add the steak to the pan and cook 3-4 minutes per side for medium, or cook to desired doneness.
4: Remove from pan and let rest at least 10 minutes.
5: Thinly slice against the grain.
6: Preheat an oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
7: Place the flour tortillas on baking sheets. Sprinkle each with a small amount of shredded cheese, then place one hard taco shell inside.
8: Heat just until cheese melts, about 3-5 minutes.
9: Heat a nonstick pan over medium heat and add butter. Scramble the eggs and season with salt and pepper.
10: To assemble, fill each double-decker shell with a few spoonfuls of scrambled eggs and a few slices of steak. Top with salsa, avocado, queso fresco, cilantro, and scallions.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cold water (1cup)、large egg、bread flour (3 ¾cups)、kosher salt (1 ½teaspoons)、light brown sugar (¼cup)、instant yeast (1tablespoon)、unsalted butter (8tablespoons)、nonstick cooking spray
instructions:
0: Make the dough: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the dough hook attachment, combine the cold water, egg, bread flour, salt, brown sugar, yeast, and butter. Mix on medium speed until the dough comes together in a ball and begins to pull away from the sides of the bowl, about 5 minutes.
1: Use wet hands to wipe the dough from the hook and cover the bowl with a kitchen towel. Place the dough in a warm place and let rise until doubled in size, about 2 hours.
2: Line a 9 x 13-inch baking sheet with parchment paper and lightly grease with nonstick spray.
3: Uncover the bowl and transfer the dough to the prepared baking sheet. Use your hands to gently press the dough to the edges of the pan. Refrigerate until the dough is completely chilled all the way through, at least 1 hour, or up to 8 hours. If refrigerating for more than 1 hour, cover with plastic wrap to prevent the dough from drying out.
4: Make the butter block: Cut a sheet of parchment paper to measure 12 x 16 inches. Fold the edges inward to create a 7-inch square, then unfold the parchment.
5: Slice the butter lengthwise into ¼-inch-thick pieces and arrange the butter tiles in a single layer to fill the center 7-inch square of the parchment. Fold the parchment over to fully enclose the butter and let the packet sit at room temperature until slightly softened, about 30 minutes. When the butter is malleable, use a rolling pin to distribute the butter in an even layer to the edges and corners of the packet. If the butter is too soft, refrigerate the packet until it firms up, about 20 minutes.  You want the butter and the dough to have the same texture.
6: Laminate the dough: Remove the dough from the refrigerator and place on a very lightly floured work surface (too much flour will break the lamination, so use just enough to keep the dough from sticking to the work surface). Use a rolling pin to roll the dough into a rectangle that is a little more than twice as long as the butter block, about 8 x 15 inches.  Place the butter block in the center of the dough and fold the sides of the dough over the butter to completely encase the block, gently pressing the dough together to seal.
7: Very lightly dust the rolling pin with flour and roll the dough into a square, about ¼ inch thick.  Use a pastry wheel or long, sharp knife to trim the edges so the butter is just barely exposed on all sides (trimming the edges will help make clean and even layers when folding the dough). Fold the dough in half horizontally, then fold in half vertically, making sure to line up the edges. Place the dough square back on the baking sheet and let the dough rest in the refrigerator for 20 minutes.
8: Remove the dough from the refrigerator and repeat rolling out to ¼-inch-thick square, trimming the edges, and folding one more time. Return the dough to the baking sheet and wrap tightly with plastic wrap. Place the dough in the refrigerator and let rest overnight.
9: Shape the donuts: Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper.
10: Remove the dough from the refrigerator and let sit at room temperature until it is soft enough to roll without applying too much pressure, about 10 minutes. Transfer the dough to a very lightly floured surface and roll into a 14-inch square. Let the dough rest for about 5 minutes to let the gluten relax.
11: Using a 3½-inch round cutter, cut out 12 rounds from the dough. Use a 1-inch round cutter to cut out the center of each dough round. Place the donuts on the prepared baking sheet, spacing about 2 inches apart. Lightly grease a piece of plastic wrap with nonstick spray and gently cover the pan. Let the donuts proof at room temperature until doubled in size, about 2 hours.
12: Fry the donuts: Heat the vegetable oil in a large, heavy-bottomed pot fitted with a deep fry thermometer over medium-high heat until the temperature reaches 350°F (180°C). Set a wire rack over a baking sheet.
13: Working in batches of 3–4 at a time, fry the donuts in the hot oil, flipping once halfway through, until golden brown all over, about 3 minutes. Use a spider or slotted spoon to transfer the donuts to the wire rack to cool slightly, about 10 minutes.
14: Make the icing: In a medium bowl, whisk together the powdered sugar, vanilla bean seeds, and buttermilk until smooth. Transfer the icing to a small piping bag and cut a hole in the tip.
15: Pipe the icing on the top of the donuts.
16: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsalted butter (½stick)、rolled oats (1cup)、roasted pistachios (¼cup)、walnuts (¼cup)、kosher salt (½teaspoon)、ground cinnamon (½teaspoon)、large eggs、Planet Oat® Original Oatmilk (1cup)、honey (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Make the baked oatmeal: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Grease the insides of 4 8-ounce ramekins with cooking spray.
1: In a large bowl, mix together the oats, pistachios, walnuts, salt, and cinnamon.
2: In a medium bowl, whisk together the remaining melted butter, the eggs, Planet Oat® Oatmilk, and honey until well combined. Add the wet ingredients to the dry and mix together.
3: Divide mixture evenly among the prepared ramekins.
4: Set ramekins on a baking sheet and transfer to the oven. Bake for 25–30 minutes, or until the mixture is mostly cooked and the centers are firm and starting to rise.
5: While the oatmeal bakes, make the honey syrup: In a medium saucepan, combine the water, honey, orange zest, lemon juice, and cinnamon stick. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, stirring frequently until the honey is melted. Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 15 minutes, or until the mixture has thickened slightly and reduced to ½ cup total. Remove the pot from the heat and let the syrup cool while the oatmeal finishes baking.
6: Make the topping: In a small bowl, toss together the pistachios, walnuts, and oats.
7: Remove the oatmeal ramekins from the oven and use a chopstick or skewer to poke about 5 holes through the oatmeal all the way to the bottom of the ramekins. Top each with 3 tablespoons of the topping mixture and 2 tablespoons of the honey syrup, making sure to coat the nuts in the syrup.
8: Return the ramekins to the oven for another 8–10 minutes, or until bubbling and starting to brown. Remove from the oven and let cool for 5–10 minutes before serving.
9: Enjoy!

instructions:

2: Melt the olive oil and butter together in a 10-inch (25 cm) cast iron skillet over medium heat. Add the egg mixture and sprinkle the tortilla chips, more goat cheese, and the cilantro leaves on top. Season with black pepper. Cook for 4–5 minutes, until the eggs begin to set and start to pull away from the sides of the pan.

4: Let the frittata cool slightly, then top with more goat cheese, flaky salt, black pepper, olive oil, and cilantro. Slice and serve with salsa verde, pickled vegetables, avocado, and other toppings of choice.

ingredients:ready-made puff pastry (1lb)、vegan butter (1tablespoon)、leek (3cups)、garlic (3cloves)、fresh sage (1tablespoon)、dried cranberries (¼cup)、dairy-free cream cheese (½cup)、vegan chorizo (½lb)、oat milk (1tablespoon)、poppy seeds (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: To make the filling, melt the butter in a pan, when foaming add the leek and saute for 8-10 minutes until they’re creamy, soft and caramelised. Season with salt  & pepper.
1: Add garlic & fresh sage, dried cranberries, cream cheese and vegan chorizo. Cook for 2 minutes. Remove from the heat and leave to cool.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:Vegan Quiche Crust
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: Roll out the crust on a lightly floured surface to a 12-inch (25 cm) round about ⅛ inch (3 mm) thick. Gently transfer the crust to a 9-inch (22 cm) pie dish. Trim any excess dough around the edges. Fold the edges of dough back underneath itself, then crimp using an index finger knuckle on one hand and the thumb and index finger on the other hand.
2: Place a piece of parchment paper in the center of the crust. Add the dried beans to the center and spread toward the sides of the crust — this will add weight to keep the crust from puffing up and hold up the walls while baking.
3: Bake the crust for 15 minutes. Carefully remove the weights by lifting out the parchment paper, then bake for 5 minutes more, until the dough no longer looks raw. Remove from the oven and let cool.
4: While the crust bakes, make the filling: Set the tofu in a fine-mesh strainer set over a bowl. Let drain for 10 minutes.
5: In a large skillet, combine the water, broccolini, and ¼ teaspoon salt. Cover and steam over medium-high heat for 2–3 minutes, until the broccolini is bright green and tender. Remove the pan from the heat and set aside.
6: Heat 2 teaspoons of olive oil in a medium pan over medium heat until just shimmering. Add the onion and ¼ teaspoon salt. Sauté for 3–4 minutes, until the onion is translucent. Remove the pan from the heat and set aside.
7: Crumble the tofu into a blender. Add the chickpea flour, oat milk, coconut oil, turmeric, garlic powder, kala namak, remaining teaspoon of salt, the cornstarch, miso, and nutritional yeast. Blend on high speed for 60–90 seconds, until completely smooth, scraping down the sides as needed. Transfer the mixture to a medium bowl.
8: Season the filling with the pepper. Set aside a few larger pieces of broccolini for topping, then fold the rest of the steamed broccolini and sautéed onions into the “egg” mixture.
9: Pour the mixture into the prepared crust. Arrange the reserved broccolini on top.
10: Cover the quiche with aluminum foil and bake for 35 minutes. Remove the foil and bake for another 10–15 minutes, until the quiche is set and no longer jiggling in the center and the crust is beginning to brown. Let cool for 30 minutes before slicing.
11: Garnish the quiche with the chives, then slice and serve.
12: Enjoy!

instructions:
0: Add your oats, apple sauce, egg, baking powder, cinnamon, vanilla extract, 3 tbsp of cinnamon toast crunch and your almond milk to a blender and blend until smooth. Set aside leftover cinnamon toast crunch for garnish.

ingredients:canola oil、frozen hash brown (2lb)、large eggs、kosher salt (1tablespoon)、freshly ground black pepper (1tablespoon)、paprika (2teaspoons)、all purpose flour (3tablespoons)、cheddar cheese (24slices)、ketchup
instructions:
0: Fill a large, deep pan halfway with canola oil and heat over medium heat until the temperature reaches  350°F (180°C).
1: In a large bowl, combine the hash browns, eggs, salt, pepper, paprika, and flour. Mix well.
2: Scoop a heaping tablespoon of the hash brown mixture onto a clean surface and shape into a rectangle.
3: Place two slices of cheddar cheese in the center, then top with another tablespoon of the hash brown mixture and shape into a rectangle, sealing the cheese inside. Repeat with the remaining potato mixture and cheese.
4: Use a large spatula to transfer 2 hash browns at a time to the hot oil and fry for 2–3 minutes, or until golden brown. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain and season with more salt.
5: Serve immediately with ketchup for dipping, or let cool completely, wrap in foil, and freeze for up to 3 months. To reheat, unwrap and bake in a 400°F (200°C) oven for about 20 minutes, flipping once, until warmed through and golden brown.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large eggs、kosher salt (¼teaspoon)、sugar (1tablespoon)、vanilla extract (¼teaspoon)、all purpose flour (1cup)、Lala® Crema (½cup)、water (1cup)、unsalted butter
instructions:
0: Make the crepes: Add the eggs, salt, sugar, vanilla, flour, Lala® Crema, and water to a blender and blend on high speed for 1 minute, or until smooth. Let the batter rest for 10 minutes before using.
1: Heat a 10-inch nonstick skillet over medium-low heat. Grease the skillet with butter. Pour ⅓ cup of the batter into the skillet, tilting to coat the surface of the pan evenly. Cook for 1–2 minutes, until the batter looks dry on top and the bottom is golden brown. Flip and cook until golden brown on the other side, 1–2 minutes more. Transfer the crepe to a baking sheet or plate and cover with a kitchen towel to keep warm while you repeat with the remaining batter.
2: Dulce de Leche: Spread each crepe with 1 tablespoon of dulce de leche, then sprinkle with ¼ teaspoon flaky salt. Fold the crepes in half, then in half again to make triangular shapes.
3: Drizzle each crepe with the remaining dulce de leche and top each with 1 tablespoon chopped pecans and a sprinkle of the remaining flaky salt. Enjoy!
4: Spicy Cinnamon Chocolate: In a small bowl, stir the cayenne into the melted chocolate until combined.
5: Spread each crepe with 1 tablespoon of the chocolate, then sprinkle with ¼ teaspoon cinnamon. Fold the crepes in half, then in half again to make triangular shapes.
6: Swipe a small smear of the remaining chocolate on the top of each crepe and top each with a sprinkle of the remaining cinnamon. Enjoy!
7: Almond Butter & Apple: In a small bowl, mix together the almond butter and 3 tablespoons of maple syrup until smooth.
8: Spread each crepe with 1 tablespoon of the almond butter mixture, then spread with 1 tablespoon applesauce. Fold the crepes in half, then in half again to make triangular shapes.
9: Top each crepe with a few slices of apple, then drizzle with the remaining maple syrup. Enjoy!
10: Berries & Crema: In a small bowl, mix together the Lala® Crema, powdered sugar, ½ teaspoon lemon zest, and the lemon juice until smooth.
11: Spread each crepe with 1 tablespoon of crema mixture. Then, sprinkle with ¼ cup chopped berries. Fold the crepes in half, then in half again to make triangular shapes.
12: Drizzle the crepes with the remaining crema mixture and sprinkle with remaining ½ teaspoon lemon zest. Garnish with more berries. Enjoy!

ingredients:all purpose flour (1cup)、sugar (1tablespoon)、kosher salt (¼teaspoon)、whole milk (1 ½cups)、large eggs、Justin’s Maple Almond Butter Squeeze Packs、orange zest (1 ½teaspoons)、nonstick cooking spray、cocoa powder (½cup)、orange slice
instructions:

instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400ºF (375ºF for convection ovens). Coat a muffin tin with nonstick spray.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large croissants、milk (3cups)、heavy cream (¾cup)、sugar (½cup)、vanilla (1teaspoon)、hazelnuts (¼cup)、shredded coconut (¼cup)、dollop cream (2tablespoons)、sugar (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 180°C (356 f)
1: Toast croissant cubes in the oven for 10 minutes until crispy. Remove from the oven.
2: Increase oven temperature to 200°C. (390 f)
3: Combine milk, cream, sugar and vanilla in a pot over medium heat. Stir to combine. Heat until the sugar is dissolved and the mixture is simmering. Set aside.
4: In a large bowl, toss croissant croutons with chopped hazelnuts and coconut. Place in a deep, oven-proof dish (i.e. casserole dish) and cover with milk mixture.
5: Spread dollop cream over the top, before sprinkling with the sugar. Then, bake for ~15 minutes, or until the top is browned and the milk is bubbling beneath. Leave to cool for about 5 minutes, or until the milk has settled.
6: Serve.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:egg、milk (3tablespoons)、fresh basil (1tablespoon)、grated cheese (1tablespoon)、paprika、bagels、butter (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Whisk egg and milk together. Mix in basil, cheese and paprika.
1: Dip each slice of bagel in the mixture and cook on a hot pan with butter.
2: Serve warm.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (1stick)、flour (4.5oz)、salt (½teaspoon)、ice water (5tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Filling: Add all your ingredients, except the butter, into a heavy-bottomed saucepan and stir until boiling, Boil for about 5 minutes, or until your mixture thickens. Chill your filling in the fridge until it is completely cool.
1: Preheat the oven to 350°F.
2: Crust: Mix together your salt and flour in a bowl. Cut in your butter and mix together by hand or with a pastry cutter, or in the bowl of your electric mixer. Mix until you have a crumbly mixture with pea-sized chunks. Do not overmix. Add in your water, 2 tablespoons at a time, until you have a soft dough.
3: Flour your work surface and roll the dough out thinly. Cut the dough into rectangles, about 2 by 4 inches each. Place 4 of your rectangles on a baking sheet. Leaving the others set aside.
4: Spread about 1 tbsp filling on each rectangle. Place ½ tsp  of butter over your filling and place a rectangle you have set aside directly over it and flatten the edges together with a fork. Do this with remaining rectangles.
5: Brush a thin layer of milk over each pop tart. Bake for about 15 minutes, or until the crust is flaky and lightly browned.
6: Let cool on cooling racks. After they have cooled, brush icing over top and decorate as desired. Serve.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:prepared stuffing (6cups)、large eggs、shredded white cheddar cheese (1 ½cups)、kosher salt (1 ½teaspoons)、nonstick cooking spray、McCormick® brown gravy mix (1packet)、cold water (1cup)、egg
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, mix together the stuffing, eggs, white cheddar cheese, and salt until combined.
1: Preheat the waffle iron and grease with nonstick spray.
2: Add the stuffing mixture to the hot waffle iron and cook until golden brown and crisp, 7–9 minutes.
3: While waffles cook, make the gravy: In a small pot, combine the McCormick® Brown Gravy mix and cold water. Cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, until boiling. Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 1 minute.
4: Transfer the stuffing waffles to a platter, top with the fried eggs, and drizzle with the gravy.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray、all purpose flour、premade pizza dough (16oz)、whole grain dijon mustard (2tablespoons)、everything bagel seasoning (4teaspoons)、shredded cheddar cheese (1cup)、shredded swiss cheese (1cup)、leftover baked ham (¾cup)、unsalted butter (4tablespoons)、honey (1tablespoon)、thinly sliced chives (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Grease an 8-inch round baking dish with nonstick spray.
1: On a lightly floured surface, roll out the pizza dough to a rough 8 x 12-inch rectangle.
2: Spread the mustard over the dough in an even layer, then sprinkle with 1 tablespoon of everything bagel seasoning. Top with the cheddar and Swiss cheeses and ham.
3: Starting from a long edge, tightly roll the dough into a log. Cut the log crosswise into 8 even pieces. Transfer the rolls to the prepared baking dish.
4: Bake for 25 to 30 minutes, until golden brown.
5: In a small bowl, whisk together the melted butter, honey, and remaining 1 teaspoon everything but the bagel seasoning.
6: Remove the rolls from the oven and brush the butter mixture over the tops. Garnish with the chives, if using. Let cool for 5–10 minutes before serving.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:blanched almond flour (2 ½cups)、salt (½teaspoon)、cinnamon (1tablespoon)、baking powder (2teaspoons)、honey (½cup)、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、almond extract (¼teaspoon)、melted butter (5tablespoons)、large eggs
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C), and put paper liners in 9 standard-sized muffin cups (you may end up with a bit more).
1: Combine the almond flour, salt, cinnamon, and baking powder.
2: In a larger bowl, whisk together the honey, vanilla and almond extracts, melted butter, and eggs.
3: Blend the wet and dry ingredients well, then divide among muffin cups.
4: Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until browning and just done (moist crumbs on a toothpick are okay).

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large banana、eggs、maple extract (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Mash banana(s), eggs, and maple extract with a fork until incorporated.
1: Heat up a greased fry pan to medium heat, and pour in about ¼ cup (60 g) of batter.
2: When the pancake is cooked on one side, flip, and cook for about a minute.
3: Serve, topped as desired.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all purpose flour (1 ½cups)、cornstarch (2tablespoons)、brown sugar (½cup)、baking powder (2teaspoons)、ground cinnamon (2teaspoons)、kosher salt (½teaspoon)、whole milk (½cup)、large eggs、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、honeycrisp apple (2cups)、powdered sugar (2cups)、apple cider (2tablespoons)、nonstick cooking spray
instructions:
0: Preheat the air fryer to 400°F (200°C).
1: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, cornstarch, brown sugar, baking powder, 1½ teaspoons cinnamon, and the salt.
2: In a separate large bowl, whisk together the milk, eggs, and vanilla.
3: Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and stir until smooth. Fold in the diced apples.
4: Place a parchment paper round (or square) in the bottom of the air fryer.
5: Dollop about ¼ cup of batter onto the lined air fryer basket. Add more batter to fill the basket, but do not overcrowd. Spray the tops of the fritters with nonstick spray. Fry for 6 minutes, then flip, spritz with nonstick spray again, and cook for 4 minutes more, until crispy. Remove from the air fryer and repeat with the remaining batter.
6: Make the glaze: Meanwhile, in a medium bowl, whisk together the powdered sugar, remaining ½ teaspoon cinnamon, and 2 tablespoons of apple cider. Stir until smooth, adding more apple cider to reach your desired consistency.
7: Drizzle the glaze over the hot fritters and serve immediately.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:organic readies-to-bake biscuits、Justin’s® Maple Almond Butter (¼cup)、banana、thick cut bacon (2slices)、maple syrup (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Break each biscuit in half horizontally.
1: Spread each bottom biscuit half with 2 tablespoons of Justin’s® Maple Almond Butter, then top with 4–6 slices of banana in a single layer and 2 pieces of bacon. Drizzle with 1 tablespoon of maple syrup. Top with biscuit half.
2: Repeat with the remaining ingredients to make a second sandwich.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:water (½cup)、granulated sugar (½cup)、instant espresso (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat an air fryer to 350°F (180°C).
1: Make the espresso simple syrup: In a small saucepan, combine the water, sugar, and espresso powder and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Let the mixture simmer for 5 minutes, then remove the pot from the heat and set aside until ready to use. The syrup will keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week.
2: Make the coffee-yogurt custard: In a small bowl, whisk together the yogurt, espresso powder, and egg.
3: Assemble the toast: Set the grapefruit on a cutting board and use a sharp knife to cut off the top and bottom so the flesh is exposed and the fruit can sit upright. Use the knife to remove the rind from around the fruit, following the contours of the fruit and cutting carefully to remove all of the pith, but leaving as much flesh intact as possible. Holding the fruit in your non-dominant hand, use the knife to cut between the membranes to release the segments.
4: Place the croissant halves, cut-side up, on a flat surface and use your fingertips to gently press down the centers to create wells. Brush each croissant half with the espresso syrup, then spoon a couple of tablespoons of custard into each well and lightly spread to fill evenly. Arrange the grapefruit segments on top of the custard and sprinkle with the sugar.
5: Carefully transfer the filled croissants to the air fryer and cook until the edges of the pastry are golden brown and the custard has set in the center, 5–7 minutes. Remove from the air fryer and transfer to a plate. If you want a little more color and crunch, use a kitchen torch to caramelize the sugar on the grapefruit.
6: Serve immediately.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsweetened plain almond milk (⅓cup)、nutritional yeast (2tablespoons)、garlic (1clove)、ground turmeric (¼teaspoon)、kosher salt (¾teaspoon)、extra firm tofu (16oz)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、scallions、freshly ground black pepper (¼teaspoon)、red bell pepper (½cup)、kale (½cup)、avocado、veggie breakfast sausage patties、La Brea Bakery® French Bread Loaf,
instructions:
0: In a small bowl, whisk together the almond milk, nutritional yeast, garlic, turmeric, and ½ teaspoon salt.
1: On a plate, use your hands or a potato masher to crumble the tofu into small, bite-size pieces resembling scrambled eggs.
2: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the scallions and cook for 1–2 minutes, until starting to soften. Add the tofu, remaining ¼ teaspoon salt, and the black pepper, and cook, stirring frequently, for about 5 minutes, until warmed through and some of the moisture has evaporated.
3: Reduce the heat to medium and stir in the almond milk mixture. Cook for 2 minutes, stirring frequently, until liquid starts to reduce. Add the red bell pepper and kale, and cook for 2–3 minutes, until the vegetables are tender.
4: Serve the scramble topped with avocado, with the veggie sausage patties and toasted slices of La Brea Bakery® French Bread Loaf alongside.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:paneer cheese (1block)、ghee (2tablespoons)、cumin seed (½teaspoon)、fresh ginger (½teaspoon)、serrano chile、medium tomato、kosher salt、fresh cilantro (1teaspoon)、nonstick cooking spray、large eggs、freshly ground black pepper、bread (4slices)、ripe avocados
instructions:
0: Remove the paneer from the refrigerator 1–2 hours before prepping. This will allow it to soften, making it easier to work with. Crumble or cut the paneer into smaller pieces, then add to a medium bowl and mash with a fork into small crumbles. Use your hands to massage the paneer until dough-like in texture. Cover the bowl with a damp paper towel, pressing directly against the surface of the cheese. Set aside.
1: Melt the ghee in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add the cumin seeds, ginger, serrano chiles, and tomato. Cook until the tomato has softened slightly, about 2 minutes.
2: Add the crumbled paneer and season with salt to taste. Stir to incorporate, then remove the pan from the heat and sprinkle in the cilantro. Stir to combine.
3: Wipe out the pan, then grease with nonstick spray. Crack the eggs in the pan and season with salt and pepper. Fry the eggs sunny-side up to your desired doneness.
4: Smear the smashed avocado over the toasted bread. Spoon ¼ of the paneer bhurji over each slice, then top each with a sunny-side up egg and serve. Any leftover paneer will keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:Planet Oat® Unsweetened Original Oatmilk (½cup)、frozen mixed berry (1cup)、frozen cooked beets (⅓cup)、frozen banana、date
instructions:
0: In a high-powered blender, combine the Planet Oat® Unsweetened Original Oatmilk, mixed berries, beets, frozen banana, and date. Blend on high speed until smooth, 2–3 minutes.
1: Pour the smoothie into a bowl and garnish with sliced banana, chia seeds, dragon fruit, blackberries, and a drizzle of honey.
2: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flour (1cup)、milk (1 ¼cups)、eggs、sugar (2tablespoons)、butter (2tablespoons)、lemon juice (2tablespoons)、salt (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: In a blender, add all the crepe ingredients. Blend till smooth. Cover and let rest for 20 minutes.
1: While the batter rests, start the compote. In a saucepan, add the blueberries on medium heat and cook for 2 minutes. Then, add the sugar, lemon juice and zest, and water. Stir and cook until hot and bubbly. Then, reduce heat to medium low, stirring occasionally until set.
2: To make the crepes, lightly brush a nonstick pan with butter and on medium heat, add ¼ of the batter. Quickly lift the pan and swirl to the edges, making a circle.
3: Cook for about 40 seconds, until the middle begins to bubble and edges begin to brown. Once set slightly, flip over and cook the other side for 40-45 seconds.
4: To fill, spread some cream on one end, top with a few spoons of the berry compote, and, if desired, top with additional whipped cream, fresh blueberries, and a sprinkle of lemon zest.
5: Serve.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all purpose flour (2cups)、baking soda (1teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、buttermilk (2 ¼cups)、eggs、unsalted butter (¼cup)、Blueberries, blackberries, or strawberry、heavy cream、maple syrup
instructions:
0: Sift and combine dry ingredients in a mixing bowl. In a separate mixing bowl, combine all of the wet ingredients, including the melted butter.
1: Pour the wet ingredients into the mixing bowl with the dry ingredients and whisk well until no lumps remain.  Wash and chop the berries, if using, and stir into the mixture.
2: Heat up a griddle on medium-high heat. Using a stick of butter, grease the griddle where you are going to pour the first pancake(s) and then pour or ladle some batter onto the griddle. Cook on medium-high. When bubbles start to form in the middle of the pancake, it’s ready to flip. Repeat with the rest of the batter.
3: While the pancakes are cooking, pour some heavy cream into an electric stand mixer and mix on medium, increasing the speed to high to make whipped cream.
4: Serve the pancakes warm, topping with whipped cream and syrup, if desired.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all purpose flour (3 ½cups)、granulated sugar (½cup)、instant yeast (2teaspoons)、kosher salt (1 ¾teaspoons)、baking soda (¼teaspoon)、unsalted butter (1stick)、plain greek yogurt (1cup)、apple cider (½cup)
instructions:
0: Make the dough: In the bowl of a stand mixer, whisk together the flour, sugar, yeast, salt and baking soda.
1: In a small saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the Greek yogurt and apple cider and whisk to combine. Continue cooking until the mixture is just warmed through, about 1 minute. 
2: Pour the butter mixture into the flour mixture and stir with a wooden spoon until a shaggy dough forms.
3: Attach the bowl to the stand mixer fitted with the hook attachment and mix on low speed until the dough comes together in a tight ball, about 20 minutes. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and let rise in a warm place until doubled in size, about 2 hours. 
4: Punch the dough down, cover with plastic wrap, then transfer to the refrigerator to rest for at least 4 hours, up to overnight. 
5: Make the filling: In a small bowl, whisk together the brown sugar, butter, and miso until smooth.
6: Make the buns: Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and roll out to ¼-inch-thick rectangle. Spread the filling across the dough, all the way to the edges, then sprinkle the diced apple and dates on top. Starting from a long end, roll the dough into a log, then slice into 12 pieces. 
7: Place the buns in a 9 x 13 x 2-inch baking dish and cover with foil. Let the buns proof in a warm place until doubled in size, about 90 minutes.
8: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
9: Bake the buns until beginning to turn golden brown, about 30 minutes. Remove the foil and continue baking until completely golden brown and cooked through, about 15 minutes more. 
10: Meanwhile, make the glaze: In a small saucepan, bring the apple cider to a boil over medium-high heat. Cook until reduced by half, about 5 minutes. Add the maple syrup and continue cooking until the temperature reaches 225°F (105°C). Remove the syrup from the heat and add the buttermilk, butter, and salt. Swirl the pan until the butter is completely melted. 
11: Pour the glaze over the buns while they are hot. Let sit for 5 minutes before serving.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:water (½cup)、almond milk (½cup)、rolled oats (½cup)、vanilla (1teaspoon)、fresh fruit、maple syrup、brown sugar
instructions:
0: Mix milk together with water and bring to a steady boil in a small saucepan.
1: Add rolled oats and simmer on low. Stir mixture constantly until it has thickened, about 5 minutes.
2: Serve with toppings of your choice.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:smoked salmon (¼cup)、medium eggs、cream cheese (½cup)、fresh chives (1handful)、whole milk (1splash)、butter、salt and pepper
instructions:
0: Crack the eggs in a bowl and whisk them together with a splash of milk. In a separate bowl, mix chives with cream cheese, add ground pepper to taste, and combine. Set aside remaining leftover chives for garnish.
1: Heat up your frying pan with a knob of butter over medium heat. Once the butter has fully melted, pour half of the egg mixture into the pan. Slightly whisk the egg in the pan until it starts to set so that it cooks more evenly.
2: Once the egg mixture has set, flip the omelet and cook the other side until it is slightly golden brown.
3: Once the omelet is cooked, fold it in the pan, then transfer to a plate.
4: Repeat the process for the second omelet.
5: Grind some salt & pepper over the omelets and top the omelets with small pieces of the smoked salmon. Then place a scoop of cream cheese on top of the smoked salmon. Finish the dish off by sprinkling the remaining diced chives over the omelet.
6: Serve.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:banana、egg、vanilla extract (½teaspoon)、melted butter (1tablespoon)、sugar (3tablespoons)、buttermilk (3tablespoons)、flour (½cup)、baking powder (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, mash the banana and add oil, vanilla, buttermilk, egg, and sugar. Whisk until combined.
1: Add the remaining ingredients and whisk until combined. Do not over mix.
2: Spray a skillet or griddle and heat to medium heat.
3: Pour batter in small circles.
4: Cook until the top is bubbly and thick, and the edges are golden brown.
5: Flip, and cook for another 1-2 minutes, or until cooked through.
6: Serve.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:Hereford Corned Beef (1can)、eggs、half & half (½cup)、nutmeg (½teaspoon)、cayenne pepper (½teaspoon)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、salt (1tablespoon)、shredded cheddar cheese (1cup)、spinach (1cup)、puff pastry (2packages)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F.
1: Whisk together eggs, cream, and spices.To this, stir in beef, cheddar, and spinach.
2: Roll open dough and cut into 4” square sections.

4: Evenly distribute egg mixture between each muffin section.
5: Bake on the middle rack for 25-30 minutes, or until the egg is set in the center.
6: Let cool slightly before serving.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:vegan cream cheese (1package)、freeze dried berries (1 ½cups)、vegan sugar (1tablespoon)、ciabatta roll (1package)、plant based milk (2cups)、chickpea flour (⅔cup)、vanilla extract (2teaspoons)、vegan butter (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Grind freeze dried berries and mix with one package of vegan cream cheese and sugar, set aside.
1: Mix plant milk and chickpea flour in a bowl large enough to fit a roll in. Then, take a roll and cut through the middle to create space for filling.
2: Put cream cheese mixture into a sandwich baggy and cut a corner off for easy filling of rolls.
3: Fill the ciabatta rolls with cream cheese then soak in the milk/chickpea flour mixture.
4: Add butter to a fry pan on low/medium heat, add rolls to the pan. About 3-4 min on each side or until desired golden brown and crispness.
5: Serve with fresh berries, whipped topping, powdered sugar and maple syrup.

instructions:

4: Melt butter

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pie dough、bacon (10slices)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、small leek、kosher salt、freshly ground black pepper、asparagus (1lb)、large eggs、shredded white cheddar (2cups)、half & half (1 ½cups)、dijon mustard (1tablespoon)、ground nutmeg (¼teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: Place the pie dough in a round tart dish, pressing gently against the sides, and prick the bottom all over with a fork. Bake for 10–15 minutes, until the crust is cooked through, but not brown. Remove from the oven and let cool completely.
2: Heat the olive oil in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add the leeks, season with salt and pepper, and cook until soft and golden brown, 5–7 minutes. Remove the pan from the heat and set aside.
3: Fill the bottom of a steamer or double boiler with water and bring to a boil over high heat. Add the asparagus to the basket, cover, and steam until tender-crisp, 2–6 minutes. Let cool.
4: Sprinkle the white cheddar, sautéed leeks, chopped bacon, and asparagus over the crust, reserving a bit of bacon, leeks, and asparagus for topping.
5: In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, half-and-half, mustard, nutmeg, and salt and pepper to taste.
6: Pour the egg mixture into the crust over the fillings. Top with the reserved bacon, leeks, and asparagus.
7: Bake the quiche until the filling is firm, 30–40 minutes. Remove from the oven and let cool to room temperature, 1–2 hours.
8: Slice and serve.
9: Enjoy.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray、Stuffin’ Muffins Base (1batch)、shredded cheddar cheese (1 ½cups)、fresh rosemary (2teaspoons)、large eggs、McCormick® Rubbed Sage (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Grease a 12-cup muffin tin with nonstick spray.
1: Add 1 cup shredded cheddar and the rosemary to the stuffing base and stir to combine. Fold in the eggs until incorporated.
2: Spoon about ¼ cup of the stuffing into each muffin cup, filling just above the rims. Press down gently with a spoon to release any air pockets. Sprinkle the remaining ½ cup shredded cheddar over the muffins, then finish with a sprinkle of the McCormick® Rubbed Sage.
3: Bake the muffin cups for 25–30 minutes, or until cooked through and the tops are browned. Let rest in the muffin tin for 20 minutes, then run a knife around the edges of each cup to release.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:Plant milk (1oz)、oats (¼cup)、banana、cinnamon (1teaspoon)、nutmeg (1teaspoon)、maple syrup (1tablespoon)、vegan protein powder (1tablespoon)、fresh berry、any desired topping
instructions:
0: Boil water and add in the banana peel. Cook for 10 minutes or until soft . In a separate bowl, mix the oats and milk
1: Add in half of the banana and mash it all together Then, add in your protein powder, cinnamon, nutmeg and maple syrup and stir
2: Remove the banana peel from the boiling water, drain the water and tear the peel up into pieces and add it to the pancake mixture
3: Mix the peel in and let it break up further until you can no longer see many bits. Then, add your berries to the mixture.
4: Cook the pancakes on medium heat on a pan for 3-4 minutes on each side, until each side is crispy and light golden brown. You can separate the mixture into 4 or 5 mini pancakes or make a large one. However, you will need to cook this for longer on each side.

6: Cut up the remaining half of the banana and place the pieces on top. Serve warm.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray、olive oil (1tablespoon)、breakfast sausage (1lb)、McCormick® Rubbed Sage (½teaspoon)、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、kosher salt、Stuffin’ Muffins Base (1batch)、large eggs、McCormick® Turkey Gravy Mix (1oz)、cold water (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Grease a 12-cup muffin tin with cooking spray.
1: Heat the olive oil in a medium pan over medium heat. Add the breakfast sausage, McCormick® Rubbed Sage, and red pepper flakes and cook, breaking up the meat into small pieces, until browned and cooked through, 6–8 minutes. Pour off any excess grease, then season with salt to taste.
2: Add the sausage to the stuffing base and stir to combine. Fold in the eggs until incorporated.
3: Spoon about ¼ cup (60 G) of the stuffing into each muffin cup, filling just above the rims. Press down gently with a spoon to release any air pockets.
4: Bake the stuffing cups for 30–35 minutes, or until cooked through and the tops are browned. Let rest in the muffin tin for 20 minutes, then run a knife around the edges of each cup to release.
5: While the stuffing muffins cool, add the McCormick® Gravy Mix to a small saucepan. Pour in the water, whisking constantly to prevent lumps from forming. Turn the heat to medium and cook, stirring frequently, until the gravy comes to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 1 minute. Remove the pot from the heat and let sit for 3–5 minutes, until slightly thickened.
6: Spoon the gravy over the sausage stuffin’ muffins and serve warm.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all-purpose flour (1 ½cups)、baking powder (3 ½teaspoons)、salt (½teaspoon)、granulated sugar (2tablespoons)、milk (1cup)、heavy cream (½cup)、egg、vanilla extract (1teaspoon)、butter (3tablespoons)、fresh cherry
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 360°F. Grease a 9 inch baking tray and set aside.
1: In a large bowl, sift the flour, baking powder, salt and sugar and combine.
2: Pour the milk, cream, egg, vanilla, and melted butter into the flour mixture and whisk until smooth.
3: Pour the batter into the prepared baking tray and arrange fresh cherries on top. Push cherries to the bottom of the tray.
4: Bake for about 20-25 minutes, or until cooked through and lightly browned.
5: Remove from the oven and let cool to room temperature.
6: Before serving, dust the cake with powdered sugar and serve with maple syrup.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium onion、large bell pepper、garlic (1clove)、bacon (⅓cup)、coconut oil (3tablespoons)、cream cheese (4oz)、parmesan cheese (1cup)、eggs、salt (¼teaspoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、spinach (8oz)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to broil
1: Using a 10", oven-safe skillet, saute the onions, bell peppers, and garlic in 2 tbsp of oil. Once the veggies are nearly done (about 4 minutes), add bacon crumbles and cream cheese to the mix and cook until a creamy mixture. Scoop the veggie/bacon mix into a bowl to cool while leaving the oil behind. Ensure that excess oil is drained.
2: In the same skillet, add the hopped spinach. Cook it down until it starts to wilt, then place it on a paper-towel-lined plate to cool, ensuring the excess oil drips off.
3: In the onion bowl, add the parmesan cheese and mix until even clumps form. Then add the 8 eggs, salt, and pepper, and whisk until combined.
4: In the same skillet, heat the remaining oil before pouring the egg/veggie mixture into it. Let it cook for 30 seconds, stirring gently with whatever utensil you used before, then evenly cover the top with spinach. Let cook for 5 minutes, or until the edges of the mixture start turning a light brown.
5: Place the skillet in the oven with the broil on. Cook for 5-8 minutes, until the surface is golden brown.
6: Take out the skillet, cool, and serve while warm.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flour (2tablespoons)、cocoa powder (½teaspoon)、milk (1tablespoon)、honey (1teaspoon)、melted butter (¼teaspoon)
instructions:
0: In a bowl, mix together cereal powder, honey, cocoa powder, and melted butter. Slowly pour the milk and mix thoroughly until it becomes doughy. Mold into the bottom of a separate bowl to form a base crust.
1: In the mixing bowl, add the oats, biscuit powder, and crushed almonds. Mix thoroughly. Add the cranberries. Mix well.
2: Drizzle the syrup and let the mixture sit there for 2 minutes.
3: Mix the syrup well into the crumble (make sure it is evenly mixed). Put the mixture on top of the chocolate tart base and press in evenly. Make sure it is really compact.
4: Drizzle the milk over it and let it rest.
5: If desired, drizzle melted dark chocolate on top for a warm taste.
6: Bake in the microwave for about 2 minutes (may vary).
7: Serve warm.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium sweet potatoes、avocado oil (3tablespoons)、pepper (½teaspoon)、olive oil (3tablespoons)、dry quinoa (1cup)、coconut amino (1teaspoon)、fresh goat cheese (8oz)、milk (2tablespoons)、apple cider vinegar (1teaspoon)、sweet paprika (⅛teaspoon)、fresh tarragon (2sprigs)、kale chips、eggs
instructions:
0: PREPARE THE POTATOES:
1: Preheat the oven to 375°F. Line a sheet tray with parchment paper.
2: Wash and cut the potatoes lengthwise into ¾-inch slices. Rub with 2 tablespoons of avocado oil. Dust with pepper and a pinch of salt.
3: Evenly space the toasts on the sheet tray. Roast until lightly browned, about 15 minutes. Remove from the oven and let cool.
4: PREPARE THE QUINOA:
5: Rinse the quinoa in a fine-mesh strainer.
6: Add 2 tablespoons of olive oil to a pot with a tight-fitting lid set on medium heat. When the oil is shimmering, add the quinoa. Stir to coat, then cook until fragrant and lightly toasted, about 2 minutes.
7: Add 2 cups (480 ml) of water and a pinch of salt to the pot, then increase the heat and cover. As soon as the liquid comes to a boil, turn down the heat to create a gentle simmer.
8: Cook until the water is absorbed, about 20 minutes. Remove from the heat, uncover, and add the coconut aminos, using a fork to fluff and stir the quinoa.
9: Heat the remaining avocado oil in a skillet set on medium heat. When the oil is shimmering, add half the quinoa and stir to coat. Cook, stirring occasionally, until golden brown and crispy, about 15 minutes. Transfer to a plate lined with a paper towel. Then, repeat the process with the remaining quinoa.
10: PREPARE THE CHEESE:
11: Add the goat cheese, milk, and apple cider vinegar to a small food processor. To this, add the paprika.
12: Wash and chop the herbs, including any delicate stems, then add to the food processor. Blend until smooth.
13: TO SERVE:
14: Heat the “toasts” and place one or two slices on each plate.
15: Crumble a spoonful or two of the cheese spread on top of each serving.
16: Fry one egg per person and place it on top of each serving of toast. Crumble more cheese spread on top of the fried eggs.
17: Sprinkle each serving generously with the crispy quinoa.
18: Crush the kale chips and sprinkle on top of each serving.
19: Plate and serve.

ingredients:onion、garlic (2cloves)、paprika (1teaspoon)、cayenne pepper (¼teaspoon)、tomato basil pasta sauce (¼cup)、medium tomatoes、eggs、salt and pepper、maple syrup (1teaspoon)、lemon juice (1teaspoon)、fresh parsley (1small bunch)
instructions:
0: Heat olive oil in a pan on medium heat. Add the chopped onion. Cook until the onion turns to translucent.
1: Add garlic and spices. Cook for 1 to 2 minutes.
2: Add chopped fresh tomatoes and ¼ cup (55 g) of tomato basil pasta sauce into the pan. Break down tomatoes  with a large fork and season with salt and pepper. Add maple syrup and lemon juice. Bring the sauce to a simmer.
3: Make some spaces and crack the eggs into it. Cover the pan and cook until the eggs are done or as you like.
4: Add chopped parsley on top and serve with french baguette or sourdough.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:Phyllo pastry sheets、egg wash、olive oil (1tablespoon)、eggs、roe (2tablespoons)、milk (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 180° C.
1: Cut phyllo pastry into medium sized squares. Then brush pastry with egg wash.
2: Place two pastry sheets into a baking tray, then into the oven for 10 min until golden brown.
3: Crack 5 eggs into a bowl, add milk, chopped parsley, salt and pepper then whisk. Drizzle olive oil into a pan at low heat. Cook eggs until fluffy and scrambled then drizzle truffle oil and fold in.
4: Fill the phyllo cups with scrambled eggs, top up with a little roe or caviar and garnish with micro herbs and serve.

instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Grease a 12-cup muffin tin with nonstick spray.
1: Melt the butter in a medium pan over medium heat. Add the apple and sauté for 1–2 minutes, or until just starting to soften. Add the pecans, McCormick® Rubbed Sage, and salt and cook for another 2 minutes, until the pecans are lightly toasted.  Remove the pan from the heat.
2: Add the apple mixture to the stuffing base and stir to combine. Fold in the eggs until incorporated.
3: Spoon about ¼ cup (60 G) of the stuffing into each muffin cup, filling just above the rims. Press down gently with a spoon to release any air pockets.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:warm water (¼cup)、red gel food coloring (¼teaspoon)、instant yeast (¼teaspoon)、brown sugar (½teaspoon)、all purpose flour (⅔cup)、kosher salt (¼teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Make the red dough: Add the warm water and red food coloring to a medium bowl and stir until the food coloring is dissolved. Sprinkle the yeast on top of the water, then add the brown sugar, flour, and salt and mix until the dough begins to come together. Use your hands to gently knead in the bowl until there are no dry spots, 1–2 minutes (the dough doesn’t need to be completely smooth at this point), then bring the dough together in a ball. Set the dough in a small dish inside a gallon-size zip-top plastic bag and seal to prevent the dough from drying out. Repeat to make the orange, yellow, green, blue, and purple doughs. After mixing the final dough, let the dough rest for 10 minutes.
1: Remove a dough ball from the bag. On a lightly floured surface, knead for 30–60 seconds, until smooth. Return the dough to the plastic bag and repeat with the remaining colors.
2: Let the dough rise in a warm spot for 40–45 minutes, until 1½ times their original size.
3: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
4: Transfer the purple dough to a lightly floured surface. Use a rolling pin to roll the dough into an 8 x 6-inch rectangle. (You should need very little flour, if any, to roll the dough out.) Roll out the blue dough to an 8 x 6-inch rectangle. Place on top of the purple rectangle, making sure not to overlap the edges so that each color remains exposed. Repeat with the green, yellow, orange, and red doughs, in this order. Use your hands to stretch and flatten the stacked dough rectangle as needed to maintain the 8 x 6-inch dimensions.
5: Use a sharp knife to cut the dough lengthwise into 6 1-inch-wide strips. Return 5 of the strips to the plastic bag to prevent them from drying out.
6: Use your fingertips to lightly roll the dough strip back and forth 5–6 times to round the square edges. Once rounded, use your palms to apply light pressure, rolling the dough strip back and forth while moving outwards, until it is about 12 inches long. Grab an end of the dough strip in each hand and twist 1–2 times to swirl the colors. Bring the ends together in a ring, overlapping about 1½ inches. Press the ends together to seal. Use your palm to roll the overlapping dough against the surface to help seal, if needed. Make sure the bagel hole is at least 2 inches wide, using your fingers to carefully stretch and widen the hole if necessary. Transfer the bagel to the prepared baking sheet and repeat with remaining dough strips, spacing the bagels at least 2 inches apart. Cover the baking sheet with plastic wrap or place in a large, clean recycled plastic bag to prevent the bagels from drying out. Let proof for 25–30 minutes, until slightly puffy.
7: Arrange a rack in the center of the oven. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
8: While the bagels are proofing, prepare the water bath: Add the water, baking soda, and flour to a large pot. Stir to dissolve the baking soda and flour. Bring the water to a boil over high heat and let boil for at least 5 minutes.
9: Carefully place 2–3 bagels (depending on the size of the pot) upside down into the boiling water. Boil for 40 seconds, flipping halfway through. Use a slotted spatula or spoon to lift the bagel out of the water, letting the excess water drip off, then transfer back to the baking sheet. Repeat with the remaining bagels. Let the bagels cool for 5 minutes
10: Bake the bagels for 20–22 minutes, until the bottoms are golden brown. Let cool completely before slicing.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

3: Serve.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs、salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (1teaspoon)、oil (1tablespoon)、garlic (3cloves)、onion、tomato、spinach (2cups)、heavy cream (2cups)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、grated parmesan cheese (½cup)、fresh flat-leaf parsley (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Season the chicken all over with salt and pepper.
1: Heat the oil in a skillet over medium-low heat.
2: Place the chicken thighs skin side down in the skillet and cook for about 13 minutes to crisp up the skin. Move the chicken around from time to time to ensure it cooks evenly. The skin should be hard to the touch.
3: Flip the chicken, then cook for about another 15 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through. Remove from pan.
4: Add the garlic and onion, stirring until onions are translucent. Stir in the tomatoes and spinach until the spinach is wilted.
5: Add the heavy cream, salt, and pepper, bringing to a boil.
6: Add the Parmesan cheese and parsley, stirring until the sauce has thickened slightly.
7: Place the chicken back in the pan, spooning the sauce on top of the chicken.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:shredded mozzarella cheese (1cup)、egg yolk
instructions:
0: Add the mozzarella to a bowl and microwave for 1-2 minutes, until melted.
1: Allow the mozzarella to cool for 30 seconds.
2: With a spatula, gently fold the egg yolk into the cheese.
3: Turn the mixture out onto a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
4: Place another piece of parchment paper on top of the dough and press down with your hand until thin.
5: Remove the top piece of parchment and cut the dough into thin strips.
6: Place the “pasta” on a rack and refrigerate for four hours or overnight.
7: Place the “pasta” in boiling water for one minute.
8: Drain into a colander and run cool water over the pasta to prevent sticking.
9: Serve with your favorite sauce and toppings.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsalted butter (1tablespoon)、anchovies、panko breadcrumbs (½cup)、freshly grated parmigiano-reggiano cheese (½cup)、extra virgin olive oil (¼cup)、garlic (6cloves)、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、cherry tomato (2pt)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、white wine (1cup)、spaghetti (1lb)、lemon  zest
instructions:
0: Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add 4 of the chopped anchovy filets and cook for 1 minute, until they begin to melt.
1: Add the panko bread crumbs and cook for 3 minutes, stirring frequently, until golden brown. Transfer the bread crumbs to a medium bowl and let cool to room temperature. Once cooled, toss with the Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.
2: Heat ¼ cup (60 ml) of olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the remaining 6 anchovies and cook for 2 minutes, stirring frequently, until the anchovies begin to melt into the oil.
3: Add the garlic and red pepper flakes and cook for 30 seconds, until fragrant.
4: Add the tomatoes and stir to coat in the oil. Season with 1 teaspoon of salt and cook for 5 minutes, or until the tomatoes just begin to soften.
5: Add the white wine and reduce the heat to low. Cook for 5 minutes, or until the sauce is reduced by half.
6: Add cooked pasta and reserved cooking water to the pot with the tomatoes and stir to combine. Cook for 1 minute, until the pasta is well coated and saucy. Drizzle with the remaining tablespoon of olive oil and season with salt. Toss to coat.
7: Serve the pasta topped with the anchovy bread crumbs and lemon zest
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、garlic (4cloves)、chicken broth (2cups)、milk (1cup)、fettuccine (8oz)、salt、pepper、grated parmesan cheese (¼cup)、fresh parsley (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Heat unsalted butter in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add garlic and cook, stirring frequently, until fragrant, about 1-2 minutes.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
