ingredients:chicken thighs、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、dried parsley (1teaspoon)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、garlic (1tablespoon)、red onion (½cup)、long grain rice (1cup)、chicken broth (1 ½cups)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: In a large bowl, evenly season chicken thighs with salt, pepper, paprika, and parsley.
2: On high, heat olive oil in a oven-proof pot and place chicken thighs, skin-side down, in the hot oil. Cook 5-6 minutes or the thighs develop brown crispy skin and flip over.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs、salt、pepper、unsalted butter (1tablespoon)、garlic (3cloves)、brown sugar (1tablespoon)、honey (¼cup)、dried thyme (1teaspoon)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、green beans (1lb)
instructions:

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken thighs (2lb)、salt (1tablespoon)、white pepper (1teaspoon)、cornstarch (1cup)、flour (3cups)、egg、water (1 ½cups)、oil (2tablespoons)、oil (6cups)
instructions:
0: On a cutting board, cut chicken into 1x1-inch (2x2-cm) cubes and set aside.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instructions:
0: In a pan over medium-high heat, melt butter, then add the chicken breast.

3: Add half of the flour to the garlic and butter, stirring until incorporated. Then add the rest of the flour and stir.

8: Add parsley and extra parmesan. Mix well.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bacon (4slices)、chicken breasts、salt、pepper、italian seasoning (2teaspoons)、paprika (1teaspoon)、garlic (2cloves)、spinach (2cups)、small tomatoes、cream (1 ½cups)、shredded parmesan cheese (1cup)、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、penne pasta (10oz)、Chopped fresh parsley (3tablespoons)
instructions:
0: In a deep skillet, fry the bacon until crispy. Remove to a paper towel to drain, then chop.
1: In the same skillet, add the chicken and season with salt, pepper, Italian seasoning, and paprika. Cook until no longer pink inside.
2: Add the garlic and cook until softened.
3: Add spinach and tomatoes and cook until the spinach is wilted.
4: Add the cream, Parmesan, an red pepper flakes and bring to a boil.
5: Add the penne and bacon, and stir until fully coated in sauce.
6: Serve with parsley, Parmesan, and red pepper flakes, if desired.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bacon (6slices)、shrimp (1lb)、salt (1teaspoon)、black pepper (½teaspoon)、medium yellow onion、medium tomato、garlic (3cloves)、heavy cream (2cups)、fettuccine (1lb)、grated parmesan cheese (1cup)、fresh parlsey (½cup)
instructions:
0: In a large pot, cook the bacon over medium heat until crispy.
1: Add the shrimp, salt, and pepper and cook until the shrimp is pink and opaque. Remove the shrimp and bacon from the pot, leaving any fat from cooking the bacon behind.
2: Add the onions, tomatoes, and garlic to the pot and cook until the garlic is starting to brown.
3: Add the cream and bring to a boil.
4: Once the cream is boiling, add the fettuccine. Return the shrimp and bacon to the pan, along with the Parmesan cheese and parsley. Stir until the cheese melts and the sauce coats the shrimp and pasta nicely.
5: Nutrition  Calories: 2185 Fat: 125 grams  Carbs: 192 grams Fiber: 9 grams  Sugars: 20 grams  Protein: 103 grams

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (1stick)、flour (½cup)、milk (8cups)、salt (2teaspoons)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、nutmeg (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Lay down about 6 feet (1.8 meters) of tinfoil on a flat surface. Place place 4 clusters of 2 lasagna noodles towards the left half of the foil sheet, leaving about a ½-inch (1 cm) gap in between each cluster.
1: Fold the right half of foil over the noodles, pressing flat. To help you see where the noodles are, run your finger along the edges of the noodles to create a rough outline in the foil.
2: Fold the top and bottom flaps of foil over, creasing and pressing flat.
3: Flip the foil sheet onto the table so that it’s now standing, then arrange into a square box, using the 4 groups of noodles as a visual guide. Fold and crease over any excess foil to join the ends together, then set aside.
4: In a large pot, melt the butter over medium heat.
5: Whisk in the flour, cooking until the mixture reaches a light golden color.
6: Slowly drizzle in the milk and bring to a boil, whisking constantly until smooth. Mix in salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Bring to a boil.
7: Transfer the béchamel to a large bowl and press plastic wrap onto the surface of the sauce to prevent a skin from forming. Set aside.
8: Heat oil in a very large pot over high heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onions, carrots, and celery and cook until the vegetables have started to sweat but aren’t browning.
9: Add in the ground beef and use a wooden spoon or spatula to break up the meat into small pieces.
10: Cook the beef, stirring occasionally, until half of the liquid has evaporated.
11: Add in the tomato sauce, tomato paste, chicken stock, salt, and pepper, stirring to combine evenly and breaking up any last lumps.
12: Turn down the heat to low, and simmer, covered, for about 2 hours.
13: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
14: To assemble, line a greased 9x9-inch (23x23-cm) square baking pan with 2 sheets of foil that extend over the sides.
15: Spread a thin layer of béchamel on the lined baking pan and top with 2 lasagna noodles. Spread a thin layer of meat sauce evenly across the noodles, followed by a thin layer of béchamel. Repeat the layering process, following the order of: 2 noodles, meat sauce, and béchamel. Alternate the direction of the lasagna sheets after every layer.
16: After 50 layers, place the foil box over the lasagna, helping it stay upright and stable.
17: Continue with the layering process until the 99th layer.
18: Sprinkle Parmesan on top, then cover the whole lasagna with foil.
19: Bake for about 1½ hours, uncovering the foil halfway, until the top is a deep golden brown.
20: Cool for at least 2 hours, then carefully lift out the lasagna with the foil sleeves onto a large cutting board.
21: Peel away the foil walls, then sprinkle the top of the lasagna generously with chives.
22: Cut and serve.
23: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground beef (1lb)、seasoned bread crumbs (½cup)、onion、egg、kosher salt (1tablespoon)、pepper (1tablespoon)、canola oil (2tablespoons)、beef broth (2cups)、milk (2cups)、worcestershire sauce (1tablespoon)、egg noodle (4cups)、shredded parmesan cheese (1cup)、fresh parsley (½cup)
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, breadcrumbs, onion, egg, ½ tablespoon salt, and ½ tablespoon pepper, mixing until evenly combined.
1: Heat the canola oil in a pot over medium-high heat. Take about a golf-ball size of the meatball mixture and roll it into balls. Place the meatballs into the pot, cooking for one minute. Flip the meatballs.
2: Add the beef broth, milk, remaining ½ tablespoon salt, remaining ½ tablespoon pepper, and Worcestershire sauce and give it a stir.
3: Bring the liquid to a boil, then add the egg noodles. Stir constantly until the pasta is cooked and the liquid has reduced to a sauce that coats the noodles, about seven to eight minutes.
4: Add the parmesan and the parsley, stirring until the cheese is melted.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:eggplants、roma tomatoes、yellow squashes、zucchinis
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven for 375˚F (190˚C).
1: Slice the eggplant, tomatoes, squash, and zucchini into approximately ¹⁄₁₆-inch (1-mm) rounds, then set aside.
2: Make the sauce: Heat the olive oil in a 12-inch (30-cm) oven-safe pan over medium-high heat. Sauté the onion, garlic, and bell peppers until soft, about 10 minutes. Season with salt and pepper, then add the crushed tomatoes. Stir until the ingredients are fully incorporated. Remove from heat, then add the basil. Stir once more, then smooth the surface of the sauce with a spatula.
3: Arrange the sliced veggies in alternating patterns, (for example, eggplant, tomato, squash, zucchini) on top of the sauce from the outer edge to the middle of the pan. Season with salt and pepper. 
4: Make the herb seasoning: In a small bowl, mix together the basil, garlic, parsley, thyme, salt, pepper, and olive oil. Spoon the herb seasoning over the vegetables.
5: Cover the pan with foil and bake for 40 minutes. Uncover, then bake for another 20 minutes, until the vegetables are softened.
6: Serve while hot as a main dish or side. The ratatouille is also excellent the next day--cover with foil and reheat in a 350˚F (180˚C) oven for 15 minutes, or simply microwave to desired temperature.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breast (1lb)、salt、pepper、teriyaki sauce (½cup)、cooking oil (4tablespoons)、chow mein noodle (6oz)、onion (¾cup)、carrot (½cup)、broccoli floret (1cup)、cabbage (1cup)、sesame seed
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, season the cubed chicken with salt and pepper. Add ¼ cup (of 60 ml) teriyaki sauce and mix until the chicken is well-coated. Cover with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator for 30 minutes to 1 hour.
1: In a wok or deep skillet over medium-high heat, heat 2 tablespoons of cooking oil, then add the par-cooked noodles. Cook for 1-2 minutes, allowing the noodles to crisp, then flip and cook for another 1-2 minutes. Transfer to a plate and set aside.
2: In the same wok, heat 1 tablespoon of cooking oil, then add the chicken. Cook for 3-4 minutes, until browned on one side, then stir and cook for another 3-4 minutes, until fully cooked through. Set the chicken aside.
3: In the same wok, add 1 tablespoon of oil, the onion, and carrot. Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the onions are translucent. Add the broccoli and cabbage. Stir and cook for 1-2 minutes, then season with salt and pepper and cook for 3 minutes more, until the vegetables are soft.
4: Add the cooked chicken and crispy noodles back to the wok, along with the remaining ¼ cup (60 ml) teriyaki sauce. Toss well and cook for 2-3 minutes, until everything is well-combined. Garnish with sesame seeds.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butternut squash、achiote (1 ½teaspoons)、ancho chile powder (1 ½teaspoons)、garlic powder (1 ½teaspoons)、onion powder (1 ½teaspoons)、ground coriander (1 ½teaspoons)、dried thyme (1 ½teaspoons)、ground cumin (2teaspoons)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、cayenne (½teaspoon)、apple cider vinegar (1tablespoon)、orange juice (3tablespoons)、extra virgin olive oil (4tablespoons)、pineapple (2cups)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.
1: In a large bowl, toss the butternut squash with the achiote powder, ancho chile powder, garlic powder, onion powder, coriander, thyme, cumin, salt, pepper, cayenne, apple cider vinegar, orange juice, and 2 tablespoons of olive oil until well coated. Spread the butternut squash in an even layer on a prepared baking sheet.
2: Bake the squash for 45 minutes, tossing halfway, until deepened in color and the spices have darkened.
3: Add the pineapple to the same bowl where the butternut squash was seasoned and toss to coat in the remaining marinade. Spread in an even layer on the other baking sheet.
4: Bake the pineapple for 25–30 minutes, until softened and slightly shrunken.
5: Toss the roasted butternut squash with the remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil on the baking sheet.
6: Warm the tortillas, one at a time, directly over a medium flame on a stovetop burner until the edges are charred and the tortillas are pliable. Keep warm by wrapping in a kitchen towel while you repeat with the remaining tortillas. Alternatively, microwave the tortillas until warmed through.
7: To assemble the tacos, spoon butternut squash and pineapple into each tortilla. Top with onion, cilantro, and avocado. Serve with lime wedges.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:olive oil (3tablespoons)、garlic (3cloves)、cooked sausage (1cup)、chicken breasts、cajun seasoning (1tablespoon)、heavy cream (2cups)、penne pasta (4cups)、parmesan cheese (1cup)、fresh parsley (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Heat oil in a large pot over high heat. Cook the garlic, sausage, and chicken until garlic starts to brown and the chicken is no longer pink.
1: Sprinkle over the Cajun seasoning and stir to evenly coat the sausage and chicken.
2: Add the cream, and bring to a boil.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:vegetable oil (2tablespoons)、boneless, skinless chicken breast (2lb)、diced yellow onion (1cup)、sliced carrot (1cup)、garlic cloves (3cloves)、salt (1teaspoon)、unsalted butter (5tablespoons)、all-purpose flour (6tablespoons)、chicken broth (6cups)、heavy cream (½cup)、dried thyme (½teaspoon)、bay leaves、frozen peas (1 ½cups)、fresh parsley (4tablespoons)
instructions:
0: In a 6-quart Dutch oven, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned on both sides. Remove from the pot and set aside.
1: Add carrot and onion and cook until just tender, about 3 minutes.
2: Add the garlic and stir for another minute, until fragrant.
3: Reduce the heat to medium-low and add the butter and flour, stirring constantly for 3 minutes to prevent lumps from forming.
4: Add the chicken and any accumulated juices back to the pot and stir to coat in the roux.
5: Add the chicken broth, cream, thyme, and bay leaves and bring to a simmer. Once soup is at a simmer, add the frozen peas, cover, and cook for 15 minutes.
6: Make the dumplings: In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, salt, pepper, and cream. Stir until mixture comes together into single mass of dough.
7: Using a large spoon or ice cream scoop, form the dough into small round balls about 1 inch (2 ½ cm) in diameter (the dough should yield 14-16 dumplings).
8: Place the dough balls in the simmering soup (making sure they don’t touch), add the parsley, and cover. Let the soup simmer for 15 minutes, or until the dumplings are cooked through.
9: Ladle into bowls, giving 1-2 dumplings per serving.
10: Enjoy!

instructions:
0: Season chicken with salt and pepper. Coat with cornstarch, dip in beaten egg.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breast (2lb)、salt、pepper、chili powder (2teaspoons)、turmeric (½teaspoon)、butter (6tablespoons)、yellow onion (1 ½cups)、garam masala (3teaspoons)、cumin (1teaspoon)、cayenne pepper (1teaspoon)、ginger (1tablespoon)、garlic (3cloves)、cinnamon、tomato sauce (14oz)、water (1cup)、heavy cream (1cup)、rice、fresh cilantro
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, season the chicken breast with salt, pepper, 1 teaspoon of chili powder, and the teaspoon of turmeric. Let sit for 15 minutes to marinate.
1: Melt 2 tablespoons of butter in a large pot over medium heat. Brown the chicken, then remove from the pot.
2: Melt another 2 tablespoons of butter in the pot, then add the onion, garam masala, remaining teaspoon of chili powder, the cumin, ginger, garlic, cayenne, cinnamon, salt and pepper. Cook until fragrant.
3: Add the tomato sauce and bring to a simmer.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、plain yogurt (½cup)、lemon juice (2tablespoons)、garlic (6cloves)、minced ginger (1tablespoon)、salt (2teaspoons)、ground cumin (2teaspoons)、garam masala (2teaspoons)、paprika (2teaspoons)
instructions:
0: Slice the chicken into bite-sized chunks. Combine the cubed chicken with the yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, salt, cumin, garam masala, and paprika and stir until well-coated.
1: Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour, or overnight.
2: Preheat the oven to 500°F (260°C). Line a high-sided baking pan or roasting tray with parchment paper.
3: Place the marinated chicken pieces on bamboo or wooden skewers, then set them over the prepared baking pan, making sure there is space underneath the chicken to help distribute the heat more evenly. Bake for about 15 minutes, until slightly dark brown on the edges.
4: Make the sauce: Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat, then sauté the onions, ginger, and garlic until tender but not browned. Add the cumin, turmeric, coriander, paprika, chili powder, and garam masala and stir constantly for about 30 seconds, until the spices are fragrant. Stir in the tomato puree, tomato sauce, and 1 ¼ cups of water, then bring to a boil and cook for about 5 minutes. Pour in the cream.
5: Remove the chicken from the skewers and add to the sauce, cooking for another 1-2 minutes. Garnish with cilantro and serve over rice or alongside naan bread.
6: Enjoy!

3: Let the salmon marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
4: In a medium pan, heat oil. Add salmon to the pan, but discard the used marinade. Cook salmon on one side for about 2-3 minutes, then flip over and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes.
5: Remove salmon from pan. Pour in remaining marinade and reduce.
6: Serve the salmon with sauce and a side of veggies. We used broccoli.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:olive oil (3tablespoons)、chicken breast (1 ½lb)、yellow onion、salt、pepper、cremini mushroom (2cups)、garlic (3cloves)、dried thyme (1teaspoon)、paprika (2teaspoons)、chicken broth (4cups)、heavy cream (1cup)、farfalle pasta (1lb)、spinach (5oz)、parmesan cheese (1cup)
instructions:
0: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large pot on medium heat. Add chicken, salt and pepper, and brown - make sure to cook through. Set chicken aside.
1: Add 1 tablespoon olive oil and the onion into the pot and stir. Cook down for 1-2 minutes.
2: Add mushrooms and garlic, and stir to incorporate with the onion. Season with salt and pepper to taste as well as thyme and paprika. Stir to evenly season.
3: Add chicken broth and heavy cream to the pot and stir. Bring to a boil, then add the farfalle pasta.
4: Cook according to package instructions, being sure to stir every 1-2 minutes to keep the pasta from clumping together. (Cook time may be a little longer in this recipe than when the pasta is boiled in water.)
5: When the farfalle pasta is al dente, add the spinach and chicken and stir until the spinach cooks down and incorporates.
6: Add parmesan and stir until it’s well-incorporated and you’re left with a smooth sauce.
7: Top off with extra parmesan and serve.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instructions:
0: Heat the olive oil until shimmering over medium heat in a large soup pot. Add the onion, carrots, celery, and 1 teaspoon each salt and pepper. Cooking, stirring frequently, until the vegetables are very soft, about 15 minutes.
1: Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add the stock and bring to a boil.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、salt、pepper、flour (1cup)、butter (1 ½tablespoons)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、chicken stock (1 ¼cups)、heavy cream (1cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、lemon、lemon、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: On a cutting board, cut the chicken breasts in half, widthwise.
1: Lay chicken flat and season both sides with salt and pepper.
2: Gently coat the chicken pieces in the flour, shaking off any excess.
3: Heat a skillet on medium-high heat and add the butter and oil, swirling together to coat the pan.
4: Place the chicken breasts into the pan and cook for 3-5 minutes or until golden brown.
5: Flip the chicken and cook the other side, another 3-5 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through.
6: Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
7: Pour ¼ cup (60 ml) of the chicken stock in the pan and scrape up any bits that may have stuck to the bottom of the pan.
8: Add the rest of the stock and the cream and stir.
9: Season with salt and pepper, and add the lemon juice.

11: Spoon the sauce over the chicken.
12: Remove from heat. Sauce will thicken as it cools.
13: Serve with parsley and extra sauce.
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:thick-cut pork chops、paprika (½teaspoon)、cayenne pepper (½teaspoon)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、black pepper (½teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、brown sugar (4tablespoons)、olive oil
instructions:
0: In a bowl, combine your spices (paprika, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, black pepper, and salt).

5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、chicken breasts、salt、pepper、yellow onion (½cup)、garlic (2cloves)、chicken broth (2cups)、water (3cups)、pasta shells (16oz)、broccoli (4cups)、cayenne powder (½teaspoon)、nutmeg (¼teaspoon)、milk (1cup)、shredded cheddar cheese (2cups)
instructions:
0: Heat olive oil on medium heat in a large pot. Add chicken breasts, season with salt and pepper, and allow the chicken to brown on one side.
1: Flip chicken, then add onions and garlic as the second side browns.
2: Once the chicken has browned on both sides, add chicken broth, water, and pasta to the pot.
3: Stir all ingredients, cover the pot with a lid, and bring to a boil. When it begins to boil, uncover and stir. Bring the heat to low, stir, then cover and let simmer for 20 minutes.

5: Add milk and cheddar cheese and stir until the cheese melts and you have a smooth cheese sauce.
6: Add salt and pepper (to taste), cayenne, and nutmeg. Stir once more, then you’re ready to serve.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:salt、spaghetti (½lb)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、coarsely ground black pepper (2teaspoons)、grated parmesan cheese (4oz)
instructions:
0: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta for 1 minute less than the package instructs, until al dente. Save 1 cup (240 ml) pasta water, then drain.
1: Heat a large sauté pan over medium heat. Add the olive oil, butter, and pepper, and stir to combine.
2: Stir in the reserved pasta water.
3: Toss in the cooked pasta. Reduce the heat to low.
4: Add the Parmesan and toss until the cheese is melted and the pasta is well-coated.
5: Season with salt, if desired.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:oil (2tablespoons)、chicken breasts、garlic (3cloves)、bacon (6strips)、spinach (5oz)、salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (2teaspoons)、heavy cream (2cups)、rotini pasta (1 ¼cups)、parmesan cheese (1cup)、fresh parsley (½cup)
instructions:
0: Heat oil in a large pot over high heat.
1: Cook the chicken until no pink is showing.
2: Add the garlic, bacon, spinach, salt, and pepper, cooking until spinach is wilted.
3: Pour in the cream and bring to a boil.
4: Add the pasta, cheese, and parsley, stirring until the pasta is coated evenly.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、salt、pepper、garlic (1teaspoon)、soy sauce (½cup)、honey (⅓cup)、sesame seed (1 ½tablespoons)、onion、small bell peppers、broccoli (2cups)、green onion、white rice
instructions:
0: In a pan, cook cut chicken over medium-high heat until almost done. Salt and pepper to taste.
1: Reduce heat to medium and stir in the crushed garlic.
2: Add in the soy sauce, honey, and 1 tablespoon of the sesame seeds. Stir until thickened.
3: Remove the chicken from the pan, leaving the sauce, and add the vegetables to the pan.
4: Cover the pan for several minutes and cook until the vegetables begin to soften, then remove the lid and stir until the sauce is thick again.
5: Split the rice, vegetables, and chicken evenly between 4 containers. Top with a sprinkle of sesame seeds and sliced green onion. Refrigerate for up to 4 days.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:fresh spinach (¼cup)、ricotta cheese (¼cup)、chicken breasts、cheddar cheese (¼cup)、paprika (1teaspoon)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Cook the spinach on a medium heat in a splash of oil for 3-5 minutes until it is slightly wilted.
1: Stir in the ricotta and cook for a further 30-60 seconds. Allow to cool.
2: Cut slits into the chicken breasts about 1cm (½ inch) apart but don’t cut all the way through - about 75% of the way down is what you should aim for.
3: Stuff all of the spinach and ricotta mixture into the slits.
4: Season the chicken with salt and pepper.
5: Grate the cheddar and sprinkle it generously on top.
6: Shake the ground paprika over the chicken to add some colour and flavour.
7: Bake in the centre of a pre-heated oven for 20-25 minutes 400°F (200°C) until the cheese has melted and the juices are clear.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken thighs (2lb)、large yellow onion、wooden skewer
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, combine marinade ingredients and stir well.
1: On a cutting board, place a piece of plastic wrap over the chicken thighs and pound until about ½ inch (1 cm) thick with a meat mallet, rolling pin, or heavy pan.
2: In another large bowl or gallon plastic bag, combine chicken thighs and marinade, stirring well to coat. Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour and up to one day.
3: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
4: Shred the cucumber, be sure to squeeze out any excess liquid.
5: In a medium bowl, combine tzatziki ingredients and stir well. Cover and refrigerate at least 30 minutes.
6: On a baking sheet or a large cast-iron skillet, use the onion half as a base and position the skewer vertically like a spit. Skewer the chicken thighs individually, rotating each one 90 degrees.
7: Bake for 1.5 to 2 hours, until internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C). Let cool for 10 minutes.
8: Carve off slices of chicken to fill a pita. Top with onion slices, tomato slices, and tzatziki sauce.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、ground beef (1lb)、yellow onion (½cup)、taco seasoning (4 ½tablespoons)、tomato paste (1tablespoon)、tomato (10oz)、spaghetti (8oz)、water (3cups)、cheddar cheese (½cup)、mozzarella cheese (½cup)、roma tomato、fresh cilantro (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Heat olive oil in a large stockpot over medium-high heat. Add ground beef, yellow onions, and taco seasoning.  Cook until beef has browned, about 3-5 minutes, making sure to crumble the beef as it cooks.
1: Stir in tomato paste and diced tomatoes, then stir.
2: Add spaghetti and water. Bring to a boil; cover, reduce heat, and simmer until pasta is cooked through, about 15 minutes.
3: Remove from heat and top with cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, Roma tomato, and cilantro. Mix until cheese is melted.
4: Serve immediately. Garnish with additional tomato and cilantro, if desired.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:oil (2tablespoons)、garlic cloves (4cloves)、shrimp (2lb)、spinach (3cups)、onion、salt (2teaspoons)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、heavy cream (2cups)、fettuccine pasta (1lb)、bacon (6slices)、parmesan cheese (1cup)、fresh parsley (½cup)
instructions:
0: Heat oil over medium heat in a large pot.
1: Cook the garlic and the shrimp until the shrimp is pink, then remove the shrimp.
2: Add the spinach, onions, salt, and pepper, cooking until the onions are translucent.
3: Pour in the cream and bring to a boil.
4: Add the fettuccine, stir until the pasta is evenly cooked.
5: Mix in the cooked shrimp, bacon, parmesan, and parsley until the cheese is melted.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:oil (2teaspoons)、carrot (½cup)、garlic (1tablespoon)、onion (½cup)、bell pepper (½cup)、broccoli floret (½cup)、pea (½cup)、corn (⅓cup)、eggs、white rice (3cups)、soy sauce (2tablespoons)、sesame oil (1tablespoon)、pepper
instructions:
0: In a wok or deep skillet, heat up the oil over high heat and cook carrots, onions, and garlic until onions are translucent.
1: Add bell peppers and broccoli and cook an additional 3-4 minutes. Push all of the cooked vegetables to the side of the pan.
2: Beat the eggs and pour into the cleared half of the pan. Scramble the eggs and mix with the rest of the vegetables.
3: Add peas, corn, rice, soy sauce, sesame oil, and pepper. Mix well and let the rice cook until slightly crispy.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、salt、pepper、lemon  zest (1tablespoon)、asparagus、provolone cheese (3slices)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、olive oil (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚F).
1: On a cutting board, cut the chicken breasts in half, lengthwise, leaving it intact on one side.
2: Season the inside of the chicken with salt and pepper.
3: Sprinkle the lemon zest on the interior of the chicken. Top with piece of provolone and three stalks of asparagus, then fold the chicken over enclosing the filling.
4: Season the outside of the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and paprika.
5: Heat a large oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat, and add the oil. Add the chicken to the pan, and cook for 3 to 5 minutes, until golden brown.
6: Flip the chicken over and cook for an additional 3 to 5 minutes.
7: Cover the skillet with aluminum foil and place in the oven for 15 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 155˚F (70˚C).
8: Remove the skillet and let sit, covered, for 5 minutes.
9: Remove the foil, and serve.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、salt、pepper、all-purpose flour (⅔cup)、olive oil (4tablespoons)、dry white wine (⅓cup)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、garlic (2cloves)、caper (2tablespoons)、lemon juice (3tablespoons)、chicken stock (1 ½cups)、heavy cream (⅓cup)、fresh flat-leaf parsley (2tablespoons)、angel hair pasta (8oz)
instructions:
0: Butterfly each chicken breast. Lay a piece of parchment paper on top and pound to about ¼ inch (6 mm) thick. Season generously on both sides with salt and pepper.
1: Cut each breast in half lengthwise so you have 4 pieces of chicken.
2: Add the flour to a wide, shallow dish. Dredge each piece of chicken in flour, shaking off the excess.
3: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Fry the chicken until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
4: Pour the white wine into the pan and cook until reduced by half, about 1 minute.
5: Add the butter, garlic, and capers and cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
6: Stir in the lemon juice and chicken stock and cook for 5 minutes, until the sauce has slightly thickened.
7: Stir in the cream, then return the chicken to the pan.
8: Sprinkle with the parsley and turn the chicken to coat in the sauce. Simmer for 2 minutes, until the sauce thickens slightly, then remove from the heat.
9: Serve the chicken and sauce over angel hair pasta.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:instant ramen (3oz)、water (8cups)、garlic (1clove)、cornstarch (1teaspoon)、sesame oil (2tablespoons)、lime、soy sauce (¼cup)、broccoli floret (2cups)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、flank steak (¾lb)、medium yellow onion
instructions:
0: Place the ramen noodles in a large bowl (discard the seasoning packets or save for another use) and pour the boiling water over them. Let sit for 6 minutes, stirring every now and then to break up the noodle blocks. Drain and rinse under cold water. Set aside.
1: In a small bowl, combine the garlic, cornstarch, sesame oil, lime juice, and soy sauce. Stir well, then set aside.
2: Place the broccoli in a large, microwave-safe bowl and microwave for 1½ minutes, until soft. Set aside.
3: Heat 1 teaspoon of olive oil in a large, nonstick pan over high heat. Add the steak to the pan and toss with 2 tablespoons of the reserved sauce. Cook until browned, about 2 minutes. Remove from the pan and set aside.
4: Heat another teaspoon of olive oil in the pan, then add the onion. Cook, stirring often, until browned, about 4 minutes.
5: Add the broccoli and cook until lightly browned, about 2 minutes. Remove from the pan and set aside.
6: Add the remaining teaspoon of olive oil to the pan, then add the noodles and the remaining sauce. Cook, stirring constantly, until the noodles soak up the sauce. Return the cooked vegetables and steak to the pan and stir to distribute.
7: Transfer the noodles to a serving dish and garnish with green onions, cilantro, and sesame seeds, if using.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、white button mushroom (8oz)、butter (2tablespoons)、onion、ground beef (1lb)、garlic powder (2teaspoons)、flour (3tablespoons)、paprika (1teaspoon)、dry sherry (¼cup)、low sodium beef broth (4cups)、salt (1 ½teaspoons)、pepper (½teaspoon)、dry egg noodle (4cups)、sour cream (½cup)、fresh parsley (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Add olive to a large pan over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the mushrooms and cook until tender, 5 to 6 minutes. Transfer the mushrooms to a plate.
1: In the same pan, add the butter. Add the onion, ground beef, and garlic powder. Stir until the meat is browned, breaking it up as you stir.
2: Drain any excess fat and return the pan to the stove.
3: Add the flour and paprika. Stir until thick, about 1 to 2 minutes.
4: Add the sherry, and stir, scraping up any brown bits from the bottom of the pan.
5: Add the beef broth and bring the mixture to a boil.
6: Add the egg noodles, salt, and pepper. Reduce the heat to simmer. Cover the pan with a lid.
7: Stir often, until the noodles are tender, about 8 to 10 minutes.
8: Return the mushrooms to the pan and stir to combine.
9: Add the sour cream and stir. Top with chopped parsley.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs、paprika (1tablespoon)、salt、pepper、unsalted butter (3tablespoons)、garlic (3cloves)、heavy cream (½cup)、parmesan cheese (¼cup)、lemon、fresh baby spinach (2cups)、dried thyme (1teaspoon)、chicken broth (1cup)
instructions:
0: Season chicken thighs with salt, pepper, and paprika.
1: Melt 2 Tbsp. butter in a large oven-proof skillet over medium high heat. Add chicken, skin-side down, and sear both sides until golden brown. Drain excess fat and set aside.
2: Melt 1 Tbsp. butter in the skillet. Add garlic, stir until fragrant, then add chicken broth, heavy cream, Parmesan, lemon juice, thyme, and stir. Bring to boil, then reduce heat to low.
3: Stir in spinach, simmer until spinach has wilted and the sauce has thickened.
4: Return chicken to the skillet. Bake at 400˚F (200˚C) for 25 minutes.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bacon (6strips)、chicken breasts、spinach (5oz)、garlic (4cloves)、salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (1teaspoon)、milk (5cups)、penne pasta (1lb)、parmesan cheese (1cup)
instructions:
0: Cook the bacon in a large pot over medium-high heat until crispy.
1: Add the chicken and cook until no pink is showing. Remove the chicken.
2: Cook the spinach, garlic, salt, and pepper with the bacon until the spinach has wilted.
3: Put the chicken back in, add the milk, then stir.
4: Bring the milk to a boil, then add the pasta.
5: Stir constantly for about 10 minutes until the pasta is cooked.
6: Add the parmesan, then mix until the cheese has melted. Serve!
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:warm water (2 ½cups)、sugar (1teaspoon)、active dry yeast (2teaspoons)、all-purpose flour (7cups)、extra virgin olive oil (6tablespoons)、kosher salt (1 ½teaspoons)、semolina flour (¼cup)
instructions:
0: “Bloom” the yeast by sprinkling the sugar and yeast in the warm water. Let sit for 10 minutes, until bubbles form on the surface.
1: In a large bowl, combine the flour and salt. Make a well in the middle and add the olive oil and bloomed yeast mixture. Using a spoon, mix until a shaggy dough begins to form.
2: Once the flour is mostly hydrated, turn the dough out onto a clean work surface and knead for 10-15 minutes. The dough should be soft, smooth, and bouncy. Form the dough into a taut round.
3: Grease a clean, large bowl with olive oil and place the dough inside, turning to coat with the oil. Cover with plastic wrap. Let rise for at least an hour, or up to 24 hours.
4: Punch down the dough and turn it out onto a lightly floured work surface. Knead for another minute or so, then cut into 4 equal portions and shape into rounds.
5: Lightly flour the dough, then cover with a kitchen towel and let rest for another 30 minutes to an hour while you prepare the sauce and any other ingredients.
6: Preheat the oven as high as your oven will allow, between 450-500˚F (230-260˚C). Place a pizza stone, heavy baking sheet (turn upside down so the surface is flat), or cast iron skillet in the oven.
7: Meanwhile, make the tomato sauce: Add the salt to the can of tomatoes and puree with an immersion blender, or transfer to a blender or food processor, and puree until smooth.
8: Once the dough has rested, take a portion and start by poking the surface with your fingertips, until bubbles form and do not deflate.
9: Then, stretch and press the dough into a thin round. Make it thinner than you think it should be, as it will slightly shrink and puff up during baking.
10: Sprinkle semolina onto an upside down baking sheet and place the stretched crust onto it. Add the sauce and ingredients of your choice.
11: Slide the pizza onto the preheated pizza stone or pan. Bake for 15 minutes, or until the crust and cheese are golden brown.
12: Add any garnish of your preference.
13: Nutrition  Calories: 1691 Fat: 65 grams  Carbs: 211 grams Fiber: 12 grams  Sugars: 60 grams  Protein: 65 grams
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sirloin steak (2lb)、beef broth (1cup)、low sodium soy sauce (½cup)、brown sugar (¼cup)、sesame oil (1tablespoon)、garlic (4cloves)、cornstarch (4tablespoons)、water (4tablespoons)、broccoli (1head)、white rice
instructions:
0: In the insert of the crockpot, whisk together beef broth, soy sauce, sesame oil, minced garlic, and brown sugar.
1: Place slices of beef in the liquid and toss to coat.
2: Cover with lid and cook on low heat for 4 hours.
3: After 4 hours, whisk together cornstarch and water in small bowl. Pour into crock pot, add the broccoli and gently stir to combine.
4: Cover with lid and cook 30 minutes to cook broccoli and thicken sauce.
5: Serve with warm white rice.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (2tablespoons)、garlic (2cloves)、medium onion、fresh spinach (5oz)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、breadcrumb (⅓cup)、cream cheese (4oz)、shredded parmesan cheese (¼cup)、fresh dill (2tablespoons)、puff pastry (1sheet)、salmon fillet、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、egg
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
1: In a pan over medium heat, melt butter. Add the garlic and onions, cooking until translucent.
2: Add the spinach, salt, and pepper, cooking until spinach is wilted.
3: Add the breadcrumbs, cream cheese, parmesan, and dill, stirring until mixture is evenly combined. Remove from heat and set aside.
4: On a cutting board, smooth out the sheet of puff pastry. Place the salmon in the middle of the pastry and season both sides with salt and pepper.
5: Place several spoonfuls of the spinach mixture on top of the salmon, smoothing it out so that it does not spill over the sides.
6: Fold the edges of the puff pastry over the salmon and spinach, starting with the longer sides and then the shorter ends. Trim any excess pastry from the ends, then fold the ends on top. Flip the puff pastry-wrapped salmon over and transfer for a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
7: Brush the beaten egg on the top and sides of the pastry. Score the top of the pastry with a knife, cutting shallow diagonal lines to create a crosshatch pattern.
8: Brush the top again with the egg wash.
9: Bake for 20-25 minutes, until pastry is golden brown.
10: Slice, then serve!
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、onion、garlic (3cloves)、tomato paste (2tablespoons)、dried basil (1teaspoon)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、crushed tomato (28oz)、vegetable broth (6cups)、green lentil (⅓cup)、lasagna noodle (8oz)、spinach (3cups)、fresh basil
instructions:
0: In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook for 3-4 minutes, until semi-translucent.
1: Add the garlic, tomato paste, basil, and oregano, and cook for 2-3 more minutes, or until the onions are translucent and herbs are fragrant.
2: Add the crushed tomatoes, vegetable broth, and lentils, and bring to a boil. Increase heat to medium-high and cook for 10 minutes or until lentils are halfway tender.
3: Break apart the lasagna noodles into about 2-inch-long (5-cm) pieces and add to the pot. Let the soup cook for another 10-15 minutes, or until the pasta is al dente and the lentils are tender.
4: Stir in the spinach and let wilt, then serve immediately.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:lean ground beef (1lb)、small onion、canned kidney bean (15oz)、canned black bean (15oz)、canned corn kernels (15oz)、canned diced tomato (15oz)、tomato sauce (8oz)、taco seasoning (2tablespoons)、shredded cheddar cheese、sour cream、pico de gallo、avocado、tortilla chip、lime wedge、chopped cilantro
instructions:
0: Add the ground beef and onion to a large pot and stir until the beef is cooked through.
1: Drain excess liquid.
2: Add the kidney beans, black beans, corn, tomatoes, tomato sauce, and taco seasoning to the pot, and stir until combined.
3: Cook over medium heat for 10 minutes.
4: Serve with cheddar cheese, sour cream, pico de gallo, avocado, corn chips, lime wedges, and cilantro.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、salt、pepper、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、onion powder (1tablespoon)、swiss cheese (16slices)、ham (½lb)、peanut oil、all-purpose flour (1cup)、eggs、panko bread crumbs (2cups)
instructions:
0: Sprinkle the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and onion powder, tossing to coat evenly.
1: On a cutting board, place a chicken breast between two sheets of plastic wrap and pound until about ½ inch (1 cm) thick with a meat mallet, rolling pin, or heavy pan.
2: Remove the plastic wrap and place 2 slices of Swiss cheese, then 2 slices of ham, then another layer of Swiss cheese, and another layer of ham. Evenly roll the chicken and place onto a new sheet of plastic wrap.
3: Wrap the chicken in the plastic wrap tightly and use the excess plastic on the sides to twist, firming up the roll of chicken cordon bleu as you work. Tie the excess plastic. Repeat with the remaining ingredients, then chill the rolls in the fridge to set for 30 minutes.
4: Meanwhile, preheat a tall-sided pan with 2 inches (5 cm) of oil to 325°F (170°C).
5: After the rolls are set, prepare 2 separate large, wide dishes with the flour, beaten egg, and bread crumbs. Dredge the chicken first in the flour, then the egg, and then bread crumbs.
6: Place the breaded chicken cordon bleu in the oil and cook for about 5 minutes per side, or until the outside is an even golden brown. If a good color is achieved and the chicken’s center is still not 165°F (75°C), place the chicken cordon bleu on a wire rack set over a baking sheet and finish the chicken in the oven at 325°F (170°C) until that temperature is reached.
7: Meanwhile, prepare the sauce. In a 1 ½-quart saucepan over medium heat, melt the butter and cook the garlic until soft. Add the flour and whisk for 1 minute.
8: Add the milk and whisk until fully combined with the roux and no lumps remain. Continue whisking until the mixture comes to a simmer and has thickened.
9: Add the mustard, Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper and whisk to combine. Remove the pan from the heat.
10: Slice the chicken and serve drizzled with Dijon sauce.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (4tablespoons)、raw shrimp (1lb)、asparagus (1lb)、salt (1teaspoon)、crushed red pepper (½teaspoon)、garlic (1teaspoon)、ginger (1teaspoon)、low sodium soy sauce (1tablespoon)、lemon juice (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: In a large frying pan, heat 2 tablespoons olive oil over medium-high heat.
1: Add shrimp to the pan, then season with ½ teaspoon of salt and ½ teaspoon crushed red pepper. Cook until the shrimp is pink. Remove the shrimp from the pan and set aside.
2: In the same pan, heat 2 tablespoons olive oil and add asparagus.
3: Add ginger and garlic, then season with ½ teaspoon of salt. Stir frequently and cook until the asparagus is tender-crisp.
4: Return the shrimp to the pan, then add soy sauce. Stir until the ingredients are well combined. Just before the dish is ready, add lemon juice, stir once more, then serve while hot.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:shrimp (1lb)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、butter (1tablespoon)、garlic (2cloves)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、milk (1 ½cups)、chicken broth (1 ½cups)、fettuccine pasta (8oz)、spinach (4cups)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、italian seasoning (½teaspoon)、grated parmesan cheese (¼cup)
instructions:
0: In a heated pot, melt butter and olive oil. Add garlic and shrimp, seasoning with salt and pepper.
1: Cook until shrimp is pink, then put aside.
2: In the same pot, add milk, broth, and pasta.
3: Cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, so that the pasta does not stick to each other.
4: Once pasta is al dente, add in spinach, salt, pepper, seasoning, and cheese, and mix until spinach is wilted and everything is coated in the sauce.
5: Add the shrimp back in and give it a stir until fully incorporated.
6: Serve with some extra parmesan cheese, if desired.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、chicken breasts、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、garlic (3cloves)、flour (2tablespoons)、chicken broth (1cup)、skim milk (1cup)、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (¼teaspoon)、spinach (2cups)、whole grain penne pasta (2cups)、parmesan cheese (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Heat the olive oil over a skillet and add chicken. Season with salt and pepper, and cook 5-8 minutes, or until no longer pink.
1: Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
2: In the same pan, add the garlic and sauté for one minute over medium heat.
3: Sprinkle the flour over the garlic and slowly add in the chicken stock.
4: Quickly stir to avoid lumps.
5: Add in the skim milk, stir ,and allow to reach a boil to thicken sauce. Season with salt and pepper.
6: Once the sauce is thickened, add in the spinach and stir until wilted.
7: Remove from heat and add in the cooked penne, chicken, and parmesan. Stir to coat.
8: Top with fresh parmesan.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken thighs、salt、pepper、garlic (6cloves)、small onion、brown sugar (½cup)、chicken broth (½cup)、fresh thyme (1tablespoon)、fresh parsley (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Season the chicken thighs with salt and pepper.
1: Heat a cast-iron skillet or pan over medium-high heat, and add the chicken skin side down.
2: Cook the chicken until it has a dark brown and crispy skin. Flip the chicken and cook until the chicken is cooked through, about 5 more minutes. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
3: Add the garlic and onion to the remaining chicken fat and cook, stirring frequently until the onions are softened and caramelized.
4: Add the brown sugar, chicken broth, thyme, and parsley and stir to combine. Bring the sauce to a boil and and cook for 1-2 minutes, until slightly reduced.
5: Add the chicken back to the pan and coat it in the garlic brown sugar sauce.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:avocado、egg yolk、heavy cream (½cup)、garlic (1clove)、lemon、parmesan cheese (½cup)、bacon (3strips)、spaghetti (½lb)、olive oil (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Blend avocado, egg yolk, garlic, and lemon juice in a powerful blender or food processor.
1: Pulse to blend and add heavy cream gradually. Blend the sauce until smooth and set aside.
2: Cut up strips of bacon and cook in a large pan. Set aside.
3: In a large pot, bring water to a boil and cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
4: Drain and coat with olive oil.
5: Add sauce, bacon, parmesan, salt and pepper, stirring until well-combined.
6: Serve and sprinkle with parmesan.
7: Enjoy!

instructions:

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:ribeye steak (1 ½lb)、onion、garlic cloves (3cloves)、pear、spring onions、brown sugar (3tablespoons)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、soy sauce (⅓cup)、sesame oil (3tablespoons)、canola oil (1tablespoon)、sesame seed (1teaspoon)、cooked rice (2cups)、Banchan (Korean side dishes)
instructions:
0: Slice the beef as thinly as you can, then set aside in a large bowl. Using frozen or cold beef will make the slicing easier.
1: In a blender or food processor, blend the onion chunks, garlic, pear, green onion pieces, brown sugar, pepper, soy sauce, and sesame oil until smooth.
2: Pour the marinade over the beef, add the thinly sliced onion, then mix to coat evenly. Cover with plastic wrap and marinate in the fridge for at least 30 minutes, or overnight.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ribeye steak、salt、pepper、canola oil (3tablespoons)、butter (3tablespoons)、garlic (3cloves)、fresh rosemary (2sprigs)、fresh thyme (3sprigs)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 200°F (95°C).
1: Generously season all sides of the steak with salt and pepper.
2: Transfer to a wire rack on top of a baking sheet, then bake for about 45 minutes to an hour until the internal temperature reads about 125°F (51° C) for medium-rare. Adjust the bake time based on if you like your steak more rare or more well-done (you monster).
3: Heat the canola oil in a pan over high heat until smoking. Do not use olive oil, as its smoke point is significantly lower than that of canola oil and will smoke before reaching the desired cooking temperature.
4: Sear the steak for 30 seconds on the first side, then flip.
5: Add the butter, garlic, rosemary, and thyme and swirl around the pan.
6: Transfer the garlic and herbs on top of the steak and baste the steak with the butter using a large spoon.
7: Baste for about 30 seconds, then flip and baste the other side for about 15 seconds.
8: Turn the steak on its side and cook to render off any excess fat.
9: Rest the steak on a cutting board or wire rack for about 10 minutes. Slicing the steak before the resting period has finished will result in a lot of the juices leaking out, which may not be desirable.
10: Slice the steak into ½ -inch (1 cm) strips, then fan out the slices and serve.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

7: Heat the oil in a large pan over medium heat. Preheat oven to 180°C.
8: Fry the chicken until golden brown on both sides.
9: Place ⅔ of the tomato sauce evenly on the bottom of a baking dish. Place the chicken on top.
10: Top with the rest of the tomato sauce, then sprinkle the parmesan and basil on top.

12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless skinless chicken thighs (1 ½lb)、sea salt (1teaspoon)、ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、garlic (1tablespoon)、dried thyme (2teaspoons)、dried rosemary (1teaspoon)、chicken stock (½cup)、sun-dried tomato (⅓cup)、heavy cream (1cup)、grated parmesan cheese (½cup)、fresh parsley (2tablespoons)、steam cauliflower rice
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Season the chicken thighs on both sides with ½ teaspoon salt and ¼ teaspoon black pepper.
2: Heat a 10-inch cast iron skillet over high heat. Once the skillet is hot, add the olive oil and the chicken thighs.  Cook for 3–4 minutes, or until the edges are seared.  Remove the chicken from the skillet and transfer to a clean plate.
3: Reduce the heat to medium-low.  Add the garlic thyme, and rosemary to the pan and sauté for 2–3 minutes, until fragrant.
4: Pour in the chicken stock, then add the sun-dried tomatoes and heavy cream. Season with the remaining ½ teaspoon salt and ¼ teaspoon pepper. Bring to a simmer and cook for 1–2 minutes, to let the flavors meld, then add the Parmesan cheese and stir until melted.
5: Return the chicken thighs to the skillet, nestling into the sauce. Drizzle some of the sauce over the chicken.
6: Transfer the skillet to the oven and bake for 15 minutes until the chicken is cooked through.
7: Remove from the oven and let sit for 5 minutes, until cooled slightly and the sauce thickens.
8: Garnish with the parsley, then serve the chicken over cauliflower rice with more sauce spooned on top.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:potatoes、grated parmesan cheese (2cups)、salt (3teaspoons)、olive oil (4tablespoons)、sweet onion、ground beef (1lb)、diced tomato (14 ½oz)、fresh parsley (4tablespoons)、paprika (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、spinach (6cups)、garlic (2cloves)、ricotta cheese (1cup)、shredded mozzarella cheese (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: Using a knife or mandolin cut the potatoes into slices ⅛-inch (3 mm) thick.
2: On a parchment paper-lined baking sheet, sprinkle half of the Parmesan cheese and spread until it is evenly covering the parchment paper.
3: Place the potatoes over the parmesan so each potato is overlapping the previous potato both vertically and horizontally. Continue until the entire pan is filled with potatoes.
4: Sprinkle to rest of the Parmesan evenly over the potatoes. Season with 1 teaspoon of salt. Bake for 30 minutes, until golden and the potatoes are flexible and slightly crispy.
5: In a skillet heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onions, and cook until caramelized, about 15 minutes.
6: Add the beef break up and mix with the onion until cooked. Mix in the tomatoes, 3 tablespoons of parsley, paprika, 1 teaspoon of salt, and pepper. Stir, cooking until the beef is browned and cooked through. Remove from heat.
7: In a skillet heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat. Add the spinach, cook until wilted. Add 1 teaspoon of salt and the garlic. Stir to combine. Remove from heat.
8: In a bowl combine the spinach mixture and the ricotta. Set aside.
9: Evenly spread the spinach mixture over the cooked potato sheet.
10: Evenly spread the beef mixture over the spinach. Sprinkle mozzarella over the beef.
11: Take one end of the potato sheet holding the parchment paper begin rolling upward, making sure the ingredients are not coming out the ends.
12: Once the it is completely rolled place the potato roll on the parchment paper and bake for 15 minutes.
13: Sprinkle with parsley for garnish. Slice and serve immediately.
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instructions:

1: In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef and marinara sauce.
2: In a separate large bowl, combine the ricotta, Parmesan, parsley, basil, salt, pepper, and olive oil.

Spread 2 cups of the ricotta mixture over the noodles. Top with 1 cup of mozzarella cheese. Repeat with the remaining meat sauce, noodles, ricotta, and mozzarella to make 2 more layers.
4: Bake the lasagna for 25–30 minutes, until the cheese is melted and the sauce is bubbling up through the layers. Turn the broiler to high and broil for 1–2 minutes, until the top layer of cheese is bubbly and golden brown.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instructions:

5: Stir in the white wine and simmer 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally.

instructions:
0: Heat olive oil in a large stock pot or dutch oven over medium-high heat.
1: Add onion and cook until onion becomes translucent and begins to brown, about 3-5 minutes.
2: Add garlic, ginger, and jalapeño. Continue to cook over medium heat until garlic is fragrant and jalapeño is tender, about 3-4 minutes.
3: Add garam masala, turmeric, salt, and pepper then continue to cook for 1-2 minutes.
4: Add tomatoes, chickpeas, and water. Stir to incorporate, making sure to use the spoon the scrape off any brown bits that have appeared on the bottom or sides of the pot.
5: As the tomatoes break down, the mixture should take on the texture of a thick stew. Add more water if needed before bringing everything to a simmer and then cover with a lid.
6: Once covered, cook for 15 minutes while stirring occasionally. 
7: Remove lid, reduce heat to low and mix in the lemon juice and chopped cilantro. Cook over low heat 1-2 minutes until the cilantro has wilted and turned bright green.
8: Serve over basmati rice or with a side of naan.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cream cheese (16oz)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、fresh chives (¼cup)、shredded provolone cheese (1cup)、bacon (4strips)、boneless pork chops、salt、pepper、flour (2cups)、eggs、panko breadcrumbs (2cups)、canola oil (4tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
1: In a large bowl, combine cream cheese, pepper, garlic powder, chives, provolone, and bacon, stirring until thoroughly mixed. Set aside.
2: Season all sides of the pork chops with salt and pepper.
3: Carefully cut a pocket through the side of the pork chop in order to create a cavity. Stuff the cavity with a generous spoonful of the cream cheese mixture and press around the edges of the pork to seal it in. Repeat with the remaining pork chops.
4: Dip the stuffed pork chops in the flour, shaking off excess, then the egg, then the breadcrumbs. Repeat with the remaining pork chops.
5: Heat the oil in a pan over medium heat. Fry the pork chops for about one to two minutes, then flip. Remove from the heat and bake for 15-20 minutes, until cheese is bubbling and starting to brown.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、salt、pepper、all-purpose flour (1cup)、eggs、italian bread crumbs (2cups)、vegetable oil、ricotta cheese (2cups)、marinara sauce (24oz)、lasagna noodles、shredded mozzarella cheese (1 ½cups)、shredded parmesan cheese (1 ½cups)、fresh basil
instructions:
0: Cut chicken breasts in half (pound thin if necessary) and season with salt and pepper.
1: Add the flour, 4 eggs, and bread crumbs to 3 separate shallow dishes. Beat the eggs. Coat the chicken in the flour, then the eggs, and finally in the bread crumbs.
2: Heat the vegetable oil in a cast iron skillet over medium heat. Fry the chicken on both sides until golden brown, about 4 minutes  on each side. Let drain on paper towels.
3: In a medium bowl, combine the ricotta cheese and the remaining egg.
4: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
5: Spread about ⅓ of the marinara sauce over the bottom of a casserole dish. Top with 4 lasagna noodles, ½ of the ricotta mixture, and 3 chicken cutlets. Sprinkle with ½ cup of mozzarella and ½ cup of Parmesan cheese. Repeat to make another layer, then finish with the remaining sauce and mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses.
6: Cover with foil and bake for 45-60 minutes, uncovering the lasagna for the last 10 minutes of baking.
7: Serve with a sprinkle of fresh basil.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:andouille sausages、shrimp (1lb)、red potatoes、corn (2pieces)、oil (2tablespoons)、butter (1tablespoon)、garlic (4cloves)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
1: In a small bowl, combine the Cajun spice mix ingredients and stir to combine.
2: In a baking dish, combine potatoes, corn, 2 garlic cloves, 1 tablespoon of oil, and ½ tablespoon of the cajun spice mix.
3: Mix until the vegetables are coated evenly with the spice mix. Place butter on top.
4: Bake for 25 minutes.
5: In a medium bowl, combine the sausage, shrimp, garlic, oil, and ½ tablespoon of the spice mix. Save the remaining spice mix for future recipes.
6: Mix well.
7: Add the sausage and shrimp into the same baking dish as the corn and potatoes.
8: Bake for another 15 minutes.
9: Top with fresh parsley. Serve with lemon wedges and beer!
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:yellow bell pepper、green bell pepper、red bell pepper、mushroom (2 ½cups)、medium yellow onion、chili powder (1tablespoon)、paprika (1tablespoon)、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、cumin (1tablespoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、olive oil (3tablespoons)、penne pasta (4cups)、sour cream (1 ½cups)、shredded pepper jack  cheese (3cups)、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: In a nonstick baking dish, add the bell peppers, mushrooms, and onion.
2: In a small bowl, combine the chili powder, paprika, garlic powder, cumin, salt, and pepper.
3: Pour the olive oil and half of the spice mix over the vegetables and toss well to coat.
4: Bake the vegetables for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally, until tender.
5: In a large pot of boiling water, cook the pasta according to the package instructions, until tender.
6: Drain the pasta, reserving about 1 cup (240 ml) of cooking water.
7: Return the drained pasta to the pot and add the roasted vegetables. Add the rest of the spice mix, the reserved pasta water, and the sour cream and mix to combine.
8: Transfer the pasta mixture to the baking dish used for roasting the vegetables and spread evenly. Sprinkle the cheese over the top.
9: Bake for about 15 minutes, until the cheese is golden brown.
10: Let cool for about 5 minutes, then serve. Garnish with parsley, if desired.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、mushrooms (2cups)、onion (½cup)、garlic (2cloves)、ground beef (1lb)、paprika (2teaspoons)、beef stock (4cups)、egg noodles (8oz)、sour cream (½cup)、cornstarch slurry (1tablespoon)、fresh parsley、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: In a 6-quart (5 L) Dutch oven, heat olive oil. Add mushrooms and season with salt and pepper.
1: Add the onions and garlic. Cook until onions are translucent.
2: Add the ground beef and cook until brown. Stir in the paprika.
3: Add beef stock and egg noodles. Give it a stir and cover. Simmer for 15-20 minutes. Lower the heat.
4: Add the sour cream and cornstarch slurry. Stir until thickened.
5: Serve and garnish with parsley.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、egg、flour (¾cup)、green pepper、red pepper、rice
instructions:
0: Season the chicken with salt and pepper.
1: Cut the chicken into thin strips then coat in the egg wash and flour.
2: Shallow fry for a few minutes on each side, until golden brown. 
3: Add the peppers and fry for another couple of minutes. Remove the chicken and peppers and set aside.
4: In the same pan, add the garlic, red chilli, soy sauce, tomato purée, and water. Stir and simmer the mixture reduces and is thick and syrupy.
5: Add back in the chicken and peppers and stir well in the sauce.
6: Serve with rice.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:soy sauce (⅓cup)、ginger (1tablespoon)、garlic (1tablespoon)、oyster sauce (1tablespoon)、sesame oil (1tablespoon)、sugar (1tablespoon)、red pepper flakes (¼teaspoon)、pepper、chicken breasts、onion、celery (3stalks)、carrots、cabbage (3cups)、ramen noodle (2packages)、chicken broth (1 ½cups)
instructions:
0: In a bowl, mix soy sauce, ginger, garlic, oyster sauce, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, and pepper.
1: Place chicken cubes into a re-sealable plastic bag pour half of the marinade into the bag and save the rest for later.
2: Let the chicken marinate in the refrigerator for at least an hour.
3: Pour the marinated chicken into a large pot and cook over medium-high heat. Remove chicken from the pot.
4: Add sesame oil to the bottom of the pot and add the onion, celery, carrots, and cabbage. Sauté until the onions are translucent.
5: Place both of the ramen noodle bricks into the bottom of the pot.
6: Pour in chicken broth over the noodles.
7: Cover the noodles with the vegetables as much as possible. Cover the pot with a lid and simmer for 5-7 minutes or until the noodles are cooked through.
8: Break up the noodles and add back the chicken, and pour in the rest of the marinade from earlier.
9: Garnish with scallions.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:salt、penne pasta (8oz)、broccoli floret (2cups)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、boneless, skinless chicken breasts、pepper、butter (¼cup)、garlic (3cloves)、heavy cream (1cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、nutmeg (⅛teaspoon)、black pepper (¼teaspoon)、grated parmesan cheese (1 ½cups)、red pepper flake
instructions:
0: Bring a quart (950 ML) of water in a large pot to a boil over high heat, and salt to taste.
1: Cook pasta for 8 minutes, or until slightly underdone.
2: Add broccoli to pasta and simmer for 4 minutes with the lid on.
3: Strain the pasta and broccoli in a colander, and run cold water over to prevent the broccoli from over cooking.
4: Heat the olive oil in the pot over medium-high heat, and add the chicken. Season the chicken with season salt and pepper.
5: Once the chicken is cooked through, remove it from the pot and set aside.
6: Add the butter to the pot, and melt it. Once butter is fully melted, add in garlic and stir continuously for 10 seconds.
7: Add the heavy cream, salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Stir often, and cook until sauce starts to bubble slightly.
8: Once the sauce is bubbling and begins to cook down, add in Parmesan cheese and stir until the sauce thickens.
9: Add in the cooked chicken, pasta, and broccoli, and stir until fully combined.
10: Top with Parmesan cheese or red chili flakes.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:water (2cups)、salt、quinoa (1cup)、fresh spinach (2cups)、large cucumber、roma tomatoes、ripe avocados、lemon、extra virgin olive oil (4tablespoons)、pepper
instructions:
0: In a small saucepan, bring the water and a pinch of salt to a boil. Add the quinoa, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes, or until the water is absorbed. Transfer to a medium bowl to cool to room temperature, then fluff the quinoa.
1: Refrigerate the quinoa for 20 minutes.
2: Add the spinach, cucumber, tomatoes, and avocado to the bowl of quinoa and mix to combine.
3: Add the lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper, and mix well.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (3tablespoons)、shrimp (1lb)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、garlic (3cloves)、red chili flakes (½teaspoon)、fresh parsley (1tablespoon)、lemon juice (3tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Melt butter in a pan over medium heat.
1: Spread the shrimp around in the pan in a single layer, sprinkling the salt and pepper on top, then cook until the butter is starting to turn a dark brown. Flip the shrimp, add the garlic and chili flakes, and cook for about 15-30 seconds.
2: Add the parsley and lemon juice, reducing the lemon juice down to a sauce, then remove from heat.
3: Serve and enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium russet potatoes、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、egg、all-purpose flour (1 ½cups)、butter (2tablespoons)、sage leaf
instructions:
0: Add the potatoes to a large pot of cool salted water. Bring the water to a boil and cook for 20-25 minutes, or until a fork can easily pierce a potato. Drain the potatoes and set aside until cool enough to handle but still warm.
1: Using a peeler or your fingers, remove the skin from the potatoes. In a medium bowl, mash the potatoes until all lumps are gone. Add the salt and pepper and mix well. Make a well in the center of the potatoes and crack an egg into it. Whisk the eggs briefly. Then, using your hands, gently mix it into the potatoes until evenly distributed.
2: Put 1 cups of flour onto a clean surface and turn out the potato dough onto it, keeping the remaining ½ cup close by in case you need it. Working quickly and carefully, knead the dough, only incorporating as much flour as you need along the way until the dough loses stickiness and becomes more solid. Slice the dough into 4 parts. Roll out 1 part into a long rope, about 1 inch wide, cutting in half and working with 1 half at a time if the rope is becoming too long. Slice the rope into ½-inch squares and set aside on a lightly floured surface. Repeat with the remaining dough.
3: If desired, place a fork on your work surface and slide each gnocchi square from the base of the fork prongs to the top so they make a decorative shape.
4: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and add the gnocchi in batches, stirring gently once or twice to ensure they are not sticking. Boil until they float to the surface; after another 15-30 seconds in the water, remove.
5: In a pan over medium heat, melt butter and add the sage. Add the gnocchi and toss until lightly golden.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bacon (6strips)、boneless, skinless chicken breasts、salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、onions、garlic (4cloves)、spinach (5oz)、milk (5cups)、fettuccine (1lb)、pesto (½cup)、parmesan cheese (1cup)、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: In a large pot or Dutch oven over medium-high heat, cook the bacon until crispy. Add chicken and season with salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Cook until the chicken is no longer pink, then remove from the pot and set aside.
1: Add the onions and garlic and cook to the pot and cook until softened. When onions are caramelized, add spinach and cook until wilted. Add the milk and bring to boil. Add the fettuccine to the boiling milk and cover. Cook the fettuccine over medium heat until the milk thickens and the pasta is cooked, about 7 minutes.
2: Return the chicken to the pot. Stir in the pesto and Parmesan. Garnish with parsley and more Parmesan.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:low-sodium chicken stock (6cups)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、shallot、shiitake mushroom (1lb)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、garlic (2cloves)、fresh thyme (1teaspoon)、salt、pepper、arborio rice (1 ½cups)、white wine (½cup)、grated parmesan cheese (1cup)、fresh parsley (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Add the stock to a medium pot and bring to a boil over high heat. Once the stock is boiling, reduce the heat to low or remove the pan from the heat and keep nearby.
1: Heat the olive oil in a wide, tall pot over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the shallot and cook, stirring frequently, until translucent.
2: Add the shiitake mushrooms and butter. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the mushrooms have cooked down.
3: Add the garlic, thyme, salt, and pepper, stir, and cook for 1 minute, until the butter has melted and the garlic is aromatic.
4: Add the rice and stir until fully coated in the mushroom mixture. Let the rice toast for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.
5: Add the white wine and cook until the wine has evaporated, stirring occasionally.
6: Add 1 cup (240 ml) of the hot stock and stir to combine. Cook, stirring frequently, until the stock is fully absorbed.
7: Continue to add the stock, ½ cup (120 ml) at a time, stirring continuously, until the broth is fully absorbed, for 15-20 minutes. Depending on how fast the rice cooks, there may be leftover stock.
8: Once the rice is al dente, remove from the heat. Add the Parmesan and stir to combine.
9: Top with parsley, Parmesan, salt, and pepper.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、cooked andouille sausage (1lb)、olive oil (4tablespoons)、garlic (3cloves)、bell peppers、medium onion、milk (6cups)、fettuccine pasta (1lb)、parmesan cheese (¾cup)、fresh parsley (3tablespoons)
instructions:
0: In a small bowl, combine all spices for the cajun seasoning and mix together. Set aside. Store any extra in an airtight container for future use.
1: In a heavy bottom pot (such as a Dutch oven), heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat.
2: Add the sliced chicken and 2½ tablespoons of the prepared cajun seasoning.
3: Add the andouille sausage and cook until the chicken is no longer pink, about 4-5 minutes.
4: Remove the meat from the pot and add the remaining olive oil.
5: Add the garlic, diced peppers and onions and cook until the onions are transparent and softened, about 5 minutes.
6: Add the milk and stir so that the seasoning is incorporated into the liquid.
7: Turn the heat to high and bring to a boil.
8: Add the uncooked fettuccine, stirring constantly until the noodles are al dente, about 10 minutes.
9: On low heat, add the meat back in and stir so that it’s evenly incorporated.
10: Add the cheese and parsley, and stir. Remove from the heat.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、large sweet potato、broccoli (1head)、garlic (4cloves)、fresh rosemary (2tablespoons)、paprika (1tablespoon)、salt、pepper、olive oil (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil. Lay out the sweet potato, chicken breasts, and broccoli.
1: Evenly distribute the garlic, rosemary, paprika, salt, and pepper over the entire pan. Drizzle with olive oil.
2: Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 35-40 minutes (or until the internal temperature of the chicken reaches 165°F (75°C) and the juices run clear).
3: Serve up and dinner’s ready! For an easy cleanup, just carefully toss the aluminum foil and you’re good to go.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:onion、garlic (2cloves)、coriander powder (2teaspoons)、cumin (1teaspoon)、turmeric (1teaspoon)、chili flakes (1pinch)、salt (1pinch)、ginger、tomatoes、lentils (4tablespoons)、coconut cream (4tablespoons)、broccoli (1 ⅓cups)、chickpeas (1can)、spinach (½cup)、lemon
instructions:
0: Fry the onion and garlic in a little oil for 3 minutes.
1: Add all of the spices, the salt, the ginger and cook for a further 2 minutes.
2: Add the tomatoes, the lentils and coconut cream, cover and simmer on a low heat for 15 minutes until the lentils are tender.
3: Stir in the broccoli and cook for a further 4 minutes.
4: Stir in the chickpeas, spinach, and lemon juice and cook a further 3 minutes until the spinach is slightly wilted.
5: Serve with natural yogurt and some chopped coriander.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large, boneless, skinless chicken breast、salt、pepper、flour、butter (3tablespoons)、chicken broth (½cup)、lemon、caper (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Butterfly the chicken breast and pound it thin. Salt and pepper to taste.
1: Dredge each piece in flour, shaking off the excess.
2: In a skillet over high heat, melt three Tbsp. butter, and brown the chicken, the browner and crispier the better, 3–5 minutes on each side.
3: Remove chicken from the skillet, and, in the same pan, add chicken stock, lemon, and capers.
4: Boil until the sauce reduces by ⅓, and return the chicken to the skillet.
5: Spoon sauce over the chicken several times.
6: Serve immediately, with the remaining sauce poured over the chicken.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:canola oil (2tablespoons)、boneless, skinless chicken breasts、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、garlic (2cloves)、broccoli floret (2cups)、milk (2cups)、shredded parmesan cheese (1cup)、fresh parsley (¼cup)、bacon (4strips)、spaghetti (½lb)
instructions:
0: Heat oil in a pot over medium-high heat.
1: Cook the chicken with the salt and pepper.
2: Add the garlic and broccoli, cooking for 1-2 minutes.
3: Add the milk, parmesan, parsley, and bacon, bringing to a boil.
4: Add the spaghetti, and toss until evenly coated and sauce sticks to the noodles.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、onion powder (½teaspoon)、flour (1cup)、eggs、seasoned breadcrumb (1cup)、marinara sauce (2cups)、fresh mozzarella cheese (8slices)、grated parmesan cheese (½cup)、fresh basil、vegetable oil
instructions:
0: Cut the chicken breasts in half widthwise to make 4 thin breasts.
1: Season the chicken with salt, pepper, and onion powder.
2: Coat the chicken in flour, then egg, and then bread crumbs.
3: Pour oil in a cast-iron skillet to come ¼ inch (½ cm) up the side. Heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and fry on both sides until brown, about 4 minutes.
4: Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain.
5: Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C).
6: Place the fried chicken breasts in a baking dish. If they don’t fit side by side, gently overlap them. Pour the marinara over the chicken.
7: Top with mozzarella slices and Parmesan.
8: Bake for 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is browned and bubbling.
9: Serve with freshly chopped basil.
