instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large pineapple、peanut or vegetable oil (2tablespoons)、boneless chicken thighs、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、hoisin sauce (1tablespoon)、soy sauce (1tablespoon)、brown sugar (1tablespoon)、garlic paste (1tablespoon)、chicken stock (½cup)、cooked rice、sesame seed
instructions:
0: Using a sharp knife, carefully cut the pineapple in half lengthwise. Using the knife tip, cut around the inside edge of the pineapple, being careful not to cut through the skin. Slice down and across the pineapple flesh, then scoop out the  pineapple cubes with a spoon. Discard the core and set the flesh aside.
1: In a large pan, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the chicken and season with salt and pepper. Fry for about 10 minutes, until browned and cooked through. Remove the chicken and set aside.
2: Add the cubed pineapple, hoisin sauce, soy sauce, brown sugar, and garlic paste and cook for a few minutes. Stir in the chicken stock, bring to a boil, then simmer, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has reduced and thickened.
3: Add the chicken back to the pan and stir until evenly coated with the sauce. Serve in the empty pineapple halves, along with some rice and sesame seeds.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil、onion、garlic (3cloves)、tomato paste (2tablespoons)、grape tomato (1pt)、salt、pepper、vegetable broth (2 ½cups)、non-dairy milk (2 ½cups)、dried pasta (16oz)、fresh spinach (5oz)、nutritional yeast (⅓cup)
instructions:
0: In a large pot over medium heat, add the olive oil and onion and cook for 3-5 minutes until semi-translucent.
1: Add the garlic and tomato paste and cook for 3 more minutes, stirring occasionally.
2: Add the tomatoes and cook for 3-5 more minutes, until the skins begin to wrinkle and tomatoes begin to release liquid.
3: Season with salt and pepper, than add the vegetable broth, non-dairy milk, and pasta and stir until combined.
4: Bring to a boil, then cover, reduce heat, and let simmer for 10 minutes or until most liquid is absorbed.
5: Add the spinach and stir until wilted.
6: Add the nutritional yeast and stir until combined.
7: Remove from heat and serve immediately.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:black beans (2cans)、onion、garlic (3cloves)、carrots、quick-cook oats (½cup)、soy sauce (1tablespoon)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、cumin (1teaspoon)、coriander (½teaspoon)、chili powder (½teaspoon)、cayenne pepper (¼teaspoon)、salt、pepper、buns
instructions:
0: Heat one tablespoon of olive oil in a pan. Combine onions, garlic, salt, and pepper and cook until onions are translucent.
1: Add carrots, cumin, coriander, chili powder, and cayenne pepper until carrots are tender. Remove pan from heat.
2: In a bowl, mash the beans and then add the contents of the pan along with the soy sauce and quick oats.
3: Mix and form four patties. Place in freezer for 30 minutes to set.
4: Cook patties on a pan coated in cooking spray over medium heat, flipping halfway.
5: Use patties to create your dream veggie burger.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (6tablespoons)、onion、flour (½cup)、chicken broth (3cups)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、heavy cream (1cup)、frozen mixed vegetable (2 ½cups)、rotisserie chicken、biscuit dough (2tubes)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: In a large pot over medium-high heat, melt the butter.
2: Add the onion, stir until softened. About 1 minute.
3: Whisk in the flour, stirring constantly to prevent the flour from browning. About 1 minute.
4: Whisk in the chicken broth, salt, and pepper. Continue to whisk until no lumps remain.
5: Whisk in the heavy cream. Bring to a light simmer until the sauce has thickened slightly. Test for additional salt/pepper.
6: Add the mixed vegetables and shredded chicken, stir until fully incorporated.
7: Transfer to a 9x13-inch (23x33 cm) baking dish.
8: Evenly top with 12 pieces of biscuit dough (you will have extra biscuits, which can be baked off separately).
9: Bake in a preheated oven for 20 minutes, until the biscuits are golden and the gravy mixture is bubbling.
10: Cool slightly before serving.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chuck roast (3lb)、salt、pepper、dried onion soup mix (1oz)、onion、gold potatoes、large carrots、water (½cup)
instructions:
0: Place the chuck roast in a 7-quart (6 ½ liters) slow cooker and season with salt and pepper.
1: Sprinkle the onion soup pack and top with vegetables and water.
2: Cook on low for 8 hours, or high for 4-5 hours.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:long grain rice (1cup)、black pepper (¼teaspoon)、onion powder (½teaspoon)、cream of chicken (1can)、shredded cheddar cheese (1cup)、broccoli (2cups)、chicken broth (1 ½cups)、cheddar cheese
instructions:
0: Heat oven to 375°F (190°C).
1: In a casserole dish, combine rice, pepper, onion powder, cream of chicken, cheese, broccoli, and chicken stock. Mix until everything is combined.
2: Lay chicken on top of the rice mixture. Space evenly.
3: Cover with foil and bake for 50 minutes.
4: Take off cover and top the chicken with more cheese. Bake uncovered for another 5 minutes or until cheese is melted.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (2tablespoons)、shrimp (1lb)、salt、black pepper、garlic (3cloves)、bacon (½lb)、baby spinach (7oz)、heavy cream (1 ½cups)、fettuccine pasta (1lb)、grated parmesan cheese (¾cup)、fresh parsley (⅓cup)
instructions:
0: In a large pot, heat the butter over medium-high heat until browned.
1: Toss in the shrimp and season with salt and black pepper. Sear just until pink on both sides. Remove the shrimp from the pot and set aside.

ingredients:lobster tail (8oz)、butter (3tablespoons)、salt (1teaspoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、fresh parsley (1teaspoon)、lemon juice (1teaspoon)、lemon (2wedges)、broccoli
instructions:
0: Using a clean pair of scissors or kitchen shears, cut along the middle of the top of the shell towards the fins of the tail, making sure to cut in a straight line. Do not cut through the end of the tail.
1: Using a spoon, separate the meat from the two sides of the shell, then lift the meat up and out from inside the shell.
2: Press the two sides of the shell together, then lay the meat over the seam where the two shells meet.
3: If you are having difficulty opening the shell up to lift out the meat, flip the tail over and make cuts along the carapace where the legs meet the bottom part tail. This will help break the rigid structure of the shell and allow it to be more flexible.
4: While cutting through the shell, you may have also cut into the meat, which is perfectly okay. Make a shallow cut through the middle of the lobster meat so that you can peel down the thin layer of meat over the sides. This gives the lobster tail its signature look.
5: Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C).
6: In a small bowl, combine the butter, salt, pepper, garlic powder, paprika, lemon juice, and parsley, then brush the mixture evenly over the lobster meat.
7: Place the tails onto a baking sheet, then bake for approximately 12-15 minutes, until the lobster is fully cooked but not rubbery.
8: Serve with a side of broccoli and a lemon wedge.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、onion、ground beef (1lb)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、crushed tomato (28oz)、vodka (½cup)、red chili flake (½teaspoon)、heavy cream (½cup)、penne pasta (4cups)、fresh parsley、Parmesan (½cup)
instructions:
0: Heat oil in a large pot over high heat. Cook onion until translucent.
1: Add beef, salt, and pepper, cooking until all the moisture has evaporated and the beef is browned.
2: Add crushed tomatoes, vodka, and chili flakes, stirring and cooking until half of the liquid has evaporated and the sauce has reduced.
3: Add cream, stirring until evenly incorporated.
4: Stir in pasta until evenly coated.
5: Serve with parsley and parmesan.
6: Nutrition  Calories: 1753 Fat: 69 grams  Carbs: 193 grams Fiber: 13 grams  Sugars: 22 grams  Protein: 93 grams
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:russet potatoes、zucchinis、yellow squashes、red pepper、onion、sausage (2large links)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、garlic cloves、canned diced tomato (14.5oz)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
1: Layer all of the veggies and sausages on one or two 9x13 baking pans, depending on the size of the vegetables you use.
2: Drizzle on olive oil, and sprinkle on the garlic, diced tomato, salt, and pepper.
3: Bake uncovered for one hour.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:shrimp (1lb)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、red chili flakes (1teaspoon)、garlic (3cloves)、butter (6oz)、lemon juice (1teaspoon)、white wine (½cup)、linguine (8oz)、fresh parsley、red chili flake
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: In a medium-sized casserole pan, combine shrimp, salt, pepper, red chili flakes, garlic, butter, lemon juice, and white wine.
2: Bake for 10-13 minutes, or until shrimp turns pink and is fully cooked.
3: Bring 4 quarts of water to a boil, add salt to taste, and cook linguine pasta al dente according to package directions, stirring occasionally.
4: Strain linguine and combine with shrimp until pasta is fully coated in white wine scampi sauce.
5: Garnish with chopped Italian parsley.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (1cup)、garlic (7cloves)、fresh rosemary (2tablespoons)、fresh thyme (2tablespoons)、salt (2tablespoons)、pepper (1tablespoon)、boneless ribeye roast (5lb)、flour (2tablespoons)、beef stock (2cups)、mashed potato、green bean
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 500°F (260°C).
1: Mix together the butter, garlic, herbs, salt, and pepper in a bowl until evenly combined.
2: Rub the herb butter all over the rib roast, then place on a roasting tray with a rack.
3: Bake for 5 minutes per pound (10 minutes per kilo) of meat, so a 5-pound (2.2 kg) roast would bake for 25 minutes.
4: Turn off the heat and let the rib roast sit in the oven for 2 hours, making sure you do not open the oven door or else the residual heat will escape.
5: Once the 2 hours are up, remove the roast from the pan and pour the pan drippings into a saucepan over medium heat.
6: Add the flour, whisking until there are no lumps, then add the beef stock, stirring and bringing the sauce to a boil.
7: Remove from heat and strain the sauce into a gravy dish.
8: Carve the prime rib into ¾-inch (20 mm) slices.
9: Serve with the mashed potatoes, green beans, and sauce!
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium zucchinis、olive oil、garlic (2cloves)、fresh spinach (2cups)、ricotta cheese (1cup)、fresh basil (2tablespoons)、salt、pepper、marinara sauce (1cup)、shredded mozzarella cheese (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
1: Cut off the end of each zucchini then using a vegetable peeler, peel each zucchini into wide strips.
2: Transfer the zucchini strips to a plate then layer two strips vertically and two strips horizontally to make a cross. Repeat process with remaining strips.
3: Heat a pan over medium-high heat.
4: Add olive oil then garlic and sauté for 30 seconds to 1 minute.
5: Add spinach, salt, and pepper. Sauté for 1-2 minutes, until wilted down.
6: Remove from heat and allow to cool for 10 minutes.
7: In a large bowl, add the spinach and garlic. Add the ricotta, basil, salt, and pepper. Mix until well combined.
8: Using a spoon or cookie scoop, scoop approximately 1 tablespoon of the mixture and place in the middle of each zucchini noodle cross.
9: Fold each side to seal the ricotta mixture then flip over the ravioli so the seam side is on the bottom.
10: In a baking dish pour the marinara sauce then smooth with a spatula.
11: Evenly place the zucchini raviolis then top with mozzarella cheese.
12: Bake for 15-20 minutes.
13: Serve with fresh basil.
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breast (1 ⅓lb)、plain yogurt (½cup)、ginger garlic paste (2tablespoons)、chili powder (2tablespoons)、garam masala (1tablespoon)、salt (1tablespoon)、turmeric (1tablespoon)、cumin (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: On a cutting board, slice the chicken into bite size pieces.
1: Combine the chicken with the yogurt, ginger garlic paste, chili powder, garam masala, salt, turmeric, and cumin and mix to coat well.
2: Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 1 hour.
3: Preheat the oven 430˚F (220˚C).
4: Thread the marinated chicken pieces onto bamboo skewers, then place them over a baking tray lined with parchment paper, making sure there is space underneath the chicken to help distribute the heat more evenly.
5: Bake for about 15 minutes, until slightly dark brown on the edges.
6: Melt the butter in a large pot over medium heat, then sauté the onions and tomato purée, until tender but not browned.
7: Add the garlic ginger paste, cardamom pods, cloves, chili powder, coriander, garam masala, and turmeric and fry for about 30 seconds to release their aromatics and flavor, stirring constantly.
8: Pour in the cream and mix well with the onion and spices.
9: When the cream mixture is bubbling, add in the chicken and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
10: Serve with naan bread and rice and garnish with parsley.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:fusilli pasta (8oz)、corn (8oz)、black beans (8oz)、cooked chicken (2cups)、alfredo sauce (16oz)、taco seasoning (1tablespoon)、monterey jack cheese (1cup)、cheddar cheese (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C)
1: Cook the fusilli pasta according to box instructions. This will make about 4½ cups (900g) of cooked pasta.
2: In a large bowl, mix together cooked pasta, corn, black beans, cooked chicken, alfredo sauce, and taco seasoning.
3: Pour into a 9x13-inch (23x33 cm) baking pan and spread evenly around the pan.
4: Sprinkle Monterey Jack and cheddar cheese over the top and cover with foil.
5: Bake for 35 minutes, uncovering after 20 minutes to allow the cheese to brown.
6: Garnish with cilantro.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:warm water (½cup)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、all purpose flour (⅔cup)、sugar (½teaspoon)、instant yeast (½teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: In a large nonstick pan, combine the warm water, olive oil, flour, sugar, yeast, and salt. Use a spatula to stir the ingredients, then smooth the dough to the edges of the pan.
1: Spread the marinara sauce over the dough, all the way to the edges. Sprinkle the mozzarella evenly over the sauce, then top with the pepperoni.
2: Place over medium heat, cover, and cook for 10 minutes with the vent covered.
3: Uncover the vent and cook for 5 more minutes, until the edges are crispy.
4: Slide the pizza out of the pan onto a cutting board and let cool for 5 minutes.
5: Sprinkle with basil, then slice and serve.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:crushed tomato (7cups)、onion (⅓cup)、garlic (2cloves)、dried basil (2teaspoons)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Combine all sauce ingredients in slow cooker and stir. Set to high and cover while making meatballs, or for 30 minutes. (Or use pre-made/canned sauce.)
1: Combine all meatball ingredients except the mozzarella in a large bowl. Using your hands, mix until fully combined.
2: Take a golf ball sized piece of the ground beef mixture and place a piece of mozzarella in the middle. Press meat around the piece of cheese, fully enclosing it. Repeat until all meat is used.
3: Place meatballs in slow cooker and submerge in sauce.
4: Cover and cook on high for 2-2½  hours, or until meat is fully cooked.
5: Serve by itself or over pasta.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、baby bella mushroom (10oz)、yellow onion、carrots、celery stalks、garlic (2cloves)、dried rosemary (½teaspoon)、dried thyme (½teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、tomato paste (3tablespoons)、low sodium soy sauce (2tablespoons)、flour (¼cup)、dry red wine (¾cup)、red potato (4cups)、vegetable broth (4cups)、bay leaf (2leaves)
instructions:
0: In large pot or Dutch oven, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the mushrooms and cook for about 5 minutes, or until most of their juices have been released.
1: Add the onions, carrots, and celery, and cook for 4-5 minutes, or until onions are semi-translucent.
2: Add the garlic, rosemary, thyme, pepper, tomato paste, and soy sauce, and cook for 2-3 more minutes, until the herbs are fragrant.
3: Add the flour and stir until fully incorporated. Add the wine and stir until mostly absorbed.
4: Add the potatoes, vegetable broth, and bay leaves, and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the potatoes are tender and the stew has thickened.
5: Remove the bay leaves.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:skinless salmon (6oz)、asparagus (7oz)、olive oil、salt、pepper、egg
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: In a medium bowl, mix the parmesan crust ingredients.
2: In a separate bowl, whisk egg. Dredge the salmon in the egg, then parmesan.
3: Lay the salmon on a baking sheet. Lay asparagus beside the salmon. Drizzle with olive oil, then season with salt and pepper.
4: Bake for 10-12 minutes.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:top sirloin steak (1lb)、low sodium soy sauce (¼cup)、cornstarch (2teaspoons)、dark brown sugar (1tablespoon)、fresh ginger (2tablespoons)、oil (1tablespoon)、broccoli (1head)、water (½cup)、garlic (3cloves)、red pepper flakes (¼teaspoon)、toasted sesame oil (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, mix together the sirloin steak, soy sauce, cornstarch, brown sugar, and ginger until the meat is evenly covered in the marinade.
1: Set aside to marinate for 20 minutes.
2: Heat the oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.  Dump in the meat and marinade and sear each side until golden brown.
3: Transfer the meat to a clean bowl and set aside.
4: Place the broccoli into the hot skillet and sauté until the broccoli has just started to brown, about 1 minute.
5: Pour the water into the skillet and immediately cover with a lid. Let it steam for 2 minutes, until the broccoli has softened.
6: Remove the lid and toss in the garlic, red pepper flakes, and sesame oil. Sauté until the garlic becomes fragrant, about 30 seconds.
7: Add the steak back into the pan and stir to combine.
8: Remove from heat and serve on a bed of brown rice.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sweet potato、vegetarian parmesan cheese (½cup)、egg、flour (2cups)、butter (2tablespoons)、fresh sage (2leaves)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC).
1: Prick the sweet potato with a fork several times and bake for 40 minutes (or microwave for 5 minutes).
2: Allow potato to cool at least 5 minutes before peeling skin off.
3: In a large bowl, mash potato with masher or fork until smooth.
4: Add parmesan cheese, egg, and flour. Knead the dough until it is firm and no longer sticky, adding flour as needed, forming a ball with the dough.
5: Divide the dough into four equal parts. Take one part and roll it out into a long rope, about a 1-inch (2 ½ cm) wide.
6: Slice into ½-inch (1 cm) rectangles and set aside.
7: Using an overturned fork, slide each gnocchi over the fork prongs so they become serrated in a corkscrew shape.
8: Bring a large pot of water to a boil and add the gnocchi. Boil until the gnocchi float to the top, about 1-2  minutes. Drain in a colander.
9: In a pan over medium heat, melt butter and add sage. Simmer for 1 minute without letting butter burn.
10: Add gnocchi to pan with the sage and butter, tossing until lightly golden.
11: Top with more Parmesan cheese.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、salmon fillets
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, mix oil, salt, pepper, and paprika. Coat the salmon fillets with the marinade and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
1: Grill the salmon on an 11 inch (28 cm) griddle pan on high heat for two minutes on each side.
2: In a separate bowl, lightly toss avocados, ¼ red onion, the juice from one lime, 1 tablespoon olive oil, and salt to taste.
3: Spoon avocado salsa on top of the cooked salmon. Top with finely cut cilantro.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:fresh basil (4cups)、garlic (2cloves)、pine nuts (½cup)、grated parmesan cheese (¾cup)、olive oil (¾cup)、cold water (¼cup)、heavy cream (½cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: To make the pesto, mix basil, garlic, pine nuts, parmesan, cold water, heavy cream, salt, and pepper in a food processor for about 30 seconds. Add in olive oil. Process until combined, set aside.
1: Cook fusilli to very al dente, or about 3-4 minutes before the package instructs for cook time, then drain pasta.
2: Halve cherry tomatoes.
3: In a skillet or casserole pan, mix fusilli, cherry tomatoes, and pesto.
4: Top with grated parmesan and mozzarella balls.
5: Bake at 400° Fahrenheit for 10-15 minutes, or until mozzarella has melted.
6: Garnish with additional parmesan and fresh basil. Serve immediately.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:small sweet potato、lemon、green beans (1cup)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、fresh rosemary (1tablespoon)、fresh thyme (1tablespoon)、garlic (1clove)、salt (½teaspoon)、ground black pepper (¼teaspoon)、boneless, skinless chicken breast、paprika (¼teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
1: Add the sweet potatoes, lemon slices, green beans, olive oil, rosemary, thyme, garlic, salt, and pepper to a large bowl (or parchment paper-lined sheet tray)  and toss until fully coated.
2: Season the chicken breast with salt, pepper, and paprika.
3: Transfer to a parchment paper-lined sheet tray and place the chicken breast on top of the vegetables (if you tossed your vegetables in a bowl).
4: Bake until vegetables are tender and chicken is cooked through, about 20 minutes.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken thighs (1lb)、kosher salt、freshly ground black pepper、chipotle pepper in adobo sauce (6oz)、vegetable oil (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: On a cutting board, season the chicken all over with salt and pepper.
1: Transfer the chicken to a large zip-top bag with the chopped chipotles and mix until the chicken is fully coated.
2: Refrigerate for at least 2 hours, up to overnight.
3: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
4: Add the chicken and cook until golden brown, 4 minutes per side.
5: Remove the chicken with tongs and place on a cutting board. Let cool for 5 minutes. Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces.
6: Transfer the chicken back to the pan over medium-high heat and cook, stirring frequently, for 2-3 minutes, until all pieces are browned.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、ground lamb (3lb)、salt、pepper、large onion、large carrots、garlic (6cloves)、fresh thyme (1tablespoon)、fresh rosemary (1tablespoon)、tomato paste (2tablespoons)、worcestershire sauce (2tablespoons)、red wine (1cup)、chicken stock (1cup)、yukon gold potato (3lb)、unsalted butter (¼cup)、large egg yolks、sour cream (1cup)、grated parmesan cheese (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220˚C).
1: Heat the oil in a large pan over medium-high heat until shimmering. Add the ground lamb, season with salt and pepper, and fry for 5 minutes, until cooked through.
2: Add the onion, carrots, garlic, thyme, and rosemary, stir, and cook for about 10 minutes, or until the veggies are softened and the meat is well-browned.
3: Add the tomato paste and Worcestershire sauce and stir to incorporate. Cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly, until the liquid evaporates and the meat is aromatic.
4: Pour in the red wine and reduce until almost completely evaporated.
5: Add the chicken stock, bring to a boil, and cook the meat until the stock has evaporated, 5 minutes.
6: Meanwhile, cook the potatoes in a large pot of boiling salted water until tender. Drain, then return to the hot pan over low heat to dry out a bit.
7: Transfer the potatoes to a large bowl and mash until smooth.
8: Add salt, the butter, egg yolks, sour cream, and Parmesan cheese. Fold until well combined.
9: Transfer the potatoes to a piping bag or zip-top bag fitted with a star tip.
10: Spoon the lamb mixture into a large baking dish. Pipe the golden mashed potatoes over the lamb.
11: Bake for 30 minutes, until the potatoes are golden brown.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cauliflower rice (4cups)、broccoli floret (2cups)、chicken (2cups)、shredded mozzarella cheese (½cup)、shredded cheddar cheese (1cup)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、onion powder (1teaspoon)、salt、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: In a large bowl, mix together the cauliflower rice, broccoli, chicken, mozzarella, ½ cup cheddar, the garlic powder, onion powder, and salt until well combined.
2: Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and cover with aluminum foil. Bake for 40 minutes.
3: Uncover the pan and top with the remaining ½ cup cheddar cheese. Bake for 10 minutes more, until the cheese is melted. 
4: Let cool for 5–10 minutes before serving.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、small broccoli crowns、medium red potatoes、olive oil (¼cup)、sea salt (2teaspoons)、black pepper (2teaspoons)、onion powder (2teaspoons)、paprika (1teaspoon)、garlic (2cloves)、parmesan cheese (⅓cup)
instructions:
0: Cut broccoli and potatoes into small pieces and place on either side of a sheet tray.
1: Place two whole chicken breasts in the middle of the sheet tray. Drizzle the vegetables and chicken with olive oil (all but 1 tablespoon).
2: Drizzle the vegetables and chicken with olive oil (all but 1 tablespoon).
3: In a small bowl, blend the salt, pepper, onion powder, and paprika.
4: Evenly sprinkle the spice mixture over the veggies and both sides of the chicken. (TIP! Save any excess spice mix for next time.)
5: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
6: Lightly mix the veggies on the pan with your hands to coat with the spices.
7: Rub the top of the chicken breast with crushed garlic, then sprinkle the parmesan cheese evenly over the chicken and vegetables.
8: Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken’s internal temperature reaches 165ºF (75ºC).
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:hot dog buns、butter (¼cup)、garlic (2cloves)、fresh parsley (2tablespoons)、cheddar cheese (8slices)、chili (15oz)、hot dogs
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Leaving them attached, place the 8 hot dog buns in a 9 x 13-inch (22 x 33-cm) baking dish. Cut a rectangle in each hot dog bun, making sure to stay 1 centimeter from the edges. Push down on the bread cut-out to compact it tightly into the bottom of each bun, making sure to press down on the bottom edges as well. This will help create a larger space for the fillings and reduce mess.
2: Mix the butter, garlic, and parsley in a small bowl, then brush the buns and their hollowed insides with the garlic butter. Bake for 5 minutes to toast the buns as well as help the sides of the buns firm up so they don’t collapse under the weight of the fillings.
3: Place a slice of cheddar cheese inside each bun, then spoon a bit of chili inside each one. Slide a hot dog snugly on top of the chili in each bun, then top with more chili.
4: Bake for 20-25 minutes, until the cheese is golden brown and the chili has started to brown. Top with fresh parsley, then slice the hot dog boats along their connected seams to serve.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken thighs (2 ½lb)
instructions:
0: Combine all marinade ingredients in a large bowl and whisk together.
1: Add the chicken thighs and coat evenly.
2: Cover and chill for at least 1 hour and up to 12 hours
3: Prepare the sauce by adding all sauce ingredients to a small bowl. Mix together and chill until ready to serve.
4: Adjust the oven rack about 6 inches (15 cm) from the top heat source in your oven, then preheat the broiler.
5: Line a baking sheet with foil and a wire rack.
6: Place chicken in single layer on prepared wire rack, with the smooth sides down. Broil until chicken is well browned and registers at least 165˚F (74˚C), about 16-20 minutes. You may need to rotate the sheet pan halfway through if your broiler heats unevenly. Remove and rest the chicken for 5 minutes before handling, and turn off the oven.
7: While chicken rests, warm your pitas in the still-warm oven for a few minutes.
8: Slice the chicken into thin strips and transfer to platter.
9: Serve with sliced cucumbers, tomatoes, pickles, prepared yogurt sauce, and warm pita.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:canola oil (1tablespoon)、spinach (5oz)、mushroom (2cups)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、pesto (1cup)、parmesan cheese (½cup)、spaghetti (½lb)
instructions:
0: Heat pot over medium-high heat.
1: Add oil to the pot.
2: Cook the spinach until wilted.
3: Add the mushrooms, salt, and pepper cooking until most of the water is gone.
4: Add the pesto and parmesan.
5: Add the spaghetti, and toss until evenly coated, with the sauce sticking to the noodles.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breast、tomato puree (7teaspoons)、mozzarella cheese (7slices)、salami (7slices)、grated cheddar cheese (1tablespoon)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Cut seven slits on the top of the chicken breast.
1: In each slit, spread 1 teaspoon of tomato puree, 1 mozzarella slice, and 1 salami slice.
2: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
3: Sprinkle on the cheddar cheese and oregano.
4: Bake for 20 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. It should have an internal temperature of 165˚F (75˚C).
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium eggplants、olive oil (¼cup)、sea salt、freshly ground pepper (½teaspoon)、coconut oil (¼cup)、medium white onion、chili powder (1teaspoon)、ground cardamom (2teaspoons)、smoked paprika (1teaspoon)、ground coriander (1teaspoon)、ground turmeric (1tablespoon)、garlic (3cloves)、ginger (1teaspoon)、roma tomatoes、coconut milk (15oz)、water (½cup)、cooked rice、fresh cilantro
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400ºF (200ºC).
1: Slice the tops off the eggplants, then slice them in half lengthwise. Cut each half once more lengthwise. Lay the slices on their flat sides and cut lengthwise into thirds. Finally, slice horizontally to form cubes.
2: Transfer to a baking sheet, drizzle with the olive oil, salt, and pepper. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring halfway through, until golden brown.
3: In a large saucepan, heat the coconut oil over high hat. Add the onions, stir for 1 minute, then reduce the heat to medium-low and cook, stirring occasionally, until the onions are golden brown, about 8 minutes.
4: Stir in the chili powder, cardamom, and smoked paprika. Cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. 
5: Stir in the ground coriander, ½ teaspoon of black pepper, turmeric, garlic, and ginger. Cook for a few minutes more, stirring constantly.
6: Add the chopped tomatoes, coconut milk, water, and the roasted eggplant.
7: Bring the curry to a simmer, then reduce to low heat, cover, and simmer for 25 minutes. The sauce should reduce and thicken slightly.
8: Serve the curry warm over rice, topped with chopped cilantro.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground beef (½lb)、salt (1pinch)、pepper (1pinch)、burger buns、american cheese (1slice)
instructions:
0: Roll half of the beef mince into a ball and pat it down until a finger thick, bigger than palm size patty. Repeat with remaining beef.
1: Fry both patties with salt and pepper for 2 and a half minutes a side. Add 1 cheese single to one of the patties.
2: Toast the burger buns on a dry pan on medium heat until one of the sides is golden brown.
3: Mix all the sauce ingredients and set aside.
4: Time to build this bad boy! Spread burger sauce on a bun, sprinkle diced onion, shredded lettuce, place the patty with cheese, place another slice of bun.
5: Then more sauce, more onion, shredded lettuce, gherkin slices, another patty, and the last slice of bun!
6: Dig in and get lovin’ it!
7: Nutrition  Calories: 1774 Fat: 131 grams  Carbs: 69 grams Fiber:  7 grams  Sugars: 17 grams  Protein: 74 grams
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sesame oil (2tablespoons)、garlic (3cloves)、chicken breasts、salt、pepper、carrot (1cup)、broccoli floret (1cup)、brown rice (2cups)、frozen peas (½cup)、low sodium soy sauce (3tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Heat sesame oil in a skillet, and cook garlic until softened.
1: Add the chicken, salt, and pepper, and sauté for 5 minutes.
2: Add the carrots and broccoli, and sauté until tender.
3: Add the rice, soy sauce, and peas, and mix thoroughly.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:salsa (16oz)、limes、taco seasoning (1package)、fresh cilantro (3tablespoons)、chicken breast (3lb)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: In your slow cooker, mix the salsa, lime juice, taco seasoning, and cilantro.
1: Salt and pepper the chicken to taste, then mix into the sauce. Cover and cook on high for four hours or low for seven to eight hours.
2: Remove the chicken, shred with two forks, and return to the slow cooker and stir.
3: Freeze leftovers in an airtight bag for up to six months!
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken (3lb)
instructions:
0: In a large mixing bowl, combine the chicken with the onion, scallions, garlic, cilantro, curry powder, thyme, parsley, salt, and pepper.  Mix and let marinate for at least 1 hour in the refrigerator.
1: Heat the oil in a medium skillet over medium heat until shimmering, and add the onion and garlic. Cook for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.
2: Add the curry powder and stir well, cooking for 3-4 minutes more.
3: Add the scallions and coconut milk, increase the heat to medium-high, and cook for 8-10 minutes, until the coconut milk is boiling and begins to thicken.
4: Add the marinated chicken and stir well. Cook the chicken for 5 minutes, or until starting to brown. Season with pepper.
5: Add the chicken broth to the pot and stir.
6: Bring to a rolling boil and cover the pot. Simmer for 30 minutes, until the sauce thickens into a gravy.
7: Garnish with cilantro.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pork belly (20oz)、water (4cups)、slices of fresh ginger、spring onion、garlic (2cloves)、oil (2tablespoons)、brown sugar (2tablespoons)、light soy sauce (3tablespoons)、dark soy sauce (3tablespoons)、shaoxing rice wine (3tablespoons)、cooked rice、sliced green onion
instructions:
0: Cut the pork belly into roughly 1-inch (2 ½ cm) cubes.
1: Bring 1 liter of water to a boil in a pot, then add the pork, ginger, onion, and garlic, and cook for 3-4 minutes.
2: Remove the pork from the water using a slotted spoon and drain on a plate lined with a paper towel. Discard the remaining water and vegetables.
3: Clean and dry the pot, then return it to high heat and add the olive oil. Return the pork to the pan and cook until browned. The oil may pop and splatter, so be careful.
4: Add the brown sugar, then reduce the heat to low. Stir continuously until the sugar has melted, caramelized, and coated the pork evenly.
5: Immediately add the soy sauces and rice wine, stirring continuously for 5-6 minutes more, or until the liquid has reduced to a thick glaze.
6: Add the remaining 250 milliliters of water. Stir, cover, and simmer for about 45 minutes. Make sure the mixture is at a low simmer, not boiling. Stir every 10 minutes or so, adding more water if the pot is getting dry.
7: Remove the lid. The sauce should coat the pork in a very thick glaze. If it is too runny, continue to stir, uncovered, until the liquid has reduced.
8: Serve immediately over a bowl of rice and sprinkle with sliced green onions.
9: Nutrition  Calories: 1704 Fat: 162 grams  Carbs: 27 grams Fiber: 1 gram  Sugars: 9 grams  Protein: 30 grams
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless pork butt (4lb)、salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (1teaspoon)、dried oregano (1tablespoon)、cumin (1tablespoon)、garlic (8cloves)、medium onion、bay leaf (3leaves)、lime、large orange
instructions:
0: Cut pork into 6 equal pieces. Add it to the slow cooker.
1: Add salt, pepper, oregano, cumin, garlic, onion, bay leaves, lime juice and juice the orange. Add orange to the cooker as well. Mix together until the meat is well-coated.
2: Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours, or until the meat pulls apart easily.
3: Remove the pork and transfer to a foil-lined baking sheet. Shred the pork and spread across the baking sheet in a single layer.
4: Pour about 1 cup (235 ml) of the liquid remaining in the slow cooker over the shredded pork. Broil for 5-10 minutes until the meat browns and crisps along the edges.
5: Serve immediately. Great as a filling in tacos, burritos, salads, or nachos!
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken thighs、white rice (1cup)、chicken broth (1 ½cups)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、onion、garlic (4cloves)、fresh cilantro (½cup)、black beans (1can)、lime、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Season both sides of the chicken thighs with salt and pepper.
1: In a large skillet, add the olive oil and place the chicken skin side down for about 5 minutes or until skin is golden brown. Flip the chicken and cook for another 3 minutes.
2: Take the chicken out and add the onions and cook until they’re translucent, about 5 minutes.
3: Add the rice, stir to coat in the oil and onions, and toast for 3 minutes.
4: Add the garlic then pour in the chicken stock and place the chicken on top of the rice. Bring to a boil, then cover and simmer for 25-30 minutes, or until rice is cooked.
5: Once cooked, take the chicken out and add in the cilantro, black beans, and the juice of one lime. Mix until well-incorporated.
6: Serve the chicken over rice and garnish with cilantro.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:russet potatoes、olive oil、salt、pepper、bacon (10slices)、sour cream (3cups)、shredded cheddar cheese (4cups)、fresh chive
instructions:
0: Place potatoes on a baking sheet and poke holes in two sides with a fork.
1: Coat potatoes with olive oil, and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
2: Bake for at 425°F (220°C) for 45 minutes.
3: Remove potatoes from oven, and let cool. Chop into 1-inch (2 ½ cm) pieces.
4: Lay half of the potatoes on the bottom of a greased 9x13 inch (23x33 cm) baking dish.
5: Sprinkle on half of the bacon, spread half of the sour cream, and sprinkle on half of the cheese.
6: Repeat for a second layer.
7: Bake for 20 minutes at reduced temp of 350°F (180°C), or until cheese is golden brown and the edges start crisping up.
8: Sprinkle with chives.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken (2cups)、flour (1tablespoon)、salt (2teaspoons)、garam masala (1tablespoon)、turmeric (1tablespoon)、paprika (1tablespoon)、onion、garlic (4cloves)、green chiles、tomato (½cup)、tomato puree (2tablespoons)、plain yogurt (¾cup)
instructions:
0: Place the chicken pieces in the slow cooker and coat well with the flour and salt.
1: Throw in the garam masala, turmeric, paprika, onions, garlic, chillies, chopped tomatoes and tomato puree and mix together.
2: Slow cook on high for 3 hours.
3: After 3 hours, stir in the plain yogurt. Serve with rice and top with chopped coriander.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:small red potato (2lb)、olive oil (4tablespoons)、salt、pepper、garlic (4cloves)、lemon juice (4tablespoons)、fresh thyme (2tablespoons)、ginger (2teaspoons)、salmon fillets、asparagus (1bunch)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: Cover a sheet pan with foil or parchment paper. Spread out potatoes on the pan and drizzle with olive oil. Season with salt, pepper, 2 cloves of garlic, and 1 tablespoon lemon juice.
2: Bake for 30 minutes.
3: Make salmon glaze. Combine salt, pepper, 1 tablespoon thyme, 2 garlic cloves, ginger, 2 tablespoons of olive oil, and 2 tablespoons of lemon juice. Mix well.
4: Remove potatoes from the oven and push them to the top or side of your pan. Place your salmon fillets on the pan. Brush both sides of the salmon with the glaze.
5: Place asparagus on the pan and top with 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Sprinkle 1 tablespoon of thyme on the asparagus and potatoes.
6: Bake for 10-12 minutes. (The salmon should flake easily with a fork when it’s ready.)
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pork (½lb)、salt (1teaspoon)、corn flour (1teaspoon)、egg
instructions:
0: In a bowl, combine all marinade ingredients with the pork. Cover and leave to marinade in the fridge 20 minutes.
1: Place the corn flour in a large bowl and toss the marinated pork chunks until liberally coated.
2: In a medium-sized saucepan, heat the oil to 350˚F (180°C).
3: Deep fry the pork pieces for about 3-4 minutes until the coating is golden brown and the pork is cooked throughout. Set aside.
4: For the sauce, place a frying pan over a medium heat and add the oil.
5: Sauté the garlic until fragrant, then fry the peppers until soften.
6: Add in the pineapple and warm thorough.
7: Add the sugar, vinegar, and ketchup, stir. Bring the mixture to a boil.
8: Add the pork to the frying pan and coat everything evenly with the sauce.
9: Serve top with sesame seeds.
10: Nutrition  Calories: 2299 Fat: 220 grams  Carbs: 55 grams Fiber: 3 grams  Sugars: 44 grams  Protein: 35 grams

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pad thai noodle (8oz)、sesame oil (2tablespoons)、eggs、chicken breast、shallot (¼cup)、pad thai sauce (¾cup)、bean sprout (1cup)、peanuts (½cup)、green onion (¼cup)、fresh cilantro (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Cook the noodles according to the package instructions.
1: Toss with 1 tablespoon of sesame oil and set aside.
2: Add ½ teaspoon of sesame oil to a pot with the lightly beaten eggs. When the eggs are finished cooking, set aside.
3: Pour the remaining ½ tablespoon of sesame oil into the pot and add the diced chicken breast. Cook until no longer pink in the middle, then set aside.
4: Add the shallots to the pot and cook until lightly browned and fragrant. Then, add the noodles, eggs, and chicken back into the pot.
5: Pour in the pad Thai sauce and toss to coat.
6: Top with the bean sprouts, crushed peanuts, green onions, and cilantro, and stir until well blended.
7: Dish up and garnish with extra peanuts, green onions, and cilantro.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sugar (¼cup)、soy sauce (½cup)、mirin (½cup)、boneless, skinless chicken thighs (2lb)、canola oil (1tablespoon)、carrots、medium onion、red bell pepper、salt、pepper、peas (1cup)、broccoli florets (1cup)、sesame oil (3tablespoons)、garlic (2tablespoons)、ginger (1tablespoon)、white rice (4cups)、large eggs、sesame seed、scallion
instructions:
0: In a liquid measuring cup or small bowl, mix together the sugar, ½ cup (120 ml) soy sauce, and the mirin.
1: Add the chicken to a large bowl. Pour ½ cup (120 ml) of the marinade over the chicken and save the rest for later. Toss the chicken to coat, cover with plastic wrap, and marinate in the fridge for 30 minutes.
2: Add the canola oil to a wok or a large skillet over high heat. When the oil begins to shimmer, add the carrots, onion, and pepper. Season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, until starting to soften, 5 minutes.
3: Add the peas and broccoli florets to the skillet. Cook, shaking the pan or stirring, for about 3 more minutes, until the broccoli becomes slightly tender. Remove the vegetables from the skillet.
4: Add 2 tablespoons of sesame oil to the skillet and heat until it shimmers, then add the minced garlic and ginger. When the mixture is fragrant, about 15 seconds later, add the cooked rice, breaking up clumps with a spoon and tossing in the oil.
5: When the rice is well-coated, push to one side of the skillet and add the beaten eggs to the other side. Scramble until it starts to set, then return the veggies to the pan and stir into the rice to incorporate. Add the remaining 3 tablespoons of soy sauce. Stir until well-combined.
6: Transfer the rice mixture to a greased bundt pan. Pack the rice down slightly. Cover and set aside.
7: Heat the remaining tablespoon of sesame oil in the skillet. Add the marinated chicken and cook until browned on all sides, about 10 minutes. Add the reserved teriyaki sauce and cook until reduced and thickened slightly. Sprinkle with sesame seeds.
8: Invert the fried rice dome onto a serving platter. Pour the hot teriyaki chicken into the center of the dome and garnish with sliced scallions.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、spicy italian sausage (1lb)、broccoli florets (1lb)、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、rigatoni (1lb)、chicken stock (4cups)、grated parmesan cheese (½cup)
instructions:
0: Heat the olive oil in a large Dutch oven or heavy-bottomed pot over medium-high heat. Add the sausage and cook until browned, breaking up with a wooden spoon, about 8 minutes.
1: Add the broccoli, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper and stir to combine.
2: Add the pasta and chicken stock and bring to a boil. Cook for 10–12 minutes, stirring constantly, until the liquid is absorbed and the pasta is tender. Add the Parmesan and stir to incorporate.
3: Divide the pasta between serving bowls and garnish with more Parmesan.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:salt (1tablespoon)、pepper (1tablespoon)、paprika (1tablespoon)、chili powder (1tablespoon)、rack of pork ribs (2 ½lb)、honey (1cup)、soy sauce (½cup)、garlic cloves
instructions:
0: In a small bowl, mix together the salt, pepper, paprika, and chili powder. Season the ribs evenly with the mixture, making sure to rub it in on all sides.
1: Add the honey, soy sauce, and garlic to a large slow cooker. Transfer the ribs to slow cooker and turn them over in the sauce until coated. Position the ribs so they are standing up, with the meatier side down, and so the meat is against the walls of the slow cooker, with the bone sides facing in. Cover and cook on  high for 4 hours, or low for 7-8 hours. Check after the allotted time to make sure the meat is cooked through and tender.
2: Remove the ribs and transfer to cutting board. Cut between the bones to separate into individual ribs. Serve with additional sauce from the slow cooker, as needed
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:oil (1tablespoon)、chicken breast (1 ½lb)、seasoned salt (1teaspoon)、pepper、small onion、broccoli (1medium head)、milk (6cups)、bowtie pasta (1lb)、shredded parmesan cheese (1cup)、shredded mozzarella cheese (1cup)
instructions:
0: Heat half of the oil in a large pot. Add in the chicken, season with half of the seasoned salt and pepper, and cook.
1: Once the chicken is nicely browned and cooked through, remove it from the pan. Set aside.
2: Add in remaining oil, onion, and broccoli. Cover for 2 minutes. Season with remaining seasoned salt and pepper. Cook and stir until the onions begin to become translucent.
3: Pour in milk and bring to a boil. Stir periodically so the bottom does not burn.
4: Once milk is bubbling, add pasta and stir frequently until pasta reaches your desired doneness (approximately 10 minutes at medium heat).
5: Add in Parmesan and mozzarella. Stir until cheese is melted.
6: Stir in chicken until well incorporated.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground turkey (1lb)、onion、garlic (3cloves)、black beans (1can)、yellow corn (1can)、salsa (1jar)、ground cumin (1teaspoon)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、black pepper (½teaspoon)、guacamole
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Using a sharp knife, cut off the tops of each bell pepper. Use the knife to help cut out and remove the seeds and ribs from inside the peppers.
2: Place the peppers in a lightly greased roasting pan and set aside.
3: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Toss in the onion, cumin, oregano, paprika, salt, and black pepper, and sauté until the onions have softened, about 2-3 minutes.
4: Toss in the garlic and sauté until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
5: Move the onions away from the center of the pan to create an open surface in the skillet. Place the ground turkey in the center of the pan and break up the meat.
6: Move the meat and onions to the sides of the pan to create an open surface again. Pour in the black beans, corn, and salsa and stir the mixture until evenly combined.
7: Spoon the mixture evenly into the hallowed bell peppers and replace the bell pepper tops.
8: Bake for 30-35 minutes, until the bell peppers have softened and wilted slightly.
9: Remove the tops of the bell peppers, spoon on a large dollop of guacamole, and replace the tops.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:green cabbage (½head)、medium red onion、roma tomatoes、fresh cilantro (¼cup)、small jalapeño、lime juice (2tablespoons)、salt
instructions:
0: Make the cabbage slaw: Combine the cabbage, onion, tomato, cilantro, jalapeño, lime juice, and salt in a large bowl. Toss well, then set aside.
1: Make the crispy fish: In a large bowl, combine the flour, Old Bay, and baking powder. Add the beer and whisk until smooth. Let sit for 15 minutes.
2: Heat the vegetable oil in a large pot until it reaches 350°F (180°C).
3: Coat the fish in the batter, then transfer to the oil and fry until golden on the outside and cooked through, 5-7 minutes. Drain the fish on a wire rack set over a baking sheet lined with paper towels.
4: Make the avocado crema: Add the avocados, sour cream, lime juice, and salt to a blender and blend until smooth.
5: To assemble the tacos, add a bit of the cabbage slaw to a warmed tortilla. Top with a piece of fried fish, avocado crema, and sliced radish.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:onion、garlic (2cloves)、bell pepper、jalapeño、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、rotisserie chicken (4cups)、corn (1cup)、cumin (1teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、cream cheese (8oz)、flour tortillas、cheese blend (2cups)、oil、sour cream、pico de gallo
instructions:
0: Add onion, garlic, bell pepper, and jalapeño to a lightly oiled sauté pan. Season with salt and pepper, then cook until onions are translucent.
1: Once veggies are fully cooked add in chicken, corn, cumin, and paprika. Mix together until fully combined.
2: Remove chicken from the heat and place in a large mixing bowl.
3: Add in cream cheese and mix until chicken becomes creamy.
4: Using a medium-sized ice cream scooper. Scoop out 2 portions of creamy chicken and place on flour tortilla. Top with cheese blend then roll tightly into a burrito.
5: Preheat oil to 325ºF (170ºC).
6: Place burrito into shallow oil, flap side down to create a seal and cook for 2-3 minutes on both sides or until golden brown.
7: Top with sour cream and pico de gallo.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、hot italian sausage (5links)、large yellow onion、garlic (5cloves)、salt、pepper、dried oregano (1tablespoon)、dried basil (1tablespoon)、dried parsley (1tablespoon)、tomato paste (12oz)、diced tomato (15oz)、grated parmesan cheese (2cups)、spinach (2cups)、rigatoni (1lb)、ricotta cheese (1cup)、fresh basil
instructions:
0: To a large dutch oven on medium heat, add the olive oil and heat it until it shimmers.
1: Add the hot Italian sausage, cook until the the first side browns deeply, flip and cook on the other side until the sausage is fully cooked, 15 minutes. Remove the sausages from the pan and slice when they cool down.
2: To the leftover pan drippings, add the chopped yellow onion, minced garlic, salt, pepper, dried basil, dried oregano, and dried parsley. Cook until the onions are caramelized and soft. About 10 minutes.
3: Add the tomato paste and cook until the tomato paste darkens slightly.
4: Add in the diced tomatoes and the sausage slices into the pan, stir, and let the sauce come to a simmer.
5: Add in half the grated parmesan, spinach, the cooked pasta, and stir to combine.
6: Spoon in fresh dollaps of the ricotta cheese, garnish with fresh basil, more grated parmesan, and serve!
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:spaghetti (1lb)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、garlic (3cloves)、cherry tomato (2cups)、salt、pepper、white wine (1cup)、parmesan cheese (1cup)、fresh basil (½cup)
instructions:
0: Cook spaghetti in boiling salted water until it’s al dente. Reserve 1 cup (235 ml) of the pasta water before draining.
1: While the spaghetti is cooking, heat olive oil in a large pan (it should be large enough to toss the pasta in). Add garlic and tomatoes, and stir until well-incorporated. Season with salt and pepper.
2: Cook tomatoes down for 5 minutes until they soften and release some of their juices.
3: Then add the wine and allow that to reduce for 5-10 minutes until you’re left with a syrupy sauce.
4: Add the pasta to your sauce, along with a splash of pasta water and toss to coat it for about 1-2 minutes so the pasta finishes cooking and absorbs the flavor of the sauce.
5: Add the parmesan and basil. Add another small splash of pasta water, if needed. Toss until the cheese is melted down and you’re left with a smooth sauce.
6: Gradually add small amounts of pasta water, as needed, until the sauce reaches your desired smoothness.
7: Top off with extra parmesan and basil and serve immediately.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flank steak (1lb)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、paprika (1tablespoon)、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、salt (2teaspoons)、worcestershire sauce (2tablespoons)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、large white onions、green bell peppers、red bell peppers、provolone cheese (15slices)、fresh parsley (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: Cut the flank steak against the grain into ⅛-inch (3-mm) thick slices.
2: In a large skillet over medium heat, heat the olive oil, until shimmering.  Add the steak, paprika, garlic powder, ½ teaspoon of pepper, 1 teaspoon of salt, and the Worcestershire sauce.
3: Mix to coat the meat with the spices and cook until the meat is cooked through, about 3 minutes. Transfer the meat a bowl, leaving the juices in the pan. Cover and set aside until ready to use.
4: Add the butter to the pan with the meat juices. Add the onions and cook until tender and shiny, about 10 minutes. Add the green bell peppers and the remaining ½ teaspoon of pepper and teaspoon of salt, and cook until the onions and peppers are caramelized, about 10 minutes.
5: Cut the top off of a red bell pepper. Cut around the seed pod, then pull it out of the pepper. Remove any remaining seeds. Repeat with the rest of the peppers.
6: Cut 9 of the provolone slices in half.
7: Place the peppers in a 9x13-inch (23x33-cm) baking dish, cut side up. Scoop a bit of steak filling into each pepper, followed by the peppers and onions, then 3 half slices of provolone. Repeat with the rest of the steak, then the rest of the peppers and onions. Place a whole slice of provolone on top of each pepper.
8: Bake for 30 minutes, until the skin of the peppers is shriveling, and the cheese is golden.
9: Top with parsley.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:spaghetti (1lb)、olive oil (3tablespoons)、shrimp (1lb)、salt (2teaspoons)、red pepper flakes (1 ½teaspoons)、small yellow onion、garlic (8cloves)、canned diced tomato (42oz)、sugar (1teaspoon)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、dry white wine (1cup)、fresh parsley (⅓cup)、water (4qt)
instructions:
0: In a 6-quart Dutch oven, bring 4 quarts of salted water to a boil over medium-high heat.
1: Add spaghetti, cooking about 6-7 minutes until al dente. Drain and set aside.
2: Return the Dutch oven to the stovetop and heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat.
3: Add the shrimp, salt, and ½ teaspoon of the red pepper flakes. Spread evenly across the bottom of the pot and cook until the bottoms pink and slightly brown, about 45-60 seconds. Flip and repeat until shrimp are just cooked through.
4: Remove the shrimp and place in a small bowl to the side.
5: Reduce heat to medium-low, and add additional 1 tablespoon of oil to the pot, as needed.
6: Add onion and garlic to the oil and cook until onions have softened, about 3-5 minutes. Stir frequently to ensure the garlic does not burn.
7: Add the diced tomatoes, remaining 1 teaspoon of salt, sugar, remaining 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes, oregano, and white wine.
8: Stir and bring the sauce up to a simmer. Simmer for 5-10 minutes until the sauce has thickened.
9: Return the shrimp (and any accumulated juices) to the sauce. Add the parsley, stirring to incorporate.
10: Add the cooked spaghetti back into the pot, toss until evenly coated and heated, then remove from heat. Serve immediately.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:oil (3tablespoons)、chicken (3cups)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、onion (1 ⅓cups)、carrot (¾cup)、potato (1cup)、water (4 ¼cups)、peas (⅔cup)、curry paste (⅔cup)
instructions:
0: Heat up 2 tablespoons of oil on low to medium heat.
1: Sear the chicken until the outside turns golden brown. Season with salt and pepper.
2: Take out the chicken, make sure you don’t clean the pot or you’d wipe away some deliciousness!
3: Add another tablespoon of oil, fry the onions, carrots, and potatoes until soften.
4: Add the chicken back in with the water. Bring to a boil then simmer for 10 minutes with the lid on.
5: Add in the peas and curry paste, stir well.
6: Serve with rice.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:tuna (15oz)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、panko bread crumbs (¾cup)、dried parsley (1tablespoon)、fresh chives (2teaspoons)、garlic (1tablespoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、large egg、whole wheat burger bun
instructions:
0: Combine the tuna, olive oil, panko, parsley, chives, garlic, salt, pepper, paprika, and egg in a large bowl until evenly mixed.
1: Divide the mixture into 4 portions and form patties with your hands.
2: Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
3: Place the patties in the pan and cook for 3-5 minutes on each side, until golden brown.
4: Serve on whole wheat buns with your preferred toppings.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breast (1lb)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、yellow onion、poblano peppers、garlic cloves (2cloves)、low-sodium chicken broth (2 ½cups)、lime、canned cooked black beans (14 ½oz)、diced tomatoes、jasmine rice (1 ½cups)、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (¼teaspoon)、cilantro (3tablespoons)
instructions:
0: In a skillet, heat a small amount of oil on medium–high heat. Add chicken and season with salt and pepper.
1: Cook the chicken thoroughly, about 6-8 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
2: Add remaining olive oil to the skillet. Add onion and peppers and sauté for 5-7 minutes.
3: Add garlic and cook for an additional minute.
4: Add the chicken broth, lime juice, black beans, tomatoes, rice, salt, and pepper and stir to combine.
5: Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until rice is cooked through.
6: Add chicken back to the pot. Add cilantro and combine.
7: Serve immediately.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:vegetable oil (1tablespoon)、maple syrup (¼cup)、orange juice (2tablespoons)、soy sauce (2tablespoons)、ground ginger (1teaspoon)、garlic (1clove)、pepper、salt、salmon fillet (4oz)、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: For the salmon, heat vegetable oil on medium-high in a cast-iron skillet.
1: For the broccoli, fill a medium pot halfway with water. Add a dash of salt and start boiling water.
2: In the meantime, whisk together maple syrup, orange juice, soy sauce, garlic, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl.
3: Set aside 2 tablespoons for topping later.
4: Place salmon fillets inside the bowl and make sure each side is covered with sauce.
5: Sear the salmon 2-3 minutes on each side.
6: Brush the tops with the sauce set aside.
7: With the pot of water boiling, add the broccoli and cover lid. Blanch for 2 minutes.
8: Drain under cold water to stop the cooking.
9: In the drained pot of broccoli, stir in butter, soy sauce, red pepper flakes, some lemon zest, and garlic on low heat. Mix until broccoli is well-coated.
10: On each plate, serve a filet of salmon and scoop of broccoli.
11: Top with reserved marinade and sprinkle parsley for garnish.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray、non dairy milk (2cups)、all purpose flour (2cups)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、cauliflower、canola oil (1tablespoon)、garlic (3cloves)、fresh ginger (1piece)、red pepper flakes (¼teaspoon)、orange juice (½cup)、brown sugar (½cup)、distilled white vinegar (¼cup)、soy sauce (¼cup)、cornstarch (2tablespoons)、cold water (2tablespoons)、sesame oil (1teaspoon)、white rice、scallions
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 450˚F (230°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and grease with nonstick spray.
1: In a medium bowl, whisk together the non-dairy milk, flour, and salt.
2: One at a time, dip each cauliflower floret in the batter to coat, letting any excess batter drip off. Arrange the battered cauliflower on the prepared baking sheet, making sure they aren’t touching one another. Lightly spray with cooking spray.
3: Bake for 30–35 minutes, until the coating is crispy and beginning to brown.
4: While the cauliflower is baking, make the sauce: Heat the canola oil in a medium skillet over medium heat. When the oil is shimmering, add the garlic, ginger, and red pepper flakes. Cook for 2–3 minutes, until fragrant, stirring frequently to prevent burning.
5: Add the orange juice, brown sugar, vinegar, and soy sauce. Cook for 2–3 minutes, until the brown sugar is dissolved and the mixture begins to simmer.
6: In a small bowl, stir together the cornstarch and cold water with a fork.
7: Add the slurry to the sauce, stirring to combine. Simmer for another 2 minutes, until the sauce thickens. Mix in the sesame oil, then transfer the sauce to a large bowl.
8: Toss the hot cauliflower florets in the sauce until well coated.
9: Serve the cauliflower over rice and garnish with the scallions.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken drumsticks
instructions:
0: In a mixing bowl, combine the garlic, ginger, chili, honey, and soy sauce.
1: Mix in the chicken drumsticks.
2: Cover with cling film and leave to marinate in the fridge for 4-6 hours, or overnight.
3: Fry the chicken in a large pan, on all sides for about 10-15 minutes, stirring often to prevent the marinade from burning, until golden brown.
4: Remove from the pan and pour in the marinade.
5: Bring to a boil and stir, until the marinade is thick and resembles a sauce.
6: Throw the chicken back in the pan and fry for a further 5-10 minutes in the sauce, making sure each drumstick is evenly coated and cooked through.
7: Garnish with sesame seeds and spring onions.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:water (½cup)、cornstarch (1tablespoon)、soy sauce (¼cup)、garlic (1tablespoon)、brown sugar (1tablespoon)、white pepper (1teaspoon)、flank steak (1lb)、salt、cooking oil (3tablespoons)、chow mein noodle (6oz)、onion (½cup)、broccoli floret (1cup)、sesame oil (2teaspoons)、scallion
instructions:
0: In a 2-cup (480 ml) liquid measuring cup, combine the water, cornstarch, soy sauce, garlic, brown sugar, and white pepper.
1: In a medium bowl, season the steak strips with salt. Pour half of the sauce over the meat and set the rest aside for later. Mix the sauce with the steak, cover with plastic wrap, and marinate in the refrigerator for 30 minutes to 1 hour.
2: In a wok or deep skillet over medium-high heat, heat 2 tablespoons of cooking oil, then add the par-cooked noodles. Cook for 1-2 minutes, allowing the noodles to crisp, then flip and cook for another 1-2 minutes. Transfer to a plate and set aside.
3: In the same wok, add 1 tablespoon of cooking oil and the marinated beef. Cook the beef for 3-4 minutes, then flip and cook for another 2 minutes, or until slightly crispy. Remove from the wok and set aside.
4: In the same wok, heat the remaining tablespoon of oil and add onion and broccoli. Season with salt, then stir and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until the onions are translucent.
5: Return the steak to the wok, followed by the crispy noodles and sesame oil. Mix well and pour in the reserved sauce. Toss gently and cook for another 2-3 minutes, or until everything is well-combined. Garnish with sliced scallions.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium yukon  potatoes、medium eggplants、red bell peppers、olive oil (5tablespoons)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (¾teaspoon)、medium yellow onion、tomato paste (1tablespoon)、garlic (3cloves)、smoked paprika (1teaspoon)、chickpeas (15oz)、medium beefsteak tomatoes、low sodium vegetable broth (1 ½cups)、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400ºF (200ºC).
1: With a sharp knife, score a ring around each potato, just deep enough to break the skin. Place the potatoes in a medium pot of cold water. Bring to a boil and cook for about 8 minutes, until about halfway cooked.
2: Drain the potatoes, and rinse with cold water. Peel off the skin.
3: Cut the potatoes into ½-inch (1 cm) pieces and set aside.
4: Divide the eggplant and bell peppers between 2 baking sheets and spread in an even layer. Drizzle with 4 tablespoons of olive oil, and season with salt and pepper to taste. Toss with your hands to coat.
5: Bake for 25 minutes, flipping halfway through.
6: Heat the remaining tablespoon of olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook for 3-4 minutes, until semi-translucent.
7: Add the tomato paste and stir until well distributed, then add the garlic, paprika, 1 teaspoon salt, and ¾ teaspoon pepper, and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until fragrant.
8: Add the potatoes, chickpeas, and tomatoes, and stir to incorporate.
9: Stir in the vegetable broth and cover. Reduce the heat to low and cook for 20 minutes, until the potatoes are tender.
10: Add the roasted eggplant and bell pepper, and stir to combine. Cook for another 5-10 minutes, until the tomatoes have mostly broken down.
11: Ladle into bowls, garnish with parsley, and serve. Or, transfer the stew to resealable containers and store in the fridge for up to 5 days or freezer for up to 3 months.
12: Enjoy!

ingredients:garlic (2cloves)、spinach (10oz)、artichoke heart (1cup)、cream cheese (2oz)、shredded mozzarella cheese (½cup)、grated parmesan cheese (⅔cup)、salt、pepper、boneless, skinless chicken breasts、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、onion powder (½teaspoon)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、riced cauliflower (1 ⅓cups)、broccoli (2cups)
instructions:

3: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
4: Sprinkle the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, onion powder, and garlic powder until evenly coated.
5: To pound out the chicken, take a chicken breast and butterfly it by slicing half way into it to open like a book, making sure not to slice all the way through. Cover the breast with parchment paper or plastic wrap. Gently pound the meat with a mallet or rolling pin until it is evenly flattened, about ¼ inch (6 mm) in thickness.
6: Onto each pounded chicken breast, evenly add ¼ of the spinach-artichoke mixture, but making sure to not overfill the chicken.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instructions:

ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、butter (2tablespoons)、onion、large carrot (½cup)、celery stalk (½cup)、ground beef (1lb)、ground pork (1lb)、salt、pepper、can of tomato paste (½cup)、red wine (2cups)、diced tomato (4cups)

0: Pour olive oil into the pot.
1: Add diced chicken breast to the pot, cover with cajun seasoning, and stir until the chicken is evenly seasoned.
2: Add sliced sausage and stir. Cook the meat on medium heat for 5-10 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.
3: Once the meat is cooked, add in the garlic, onion, peppers, and mushrooms, and stir. Continue stirring for 3-5 minutes as the veggies cook down.
4: Add the dry pasta to the pot (if using long, thin noodles, break in half), then pour in the chicken broth. Stir until everything is well-mixed.
5: Cover the pot and bring to a boil. Once boiling, keep covered bring the heat down to a simmer for 10 minutes (stirring every two minutes).
6: NOTE: If there still extra chicken broth, you can discard it, cook longer until the liquid evaporates, or add a little cornstarch to thicken the liquid.
7: Lastly, add heavy cream and parmesan and stir until your pasta is well blended. Stir in parmesan cheese.
8: Garnish with green onions, more parmesan, a sprinkle of cajun seasoning (if you want some extra spice), and salt and pepper to taste.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken thighs、salt、pepper、mixed herb、shallots、garlic (40cloves)、dry vermouth (½cup)、fresh parsley (3sprigs)、dried tarragon (1teaspoon)、chicken stock (¾cup)
instructions:
0: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C (350°F)
1: Season the chicken with the salt, pepper and mixed herbs. Set aside.
2: Heat some oil in a large pan and sear the chicken for about 10-15 minutes evenly on each side, until golden brown.
3: Take the chicken out and set aside.
4: Add the shallots and cook down in the remaining juices for about 5 minutes over a low-medium heat.
5: Add the garlic cloves and gently cook them for about 2 minutes.
6: Pour in the vermouth or white wine and gently cook so that it reduces slightly.
7: Add the chicken, parsley sprigs and tarragon, followed by the chicken stock.
8: Bake in the oven for 20-25 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.
9: Serve with crusty bread and vegetables of your choice.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:oil (1tablespoon)、chorizo (4oz)、onion、ground beef (1lb)、salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (2teaspoons)、tomato sauce (3cups)、rotini pasta (1 ¼cups)、parmesan cheese (½cup)、fresh basil (½cup)
instructions:
0: Heat oil in a large pot over medium-high heat.
1: Cook chorizo until slightly crispy.
2: Add the onions and cook until translucent.
3: Add the beef, salt, and pepper, cooking until no pink is showing.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs、salt、pepper、unsalted butter (3tablespoons)、garlic (4cloves)、chicken broth (1cup)、heavy cream (½cup)、sun-dried tomato (⅓cup)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、dried thyme (1teaspoon)、fresh basil (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Season chicken thighs with salt and pepper.
1: Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a large oven-proof skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken, skin-side down, and sear both sides until golden brown. Drain excess fat and set aside.
2: Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in the skillet. Add garlic. Stir until fragrant, then add chicken broth, heavy cream, sun-dried tomatoes, dried oregano, dried thyme, and fresh basil and reduce heat to low. Return chicken to the skillet and baste well.
3: Bake at 400˚F (200˚C) for 25 minutes.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:warm water (¾cup)、instant yeast (1 ½teaspoons)、all-purpose flour (2cups)、kosher salt (1 ½teaspoons)、olive oil (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Make the dough: In a medium bowl, combine the warm water, yeast, flour, and salt. Mix with a rubber spatula until well-combined and the dough comes together into a ball.
1: Lightly flour a clean surface, then turn the dough out and knead for 1-2 minutes to smooth and encourage gluten development. Shape the dough into a ball.
2: Drizzle the olive oil in a clean large bowl. Add the dough ball and turn to coat in the oil. Cover with a kitchen towel and let rise for 1 hour, or until doubled in size.
3: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
4: While the dough is rising, make the filling: Add the sausage to a medium nonstick pan over medium heat and cook until no longer pink, 5-6 minutes. Add the onion, salt, and pepper and continue to cook until the sausage is browned, about 5 minutes more. Remove from the heat and let cool.
5: After the dough has risen, turn it out onto a lightly floured surface. Divide the dough into 4 portions, then roll each into and round about ¼-inch (½ cm) thick.
6: Spread ¼ of the sauce over one half of each dough round, leaving a ½-inch (1 cm) border along the edge. Top each one with 2 slices of ham, 5 pepperoni, ¼ of the sausage and onion mixture, and ¼ cup (25 G) of mozzarella cheese.
7: Lightly beat the egg with a pinch of salt. Brush the egg wash on the border of the dough, fold the other half over, and press the edges together. Starting from one corner, fold the dough over itself in a twist. Tuck the other corner underneath. Transfer the calzones to the prepared baking sheet. Brush lightly with egg wash and score the tops with a knife to allow steam to escape.
8: Bake for 15-17 minutes, until golden brown. Let cool for 5 minutes.
9: Serve the calzones with marinara sauce for dipping, if desired.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:runner bean (4oz)、broccoli (15oz)、gnocchi (15oz)、grated mozzarella cheese (1cup)、grated parmesan cheese (1cup)、single cream (3tablespoons)、pepper (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
1: Bring some water to the boil in a saucepan and boil the runner beans and broccoli for 2-3 minutes.
2: Take them out of the water and set aside.
3: In the same boiling water, cook the gnocchi for 2 minutes (or, until it floats to the top of the water). Drain.
4: In the same saucepan, mix together the drained gnocchi, runner beans, broccoli, mozzarella, parmesan, cream, and pepper.
5: Pour into an ovenproof dish and bake for 5 minutes at 180°C (350°F), until the cheese bubbles.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:boneless pork shoulder (1 ½lb)、onion、green onion (3stalks)、garlic (3cloves)、ginger (1teaspoon)、korean red chili paste (¼cup)、red pepper flakes (1teaspoon)、soy sauce (¼cup)、rice wine (3tablespoons)、sesame oil (1tablespoon)、sugar (1tablespoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、canola oil (1tablespoon)、sesame seed、rice
instructions:

4: Sprinkle a bit of sesame seeds on top, then serve with rice!
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:baby back ribs (1rack)、cumin (2teaspoons)、chili powder (2teaspoons)、pepper (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (2teaspoons)、salt (2teaspoons)、paprika (2teaspoons)、BBQ sauce (1cup)、corns、asparagus (10stalks)、olive oil (4tablespoons)、salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (½teaspoon)
instructions:

1: Place the half racks on a baking sheet lined with foil. Sprinkle evenly with cumin, chili powder, pepper, garlic powder, salt, and paprika. Rub in the seasoning evenly on both sides.
2: Cover with the foil and bake for 2 hours.

8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large sweet potato、brussels sprouts (1lb)、apples、skins on chicken thigh、olive oil (4tablespoons)、salt、pepper、garlic (3cloves)、fresh rosemary (1tablespoon)、fresh thyme (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: On a baking sheet, toss the sweet potato, Brussels sprouts, and sliced apples so they’re evenly distributed.
2: Lay the chicken thighs on top.
3: Drizzle the olive oil over the chicken, fruit, and veggies, and season with salt and pepper.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、cajun spice (¼cup)、onion、bell pepper、black beans (1can)、rice (1cup)、chopped tomato (15oz)、chicken stock (1 ¾cups)、olive oil
instructions:
