instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breast (¼lb)、lemon  zest (½lemon)、garlic (1teaspoon)、soy sauce (1tablespoon)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Combine all marinade ingredients with the chicken breast and leave for 20 minutes.
1: Coat the chicken breast first in flour, then eggs, and finally panko breadcrumbs.
2: In a medium-sized saucepan heat the oil to 325˚F (170°C),
3: Deep fry the breaded chicken for about 3-4 minutes until the coating is golden brown.

8: Nutrition  Calories: 4856 Fat: 436 grams  Carbs: 188 grams Fiber: 9 grams  Sugars: 47 grams  Protein: 66 grams

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ripe avocados、white onion、tomato、chopped fresh cilantro (2tablespoons)、kosher salt (½tablespoon)、fresh lime juice (2tablespoons)、boneless, skinless chicken breasts、black pepper、bacon (8strips)、canola oil (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Using a knife, cut around the pit of each avocado, separating the halves from each other. Remove the pits and use a spoon to scoop out the flesh.
2: In a large bowl, combine the avocado, onion, tomato, cilantro, salt, and lime juice. Mash and stir with a fork until there are no large chunks of avocado left.
3: Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper on all sides. Slice chicken breasts in half crosswise.
4: Cut a slit in the center of each half to make a pocket. Take a heaping spoonful of the guacamole and pack it into the pocket. Pinch the edges closed.
5: Wrap each chicken breast with 2 strips of bacon, making sure the ends of the bacon all end up on the same side of the chicken.
6: Heat oil in a large pan over high heat. Sear the bacon-wrapped chicken for 2-3 minutes on each side. Remember to sear the sides of the chicken as well.
7: Transfer the chicken to a baking dish and bake for 10 minutes, or until cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C). Serve immediately.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:russet potatoes、skirt steak (1lb)、olive oil (4tablespoons)、salt、pepper、paprika (2teaspoons)、shredded cheddar cheese (1cup)、shredded monterey jack cheese (½cup)、sour cream、salsa、green onions
instructions:
0: Place sliced potatoes in a large bowl. Toss with olive oil, salt, pepper, and paprika.
1: Lay the potatoes on a baking sheet and bake at 450˚F (230˚C) for 20 minutes.
2: Season skirt steak with salt and pepper. Cook on high heat for roughly three minutes each side, for medium-rare.
3: Let the steak rest for 10 minutes, then slice into cubes.
4: In a cast iron skillet or baking sheet, arrange cooked potatoes into a heap. Top with steak, then cheddar and monterey jack cheese.
5: Broil for five minutes or until the cheese is melted.
6: Serve immediately with sour cream, salsa, green onions or any topping of choice.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:potatoes、salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (1teaspoon)、ham (8slices)、mozzarella cheese (7slices)、bacon (5slices)、fresh parsley (¼cup)、shredded mozzarella cheese (2cups)、heavy cream (1cup)、eggs
instructions:
0: Slice the peeled potatoes into ¼ inch (½ cm) slices.
1: Season the potatoes with salt and pepper, tossing them to make sure they’re coated evenly.
2: Press a layer of potatoes evenly into the bottom of a greased, square baking pan.
3: Place half of the ham slices evenly on top of the potatoes, followed by half of the sliced cheese.
4: Follow with another layer of potatoes, then the remaining ham and sliced cheese.
5: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
6: Sprinkle the bacon and parsley evenly on top of the sliced cheese, and place one final layer of potatoes on top.
7: Sprinkle the shredded cheese on top of the potatoes, then press it into an even layer.
8: In a small bowl, mix the heavy cream and eggs. Pour on top of the shredded cheese.
9: Bake for about 40 minutes, until the cheese is a deep golden brown.
10: Cool slightly, slice, then serve!
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil、ground beef (1lb)、small white onion、garlic (1tablespoon)、taco seasoning (2tablespoons)、small macaroni (½lb)、water (1cup)、beef stock (2cups)、shredded white cheddar (2cups)、tomato (1cup)、green onion
instructions:
0: In a 4-quart chicken fryer, heat approximately 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium-high heat and cook the onions until they begin to soften.
1: Add garlic and stir for 30 seconds.
2: Add the ground beef and 1 tablespoon of taco seasoning. Using your spatula, break up the ground beef and stir until cooked. Drain the excess liquid from the pan.
3: Add water, beef stock, pasta, tomatoes, and 1 tablespoon of taco seasoning back to the pan. Stir to combine.
4: Cook over low heat for 15 minutes, stirring twice to keep the pasta from sticking to the bottom of the pan.
5: Increase heat to medium after 15 minutes, and stir pasta until most of the liquid is gone.
6: Turn off heat and add the shredded cheese. Stir until cheese is completely melted.
7: Top with green onions.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken thighs (2lb)、kosher salt (4teaspoons)、freshly ground black pepper、unsalted butter (3tablespoons)、onion (1cup)、garlic (3cloves)、ginger、paprika (2teaspoons)、garam masala (1 ½tablespoons)、curry powder (1tablespoon)、crushed tomato (28oz)、plain whole milk yogurt (1cup)、basmati rice、naan bread、fresh cilantro
instructions:
0: On a cutting board, pat the chicken thighs dry with paper towels. Season chicken on both sides with 1 teaspoon salt and black pepper to taste. Set aside.
1: Set Instant Pot to high on the sauté setting. Melt the butter in the pot, then add the onion and sauté until it begins to soften, 4 minutes. Add the garlic and ginger and cook until softened, stirring occasionally, 2 minutes.
2: Add the remaining 3 teaspoons salt, the paprika, garam masala, and curry powder. Cook, stirring, until the spices are aromatic and toasted, about 1 minute.
3: Add the crushed tomatoes and the chicken and stir to combine. Place the lid on the Instant Pot and seal to close. Set the machine to pressure cook on high and cook for 5 minutes.
4: Turn off the Instant Pot and let it vent naturally for 10 minutes. Then turn the quick release seal to “vent” and allow any remaining steam to vent.
5: Remove the lid. Using tongs, transfer the chicken to a cutting board. When cool enough to handle, cut into bite-sized pieces.
6: Set the machine to high on the sauté setting. Cook sauce until it is reduced by half, 10–15 minutes.
7: . Add the yogurt to the sauce and stir to combine. Return the chicken to the pot and stir to coat completely with sauce.
8: Serve chicken with basmati rice and naan and garnish with cilantro.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、onion (1cup)、ground beef (1lb)、salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (½teaspoon)、shredded cheddar cheese (⅓cup)、ketchup (2tablespoons)、yellow mustard (1tablespoon)、worcestershire sauce (½teaspoon)、pie dough (2sheets)
instructions:
0: Heat oil in a large skillet.
1: Cook down onions until translucent.
2: Add meat, 1 teaspoon salt, and ½ teaspoon pepper, and cook until meat is fully cooked. Transfer into a large bowl.
3: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
4: Combine cheese, ketchup, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, and 1 teaspoon of salt. Mix thoroughly.
5: Roll out the pie crust and cut into 4 pieces.
6: Place a spoonful of the stuffing on one side of the dough, leaving ¼ inch (6 mm) from the edge and fold over, creating a triangle.
7: With a fork, crimp down the 2 sides so the stuffing stays in.
8: Transfer onto baking sheet. Brush on egg and sprinkle on sesame seeds.
9: Bake for 20 minutes or until golden brown and pie crust is thoroughly cooked.
10: Let it cool for a few minutes
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flank steak (1lb)、soy sauce (¼cup)、sesame oil (2tablespoons)、minced garlic (2tablespoons)、brown sugar (1tablespoon)、water (½cup)、cornstarch (1tablespoon)、oil (2teaspoons)、onion (½cup)、broccoli floret (1cup)、eggs、cooked white rice (2cups)、pepper、sliced scallions
instructions:
0: Pour ¼ cup soy sauce, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 1 tablespoon of garlic, the brown sugar, water, and cornstarch over the sliced flank steak. Mix well, then let marinate in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour.
1: In a wok or deep skillet, cook the beef and marinade thoroughly, then set aside.
2: In the same pan, heat the oil over medium heat. Sauté the onion, remaining tablespoon of garlic, and broccoli until the onion is translucent. Push the cooked vegetables to the side of the pan.
3: Beat the eggs and pour into the empty half of the pan. Scramble the eggs and mix with the rest of the vegetables.
4: Add the rice, remaining 3 tablespoons of soy sauce, remaining tablespoon of sesame oil, pepper, and the cooked beef. Mix well and let the rice cook until slightly crispy.
5: Serve garnished with scallions.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instructions:
0: Slice the lettuce into about 1-inch (2 ½ cm) pieces, then transfer to a large salad bowl.
1: Add the bacon, avocado, croutons, cheese, and dressing, mixing until evenly combined.
2: Serve with additional parmesan on top.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:thick rib eye steak (1lb)、kosher salt (2tablespoons)、freshly ground black pepper (2tablespoons)、canola oil (4tablespoons)、butter (3tablespoons)、fresh thyme (2sprigs)、fresh rosemary (2bunches)、garlic (2cloves)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 250°F (120°C).
1: Season the steak evenly with the salt and pepper on all sides.
2: Place the steak on a wire rack on top of a baking sheet. Bake for 35 minutes.
3: Heat the canola oil in a skillet or stainless steel pan over high heat until smoking. Sear the steak on one side for 30 seconds, then flip.
4: Immediately, add the butter, thyme, rosemary, and garlic, swirling the pan to melt the butter quickly.
5: Place the herbs and garlic on top of the steak, and push the steak toward the top of the pan. Tilt the pan toward you to pool the butter near the bottom. Using a spoon, continuously scoop the butter over the top of the steak for about 30–45 seconds.
6: This helps not only flavor the steak, but also helps cook the steak faster. If you prefer your steak medium or medium-well, cook your steak longer.
7: To test the doneness of your steak, lightly press the tip of your left index finger to the tip of your left thumb. The fleshy area below the thumb should feel how rare steak feels pressing the surface of the steak. For medium-rare steak, touch your middle finger to your thumb and press the area below your thumb. For medium, touch your fourth finger to your thumb. For well done, touch your pinky to your thumb.
8: Rest the steak for 10 minutes on a cutting board. Slice, then serve!
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken thighs、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (¼teaspoon)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、paprika (½teaspoon)、dried basil (½teaspoon)、dried oregano (½teaspoon)、zucchinis、rice (1cup)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、salt、pepper、chicken broth (1 ½cups)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: Season the chicken thighs in a bowl with salt, pepper, garlic powder, paprika, dried basil, and dried oregano. Mix until thoroughly coated with the seasoning.
2: On high, heat olive oil in a ovenproof pot and place chicken thighs, skin-side down, in the hot oil. Cook 3-4 minutes or until the thighs develop brown crispy skin, and flip over. Cook an additional 2-3 minutes to brown the other side, and remove from the pot.
3: Grate both zucchinis with a box grater.
4: Add the grated zucchini into the pot, along with rice, garlic powder, salt, pepper, and chicken broth. Bring to a boil.
5: Lay the chicken on top of the rice mixture and cover. Bake for 30 minutes or until the chicken’s internal temperature reads 165˚F (75˚C).
6: Remove chicken and broil 1-2 minutes to crisp skin even more (optional).
7: Serve chicken on bed of rice mixture.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、garlic (4cloves)、baby carrot (1lb)、boneless, skinless chicken thighs、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、dried basil (1teaspoon)、balsamic vinegar (½cup)、onion、green beans (1lb)、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Pour olive oil and garlic in the bottom of a 6-qt slow cooker. Line the bottom with baby carrots, then place the chicken thighs over the carrots.
1: Season the chicken thighs with salt, pepper, garlic powder, basil and vinegar. Top with sliced onion.
2: Cover and cook on low heat for 8 hours or high for 4 hours. Add green beans during the last 30 minutes of cooking time.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:red bell pepper、yellow bell pepper、green bell pepper、white onion、chicken breasts、oil (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: In a small bowl, mix together all of the fajita seasoning ingredients and set aside.
2: Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil in a large, ovenproof skillet. Toss in the bell peppers and onions and sprinkle on 2 teaspoons of the fajita seasoning. Sauté until the veggies have softened, about 6 minutes.
3: Using a sharp knife, slice into the side of a chicken breast to form a large pocket, being careful not to cut all the way through.
4: Spoon in some of the fajita pepper mixture so that the breast is comfortably stuffed.
5: Season the chicken on both sides with fajita seasoning.
6: Heat the remaining oil in the skillet and brown the chicken, about 4-5 minutes per side.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、salt、pepper、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、onion powder (1tablespoon)、swiss cheese (16slices)、ham (½lb)、puff pastry (2sheets)、english mustard (¼cup)、egg
instructions:
0: Sprinkle the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and onion powder, tossing to coat evenly.
1: On a cutting board, place a chicken breast between two sheets of plastic wrap and pound until about ½-inch (1 cm) thick with a meat mallet, rolling pin, or heavy pan.
2: Remove the plastic wrap and place a layer of Swiss cheese, then ham, then one more layer of Swiss cheese.
3: Evenly roll the chicken, and place onto a new sheet of plastic wrap.
4: Wrap the chicken in the plastic wrap, twist the excess plastic, and roll the chicken while twisting the sides in to tighten and firm up the roll of chicken cordon bleu. Tie the excess and chill in the fridge to set for 30 minutes.
5: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
6: Cut the puff pastry sheets in half and gently roll out width-wise.
7: Brush the pastry with mustard and place the chicken on to the bottom edge of the pastry.
8: Tightly roll the chicken in the puff pastry, pinching the seams together to close and folding the sides under the bottom.
9: Place the chickens rolls on a greased baking sheet and brush all sides with egg wash.
10: With a fork, score a decorative design onto the surface of the puff pastry.
11: Sprinkle with salt.
12: Bake for 35-40 minutes or until the puff pastry is a dark golden brown and the internal temperature of the chicken is 165°F (75°C).
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all-purpose flour (2cups)、kosher salt (1pinch)、large eggs、large egg yolks、extra virgin olive oil (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: On a clean, sturdy work surface, turn out your chosen flour(s) and salt and make a large well in the middle with your hands.
1: Whisk the eggs, egg yolks, and olive oil together in a medium bowl until combined, then pour the mixture into the well.
2: Using the same fork, whisk the eggs, slowly incorporating more and more flour into the eggs by moving your fork along the edges of the well.
3: Once almost all of the flour is incorporated, start bringing the dough together with your hands. (The dough should be malleable, but not sticky--add more flour if the dough is sticking too much to your hands or the surface. Alternatively, if it’s too dry and tough, whisk another egg with 1 tablespoon of water and use your hand to sprinkle some of the mixture over the dough, continuing to do so until the dough is easier to knead.)
4: Knead the dough for 7-10 minutes, until the dough is smooth and elastic. When you poke the dough, it should spring back.
5: Wrap the dough in plastic wrap and let rest at room temperature for 30 minutes to an hour, or until the dough does not spring back when poked.
6: Unwrap the dough and cut into 8 equal pieces so that it’s easier to work with. Take 1 piece and wrap the rest in the plastic wrap so that they don’t dry out.
7: Lightly flour your work surface, and begin rolling out the piece of dough into one long piece. Then, fold the top third down, and the bottom third over that, like a letter. Rotate the dough 90˚ and roll the piece back into a long shape. This helps form a more even rectangular shape and makes the dough a little bit easier to work with.
8: Continue rolling out the dough until it is very thin. When you lift the dough, you should be able to see your hands through it.
9: Fold the top and bottom of the rectangle to meet in the middle, then fold over again--this will make the dough easier to cut. Cut the dough to your ideal shape. Loosen or unravel the cut dough immediately, so it doesn’t stick, sprinkle with a bit of extra flour, or semolina, if using. Let the pasta sit out for about 30 minutes to dry out slightly.
10: Bring a large pot of heavily salted water to a boil. Add the pasta and stir to ensure it doesn’t clump. Cook for 2-3 minutes, or 30 seconds to 1 minute after the pasta comes to the surface (fresh pasta will cook much faster than dried pasta!)
11: Take out a noodle and taste for doneness. Once cooked to your liking, remove the pasta from the water, being sure to save at least 1 cup (240 ML) of the pasta cooking water.
12: Add the cooked pasta into your preferred sauce and stir to coat, adding some of the reserved pasta water if needed to add a bit of body and silkiness to the sauce.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (2 ½tablespoons)、flour (3tablespoons)、milk (1 ½cups)、rotisserie chicken breasts、frozen peas (½cup)、frozen carrot (½cup)、salt、pepper、small potato、cream (½cup)、premade pie crust
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC).
1: Debone, remove skin, and shred rotisserie chicken.
2: Melt butter in a cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat.
3: Add in the flour and stir until bubbling.
4: Whisk in the milk until smooth, then add chicken, frozen peas and carrots, potato, and cream. Stir until fully mixed and bubbling.
5: Drape pie crust over the top of the skillet and cut 4 venting holes in the center.
6: Bake for 30-35 min, or until crust is golden brown. Carefully remove from the oven.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:dried spathetti (8oz)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、large yellow onion、medium carrots、celery (1stalk)、white mushroom (4cups)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、red wine (½cup)、garlic (3cloves)、diced organic tomato (28oz)、tomato paste (¼cup)、vegetable broth (2cups)、dried brown lentil (1cup)、dried basil (½teaspoon)、dried oregano (½teaspoon)、dried rosemary (½teaspoon)、baking soda (½teaspoon)、fresh parsley (¼cup)
instructions:
0: In a large pot, cook the pasta according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
1: Heat the olive oil in the same pot over medium heat. Add the onion and sauté until translucent, about 2 minutes.
2: Stir in the carrots, celery, mushrooms, salt, and pepper. Sauté until mushrooms have cooked down and are turning golden, about 5 minutes.
3: Add the wine and simmer until most of the liquid is absorbed, about 4 minutes.
4: Add the garlic and stir to combine, then add the diced tomatoes, tomato paste, broth, lentils, basil, oregano, rosemary, and baking soda. Stir to combine.
5: Bring to a boil, then cover, reduce the heat to low, and simmer for 40 minutes, until the bolognese is thickened.
6: Serve the bolognese over the pasta, or, for a lighter option, use zucchini noodles or spaghetti squash.
7: Garnish with parsley.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breast (½lb)、salt、pepper、BBQ sauce (½cup)、flour tortillas、red onion (¼cup)、monterey jack cheese (½cup)、cheddar cheese (½cup)
instructions:
0: In a large skillet, add chicken breast and season both sides with salt and pepper.
1: Cook 15-18 minutes, flipping halfway and adding the onions when you flip the chicken. (Cooking times may vary depending on thickness of the chicken breast).
2: Remove the chicken from the pan and continue to stir onions.
3: Shred the chicken while onions are cooking.
4: Return the shredded chicken to the pan with the onions. Add the BBQ sauce and stir. Remove from the pan and set aside.
5: Place a tortilla in a pan and add a layer monterey jack and cheddar cheese on half of the tortilla.
6: Place cooked chicken and onions, and top with the rest of each cheese. Fold in half and cook 6 minutes, flipping halfway.
7: Serve with extra BBQ sauce and garnish with fresh parsley.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:fresh basil (4cups)、grated parmesan cheese (1cup)、pine nuts (½cup)、garlic (2cloves)、lemon、salt、pepper、olive oil (½cup)、oil、zucchinis、cherry tomato (1cup)、boneless, skinless chicken breasts
instructions:
0: In a food processor, combine the basil, Parmesan, pine nuts, garlic, lemon juice, salt, pepper, and olive oil. Pulse until smooth texture. Set aside.
1: With a vegetable peeler, shave ribbons of the zucchini until you reach the seeds. Set aside.
2: Slice the cherry tomatoes and set aside.
3: Heat a 4-quart jumbo cooker over medium-high. Add a little oil, the chicken breasts, and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook until the chicken is cooked through and browned on all surfaces.
4: Turn off the heat and add the cherry tomatoes, pesto, and zucchini ribbons. Toss until well combined and heated through.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium eggplants、coarse salt (1tablespoon)、all-purpose flour (1cup)、dried oregano (½teaspoon)、dried basil (½teaspoon)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、vegetable oil (2cups)、marinara sauce (2 ½cups)、fresh basil (2tablespoons)、low-moisture mozzarella (2cups)、shredded parmesan cheese (1cup)、fresh mozzarella cheese (8slices)
instructions:
0: Cut each eggplant into about ½-inch (1-cm) thick round slices.
1: Arrange the slices in a single layer on a baking sheet lined with paper towels.
2: Sprinkle the eggplant with half of the coarse salt. Flip the slices over and sprinkle with the rest of the salt.
3: Put another baking sheet on top of the eggplant and place something heavy, like a cast-iron skillet, on the top baking sheet to help release moisture from the eggplant. Let sit for 30 minutes.
4: Uncover the eggplant slices and pat dry with paper towels. Brush most of the salt from the eggplant with a paper towel, then transfer to a medium bowl. Set aside.
5: In a separate medium bowl, combine the flour, oregano, basil, garlic powder, and pepper. Mix well.
6: Heat the vegetable oil in a large frying pan until it reaches 375°F (190°C).
7: Coat each eggplant slice in the flour mixture, shaking off any excess flour.
8: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
9: Fry the eggplant in batches until golden brown on both sides, 2-3 minutes per side. Drain on a paper towel-lined baking sheet and pat dry using more paper towels to absorb excess oil.
10: Pour about 1 cup (260 g) of marinara sauce into a 2½-quart (2 L) baking dish and spread evenly to cover the bottom of the dish.
11: Add about 8 eggplant slices (it’s okay if they overlap) and cover with ½ cup (130 g) of marinara. Sprinkle with a third of the fresh basil, then top with about a third of the shredded mozzarella and Parmesan. Repeat to make 2 more layers. Finish with the fresh mozzarella cheese and a final sprinkling of Parmesan.
12: Bake for 30 minutes, until the mozzarella is bubbling and golden brown.
13: Let cool for 10 minutes, then serve garnished with fresh basil.
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:salmon fillet (6oz)、butter (½cup)、garlic (3cloves)、lemon、salt、pepper、broccoli floret (4cups)、olive oil、parmesan cheese (¼cup)、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
1: In a bowl, mix butter, garlic, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
2: Lay salmon fillets on a pan, and evenly distribute the marinade.
3: Place broccoli on both sides of the salmon, and drizzle on olive oil, salt, pepper, and parmesan.
4: Bake 18 minutes.
5: Serve and garnish with parsley.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:new york strip steak (14oz)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、coarsely ground black pepper (2tablespoons)、vegetable oil (1tablespoon)、butter (2tablespoons)、cream (1cup)、brandy or cognac (⅓cup)、dijon mustard (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Liberally season steak with salt and pepper, being sure to coat the entire surface of the meat. Using your hands, press the seasoning into the meat to create an even coating.
1: Heat the vegetable oil and 1 tablespoon of butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat until just smoking. Add the steak to the pan and sear for 4 minutes. Turn and sear the other side for another 4 minutes, for medium-rare. If steak has a fat-cap on its side, be sure to sear it as well for 30 seconds to 1 minute. Once cooked to desired doneness, transfer the steak to a cutting board to rest.
2: Reduce the heat to medium and add the brandy to the skillet. Allow the brandy to cook down for about 1 minute while using a whisk to scrape off any browned bits in the bottom of the pan. Once the brandy has reduced by half, add the cream and continue to whisk until combined. Add the Dijon mustard and remaining tablespoon of butter and continue to cook until mixture begins to reduce and thicken, 5-7 minutes. The final pan sauce should have a rich consistency and coat the back of a spoon. Reduce the heat to low.
3: Slice the steak into ½-inch (1.5cm) pieces. Pour cream sauce over the top and serve.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:McCormick ® Ground Cumin (2teaspoons)、garlic powder (2teaspoons)、paprika (2teaspoons)、chili powder (2teaspoons)、dried oregano (2teaspoons)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、shrimp (1lb)、vegetable oil (1tablespoon)、sour cream (½cup)、limes、flour tortillas、red cabbage、scallion、cilantro
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, stir together McCormick Cumin, garlic powder, paprika, chili powder, dried oregano, 2 teaspoons salt, and pepper. Add in shrimp and toss to coat evenly with the spices.
1: Heat vegetable oil in a cast-iron skillet over high heat. Add in shrimp. Cook until slightly blackened, about 2 minutes. Flip and cook on the other side, another 2 minutes, until fully cooked through. Remove shrimp from pan.
2: Whisk together sour cream, lime juice, and 1⁄2 teaspoon salt.
3: Place shrimp on tortillas. Drizzle with lime sour cream. Top with red cabbage, scallions, and cilantro.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:salt (2tablespoons)、black pepper (3tablespoons)、onion powder (2tablespoons)、garlic powder (2tablespoons)、paprika (3tablespoons)、ground cumin (2tablespoons)、dried oregano (2tablespoons)、cayenne powder (2teaspoons)、all-purpose flour (3cups)、bone-in, skin-on chicken drumsticks、bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs、buttermilk (3cups)、peanut or vegetable oil、honey
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, add the salt, pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, paprika, cumin, oregano, and cayenne and mix until combined. In a another medium bowl, combine half of the spice mix with the flour, mixing until the spices are evenly distributed.
1: Add the chicken to a large bowl and sprinkle with the remaining spice blend. Mix until all the chicken pieces are evenly coated.
2: Pour the buttermilk over the chicken and stir until the residual spices from the chicken have blended in with the buttermilk to create a light orange color. Marinate the chicken in the fridge for 2 hours, or overnight.
3: Heat the oil to about 325°F (160°C) in a large cast-iron skillet.
4: Dredge each piece of chicken in the flour, shaking off any excess. Dip them back into the buttermilk mixture, then back into the flour. Make sure to shake off excess flour or it’ll burn while frying.
5: Fry 3-4 chicken pieces at a time, occasionally turning them over. Cook for 10-12 minutes, until golden brown, crispy, and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C). Rest the cooked chicken pieces on a wire rack to let excess oil drain off.
6: Drizzle the chicken with honey, then serve.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:firm tofu (8oz)、sweet potato、onion、garlic (2cloves)、peanut or vegetable oil (1tablespoon)、chickpeas (1cup)、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、chili powder (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、cooked quinoa (1 ½cups)、leafy greens (1cup)、shredded carrots (¼cup)、avocado、Juice of 1 lemon
instructions:
0: Make the marinade: In a small bowl, combine the vegetable oil, sesame oil, hot sauce, thyme, paprika, and salt. Set aside.
1: Add the marinade and tofu to a container and marinate for at least 30 minutes, or up to a day.
2: Preheat the oven to 400ºF (200ºC).
3: Lay the sweet potato, onion, and garlic on a baking sheet and drizzle with oil. Season with salt and pepper. Bake for 20-25 minutes.
4: In a medium bowl, add the chickpeas, salt, pepper, chili powder, and garlic powder to a bowl and stir to combine.
5: Transfer chickpeas to a skillet and cook over medium heat for about 10 minutes. Set chickpeas aside.
6: Fry the tofu in the same pan for about 10 minutes on each side.
7: Slice tofu to your preference.
8: Combine the quinoa, greens, sweet potatoes, onions, chickpeas, carrots, tofu, and avocado in a medium-large bowl and top off with lemon juice
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:tuna (5oz)、large avocado、carrot (1cup)、celery (2ribs)、red onion (¼cup)、dijon mustard (¼cup)、lemon juice (1tablespoon)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、salt、pepper、whole wheat tortillas、green leaf lettuce (4leaves)、cherry tomatoes (1cup)
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, add the tuna and avocado. Use a fork to smash the avocado and tuna together.
1: Add the carrots, celery, red onion, Dijon mustard, lemon juice, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine.
2: Lay a tortilla flat on a plate. Lay a lettuce leaf on the tortilla. Scoop ¼ of the tuna mixture into the center of the lettuce and spread down the middle.  Top with cherry tomatoes and carefully roll the the tortilla to create a wrap. Repeat with the remaining ingredients.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breast (1 ½lb)、kosher salt (1 ½tablespoons)、olive oil (3tablespoons)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、garlic (4cloves)、all purpose flour (1tablespoon)、chicken broth (1 ½cups)、French's Dijon Mustard (2tablespoons)、freshly ground black pepper (¼teaspoon)、heavy cream (3tablespoons)、fresh parsley (1tablespoon)、lemon、baby bella mushrooms (½lb)、asparagus (½lb)、peas (½cup)
instructions:
0: Season the chicken evenly on both sides with 1½ tablespoons salt. Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a shallow pan over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and sear for 3-4 minutes on each side. Remove chicken from the pan (it will not be fully cooked) and set aside. Wipe out the pan if it looks charred.
1: Melt the butter in the pan over low heat. Add the garlic and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 1 minute, then whisk in flour. Pour in the chicken broth, whisking, then add French’s Dijon Mustard, ½ teaspoon salt, and ¼ teaspoon pepper, and whisk until smooth. Simmer sauce for 1-2 minutes, then stir in the heavy cream. Return the sauce to a simmer, place the chicken in the sauce, and cover the pan with a lid. Simmer until chicken is fully cooked through, 5–10 minutes.
2: Remove chicken from the pan. Stir the minced parsley and lemon zest into the sauce, then taste for seasoning. Slice the chicken. Remove the sauce from the heat.
3: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil is hot, add the mushrooms and season with salt to taste. Saute mushrooms, stirring occasionally, until golden brown, 7–10 minutes. Remove mushrooms from the pan.
4: Heat remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil in the pan. Add asparagus and sauté, stirring occasionally, until tender, about 3 minutes. Season with salt to taste. Add the peas and cook 1 minute more.
5: Place the vegetables on a plate. Top with sliced chicken and drizzle with the dijon sauce. Garnish with chopped parsley.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:soy sauce (1cup)、garlic (4cloves)、ginger (2teaspoons)、sesame oil (2tablespoons)、rice vinegar (2tablespoons)、honey (2tablespoons)、creamy peanut butter (¼cup)
instructions:
0: In a bowl, add the soy sauce, sesame oil, honey, rice vinegar, peanut butter, garlic, and ginger, and whisk to combine.
1: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large pan over high heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the cubed chicken and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the chicken is cooked through, about 5 to 7 minutes.
2: Transfer the chicken to the bowl, and wipe the wok clean.
3: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in the cleaned wok over high heat.
4: Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the red onion, broccoli, and red cabbage, and cook, stirring frequently, for 3 minutes.
5: Add the red bell peppers and snap peas and cook for 3 minutes, stirring frequently, until the peppers begin to soften.
6: Add the carrots and cook for 2 minutes, stirring frequently.
7: Add the chicken, cooked rice noodles, and sauce, and stir until fully incorporated.
8: Serve with cilantro, scallions, and sesame seeds.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、salt、pepper、alfredo sauce (24oz)、broccoli head (1lb)、parmesan cheese (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: Spread a layer of alfredo sauce on the baking dish. Place chicken breast over sauce. Season chicken with salt and pepper, to taste.
2: Spread broccoli over chicken.
3: Pour remaining alfredo over chicken and broccoli.
4: Top with Parmesan cheese.
5: Bake for 40 minutes.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:top sirloin steak (½lb)、pico de gallo、corn tortillas
instructions:
0: Place the avocado, cilantro, lime juice, water, and salt in a blender or food processor. Blend until smooth and set aside.
1: In a small bowl, combine the chili powder, cumin, oregano, salt, pepper, garlic, and lime juice.
2: Rub the chili lime rub all over the steak in a thin, even layer.
3: Grill the steak on either a grill or stove-top grill pan. To get the “X” grill marks, sear the steak for 1 minute, then adjust about 90 degrees and grill for another minute. Flip the steak when you’ve achieved desired grill marks and repeat the process on the other side.
4: Allow the steak to rest for 5-10 minutes once taken off the heat.
5: Slice the steak thinly, against the grain of the meat.
6: Prepare the tacos by topping the corn tortillas with a few strips of meat, salsa, the avocado cilantro lime sauce, and cilantro, and serve.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:salt (2tablespoons)、ground pepper (1tablespoon)、ground cumin (1tablespoon)、smoked paprika (1tablespoon)、ground turmeric (1tablespoon)、coriander (1tablespoon)、ground cardamom (1teaspoon)、dry mustard (1teaspoon)、cayenne (1teaspoon)、allspice (½teaspoon)、boneless, skinless chicken thighs (3lb)、full-fat yogurt (5tablespoons)、garlic (9cloves)、fresh ginger (1tablespoon)、olive oil (3tablespoons)、carrots、white onion、yukon gold potato (1lb)、tomato paste (2tablespoons)、crushed tomatoes (28oz)、chicken broth (2cups)、basmati rice (2cups)、fresh cilantro、Lime wedge
instructions:
0: In a small bowl, combine the salt, pepper, cumin, smoked paprika, turmeric, coriander, cardamom, dry mustard, cayenne, and allspice. Stir to combine.
1: In a large bowl, add the cubed chicken thighs, 2 tablespoons of yogurt, 4 cloves of minced garlic, the ginger, and half of the spice mixture. Toss the chicken until it is fully coated. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap, and marinate in the fridge for 2 hours or overnight.
2: Make the naan bowls: In a liquid measuring cup, combine the warm water, sugar, and yeast. Set aside to bloom for 10 minutes.
3: In the meantime, mix the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt together in a large bowl.
4: To the yeast mixture, add the yogurt and milk. Stir until smooth, then pour into the dry ingredients. Stir to combine, then dump the dough out onto a floured surface and knead with your hands until it forms a smooth, soft ball, about 2 minutes.
5: Place the dough in a clean large bowl greased with olive oil and cover with a clean kitchen towel or plastic wrap. Let rise at room temperature until doubled in size, about 2 hours.
6: Heat the olive oil in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Working in batches to avoid overcrowding the pot, cook the marinated chicken on all sides until cooked through and browned, about 20 minutes. Drizzle in more oil, as needed, to prevent the meat from sticking to the bottom of the pot. Transfer the browned meat to a plate as it finishes cooking and set aside.
7: Add the carrots, onion, potatoes, remaining 5 cloves of minced garlic, and reserved spice mixture, Stir and cook until the vegetables brown slightly and start to soften, 15 minutes.
8: Stir in the tomato paste and cook until aromatic, about 3 minutes.
9: Add the crushed tomatoes and chicken broth. Stir to combine. Bring to a simmer.
10: Add the chicken, stir, and return to a simmer. Cover and cook for 30 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and the chicken is cooked through.
11: Stir in the remaining 3 tablespoons of yogurt, then cover and keep warm.
12: Once the naan dough has risen, dump onto a floured surface, and divide into 6 equal portions. Roll each portion into a ¼-inch (1 /2 cm) thick circle, approximately 10 inches (25 cm) in diameter.
13: Heat a large cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat. Place a disc of naan dough in the skillet. Cook for about 2 minutes, until the dough puffs up, then flip and cook on the other side until browned, 1 minute. Transfer the naan to a medium bowl and place another bowl on top. Repeat with the rest of the naan dough, stacking bowls between each round. As the naan cools, they will retain the bowl shape.
14: Brush the naan bowls with warm melted butter.
15: Fill the naan bowls with the chicken curry and rice. Serve with yogurt, cilantro, and lime wedges.
16: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:lemon pepper (3tablespoons)、paprika (1tablespoon)、garlic (2cloves)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、chicken thighs with skin (2lb)、butter (4tablespoons)、yellow onion、arborio rice (1 ½cups)、white wine (¼cup)、chicken broth (4cups)、milk (1 ½cups)、pepper、parmesan cheese (1cup)、fresh parsley (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Combine lemon pepper, paprika, and 2 cloves of minced garlic in a small bowl.
1: In a large oven-proof pot, heat olive oil on medium heat. Season both sides of the chicken and place in the pot skin side down. Cook for three minutes, turn the heat up to medium high and cook for an additional two minutes (or until browned). Turn the chicken over and cook for another 3-4 minutes. Remove chicken from the pot and set aside. (Don’t worry! It will finish cooking when you put it in the oven.)
2: With a paper towel, carefully wipe out excess fat, leaving the seasoning.
3: Preheat your oven to 350˚F (175˚C).
4: On medium high, melt two Tbsp. of butter in the pot and add the diced onions and the rest of the minced garlic. Cook until onions are translucent (1-2 minutes).
5: Add the rice and stir until it becomes translucent (1-2 minutes).
6: Pour in the white wine and let it cook until most of the wine has evaporated (about two minutes).
7: Add the chicken broth, one cup of milk, and a dash of pepper and stir. Bring it to a simmer.
8: Place the chicken back into the pot. Cover with a lid or foil and bake for 30 minutes (remove lid after 20 minutes).
9: Remove the chicken from the pot and broil on high for 2-3 minutes or until the skin has nicely browned.
10: Add the other two Tbsp. butter, parmesan, ½ cup (118 ml) of milk and parsley to the rice. Stir until well combined. Return the chicken on top of the rice.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (3tablespoons)、boneless, skinless chicken breast (1 ½lb)、white mushroom (2cups)、white onion、chicken stock (3cups)、heavy cream (1 ½cups)、marsala wine (1cup)、penne pasta (3cups)、shredded parmesan cheese (1cup)、salt、pepper、fresh parsley (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Heat a large pot over medium-high heat.
1: Add 2 tablespoons of olive oil and chicken breast. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
2: Cook until chicken is no longer pink. Remove and set aside.
3: Add the remaining tablespoon of oil, and the mushrooms and onion. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Cook until onions are browned, stirring occasionally.
4: Return the chicken to the pot. Add the stock, cream, wine, and pasta, bring up to a simmer, and cover.
5: *Marsala wine can be purchased at most grocery stores near the dessert or sweet wines and gives the dish a distinct flavor. However, if you can’t get your hands on Marsala, you can substitute 1 cup of white wine (240 ml) plus 1 ½ tablespoons of brandy.
6: Simmer until pasta is tender, about 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
7: When pasta is tender, stir in parmesan cheese until smooth. Remove from heat.
8: Garnish with fresh parsley.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、garlic (3cloves)、chicken breasts、asparagus (2cups)、cherry tomato (1cup)、carrot (1cup)、pepper (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、penne pasta (4cups)、parmesan cheese (1cup)
instructions:
0: Heat oil in a large pot over high heat. Cook garlic and chicken until no pink is showing.
1: Add asparagus, tomatoes, carrots, salt, and pepper, cooking for about 2 minutes.
2: Add pasta and parmesan, stirring until cheese is melted and evenly distributed.
3: Serve.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:potato (1lb)、olive oil、salt、pepper、lemon juice (3tablespoons)、garlic (2cloves)、onion powder (½teaspoon)、paprika (½teaspoon)、dried thyme (½teaspoon)、dried parsley (½teaspoon)、honey (2tablespoons)、salmon fillets、asparagus (1bunch)、lemon (6slices)、fresh thyme (4sprigs)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C)
1: Add potatoes to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
2: Season with olive oil, thyme, salt, and pepper.
3: Bake for 20 minutes.
4: To prepare salmon marinade, combine lemon juice, garlic, onion powder, paprika, thyme, parsley, and honey, and stir until evenly combined.
5: On the same baking tray, push the potatoes to one side of the tray and add salmon and asparagus.
6: Season the salmon and asparagus with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Brush the marinade on the salmon.
7: Top salmon with lemon slices and thyme springs.
8: Bake for 12-14 minutes or until salmon is cooked.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chuck roast (3lb)、all-purpose flour (⅓cup)、salt (1 ½tablespoons)、pepper (½tablespoon)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、red onion (1cup)、celery stalk、carrot、garlic (3cloves)、can of plum tomatoes (28oz)、red wine (2cups)、bay leaf、fresh parsley (1tablespoon)、chopped fresh sage (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: In a small bowl, combine the flour, 1 tablespoon of salt, and the pepper. Rub the flour mixture on the beef, making sure it is covered entirely.
1: Heat oil in large skillet. Sear the meat on all sides until golden brown.
2: Transfer meat to a slow cooker. Add the onion, celery, carrot, garlic, tomatoes, wine, bay leaf, and remaining ½ tablespoon salt. Cook on low for 8 hours.
3: Remove and discard the bay leaf. Stir in the parsley and sage. Serve the stew with your favorite side dish and sprinkle more parsley on top.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:potato (1lb)、butter (2tablespoons)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、shredded parmesan cheese (½cup)、milk (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: Place cooked potatoes into a large bowl. Add butter, salt, pepper, parmesan, and a splash of milk. Mash and add more milk gradually until the potatoes are the desired texture. Set aside and let cool.
2: Prepare the glaze by mixing ketchup, brown sugar, onion powder, mustard powder, and paprika in a bowl. Reserve half in a separate bowl to glaze once cooked.
3: Add oil in a skillet over medium heat, followed by onions and garlic. Cook until onions are translucent and fragrant. Set aside in a bowl to cool before adding to the meat mixture.
4: In a large bowl, combine ground beef, salt, pepper, worcestershire sauce, parmesan, parsley, cooled onions & garlic, egg, breadcrumbs and milk. Mix until combined.
5: Using a spoon or ice cream scooper, scoop the meat mixture and place into a greased 12 cup cupcake baking tin.
6: Using your fingers, spread the meat from the center to make a cup. Fill the middle with a small spoonful of mashed potatoes, and cover back up with the meat mixture.
7: Generously brush half of the reserved glaze on top of the meatloaf cups generously.
8: Bake for 25 minutes, reapplying the glaze halfway through. Once they are done cooking, brush with the remaining glaze that has Not been used on the raw meatloaves.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、turmeric (1tablespoon)、chili powder (1tablespoon)、ground cumin (1tablespoon)、garam masala (1tablespoon)、ground ginger (½tablespoon)、white wine vinegar (2tablespoons)、oil、red chili、tomato (2cups)、water (½cup)、salt、pepper、rice、fresh coriander
instructions:
0: Cut the chicken into bite-size pieces.
1: Season the chicken with turmeric, chili powder, cumin, garam masala, ginger, and white wine vinegar, and mix well.
2: Heat oil in a pot over a medium heat. Add the chicken and cook until brown.
3: Add the chili, chopped tomatoes, water, salt, and pepper.
4: Mix well and bring to a boil.
5: Simmer for 1 hour, until the sauce has thickened.
6: Serve with rice and chopped coriander.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:rotisserie chicken (2cups)、diced tomato (14.5oz)、corn (15oz)、red onion、ranch dressing (1 ½cups)、BBQ sauce (1cup)、fusilli pasta (16oz)、pepper、shredded mozzarella cheese (2cups)、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: In a bowl, combine chicken, tomatoes, corn, onion, ranch, and BBQ sauce.
2: Add the pasta, and mix until evenly coated.
3: Pour mixture into a 9x13 (22 x 33 cm) baking dish. Sprinkle with pepper to taste.
4: Top with mozzarella, and bake uncovered for 30 minutes.
5: Top with fresh parsley.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:garlic (1head)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、freshly ground black pepper (1 ½teaspoons)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、large eggs、panko breadcrumbs (2cups)、boneless, skinless chicken breasts、vegetable oil (6tablespoons)、large shrimps
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Drizzle the halved head of garlic with the olive oil and season with ½ teaspoon salt and ¼  teaspoon pepper. Wrap the garlic in foil.
2: Bake for 40–50 minutes, until the garlic cloves are golden and tender. Set aside to cool.
3: Season the chicken on both sides with 1 teaspoon salt and 1 teaspoon pepper.
4: Add the eggs and panko to 2 shallow dishes.
5: Coat the chicken breasts in the eggs, then dredge in the bread crumbs, making sure bread crumbs adhere to the chicken.
6: Heat 3 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat until shimmering. Working in batches to avoid overcrowding the pan, add the chicken to the hot oil and cook until golden brown on both sides and cooked through, 5–8 minutes.  Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside. Wipe out the pan to remove any remaining oil and bread crumbs.
7: Season the shrimp with ¼ teaspoon pepper and ½ teaspoon salt. Coat the shrimp in the eggs, then dredge in the bread crumbs, making sure the bread crumbs adhere to the shrimp.
8: Heat the remaining 3 tablespoons of oil in the same pan over medium heat. When the oil is shimmering, add the shrimp to the skillet and cook for 2–3 minutes per side, or until golden brown. Remove the shrimp from the pan and set aside. Wipe out the pan to remove any remaining oil and bread crumbs.
9: Make the whiskey glaze: Squeeze the cloves from one half of the roasted garlic head into a medium bowl. Using the back of a fork, mash the garlic cloves into a paste. Add the pineapple juice, water, soy sauce, teriyaki sauce, and brown sugar. Whisk until the sugar dissolves.
10: Pour the sauce into the same skillet and bring to a simmer over medium heat. Once simmering, whisk in the lemon zest and juice, onion, crushed pineapple, whiskey, and cayenne. Gently simmer for 20–30 minutes, or until the sauce is thick and syrupy.
11: While sauce is cooking, make the mashed potatoes: Add the potatoes to a large pot and cover with cold water by 1 inch (2 ½ cm). Bring to a boil over high heat and cook until fork-tender, about 20 minutes.
12: Drain the potatoes and return to the warm pot. Add the remaining half head of roasted garlic cloves. Mash into the potatoes with a potato masher or wooden spoon. Add the butter and cream and stir to incorporate. Season with the remaining salt and pepper.
13: Return the chicken and shrimp to the skillet and turn to coat in the sauce. Transfer the chicken and shrimp to plates with a few spoonfuls of the mashed potatoes and garnish with the parsley.
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cube steak (8oz)、kosher salt (1 ½teaspoons)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、large eggs、whole milk (2 ¾cups)、all-purpose flour (1 ½cups)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、onion powder (1teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、vegetable oil (1cup)、unsalted butter (3tablespoons)、heavy cream (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 225˚F (110˚C).
1: Set a steak in the center of a cutting board and cover with a piece of plastic wrap. Using a meat mallet, pound the steak evenly to ¼-inch (½ cm) thick. Season with salt and pepper on both sides. Repeat with the remaining meat.
2: In a wide, shallow dish, whisk together the eggs and 1 cup (240 ml) of milk. In a separate shallow dish, mix together the 1 ½ cups (190 g) of flour, pepper, salt, garlic powder, onion powder, and paprika.
3: Dredge the steaks in the flour mixture, then dip in the egg mixture, letting any excess egg drip off. Coat again in the flour mixture. Set aside for 10-15 minutes, until the coating has dried out a bit.
4: Meanwhile, heat the oil in a 10-inch (25.5 cm) pan over medium-high heat until it reaches 375˚F (190˚C).
5: Fry the steaks, 2 at a time, for 3 minutes, until golden brown and crispy. Flip and cook on the other side for 3 minutes more, until golden brown and cooked through when the internal temperature reaches 155˚-165˚F (170˚-175˚C). Transfer the steaks to a paper towel-lined plate or baking sheet and immediately season with salt. Once all of the steaks are done frying, transfer to the oven while you prepare the gravy.
6: Pour the hot oil into a heatproof bowl and let cool before discarding. 9. Leave any browned bits in the pan.
7: In the same pan, without wiping it out, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the remaining 3 tablespoons of flour, whisking to incorporate. Cook for 2-3 minutes, until the roux is a light brown color.  Add the heavy cream and remaining milk. Bring to a simmer and cook, whisking constantly, until thickened, 5-7 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
8: Ladle the gravy over the steaks and serve with your favorite side dishes.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium red onion、olive oil (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: In a large pot, sauté the diced red onion and minced garlic in 1 tablespoon of olive oil until translucent, about 5 minutes.
1: Add the water, green lentils, and salt to the large pot. Bring to a boil.
2: Cover with lid and simmer for 10 minutes.
3: To make the caramelized onions, heat a tablespoon of olive oil over low heat and add the onion slices, stirring occasionally until completely soft, dark brown, and caramelized.
4: NOTE: This will take about 30 minutes. The onions should become very dark and tacky when finished. Stir often to avoid burning.
5: Add the rice, cumin, cinnamon, and bayleaf to the lentils. Stir.
6: Cook covered for about 15 minutes, or until rice is cooked.
7: Serve lentils and rice topped with the caramelized onions, chopped fresh parsley, lemon wedges, and Greek yogurt if desired.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (¼cup)、large yellow onions、garlic (10cloves)、kosher salt、pepper、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、tomato paste (12oz)、crushed tomato (55oz)、dried basil (1tablespoon)、dried oregano (1tablespoon)、dried parsley (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Set a wire rack over a baking sheet and grease with nonstick spray.
1: Make the marinara sauce: Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the onions and garlic and season with salt, pepper, and the red pepper flakes. Cook until soft and caramelized, about 15 minutes.
2: Set aside ⅓ cup (50 G) of the cooked onions and garlic for the meatballs and let cool.
3: Stir the tomato paste into the onions and cook until browned and aromatic, 3-5 minutes.
4: Add the crushed tomatoes, dried basil, dried oregano, and dried parsley. Stir together and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for at least 30 minutes.
5: Make the meatballs: In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, ground pork, reserved onion and garlic mixture, bread crumbs, ricotta, parsley, eggs, Parmesan, milk, salt, and pepper. Mix with your hands until well combined.
6: Shape about 2 ounces (55 G) of meat at a time into balls and set on the prepared wire rack.
7: Bake the meatballs for 20 minutes, until the outsides are browned and the centers are tender and juicy and reach about 155˚F (68˚C).
8: Bring a large pot of water to boil and add a generous pinch of salt. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions, 7-10 minutes, until al dente. Stir occasionally to keep the noodles from sticking together.
9: Drain the pasta and add it directly to the simmering marinara sauce. Reserve some pasta water, in case you need it to loosen the sauce. Stir the pasta into the sauce until fully coated.
10: Add the pasta to serving bowls, top with the meatballs, and garnish with Parmesan, fresh basil, and cracked pepper.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:firm tofu (14oz)、vegetable oil (1teaspoon)、sesame oil (1 ½teaspoons)、broccoli florets (3cups)、vegetable broth (3tablespoons)、garlic cloves、grated ginger (1teaspoon)、soy sauce (¼cup)、agave syrup (2tablespoons)、rice vinegar (1tablespoon)、cornstarch (1tablespoon)、toasted sesame seeds (¹¹⁄₂teaspoon)、cooked white rice、sliced scallions
instructions:
0: Wrap the tofu in 2 layers of paper towels and place on a plate. Put another plate on top of the tofu to weigh it down and microwave for 2-3 minutes, or until drained.
1: After microwaving, carefully unwrap the tofu and slice into ½-1 inch cubes. Pat each cube dry.
2: In a large nonstick skillet, heat the vegetable oil and 1 teaspoon of sesame oil over medium-high heat. Once the oil is hot, add the tofu and cook on all sides until golden brown, 2-4 minutes per side, then remove from the pan and set aside.
3: Add broccoli to the hot pan with the vegetable broth. Cover and reduce the heat to medium-low. Steam for 5 minutes.
4: Remove the lid and increase the heat to medium-high.
5: Add the garlic, ginger, and remaining ½ teaspoon of sesame oil. Stir until softened.
6: Add the soy sauce, agave, rice vinegar, and cornstarch slurry. Stir until thickened to your desired consistency. Add the sesame seeds and stir to incorporate.
7: Return the tofu to the pan and toss to coat in the sauce.
8: Serve over white rice and garnish with scallions and sesame seeds.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bacon (8oz)、small yellow onion、red bell pepper (½cup)、shredded carrot (1cup)、garlic (2cloves)、lean ground beef (1lb)、kosher salt、smoked paprika (1tablespoon)、tomato paste (2tablespoons)、diced tomato (1can)、beef stock (3cups)、whole milk (2cups)、pasta shells (1lb)、shredded smoked gouda cheese (2cups)、shredded cheddar cheese (2cups)、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Add the bacon to a large pot. Turn the heat to medium-high and cook until crispy, 5–7 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer the bacon to a paper towel-lined plate to drain. Discard all but 1 tablespoon of the rendered bacon fat in the pot.
1: Reduce the heat to medium and add the onion to the pot. Cook until softened, 5–7 minutes. Add the red bell pepper, carrots, and garlic. Cook until softened, 2–3 minutes more.
2: Increase the heat to medium-high and add the ground beef to the pan. Break up the beef with spatula and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Season with salt.
3: Add the paprika and tomato paste. Cook until fragrant and the tomato paste turns brick-red in color, 2–3 minutes. Add the diced tomatoes, beef stock, and milk and bring to a low boil.
4: Once the liquid is boiling, add the pasta shells. Cover and cook for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the noodles are al dente and they have absorbed most of the liquid. NOTE: The timing will differ depending on what type of noodles you use.
5: Remove the pot from the heat. Stir in the Gouda and cheddar cheeses until melted. Fold in the cooked bacon.
6: Garnish with parsley, if desired.
7: Serve immediately.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:soy sauce (½cup)、balsamic vinegar (½cup)、olive oil (¼cup)、garlic (2cloves)、salmon (12oz)
instructions:
0: In a square baking dish, combine the soy sauce, balsamic vinegar, oil, and garlic, and whisk to combine.
1: Put 2 of the salmon fillets in the soy and balsamic mixture, making sure all sides are coated.
2: Transfer to the refrigerator, marinading for 30 minutes to 2 hours.
3: Preheat oven to 450˚F (230˚C).
4: In a small bowl, mix together the paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper.
5: Evenly coat the remaining 2 salmon filets with the spice rub.
6: Place the salmon and vegetables on a parchment paper-lined baking tray.
7: Drizzle olive oil and sprinkle salt and pepper to taste over the vegetables.
8: Bake for 11 minutes per inch (2.5 cm) of salmon thickness.
9: Divide the salmon and vegetables into 4 containers, mix and matching the vegetables to your liking.
10: Refrigerate for up to 3 days.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cream cheese (4oz)、hot sauce (¼cup)、chicken (2 ½cups)、shredded monterey jack cheese (1cup)、mozzarella cheese (1cup)、refrigerated crescent dinner roll (8oz)
instructions:
0: In a bowl, mix cream cheese and hot sauce until smooth.
1: Mix in chicken and Monterey Jack cheese.
2: Unroll cans of dough, separate into triangles. On a large cookie sheet, arrange the triangles in ring, dough should overlap, leaving around 5 inches (12 ¾ cm) in the center.
3: Layer half of the Mozzarella on each triangle closest to the ring.
4: Spoon mixture on top of the Mozzarella. Top with the rest of the Mozzarella.
5: Bring the top of the triangle over the filling and tuck the edges under the bottom layer of dough. Repeat around the ring until the entire filling is enclosed.
6: Bake at 375˚F (190˚C) for 35 minutes or until the dough is golden brown.
7: Cool 5 to 10 minutes before cutting into serving slices. Serve with choice dressing.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cooked chicken (2 ½cups)、red onion (1cup)、BBQ sauce (1cup)、mozzarella cheese (1cup)、crescent dough (16pieces)、ranch dressing
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
1: In a large bowl, combine shredded chicken, red onion, and BBQ sauce.
2: Place a small bowl, filled with mozzarella cheese, in the middle of a greased baking pan and arrange crescent dough triangles around the bowl with the smallest angle on the outside.
3: Sprinkle ½ of the cheese along the inside of the ring and spoon BBQ chicken mixture on top of the cheese, also in a circular shape. Top with the rest of the mozzarella.
4: Lay the top of the triangle over the filling and repeat until the all of the triangles have been wrapped around the filling.
5: Bake for 25 minutes or until golden brown.
6: Cut into pieces and serve with choice dressing in a bowl in the middle.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:penne pasta (8oz)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、white onion、garlic (1clove)、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、dried basil (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、vodka (½cup)、tomato sauce (1 ½cups)、heavy cream (½cup)
instructions:
0: Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet.
1: Add onion and 1 clove of garlic, and cook until onions are translucent.
2: Add tomato sauce and mix to combine with onion and garlic.
3: Add vodka, dried basil, red pepper flakes, and salt. Let this to simmer for 2 minutes to allow most of the alcohol to burn off.
4: Add heavy cream and stir until fully combined. The sauce will turn into a beautiful light orange creamy mixture.
5: Add cooked pasta to vodka sauce and mix until noodles are fully coated in sauce.
6: Cover with a lid and let simmer for 5 minutes or until the sauce has reduced by half.
7: Garnish with basil.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:canola oil (2tablespoons)、red bell pepper、green bell pepper、yellow bell pepper、onion、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、fresh ground black pepper (1teaspoon)、cream cheese (4oz)、shredded cheddar cheese (½cup)、pepper jack cheese (½cup)、boneless, skinless chicken breasts、salt (2teaspoons)、chili powder (2teaspoons)、cumin (2teaspoons)、garlic powder (2teaspoons)、canola oil (3tablespoons)、salsa、sour cream、guacamole
instructions:
0: Heat the canola oil (for the veggies) in a pan over high heat. Cook the peppers, onion, salt, and pepper until soft and slightly caramelized.
1: Transfer the cooked veggies to a bowl. In the same bowl, mix in the cream cheese, cheddar, and pepper jack, stirring until evenly incorporated. Set aside.
2: In a separate bowl, combine the chicken with the salt, chili powder, cumin, and garlic powder, evenly distributing the spices over the chicken.
3: On a cutting board, slice a pocket in the chicken horizontally.
4: Fill the pocket with a heaping spoonful of the veggie mixture. Press the edges of the chicken together to seal in the filling. Repeat with the remaining chicken.
5: Heat the canola oil in a pan over medium heat. Cook the stuffed chicken for five minutes on each side, until cheese is melted and chicken is cooked through.
6: Serve with salsa, sour cream, and guacamole!
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken (2lb)、dried bay leaves、soy sauce (5tablespoons)、vinegar (2tablespoons)、garlics、water (1cup)、cooking oil (¼cup)、white sugar (1tablespoon)、salt、whole peppercorn
instructions:
0: In a container or a plastic food bag, combine soy sauce and garlic then marinade the chicken for 30 minutes.
1: Place a medium pan on medium heat and add oil, once the oil is hot put the marinated chicken and brown (about five minutes).
2: Pour in the remaining marinade and add water, then bring to a boil.
3: Add the dried bay leaves and whole peppercorn. Simmer for 30 minutes or until the chicken is tender.
4: Add the vinegar, stir and simmer for 10 more minutes.
5: Add the sugar, salt, and stir. Then remove from heat.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、salt (1tablespoon)、pepper (1tablespoon)、sundried tomatoes、pesto (3tablespoons)、shredded mozzarella cheese (3oz)、oil (3tablespoons)
instructions:
0: On a cutting board, salt and pepper both sides of each chicken breast with approximately ½ teaspoon salt and ½ teaspoon pepper, per side.
1: Slice each chicken breast horizontally along the side to create a pocket for the filling.
2: Stuff each breast with approximately one third of mozzarella cheese, one tablespoon pesto and four sundried tomatoes. If the chicken breast does not close fully with the filling, try securing with a wooden toothpick.
3: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat.
4: Pan fry for about 5-8 minutes, per side, depending on the size of the chicken breasts, until the cheese is melted and the chicken is cooked through. Serve warm.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:garlic (3cloves)、fresh ginger (2teaspoons)、scallions、soy sauce (¼cup)、sesame oil (4tablespoons)、mirin (1tablespoon)、light brown sugar (1tablespoon)、boneless, skinless chicken thighs (1lb)、fresh spinach (4cups)、kosher salt、freshly ground black pepper、large carrots、shiitake mushroom (8oz)、unsalted butter (1tablespoon)、large eggs
instructions:
0: In a shallow dish, combine 2 cloves of garlic, the ginger, 2 thinly sliced scallions, the soy sauce, 2 tablespoons sesame oil, the mirin, and brown sugar, and whisk to combine.
1: Add the chicken and toss to coat. Cover with plastic wrap and let marinate in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.
2: Bring a large pot of water to boil over high heat and season generously with salt. Prepare an ice bath in a large bowl. Blanch the spinach in the boiling water for 30 seconds, then transfer to the ice bath to shock, then drain. Transfer to a small bowl and season with 1 teaspoon of sesame oil, salt, and pepper.
3: In a medium skillet, heat 1 teaspoon of sesame oil over medium heat. Add the carrots and cook until softened, 2-3 minutes. Remove from the pan and set aside. Season with salt.
4: In the same skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of sesame oil over medium-high heat. Add the remaining clove of garlic and cook for 30 seconds, until fragrant. Add the mushrooms and cook, stirring frequently, until softened, about 2 minutes. Season with salt, then remove from the pan and set aside.
5: In the same skillet, heat the remaining tablespoon of sesame oil over medium-high heat. Add the marinated chicken and sauté, stirring occasionally, until cooked through, about 5 minutes.
6: Heat a nonstick pan over medium-high heat. Melt the butter in the pan. Once the foaming subsides, crack the eggs into the pan and cook until the whites are firm and golden brown around the edges and the yolks are still runny, or to your desired doneness.
7: To assemble the bibimbap bowls, top the rice with the chicken, kimchi, sliced scallions, carrots, spinach, mushrooms, cucumbers, and fried eggs.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sea scallop (1lb)、fine sea salt、black pepper、extra virgin olive oil (1tablespoon)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、garlic (1clove)、dry white wine (1tablespoon)、fresh chives (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Pat the scallops dry with a paper towel.
1: Season with salt and pepper.
2: In a large skillet set over medium-high heat, add the oil.
3: When the oil is hot, add the scallops and cook until golden brown on one side, 2-3 minutes.
4: Gently turn the scallops, and add the butter and garlic to the pan.
5: Continue to cook, spooning the butter over the scallops until they are cooked through, about 3 minutes more.
6: Add the white wine, cook another 10 seconds.
7: Serve with chives.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:salt (1tablespoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、onion powder (1teaspoon)、cayenne (½teaspoon)、ground cumin (2teaspoons)、chili powder (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (2teaspoons)、baby back ribs (2lb)、diced pineapple (20oz)、barbecue sauce (28oz)
instructions:
0: In a small bowl, combine the salt, pepper, onion powder, cayenne, cumin, chili powder, and garlic powder.
1: Rub the spice mix all over the baby back ribs.
2: Drain the juice from the can of pineapple and add to the slow cooker, along with the barbecue sauce. Stir to combine.
3: Add the diced pineapple and ribs to the slow cooker and cover with the sauce.
4: Cover and cook on high for 4 hours. Halfway through, flip the racks of ribs so the one that was previously on the bottom is now on top. Cover with more sauce.
5: Remove the ribs from the slow cooker and cut into individual pieces. Serve with the leftover sauce and pineapple chunks.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、garlic (2cloves)、onion、hot dog sausages、tomatoes、sugar (½tablespoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、heavy milk (7oz)、penne pasta (½lb)、water (16oz)、green onion (2tablespoons)、parmesan cheese
instructions:
0: In a big pot, add the olive oil, the garlic, the onion and mix it well.
1: Add the hot dog sausages and mix it well. Add the tomatoes and mix it well.
2: Add the seasoning: sugar, salt and pepper. Mix it well.
3: Add the heavy milk and mix it.
4: Add the raw penne pasta, the water and mix it well.
5: Let it cook for 15 minutes, stirring each 5 minutes for the pasta not to stick on the bottom.
6: Turn off the heat, add the green onions, mix it and close the pan lid.
7: Wait 5 minutes with the pan closed before serving.
8: Serve with parmesan cheese to taste.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:egg、egg yolk、parmesan cheese (⅓cup)、ground pepper、bacon (2strips)、instant ramen (1pack)、extra virgin olive oil (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: In a small bowl, add one whole egg, one egg yolk, parmesan cheese, and pepper to taste. Whisk with fork until well combined.
1: Cut two strips of bacon crosswise into half-inch strips. Fry until cooked but not yet crispy.
2: Boil water and cook ramen very al dente, or just until it can be loosened from it’s block form.
3: Add 1-2 tablespoons of olive oil to the bacon and stir, lifting any bacon bits that are stuck to the pan. Once the oil is hot, remove the pan from heat.
4: Pour a small amount of the water the ramen was cooked in and stir. Add the ramen noodles and stir some more, coating the noodles in the bacon/olive oil mixture.
5: Next, add the egg mixture, making sure to pour it onto the noodles and not straight onto the pan. Stir vigorously. The heat from the pan and ingredients need to turn the egg mixture into a creamy sauce. But, if the eggs get too hot they will cook too much and become scrabbled eggs. Add additional ramen water as needed to create a smooth but creamy sauce.
6: Plate and top with additional parmesan cheese and pepper.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:onion、corn (1cup)、diced tomato (1can)、large jalapeño、garlic (4cloves)、lime、boneless, skinless chicken thighs、corn tortillas、guacamole、salsa
instructions:
0: In a small bowl, combine the cumin, oregano, paprika, chili powder, pepper, and salt and stir to combine. Set aside.
1: Place the onion, corn, tomatoes, jalapeño, garlic, and lime juice in a large slow cooker.
2: Place the chicken thighs on top of the veggies and season with half of the taco seasoning. Turn the chicken over and season with the remaining taco seasoning before mixing the chicken and veggies together so that everything is well combined.
3: Cook on the high setting for 3 hours or the low setting for 6 hours, until the chicken is cooked through.
4: Remove the chicken and slice into small diced pieces, then place them back in the slow cooker. Give the chicken and veggies a good mix and replace the lid.
5: Cook the chicken mixture for another 10 minutes so the flavors can marry.
6: Using tongs or a slotted spoon, place the chicken taco mixture on corn tortillas and top with your choice of toppings.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken tenders (1lb)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、garlic (3cloves)、low-sodium chicken broth (16fl oz)、sun-dried tomatoes (4oz)、whole wheat pasta (8oz)、salt (¼teaspoon)、red pepper flakes (¼teaspoon)、baby spinach (3oz)
instructions:
0: For the pesto, add garlic, basil, salt, pepper, and walnuts into the bowl of a food processor.
1: Turn on the food processor and slowly add the olive oil in a steady stream and puree thoroughly.
2: Add the parmesan and pulse to incorporate. Set aside.
3: In a large pot, heat olive oil on medium-high heat. Season chicken and brown on both sides. Cook thoroughly for 8-10 minutes. Remove chicken from pan and set aside.
4: Sauté garlic for 1-2 minutes, or until fragrant. Add the chicken broth, sun-dried tomatoes, pasta, salt, and red pepper flakes and mix until combined. Cover.

6: Add spinach and stir until wilted.
7: Add cooked chicken and pesto.
8: Serve immediately.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground turkey (1lb)、red onion (⅓cup)、jalapeño pepper、salt (1teaspoon)、black pepper (½teaspoon)、cayenne pepper (1teaspoon)、cumin (1 ½teaspoons)、smoked paprika (1teaspoon)、vegetable oil (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Place turkey, onion, jalapeño, and spices together in a large bowl and mix together until all the ingredients are incorporated.
1: Lightly wet your hands and use them to shape 4 circular patties about 4 inches (10 cm) in diameter.
2: Heat up about 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat.
3: Cook burgers for 2 minutes on the first side, then flip, lower heat to low, and cook them for an additional 5-6 minutes. Top with pepper jack cheese during the last minute.
4: NOTE: The turkey burgers must be cooked through. Use a meat thermometer to check each patty for an internal temperature of at least 165˚F (75˚C) before removing from pan.
5: Assemble the burgers as desired with bun, chipotle mayonnaise,  lettuce, tomato, avocado, and preferred condiments.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:oil (2teaspoons)、onion (½cup)、garlic (1tablespoon)、carrot (½cup)、bell pepper (½cup)、ham (½cup)、eggs、brown rice (3cups)、soy sauce (2tablespoons)、pepper、pineapple (1cup)
instructions:
