instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken thighs、salt、pepper、garlic (1tablespoon)、dried parsley (1tablespoon)、butter (1tablespoon)、large onions、fresh thyme (1tablespoon)、beef stock (1cup)、gruyère cheese (2cups)、bread
instructions:
0: In a bowl, add the chicken thighs, salt, pepper, garlic, dried parsley, and olive oil, and toss until evenly coated.
1: Add the chicken to a skillet on medium-high heat. Sear until golden brown, about 4 minutes. Flip and cook the other side of the chicken, 2 minutes. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
2: Preheat oven to broil.
3: Add the butter, sliced onions, salt, and pepper to the same pan, stirring occasionally until softened. Reduce heat to low and cook until they are deeply caramelized, about 1 hour.
4: Add thyme and beef broth and bring the mixture to a simmer.
5: Add the chicken on top of the onions, and sprinkle with Gruyère cheese.
6: Broil for 5 minutes, until the cheese is melted and golden brown.
7: Serve over bread.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless pork shoulder (5lb)、achiote paste (3tablespoons)、guajillo chili powder (2tablespoons)、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、dried oregano (1tablespoon)、cumin (1tablespoon)、salt (1tablespoon)、pepper (1tablespoon)、white vinegar (¾cup)、pineapple juice (1cup)、pineapple
instructions:
0: Slice the pork shoulder into about 1-centimeter (¼ in) slices, then transfer to a large dish or bowl. In a medium bowl, combine the achiote paste, chili powder, garlic powder, oregano, cumin, salt, pepper, vinegar, and pineapple juice, mashing and stirring until smooth with no lumps. Pour the marinade over the pork slices, then toss to make sure they are coated on all sides. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap, then refrigerate for at least 2 hours or up to 3 days.
1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
2: Place a slice or two of the pineapple on the baking sheet. Take a wooden skewer and push it directly in the middle of the pineapple. Remove the pork from the fridge and push the slices through the skewer, layering one after the other until there is a 1-inch (2 ½ cm) gap at the top. Push another pineapple slice on top.
3: Bake for about 1½ hours, until the pork is slightly charred on the outside and deep red. Rest the meat for about 10 minutes, then carve off thin slices of pork and roasted pineapple.
4: To assemble, place some pork on the tortillas, followed by a few pieces of pineapple, a sprinkling of onion, a pinch of cilantro, and a spoonful of salsa, and some diced avocado. Serve with lime wedges.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cooking oil (2tablespoons)、chow mein noodle (1package)、onion (½cup)、bell pepper (½cup)、broccoli floret (½cup)、carrot (½cup)、garlic (1tablespoon)、salt、pepper、cabbage (½cup)、shiitake mushroom (½cup)、snow pea (½cup)、corn (⅓cup)、water (2tablespoons)、cornstarch (2teaspoons)、soy sauce (2 ½tablespoons)、hoisin sauce (1 ½tablespoons)、rice wine (1 ½tablespoons)、sugar (2teaspoons)、white pepper (1teaspoon)、bean sprout (½cup)、scallion
instructions:
0: In a wok or deep skillet over medium-high heat, heat 2 tablespoons of cooking oil, then add the par-cooked noodles. Cook for 1-2 minutes, allowing the noodles to crisp, then flip and cook for another 1-2 minutes. Transfer to a plate and set aside.
1: In the same wok, heat the remaining tablespoon of cooking oil over medium-high heat and add the onion, bell pepper, broccoli, and carrot. Stir and cook for 2 minutes, then add the garlic and season with salt and pepper. Stir and continue to cook for 2 minutes, or until the onions are translucent.
2: Add the cabbage, shiitake mushrooms, snow peas, and corn.
3: In a small bowl, combine the water and cornstarch. Mix with a fork to dissolve the cornstarch, then add the soy sauce, hoisin sauce, rice wine, sugar, and white pepper. Mix well.
4: Pour the sauce over the vegetables. Mix well and cook for 3-5 minutes, or until the vegetables have softened.
5: Add the crispy noodles to the wok, mix well and add bean sprouts. Toss gently and cook for another 2-3 minutes, or until everything is well-combined. Garnish with sliced scallions.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:spaghetti squash、olive oil (2tablespoons)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC).
1: With a sharp knife, slice the squash in half. If the squash is too tough, puncture in several places forming a dotted line around the squash. Microwave for 3-5 minutes to soften. Allow to cool before cutting in half.
2: Scoop out the seeds, brush with oil, and sprinkle with salt, and pepper. Bake for 40-45 minutes, or until a fork can easily pierce the skin.
3: In a pan over medium heat, add the oil, garlic, and onions, and sautè until onions are translucent.
4: Add the cherry tomatoes, salt, and pepper and simmer until they are cooked and begin to become softened.
5: Remove squash from the oven, with a fork pull at the edges to produce that stringy “spaghetti” quality. Add the squash to the tomato mixture and mix in the pan.
6: Add mixture back to the hollowed out spaghetti squash halves. Top with mini mozzarella balls ans basil.
7: Bake an additional 5-10 minutes, or until cheese melts.
8: Serve in the squash, and top with basil.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:onion、crushed tomato (28oz)、unsalted butter (½cup)、salt (1teaspoon)

0: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: Add the crushed tomatoes, butter, onion, and salt to a pot and bring to a simmer over medium heat.

3: In a bowl, mix the ground beef, ground pork, panko, Parmesan, egg, garlic, onion, Worcestershire, salt, pepper, and parsley until fully combined.

7: Drain pasta and toss lightly in about a tablespoon of oil (optional).
8: Pour the sauce over the pasta. Transfer the cooked meatballs and top with Parmesan.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instructions:

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、eggs、fresh mozzarella cheese (1ball)、marinara sauce (1jar)、whole wheat pasta、fresh basil
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 425°F (215°C).
1: In a medium bowl, combine the panko, parmesan cheese, basil, garlic powder, oregano, salt, and pepper.
2: Beat the 2 eggs in a shallow dish.  Dredge the chicken in the egg wash, then coat with the bread crumb mixture.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:tomato sauce (1cup)、apple cider vinegar (1tablespoon)、honey (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
1: Make the sauce: In a medium bowl, stir together the tomato sauce, apple cider vinegar, and honey. Set aside.
2: Make the meatloaf: In a large bowl, combine the ground turkey, zucchini, onion, garlic, egg, Dijon mustard, honey, 2 tablespoons of the tomato sauce, bread crumbs, salt, pepper, oregano, basil, and parsley. Mix well.
3: Add half of the meatloaf mixture to a greased loaf pan and flatten to form an even layer.
4: Layer the cheese over the meatloaf layer. Top with the rest of the meatloaf and smooth the top.
5: Top the meatloaf with half of the tomato sauce mixture, using a spoon or rubber spatula to spread evenly. Reserve the rest of the tomato sauce.
6: Bake the meatloaf for 1 hour, or until the internal temperature reads 160˚F (70˚C) when tested with a meat thermometer.
7: When the meatloaf is cooked through, warm the reserved tomato sauce in the microwave or a skillet, then drizzle on top of the meatloaf.
8: Garnish with fresh parsley and serve with your favorite sides. (We used mashed sweet potatoes and asparagus.)
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:self-raising flour (¾cup)、water (¼cup)、olive oil (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Whizz together the flour and water in a food processor for a minute or so until it clumps together to form a single ball. You might need to add a little bit more water or flour to get the consistency right. (Dough should be soft, but not sticky!)
1: Preheat the grill (broiler) on high.
2: On a floured surface, roll out the dough to about 1 cm (½ inch) thick.
3: Place pizza dough onto a well-oiled, oven-safe frying pan on high heat.
4: While the bottom is cooking on the hob, top the pizza with the sauce, cheese, pepperoni herbs and whatever else you like. (Try your best to not over-top it or else it can fall apart or get soggy.)
5: Continue cooking on high until the edges of the crust start browning and crisping.
6: Place the pan under the grill and cook the toppings until the cheese is bubbly and browning. Slice.
7: If you’re quick, you can actually have this from-scratch pizza on your plate (and in you mouth) quicker than it takes to cook a pre-made frozen pizza.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、olive oil、salt、pepper、garlic powder、oregano、fresh mozzarella cheese (1ball)、tomato、fresh basil leaf (5leaves)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: On a parchment-lined baking sheet, season both sides of the chicken with olive oil, salt, pepper, garlic powder, and oregano.
2: Bake for 30 minutes, or until cooked through and juices run clear.
3: While the chicken is in the oven, combine the balsamic vinegar and honey in a sauce pot and simmer, stirring occasionally.

6: Remove the chicken from the oven and top with slices of mozzarella and tomato.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless chuck roast、flour (¼cup)、salt、pepper、canola oil (3tablespoons)、butter (4tablespoons)、pepperoncinis、mayonnaise (2tablespoons)、apple cider vinegar (2teaspoons)、dried dill (¼teaspoon)、paprika (⅛teaspoon)、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Dredge the chuck roast in flour, salt, and pepper, and massage it into the meat.
1: In a skillet on a very high heat, brown the meat on all sides in the canola oil to create a crust.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:panko breadcrumbs (1 ½cups)、parmesan cheese (¼cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、chicken breasts、all purpose flour (1cup)、large eggs、olive oil (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C).
1: In a medium bowl, combine the panko bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, salt, pepper, paprika, and garlic powder. Mix together with a fork.
2: Season the chicken breasts on both sides with pepper and salt to taste.
3: Add the flour and eggs to 2 separate medium bowls. Dip the chicken breasts in the flour and shake off the excess. Then, dip in the eggs. Finally, dip in the bread crumb mixture. Make sure the chicken is well-coated.
4: Place the chicken breasts on a baking sheet and drizzle with the olive oil.
5: Bake for 25 minutes, or until deep golden brown and a meat thermometer inserted in the thick part of a breast registers at least 165˚F (75˚C).
6: While the chicken is cooking, make the dressing: In a liquid measuring cup or small bowl, combine the sour cream, buttermilk, Parmesan, garlic, lemon juice, apple cider vinegar, olive oil, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine. If you prefer a thinner dressing, add a few more splashes of buttermilk.
7: To assemble the salad, add the mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, and red onion to a large bowl. Drizzle about ½ the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
8: Slice the chicken, then serve on top of the salad and drizzle with more dressing.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground turkey (1lb)、medium yellow onion、red bell pepper、yellow bell pepper、garlic (2cloves)、tomato sauce (28oz)、black beans (15oz)、pinto bean (15oz)、frozen corn (1cup)、chili powder (2teaspoons)、ground black pepper (1teaspoon)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)
instructions:
0: Combine the ground turkey, onion, bell peppers, garlic, crushed tomatoes, black and pinto beans, corn, chili powder, pepper, and salt in the bowl of a slow cooker.
1: Cook on low for 6-8 hours or high for 4 hours.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instructions:
0: Boil salted water and cook the pasta for 1 minute less than the time indicated on the package. When the pasta is finished cooking, reserve ¼ cup (60 ml) of pasta water.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:vegetable oil (1tablespoon)、garlic (2tablespoons)、onion、celery (3stalks)、carrots、mushrooms (2cups)、corn (1cup)、fresh parsley (¼cup)、tomato paste (1tablespoon)、dried thyme (1teaspoon)、dried sage (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、vegetable broth (2cups)、flour (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 220ºC (425ºF).
1: In a medium-large pot, over medium heat, combine oil, garlic, and onions. Cook for one minute, until onions start to soften.
2: Add celery and carrots, stir until onions are translucent.
3: Add mushrooms, corn, parsley, tomato paste, thyme, sage, salt, and pepper until well mixed.
4: Add veggie stock in half-cup (120 ml) increments, allowing it to come to a simmer before adding more.
5: Add flour, then mix. Continue mixing until the mixture thickens.
6: Once thick, remove from heat and pour into a pie dish.
7: Add potatoes to a large pot and cover with lightly salted water. Set over medium-high heat and bring to a boil. Cook until potatoes have softened and are fork-tender.
8: Remove from heat and drain.
9: Mash potatoes then add butter, milk, salt, and pepper.
10: Spoon potato mixture over the top of the veggies in the pie dish, and smooth so that it is evenly spread.
11: Optional: Using a butter knife or a long, thin spatula. press into potato surface every inch (2 ½cm) to create a beautiful, undulating presentation.
12: Bake pie for 20-25 minutes.
13: Allow to cool for five minutes then serve.
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cauliflower (1head)、sesame oil (1tablespoon)、garlic (1tablespoon)、ground beef (½lb)、carrot (1cup)、frozen peas (1cup)、eggs、white pepper、soy sauce (3tablespoons)、green onion

7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:chicken breast (1 ⅓lb)、natural yogurt (1 ⅔cups)、lemon juice (1tablespoon)、ginger garlic paste (2tablespoons)、tikka masala sauce (2tablespoons)、red chili powder (1tablespoon)、turmeric powder (½teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven 430˚F ( 220˚C).
1: Combine all the chicken tikka ingredients and marinate in the fridge for at least 1 hour.
2: Skewer the marinated chicken pieces on bamboo skewers, then place them over a baking tray lined with parchment paper, making sure there is space underneath the chicken to help distribute the heat more evenly.
3: Reserve the chicken tikka marinade for later use.
4: Bake the chicken skewers for about 15 minutes, until slightly dark brown on the edges and cooked throughout.
5: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat, then sauté the onions with the herbs and spices until just browned.
6: Add in the chopped tomatoes and fry till soft.
7: Pour in the yogurt, water, and reserved tikka marinade, and mix it well with the vegetables and spices.
8: Bring the mixture to a boil, add in the chicken and cook for a further 4-5 minutes. Set aside.
9: In a large pot, assemble your biryani in the following layers: ⅓ rice, ½ chicken curry, ½ caramelised onion, ½ coriander, ⅓ rice, oil, ½ of the saffron-infused water, ½ chicken curry, ⅓ rice, the rest of the saffron-infused water, ½ caramelised onion, and finally top with the remaining coriander.
10: Simmer the biryani over a low heat for 10 minutes or until all the water is absorbed and the rice and chicken are heated throughout.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:kroger beef chuck roast (2lb)、kosher salt (½teaspoon)、black pepper (½teaspoon)、canola oil (2tablespoons)、yellow onion (2cups)、celery (2cups)、carrot (2cups)、garlic (2cloves)、tomato paste (2tablespoons)、red wine (1cup)、beef stock (2cups)、diced tomatoes (28oz)、dried rosemary (1teaspoon)、dried thyme (1teaspoon)、bay leaf、egg noodle
instructions:
0: Cut the beef into cubes, then season generously with salt and pepper.
1: Heat the canola oil in a large Dutch oven or pot over medium high  heat. Working in batches, sear the beef on all sides until well browned. Do not overcrowd the pan. Transfer the meat to a plate and set aside.
2: Add the onion, celery, carrots, and garlic to the pan and cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
3: Add the tomato paste to the center of the pot and cook for 1 minute. Stir the tomato paste into the vegetables and continue cooking until fragrant, about 5 minutes.
4: Pour in the wine to deglaze the pan, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom of the pot with a wooden spoon.
5: Add the beef stock and tomatoes and stir to combine, then add the rosemary, thyme, pepper, salt, and bay leaf. Return the beef to the pot, making sure it is submerged in the braising liquid.
6: Bring to a boil, then cover, reduce the heat to low, and simmer until the meat is tender, about 3 hours.
7: Shred larger pieces of beef with a fork or tongs. Serve the braised beef and sauce over cooked egg noodles.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:red bell pepper、yellow bell pepper、green bell pepper、yellow onion、boneless, skinless chicken breast (2lb)、taco seasoning (2tablespoons)、garlic (4cloves)、lime、canned diced tomatoes with green chiles (10oz)
instructions:
0: Add half of the sliced peppers and onions to your slow cooker.
1: Layer the chicken and coat all sides with taco seasoning.
2: Top with garlic, the juice from one lime, and tomatoes (be sure to drain).
3: Add the remaining peppers and onions, cover and any remaining lime juice.
4: Cook on high for 3-4 hours.
5: Remove chicken and cut/shred into slices (chicken left longer will tend to shred more - cook to your preference).
6: Return the sliced chicken to the slow cooker to marinate in the juices for about 10 more minutes (on LOW) until ready to serve.
7: NOTE: If you find that there is too much liquid, you can remove till there is a desired amount before serving.
8: Assemble Fajitas to your liking - we recommend topping with cheese, sour cream, and guacamole!
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flour (7cups)、kosher salt (4teaspoons)、active dry yeast (½teaspoon)、water (3cups)、cornmeal (4tablespoons)、flour
instructions:
0: In a very large bowl, whisk together the dry ingredients.
1: Make a divot in the middle of the flour mixture and add a few tablespoons of water. Stir with a wooden spoon, gradually adding more and more water until the dough starts to come together. You may need a tablespoon more or less water, depending on the consistency of the dough as it forms.
2: Using your hands, ensure the dough is well incorporated, but do not knead. Be careful not to overwork the dough.
3: Cover with plastic wrap and store at room temperature overnight, or for at least 12 hours,  until doubled in size and porous.
4: Make the sauce by combining tomato paste, water, vinegar, maple syrup, salt, pepper, garlic, oregano, basil, marjoram, and cayenne pepper in a medium bowl. Let sit at room temperature for an hour before canning or jarring. Refrigerate as necessary up to 2 weeks.
5: Once the dough has risen, transfer to a clean, floured work surface and form into a large ball. Cut the dough into 6 equal parts and form dough balls by folding the corners into themselves.
6: Place the dough balls on a floured sheet pan, sprinkle with flour, and cover with a damp towel for about 30 minutes to an hour.
7: Preheat oven with a pizza stone in it to 500ªF (260ºC) or a low broil.
8: Work each dough into a disk on a floured work surface. Knuckling the edges of the dough and tossing it gently will help thin it out. Be careful not to rip the dough.
9: Place the dough disk onto a pizza peel generously floured with semolina or cornmeal. This will prevent sticking. Top with desired sauce, cheese, and toppings.
10: Slide the pizza onto the stone and bake for about 9 minutes, watching carefully to make sure it doesn’t burn. Look for the edges to become charred and crispy and the cheese to bubble.
11: Let the pizza cool for 5 to 10 minutes before cutting and serving.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:white rice (2cups)、water (4cups)、coconut oil (1tablespoon)、salt
instructions:
0: In a medium pot, combine the rice, water, coconut oil, and salt. Bring to a boil, then cover and simmer over low heat for 15-20 minutes, until the water is absorbed. Once finished cooking, remove the rice from the heat and fluff.
1: Heat 3 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat until shimmering. Add the onions and potatoes and cook, stirring occasionally, until the onions are caramelized and potatoes are golden brown around the edges, about 10 minutes.
2: Reduce the heat to medium. Add the remaining tablespoon of oil, the tomato paste, ginger, and garlic. Cook, stirring constantly, until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add the garam masala and curry powder and cook, stirring constantly, about 1 minute longer.
3: Add cauliflower and cook, stirring constantly, until the spices coat the florets, about 2 minutes longer.
4: Add the tomatoes, chickpeas, water, and salt and stir to combine. Increase the heat to medium-high and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium. Simmer, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender, 10-15 minutes.
5: Stir in the coconut milk and frozen peas. Cook until heated through, about 2 minutes longer. Remove from the heat.
6: Meanwhile, in a large bowl, stir together the flour, salt, baking powder, and sugar. Create a well in the middle of the dry ingredients and pour in 1 tablespoon of melted ghee, the yogurt, skim milk, and a bit of the water. Mix until combined, adding more water as needed until the dough comes together.
7: Transfer the dough to a lightly floured surface and knead until no longer sticky, then shape into a ball and divide into quarters. Roll out the dough portions to ¼ inch (6 mm) thick.
8: In a small bowl, combine the remaining tablespoon of melted ghee with the garlic.
9: Heat a bit of ghee in a medium nonstick pan over medium-high heat. Add a dough round and brush with the ghee and garlic mixture. Cook for 3-4 minutes, until the dough bubbles up and forms a nice brown crust, then flip and cook on the other side. Repeat with the remaining dough.
10: Serve the curry over the rice with the naan on the side.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:beef chuck roast (3lb)、pepper、salt、oil、chipotle peppers in adobo sauce、garlic (5cloves)、ground cumin (1tablespoon)、dried oregano (3teaspoons)、ground cloves (¼teaspoon)、beef broth (½cup)、apple cider vinegar (¼cup)、fresh lime juice (¼cup)、bay leaves
instructions:
0: Cut the beef into 6-8 large chunks. Season all over with pepper and salt.
1: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Sear the beef, in batches if necessary, on all sides, until browned. Transfer the seared meat to a slow cooker.
2: In a medium bowl, combine the chipotles, garlic, cumin, oregano, cloves, salt, pepper, beef broth, apple cider vinegar, and lime juice. Mix well.
3: Pour the marinade over the beef in the slow cooker and add the bay leaves. Cover and cook on low for 8 hours, until the meat can be shredded easily.
4: Remove and discard the bay leaves. Remove and shred the beef, then return to the slow cooker to marinate in the sauce for at least 10 more minutes, or until ready to serve.
5: To serve, add the shredded beef to your choice of tortillas with your favorite toppings.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、buttermilk (2 ½cups)、ranch dressing mix (1packet)、cheese cracker (3cups)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 425˚F (225˚C).
1: On a cutting board, slice chicken breasts against the grain into strips.
2: Place the chicken strips in a bowl and add in buttermilk and ranch packet. Stir until well-coated.
3: Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and place in the refrigerator for at least an hour.
4: Pour cheese crackers into a resealable bag and crush with a rolling pin until they become finely ground.
5: Open the bag and place a marinated piece of chicken in the cracker crumbs. Coat the chicken with the crumbs and place on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
6: Bake for 20 minutes, flipping halfway.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、kosher salt (3 ½teaspoons)、freshly ground black pepper (2 ½teaspoons)、olive oil (5tablespoons)、fettuccine pasta (¾lb)、large shallot、garlics、all purpose flour (3tablespoons)、coconut milk (13.5oz)、chicken stock (1cup)、fresh lemon juice (1tablespoon)、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Season the chicken all over with 1½ teaspoons salt and 1 teaspoon pepper.
1: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Once the oil is shimmering, add the chicken breasts, 2 at a time, and cook for 4-5 minutes, until golden brown. Add more olive oil, if needed, and Flip and cook on the other side for 4-5 minutes more, until golden brown and the internal temperature reads 165ºF (75˚C). Remove from the pan, set aside, and cover to keep warm while you repeat with the remaining chicken.
2: Fill a large pot with water and bring to a boil over high heat. Once at a rolling boil, generously salt the water then add the fettuccine. Cook according to the package instructions. Drain and return to the pot.
3: Meanwhile, heat the remaining 3 tablespoons of olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. Once the oil is hot, add the shallots and garlic, season with a pinch of salt, and cook until the shallot is translucent, 3-4 minutes.
4: Stir in the flour and whisk for 3-4 minutes, until golden brown. Add the coconut milk and chicken stock. Bring up to a low boil and cook for about 1 minute, then reduce the heat to low-medium and cook, stirring frequently, until thickened, about 10 minutes. Stir in the lemon juice and season with the remaining 2 teaspoons salt and 1½ teaspoons pepper.
5: Pour the sauce over the fettuccine and toss well to coat. Slice the chicken.
6: Divide the pasta between bowls and top with the chicken. Garnish with parsley and serve.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:penne pasta (1lb)、olive oil (¼cup)、garlic cloves (4cloves)、chicken breast (1lb)、salt、pepper、chicken broth (½cup)、aspargus (1lb)、grated parmesan cheese (1cup)、cherry tomatoes (2cups)
instructions:
0: In a pot, cook pasta according to package instructions, drain, then set aside.
1: In the same pot, heat 2 tablespoons olive oil and sauté 2 garlic cloves.
2: Add chicken breasts, season with salt and pepper, and fully cook. Remove cooked chicken from pot and set aside.
3: In the same pot, pour the chicken broth, then add asparagus, salt, pepper, and the remaining garlic and stir. Cover and reduce heat to a simmer for 5 minutes.
4: Add cooked chicken, penne, remaining olive oil, parmesan, and tomatoes, and stir until fully incorporated and the cheese has melted.
5: Serve while hot.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:salmon (4oz)、chili sauce (½cup)、fresh scallions (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200˚C).
1: In a bowl, mix together the salmon, chili sauce, and the scallions.
2: Place the fillets on a baking tray lined with parchment paper. Spoon any leftover sauce on top of the salmon.
3: Bake for 12-15 minutes, until the salmon is cooked but still tender.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、garlic (1tablespoon)、heavy cream (4cups)、grated parmesan cheese (2cups)、salt、pepper、nutmeg (½teaspoon)、spinach ricotta ravioli (30oz)、rotisserie chicken (2cups)、shredded mozzarella cheese (2cups)、fresh parsley (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: In a large sauté pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the garlic and sauté for 2-3 minutes, until softened.
2: Add the heavy cream and Parmesan and stir to incorporate. Once the mixture comes to a low boil, reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10-15 minutes, until the sauce coats the back of a spoon. Season with salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Remove the sauce from the heat.
3: Pour a thin layer of sauce in a the bottom of a 9x13-inch (23x33 cm) glass baking dish. Arrange 1 package of spinach ricotta ravioli over the sauce. Top with 1 cup of shredded chicken and ½ cup (50 g) of mozzarella cheese. Cover with more sauce.
4: Arrange another package of ravioli over the first layer, and top with the remaining cup of shredded chicken and another ½ cup (50 g) of mozzarella. Top with more sauce. Add the last package of ravioli and cover with remaining sauce, making sure all the ravioli are covered. Top with the remaining cup of shredded mozzarella cheese.
5: Cover the ravioli lasagna with foil and bake for 20 minutes. Uncover and cook for another 20 minutes, until the cheese is golden brown. Let cool for 10 minutes.
6: Sprinkle with chopped parsley, then serve.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ribeye steak、salt、pepper、canola oil (3tablespoons)、butter (3tablespoons)、garlic (3cloves)、fresh rosemary (2sprigs)、fresh thyme (3sprigs)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 200°F (95°C).
1: Generously season all sides of the steak with salt and pepper.
2: Transfer to a wire rack on top of a baking sheet, then bake for about 45 minutes to an hour until the internal temperature reads about 125°F (51° C) for medium-rare. Adjust the bake time based on if you like your steak more rare or more well-done.
3: Heat the canola oil in a pan over high heat until smoking.
4: Sear the steak for 30 seconds on the first side, then flip.
5: Add the butter, garlic, rosemary, and thyme, and swirl around the pan.
6: Transfer the garlic and herbs on top of the steak and baste the steak with the butter using a large spoon.
7: Baste for about 30 seconds, then flip and baste the other side for about 15 seconds.
8: Turn the steak on its side and cook to render off any excess fat.
9: Rest the steak on a cutting board or wire rack for about 10 minutes. Slicing the steak before the resting period has finished will result in a lot of the juices leaking out, which may not be desirable.
10: Slice the steak into ½ -inch (1 cm) strips, then fan out the slices and serve.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground beef (2lb)、salt、pepper、salted butter (3tablespoons)、garlic powder、flour (⅓cup)、onion powder、milk (3cups)、rigatoni (2lb)、eggs、marinara sauce (24oz)、shredded mozzarella cheese (3cups)、parmesan cheese (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375°F (190˚C.)
1: In a skillet, cook and crumble the ground beef with garlic powder, onion, powder, salt, & pepper. Remove from pan and drain.
2: In the same pan, melt the butter, and mix with the flour until it forms a paste.
3: Add the milk gradually, and bring to a boil, until it thickens into a creamy sauce.  Set aside.
4: In a bowl, mix the rigatoni with the eggs. Divide between two 9x13 inch (23x33 centimeter) baking dishes.
5: Layer on the marinara, ground beef, mozzarella, white sauce, and parmesan.
6: Bake both for 30-35 minutes, or until cheese is melted and golden brown.
7: Cool and freeze extra casserole up to 2 months. (To cook, transfer to the refrigerator overnight. Bake covered at 375°F (190°C) for 40 minutes. Remove cover and bake an additional 10 minutes.)
8: Nutrition  Calories: 1916 Fat: 61 grams  Carbs: 223 grams Fiber: 12 grams  Sugars: 21 grams  Protein: 110 grams
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sweet potatoes、asparagus (2bunches)、chicken breast tender (1 ¼lb)、olive oil、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: Cut sweet potatoes into medium julienne.
2: Spread sweet potatoes evenly onto parchment paper-lined baking tray.
3: Season with olive oil, pepper, and salt.
4: Bake for 20 minutes. Set aside.
5: Trim asparagus and cut into pieces diagonally.
6: Spread evenly on the baking tray next to the sweet potatoes. Season with olive oil, pepper, and salt.
7: Season chicken with pepper and salt. Place on top of the veggies.
8: Bake for 15 minutes or until the internal temperature of the chicken reaches 165˚F (75˚C).
9: While chicken is baking, reduce balsamic vinegar, white wine vinegar, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, pepper, and salt in a small saucepan for 5-7 minutes until the sauce slightly thickens.
10: Distribute veggies and chicken into four containers.
11: Pour the sauce reduction onto the chicken.
12: Can be refrigerated up to 4 days.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:potatoes、broccoli (½head)、red bell pepper、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、dried parsley (1tablespoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、olive oil (3tablespoons)、parmesan cheese (½cup)、couscous (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180°C).
1: Add the potatoes, broccoli florets, and red pepper to a baking sheet.
2: Sprinkle the garlic powder, parsley, salt, pepper, and 2 tablespoons of olive oil over the vegetables and toss to coat.
3: Bake for 25 minutes, until the vegetables are tender.
4: Sprinkle the Parmesan cheese over the vegetables.
5: Add the vegetables to a large bowl with the cous cous and remaining tablespoon of olive oil and toss to combine.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sirloin steak (1 ½lb)、kosher salt、pepper、oil、medium white onion、mushroom (1lb)、beef broth (1cup)、sour cream (½cup)、large zucchini、thinly sliced chive
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, season the sirloin liberally with salt and pepper. Toss to coat.
1: Heat a bit of oil in a large pot over medium-high heat until shimmering. Place half of the cubed meat in the pan, spacing out to avoid overcrowding. Sear on each side for 1 minute, until well-browned. Transfer the seared beef to a bowl and repeat with the remaining meat.
2: Reduce the heat to medium. Add the onion, mushrooms, and a pinch of salt. Sauté until all of moisture has been release from the mushrooms and evaporated and the onions have caramelized, about 12 minutes.
3: Add the beef broth and scrape up any browned bits from the bottom of the pan.
4: Once the liquid has thickened slightly, mix a few tablespoons of the hot broth with the sour cream in a small bowl--this will temper the sour cream and keep it from curdling. Add the sour cream mixture to the broth and mix until incorporated.
5: Once the liquid has thickened slightly, add the seasoned sirloin and any juices that have collected in the bowl.
6: Stir the the contents of the pot until the meat has cooked through, about 5 minutes.
7: Use a vegetable peeler to slice the zucchini into ribbons.
8: Heat a drizzle of oil in a medium pan over medium-high heat.
9: Add the zucchini ribbons and a pinch of salt and toss until the zucchini has wilted slightly, about 1 minute. Immediately transfer the zucchini to serving dishes to stop cooking.
10: Top the zucchini with the stroganoff and a sprinkle of chives.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、butter (¼cup)、medium onion、large carrot、celery (1stalk)、pancetta (4oz)、lean beef (7oz)、lean pork (5 ⅓oz)、red wine (¾cup)、double concentrated tomato puree (2tablespoons)、chicken stock (2cups)
instructions:
0: Heat olive oil and butter in a large pan over medium heat. Add onion, carrot, celery, and pancetta. Cook for around 10 minutes until the onions start to look translucent.
1: Add the minced meats and brown all over, ensure the meat is fully broken up and no large chunks remain.
2: Add salt and pepper to taste. Increase the heat, add the wine, and allow to evaporate for around 2-3 minutes.
3: In a large jug, dilute the tomato puree into the chicken stock and add to the pan, stir well.
4: Reduce to a low heat, then cover and simmer for 2 hours. Check from time to time to ensure the sauce is not drying out. If this occurs, add a small amount of stock.
5: Cook desired pasta and toss in the bolognese.
6: Top with parmesan cheese and serve.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:russet potato (1lb)、onion (1cup)、unsalted butter (6tablespoons)、shredded cheddar cheese (½cup)、sour cream (¼cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、all-purpose flour (1 ½cups)、warm water (⅓cup)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、large egg、fresh sage leaves
instructions:
0: Place the potatoes in a medium pot filled with cold water. Cover and turn the heat to medium-high. Bring to a boil and cook potatoes for 20-25 minutes, until fork-tender.
1: As the potatoes are cooking, melt 2 tablespoons of butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add the onions and sauté for 8-10 minutes, until golden brown. Remove the pan from the heat.
2: In a medium bowl, combine the flour, warm water, olive oil, egg, and a pinch of salt. Use a fork to mix together, then once the dough begins to come together.
3: Knead with your hands for 2-3 minutes, until smooth. Shape the dough into a disc. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.
4: Once the potatoes are finished cooking, drain and transfer to a medium bowl. Add the cheddar cheese to the hot potatoes so the cheese melts a bit. Add the sautéed onions, sour cream, salt, and pepper. 
5: Mash the potato mixture with a fork, then mix with a spatula until smooth. Cover with plastic wrap and chill in the refrigerator for 15 minutes.
6: Remove the dough from the refrigerator and place on a floured surface. Lightly flour the top and roll out the dough to about ⅛-inch (3-mm) thick. 
7: Use a pint glass to cut out circles. Gather the scraps and re-roll, then let rest for 5 minutes. Cut out more circles of dough. Keep the dough circles covered with plastic wrap to prevent them from drying out while you work.
8: To assemble the pierogi, scoop a rounded tablespoon of the potato filling into the center of a dough circle. Lightly stretch the dough around the filling and pinch closed with your fingers. Repeat with remaining dough and filling. If the dough circles gets too warm to handle, chill in the refrigerator for 10 minutes.
9: Bring a large pot of water to boil. Boil the pierogis, in batches if necessary, for 3 minutes, until they float to the surface. Be careful not to overcook. Scoop the pierogis out with a slotted spoon and place them in a oiled bowl so they don’t stick together.
10: Just before serving, melt the remaining 4 tablespoons of butter in a large nonstick saucepan over medium-high heat. Once the butter is melted, add the sage leaves. Cook until the butter begins to brown and smell nutty, 2-3 minutes. Reduce the heat to medium and add the pierogis, working in batches if the pan is too crowded. Lightly brown the pierogis, about 2 minutes per side. Remove the pan from the heat.
11: To serve, spoon the brown butter over the pierogies and sprinkle with salt and freshly cracked black pepper to taste.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、salt、pepper、BBQ sauce (6tablespoons)、onion
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: Place chicken breast in a baking dish. Season chicken with salt and pepper, to taste.
2: Spread BBQ sauce on each chicken breast.
3: Layer onions on top of the chicken.
4: Bake for 40 minutes.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:rice noodle (10oz)、warm water、whole black peppercorn (1tablespoon)、coriander seed (1tablespoon)、whole star anise (4pods)、fresh ginger (1piece)、green onion (1bunch)、hot water (4cups)、chicken broth (8cups)、chicken breast (1lb)、fish sauce (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Place the rice noodles in a large heatproof bowl. Cover with warm water and soak for 20 minutes, until softened.
1: While the noodles are soaking, heat a large pot over medium-high heat. Toast the black peppercorns, coriander seeds, and star anise pods for 2 minutes, until fragrant.
2: While the seeds are toasting, peel the ginger and cut into pieces.  Trim the ends off the green onions, then chop 5 inches off the bases and save the remaining green tops for later.
3: Add the ginger and green onion bases to the pot and cook for 2 minutes, or until fragrant.
4: Add the water, chicken broth, and chicken breasts. Increase the heat to high, cover, and bring to a simmer. Cook for 5 more minutes, then check the chicken every minute until cooked through. Remove from the heat.
5: While the broth heats up, thinly slice the green onion tops. Cut the lime into wedges. Thinly slice the jalapeño.
6: After 20 minutes of soaking, drain the rice noodles, then return to the bowl.
7: Remove the chicken from the broth.
8: Strain the broth over the noodles. Pour the noodles and broth back into the pot over high heat, then add the fish sauce. Cover and cook for 3 minutes.
9: Shred the chicken.
10: Divide the noodles between four serving bowls and top with the shredded chicken, jalapeño, bean sprouts, and Thai basil. Ladle the hot pho broth over the noodles. Add a squeeze of lime, green onions, and any other favorite toppings.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:spaghetti squash、olive oil (1tablespoon)、garlic (2cloves)、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、shrimp (4oz)、salt (¾teaspoon)、ground black pepper (¼teaspoon)、lemon、lemon、fresh parsley (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Microwave squash on high until tender, about 10 minutes. Shred the flesh of the squash and discard the skin.
1: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the garlic, red pepper flakes, and shrimp, and cook until shrimp are pink and start to curl, about 2 minutes.
2: Add the lemon zest, salt, pepper, and lemon juice, and cook for 1 minute.
3: Remove from heat, add parsley and shredded squash, and stir to combine.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:onion、celery (4stalks)、carrots、garlic (1clove)、butter (3tablespoons)、flour (¼cup)、chicken stock (2cups)、half & half (2cups)、pepper (1teaspoon)、dried thyme (1teaspoon)、ground nutmeg (1pinch)、frozen corn (1cup)、frozen peas (1cup)、whole rotisserie chicken
instructions:
0: Heat oil in large pot on medium high heat.
1: Bring in onion, celery, carrots, and garlic and cook until onions are translucent, about 5 minutes.
2: Stir in butter and melt.
3: Add in flour and stir until flour butter mixture coats vegetables and browns lightly.
4: Add the chicken stock and half and half and stir to combine.
5: Season with pepper, thyme, and nutmeg and allow to come to a boil.
6: Reduce the heat to medium-low and add in corn, peas, and chicken and fully incorporate.
7: Season with salt.
8: Optional - garnish with cookie sized pieces of pie crust.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、garlic (1tablespoon)、sundried tomato (½cup)、lemon、tuna (10oz)、salt、pepper、whole wheat pasta (2cups)、fresh spinach (2cups)
instructions:
0: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.  Add the garlic and cook for about 30 seconds, until fragrant.
1: Add the sun-dried tomatoes and lemon juice and cook for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.
2: Add the tuna, salt, and pepper, and mix until thoroughly combined.
3: Add the pasta and spinach and cook for about 1 minute, until spinach starts to wilt.
4: Remove the pasta from the heat and serve.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、medium yellow onion、garlic (4cloves)、yellow bell pepper、red bell pepper、green beans (1cup)、short grain white rice (1 ½cups)、smoked paprika (½teaspoon)、sweet paprika (½teaspoon)、tomato paste (1tablespoon)、salt、black pepper、diced tomato (14oz)、vegetable broth (3cups)、saffron thread (½teaspoon)、bay leaves、frozen peas (½cup)、canned artichoke heart (½cup)、vegan chorizon (½cup)、fresh flat-leaf parsley (½cup)、lemon
instructions:
0: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
1: Add the onion and cook until translucent, 3-4 minutes.
2: Add the garlic and cook for about 2 minutes until it is fragrant.
3: Add the yellow bell peppers, red bell peppers, and green beans. Cook stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes until tender.
4: Add the rice, smoked paprika, sweet paprika, tomato paste, salt, and pepper. Stir until incorporated. Cook for 1-2 minutes until the rice starts to sizzle.
5: Add the canned tomatoes. Cook for 5 minutes until the liquid has evaporated slightly.
6: Add the vegetable broth, saffron threads (crush the saffron threads between your fingertips), and bay leaves. Bring to a boil on high heat. Continue cooking, stirring occasionally, until most of the liquid is absorbed by the rice, about 10 minutes.
7: Add in the peas, artichokes, and sausage, if using. Cover the pan, reduce the heat to low, and cook for 10 minutes.
8: Remove the pan from the heat and let sit covered for 10 minutes.
9: Sprinkle the fresh parsley.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、all-purpose flour (1cup)、salt、pepper、onion powder (1tablespoon)、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、butter (4tablespoons)、garlic (2cloves)、shallot (½cup)、cremini mushroom (1lb)、dry Marsala wine (2cups)、chicken stock (2cups)、lemon juice (1tablespoon)、fresh parsley、Cooked pasta, potatoes, or rice (1lb)
instructions:
0: Cut each chicken breast in half crosswise, then cut the larger, thicker half again horizontally, creating 3 equally thick cutlets. Place the flour, salt, pepper, onion powder, and garlic powder in a wide, shallow dish and stir to combine. Dredge the chicken pieces in the flour mixture, shaking gently to remove any excess flour, and set aside.
1: Heat the oil and 2 tablespoons of butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken in batches to prevent overcrowding. Cook the chicken until golden brown, about 3 minutes. Flip and cook the other side, another 3 minutes. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
2: To the same, now empt pan with leftover oil and butter, add the garlic, shallots, and cremini mushrooms, stirring occasionally and scraping the bottom of the pan until the mushrooms are soft and most of the liquid has evaporated, about 8 minutes.
3: Deglaze the pan with the Marsala wine and scrape all the caramelized bits from the bottom of the pan. Add the chicken stock and lemon juice, and allow mixture to come to a boil. Reduce to a simmer, and cook until the liquid has reduced by half.
4: Turn off the heat. Add 2 tablespoons of cold butter and stir until the sauce is smooth and creamy. Add the cooked chicken to the sauce, and simmer for 5 more minutes, flipping halfway through.
5: Sprinkle with parsley and serve with pasta, potatoes, or rice.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、bacon (4rashers)、spring onions、cream cheese (½cup)
instructions:
0: Slice into the chicken several times, about ½ cm (¼ inch) apart, but only cut about 85% of the way through, leaving the bottom intact.
1: Cook the bacon over a medium heat until it starts to get crispy.
2: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
3: Stir in the spring onions and cook for another minute or so.
4: Add the cream cheese and cook until melted.
5: Allow filling to cool to the touch, and then fill each segment of the chicken breast with about 1 teaspoon of the mixture.
6: Bake in the centre of the oven for 18-22 minutes until the chicken is cooked through and the juices run clear.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、large zucchinis、cherry tomato (2cartons)、garlic (3cloves)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、salt、pepper、pesto (1jar)、shredded mozzarella cheese (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: Line a baking tray with aluminum foil.
2: Lay out the 3 chicken breasts in the middle of the baking tray. Spread the zucchini evenly on one end and the cherry tomatoes on the other.
3: Sprinkle the olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper evenly over everything. Toss veggies to coat.
4: Pour the jar of pesto evenly over the chicken breasts and top with mozzarella cheese.
5: Bake in a preheated oven for 25-30 minutes.
6: Rest chicken 10 minutes before serving. Lay chicken on bed of vegetables and sprinkle mozzarella to serve.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:onion、boneless, skinless chicken breasts、seasoned salt (1 ½teaspoons)、pepper (½teaspoon)、dried oregano (1tablespoon)、dijon mustard (1tablespoon)、honey (⅓cup)、garlic (6cloves)、slider buns
instructions:
0: Add all ingredients to a slow cooker and stir until chicken and onions are coated with seasonings.
1: Cook on high for 3-4 hours, or until chicken is cooked and shreddable.
2: With a set of tongs or two forks, shred the chicken and stir into the juices.
3: Distribute evenly between slider buns.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:corn (2ears)、olive oil、dried orecchiette pasta (8oz)、cherry tomato (2cups)、red onion (½cup)、avocado
instructions:
0: Microwave the corn on a microwave-safe plate on high for 7 minutes.  Remove from the microwave, and grip the corn with a dish towel. Then cut off the bottom end with a serrated knife. Slide the corn out of the husk. It should come out fairly easily with none of the silky string mess.
1: Brush the corn with olive oil, then place on a cast iron grill pan or outdoor grill over medium-high heat. Grill for 5-6 minutes on each side, until the kernels are slightly charred.
2: Insert the narrow end of an ear of corn into the center hole of a bundt pan. Holding the corn steady with one hand, saw off the kernels with a serrated knife. The kernels will fall into the pan for easy collection.
3: Make the cilantro-lime vinaigrette: Combine the cilantro, olive oil, lime juice, garlic, chili powder, honey, salt, and pepper in a food processor and blend until smooth.
4: In a large bowl, add the pasta, corn, tomatoes, red onion, avocado, and vinaigrette, and mix until well-combined.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cremini mushroom (16oz)、olive oil (3tablespoons)、onion、vegetable broth (¼cup)、garlic (3cloves)、soy sauce (2tablespoons)、chopped fresh thyme (1tablespoon)、spinach (4oz)、nonstick cooking spray、puff pastry (1sheet)、flour、medium potatoes、non-dairy milk (1tablespoon)、vegan gravy
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
1: Add the mushrooms to a food processor and pulse until crumbly, 10-12 times. Be careful not to over-process.
2: Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a medium pan over medium heat. Add the onion and sauté for 3-5 minutes. Add the vegetable broth and sauté until the onions are translucent and most of the broth has evaporated.
3: Add the garlic and sauté for 3 minutes more, or until fragrant.
4: Add the mushrooms and soy sauce and sauté until most of the liquid has released from the mushrooms and evaporated, 10-12 minutes.
5: Push the sautéed veggies to the sides of the pan and add a bit more olive oil to the center. Sauté the thyme in the oil until fragrant, then incorporate into the rest of mixture.
6: Add the spinach and sauté until wilted.
7: Grease an 18 x 13-inch baking sheet with nonstick spray. On a lightly floured surface, use a rolling pin to roll out puff pastry sheet to fit the baking sheet. Transfer the puff pastry to the pan.
8: In center third of the pastry, add a layer of potato slices. Top with half of the mushroom mixture and spread in an even layer, about ¾-inch thick. Add another layer of potatoes and the rest of the mushrooms, and top with a final layer of potatoes.
9: Fold one side of pastry over the filling, then the other side. Seal the top and bottom ends over the filling. Score the top of the Wellington diagonally with a sharp knife.
10: In a ramekin or small bowl, combine the non-dairy milk with the remaining tablespoon of olive oil. Brush over the Wellington. Decorate with more pastry, if desired. Poke air vents in the side of the Wellington.
11: Bake for 35-40 minutes. until golden brown and puffed.
12: Let rest for 10 minutes before cutting into thick slices.
13: Serve with vegan gravy.
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:center-cut beef tenderloin (3lb)、kosher salt、black pepper、canola oil (2tablespoons)、english mustard (¼cup)、butter (1tablespoon)、shallots、cremini mushroom (2lb)、garlic (5cloves)、prosciutto (½lb)、puff pastry (1sheet)、eggs
instructions:
0: Let the beef tenderloin come to room temperature. Season with kosher salt and pepper on all sides.
1: Add canola oil to a large pan on high heat. Once the oil is hot, add the tenderloin. Without moving the tenderloin, cook until a dark brown crust forms, about 3 minutes per side. Repeat searing on all sides, including the tenderloin ends.
2: Remove the tenderloin from the pan and transfer to a cutting board or wire rack and remove ties.
3: Brush the mustard on all sides of the meat while it’s still warm. Let the meat rest for while making the duxelle (mushrooms cooked and reduced until dry).
4: To the same pan, add the butter, mushrooms, minced shallot, and minced garlic over medium-high heat. Cook, stirring occasionally, until all the liquid evaporates and the mushroom mixture becomes a thick 25-30 minutes, dry-like paste. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
5: Remove the mushrooms from the pan and let cool completely.
6: Place a large layer of overlapping sheets of plastic wrap on your work surface that is twice the length and width of the tenderloin.
7: Lay overlapping strips of prosciutto on the plastic into an even square layer.
8: Spread a layer of the mushrooms evenly over the prosciutto.
9: Tightly and evenly wrap the tenderloin with the prosciutto, using the plastic wrap to wrap it even tighter and seal ends. Tie the ends of the plastic wrap together to hold the Wellington’s shape. Place in the refrigerator for 15 minutes.
10: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
11: Place a new layer of plastic wrap on the work surface and lay a sheet of puff pastry over it. Unwrap the prosciutto-wrapped beef tenderloin onto the puff pastry, wrapping until the ends meet. Cut off any extra puff pastry, making sure there is no overlap.
12: Wrap the puff pastry in plastic wrap, tying the ends together to form a log shape. Place in the refrigerator for 15 minutes.
13: Place the beef Wellington on a greased, parchment paper-lined baking sheet. Brush the surface with the beaten eggs. With a fork, score a decorative design onto the surface of the puff pastry.
14: Decorate with additional pastry (optional). Sprinkle with kosher salt.
15: Bake for 40 minutes or until the puff pastry is a dark golden brown and the internal temperature of the beef is 135°F (57°C) for medium-rare.
16: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:turkey、kosher salt (½teaspoon)、unsalted butter (1cup)、fresh sage leaf (½cup)、garlic (4cloves)、dried thyme (1tablespoon)、dried rosemary (1tablespoon)、lemon、medium white onion、large carrot、celery (1stalk)、low-sodium chicken broth (32oz)、all-purpose flour (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Defrost the turkey. Place the wrapped turkey on a baking sheet and set on the bottom shelf of the fridge. Defrost for 1 day if fresh, or 4-5 days, if frozen. For a quicker defrost, submerge the turkey in a large sink or cooler filled with cold water and defrost for 30 minutes per pound of turkey.
1: 1 day before cooking, brine the turkey. Measure the salt into a small bowl. Set up your work station with kitchen shears, a plastic bag, a fresh baking sheet with a wire rack set over it, and a garbage can nearby.
2: Cut the packaging off the defrosted turkey, being careful not to cut the skin or flesh, and remove from the bag. Set the turkey on the baking sheet with the wire rack. Cut off any excess skin around the neck and release the plastic holder securing the legs. Remove any innards and giblets from the cavity and discard. Thoroughly pat the turkey dry with paper towels.
3: Sprinkle the salt all over the turkey, making sure to get in the cavity, under the skin, and between any crevices.
4: Refrigerate the turkey, uncovered, for 1 day. If brining for more than 1 day, cover the turkey with plastic wrap, then remove for the last day to let the skin dry out before roasting.
5: A few hours before serving, prepare the turkey for roasting. Set an oven rack at the lowest height and the other in the middle of the oven. Preheat the oven to 325˚F (160˚C).
6: Add the butter to a medium bowl. Chop the sage leaves and add to the bowl, along with the garlic, thyme, and rosemary. Mash the herbs into the butter. Set aside.
7: Set a roasting pan or single-use aluminum pan over a baking sheet near your work station.
8: Trim off the wing tips of the turkey and add to the roasting pan. Cut off any excess skin to expose the wishbone, then use a paring knife to cut out the bone. Use your hands or kitchen shears if the bone is hard to remove. Add to the roasting pan.
9: Turn the bird so the legs are facing you. Tug out the plastic holder. Loosen the skin around the breasts, using your fingers to create a pocket. Be careful not to tear the skin. Rub the herb butter under the skin, then all over the rest of the turkey. Make sure to get in any crevices and the cavity.
10: Stuff the lemon wedges and ¼ of the onion inside the turkey cavity. Add the rest of the onion wedges to the roasting pan, along with the carrot and celery. Pour the chicken broth into the pan.
11: Use the wire rack to rest the turkey over the roasting pan, then pour any accumulated juices from the baking sheet into the pan.
12: Set the roasting pan on the lowest oven rack. Place the turkey on the wire rack on the middle oven rack, directly over the roasting pan to catch any juices.
13: Roast the turkey for about 2 hours, or until the internal temperature reaches 160˚F (71˚C). Start checking the turkey about 90 minutes into roasting to ensure it does not overcook.
14: Remove the turkey from the oven and set the wire rack over a baking sheet to catch any juices. Let rest for about 30 minutes while the internal temperature climbs to 165˚F (74˚C).
15: Meanwhile, make the gravy: Remove any solids from the roasting pan. Strain the liquid into a large pot and bring to a boil, then let reduce to your desired consistency. The gravy can be served as is or, for a thicker gravy, ladle a few spoonfuls of stock into a small bowl with the flour. Whisk until no lumps remain, then stir a bit of the flour mixture at a time back into the pot. Return to a boil and let cook for 5 minutes, until thickened. Repeat as needed until the gravy has reached your desired consistency. Reduce the heat to low, whisking occasionally, until ready to serve, or remove from the heat and bring back to temperature before serving.
16: Carve the turkey: Transfer the turkey to a large cutting board with a lip to catch any juices. First, release the legs to make carving the rest of the bird easier. Using a sharp knife, cut along where the legs meets the breasts, being careful not to cut all the way through. Then, use your hands to pull the legs and thigh away from the carcass and tuck them under the wings to keep them in place.
17: Cut straight down along both sides of the breast bone until you can’t cut any further, then cut horizontally near the wing to release the breasts from the carcass.
18: Cut all the way through the legs to release from the hip joint.
19: Find where the shoulder meets the breast, then cut through that joint to remove the wings, using your hands to pull the wing away if the joint is tough to find.
20: Set the carcass aside--you can pick off any remaining meat for leftovers, or make stock from the whole carcass.
21: Slice the breasts crosswise, against the grain, then transfer to a serving platter. Cut the drumsticks from the thighs through the joint, wiggling the knife to find an easy release or pulling apart with your hands. Add the drumsticks to the platter. Cut the thigh meat away from the bone, then into bite-size pieces, and add to the platter. Release the flats from the wings by cutting through the joint, pulling apart with your hands if necessary, then add to the platter.
22: Rearrange the meat on the platter so the larger pieces of meat with crispy, browned skin are on top. Garnish the platter with sage leaves and lemon wedges, if desired.
23: Serve with the warm gravy.
24: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray、unsalted butter (3tablespoons)、small yellow onion、garlic (6cloves)、all purpose flour (3tablespoons)、italian seasoning (2teaspoons)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、chicken broth (2cups)、whole milk (1cup)、peas (2cups)、carrot (1cup)、tuna (4cans)、egg noodles (12oz)、shredded cheddar cheese (3cups)、butter crackers (1cup)、grated parmesan cheese (¼cup)、olive oil (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Lightly grease a 9 x 13-inch (22 x 33cm) baking dish with nonstick spray.
1: Melt the butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the onion and sauté until softened and very fragrant, about 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic, flour, Italian seasoning, and salt and cook for another minute, until thickened.
2: Slowly pour in the chicken broth and milk and stir to combine. Bring to a simmer, stirring constantly. Once the mixture has thickened, 10–12 minutes, stir in the peas, carrots, and tuna.
3: Spread the cooked egg noodles in the prepared baking dish.
4: Pour the sauce over pasta in the pan and stir to combine. Add 2 cups of cheddar cheese and stir to incorporate. Spread the casserole in an even layer, then sprinkle the remaining cup of cheese on top.
5: In a small bowl, use a fork to mix together the cracker crumbs, Parmesan, and olive oil. Sprinkle over the casserole.
6: Bake the casserole for 15–20 minutes, or until the top is lightly browned and bubbling.
7: Serve warm.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、salt (4teaspoons)、pepper (4teaspoons)、garlic powder (4teaspoons)、canola oil (4tablespoons)、garlic (3cloves)、medium white onion、heavy cream (2cups)、shredded parmesan cheese (½cup)、fresh parsley (1cup)、lasagna noodles、shredded mozzarella cheese (2cups)、bacon (6strips)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Slice each chicken breasts in half lengthwise and sprinkle 1 teaspoon of salt, pepper, and garlic powder evenly on both sides of each chicken breast.
2: Heat oil in a large pan over high heat, then sear the chicken for about 1 minute per side. They will continue to cook through in the oven later on.
3: In the residual oil (drain some if necessary), toss in the garlic and onions, stirring constantly until the mixture has started to brown.
4: Pour in the cream, stirring until it starts to boil, then add the parmesan and parsley.
5: Cook for 1 additional minute, then remove from heat.
6: In a 9" x 13" (23cm x 33cm)  rectangular baking pan, spread about ¼ of the cream mixture on the bottom.
7: Lay enough lasagna noodles to cover the sauce, then spread about ½ of the remaining cream mixture on top.
8: Place enough chicken breasts to cover the sauce, then sprinkle with half of the mozzarella, followed by half of the bacon and half of the parsley.
9: Repeat the layers once more, starting with noodles, sauce, chicken, bacon, parsley, and mozzarella.
10: Bake for about 25 minutes, until the cheese is golden brown.
11: Cool for about 15 minutes, slice, and serve!
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、small onion、carrots、celery (2stalks)、garlic (3cloves)、italian  sausages、ground sirloin (1lb)、salt、pepper、tomato paste (2tablespoons)、italian seasoning (1tablespoon)、red wine (½cup)、crushed tomato (28oz)、beef broth (16oz)、bay leaves、parmesan cheese (1cup)、heavy cream (½cup)、penne pasta (1lb)
instructions:
0: In a large pot, set on medium heat, add the olive oil and sauté the onions, celery, carrots, and garlic until they are soft, about 10-15 minutes.
1: Add garlic and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
2: Add the ground beef and the sausages. Season with salt and pepper, and break up the meat with a spoon and frying until no longer pink.
3: Next, add the tomato paste, Italian seasoning, and red wine. Stir and reduce until the wine has almost completely evaporated.
4: Now add all the remaining ingredients, except the parmesan and cream. Stir to ensure everything is well mixed.
5: Simmer for 30 minutes to 3 hours. The longer the simmer, the deeper and more concentrated the flavor.
6: Stir in the parmesan and cream to the sausage bolognese.
7: Add the cooked pasta to the sauce.
8: Serve with more parmesan, if desired.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:beef (9oz)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、chinese 5 spice (1tablespoon)、garlic (3cloves)、red chili、chili sauce (2tablespoons)、soy sauce (2tablespoons)、noodle (9oz)
instructions:
0: Fry the beef for a couple of minutes with the salt, pepper, and 5 spice. Take out and set aside.
1: In the same pan, fry the garlic and red chili for a few minutes before stirring in the chili sauce and soy sauce.
2: Add the beef and noodles. Mix together for another couple of minutes.
3: Serve with some red chili and spring onions.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ball tip sirloin (1lb)、vegetable oil (2tablespoons)、taco seasoning (1tablespoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、corn tortillas、shredded monterey jack cheese (1 ½cups)、white onion (½cup)、fresh cilantro (½cup)
instructions:
0: To make the guacamole, add the avocados, serrano peppers, cilantro, garlic, salt, and a bit of water to a blender. Blend until smooth, adding water as needed to thin it down. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
1: To make the red sauce, add the dried chilies, stewed tomatillos in 2 cups (480 ml) of their stewing liquid, stewed tomato in ½ cup (120 ml) of its stewing liquid, garlic, and bit of salt in a blender. Blend until everything is well incorporated, adding more salt to taste.
2: Mix 1 teaspoon of salt into 1 tablespoon of taco seasoning and rub the seasoning onto both sides of the steak.
3: Cut the steak into thin strips, then cut into small pieces.
4: Add 1 tablespoon of oil to a large griddle or cast iron pan over high heat. Once the oil is hot, add the steak and cook for 6-8 minutes or until the steak has browned on all sides. Move to the side of the griddle to keep warm.
5: Reduce the heat to medium/medium-high and add a bit more oil to the griddle. Place the tortillas on the griddle and top with a generous amount of cheese. On half of the tortillas, add some of the cooked steak, diced onion, cilantro, red sauce, and guacamole.
6: Place the other tortilla (cheese-side down) on top of the fillings. Serve.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pork rib (1 ½lb)、salt (1tablespoon)、pepper (1tablespoon)、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、paprika (1tablespoon)、dried oregano (1tablespoon)、BBQ sauce (1bottle)
instructions:
0: Lay out the ribs on a large baking tray.
1: Season evenly with salt, pepper, garlic powder, paprika, and oregano. Rub in on all sides.
2: Pour half the BBQ sauce over the ribs and brush to evenly coat all sides.
3: Transfer the ribs to a large slow cooker. Position the ribs so they are standing up, with the meatier side down, and so the meat side is against the walls of the slow cooker, with the bone sides facing in.
4: Cover and cook on low for 7 - 8 hours, or high for 4 hours. Check after the allotted time, you want to make sure the meat is cooked through and tender, but you do not want it to be so tender it falls off the bone. If they seem a little tough, allow to cook an additional 30 minutes, as needed.
5: Remove the ribs and transfer to wire rack set over a foil-lined baking sheet.
6: Paint the ribs with additional BBQ sauce, ensuring they are well-coated on both sides.
7: Broil HIGH for 5-8 minutes to caramelize the sauce, making it slightly charred and bubbly.
8: Remove and carefully cut between the bones to separate into individual ribs.
9: Serve with additional BBQ sauce, as needed.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:buttermilk (1 ¾cups)、eggs、chicken drumsticks、vegetable oil (8 ½cups)
instructions:
0: Beat the eggs into the buttermilk.
1: Add the chicken pieces to the buttermilk mixture and chill for an hour.
2: In a large mixing bowl, mix the flour with all the herbs and spices.
3: Coat the soaked chicken pieces in the herbed flour mixture, shaking off any excess.
4: Heat oil in a large sauce pan to 325˚F (170°C), then turn to low heat.
5: Fry the chicken in batches for 15 minutes until the chicken is cooked and the skins turn golden brown.
6: Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large eggplants、sea salt (1teaspoon)、olive oil、garlic (5cloves)、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、crushed san marzano tomato (28oz)、fresh basil (6leaves)、large egg、ricotta cheese (15oz)、shredded mozzarella cheese (2cups)、grated parmesan cheese (1cup)、italian seasoning (2teaspoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
1: Cut off the ends of the eggplant, then slice lengthwise about ⅛-inch (3-mm) thick.
2: Sprinkle the eggplant slices with sea salt on both sides and let sit for 10 minutes to draw out moisture. Pat dry with paper towels to remove excess liquid.
3: Lightly grease a griddle pan with olive oil and heat over medium heat. Grill the eggplant slices for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until grill marks are visible. Remove from the pan and set aside.
4: In a medium saucepan, heat a drizzle of olive oil over medium-low heat, then add the garlic and red pepper flakes. Sauté for about 3 minutes, until the garlic is fragrant but not browned. Add the crushed tomatoes and 1 teaspoon of salt, stirring well to incorporate the garlic and red pepper. Simmer for 10 minutes, reducing the heat if the sauce begins to bubble too much. Add the basil and stir to combine. Remove from the heat and set aside.
5: In a medium bowl, beat the egg, then add the ricotta, 1½ cups (150 g) of mozzarella, ¾ cup (80 g) of Parmesan, and the Italian seasoning. Mix well to combine.
6: Assemble the lasagna. In a 9x13-inch (23x33-cm) baking dish, add enough sauce to cover the bottom of the dish and spread in an even layer. Add a layer of eggplant slices, covering the bottom of the dish completely. It’s okay if the eggplant slices overlap slightly. Add a layer of the ricotta mixture and spread in a thin, even layer. Repeat with the remaining ingredients, finishing with a layer of sauce. Sprinkle the remaining mozzarella and Parmesan on top.
7: Bake for 45 minutes, until cheese is fully melted.
8: Turn the broiler on high and broil for 5 minutes, or until the cheese on top is browned and bubbly.
9: Remove the lasagna from the oven and let rest for 15-20 minutes before serving to give the lasagna time to set.
10: Serve garnished with fresh basil.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken thighs (2lb)、bacon (½lb)、asparagus (1lb)、red onion、garlic (4cloves)、chicken broth (6cups)、milk (1cup)、fusilli pasta (1lb)、goat cheese (8oz)、sun-dried tomato (½cup)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: In a large pot on medium-high heat, add bacon. Cook until the fat has rendered and the bacon is crispy. Remove bacon from pot and set aside. Leave bacon fat in pan.
1: Season chicken with salt and pepper and place skin-side down in the pot. Cook until the chicken gets a dark golden crispy skin. Flip and cook on the other side until the chicken is cooked through. Remove from pot and set aside.
2: Add the red onion, asparagus, and garlic to the pot and until the asparagus is almost tender. Remove from pot.
3: Add the pasta and chicken broth to the pot.
4: Bring to a boil, and cook for 9-12 minutes or until the pasta is al dente. Stir occasionally.
5: When the pasta is almost tender. Lower the heat and add in the milk, goat cheese, cooked vegetables, cooked bacon, and sun-dried tomatoes. Stir to incorporate.
6: Add the chicken back to the pot. Sprinkle with chopped parsley and bring to the table to serve.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:russet potatoes、olive oil (1tablespoon)、kosher salt (1 ½teaspoons)、unsalted butter (3tablespoons)、heavy cream (¼cup)、freshly ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、shredded cheddar cheese (½cup)、fresh chives (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Set one rack at the top and one rack in the center of the oven. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Place the potatoes on the baking sheet. Poke a few times on each side with a fork, then brush all over with olive oil and sprinkle with ½ teaspoon of salt.
2: Bake the potatoes on the center rack of the oven for 45–50 minutes, until easily pierced with a knife. Remove from oven and let sit until cool enough to handle. Reduce the oven temperature to 350°F (180°C).
3: While potatoes are cooking, make the beef filling: Heat the olive oil in a large, high-walled skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until translucent, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and continue to cook until fragrant, 2–3 minutes.
4: Push the onion mixture to the edges of the pan and increase the heat to medium-high. Add the ground beef to the center of the pan and break up with a spatula. Let the meat brown, undisturbed, for 2–3 minutes, then season with 1 teaspoon of salt and ½ teaspoon of pepper and stir to incorporate.
5: When the beef is mostly cooked through but still slightly pink, add the tomato paste and Worcestershire sauce and stir to combine, continuing to break up the beef with the spatula.
6: Add the beef stock, carrots, and peas. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer for 3–5 minutes, until most of the liquid has evaporated. Season with the remaining teaspoon of salt and ½ teaspoon of pepper, plus more to taste. Remove the pan from the heat.
7: Once the potatoes are cool enough to handle, cut in half lengthwise. Being careful not to tear the skin, scoop out most of the flesh and transfer to a large bowl. Set the potato skins aside.
8: Add the melted butter, heavy cream, remaining teaspoon of salt, and the pepper to the bowl with the potato flesh. With an electric hand mixer, mix on low speed until combined, then increase the speed to high and mix until potatoes are light and fluffy. Add the cheddar cheese and mix on low speed until just incorporated.
9: Scoop about ¼ cup (60 G) of the beef filling into each potato skin. Top with about ¼ cup of the mashed potatoes. Spread the potatoes over the beef filling so it’s almost entirely covered. Using a fork, create ridges in the potatoes by dragging the fork from top to bottom.
10: Bake the potatoes on the center rack for 10–15 minutes, until the cheese in the potatoes starts melt and you hear sizzling coming from the potatoes when you open the oven door.
11: Transfer the potatoes to the top rack and broil on high for 1–2 minutes, until the edges are brown and crispy, keeping a close eye to ensure they do not burn.
12: Top the potatoes with the chives and serve warm
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:canola oil (3tablespoons)、boneless pork tenderloin (2lb)、salt (1tablespoon)、freshly ground black pepper (1tablespoon)、canola oil (3tablespoons)、large red onion、garlic (4cloves)、medium apples、hard cider (1cup)
instructions:
0: Pat the pork tenderloin dry and generously season with salt and pepper on all sides.
1: Heat 2 tablespoons of canola oil in a large cast iron skillet over medium-high heat, until the oil is shimmering and just starting to smoke.
2: Place pork in the hot skillet and sear until well browned, about 1½-2 minutes. Flip and repeat searing on all sides.
3: Remove the pork from the skillet and set aside.
4: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
5: Heat the remaining tablespoon of oil in the skillet.
6: Add the onion to hot skillet and toss to coat in the oil. Add the garlic and apples and cook until the apples and onion begin to soften.
7: Pour the cider over apples and onion and bring to a simmer.
8: Return the pork to the skillet, on top of the apple and onion mixture. Spoon the cooking liquid over the pork and transfer the entire skillet to the oven.
9: Bake for 15-20 minutes, until the internal temperature of the pork reaches 145˚F (62˚C.)
10: Remove the skillet from the oven and let the pork rest for 10 minutes before slicing. Serve the sliced pork over a bed of the apples and onions.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:lasagna noodles、cooked chicken (2cups)、cooked bacon (1lb)、mozzarella cheese (8oz)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350ºF (175ºC).
1: Cook the lasagna noodles until al dente, drain and rinse the noodles with cold water then lay the on a paper towel to remove excess water.
2: In a medium saucepan add butter, heavy whipping cream, and cream cheese, cook over medium heat and whisk until melted.
3: Add minced garlic, garlic powder, salt and pepper, whisk until smooth.
4: Add the parmesan cheese and bring to a simmer, continue to cook for about 3-5 minutes or until it starts to thicken.
