5: Pour 1 cup (228 grams) of the alfredo sauce in a 9x13 inch (23x33 cm) pan.
6: Add bacon and chicken to the alfredo sauce, mix together.
7: Spread about 2 tbsp. of alfredo sauce mixture over each noodle.
8: Roll each noodle and place seam down in the pan.
9: Once they are all in the pan pour remaining alfredo mixture over the top and sprinkle mozzarella cheese over the top.
10: Cook for about 30 minutes until it is heated through and cheese bubbles and browns
11: Nutrition  Calories: 6306 Fat: 591 grams  Carbs: 45 grams Fiber: 0 grams  Sugars: 24 grams  Protein: 262 grams
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ravioli (1 ⅓lb)、bolognese sauce (2 ¼cups)、shredded cheddar cheese
instructions:
0: NOTE: We used about 600g of each, Ravioli (1 ⅓lb) and Bolognese sauce (2 ¼cup). Depending on your pan size this will vary.
1: Cover the base of a deep dish baking tray with a layer of ravioli.
2: Cover this with a thin layer of bolognese sauce, use the back of a spoon to spread it around evenly.
3: Sprinkle a thin layer of grated cheddar over the bolognese sauce.
4: Put down another layer of ravioli, followed by another layer of bolognese sauce.
5: Cover all of this with a generous topping of more grated cheese.
6: Cover the tray with tin foil and bake in the center of a pre-heated oven for 35 mins. 200°C (400°F) Gas Mark 6.
7: Remove the tin foil and bake for a further 8-10 minutes, or until the cheese on top has melted and browned a bit.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:broccoli florets (2cups)、carrot (2cups)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、freshly ground black pepper (2teaspoons)、boneless salmon fillets、brown sugar (¾cup)、soy sauce (3tablespoons)、honey (½cup)、sesame seed (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: On a baking sheet, combine broccoli, carrots, oil, salt, and pepper.
2: Mix thoroughly to make sure all vegetables are coated, and then arrange them in the center of the tray in a flat layer.
3: Lay the two salmon fillets on the vegetables.
4: In a medium bowl, combine brown sugar, soy sauce, honey, and sesame seeds. Mix until there are no lumps.
5: Spread the glaze evenly on top of the two salmon fillets.
6: Bake for 12 minutes.
7: Take the salmon fillets off the vegetables and set aside. Toss the vegetables in the roasting juices.
8: Glaze the salmon with any remaining juices. Serve!
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:lean ground beef (1lb)、small white onion、garlic (2tablespoons)、diced tomato (14.5oz)、kidney bean (7oz)、black beans (7oz)、chili powder (1 ½tablespoons)、cumin (1 ½teaspoons)、seasoned salt (1teaspoon)、chicken broth (3 ½cups)、cavatappi pasta (10oz)、sharp cheddar cheese (3cups)
instructions:
0: In a large pot, cook ground beef and onions over medium high heat until browned.
1: Add minced garlic and cook for an additional two to three minutes. Carefully drain any excess fat.
2: Add the diced tomatoes, kidney beans, black beans, chili powder, cumin, seasoned salt, and chicken broth. Stir, and bring to a boil.
3: Add the pasta, and cook according to package instructions.
4: Stir in the cheese, and cook for an additional five minutes, or until thickened.
5: Serve with your favorite toppings.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bacon (2strips)、Italian sausage (1lb)、red pepper flakes (1 ½teaspoons)、medium yellow onion、garlic (4cloves)、mushroom blend (10oz)、dry white wine (½cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、spaghetti (1lb)、grated parmesan cheese (1cup)、pasta cooking water (1cup)、fresh spinach (5oz)
instructions:
0: Sauté the bacon in a large pot over medium-high heat for about 3 minutes, until crispy.
1: Add the sausage meat and red pepper flakes and sauté for about 10 minutes, until the meat is cooked through. Remove from the pan and set aside.
2: In the same pot, sauté the onion over medium heat for 2-3 minutes, until translucent.
3: Add the garlic and sauté for 2 minutes, until fragrant.
4: Add the mushrooms and cook for 2-3 minutes, until they start to release some of their liquid.
5: Add the wine, salt, and pepper and stir to combine. Cook for 7-8 minutes, until the wine has reduced by half and the mushrooms are tender.
6: Add the spaghetti and sausage mixture and toss to combine.
7: Add the Parmesan, pasta water, and spinach and stir. Cook until the pasta is warmed through and the Parmesan has melted.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsalted butter (3tablespoons)、all-purpose flour (¼cup)、milk (3cups)、rotisserie chicken、frozen pea and carrot (1 ½cups)、frozen pearl onion (½cup)、small potato (1cup)、kosher salt (1tablespoon)、black pepper (2teaspoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375ºF (190ºC).
1: Make the filling: Melt the butter in a large cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat. Add the the flour and whisk until bubbling.
2: Whisk in the milk until smooth, then add the chicken, peas and carrots, pearl onions, potato, salt, and pepper . Stir until everything is well coated, then continue to cook until the filling is bubbling and the liquid has thickened slightly, 7-10 minutes. Remove the pan from the heat.
3: Make the biscuits: In a large bowl, stir together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
4: Using your a fork, your hands, or a pastry cutter, work the butter into the dry ingredients, leaving pea-sized chunks.
5: Add the buttermilk and fold with a rubber spatula until a thick dough comes together.
6: Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface. Bring the dough together into one large mass, then roll out with a rolling pin to about 1 ½-2 inches (4-5 centimeters) thick.
7: Using a 2-3-inch (5-7 centimeter) biscuit cutter or small glass dipped in flour, cut out rounds from the dough. Cut out all of the rounds, then place on top of the filling so the dough does not warm too much. Re-roll the dough scraps if needed. You should have about 10 biscuits total.
8: Brush tops of the biscuits with the beaten egg and top with cheddar cheese.
9: Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the biscuits are golden brown and cooked through. Carefully remove from the oven and let cool for 10 minutes. Garnish with chives before serving.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cauliflower (½head)、walnuts (¾cup)、olive oil、medium yellow onion、garlic (2cloves)、chili powder (2 ½teaspoons)、ground cumin (1teaspoon)、smoked paprika (½teaspoon)、low sodium soy sauce (2tablespoons)、low sodium vegetable broth (¼cup)、kosher salt、pepper、large flour tortillas、spanish rice (2cups)、lettuce、tomato、shredded vegan cheddar cheese、guacamole
instructions:
0: Add the cauliflower florets and walnuts to a food processor and pulse until crumbly. Set aside.
1: Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook for 3-4 minutes, until semi-translucent. Add the cauliflower mixture and cook for 4-5 minutes, until the cauliflower is semi-tender.
2: Add another drizzle of olive oil, the garlic, chili powder, cumin, paprika, and soy sauce and cook for 2-3 minutes more, until the spices are fragrant. Add the vegetable broth and cook for another 5-6 minutes, until the broth has evaporated and the cauliflower is tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3: To assemble a burrito, add ¼ of the Spanish rice, ¼ of the cauliflower-walnut mixture, some lettuce, tomatoes, vegan cheese, and guacamole to the center of a tortilla. Fold in the sides and roll up, keeping the filling tucked in place. Repeat with the remaining ingredients. Cut in half and serve.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、chili powder (1teaspoon)、ground cumin (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、garlic (2cloves)、salsa (2cups)、tortilla、pico de gallo、guacamole、sour cream
instructions:
0: Place chicken breasts inside the Instant Pot.
1: Add the chili powder, ground cumin, pepper, and garlic and toss until the chicken is coated on both sides. Add the salsa.
2: Seal the lid in place until you hear the beep. Tip: Closing the lid can be tricky. Have the pressure knob at 11 o’clock and turn right.
3: Press “Poultry” and set time to 13 minutes. Set pressure knob to “Sealing”.
4: Steam will release and the screen will say “On” before it starts counting down.
5: Once the timer goes off, carefully turn the pressure knob to “Venting”. Let all of the stream release before opening the lid.
6: Shred the chicken with two forks.
7: Serve with tortillas, pico de gallo, guacamole, sour cream, or other desired toppings.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:vegetable oil (2tablespoons)、sirloin steak (1lb)、salt、black pepper、red onion、medium tomato、garlic (2cloves)、aji amarillo paste (1tablespoon)、soy sauce (2tablespoons)、white vinegar (1tablespoon)、fresh cilantro (1tablespoon)、french fries (1lb)、white rice
instructions:
0: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large pan over high heat. Add the steak, season with salt and pepper, and cook until browned, 5-6 minutes. Remove from the pan.
1: Heat the remaining tablespoon of oil in the same pan, then add the red onion and cook for about 5 minutes, until softened and browned. Add the tomato, garlic, and aji amarillo paste, and cook for another 5-7 minutes, until the tomatoes have released some of their juices, but are still intact.
2: Add the soy sauce and vinegar and stir to combine, let cook for 1 minute.
3: Add the steak, fries, and cilantro. Toss gently to coat the fries in the sauce.
4: Serve with rice, if desired.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、chicken breast、cherry tomatoes (1cup)、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、dried basil (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Use a peeler to thinly slice zucchini into “linguini” noodles. Set aside in a bowl and mix with salt. Let sit for 20 minutes to draw moisture out of the noodles. Drain the zucchini with a clean dish cloth or paper towels.
1: Heat olive oil in a large skillet. Add in chicken breast, salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Cook until no longer pink. Add in zucchini noodles, cherry tomatoes, and dried basil. Cook for an additional minute and remove from heat. Set aside in a bowl.
2: Heat olive oil for for the creamy sauce in the skillet. Add in garlic cloves and cook for about 30 seconds. Add in chicken broth to cool skillet, and reduce heat to low. (This step is important: if skillet is too hot, the Greek yogurt will curdle, so allow it to cool down before adding it in).
3: Add in Greek yogurt, parmesan, and dried basil. Mix until well combined. Add in the chicken, zoodles, and tomato mixture. Mix together and then remove from heat.
4: Serve and garnish with fresh chopped basil, as desired.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、garlic (2cloves)、red pepper、soy sauce (2tablespoons)、ketchup (1tablespoon)、cider vinegar (1tablespoon)、noodle (9oz)、sesame seed
instructions:
0: Sear the chicken until golden brown in the pan with the salt and pepper. Take out and set aside.
1: In the same pan, fry the garlic and red pepper for a couple of minutes before stirring in the soy sauce, ketchup, and vinegar.
2: Add the chicken and noodles, and mix together for another couple of minutes.
3: Garnish with sesame seeds.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:broccoli (3 ½cups)、shredded cheddar cheese (2cups)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、onion powder (1teaspoon)、cream cheese (8oz)、chicken breasts、salt、pepper、cheddar cracker (14oz)、all-purpose flour (1cup)、eggs
instructions:
0: In a small bowl, microwave 1½ cups (225 g) of broccoli for 1 minute. Add the cheddar cheese, garlic powder, onion powder, and cream cheese. Mix thoroughly, and set aside until ready to use.
1: On a cutting board, butterfly the chicken breasts with a knife. Cut through the chicken breast so you have 6 thinner chicken cutlets. Cover in plastic wrap, and tenderize by beating with a rolling pin or a heavy pan.
2: Remove the plastic wrap, and season with salt and pepper. Place a scoop of the broccoli cheddar mixture on top of a chicken cutlet, and spread until the chicken is covered.
3: Roll the chicken up starting from the tapered end. Use 2 toothpicks to keep the chicken tightly rolled. Repeat with the rest of the chicken.
4: Preheat the oven to 325˚F (165˚C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
5: In a plastic bag, crush the cheddar crackers until they have a coarse, sand-like texture. Pour the cracker crumbs into a large bowl. Add the rest of the minced broccoli. Stir to combine.
6: Put the flour into a medium bowl.
7: Whisk the eggs in another medium bowl.
8: Using tongs, place one of the pieces of chicken into the flour. Turn the chicken in the flour until it is fully coated, tap off any excess flour. Place the chicken in the egg, turn until the chicken is coated. Place the chicken in the broccoli cracker crumb mixture, turn until the chicken is fully coated. Repeat with the remaining chicken rolls.
9: Transfer the pieces of chicken to the prepared baking sheet. Bake for 40-45 minutes.
10: Let the chicken cool slightly, then remove the toothpicks.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:garlic (4cloves)、fresh ginger (2teaspoons)、honey (1tablespoon)、 sriracha (1teaspoon)、lime juice (¼cup)、reduced sodium soy sauce (¼cup)、extra firm tofu (1block)、sesame oil (2tablespoons)、sliced white onion (1cup)、sliced carrot (1cup)、sliced red bell pepper (1cup)、edamame (½cup)、soba noodle (3cups)、sesame seed (1tablespoon)、green onion
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, mix together 2 cloves of garlic, the ginger, honey, Sriracha, lime juice, and soy sauce. Set aside.
1: Wrap the tofu in a dish towel, then place a plate on top. Let drain for 10-15 minutes, then remove the plate, unwrap the tofu, and slice into cubes.
2: In a wok or large frying pan, heat the sesame oil over medium heat. Add the tofu and pan fry for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally.
3: Add the remaining 2 cloves of minced garlic and the onion and stir until softened, about 1 minute.
4: Add the carrot, bell pepper, and edamame and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender, 2-3 minutes.
5: Add the soba noodles, reserved sauce, and sesame seeds. Cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring occasionally, until warmed through. Remove the pan from the heat.
6: Garnish with green onions, if desired.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:spaghetti squash、olive oil、sea salt、black pepper、chicken breasts
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: Poke several holes in the spaghetti squash around the lengthwise center of the squash. Microwave on high for 5 minutes.
2: Cut the squash in half along the holes. Remove the seeds and pulp with a spoon. Drizzle the squash with olive oil, and season with salt and pepper.
3: Place the squash cut-side down on baking sheet and bake for 40 minutes, until tender. Let cool.
4: Heat a bit of olive oil in a medium skillet over medium high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook for 6-8 minutes, until the chicken is golden brown and cooked through. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
5: Add a bit more oil and the onion and sauté for a few minutes, until starting to brown. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant.
6: Add the salt, pepper, and tomatoes and cook for a couple minutes, until the tomatoes start to release their juices.
7: Add the lemon juice and chicken broth and cook until the liquid reduces by about half, 20 minutes.
8: Add the chicken and cook for 2 minutes, then add the spinach and cook for 2 minutes, until wilted. Remove the pan from the heat.
9: Using 2 forks, shred the spaghetti squash and scoop out onto serving plates.
10: Pour the sauce over the squash. Serve immediately.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、salt、pepper、flour (½cup)、garlic powder (¼teaspoon)、onion powder (¼teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、italian seasoning (2teaspoons)、eggs、bread crumbs (1cup)、parmesan cheese (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: Cut chicken breasts into strips and season with salt and pepper.
2: In a re-sealable plastic bag, combine flour, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, and Italian seasoning.
3: Add the seasoned chicken strips into the flour mixture and seal the bag. Shake until the chicken strips are well coated with the flour mixture.
4: Beat 3 eggs in a small bowl and dip each piece of chicken until well coated.
5: In another bowl, combine bread crumbs and parmesan cheese and coat each piece of chicken with the mixture.
6: Place the coated chicken strips on a greased baking sheet and bake for 35-40 minutes, flipping halfway, and bake until golden brown (times and temperatures may vary based on oven).
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:creamy peanut butter (¾cup)、coconut milk (¾cup)、spring onions、garlic (3cloves)、ginger (10g)、fresh Serrano chilies、curry powder (1teaspoon)、cumin (1teaspoon)、turmeric (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、soy sauce (2tablespoons)、lime、boneless, skinless chicken thighs
instructions:
0: In a food processor, blend the peanut butter, coconut milk, spring onions, garlic, ginger, chilies, curry powder, cumin, turmeric, salt, soy sauce, and lime juice into a smooth paste; this should make about 2 cups. Reserve half of the marinade and pour the other half over the chicken thighs. Mix and chill for 2 hours or overnight.
1: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C). Line a baking tray with parchment paper.
2: Skewer the marinated chicken onto bamboo skewers, then arrange the skewers so their ends rest on the edges of the baking tray, allowing the chicken to be suspended. Bake the chicken skewers for 15-20 minutes, until slightly dark brown on the edges and cooked through.
3: With no oil in the pan, toast the chopped peanuts on low to medium heat, stirring constantly until the peanuts turn golden brown, 2-3 minutes. Add in the reserved marinade and the coconut milk. Stir and cook until thick and very aromatic, 5-10 minutes.
4: Serve the chicken skewers with the sauce on the side.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cauliflower (1medium head)、large carrots、ground cumin (1tablespoon)、paprika (2teaspoons)、kosher salt、black pepper、olive oil (2tablespoons)、medium red onion、fresh italian parsley (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: In a large bowl, combine the cauliflower, carrots, cumin, paprika, salt, pepper and olive oil. Toss until well-coated.
2: Spread the vegetables on the baking sheet in a single layer and roast for 20-25 minutes, until the carrots are tender.
3: Make the dressing: In a medium bowl, whisk together the tahini, garlic, lemon juice, and water. While whisking, slowly drizzle in the olive oil until the dressing is emulsified. Season with salt and pepper.
4: In a large bowl, mix together the onion and parsley. Add the roasted cauliflower and carrots, and toss well.
5: Drizzle the salad with the dressing, then serve.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (4tablespoons)、shallots、garlic (2cloves)、whole milk (½cup)、white  pepper (1 ½teaspoons)、salt (1teaspoon)、yellow potato (2lb)
instructions:
0: Make the creamy shallot potato puree: Melt 3 tablespoons of butter in a medium pan over medium-high heat. Add the shallots and cook for 3-4 minutes, until softened.
1: Add the garlic and another tablespoon of butter and continue to cook for another 3-4 minutes, stirring frequently, until the shallots are browned.
2: Add the milk, white pepper, and salt and stir to incorporate.
3: Transfer the shallot mixture to a food processor and process until smooth.
4: Mash potatoes in a large bowl. Add the shallot puree and continue to mash until fully incorporated. Set aside.
5: Make the sautéed vegetables: Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the mushrooms and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until starting to soften.
6: Push the mushrooms to one side of the pan and add a bit more oil. Add the asparagus and season everything with salt and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes, until the vegetables are tender. Remove from the heat and set aside.
7: Make the salmon: On a cutting board, cut 4 slits in the salmon skin, roughly ¼-inch (6 mm) apart and ½-inch (12 mm) into the salmon flesh. Season with salt, pepper, and thyme leaves.
8: Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a medium pan over medium-high heat. Add the salmon, skin-side down. Cook for 3-4 minutes, or until a lighter pink color has reached ⅓-½ of the way up the side of the salmon.
9: Flip the salmon and immediately add the butter, garlic, and a few sprigs of thyme. Stir the garlic and thyme around the pan to infuse the flavors and spoon the butter over the salmon for 2 minutes more, until the salmon is cooked through. Remove the salmon from the pan.
10: Add the potato puree to plates and top with the sautéed vegetables and salmon.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken thighs、salt、pepper、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、dried rosemary (1teaspoon)、dried thyme (1teaspoon)、garlic (6cloves)、lemon、water (¼cup)、vegetable
instructions:
0: Place the chicken, salt, pepper, oregano, rosemary, and thyme into the slow cooker and mix together with your hands.
1: Add the garlic, lemon, and water.
2: Place the lid on and cook on high for 3 hours.
3: Remove the chicken, lemon, and garlic, and stir in the chicken stock and cornflour mix.
4: Stir until you reach your desired consistency for chicken gravy.

6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:canola oil (⅓cup)、distilled white vinegar (⅓cup)、fresh lime juice (⅓cup)、fresh orange juice (⅓cup)、garlic (4teaspoons)、jalapeño (3tablespoons)、fresh cilantro (¼cup)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、ground coriander (1teaspoon)、ground cumin (½teaspoon)、freshly ground black pepper (1teaspoon)、chili powder (1teaspoon)、flank steak (1lb)、white corn tortillas、pico de gallo、guacamole、sour cream、cotija cheese
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, whisk together the oil, vinegar, lime juice, orange juice, garlic, jalapeño, chopped cilantro, salt, coriander, cumin, pepper, and chili powder.
1: Place the steak in a gallon-size resealable bag. Pour in 1 cup (240 ml) of the marinade and set the rest aside. Seal the bag and shake to evenly coat the steak in the marinade. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour, or up to 4 hours.
2: In a small saucepan, bring the reserved ½ cup (120 ml) of marinade to a boil over medium-high heat. Cook until thickened and reduced by half, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and set aside.
3: Heat a large grill pan over high heat until very hot. Remove the steak from the bag and discard the marinade. Cook the steak on 1 side until there are dark grill marks and it is beginning to caramelize around the edges, about 6 minutes. Flip and cook on the other side for 5 minutes for medium rare, or 7 minutes for medium. Transfer to a cutting board and let rest for 5 minutes.
4: Working in batches, heat the corn tortillas in a pan over medium-high heat, turning with tongs, until softened and just beginning to brown in spots, about 1 minute per side. Wrap the toasted tortillas in foil to keep warm.
5: Thinly slice the steak against the grain, then cut the slices in half. Transfer to a large bowl and toss with the reduced marinade to coat.
6: Serve the steak with the warm tortillas, pico de gallo, guacamole, sour cream, cotija cheese, and cilantro leaves, if desired.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:salt、linguine (½lb)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、garlic (2cloves)、red chili flakes (½teaspoon)、dried oregano (2teaspoons)、caper (1tablespoon)、kalamata olive (½cup)、tomato paste (2tablespoons)、diced tomato (14oz)、tuna (5oz)
instructions:
0: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package instructions. Drain.

5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:medium yellow onion (1medium)、red bell pepper、yellow bell pepper、green bell pepper、chicken sausage (2cups)、olive oil、creole seasoning (1 ¼tablespoons)、raw shrimp (1lb)、paprika (½teaspoon)、tomato (1 ½cups)、rice (4cups)、scallion
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
1: On a large baking sheet, arrange the onion, bell peppers, and chicken sausage. Drizzle with olive oil and season with 1 tablespoon Creole seasoning, or to taste. Using your hands, mix everything together well.
2: Bake for 8 minutes, or until chicken sausage begins to brown.
3: While the vegetables and chicken sausage are cooking, place the shrimp in a small bowl. Season with 1 teaspoon Creole seasoning and ½ teaspoon paprika. Stir to coat.
4: Remove the vegetables and sausage from the oven, and add the seasoned shrimp and diced tomatoes. Mix everything together.
5: Return everything to the oven for 6 minutes, or until the shrimp is just done.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large spaghetti squash、boneless, skinless chicken breasts、eggs、flour、italian bread crumb、marinara sauce、shredded mozzarella cheese、grated parmesan cheese、italian seasoning、salt、pepper、oil
instructions:
0: With a sharp knife, slice the squash in half. (If the squash is too tough - puncture in several places forming a dotted line around the squash. Microwave for 3-5 minutes to soften. Allow to cool before cutting in half - following the dotted line).
1: Scoop out the seeds - brush with oil, salt, and pepper.
2: Roast face down in a preheated oven at 375˚F (190˚C) for 35-40 minutes (until a fork can easily pierce the skin).
3: Meanwhile - Slice the chicken breasts into strips. Season with salt and pepper.
4: Place flour, beaten egg, and breadcrumbs into three separate bowls.
5: Coat each strip with flour, then egg, and then roll in bread crumbs.
6: Pour oil in a cast-iron skillet to come ¼ inch up the side. Heat the oil over medium-high heat.
7: Fry the chicken strips (in batches if necessary) until golden brown on all sides and cooked through. Transfer to paper towels and remove pan from heat.
8: Once the squash has finished roasting - remove from the oven and let it set for a few minutes before turing over and pulling at it with a fork.
9: Shred the inside of each squash, being careful not to poke through the skin.
10: Pour marinara sauce over shredded squash. Top with chicken strips, then more marinara, and finish with mozzarella and parmesan cheese, and a pinch of Italian seasoning.
11: Return to the oven to bake for 10-15 minutes until the cheese has melted.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:kosher salt、linguine (8oz)、unsalted butter (8tablespoons)、large shrimp (1 ¼lb)、Tasty Zesty Spice Blend (1pouch)、fresh baby spinach (4cups)、grated parmesan cheese (¼cup)、fresh lemon juice (2tablespoons)

4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (4tablespoons)、garlic (1 ½tablespoons)、heavy cream (2 ½cups)、black pepper (½teaspoon)、grated parmesan cheese (¾cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
1: In a saucepan, melt butter. Add the garlic, heavy cream, and pepper. Stirring constantly, bring to a boil and reduce heat to a simmer.

5: Nutrition  Calories: 3332 Fat: 231 grams  Carbs: 232 grams Fiber: 32 grams  Sugars: 24 grams  Protein: 132 grams

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cauliflower (1head)、shredded mozzarella cheese (½cup)、dried oregano (½teaspoon)、dried basil (½teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、egg
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 500˚F (260˚C).
1: Remove the leaves and stem of the cauliflower.
2: Transfer pieces to a food processor and rice the cauliflower by pulsing it in the food processor, or by shredding it on a box grater.
3: Once riced, transfer to a large bowl and microwave for 4 minutes. Let it cool down for a few minutes before handling!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:cauliflower (1head)、chicken breast、peas (1cup)、carrot (1cup)、soy sauce (2tablespoons)、black pepper (2teaspoons)、eggs、sesame seed (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Remove all leaves and cut the cauliflower into small florets.
1: Place the florets in a food processor and blend until they are a rice-like texture. Be careful not to over process or it may turn mushy. Set aside, and drain excess moisture with a towel, if desired.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken thighs (1lb)、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、dried thyme (1tablespoon)、dried parsley (1tablespoon)、kosher salt、pepper、olive oil (1tablespoon)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、carrot (1cup)、celery (1cup)、yellow onion (1cup)、mushroom (½lb)、garlic (2cloves)、wild rice (¾cup)、chicken broth (8cups)、grated parmesan cheese (1cup)、heavy cream (1cup)、sour cream (½cup)、fresh parsley (¼cup)

instructions:

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sweet potato、brussels sprouts (½lb)、yellow bell pepper、red onion、can of chickpeas (15oz)、olive oil、salt、pepper、paprika、brown rice (2cups)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.
1: On 1 baking sheet, season the vegetables and chickpeas for the Roasted Chickpea & Veggie Brown Rice Bowl with olive oil, salt, pepper, and paprika.
2: On the other baking sheet, season the vegetables for the Roasted Veggie Quinoa Bowl  with olive oil, salt, pepper, garlic powder, and onion powder.
3: Bake for 15 -20 minutes, or until the vegetables are roasted to your liking.
4: Fill 2 glass storage bowls with 1 cup cooked brown rice each. Fill 2 more glass storage bowls with 1 cup cooked quinoa each.
5: Fill the brown rice bowls with the roasted chickpea and vegetables. Fill the quinoa bowls with the other roasted vegetables. 
6: Mix the cilantro-lime dressing ingredients and split the dressing between 2 small glass containers. Store in the refrigerator with the roasted vegetable and chickpea bowls for up to 4 days.
7: Mix the soy-maple dressing ingredients and split the dressing between 2 small glass containers. Store in the refrigerator with the roasted vegetable quinoa bowls for up to 4 days.
8: To serve, remove the containers with the dressing and heat the bowls in the microwave for 1 minute. Pour the dressing on top and mix everything together.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (⅓cup)、onion、celery (3stalks)、large carrots、milk (1cup)、chicken broth (2cups)、flour (½cup)、rotisserie chicken、frozen peas (1cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、refrigerated pie crusts
instructions:
0: In a deep skillet, melt the butter and cook celery, carrots, and onion until tender.
1: Pour in the flour, and mix in well.
2: Stirring constantly, add in the milk and chicken broth a little at a time, alternating between the two. Bring to a boil and continue stirring until thickened.
3: Add chicken, peas, salt, and pepper, and stir until combined. Remove from heat and cool.
4: Roll out pie crust and use the foil pot pie dish as a template. Cut a piece of dough for the bottom of the dish that is about an inch (²¹⁄₂ cm) thicker than the widest rim of the dish, and a piece that is the same size as the rim. (Roll dough back out and repeat to make more pieces.)
5: Place the larger piece of crust in the bottom of the foil dish, fill with the cooled pot pie filling, and top with the smaller crust piece.
6: Pinch together, then seal together with a fork. Cut 4 small slits in the middle of the crust.
7: Cover each pot pie with foil and freeze for up to 2 months.
8: To bake from frozen, preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C), and bake for 30 minutes with the foil on top. Remove the foil and bake for another 30 minutes or until golden brown.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil、large yellow onion、garlic (3cloves)、fresh rosemary (½tablespoon)、short-grain brown rice (1 ½cups)、vegetable broth (5 ½cups)、butternut squash (2cups)、salt、pepper、fresh sage (1bunch)、freshly grated parmesan cheese (¾cup)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Place an oven rack at the bottom of the oven and another at the top. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: Heat the olive oil in a Dutch oven or large oven-safe pot over medium heat.  Add the onion and cook for about 5 minutes, until starting to brown. 
2: Add the garlic and rosemary, and cook for 2 minutes, until fragrant.
3: Add the rice and 4 cups (960 ml) of vegetable broth, and stir to combine. Bring to a boil, then cover.
4: Place the risotto on the bottom rack of the oven. Bake for 70 minutes, until all of the liquid has been absorbed by the rice. (It will appear dry, but you’ll be adding moisture back later in the recipe.)
5: Add the butternut squash to the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil, then season with salt and pepper. Toss to coat.
6: Place the squash on the top rack of the oven, above the risotto. Bake for 45 minutes, or until the edges of the squash begin to brown and caramelize.
7: Make the fried sage garnish, if using: In a small pot or pan over medium-high heat, add enough olive oil for the sage leaves to sit in. Once hot, carefully place a few leaves into the oil with tongs. Fry for 10-20 seconds, until the leaves are crispy but not browned. 
8: Carefully remove from the oil and drain on a paper towel-lined plate. Sprinkle with salt and set aside.
9: Remove the risotto from the oven. Add the remaining vegetable broth, the Parmesan, and butter. Stir until creamy. (The liquid will absorb into the rice as you stir).
10: Add the butternut squash and stir to incorporate.
11: Serve immediately with fried sage for garnish.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray、chicken breast (2lb)、salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (2teaspoons)、dried oregano (2teaspoons)、garlic powder (2teaspoons)、dried rosemary (2teaspoons)、onion powder (2teaspoons)、all purpose flour (2cups)、large eggs、plain breadcrumbs (3cups)、bell peppers、marinara sauce (3cups)、parmesan cheese (1cup)、fresh mozzarella cheese (32oz)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Set a wire rack over a baking sheet. Grease another baking sheet with nonstick spray.
1: In a medium bowl, combine the chicken, salt, pepper, oregano, garlic powder, rosemary, and onion powder, and toss until evenly coated.
2: Add the flour, eggs, and bread crumbs to 3 separate medium bowls. Coat a few pieces of chicken at a time in the flour, then the eggs, then the bread crumbs. Once coated, transfer to the wire rack.
3: Bake for 25 minutes, or until golden brown.
4: Arrange the bell peppers, cut-side up, on the greased baking sheet.
5: Spoon half of the marinara sauce into the peppers. Sprinkle half of Parmesan over the marinara. Add a few pieces of chicken to each pepper, then spoon over the rest of the marinara sauce, and sprinkle with the rest of the Parmesan. Top each pepper with couple slices of mozzarella.
6: Bake for 25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the peppers have softened.
7: Serve immediately.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:salt (1teaspoon)、bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs、vegetable oil (3tablespoons)、long grain rice (1cup)、garlic (1clove)、yellow onion、tomato sauce (8oz)、chicken bouillon (2cubes)、hot water (2cups)、peas (6oz)、carrot (6oz)
instructions:
0: Add the chicken thighs to a large pot, cover with water, and season with salt. Boil the chicken for 40 minutes, or until cooked through. Drain.
1: Shred the chicken from the bones and set aside.
2: Heat the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat, then add the rice and continually stir until the rice turns a light brown.
3: Add the garlic, onion, and salt. Stir the rice until it turns golden.
4: Add the tomato sauce, bouillon cubes and hot water. Increase the heat to medium-high.
5: Cover and simmer for 20-25 minutes, until the rice is cooked and has absorbed the liquid. Check occasionally to make sure the rice is not drying out too quickly.
6: Mix in the shredded chicken, peas, and carrots.
7: Remove the rice from the heat and fluff with fork.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium eggplants、olive oil (2tablespoons)、salt、pepper、ground turkey (½lb)、onion、marinara sauce (2cups)、garlic (2cloves)、shredded low-fat mozzarella (1cup)、grated parmesan cheese (½cup)、fresh basil
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Scoop out inside of eggplant leaving about ½-inch (1 cm) border inside.
2: Chop the remaining eggplant and reserve.
3: Brush the scooped out eggplants with olive oil, sprinkle with salt and pepper.
4: Bake for 10-15 minutes.
5: Heat olive oil in medium skillet over medium heat.
6: Add onions and garlic to the pan. Cook until translucent. Add ground turkey and season with garlic powder, salt and pepper. Cook until the meat is browned.
7: Add leftover eggplant pieces to ground turkey and onion. Cook for 5-8 minutes or until tender.
8: Add marinara sauce and cook for another 3-5 minutes.
9: Scoop meat sauce into the eggplants and sprinkle with mozzarella and parmesan.
10: Bake for 10-15 minutes, or until cheese is melted.
11: Sprinkle with basil and serve.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、small onion、garlics、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、mashed potato (2cups)、broccoli (2small heads)、low sodium vegetable broth (2 ½cups)、milk (2 ½cups)、ground nutmeg (¼teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook for 3-4 minutes, until semi-translucent. Add the garlic, salt, and pepper and cook for 2-3 minutes more, until the garlic is fragrant.
1: Add the mashed potatoes, broccoli, vegetable broth, and milk and bring to a boil. Cover and reduce the heat to low. Simmer for 20 minutes, or until the broccoli is tender.
2: Use an immersion blender to blend the soup until smooth.
3: Stir in the nutmeg, then ladle into bowls.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、chicken breast (2lb)、salt、black pepper (½teaspoon)、unsalted butter (6tablespoons)、yellow onion (1cup)、carrot (1cup)、celery (2stalks)、flour (6tablespoons)、garlic (2cloves)、fresh parsley (2tablespoons)、fresh thyme leaf (1tablespoon)、chicken broth (3cups)、frozen peas (1cup)、heavy cream (½cup)、premade pie crust (4packages)、water
instructions:
0: Heat a large pan over medium-high heat. Add the oil and the chicken breast. Season with salt and ¼ teaspoon black pepper, and cook for 6-8 minutes, stirring occasionally until the chicken is cooked through.
1: Transfer the chicken to a medium bowl and return the pan to the stove.
2: Reduce the heat to medium and melt the butter in the pan.
3: Add the onion, carrot, and celery, cooking until the vegetables have softened and the onion is translucent, 8-10 minutes.
4: Sprinkle in the flour, stirring well so there are no lumps.
5: Add the garlic, parsley and thyme, and cook for 2-3 minutes more, until fragrant.
6: Pour in the chicken broth and stir occasionally until the sauce has thickened, 3-5 minutes.
7: Stir in the frozen peas and reserved chicken.
8: Season with salt and pepper, then pour in the heavy cream.
9: Stir to combine and cook until the peas have defrosted. Remove the pan from the heat.
10: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)
11: Lightly flour a clean work surface. Lay out 1 pie crust and lightly brush the top with water. Place another pie crust on top and lightly dust with flour.
12: Using a rolling pin, gently roll out the dough in order to bind the 2 crusts, taking care not to make them thinner.
13: Place a 5-inch (12 cm) metal bowl in the center of the crust and cut out a circle 2 inches (5 cm) larger than the bowl.
14: Place the cut-out dough circle inside the bowl, making sure to fully press down so the dough is flush against the surface of the bowl.
15: Fill the bowl with ¼ of the chicken mixture.
16: Roll the excess pie dough into a large circle. Cover the filled bowl with the dough circle slightly larger than the diameter of the bowl.
17: Press the edges of the dough together, then use scissors to trim any excess dough. Crimp the edges to close.
18: Repeat with the remaining pie crusts to make 3 more bowls.
19: Arrange the bowls on a baking sheet. Use a small knife to make small slits in the top crusts.
20: Bake for about 45 minutes, until the tops are a deep golden brown.
21: Let cool until the bowls are cool enough to handle.
22: To serve, place a plate on top of a pie, then invert onto the plate. Garnish with parsley.
23: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:brussels sprouts (1lb)、carrots、olive oil、sea salt、black pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
1: Place Brussels sprouts and baby carrots separately on a foil-lined baking sheet with room in the center for the pork.
2: Drizzle with olive oil. Sprinkle with sea salt and pepper. Mix to combine.
3: Place pork in center of baking sheet. Sprinkle with sea salt and pepper. Rub to combine and add the rosemary sprigs on top of the pork.
4: Bake in oven for 40 minutes, or until internal temperature of the pork reaches 145˚F (63˚C).
5: Let pork rest 5-10 minutes.
6: While pork is resting, mix olive oil, balsamic vinegar, and maple syrup in a small saucepan.
7: Cook on medium heat until sauce thickens and reduces by ⅓, about 3-4 minutes.
8: Immediately spoon reduced sauce on the pork.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:white miso paste (2tablespoons)、honey (2tablespoons)、rice vinegar (1tablespoon)、garlic (1teaspoon)、ginger (1teaspoon)、pepper、salmon (3oz)、asparagus (½bunch)、large baby bok choy、olive oil、salt、brown rice、sesame seed
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: In a small bowl, combine the miso paste, honey, rice vinegar, garlic, ginger, and pepper. Whisk until smooth.
2: Place the salmon fillets skin-side down in the center of the prepared baking sheet and brush generously with the miso-honey sauce.
3: Lay the asparagus on one side of the salmon and the baby bok choy on the other side. Drizzle the vegetables with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Rub the vegetables until evenly coated.
4: Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the salmon is cooked to your liking.
5: Divide the vegetables and salmon between serving plates, with rice alongside if desired. Garnish the salmon with sesame seeds and serve immediately.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:canola oil (1tablespoon)、ground beef (1lb)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、ground black pepper (1teaspoon)、garlic (2cloves)、medium onion、marinara sauce (2cups)、lasagna sheets、ricotta cheese (1cup)、mozzarella cheese (1cup)、fresh basil (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350° F (180°C).
1: Heat the oil in a cast-iron skillet over high heat.
2: Cook the beef, salt, and pepper until the moisture has evaporated and the beef is starting to brown.
3: Add the garlic and onion and cook until onions are starting to become translucent.
4: Add one cup (260 g) of the marinara sauce and cook until the sauce has reduced to a paste.
5: Using a large spoon or a spatula, push some of the beef mixture toward the side of the pan, creating a gap that allows you to slide lasagna sheets underneath the beef. Break about two lasagna sheets in order to fill in the cracks.
6: Top the beef mixture with the rest of the lasagna sheets. Spread the rest of the marinara sauce on top of the sheets. Dollop the ricotta on top of the sauce and spread evenly.
7: Sprinkle the mozzarella cheese over the ricotta, and top with the basil.
8: Bake for 25 minutes until cheese is bubbly and golden brown.
9: Cool, slice, then serve.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、onion (½cup)、extra firm tofu (7oz)、soy sauce (1tablespoon)、chili powder (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (¾teaspoon)、cumin (½teaspoon)、paprika (¼teaspoon)、cayenne pepper (1pinch)、brown rice (2cups)、shredded lettuce (2cups)、black beans (½cup)、corn (½cup)、pico de gallo (⅓cup)、guacamole (½cup)、red onion (¼cup)、fresh cilantro
instructions:
0: In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook until semi-translucent, 3-4 minutes.
1: Use your hands to crumble the tofu into the pan, then use a spatula to continue to break apart while cooking for 3-4 minutes, until slightly browned.
2: Add the soy sauce, chili powder, garlic powder, cumin, paprika, and cayenne. Continue to cook and break the tofu apart until browned and crumbly.
3: To assemble, spread brown rice on the bottom of a bowl, then layer on lettuce, black beans, corn, tofu sofritas, pico de gallo, guacamole, and onions.
4: Serve topped with cilantro.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、salmon fillets
instructions:
0: In a small bowl, combine all the Cajun spice rub ingredients and stir.
1: Place the salmon fillets on a cutting board and rub the olive oil over all sides of the salmon fillets.
2: Sprinkle the spice rub over the salmon, using your hands to ensure all sides are covered.
3: Cook on a BBQ over a medium to high heat for 2 minutes per side. The outside should start to blacken and crisp, leaving the salmon juicy inside.
4: Once the salmon is cooked set aside.
5: In a large bowl, add all of the salsa ingredients and stir well.
6: Serve the salmon with an extra sprinkling of parsley alongside the salsa.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:parchment paper、chicken breast、small potato、onion、BBQ sauce (3tablespoons)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Fold the parchment paper in half, then open up.
2: Quarter the potatoes and thinly slice the onion.
3: On one half, lay down the cut potatoes, drizzle on oil and sprinkle on salt & pepper.
4: Lay the chicken on the potatoes, season with salt and pepper and spread on the barbecue sauce. Top with sliced onions.
5: Fold the parchment paper over the chicken, and cinch the paper together by folding it over itself along the edges.
6: Bake for 25-30 minutes or until internal temperature of chicken reaches 165˚F (75˚C).
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:red potato (3lb)、water、olive oil (3tablespoons)、curry powder (5tablespoons)、boneless, skinless chicken breast (4lb)、onion、frozen peas (10oz)、red bell peppers、green beans (1lb)、carrots、jalepeno、black pepper (1tablespoon)、salt (1tablespoon)、jasmine rice、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: In a bowl, add the potatoes, and fill the bowl with water until the potatoes are covered. Microwave on the potato setting for 10 minutes.  The potatoes are done when you can pierce through them with a fork. Leave in water, and set aside until ready to use.
1: In a large pot over medium heat, add the olive oil and 3 tablespoons of curry powder, and mix thoroughly.
2: Add the cubed chicken and the onions to the pot, and mix thoroughly until chicken is cooked through, about 5 minutes.
3: Add the peas, red bell peppers, green beans, carrots, and jalapeño pepper, and mix thoroughly.
4: Add the reserved potatoes, along with 6 cups (1.4 L) of the water the potatoes were cooked in to the pot, and mix thoroughly.
5: Add the salt, pepper, and the rest of the curry powder, and mix thoroughly.
6: Bring the curry to a boil, cover, and reduce heat to low. Simmer the curry for one hour on low heat. Remove from heat.
7: Serve with jasmine rice garnished with parsley.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large russet potatoes、sour cream (¾cup)、garlic (2cloves)、cumin (½teaspoon)、salt、oregano (½teaspoon)、corn tortillas、oil
instructions:
0: Thoroughly wash the potatoes and peel the skin off. Cut into smaller pieces and place in a pot of cold water.
1: Bring to a boil over medium high heat and allow potatoes to cook until they are soft.
2: Place softened potatoes into a large bowl. Mix in sour cream, garlic, cumin, salt pepper and oregano, and mash until well combined.
3: Wrap the tortillas in a damp towel or paper towel and microwave for 15-20 seconds, so they don’t break.
4: On half of the tortilla, place about one Tbsp. of the potato mixture and spread it around. Fold the tortilla in half and repeat with the rest of the tortillas.
5: Heat one inch of vegetable oil in a pan. Carefully, place the potato tacos in the pan, allowing them to cook for about two minutes on each side.
6: Once they have developed a golden color, remove from oil and strain excess oil off on a paper towel.
7: Serve with your favorite toppings.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:whole chicken (3lb)、kosher salt (¼cup)、fresh ginger (4inch pieces)、fresh scallion (1bunch)、cold water (1gal)、sesame oil (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: To clean the chicken, rub all over with a handful of kosher salt, getting rid of any loose skin. Rinse the chicken well inside and out. Pat dry with paper towels.
1: Remove any excess fat from the chicken and set aside for later.
2: Season the chicken generously with salt. Stuff the chicken cavity with the ginger slices and scallions.
3: Place the chicken in a large stock pot, cover with cold water by 1 inch (2 cm), and season with salt to taste.
4: Bring to a boil over high heat, then immediately reduce the heat to low to maintain a simmer. Cover and cook for about 30 minutes, or until the internal temperature of the chicken reaches 165°F (75°C). Remove the pot from the heat.
5: Remove the chicken from the pot, reserving the poaching liquid for later, and transfer to an ice bath for 5 minutes to stop the cooking process and to keep the chicken skin springy. Discard the ginger and green onion.
6: After it’s cooled, pat the chicken dry with paper towels and rub all over with sesame oil. This will help prevent the chicken from drying out.
7: In a large wok or skillet, heat ¼ cup (60 ml) of sesame oil over medium-high heat. Add 2 tablespoons of reserved chopped chicken fat, the garlic, ginger, and salt, and fry until aromatic, about 10 minutes.
8: Reserve ¼ of the fried garlic mixture, then add the rice to the remaining fried garlic and stir to coat. Cook for 3 minutes.
9: Transfer the rice to a rice cooker and add 2 cups (480 ml) of reserved poaching broth. Steam the rice for 60 minutes, or until tender.
10: While the rice is cooking, carve the chicken for serving.
11: Make the chili sauce: combine the sambal, Sriracha, sugar, garlic, ginger, lime juice, and chicken broth in a small bowl and stir to incorporate.
12: Make the ginger garlic sauce: in a small bowl, combine the ginger, garlic, salt, peanut oil, and rice vinegar, and stir to incorporate.
13: Make the soy sauce: in a small bowl, combine the reserved fried garlic and ginger with the oyster sauce, dark soy sauce, light soy sauce, and chicken broth, and stir to incorporate.
14: Serve the sliced chicken with the rice, dipping sauces, sliced cucumbers, and fresh cilantro. 
15: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:zucchinis、shrimp (1lb)、yellow bell pepper、lime juice (2tablespoons)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、olive oil (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Using a vegetable peeler, peel long strips from the zucchini.
2: In a large bowl, mix the zucchini strips, shrimp, bell pepper sliced, lime juice, salt, pepper, garlic powder, and olive oil until the mixture is evenly coated.
3: On a roasting tray, spread the mixture into one even layer and bake for 8 minutes.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (1tablespoon)、chicken (2 ¼cups)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium high heat until melted.
2: Add the chicken, salt, and pepper. Fry for about 5-8 minutes or until cooked through. Take out and set aside.
3: Add the onion and fry for 2 minutes.
4: Stir in the flour.
5: Gradually whisk in the milk.
6: Whisk in the butter chicken sauce.
7: Whisk in the mozzarella and cheddar cheese.
8: Once the cheese has melted into the mixture, stir in the chicken and elbow pasta.
9: Sprinkle on some more cheese on top.
10: Bake in the oven for 15 minutes, until the cheese is brown and bubbling on top.
11: Garnish with coriander.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:parchment paper、chicken breast、zucchini、garlic (1clove)、butter (2tablespoons)、Parmesan (2tablespoons)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Fold the parchment paper in half, then open up.
2: Slice the zucchini into rounds and lay them on one half of the parchment paper.
3: Mix the minced garlic and butter in a small bowl and spoon half of the garlic butter on top of the zucchini. Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
4: Lay the chicken on the zucchini, season with salt and pepper and spoon on the rest of the garlic butter. Top with parmesan.
5: Fold the parchment paper over the chicken, and cinch the paper together by folding it over itself along the edges.
6: Bake for 25-30 minutes or until internal temperature of chicken reaches 165˚F (75˚C).
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:lasagna noodles、ricotta cheese (2cups)、spinach (1cup)、artichoke heart (1cup)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、garlic (2cloves)、marinara sauce (2cups)、shredded mozzarella cheese (1cup)、shredded parmesan cheese (1cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Boil the lasagna noodles until they are soft but not fully cooked, for about 10 minutes. Drain and set aside.
1: In a sauté pan over medium heat, saute the spinach with the olive oil and a pinch of salt. Set aside.
2: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
3: In a medium-sized bowl, mix the ricotta, cooked spinach, chopped artichokes, garlic, ½ of the mozzarella, ½ of the parmesan, salt, and pepper.
4: Spoon some of the mixture onto the lasagna noodle and roll tightly.
5: Spread the marinara on the bottom of the baking dish. Place the lasagna rolls right side up to fill the dish.
6: Top with the rest of the mozzarella and parmesan.
7: Bake for 35-40 minutes or until the cheese is brown and crispy.
8: Serve and top with parsley.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:elbow macaroni (1lb)、water (½cup)、cauliflower florets (1cup)、butternut squash (1cup)、carrot (1cup)、milk (2cups)、cheddar cheese (2cups)、cream cheese (4oz)
instructions:
0: Add water, cauliflower, squash, and carrots in a pot over medium heat. Cover and cook until vegetables are tender.
1: Add everything into a blender, including cooking water, and blend until smooth.
2: Return blended veggies to the pot over medium heat, and add the milk, cheese, and cream cheese. Stir until smooth.
3: Add macaroni, reduce heat, mix thoroughly, and cover for 20 minutes.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breast、salt (½teaspoon)、ground black pepper (¼teaspoon)、chili powder (½teaspoon)、olive oil (2teaspoons)、salsa (½cup)、zucchini、shredded cheddar cheese (2tablespoons)、roma tomato、avocado、chopped cilantro (2tablespoons)、lime
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
1: Cut zucchini in half and hollow out the centers
2: Add the Greek yogurt, lime juice, and salt together in a small bowl and stir to combine.
3: On a cutting board, season the chicken breast with salt, pepper, and chili powder.
4: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the chicken and cook until browned, about 3 minutes.
5: Remove the chicken from the pan and let cool. Once cooled, shred the chicken with a fork.
6: Add the chicken to a bowl with the salsa and stir to combine.
7: Stuff chicken mixture in hollowed out zucchini boats, and top with cheddar cheese.
8: Bake until cheese is melted and browned, and zucchini is tender, about 20 minutes.
9: Top with tomato, avocado, cilantro, and lime crema. Serve with lime wedges.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pork loin (1lb)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、asparagus (1cup)、red pepper (1cup)
instructions:
0: Mix together all sauce ingredients in a small bowl.
1: Heat oil over a nonstick pan and add pork stirring until cooked.
2: Pour sauce in pan and stir to coat meat.
3: Once the sauce is bubbling, add the veggies to the pan and stir again to coat.
4: Cook until meat is cooked through and veggies are soft.
5: Serve over rice or alone.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:red bell pepper、yellow bell pepper、white onion、large, boneless, skinless chicken breasts、olive oil (2tablespoons)、wild rice (4cups)、avocado
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: In a bowl, mix together the salt, pepper cumin, garlic powder, and paprika.
2: Add chicken, peppers, and onions to a baking tray and a pour of oil.
3: Sprinkle seasoning on chicken, bell peppers, and onions.
4: Bake for 20-22 minutes or until internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C).
5: Serve with avocado slices (optional) and rice of choice now. Or refrigerate in airtight container up to 3-4 days.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:onion、garlic (10cloves)、apple cider vinegar (¼cup)、stone ground mustard (¼cup)、orange juice (1cup)、whole cloves、picnic ham (10lb)、honey (½cup)、dijon mustard (½cup)、worcestershire sauce (1tablespoon)、brown sugar (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Add the chopped onion, garlic cloves, apple cider vinegar, mustard, orange juice, and cloves to a large roasting pan, stirring to combine.
2: Place the ham on the roasting rack over the liquid.
3: Trim off tough outer skin, then score the remaining fat in a crosshatch pattern. Cover the entire roasting rack with aluminum foil and bake for 1 hour.
4: Remove the ham from the oven, and remove the foil. Baste the ham with the liquid, then remove the rack from the roasting pan and set aside.
5: Remove all the whole cloves from the remaining liquid in the pan. Pour the remaining liquid into a pot, along with the honey, Dijon mustard, Worcestershire sauce, and brown sugar. Whisk to combine.
6: Bring the mixture to a boil over medium high heat, then simmer until thick and reduced, about 10 minutes.
7: Brush the glaze on to the ham then transfer back to the roasting rack.
8: Bake the ham for 30-45 minutes, or until the glaze is caramelized and the ham reaches 145°F (65°C).
9: Slice the ham, and serve.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:brown rice (2cups)、vegetable broth (2cups)、carrots、oil (1tablespoon)、white onion、garlic (2cloves)、frozen peas (½cup)、salt、pepper、eggs、scallion
instructions:
0: Add the brown rice, vegetable broth, and diced carrots to your Instant Pot. Stir until combined.
1: Close the lid until you hear the beep. Tip: Closing the lid can be tricky. Have the pressure knob at 11 o’clock and turn right.
2: Turn pressure knob to “Sealing”. Select Manual and reduce the time to 24 minutes. It will say “On” in a few seconds. Note: the Instant Pot will need to warm up for 5-10 minutes. Steam will be released and a few minutes later, the time will start counting down.
3: Once the time goes off, carefully turn the pressure knob to “Venting”. Let all of the stream release before opening the lid.
4: Stir the rice, then transfer from the pot into a medium sized bowl and set aside.
5: Select “Saute” on the Instant Pot.  Once it says “Hot”, add the oil.
6: When the oil is shimmering, add the onion. Cook for around 1 minute until slightly opaque.
7: Add the minced garlic, frozen peas, salt, and pepper. Mix until incorporated.
8: Add rice mixture and stir until everything is combined.
9: Make a well in the middle of the rice for the eggs. Pour the beaten eggs into the well, stirring only the eggs until they are cooked.
10: Mix everything together. Top with scallions.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:thick cut bacon (5strips)、chicken breast (1lb)、seasoned salt (1teaspoon)、pepper、small onion、asparagus (½lb)、garlic (3cloves)、fresh spinach (2cups)、sun-dried tomato (⅓cup)、milk (6cups)、rotini pasta (1lb)、shredded parmesan cheese (1 ¼cups)
instructions:
0: In a large pot, crisp the bacon on medium heat.
1: Drain excess grease so there’s about 3 tablespoons left in the pot.
2: Add in the chicken, season with half of the seasoned salt and pepper, and cook.
3: Once the chicken is nicely browned, remove it from the pan but leave the bacon.
4: Add in the onion and asparagus. Stir until the onions begin to become translucent.
5: Add the garlic and spinach. Stir until spinach is wilted.
6: Add in the sun-dried tomatoes and season with remaining salt and pepper.
7: Pour milk over veggie and bacon mixture, and bring to a boil. Stir periodically so the bottom does not burn.
8: Once milk is bubbling, add pasta and stir frequently until pasta reaches your desired doneness (approximately 10 minutes at medium heat).
9: Stir in chicken and parmesan cheese and mix until cheese is melted.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:extra virgin olive oil (1tablespoon)、yellow onion、medium garlic cloves、ground beef (1lb)、McCormick® dried oregano (2teaspoons)、salt (2teaspoons)、McCormick® black pepper (1teaspoon)、tomato paste (2tablespoons)、crushed tomato (28oz)、chicken stock (2cups)、campanelle noodles (3cups)、shredded mozzarella cheese (8oz)、whole milk ricotta cheese (½cup)、fresh basil leaf
instructions:
0: In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onion and garlic to the pan, stirring often, until soft. Move the onions and garlic to the edges of the pan. Add ground beef, McCormick® Dried Oregano, salt, and pepper to the center of the pan, breaking up the meat into smaller pieces. Let the beef sit undisturbed for a moment so the beef browns slightly. Continue cooking, stirring occasionally, until almost no pink remains.
1: Add tomato paste to the pan and stir to combine. Add crushed tomatoes and chicken stock to skillet. Bring to a boil and add noodles to skillet, stirring so noodles are submerged. Lower heat to medium, cover with a lid, and cook for about 10 minutes, until noodles are al dente.
2: Remove from heat, then stir in shredded mozzarella. Spoon dollops of ricotta over the pasta, cover with lid, and let sit for a few minutes until ricotta melts slightly. Sprinkle fresh basil over pasta and serve.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:salmon (6oz)、egg、olive oil (1tablespoon)、spinach (3cups)、garlic (1clove)、lemon、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 325°F (160°C).
1: Pour oil into a small, oven-safe skillet. Place the spinach and garlic in the skillet, season with a pinch of salt and pepper, and mix well so that everything is evenly coated.
2: Place the salmon on 1 side of the pan, then form a well on the other side and crack an egg, making sure it stays intact.
3: Season the tops of the salmon and the egg with another pinch of salt and pepper.
4: Bake for 20-25 minutes, until the salmon reaches an internal temperature of 140°F (60°C). (The temperature will continue to rise once it rests out of the oven.)
5: Squeeze a bit of fresh lemon juice over the salmon fillet for more flavor and let the salmon rest for 5 minutes before serving.
6: NOTE: If you want a runny egg yolk, follow steps 1-3, then place the skillet in the preheated oven. Halfway through the cooking process (about 10 minutes in), crack a cold egg into the well of the spinach and replace the skillet in the oven for another 10-15 minutes.  The salmon will be cooked through, the egg white will show color, and the yolk will be gloriously runny.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken sausage (½lb)、onion (½cup)、mushroom (½cup)、fresh spinach (4oz)、salt (½teaspoon)、black pepper (½teaspoon)、eggs、milk (1cup)、premade pie crust、parmesan cheese
instructions:
0: Cook sausage over medium-high until lightly browned, about 5-7 minutes, being sure to break up the meat into a fine mince.
1: Remove cooked sausage from pan and wipe away excess fat with a paper towel.
2: Add onion and sauté until softened and translucent, about 2 to 3 minutes. Add mushrooms, salt, and pepper and continue to cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
3: Add chopped spinach and cook until wilted and no extra liquid has accumulated in the bottom of the pan.
4: NOTE: Do your best to use the excessive moisture of the spinach and mushrooms to deglaze the bottom of the pan, scraping away any browned bits from cooking the sausage earlier.
5: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
6: Once cooked, remove the spinach and mushroom mixture from the pan and combine it with the reserved cooked sausage. Stir to mix evenly.
7: Combine eggs and milk. Lightly whisk until just combined.
8: Add sausage and spinach mixture to the bottom of a prepared 9-inch (23cm) pie crust, making sure to spread it evenly.
9: Pour in beaten eggs to fill the rest of the pie crust and top with a generous sprinkle of parmesan cheese.
10: Bake at 350˚F (180˚C) for 25 minutes or until the eggs are set and the top is lightly browned. Allow to cool for 10 minutes before slicing and serving.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breast (1lb)、kosher salt、black pepper、all-purpose flour (1cup)、large eggs、plain breadcrumbs (1cup)、lemon、white wine (1cup)、panko bread crumbs (½cup)、grated parmesan cheese (¼cup)、olive oil (3tablespoons)、garlic (4cloves)、red pepper flakes (¼teaspoon)、bay leaves、chicken stock (½cup)、crushed tomato (14oz)、tomato paste (2tablespoons)、dried oregano (2tablespoons)、fresh flat-leaf parsley (¼cup)、fresh basil leaves (¼cup)、shredded mozzarella cheese (½cup)、spaghetti
instructions:
0: Using the bumpy side of a meat mallet, pound each chicken breast until ½-inch (1 ¼ cm) thick. Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
1: Add 1 cup (125 G) of flour, the eggs, and the  plain bread crumbs to 3 separate shallow dishes.
2: Season flour with salt, pepper, and the lemon zest.  Stir to combine.
3: Season the eggs with salt and pepper, and add 1 tablespoon of white wine. Stir to combine.
4: To the bread crumbs, add the panko, remaining 2 tablespoons flour, and Parmesan. Stir to combine.
5: Working 1 piece at a time, coat the chicken in the flour, shaking off any excess, then in the egg mixture, then in the bread crumbs. Transfer to a baking sheet lined with cling wrap and refrigerate for 10 minutes.
6: Heat a large cast-iron skillet over medium heat. Add enough olive oil to come ¼ inch (6 mm) up the sides of the pan. Working in batches, fry the chicken until lightly browned, 2-3 minutes per side. Drain on paper towels.
7: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
8: Wipe out the pan with a paper towel. Return to medium heat and add 3 tablespoons of olive oil, the garlic, red pepper flakes, and bay leaves. Cook until fragrant, 1-2 minutes.
9: Add the remaining cup of white wine and the chicken stock. Cook until the liquid is reduced by half, stirring occasionally.
10: Stir in the crushed tomatoes and tomato paste. Season with pepper, then add the oregano, crushing between your hands to release more flavor. Simmer the sauce for 5 minutes, until thickened slightly. Add the parsley and basil and stir to incorporate.
11: Remove the bay leaves from the pan. Create a bit of space in the center, then return the chicken to the pan. Spoon the sauce over the chicken.
12: Sprinkle the mozzarella and more oregano over the chicken pieces.
13: Bake for 10-15 minutes, until the cheese is bubbly and melted and the chicken is cooked though. Set the broiler to high and broil for 1-2 minutes, until the cheese browns lightly.
14: Serve the chicken with spaghetti that's been tossed in the excess sauce. Garnish with parsley and Parmesan cheese.
15: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:soy sauce (1cup)、granulated sugar (¼cup)、garlic (3tablespoons)、scallions (¼cup)、boneless, skin-on pork shoulder (2lb)、asparagus (1bunch)、yukon potatoes、olive oil (2tablespoons)、kosher salt、freshly ground black pepper、dark brown sugar (1cup)、honey (½cup)
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, combine 1 cup (240 ml) of the soy sauce with the sugar, garlic, and scallions, stirring until mixed.
1: Score the skin of the pork by slicing a crosshatch pattern through the skin down to the meat. This will help excess fat render out and allow more of the marinade to soak in.
2: Place the pork in the marinade and toss to coat evenly. Marinate for one hour.
3: Preheat the oven to 275ºF (140°C).
4: On a baking sheet, place the asparagus halves to the right and diced potatoes to the left. Toss the vegetables with the oil, salt, and pepper. Place the marinated pork in the middle of the baking sheet.
5: Bake 1 to 1 ½ hours, depending on the weight of the pork.
6: Raise the heat of the oven to 500ºF (260ºC).
7: In a small bowl, combine the brown sugar, honey, and remaining soy sauce, stirring until smooth.
8: Spoon the honey glaze over the top of the pork, making sure to fill the cracks and crevices on top.
9: Bake for 20 minutes until sugar is dark brown and caramelized, and the top of the pork is crispy.
10: Remove the vegetables and pork from the tray, making sure to save all the juices.
11: Slice the pork into ½-inch (2 ½ cm) slices, and plate with the roasted vegetables. Spoon the reserved pan juices on top of the pork.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (3tablespoons)、onion (⅓cup)、garlic (2cloves)、tomato paste (5tablespoons)、crushed tomato (28oz)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、dried basil (1teaspoon)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: In a pot over medium heat, add the olive oil, onion, garlic, and tomato paste. Cook for 5-7 minutes or until the tomato paste has caramelized.
1: Add the canned tomatoes, dried oregano, and dried basil. Reduce heat to a simmer and cook for 15-20 minutes or until the desired thickness.
2: Add salt and pepper to taste.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chili powder (1tablespoon)、cumin (1teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、cayenne pepper (¼teaspoon)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、onion、red bell pepper、green bell pepper、olive oil (2tablespoons)、long grain rice (1cup)、chicken broth (2cups)、chicken tender (1 ½lb)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
1: In a medium bowl, combine spices to make fajita seasoning, or use store-bought.
2: In a large bowl, combine, onion, peppers, and chicken.
3: Add oil and seasoning, and mix until seasoning is fully incorporated.
4: In a casserole dish, add rice and chicken broth. Then lay down all veggies and chicken.
5: Cover the dish with foil and bake for 50-55 minutes until rice is fully cooked.
6: Serve with tomatoes, cilantro, and cheese, if desired.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、bread crumbs (½cup)、grated parmesan cheese (½cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、eggs、mozzarella (½cup)、marinara sauce
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 325°F (190°C).
1: Cut the chicken into strips.
2: In one medium-sized bowl, mix the bread crumbs, parmesan, salt, and pepper.
3: In another bowl, crack the eggs and whisk until scrambled.
4: Coat the chicken in the egg, then in the bread crumbs, then repeat.
5: Place the chicken tenders on a baking tray and bake for 20 minutes, flipping halfway through.
6: Sprinkle each tender with mozzarella and bake again for 5 more minutes, or until cheese is melted.
7: Serve with marinara.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground beef (1lb)、ground pork (1lb)、panko breadcrumbs (1cup)、dried minced onion (½cup)、grated parmesan cheese (¼cup)、garlic (2cloves)、fresh parsley (¼cup)、large eggs、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、pepper
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, mix together the beef, pork, bread crumbs, onion, Parmesan cheese, garlic, parsley, eggs, salt, and pepper until just combined.
1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2: Take a walnut-sized portion of the meat mixture and roll into a ball. Repeat with remaining meat and transfer to an oiled wire rack set over a baking sheet.
3: Bake the meatballs for 10 minutes, until golden brown.
4: Make the ricotta-herb mixture: combine the ricotta cheese, basil, parsley, Parmesan cheese, and salt in a medium bowl and mix well.
5: Stuff a tablespoon of ricotta mixture into a jumbo shells, then stuff a meatball into the shells.
6: Spread the marinara sauce in the bottom of a 9x13-inch (23x33-cm) casserole dish, then lay in the stuffed shells. Sprinkle Parmesan cheese on top.
7: Bake for 10 minutes, until the marinara sauce is warm.
8: Top with chopped basil.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、garlic (2cloves)、crushed tomato (28oz)、paprika (1tablespoon)、chili powder (1 ½teaspoons)、ground cumin (1teaspoon)、salt、black pepper
instructions:
0: In a medium pan over medium heat, heat the olive oil until shimmering, then cook the garlic until fragrant, for 1-2 minutes.
1: Stir in the crushed tomato, paprika, chili powder, ground cumin, salt, and pepper. Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 10 minutes. Set aside to cool.
2: In a medium bowl, combine the ground beef, salt, pepper, chili powder, cumin, oregano, rice, and 1 cup (260 G) of tomato sauce. Mix until combined. Refrigerate until ready to use.
3: Bring a large pot of water to a boil over high heat. Add the cabbage, cut side down. Cover with a lid, reduce the heat to medium, and simmer for 15 minutes.
4: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C) for 45 minutes.
5: Transfer the cabbage to a cutting board, cut side up, and let cool until it reaches room temperature.
6: Peel off a layer of the cabbage. With the stem facing upwards, use a paring knife to trim the thicker stem, which will make the leaf easier to roll. With the stem side pointed towards you, place a few tablespoons of filling at the base of the leaf.
7: Roll upwards so the filling is covered by a single layer of the cabbage. Fold both sides in, then roll all the way up.
8: Place the cabbage roll seam side down in a 9x13-inch (23x33 -cm) baking dish and repeat with the remaining filling.
9: Spoon the remaining tomato sauce over the cabbage rolls.
10: Cover the dish tightly with foil and bake for 45 minutes.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:soy sauce (½cup)、honey (½cup)、onion (1cup)、rice vinegar (¼cup)、ginger (1tablespoon)、garlic cloves、black pepper (¼teaspoon)、chicken thighs (2lb)、broccoli head、carrot、zucchini、water (¼cup)、cornstarch (3tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Make the teriyaki marinade. In a medium bowl, mix soy sauce, honey, onion, rice vinegar, ginger, garlic, and black pepper, and set aside.
1: In the slow cooker, add chicken and teriyaki marinade.
2: Cook on high for 4 hours, or cook on low for 8 hours.
3: Cut vegetables into bite-size pieces.
4: Mix water into cornstarch and mix until cornstarch is melted.
5: Add cornstarch slurry and vegetables into the slow cooker for 30 minutes.
6: Serve by itself or in a bowl of brown rice.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:purple potato (2cups)、brussels sprouts (1 ½cups)、baby carrots (1 ½cups)、butternut squash (1 ½cups)、red apple、large red onion、olive oil、salt、pepper、dried sage (1teaspoon)、dijon mustard (¼cup)、maple syrup (¼cup)、garlic (3cloves)、fresh rosemary (1teaspoon)、lemon juice (1tablespoon)、chicken thighs
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400ºF (200ºC) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: To the baking sheet, add the purple potatoes, Brussels sprouts, baby carrots, butternut squash, apple, and red onion.
2: In a small bowl, whisk together the Dijon mustard, maple syrup, garlic, rosemary, and lemon juice.
3: Lay the chicken thighs skin-side down on top of the vegetables. Season the chicken with salt and pepper, then brush with about ⅓ of Dijon-maple mixture.
4: Bake for 30 minutes, or until juices from the chicken run clear. Optional: Broil for 2-3 minutes to brown and crisp the chicken skin.
5: Serve the chicken with the vegetables.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
