ingredients:thick rib eye steak (2lb)、garlic (10cloves)、brown sugar (3tablespoons)、soy sauce (5tablespoons)、oyster sauce (2tablespoons)、fish sauce (1tablespoon)、freshly ground black pepper、granulated sugar (1tablespoon)、white vinegar (2tablespoons)、water (2tablespoons)、red onion、watercress (2bunches)、roma tomatoes、vegetable oil (2tablespoons)、fresh cilantro、white rice
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, combine the beef, garlic, brown sugar, 3 tablespoons of soy sauce, oyster sauce, fish sauce, and black pepper. Toss to combine. Let marinate at room temperature for 30 minutes.
1: In small bowl, combine the granulated sugar, remaining 2 tablespoons of soy sauce, white vinegar, and water. Add the red onion slices and coat the red onions in the dressing thoroughly. Set aside to soak.
2: On a platter, arrange the watercress and tomato slices.
3: Preheat a large wok or skillet over high heat, then add the vegetable oil. When the oil is shimmering, swirl the oil around in the pan. Add half of the beef cubes and sear on all sides, shaking the pan, until the meat is slightly charred and medium rare, 3-5 minutes. Set the meat aside and repeat with remaining beef.
4: Arrange the beef on the bed of watercress and tomatoes. Top with the dressed red onions and fresh cilantro.
5: Serve with domed white rice. For a full meal, serve alongside Vietnamese crepes, spring rolls, and banh mi sandwiches.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sesame oil (2tablespoons)、large shrimp (1lb)、salt (½teaspoon)、mushroom (2cups)、asparagus (1cup)、ginger (1tablespoon)、low sodium soy sauce (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Heat 1 tablespoon of sesame oil in a large, non-stick skillet over medium heat. Add the shrimp and season with ¼ teaspoon of salt. Cook the shrimp for 1 minute on each side, until just pink. Remove from the pan.
1: Add the remaining tablespoon of oil to the pan. Toss in the mushrooms, asparagus, and remaining ¼ teaspoon of salt and sauté for a few minutes, until the vegetables begin to soften.
2: Add the ginger and soy sauce and sauté until the ginger is fragrant, about 30 seconds.
3: Toss the shrimp back into the pan and mix until everything is well incorporated and the shrimp is fully cooked, about 1 minute.
4: Divide the mixture evenly between 4 bowls.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、flour (1cup)、salt (1tablespoon)、pepper (1tablespoon)、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、onion powder (1tablespoon)、eggs、potato chip (2cups)
instructions:
0: In a large ziploc bag, add the flour, salt, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, and stir to combine.
1: In a wide dish, beat the eggs
2: In a separate ziploc bag, crush your favorite type of potato chip.
3: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
4: To bread the chicken, first place the chicken slices in the bag of seasoned flour and shake until completely coated, then pour the chicken into the egg mixture and stir with a slotted spoon until completely coated.
5: Place the egg-coated chicken and place into the bag of crushed chips and shake until they are completely coated.
6: Pour the potato chip-coated chicken onto a parchment paper-lined sheet tray.
7: Bake for 25 minutes, or until the chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C) and is golden brown.
8: Serve with your favorite dipping sauce.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cauliflower (5cups)、all-purpose flour (1 ¾cups)、salt (¾teaspoon)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、pesto sauce
instructions:
0: Add the cauliflower to a steamer basket set over a medium pot of boiling water. Cover and steam for 10 minutes, or until fork-tender.
1: Transfer the cauliflower to a clean dish towel and squeeze the excess water into a bowl.
2: Transfer the squeezed cauliflower to a food processor. Add the flour, salt, and olive oil and pulse until the dough forms a ball.
3: Transfer the dough to a lightly floured surface and knead for 3-4 minutes, or until the dough bounces back when poked.
4: Shape the dough into a ball, then cut into 4 equal pieces. 
5: Working 1 piece at a time, cut in half again, then roll out a rope about 6 inches (3-cm) long and 1 inch (2-cm) wide. Slice each rope into ½-inch (1-cm) pieces.
6: Roll each piece along the back of a fork to create a line pattern.
7: Transfer the gnocchi to a large pot of salted boiling water. Boil until the gnocchi float to the surface, 3-5 minutes, then remove with a slotted spoon.
8: Toss the gnocchi with pesto sauce and serve immediately.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:tomato sauce (2cups)、vegetable broth (1cup)、salt、pepper、chile powder (¼teaspoon)、cumin (¼teaspoon)、garlic powder (¼teaspoon)、medium zucchinis、red onion、boneless, skinless chicken breasts、medium whole wheat tortillas、shredded cheese (2cups)、fresh cilantro
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, add the tomato sauce, vegetable broth, salt, pepper, chile powder, cumin and garlic powder.
2: Stir occasionally, until the sauce begins to boil. Remove from the heat.
3: Using a box grater, grate the zucchini.
4: In a large skillet over medium heat, add grated zucchini, red onion, salt and pepper. Cook until onions are translucent.
5: Add chicken and ¼ of the tomato sauce mixture. Combine well and remove from heat.
6: Fill the tortillas with the zucchini mixture and add cheese. Fold the tortillas over and place seam-side down into a greased baking dish. Repeat with remaining tortillas.
7: Pour the remaining tomato sauce over the tortillas and sprinkle with cheese.
8: Bake for 20 minutes, or until heated through and cheese is melted.
9: Top with cilantro (optional).
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large yellow onions、vegetable oil (⅓cup)、diced tomato (14oz)、tomato paste (6oz)、habanero pepper、curry powder (2teaspoons)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、ground ginger (1teaspoon)、mixed dried herbs (½teaspoon)、chicken bouillon cubes、long grain rice (2 ½cups)、frozen mixed vegetable (1cup)、water (1 ½cups)
instructions:
0: Add onions and 2 tablespoons of oil to a blender and pulse until smooth. Transfer to a medium bowl.
1: Add the diced tomatoes, tomato paste, and habanero pepper to the blender, and pulse until smooth. Transfer to a separate medium bowl.
2: Heat the remaining ⅓ cup (80 ml) of oil in a large, heavy-bottomed pot over medium heat.
3: Once the oil is shimmering, add the onion puree and cook until the water has cooked out and the puree is starting to brown, about 10 minutes.
4: Stir in the tomato puree and add the curry powder, garlic powder, ginger, dried herbs,  and crushed bouillon cubes. Cook for 20-30 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the stew has reduced by half and is deep red in color.
5: Add the rice, mixed vegetables, and water. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover the pot with foil and a lid. Simmer for another 30 minutes, until the rice is cooked through and the liquid is absorbed.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:spaghetti squash、olive oil (2tablespoons)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC).
1: With a sharp knife, slice the squash in half. If the squash is too tough, puncture in several places forming a dotted line around the squash. Microwave for 3-5 minutes to soften. Allow to cool before cutting in half.
2: Scoop out the seeds, brush with oil, and sprinkle with salt, and pepper. Bake for 40-45 minutes, or until a fork can easily pierce the skin.
3: Meanwhile, make the peanut sauce: combine the water, soy sauce, sesame oil, honey, lime juice, Sriracha, peanut butter, ginger, and garlic in a liquid measuring cup or medium bowl, stirring to combine.
4: Remove the squash from the oven and, with a fork, pull at the edges to produce that stringy “spaghetti” quality.
5: In a large bowl combine the “spaghetti” with the cucumber, carrots, bell pepper, green onion, onions, peanuts, cilantro, and the sauce. Add mixture back to the hollowed out spaghetti squash halves.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (4tablespoons)、garlic (3cloves)、fresh thyme (1tablespoon)、fresh rosemary (1tablespoon)、fresh sage (1tablespoon)、boneless, skinless chicken thighs、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、sweet potato、brussels sprouts (1lb)、red onion、bacon (4slices)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: In a plastic zip-top bag add 2 tablespoons of olive oil, garlic, thyme, rosemary, and sage.
2: Place the chicken thighs on top and season with salt and pepper.
3: Close the bag and massage to coat the chicken evenly. Refrigerate.
4: On a sheet pan, place the chopped sweet potato, Brussels sprouts and red onion.
5: Drizzle with 2 tablespoons of olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Toss to coat.
6: Place the chicken thighs on top of the vegetables and sprinkle with chopped bacon.
7: Bake for 30 minutes, or until the internal temperature of the chicken reaches 165°F (75°C).
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:skinless salmon (6oz)、broccoli floret (2cups)、olive oil、salt、pepper、green onion (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: In a small bowl, mix honey soy marinade ingredients.
2: Lay the salmon on a baking sheet. Pour the marinade over the salmon.
3: Lay the broccoli beside the salmon, but not touching. Drizzle olive oil over the broccoli, then season with salt and pepper.
4: Bake for 10-12 minutes.
5: Top with sliced green onions.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bell peppers、onion、garlic (4cloves)、ground beef (½lb)、sweet italian sausage (½lb)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、diced tomato (28oz)、tomato sauce (28oz)、whole milk ricotta cheese (15oz)、grated parmesan cheese (1cup)、fresh basil (½cup)、egg、lasagna noodles、shredded mozzarella cheese (1cup)、oil (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: Cut the top off of each pepper and remove the seeds. Transfer to a square baking dish. Bake for 20 minutes, to soften.
2: Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large pot, or dutch oven, over medium high heat. Add the onion and garlic, cook until softened.
3: Add the ground beef, sausage, salt, and pepper. Cook until the meat has browned on all sides.
4: Add the diced tomatoes and tomato sauce. Bring the mixture to a light simmer. Simmer for 5-10 minutes, remove from heat and set aside.
5: In a small bowl, combine ricotta, parmesan, basil, and egg. Mix together with a fork, set aside.
6: Remove the peppers from the oven, drain any excess water that accumulated inside.
7: Cut the lasagna noodles into quarters and set aside.
8: Assemble the lasagna in each pepper. Alternate 2 tablespoons of sauce, 1 lasagna noodle, 2 tablespoons ricotta mixture, and 1 lasagna noodle until the peppers are full. Top with mozzarella cheese.
9: Bake in preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, until the cheese is melted and slightly browned.
10: Rest for 10 minutes before serving.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil、ground beef (1lb)、pepper (2teaspoons)、salt (2teaspoons)、large onion、kidney bean (30oz)、crushed tomato (28oz)、cumin (2tablespoons)、paprika (1tablespoon)、red pepper flakes (1tablespoon)、chili powder (8tablespoons)、water (¼cup)、stout beer (14.9fl oz)、shredded cheddar cheese、sour cream、fresh chive
instructions:
0: In a large heavy bottomed pot, brown the beef in a little bit of olive oil. Season with the salt and pepper.
1: Once browned, remove the beef and set aside.
2: In the same pot, add the chopped onions. Cook until slightly softened. Add the browned beef back to the pan. Mix to incorporate.
3: Add the kidney beans, crushed tomato, cumin, paprika, red pepper flakes, chili powder, water and stout beer. Give it stir. Bring to a boil. Cover and let it simmer for an hour.
4: Serve with shredded cheddar, sour cream and chives.
5: Nutrition  Calories: 4377 Fat: 226 grams  Carbs: 306 grams Fiber: 79 grams  Sugars: 55  grams  Protein: 254 grams
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:filet mignon (6oz)、coarse salt、freshly ground black pepper、grapeseed oil (1tablespoon)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、fresh rosemary (2sprigs)、garlic (1clove)
instructions:
0: On a cutting board, pat the filet mignon dry with paper towels and let sit at room temperature for 20-30 minutes.
1: Preheat the oven to 450˚F (230˚C).
2: Generously season all sides of the filet mignon with salt and pepper.
3: Heat a medium, oven-safe stainless steel or cast iron skillet over high heat for 5 minutes. Add the grapeseed oil.
4: Once the oil beings to smoke, add the filet mignon to the pan. Cook without moving for 2-3 minutes, until a crust has formed.
5: Use tongs to flip the steak over, then add the butter, rosemary, and garlic to the pan.
6: Tilt the pan and spoon the butter continuously over the steak for 2-3 minutes.
7: Transfer the pan to the oven for 7 minutes for a medium rare steak.
8: Transfer the steak to a cutting board and let rest for at least 10 minutes before slicing.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:beef sirloin (2lb)、salt、freshly ground black pepper、flour (½cup)、canola oil (2tablespoons)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、large yellow onion、cremini mushroom (1lb)、cognac (2tablespoons)、beef broth (2cups)、sour cream (½cup)、fresh parsley (½cup)、egg noodle (4cups)
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, season the beef with salt and pepper and toss to coat.
1: Add ¼ cup (30 g) of flour, and toss the beef cubes until they are fully coated.
2: In a large pan over medium-high heat, heat the canola oil until it shimmers. Place about half of the beef cubes in the pan. Sear the beef on one side until it develops a deep brown crust, 3-5 minutes. Then flip and sear on the other side for 3-5 minutes. Then, stir the beef until evenly browned on all sides. Remove the beef from the pan. Repeat with the remaining meat.
3: Melt the butter in the leftover meat drippings.
4: Add the onion, season with salt and pepper, and cook until the onions are soft and slightly golden, about 5 minutes.
5: Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until deeply browned and tender, about 10 minutes.
6: Add the cognac and scrape the brown bits, releasing them from the bottom of the pan. Cook and stir until the cognac is fully incorporated, about 2 minutes.
7: Sprinkle the remaining ¼ cup (30 g) flour into the pan and stir to coat the the caramelized veggies.
8: Add the beef broth and stir it into the flour and vegetables. Bring the liquid to a boil, then reduce to low heat and simmer for 10 minutes. The sauce should be thick enough to coat the back of a spoon.
9: Once the sauce is thickened, turn off the heat. Put two scoops of hot gravy into a bowl with the sour cream. Mix the two together to slightly warm, or temper, the sour cream. Then add the sour cream mixture to the rest of the gravy and stir it in until fully combined.
10: Sprinkle the stroganoff with chopped parsley and serve with buttered egg noodles, rice, or potatoes.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:eggplants、ricotta cheese (2cups)、shredded mozzarella cheese (1cup)、shredded parmesan cheese (½cup)、fresh basil (¼cup)、egg、salt、pepper、marinara sauce (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350ºF (175ºC).
1: Slice the ends the eggplants and slice them into ¼ -inch (½ cm) slices and lay them out on a baking sheet covered in parchment paper.
2: Season with a pinch of salt on both sides of the eggplant slices and let them sweat for 20 minutes, then dry them with a paper towel. Once dried; add a pinch of pepper.
3: Bake for 20 minutes, or until soft.
4: Meanwhile, in a medium-size bowl, mix ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, basil, and egg.
5: Remove eggplant slices from the oven and  turn oven to 400ºF (200ºC).
6: Spoon about 2 tablespoons of the mixture onto eggplant slice then roll it up, repeating for all slices.
7: In a 11x17-inch (28 x 43cm) baking sheet, pour ½ of the marinara sauce, then add all the roll-ups seam down. Pour remaining ½ of marinara sauce, and top with basil and parmesan.
8: Bake for 25 minutes, or until cheese is melted and golden brown.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:baby back ribs (1rack)、salt (2teaspoons)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、paprika (2teaspoons)、cayenne pepper (1teaspoon)、dried oregano (2teaspoons)、brown sugar (¼cup)、BBQ sauce (1cup)、green beans (1lb)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 275˚F (140˚C).
1: Season the ribs with salt, black pepper, paprika, cayenne pepper, oregano, and brown sugar. Rub in the seasonings evenly on both sides.
2: Place the ribs on a baking sheet lined with foil. Cover the ribs with foil.
3: Bake for 2 hours.
4: Increase the oven temperature to 500˚F (260˚C).
5: Carefully uncover the ribs. Spread BBQ sauce evenly on top of the ribs.
6: Place green beans on the sides of the pan. Season the green beans with salt.
7: Bake for 10 minutes.
8: Transfer the ribs to a cutting board.
9: Cut between the bones to separate into individual ribs. Serve with green beans.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all-purpose flour (2tablespoons)、salt (1teaspoon)、ground black pepper (¾teaspoon)、large egg、plain breadcrumbs (2tablespoons)、olive oil (2teaspoons)、boneless, skinless chicken breast、minced garlic (½teaspoon)、red pepper flakes (¼teaspoon)、eggplant (1 ½cups)、crushed tomato (1cup)、fresh mozzarella cheese (1slice)、fresh basil (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375°F (190˚C).
1: Combine flour with ½ teaspoon salt and ½ teaspoon pepper in a wide bowl. Crack egg into another bowl, whisk it, and place breadcrumbs into a third bowl.
2: Coat chicken in flour, then egg, then breadcrumbs.
3: Heat 1½ teaspoons olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.  Cook chicken breast until crispy and golden, about 3 minutes on each side. Remove chicken from pan and set aside.
4: Add remaining olive oil, garlic, red pepper flakes, and eggplant to pan and cook until tender, about 3 minutes.
5: Add remaining salt, pepper, and crushed tomatoes.  Remove pan from heat, top with chicken breast, and place mozzarella on top.
6: Bake until cheese is melted, about 12 minutes.
7: Garnish with chopped basil.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (1tablespoon)、mushroom (1cup)、salt (1pinch)、pepper (1pinch)、flour (2tablespoons)、milk (1cup)、shredded parmesan cheese (1cup)、shredded cheddar cheese (1cup)、shell pasta (2cups)
instructions:
0: Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in a medium pot over medium heat. Add the mushrooms, salt, and pepper and cook until the mushrooms are softened. Remove from the pot.
1: Add the remaining 2 tablespoons of butter and the flour to the pot. Whisk until the flour is toasted, approximately 2 minutes.
2: Add the milk while whisking continuously to avoid lumps. Cook until the sauce is thickened.
3: Whisk in the Parmesan and cheddar cheeses and season with salt and pepper.
4: Add the cooked pasta and mushrooms. Mix until the sauce coats the pasta well.
5: Top with truffle oil and chives.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:whole wheat pasta (4cups)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
1: With a knife, carefully cut a slit in the side of the chicken making sure to not cut all the way through.
2: Season the chicken breasts with olive oil, pepper, and salt.
3: Stuff each chicken breast with a clove of garlic, half of the mozzarella, half of the sun-dried tomatoes, and 1 ounce (30g) of baby spinach. (You may use toothpicks to close the ingredients inside the chicken breasts if desired, just remember to remove them!)
4: In a cast-iron skillet, sear chicken on medium-high heat until all sides are browned.
5: Continue baking in oven for 15-20 minutes, or until internal temperature of the chicken reaches 165˚F (75˚C). Set aside.
6: Heat marinara and spinach in the cast-iron skillet on medium-high heat until spinach is wilted.
7: Serve chicken on top of whole wheat pasta and spinach marinara sauce.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:zucchinis、grated parmesan cheese (1cup)
instructions:
0: Cut the ends off of the zucchini, and cut in half, lengthwise.
1: Using a vegetable peeler, peel long strips of zucchini (these will be your “noodles”) and set on a baking sheet lined with paper towels.
2: Dab zucchini strips with a paper towel to absorb the excess moisture.
3: In a large pot, add olive oil, onions, and garlic. Cook until translucent, about 4-5 minutes.
4: Add ground turkey, and cook for another 4-5 minutes, or until the turkey has browned slightly.
5: Pour in crushed tomatoes, basil, parsley, oregano, salt, pepper, tomato paste, and a bay leaf. Cover and let simmer for 30 minutes.
6: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
7: In a bowl, combine ricotta cheese, egg, parsley, parmesan, salt, and pepper. Mix until well combined.
8: Using a baking dish, layer turkey sauce, zucchini strips, ricotta mixture, and parmesan. Repeat until there are 3 layers total, ending with the turkey sauce and topping that with parmesan cheese.
9: Bake for 50 minutes (times and temperatures may vary depending on the oven).
10: Let rest for at least 20 minutes.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:paprika (1tablespoon)、onion powder (2teaspoons)、salt (2teaspoons)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、dried rosemary (1teaspoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、whole chicken、carrots、red skin potatoes、corn (1ear)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、butter (1tablespoon)、fresh thyme (5sprigs)
instructions:
0: Combine paprika, onion powder, salt, garlic powder, rosemary, pepper, and oregano in a small bowl and mix well. Reserve 1 tablespoon of the spice mix and set aside.
1: In a large ziplock bag, place the quartered chicken and spice mix. Marinate for 1 hour or overnight.
2: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
3: Add the carrots, potatoes, and corn to a bowl and drizzle with oil and remaining 1 tablespoon of spice mix and toss until thoroughly coated.
4: Heat a large pan with oil over high heat. Add the chicken pieces and cook until golden brown on both side. Set aside.
5: Place the chicken and veggies on a sheet of aluminium foil. Top with butter and thyme. Fold the foil over the chicken and vegetables and cinch the edge so that no air can escape.
6: Bake for 45 minutes, or chicken is completely cooked.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:coconut oil (1tablespoon)、cinnamon stick、cardamom pods、basmati rice (1cup)、water (2cups)、salt (1pinch)
instructions:
0: Make the basmati rice: Melt the coconut oil in a small pot over medium heat. Add the cinnamon stick and cardamom pods and sauté for 2 minutes, until toasty and aromatic.
1: Add the soaked basmati rice, water, and salt. Cover and cook for 10 minutes, until the rice is fluffy. Remove from the heat, fluff the rice with a fork, and remove the cinnamon sticks and cardamom pods. Set aside.
2: In a large pan, melt the coconut oil over medium heat.
3: Add the onion and sauté, stirring occasionally for 10 minutes, until onion is light golden brown.
4: Add the ginger and garlic and sauté for 1 minute, until toasty and aromatic.
5: Add the tomato paste, turmeric, cumin, coriander, and cayenne and stir to combine.
6: Add the yogurt and chicken thighs and season with salt and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes, or until the chicken is no longer pink on the outside.
7: Add the water, cover, and cook for 10 minutes.
8: Remove the lid and continue to cook, tossing the chicken occasionally, for 5 minutes or until the curry sauce has thickened to your liking.
9: Serve the chicken and sauce over the rice with lime wedges and cilantro.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (1tablespoon)、corn (1cup)、eggs、fresh spinach (2cups)、chicken stock (4cups)、garlic (2cloves)、thumb of ginger、scallions (3pieces)、chicken breasts、miso paste (2tablespoons)、ramen noodle (2servings)、scallion、nori
instructions:
0: Heat butter in a saucepan, fry corn until warm. Set aside.
1: Soft-boil 2 eggs and set aside. Blanch the spinach and set aside.
2: Bring chicken stock, garlic, ginger and scallions to a boil. Boil for 30 minutes.
3: Add the chicken, simmer for 20 minutes. Remove, and set aside.
4: Dissolve the miso paste in the chicken broth.
5: Shred the chicken.
6: Put everything together. Divide noodles between two bowls. Pour over chicken broth. Add the spinach, corn, shredded chicken, chopped scallions, soft-boiled egg and nori.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:minced pork (5.3oz)、sake (1teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、sugar (1teaspoon)、garlic (1clove)、ginger、soy sauce (1tablespoon)、sesame oil (1teaspoon)、potato starch (1teaspoon)、cabbage (7oz)、chinese chive (0.7oz)、gyoza skin (30sheets)
instructions:
0: Put pork, sake, salt, and sugar in a bowl. Mix until meat is sticky.
1: Combine garlic, ginger, soy sauce, sesame oil, potato starch, cabbage, and chive. Mix them very well in a bowl.
2: Scoop a spoonful of filling onto the middle of the gyoza skin.
3: Apply water for skin edge with your finger. Fold in half and pinch pleats into the edges, then wrap up.
4: Heat sesame oil in the pan and lay gyoza in single layer. Keep on medium heat for 2 minutes.
5: When gyoza turns brown, pour in slurry and put the lid on. Steam for 3 minutes.
6: Take off the lid, put more sesame oil and cook over low heat.
7: Cover a pan with a plate, turn over a pan.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground beef (2lb)、eggs、breadcrumb (1cup)、fresh parsley (¼cup)、garlic (6cloves)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、oil、soft rolls、mozzarella cheese (8slices)、marinara sauce (1cup)、butter (¼cup)、grated parmesan cheese
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, eggs, bread crumbs, ¼ cup (10 g) parsley, 3 cloves garlic, salt, and pepper.
1: Shape the ground beef mixture into golf ball-sized balls.
2: Heat a cast-iron pan or skillet with oil over medium-high heat.
3: Cook the meatballs until browned on all sides. Transfer meatballs to a plate then remove pan from heat.
4: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
5: Place the soft rolls in a baking sheet.
6: Cut the top of the rolls with a knife and press the inside down to create a boat.
7: Mix together the melted butter, 3 cloves garlic, and 2 tablespoons of parsley.
8: Brush the rolls with the garlic butter.
9: Bake for 5 minutes, or until toasted.
10: Place two slices of mozzarella in the rolls. Place a spoonful of marinara on top of the cheese.
11: Place three meatballs in the boat and top with more marinara.
12: Bake for 25 minutes, or until cheese is melted.
13: Top with Parmesan.
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:russet potatoes、carrots、celery (3stalks)、yellow onion、chopped mushrooms (2cups)、flour (1tablespoon)、fresh thyme (1teaspoon)、fresh sage (1teaspoon)、garlic (4cloves)、vegetable broth (2cups)、red wine (⅓cup)、salt、pepper、soy milk、vegan butter、tomato paste (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Peel, chop, and boil the potatoes for 10-15 minutes until soft.
1: Meanwhile, chop the carrots, celery, and onion, sauté in vegan butter or oil for a few minutes.
2: Add the mushrooms, and cook until the edges begin to darken. Add the garlic, and season with salt and pepper.
3: Add the tomato paste, flour, thyme, and sage.
4: Slowly add the veggie broth and wine, stirring continuously. Let simmer for a few minutes to thicken.
5: Mash the potatoes and add the soy milk and vegan butter. Add more if needed until smooth. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
6: Lay the veggie filling into a baking dish, the spread the mashed potatoes over top. At this time you can get creative with designs and patterns for the top. The rougher the surface, the crispier it will turn out.
7: Spray the surface with cooking oil. Broil for 10-15 minutes, or until the top is crispy.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、large eggs、extra virgin olive oil (3tablespoons)、panko breadcrumbs (1 ½cups)、paprika (2teaspoons)、kosher salt (1 ½teaspoons)、all-purpose flour (1cup)、broccoli floret (2cups)、ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、garlic (2cloves)、sweet potatoes
instructions:
0: Slice the chicken breasts into strips.
1: In a medium bowl, add the eggs and 1 tablespoon of olive oil.  Whisk to combine.
2: In a large bowl, combine the panko bread crumbs, paprika, and 1 teaspoon of salt.
3: Place the flour in another medium bowl.
4: Coat the chicken strips in the flour, then in the eggs, then in the bread crumbs and place on a baking sheet.
5: Cut the broccoli into florets.
6: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190˚C) and line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.
7: In a large bowl, toss the broccoli florets with 1 tablespoon olive oil, ¼ teaspoon salt, ¼ teaspoon pepper, and half of the minced garlic.  Arrange on half of the remaining baking sheet.
8: Cut the sweet potatoes in half lengthwise, then slice into half-moons.
9: Toss the sweet potatoes in a large bowl with the remaining tablespoon of olive oil, ¼ teaspoon salt, ¼ teaspoon pepper, and minced garlic, and place on the baking sheet next to the broccoli.
10: Bake both baking sheets simultaneously, until the veggies are browned and the chicken is crisp, about 20 minutes.
11: Make the dipping sauce: Combine the mayonnaise, mustard, and honey in a small bowl.
12: Serve the chicken and veggies with the dipping sauce, BBQ sauce, and ketchup, if using.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sushi rice (1cup)、water (1cup)、rice vinegar (3tablespoons)、sugar (1 ½teaspoons)、salt (½teaspoon)、wild-caught, sushi-grade salmon fillet (8oz)、soy sauce (2tablespoons)、lemon juice (2tablespoons)、avocado、cucumber、pickled ginger (2tablespoons)、green onion、nori (5small sheets)、toasted sesame seeds (¼teaspoon)、black sesame seeds (¼teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Add the rice to a fine mesh strainer and submerge in a bowl filled with water. Shake the rice a few times to remove excess starch.
1: Transfer the rice to a medium pot and add 1 cup (240 ml) of water. Cover the pot and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Once boiling, reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove the pan from the heat and let stand for 15 minutes.
2: Remove the lid and fluff the rice with a fork or rice paddle. Transfer the rice to a large bowl.
3: Mix together the rice vinegar, sugar, and salt and pour over the rice while still hot. Gently fold the rice to incorporate. Cover and set aside until ready to assemble the bowl.
4: Using a very sharp knife, gently slice the salmon fillet into ½-inch (1 cm) cubes. It may be easier to slice if you place the salmon in the freezer for a few minutes to help it firm up.
5: Just before assembly, place the salmon in a bowl and season with the soy sauce and lemon juice.
6: To assemble, place a few spoonfuls of rice into a medium bowl (use any leftover rice for another poke bowl or sushi). Top the rice with the seasoned salmon, avocado, cucumber, ginger, green onions, nori sheets, toasted sesame seeds, and black sesame seeds.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:green beans (3oz)、olive oil、salt、pepper、skinless salmon (6oz)、pesto (2tablespoons)、cherry tomatoes
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Fold the parchment paper in half, then open up.
2: On one half, lay down the green beans. Drizzle on oil and sprinkle on salt & pepper.
3: Lay the salmon on the green beans, and spread on the pesto. Top with tomatoes.
4: Fold the parchment paper over the salmon, and cinch the paper together by folding it over itself along the edges.
5: Bake for 20 minutes or until internal temperature of salmon reaches 145˚F (63˚C).
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:italian  sausage (½lb)、mozzarella cheese (10slices)、freshly grated parmesan cheese (½cup)
instructions:
0: For the pizza sauce, melt the butter in a small saucepan and add the onion, salt, red pepper flakes, and oregano, and sauté until golden brown.
1: Add the garlic, sugar, and crushed tomatoes, and simmer for roughly 20 minutes or until sauce thickens.
2: For the dough, combine the active dry yeast, sugar, and warm water together and let sit for one minute.
3: In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, cornmeal, and salt.
4: Add the yeast mixture and butter into the dry ingredients and stir until dough forms.
5: Bring dough to floured surface and knead until dough forms into a ball.
6: Move dough to large bowl drizzled with olive oil. Coat dough in oil and cover. Let rest for 1 hour.
7: Remove dough and bring onto floured surface.
8: Cut dough in half and begin working dough out, ensuring that it is at least 2 inches (5 cm) wider than your deep dish pan.
9: Double wrap the remaining dough with plastic wrap and place in a resealable freezer bag. Freeze for up to a month.
10: Preheat your oven to 425°F (215°C).
11: Bring your dough into your oiled and floured deep dish pan.
12: Using your hands press dough into sides of your dish making it as even as possible.
13: Lay slices of mozzarella across the dough, covering the entire bottom.
14: Add pieces of uncased italian sausage on top of the mozzarella and top with tomato sauce.
15: Bake for 20-25 minutes or until crust starts to lightly brown and the cheese is melted.
16: Garnish with parmesan, cut and serve.
17: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground beef (1lb)、taco seasoning (2tablespoons)、flour tortillas、refried bean (16oz)、shredded mexican cheese blend (1cup)
instructions:
0: Add ground beef to a large skillet over high heat and sprinkle with taco seasoning. Cook, breaking up the meat, until browned. Drain the fat and set aside to cool.
1: Assemble the burritos by microwaving the flour tortilla for 20 seconds, and begin to layer burrito starting with refried beans, followed by the cooked beef and cheese.
2: Fold in the left and right sides of the tortilla and roll it up from the bottom, tucking the bottom edge under the filling. Wrap in parchment paper and label. Freeze up to 1 month.
3: To reheat from frozen, wrap the burrito in a damp paper towel and microwave for 2-3 minutes, flipping halfway or until the center is hot. Let stand 1 minute before eating.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、small onion、garlic (2cloves)、raw cashew (¾cup)、red pepper、nutritional yeast (2tablespoons)、tomato paste (1tablespoon)、cornstarch (1 ½tablespoons)、salt (½teaspoon)、smoked paprika (½teaspoon)、ground mustard (1teaspoon)、turmeric (½teaspoon)、vegetable broth (2cups)、dry pasta (8oz)、smoked paprika
instructions:
0: In a medium-sized pot or dutch oven over medium heat, add the olive oil and onion and cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally, until semi translucent.
1: Add the garlic and cook for 2-3 minutes.
2: Transfer onion and garlic to blender. Add the soaked cashews, red pepper, nutritional yeast, tomato paste, cornstarch, salt, paprika, ground mustard, turmeric, and vegetable broth, and blend until smooth.
3: Transfer sauce back into pot and cook until thickened, about 5 minutes.
4: Add pasta to the pot and stir until sauce is evenly distributed.
5: Top with smoked paprika and serve immediately.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:thick rib eye steak、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、canola oil (3tablespoons)、butter (2tablespoons)、garlic (2cloves)、fresh rosemary (2sprigs)、fresh thyme (3sprigs)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 200°F/95°C.
1: Pat the steak dry with a paper towel, and generously season all sides of the steak with salt and pepper.
2: Transfer to a wire rack on top of a baking sheet, and bake for about 45 minutes to an hour, until the internal temperature reads about 125°F/50˚C for medium-rare. Adjust the bake time if you like your steak more rare or well-done.
3: Heat the canola oil in a pan over high heat until smoking. Do not use olive oil, as its smoke point is significantly lower than that of canola oil and will smoke before reaching the desired cooking temperature.
4: Sear the steak for 1 minute on one side, then flip.
5: Add the butter, garlic, rosemary, and thyme, and swirl around the pan. Transfer the garlic and herbs on top of the steak and baste the steak with the butter using a large spoon.
6: Baste for about 1 minute, then flip the steak with tongs and baste the other side for about 15 seconds.
7: Turn the steak on its side and cook to render off any excess fat.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:canola oil (2tablespoons)、garlic (3tablespoons)、sweet onions、mushrooms (2cups)、kosher salt (½tablespoon)、freshly ground black pepper (½tablespoon)、flank steak (2lb)、fresh baby spinach (4oz)、provolone cheese (9slices)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
1: Heat one tablespoon of the oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Combine the garlic, onions, mushrooms, salt, and pepper in the pan and cook until almost all of the moisture has evaporated and the onions are caramelizing, 15–20 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.
2: Lay the flank steak on a cutting board. Add salt and pepper on both sides, to taste.
3: Spoon the mushroom and onion mixture on top, spreading it evenly across the steak. Sprinkle the spinach on top, followed by the slices of provolone. Press down lightly to compress the spinach.
4: Starting at the bottom of the flank steak, roll it up tightly, making sure the grain of the meat is running horizontally. Use six toothpicks to secure the steak roll. Slice the steak roll into six equal rolls.
5: Heat the remaining oil in a pan over high heat. Sear the steak rolls on one side for one to two minutes, then flip. Sear the second side for about one minute, then bake for 10–15 minutes, until medium rare.
6: Remove the toothpicks, then serve!
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:oil (1tablespoon)、white mushroom (1 ½cups)、salt、black pepper、fresh thyme leaf (1tablespoon)、baby spinach (4cups)、boneless, skinless chicken breasts、paprika (½teaspoon)、shredded cheddar cheese (3tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Heat the oil over medium heat in a large, nonstick skillet.
2: Toss in the mushrooms and season with salt, pepper, and thyme. Sauté until the mushrooms have started to darken in color.
3: Place the spinach on top of the mushrooms and toss until the greens have wilted, about 2-3 minutes. Set the spinach mixture aside.
4: Season the chicken breasts on both sides with salt and pepper.
5: Using a sharp knife, make vertical cuts, about half an inch apart, making sure not to cut all the way through the chicken.
6: Transfer the chicken to a greased roasting pan.
7: Stuff the spinach mixture into the cuts of the chicken breasts. Season with paprika and top with a sprinkle of grated cheddar cheese.
8: Bake for 20-25 minutes at 400°F (200°C), until the cheese has melted and the chicken has reached an internal temperature of 165°F (72°C).
9: Let the meat rest for 5 minutes before serving.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breast、broccoli (1head)、carrots、tomatoes、potatoes
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400ºF (200ºC).
1: Cut the broccoli, carrots, tomatoes, and potatoes in small pieces.
2: For the seasoning, combine the salt, pepper, garlic salt, onion salt, rosemary, thyme, and Herbes de Provence.
3: Put the olive oil in the vegetables and sprinkle the seasoning, stir to combine.
4: Put the chicken breast cut in half with the vegetables. Add seasoning to chicken on both sides.
5: Bake 35-40 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through.
6: Serve the chicken with some of the roasted vegetables.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breast (2lb)、large onion、garlic (3cloves)、chili powder (1tablespoon)、cumin (2teaspoons)、paprika (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、chicken broth (6cups)、diced tomato (1can)、black beans (1can)、heavy cream (1cup)、cheddar cheese (1cup)、monterey jack cheese (1cup)
instructions:
0: Place chicken, onion, garlic and spices into a 6-quart slow cooker.
1: Using a set of tongs or a large spoon, mix the ingredients together. Once mixed, pour in chicken broth.
2: Set slow cooker to HIGH, cover and cook for 3 hours.
3: After 3 hours remove and shred the chicken into bite-sized pieces.
4: Return shredded chicken to the slow cooker and add tomatoes, beans, heavy cream and cheese.
5: Cover and set slow cooker to the LOW setting. Let soup cook for an additional 45 minutes.
6: Ladle soup into bowl and top with favorite nacho toppings. Serve with tortilla chips.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:asparagus (9oz)、olive oil、salt、pepper、skinless salmon (7oz)、white onion (3slices)、lemon (2slices)、fresh dill (1sprig)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Fold the parchment paper in half, then open up.
2: On one half, lay down the asparagus. Drizzle on oil and sprinkle on salt & pepper.
3: Lay the salmon on the asparagus, and add more oil, salt, and pepper.
4: Place the onion, lemon, and dill on the salmon.
5: Fold the parchment paper over the salmon, and cinch the paper together by folding it over itself along the edges.
6: Bake for 20 minutes or until internal temperature of salmon reaches 145˚F (63˚C).
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bell peppers、cooked rice (2cups)、salt、pepper、corn (1can)、onion、black beans (1can)、tomato (½cup)、salsa (½cup)、shredded cheddar cheese (2cups)、chicken stock (½cup)
instructions:
0: In a bowl, mix the rice, salt, pepper, corn, onion, beans, tomatoes, and salsa.
1: Place the bell peppers hollowed side up into a 7-quart (6 ½ liters) slow cooker. Cut the bottoms of the peppers if needed to help them stand up better.
2: Fill peppers halfway with rice mixture, then sprinkle on 1 cup of cheese.
3: Fill to the top with rice mixture, and top with the remaining cheese.
4: Pour chicken stock into the bottom of the slow cooker.
5: Cook on high for 4 hours.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground beef (1lb)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、onion powder (1teaspoon)、oil (1tablespoon)、cheddar cheese (2oz)
instructions:
0: Mix together the patty ingredients until evenly combined.
1: Flatten the beef into a thin layer, then place a chunk of cheddar inside, wrapping the beef completely around the cheddar. Form a patty with your hands.
2: Repeat with the remaining beef and cheese.
3: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat.
4: Cook the burgers for 3 minutes on the first side, flip, then cook for 6 more minutes.
5: Assemble the burgers with the bun, bacon, tomato, and lettuce.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil、onion (¼cup)、garlic (2cloves)、spinach (7oz)、cream cheese (6oz)、salt、pepper、thick-cut pork chops、mashed potato
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Heat the olive oil in a medium pan over medium heat. Add the onion and sauté until translucent, about 2 minutes. Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
2: Add the spinach and cool until wilted.
3: Add the cream cheese and stir until melted. Season with salt and pepper. Remove the pan from the heat and let cool.
4: Make a slit on the side of each pork chop to make a pocket, but do not cut all the way through.
5: Fill the pork chops with the spinach mixture. Season with salt and pepper on both sides.
6: Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Working in batches, sear the pork chops until golden brown on both sides. Transfer to a baking sheet.
7: Bake the pork chops for 20 minutes, or until  cooked through.
8: Serve the pork chops with mashed potatoes.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:filet mignon (8oz)、salt、pepper、butter (2tablespoons)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、fresh rosemary (2sprigs)、garlic (2cloves)、flaky sea salt (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 450˚F (230˚C).
1: Season the steaks with salt and pepper on all sides.
2: Heat a large cast iron pan over medium-high heat until just smoking.
3: Add the butter and olive oil. Once the butter has melted, add the steaks and cook, without moving for three minutes.
4: Use tongs to flip the steaks over. Add the rosemary, thyme, and garlic.
5: Transfer the pan to the oven for 7 minutes for a medium steak.
6: Using tongs, transfer the steaks to a cutting board. Let the steaks rest for at least 5 minutes.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:broth (4cups)、linguine (10oz)、broccoli floret (10oz)、asparagus (1lb)、small onion、garlic (4cloves)、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、salt、pepper、olive oil (1teaspoon)、mushroom (4oz)、heavy whipping cream (¼cup)、grated parmesan cheese (½cup)、fresh parsley (3tablespoons)
instructions:
0: In a pot over high heat, combine broth, linguine, broccoli, asparagus, onion, garlic, red pepper flakes, salt, pepper, and olive oil. Stir.
1: Add the mushrooms and bring to a boil.
2: Once at a boil, reduce heat to medium and cook the pasta for 10 minutes, continuously tossing with tongs.

4: If the liquid hasn’t been completely absorbed, let the pasta sit off the heat for an additional few minutes.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs (2lb)、thai green curry paste (2tablespoons)、soy sauce (2tablespoons)、red bell pepper (3cups)、green beans (½cup)、red chili、coconut milk (15oz)、salt、pepper、oil、rice
instructions:
0: Sear the chicken in batches in a few tablespoons of oil, seasoning with salt and pepper as you go.
1: Transfer to the slow cooker and spoon over the Thai green curry paste and drizzle over the soy sauce.
2: Cook on high for 2.5 hours.
3: Stir in the peppers, green beans, chilli, and coconut milk.
4: Cook for a further 30 minutes.
5: Serve over rice.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、chicken breast (4cups)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、onion、garlic (1teaspoon)、ginger (1teaspoon)、chili powder (½teaspoon)、garam masala (1teaspoon)、turmeric (1teaspoon)、coriander powder (1teaspoon)、water (1 ¼cups)、passata sauce (½cup)、single cream (1tablespoon)、low fat natural yogurt (4tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Heat the oil in a large pan over a medium heat.
1: Add the chicken and season with the salt and pepper. Fry for 6-8 minutes or until cooked through.
2: Take the chicken out and set aside.
3: Fry the onions with the garlic and ginger for about 5 minutes.
4: Stir in all the spices and fry for another 2 minutes.
5: Stir in the water and passata sauce. Bring to a boil.
6: Place a lid on top of the pan and simmer for 10 minutes.
7: Stir in the cream and the yogurt.
8: Add in the chicken and cook for another 5 minutes, until the sauce thickens slightly.
9: Serve with rice, salad, and naan bread.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:brown rice (¼cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、water (¾cup)、flank steak (4oz)、small red onion、red bell pepper、lime juice (1tablespoon)、onion powder (1teaspoon)、chili powder (¾teaspoon)、ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、fresh cilantro (2tablespoons)、lime
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 450˚F (230˚C).
1: Place the rice in a sieve and rinse under cold water to remove excess starch.
2: Transfer the rice to a small pot with salt and water and bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce to a simmer, put a lid on, and cook until water is absorbed, about 45 minutes.
3: In a bowl, add the skirt steak, red onion, bell pepper, lime juice, onion powder, chili powder, black pepper, and remaining salt and toss until well combined.
4: Transfer to a parchment paper-lined sheet tray and bake for 12 to 15 minutes.
5: Serve steak over rice and top with cilantro and lime wedges.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cauliflower florets (3cups)、sesame oil (1teaspoon)、carrots、garlic (3cloves)、large shrimp (1lb)、frozen peas (1cup)、eggs、low sodium soy sauce (3tablespoons)、white pepper (½teaspoon)、green onion
instructions:
0: Pulse cauliflower in a food processor until broken into rice-sized pieces.
1: Heat the sesame oil in a large skillet or wok. Toss in the carrots and sauté until soft, about 5 minutes.
2: Add in the garlic and shrimp and sautée until the shrimp begin to turn pink, about 2 minutes.
3: Add the peas and cauliflower rice and mix until the cauliflower has warmed through.
4: Move the contents of the pan to the side to create a well in the center.  Pour in the eggs and slowly scraped the cooked bits off the bottom of the pan to scramble the eggs.  Once the eggs are almost finished cooking, mix everything in the pan together.
5: Season the cauliflower with white pepper and soy sauce, give one last good mix to combine and serve with a garnish of sliced green onion.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:carrot (½cup)、broccoli floret (1cup)、olive oil、salt、pepper、skinless salmon (6oz)、teriyaki sauce (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Fold the parchment paper in half, then open up.
2: On one half, lay down the broccoli and carrots. Drizzle on oil and sprinkle on salt & pepper.
3: Lay the salmon on the veggies, and pour on teriyaki sauce.
4: Fold the parchment paper over the salmon, and cinch the paper together by folding it over itself along the edges.
5: Bake for 20 minutes or until internal temperature of salmon reaches 145˚F (63˚C).
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:vegetable oil (2cups)、boneless, skinless chicken thighs、kosher salt (1 ½teaspoons)、panko bread crumbs (2cups)、large eggs、all purpose flour (1cup)
instructions:
0: Make the chicken: Fill a heavy-bottomed, high-sided skillet with about ½ inch (1 ¼ cm) of vegetable oil. Heat over medium heat until the oil reaches 350°F (180°C).
1: Place the chicken thighs on a cutting board and cover with plastic wrap. Pound the chicken with the flat side of a meat tenderizer until all of the thighs are between ¼ in (6 ml) and ⅓ inch (8 ml) thick.
2: On the cutting board, season the flattened chicken on both sides with the salt.
3: Add the panko, eggs, and flour to 3 separate shallow bowls.
4: Coat each piece of chicken in the flour, shaking off any excess, then in the egg, then in the panko. Gently press the panko into the chicken to ensure a thick, even coating.
5: Working in batches, carefully fry the chicken in the hot oil for about 2 minutes per side, until golden brown and cooked through. Set on paper towels to drain and immediately season lightly with salt.
6: Make the tonkatsu sauce: In a small bowl, mix together the ketchup, sugar, and Worcestershire sauce. Set aside.
7: Make the cabbage slaw: In a medium bowl, toss the cabbage, mayonnaise, vinegar, and salt until well coated. Season with additional salt if needed. Set aside.
8: Wrap the tortillas in a damp kitchen towel and microwave for 30 seconds.
9: Slice the chicken thighs into ⅓-inch (8 ml) thick pieces. Place about half of a thigh worth of meat onto a flour tortilla. Top with about ¼ cup (25 G) of cabbage slaw, a drizzle of tonkatsu sauce, sesame seeds, scallions, and cilantro. Repeat with remaining chicken to make 8 tacos total. Serve with lime wedges alongside.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsalted butter (10tablespoons)、all purpose flour (⅓cup)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、dijon mustard (1teaspoon)、heavy cream (1cup)、whole milk (2cups)、fresh thyme leaf (1 ½teaspoons)、kosher salt (1 ½teaspoons)、black pepper (½teaspoon)、shredded mozzarella cheese (1 ½cups)、shredded white cheddar cheese (1 ½cups)、grated parmesan cheese (1 ½cups)、store-bought gnocchi (32oz)、panko bread crumbs (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Melt 6 tablespoons of butter in a large cast iron skillet over medium heat. Add the flour and garlic powder and cook, whisking constantly, until light golden brown, about 3 minutes.
2: Add the mustard, heavy cream, milk, thyme, salt, and pepper and whisk to incorporate. Bring to a simmer, then stir in the mozzarella, white cheddar, and 1 cup (110 g) of the Parmesan cheese until fully melted, about 3 minutes.
3: Stir in the gnocchi until fully covered in the cheese sauce, then remove the pan from the heat.
4: In a medium bowl, microwave the remaining 4 tablespoons of butter on low power until melted.
5: Add the bread crumbs and remaining Parmesan to the melted butter and stir to combine.
6: Sprinkle the bread crumb mixture evenly over the gnocchi.
7: Bake the gnocchi for 25–30 minutes, until the sauce is bubbling and the top is golden brown.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium tomatoes、red bell pepper、small red onions、scotch bonnet pepper、vegetable oil (½cup)、boneless chicken thighs (1lb)、curry powder (2teaspoons)、dried thyme (1teaspoon)、parboiled long grain rice (2cups)
instructions:
0: Add the tomatoes, red bell pepper, quartered onion, and pepper to a blender and blend until smooth.
1: In a pot over medium heat, add 2 tablespoons oil, diced red onion, chicken, and curry powder. Cook until onions are soft and chicken has browned, about 8-10 minutes. Remove chicken from pot and set aside.
2: Raise heat to medium-high, and using the same pot, add pureed tomato mixture, cooking until reduced by half.
3: Add in remaining oil, and fry sauce for 8-10 minutes.
4: Stir in chicken, along with rice, stock and thyme leaves.
5: Cover pot tightly with foil. Cover with lid and reduce heat to low, cooking for 30 minutes.
6: Once rice is cooked, fluff up before serving.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:onion、garlic (3cloves)、red chili、red pepper、chorizo (¼lb)、turmeric (½teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、long grain rice (1 ¼cups)、water (1 ¾cups)、pea (⅔cup)、prawn (⅓lb)
instructions:
0: Fry the onions, garlic, chilli, and red pepper with a little olive oil.
1: Add the chorizo after a minute.
2: Stir in the turmeric, salt, pepper, and long grain rice.
3: Pour in the water and simmer for 20 minutes.
4: Stir in the peas and prawns until prawns are pink and no longer translucent, about 3-4 minutes.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:canned whole tomatoes (28oz)、garlic (8cloves)、olive oil (¼cup)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、large onion、kosher salt、pepper、anchovies (2oz)、red pepper flakes (1teaspoon)、tomato paste (½cup)、dry red wine (½cup)、water (1cup)、spaghetti (1lb)、parmesan cheese
instructions:
0: Add the tomatoes to a deep, large bowl. Using your hands, crush the tomatoes until no large pieces remain, just a coarse tomato puree.
1: Peel the garlic cloves and finely chop.
2: Heat the olive oil and butter in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the onion is softened but not browned, about 10 minutes.
3: Add the anchovies and the oil they are packed in. Cook, stirring occasionally, until dissolved into the oil, about 2 minutes.
4: Add the red pepper flakes and stir to combine.
5: Add the tomato paste and cook until it turns a dark, brick-red color, about 4 minutes (this caramelizes the sugars in the tomato, which will give a really great flavor and take the edge off that raw tomato-y taste).
6: Add the wine and cook for about 1 minute, just to burn off the alcohol.
7: Add the tomatoes and stir everything together, making sure to scrape the bottom of the pot to get all those good bits. Add water and bring it to a boil.
8: Reduce the heat to medium-low and cook the sauce for 1½–2 hours at a very low simmer; there should just be a few bubbles here and there. If medium-low is too high (every stove is different), reduce the heat to low. Stir every 30 minutes.
9: Ladle out about 2 cups of sauce: This is what is known as your "extra sauce." You'll serve it alongside the pasta or freeze it for later.
10: To serve, cook the spaghetti in a large pot of salted boiling water.
11: Drain the pasta and add it to the sauce. Serve it right out of the pot, or transfer to a serving bowl. Top with grated Parmesan cheese.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large eggplant、salt、almond meal (1 ½cups)、italian seasoning (1tablespoon)、large eggs、water、rice flour (1cup)、olive oil、garlic (3cloves)、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、crushed san marzano tomato (28oz)、fresh basil (6large leaves)、shredded mozzarella cheese (1 ½cups)、shredded parmesan cheese (¾cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190˚C).
1: Trim the ends off the eggplant, then slice into ½-inch (2-cm) thick rounds. Transfer the rounds to a baking sheet lined with paper towels and sprinkle with salt on both sides. Let sit for 10 minutes for the salt to draw out excess moisture from the eggplant.
2: In a medium bowl, whisk together the almond meal, Italian seasoning, and a pinch of salt. Beat the eggs in another medium bowl with a splash of water. Add the rice flour to another medium bowl.
3: Coat the salted eggplant rounds in the rice flour, then in the egg, letting any excess drip off, then in the seasoned almond meal. Set the rounds on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Lightly drizzle on both sides with olive oil.
4: Bake the eggplant, flipping halfway through for even browning, for 30 minutes, or until golden brown.
5: While the eggplant is baking, make the sauce: Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium-low heat. Add the garlic and red pepper flakes and cook for 3-4 minutes, until the garlic is fragrant. Reduce the heat if the garlic is browning too quickly. Add the crushed tomatoes and stir to combine. Cover and simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent the bottom from scorching. Add the basil and stir to incorporate.
6: To assemble, spread a bit of sauce in the bottom of a 9x13-inch (23x33-cm) baking dish, then add a layer of baked eggplant. Top with more sauce and sprinkle with the mozzarella and Parmesan cheese. Repeat with the remaining ingredients, using another baking dish if needed to make another single layer of eggplant.
7: Bake for 10 minutes, then turn the broiler on high and cook for another 3 minutes, until the cheese is browned and bubbling.
8: Serve garnished with more basil.
9: Enjoy!
10: Nutrition, per serving - Calories: 424, Total fat: 21 grams, Sodium: 666 mg, Total carbs: 41 grams, Dietary fiber: 9 grams, Net carbs: 32 grams, Sugars: 12 grams, Protein: 22 grams

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:dark soy sauce (2tablespoons)、vegetarian mushroom oyster sauce (3tablespoons)、light brown sugar (1tablespoon)、thai bird chile powder (1teaspoon)、extra firm tofu (16oz)、rice noodle (1lb)、canola oil (3tablespoons)、shallot (⅓cup)、garlic (2cloves)、water (1tablespoon)、broccoli (12oz)、large eggs
instructions:
0: In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, vegetarian oyster sauce, brown sugar, and chile powder.
1: Add the tofu to a medium bowl and drizzle with 1 tablespoon of the sauce. Gently toss to coat. Reserve the rest of the sauce.
2: Using your hands, break up the sheets of noodles into individual noodles. Set aside.
3: Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large nonstick wok or skillet over high heat, swirling the pan to coat. Working in batches, add the tofu to the pan in a single layer and cook for 1-2 minutes on each side, until browned. Flip and brown on the other side, 1-2 minutes more. Remove from the pan and set aside.
4: Add the remaining tablespoon of canola oil to the pan. Add the shallot to the pan and cook until tender and lightly browned, about 2 minutes. Add the garlic and water and cook for 30 seconds, until fragrant. Add the Chinese broccoli and cook, tossing occasionally, until crispy and tender, 2-3 minutes. Add the reserved rice noodles, tofu, and sauce and toss to combine. Cook until the noodles are warmed through and coated in the sauce, 1-2 minutes.
5: Push the noodles to one side of the pan and pour the eggs into the empty space. Cook for 30 seconds, stirring constantly, until the eggs are scrambled. Toss to incorporate the eggs into the rest of the dish.
6: Divide between 4 serving plates.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (6tablespoons)、garlic (2teaspoons)、shallot (1tablespoon)、arborio rice (1cup)、dry white wine (¼cup)、chicken stock (2cups)、tomato soup (14.5oz)、unsalted butter (6tablespoons)、parmesan cheese (¼cup)、kosher salt、white pepper、large shrimps、green peas (¼cup)、fresh parsley leaf (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: In a medium skillet, heat 3 tablespoons olive oil over medium heat. Add the shallots and 1 teaspoon minced garlic, and sauté until soft, but not brown.
1: Add the rice and sauté until well-coated with the oil. Deglaze the pan with the wine and reduce until the pan is almost dry.
2: Using a 4-ounce (115 g) ladle, add one ladle of boiling stock to the rice. Stir the rice until the stock is absorbed and the rice is almost dry. Continue adding stock 1 ladle at a time until the rice is tender, but still firm. It should be moist and creamy, but not runny.
3: Add the tomato basil bisque and stir to combine.
4: Remove the risotto from the heat, and stir in the butter and the Parmesan cheese.  Season with salt and pepper.
5: Heat the remaining 3 tablespoons of olive oil in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add the remaining teaspoon of minced garlic and the shrimp. Season with salt and white pepper. Add the peas and cook until the shrimp is pink and opaque, 4-5 minutes.
6: Remove the shrimp from the heat and sprinkle with parsley. Divide the risotto between 2 warm serving plates. Top each with half the shrimp and peas. Serve immediately.
7: Enjoy

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:baby potato (1 ½lb)、small carrots、pearl onions、beef chuck roast (3 ½lb)、salt、pepper、cornstarch (1tablespoon)、water (2tablespoons)、worcestershire sauce (2tablespoons)、fresh rosemary (2sprigs)、fresh thyme (2sprigs)、baguette
instructions:
0: In a slow cooker, add the potatoes, carrots, and onions to make a base for the meat.
1: Lay the chuck roast on top of the veggies and season with salt and pepper on both sides.
2: Wash your hands, because mess.
3: Mix cornstarch and water until well combined and pour close to the edge so it gets down to the veggies.
4: Pour Worcestershire sauce directly on top of the meat.
5: Cover with the slow-cooker lid and cook on high for 5 hours.
6: Place the rosemary and thyme sprigs on top of the meat and cook for 1 more hour.
7: Remove rosemary and thyme.
8: Using a fork, shred the meat and serve by itself with the veggies, or on top of bread for a sandwich! The juices from the bottom of the slow cooker make for an AMAZING dipping sauce!
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、chicken breasts、salt、pepper、garlic (2cloves)、ginger (1tablespoon)、water (2cups)、white rice (1cup)、soy sauce (½cup)、rice vinegar (1tablespoon)、honey (¼cup)、 sriracha (2tablespoons)、cornstarch (1tablespoon)、broccoli (1cup)、carrot (1cup)、red bell pepper、scallion
instructions:
0: Heat olive oil in a large nonstick pot on medium heat.
1: Add chicken, season with salt and pepper, and sauté for 8 minutes
2: Add garlic and ginger, sauté for 2 minutes until fragrant.
3: Add 2 cups (480 ml) of water and the rice and stir.
4: Cover the pot and bring water to a boil.
5: Uncover, stir, then reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking.
6: Add broccoli, carrots, and peppers. Stir to combine.
7: Add soy sauce, rice vinegar, honey, and Sriracha. Stir to combine.
8: Combine ¼ cup (60 ml) of water with the cornstarch to create a cornstarch slurry. Add the cornstarch slurry to the pot and stir, cooking until the sauce thickens (3-4 minutes).
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breast、salt、pepper、spaghetti (8oz)
instructions:
0: In a food processor, add all ingredients to make pesto and blend until walnuts are finely blended.
1: In a hot pan, add olive oil and cook chicken breast. Salt and pepper to taste.
2: Remove the chicken and slice.
3: Combine the chicken and pesto sauce into spaghetti and mix until the sauce fully coats the pasta.
4: Serve and top it off with parmesan cheese.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil、large yellow onion、mushroom (1cup)、sun-dried tomato (½cup)、garlic (3cloves)、white bean (15oz)、fire-roasted tomato (15oz)、artichoke heart (15oz)、balsamic vinegar (2tablespoons)、honey (1tablespoon)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、dried thyme (1teaspoon)、salt、pepper、fresh basil
instructions:
0: In a large skillet over medium heat, add the olive oil, onion, and mushrooms. Cook 5 minutes, or until the onion begins to turn translucent.
1: Add the sun-dried tomatoes and garlic. Stir and cook for another 3 minutes, or until fragrant.
2: Add the white beans, fire-roasted tomatoes, artichoke hearts, balsamic vinegar, honey, oregano, thyme, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine. Cover and reduce the heat to low. Let cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
3: Garnish with fresh basil and serve.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:oil (2tablespoons)、boneless, skinless chicken thighs (1lb)、paprika (1teaspoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、cajun seasoning (1tablespoon)、cayenne (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、andouille sausages、sweet onion、celery (2stalks)、green pepper、jalapeño、garlic (6cloves)、chicken stock (1 ½cups)、crushed tomato (2cups)、rice (3cups)、bay leaves、shrimp (1lb)
instructions:
0: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a 6-quart Dutch oven over medium- high heat. Add the chicken, paprika, black pepper, garlic powder, Cajun seasoning, cayenne, and salt. Stir to coat.
1: Once chicken is fully cooked, about 5 minutes, add the sausages and cook for 3 minutes.
2: Remove the chicken and sausage from the pot and set aside.
3: Using the same pot, add 1 tablespoon of oil to the pot. Add the onion, celery, green pepper, jalapeño, garlic, and 1 teaspoon of salt. Cook until vegetables are soft and tender, scraping any brown bits on the bottom of the pot, about 8-10 minutes.
4: Add chicken stock, crushed tomatoes, cooked rice, and bay leaves. Stir well and add the chicken and sausage back into the pot. Bring to a simmer.
5: Put the lid on and continue simmering for 10 minutes.
6: Stir in the shrimp. Put the lid back on and cook for 5 minutes, or until shrimp are cooked through.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breast (6oz)、smoked sweet paprika (2teaspoons)、fine sea salt、freshly ground black pepper、olive oil (5tablespoons)、dijon mustard (2teaspoons)、garlic (1clove)、lemon、fingerling potato (1lb)、whole milk greek yogurt (¾cup)、fresh parsley (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: Season the chicken breasts with paprika, salt, and pepper. Place in a shallow dish and add 2 tablespoons of the oil, 1 teaspoon of the mustard, the garlic, and half the lemon zest.
2: Toss until the chicken breasts are fully coated, then cover the dish and marinate at least 30 minutes, up to overnight.
3: On a baking sheet, toss the potato halves with 1 tablespoon of the olive oil. Season with salt and pepper and roast until tender and golden, 25 to 30 minutes.
4: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high. Remove the chicken breasts from the marinade, and working in two batches, cook until golden brown on one side, 6 to 8 minutes. Flip each breast and continue to cook until the chicken is cooked through, 2 to 4 minutes longer. Transfer to a serving platter and repeat with the remaining oil and breasts.
5: In a small bowl, stir together the yogurt with the remaining 1 teaspoon mustard, lemon zest, salt, pepper and the parsley.
6: Serve the chicken with the yogurt and potato wedges.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:turkey (15lb)、kosher salt (¼cup)、dark brown sugar (2tablespoons)、freshly ground black pepper (1tablespoon)、granulated garlic (1tablespoon)、cooking oil
instructions:
0: The day before serving, prepare the turkey for brining. Pat dry with paper towels.
1: Set the neck aside for the stock. Cut off the wing tips and set aside with the neck.
2: Butcher the turkey into 8 pieces: 2 breasts, 2 legs, 2 thighs, and 2 wings. Set aside the carcass for the stock.
3: Combine the salt, brown sugar, pepper, and granulated garlic in a small bowl.
4: Set a wire rack inside a baking sheet. Place the turkey parts skin-side up on the rack and generously sprinkle with the seasoning blend. Refrigerate, uncovered, for at least 2 hours, or overnight.
5: Make the stock: Preheat the oven to 450˚F (230˚C).
6: Place the turkey carcass, wing tips, and neck on a baking sheet with the onion, carrots, and celery. Season lightly with salt and drizzle with oil.
7: Roast for 30-45 minutes, or until the carcass and vegetables are deep brown.
8: Transfer the roasted vegetables, turkey carcass, and other parts to a large stock pot.
9: From the still-warm baking sheet from roasting the carcass, pour any rendered fat into a small bowl. Add about 1 cup (240 ml) of water to the pan and scrape off any browned bits from roasting process, then pour into a separate bowl. Reserve for the gravy.
10: Strain the stock, discarding the solids. The stock will keep for 5 days in the refrigerator or for 3 months in the freezer.
11: Cover the carcass with cold water. Add the bay leaves and bring to a gentle simmer over medium heat. Continue to simmer (don’t boil!) for 3 hours.
12: Make the gravy: Heat a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add the turkey fat and flour, stirring to combine. Cook the fat and flour together, stirring constantly, for about 5 minutes. This is a roux--you are cooking out the raw flour taste and deepening the flavor.
13: Gradually add the stock to the roux, stirring constantly to prevent lumps. Bring to a boil, continuing to stir until thickened. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
14: Remove the pan from the heat and let cool to room temperature. Store in the refrigerator until ready to warm for serving with the turkey. The gravy will keep in the fridge for up to 5 days, or in the freezer for up to 3 months.
15: 2 hours before you are ready to serve the turkey, preheat the oven to 425°F (220˚C).
16: Remove the turkey parts from the fridge and drizzle with oil before placing in the hot oven.
17: Roast for 30 minutes, then rotate the baking sheet to ensure even browning. Reduce the oven temperature to 400˚F (200˚C).
18: Continue roasting until an instant-read thermometer inserted into the thickest part of breast registers 160°F (70˚C).
19: Or when the thigh registers 170˚F (77˚C). Start checking after about 20 minutes, removing any parts from the oven as they reach proper temperature so that they don’t overcook.
20: Once all parts are done, loosely cover with foil and let rest for 5-10 minutes while you warm the gravy.
21: Add the gravy and sage, if using, to a medium saucepan over low heat and bring to a simmer, stirring occasionally. Season to taste with more salt and pepper, if needed.
22: Serve the turkey with the gravy and your favorite Thanksgiving dishes.
23: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:brown sugar (⅔cup)、soy sauce (1cup)、lemon juice (¼cup)、sesame seeds (1tablespoon)、fresh ginger (1teaspoon)、garlic (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Make the teriyaki sauce: In a liquid measuring cup or medium bowl, combine the brown sugar, soy sauce, lemon juice, sesame seeds, ginger, and garlic. Whisk to combine and dissolve the sugar.
1: Butterfly the chicken breasts, then place in a high-walled baking dish. Pour the teriyaki sauce over the chicken, reserving ½ cup (120 ml) of the sauce. Cover the dish with plastic wrap and marinate the chicken in the refrigerator for 20 minutes.
2: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C). Line a baking sheet with foil.
3: Make the dressing: While whisking, slowly drizzle the olive oil into the reserved teriyaki sauce.
4: Transfer the marinated chicken breasts to the prepared baking sheet. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 160˚F (70˚C). Let cool for 10 minutes.
5: In a medium bowl, use 2 forks to shred the chicken. Pour ¼ cup (60 ml) dressing over the chicken and toss to coat.
6: Prepare the salad: Add the lettuce to a large bowl. Top with the mango, bell peppers, green beans, avocado, and shredded chicken. Add the remaining dressing and toss well.
7: Divide between serving bowls and top with the scallions.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:zucchinis、salt (1tablespoon)、large egg、ricotta cheese (1cup)、bread crumbs (1cup)、italian seasoning (1tablespoon)、fresh basil (3tablespoons)、fresh parsley (3tablespoons)、pepper (1teaspoon)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、medium onion、garlic (2cloves)
instructions:
0: Cut off the bottoms of each zucchini and use a cheese grater or box grater to shred into a large bowl. Sprinkle salt on top, toss, and let rest in a colander in the sink for 20 minutes to pull out excess moisture.
1: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
2: Using a dish towel, squeeze out excess liquid from the shredded zucchini. Move the zucchini to a dry bowl and add the egg, ricotta bread crumbs, Italian seasoning, basil, parsley, pepper, olive oil, onion, and garlic. Stir until evenly mixed, then form the mixture into golf ball-sized balls.
3: Bake for 30-40 minutes, or until browned, flipping halfway through.
4: Serve over pasta with marinara sauce.
5: Enoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:McCormick® Jazzy Spice Blend (1tablespoon)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、freshly ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、raw shrimp (1lb)
instructions:
0: Make the shrimp: In a medium bowl, mix together the Jazzy Spice Blend, salt, and pepper. Add the shrimp and toss to coat thoroughly. Cover with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator for 1 hour.
1: Make the grits: In a large saucepan over high heat, bring the water or stock to a boil. Once boiling, whisk in the grits. Reduce the heat to low and simmer, whisking often, until the grits begin to thicken. If the grits are bubbling and spurting too much, cover the pot partially with a lid, but make sure not to cover fully. Continue whisking frequently until the grits are tender, about 1 hour. If the grits get too thick before they are fully cooked, add ¼ cup cooking liquid at a time. Once cooked, stir in the cheddar cheese, butter, salt, and pepper. Keep warm before serving.
2: While the grits are cooking, place the bacon strips in a cold medium skillet. Turn the heat to medium-low and cook the bacon until crispy, 2-3 minutes per side. Remove the bacon from the pan, leaving the bacon fat behind, and drain on paper towels. Once the bacon is cool, chop and reserve.
3: Add the garlic to the bacon fat in the pan and cook for 1-2 minutes over medium low heat until fragrant. Add the shrimp, white wine, and chicken stock to pan. Cook until the shrimp are pink and opaque, then remove from the pan.
4: Return chopped bacon to pan and cook for about a minute, until the liquid in the pan reduces slightly to make a sauce.
5: Spoon the grits into bowls and top with the shrimp. Spoon the bacon sauce over the shrimp and garnish with chives.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pizza sauce (½cup)、shredded mozzarella cheese (¼cup)、mini pepperoni (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C).
1: On a cutting board, arrange the bagel halves cut side-up. Spread 2 tablespoons of pizza sauce in an even layer over each half, then top each with 1 tablespoon of mozzarella and 1 tablespoon of mini pepperoni.
2: Place the bagel halves on a rimmed baking sheet and bake until the cheese has melted, about 8 minutes. Serve immediately.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:black beans (15oz)、jarred roasted red pepper (½cup)、garlic (1clove)、cayenne pepper (¼teaspoon)、cumin (½teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、cornmeal (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
1: In a large bowl, microwave black beans for 1 minute, or until softened.
2: Add roasted red peppers, garlic, cayenne, cumin, and salt. Mash until black beans are finely mashed.
3: Add cornmeal and mix until thoroughly combined.
4: Using a ½ cup (120 ml) measuring cup, portion 5 patties from the mixture. Place onto a lightly greased parchment paper-lined sheet pan.
5: Bake for 30 minutes, or until firm and browned, flipping over halfway through.
6: Serve burgers with your favorite fixins.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
