ingredients:bean chili (15oz)、tomato sauce (8oz)、tortillas、shredded cheddar cheese (2cups)
instructions:
0: In a bowl, add the chili and tomato sauce and stir to combine.
1: Add a layer of the chili mixture to the bottom of a 9x9-inch (23x23-cm) baking pan. Top with a layer of tortillas, a layer of chili, and sprinkle with cheese.
2: Repeat until all ingredients are used, making sure the top layer is cheese.
3: Cover and refrigerate for at least 3 hours, up to overnight.
4: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
5: Remove the casserole from the refrigerator and let sit for 10 minutes on your counter.
6: Poke three toothpicks in the casserole, and cover with tin foil, so that the foil doesn’t touch the cheese layer.
7: Bake for 30-40 minutes, or until cheese is melted.
8: Cut and serve.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bacon (5strips)、cream cheese (4oz)、green onion (¼cup)、shredded sharp cheddar cheese (1cup)、ground beef (1lb)、salt、pepper、cheddar cheese (4slices)、hamburger buns
instructions:
0: In a pan over medium-high heat, add the bacon, and cook until crispy. Transfer to a cutting board and roughly chop.
1: In a bowl, add the bacon, cream cheese, green onions, and shredded cheddar. Mix well.
2: Divide the ground beef into four even portions and shape into balls. Form a well into the center of each, large enough for the cheese mixture.
3: Place a quarter of the cheese mixture into the center of each ball, and enclose inside the ground beef. Gently press each ball into a patty shape, and season both sides generously with salt and pepper.
4: Heat a cast-iron pan over medium-high heat. Once hot, add the burgers and cook for 4-5 minutes on one side.
5: Flip the burgers, and cook for 2 minutes. Add a slice of cheese on each burger and cook for an additional 2 minutes, until the burger is cooked through and the cheese is melted.
6: Remove burgers from pan, and place on top a toasted burger bun. Top with condiments of your choice.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:water (2cups)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、sushi rice (1cup)、sugar (1tablespoon)、rice vinegar (¼cup)、canola oil (1tablespoon)、panko breadcrumbs (⅓cup)、pepper (½teaspoon)、mayonnaise (¼cup)、siracha (1tablespoon)、crab (16oz)、persian cucumber、radishes、nori (2tablespoons)、scallion (1bunch)、sesame seed (1tablespoon)、pickled ginger (2tablespoons)、avocado
instructions:
0: In a small pot, season the water with a pinch of salt. Bring to a boil over high heat. Add the rinsed rice and return to a boil. Cover, reduce the heat to simmer, and cook for 20 minutes, until the water is absorbed and the rice is tender.
1: In a small bowl, stir together the sugar, salt, and rice vinegar. Microwave for 2 minutes, or until the sugar dissolves.
2: Transfer the cooked rice to a medium bowl and pour the vinegar mixture over it, then stir well using a wooden spoon.
3: Heat the canola oil in a medium pan over medium-high heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the panko and cook, stirring frequently, until golden brown, 1-2 minutes. Season with salt and pepper, and remove from the heat.
4: In a small bowl, stir together the mayonnaise and Sriracha until smooth.
5: To assemble the bowls, divide the seasoned rice between 2 serving bowls. Top with the crab, crispy panko, cucumber, radish, nori, scallions, sesame seeds, pickled ginger, and avocado. Drizzle the Sriracha mayonnaise over the top.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless chicken breasts、salt、pepper、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、onion powder (1tablespoon)、dried oregano (2tablespoons)、dried basil (2tablespoons)、spaghetti (½lb)、marinara sauce (4cups)、shredded mozzarella cheese (2cups)、shredded parmesan cheese (½cup)、italian bread crumbs (1cup)
instructions:
0: Season both sides of chicken breasts with salt, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, and basil.
1: Sear in an oiled pan over high heat until the outside is brown and crisp, about 5 minutes per side.
2: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
3: Transfer chicken to a cutting board and dice.
4: Place spaghetti in a greased 9x13 (23x32 cm) glass baking dish. Spread 2 cups (510g) of marinara over spaghetti.
5: Layer on the chicken, remaining marinara, mozzarella, parmesan, and bread crumbs. Bake for 35 minutes.
6: In a bowl, combine broccoli, oil, salt, and pepper. Place on a baking sheet, and bake 15 minutes.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:basmati rice (1cup)、red bell pepper (¼cup)、carrot (¼cup)、jalapeño (¼cup)、salt (4teaspoons)、Thai Kitchen® coconut milk (1can)、water (¼cup)、cod fillets (24oz)、ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、McCormick® dried cilantro leaves (1teaspoon)、vegetable oil (1tablespoon)、Lime wedge
instructions:
0: In a medium saucepan, combine the rice, bell pepper, carrots, jalapeño, 2 teaspoons salt, Thai Kitchen coconut milk, and water, then stir to combine. Turn the heat to medium-high and bring to a boil. Cover, reduce the heat to low, and simmer for 10–12 minutes or until the rice is tender and the liquid has been absorbed.
1: Meanwhile, season the cod fillets on both sides with the remaining 2 teaspoons of salt, the pepper, and McCormick Dried Cilantro Leaves.
2: In a large skillet, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Once the oil is almost smoking, lay each fillet in the pan. Sear until fish releases from pan with ease and is golden brown, about 5 minutes. Using a fish spatula, flip each fillet and sear on the other side until cooked through, about 3 minutes.
3: To serve, scoop rice onto each plate and top with a cod fillet. Serve with lime wedges.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:red onion、broccoli florets (2cups)、yellow bell pepper、baby carrots (2cups)、cherry tomatoes (1 ½cups)、olive oil (3tablespoons)、salt、pepper、fresh thyme (10sprigs)、garlic (3cloves)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F/200˚C.
1: Place red onion, broccoli, yellow bell pepper, baby carrots, and cherry tomatoes evenly on a baking tray. (Try not to let the vegetables overlap too much so they roast properly.)
2: Season with olive oil, salt, and pepper (to taste).
3: Add sprigs of thyme and garlic clove halves on top of the vegetables.
4: Tear off four pieces of aluminum foil, approximately 12 in x 12 in (30 x 30 cm).
5: Lay down the foil and place the chicken breast in the center for each one.
6: Season both sides of the chicken with olive oil, salt, pepper, and paprika (all to taste).
7: Add sprigs of thyme and garlic clove on top of each chicken breast.
8: Bring the top and bottom edge of the foil into the center and fold a couple of times. Fold in the left and right sides a couple of times to seal the foil pack.
9: Place all 4 chicken foil packs on a baking tray.
10: Bake for 30 minutes.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsalted butter (4tablespoons)、all-purpose flour (4tablespoons)、chicken broth (2cups)、salt、freshly ground black pepper、cayenne pepper (1pinch)、heavy cream (2tablespoons)、cooked boneless, skinless chicken (2lb)、carrot (½lb)、red-skinned potato (½lb)、frozen peas (½cup)、puff pastry (½lb)、black truffle、large egg
instructions:
0: Melt the butter in a large, deep saucepan.
1: Add the flour and whisk to ensure there are no lumps before adding the chicken stock. Cook for 5-10 minutes while continuously stirring.
2: Check the consistency by dipping the back of a spoon into the sauce and running your finger along the spoon. You want the sauce to cling to the spoon and not run over the swipe you made.
3: Continue to cook and stir the sauce over medium heat until you reach the correct consistency. Season with the salt, pepper, and cayenne (if using). Taste the sauce and see if your sauce needs more seasoning.
4: Add the cream and stir to combine.
5: Add the shredded chicken, carrots, potatoes, and peas to the sauce. Cook the vegetables in the sauce for 2-3 minutes.
6: Transfer the filling to a clean bowl and chill in the refrigerator for 1 hour, or until cool.
7: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
8: Roll out the puff pastry, using a bit of extra flour to ensure the pastry doesn't stick to your work surface. Use a bowl or plate about an inch (2 cm) larger than the dish you are cooking your pot pie in as a guide to cut out your pastry.
9: Carefully spoon the chilled filling into oven-proof serving bowls.
10: Break the egg in a small bowl and add a tablespoon of water or cream. Whisk with a fork.
11: Brush the egg wash on the edges and rim of your dishes.
12: If desired, shave truffles over the filling. Lay the pastry rounds over the top, being careful not to stretch the pastry. Seal the edges of the pastry by lightly pushing it onto the rim of your dish to make sure it is secure.
13: Brush the top and sides with more egg wash.
14: Place the pot pies on a large baking sheet and bake for 25-35 minutes, until the pastry is a nice golden, dark brown and there are no more grayish raw patches.
15: Let cool for 5 minutes before serving.
16: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sweet potatoes、olive oil (2tablespoons)、wild  mushroom (6oz)、butter (7tablespoons)、fresh sage (1sprig)、chicken stock (½cup)、cooked penne (¾lb)、sherry wine vinegar (1teaspoon)、grated parmesan cheese (½cup)、salt、pepper、amaretti cookies、fresh chives (½cup)
instructions:
0: Use a fork to poke holes into 1 sweet potato. Wrap the sweet potato in a damp paper towel and microwave on high for 10-12 minutes, until fork-tender.
1: Peel and dice the other sweet potato into 1-centimeter (½ inch) cubes.
2: Carefully scoop the pulp of the cooked sweet potato into a food processor or blender. Add about 1 teaspoon each of salt and pepper and blend under smooth. Add a splash of water if the puree is too thick.
3: In a pan over medium heat, add 1 tablespoon olive oil and the mushrooms. Cook until the mushrooms start to crisp, about 3 minutes.
4: Add 1 teaspoon each salt and pepper to the mushrooms and remove from the heat. Drain the mushrooms of excess oil in a paper towel-lined bowl.
5: Add 6 tablespoons of the butter and sage to the pan and cook until brown bits start to form on the bottom, being very careful to not burn the butter.
6: Once slightly brown, remove the sage and add the cubed sweet potato and 1 teaspoon each of salt and pepper. Cook about 5 minutes, until the potato becomes tender.
7: Stir in the reserved purée and chicken stock. Simmer for two minutes, until the sauce thickens slightly and the mixture comes together smoothly.
8: Add the penne and mushrooms and coat evenly in the sauce.
9: Finish the pasta with 1 tablespoon butter, 1 tablespoon of olive oil, and sherry wine vinegar, stirring to combine. Remove from heat and stir in the Parmesan cheese.
10: Serve warm, garnished with chives, crushed amaretti cookies, and more Parmesan.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、onion、yellow bell pepper、red bell pepper、green pepper、fajita spice mix (2tablespoons)、salsa (3tablespoons)、cheddar cheese (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Slice into the chicken several times, about ¼ inch (½ cm) apart, but only cut about 85% of the way through, leaving the bottom intact.
2: Cook the onions and peppers over a medium heat until softened, then stir in the fajita mix.
3: Stir in the salsa and sprinkle the cheese over.
4: Mix together until the cheese has melted.
5: Allow to cool to the touch, and then fill each segment of the chicken breast with about 1 teaspoon of the mixture.
6: Bake in the centre of the oven for 18-22 minutes until the chicken is cooked through and the juices run clear.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium tomatillo (1lb)、medium white onion、serrano pepper、garlic (3cloves)、water、fresh cilantro (½bunch)、kosher salt (1tablespoon)、low sodium chicken stock (½cup)、vegetable oil (¼cup)、corn tortilla (12thick slices)、shredded rotisserie chicken (3cups)、queso fresco (5oz)、medium white onion、mexican crema (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Add the tomatillos, onion, serrano peppers, and garlic to a medium saucepan. Pour in enough water to just cover. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat and cook until the vegetables are very tender and the tomatillos have changed color, 8–10 minutes.
1: Use a slotted spoon to transfer the cooked vegetables to a blender and discard the cooking liquid. Purée the vegetables until broken down. Add the chopped cilantro, salt, and chicken stock. Blend the salsa until smooth. It should be speckled and thick.
2: Heat 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. When the oil is shimmering, add the salsa verde to the pan. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to maintain a strong simmer. Cook until the salsa deepens in color and thickens slightly, about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Pour the salsa into a medium bowl and set aside. Wipe out the pan with a paper towel.
3: Heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in the same pan over medium-high heat. Working 2 at a time, fry the tortillas for 1 minute per side, until starting to brown but not completely fried. They should be crisp around the edges but still pliable enough to roll. Transfer the tortillas to a paper towel-lined baking sheet to drain.
4: Set a rack in the center of the oven and turn on the broiler.
5: Spread ½ cup of the salsa verde over the bottom of a 9 x 13-inch (22 x 33 cm) baking dish.
6: Assemble the enchiladas: Dip a tortilla in the remaining salsa verde so both sides are coated. Place the tortilla on a flat surface and add about 4 tablespoons of shredded chicken to the center. Roll tightly. Place the filled tortilla, seam-side down, in the baking dish. Repeat with the remaining ingredients.
7: Pour any remaining salsa over the top of the enchiladas, then sprinkle with the queso fresco.
8: Broil the enchiladas until the cheese is just melted, 2–4 minutes.
9: Serve the enchiladas warm with the diced onion, Mexican crema, and cilantro leaves for topping
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large sweet potato、olive oil (1tablespoon)、salt (1pinch)、rotisserie chicken breast、red cabbage (1cup)、barbecue sauce (⅓cup)、green onions (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a small baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: Using a sharp knife, carve out one of the breasts from the rotisserie chicken. If the chicken is particularly small, use both breasts. Chop the chicken breast into very small pieces and set aside.
2: Use a fork to poke holes all over the sweet potato. Transfer the sweet potato to the prepared baking sheet.
3: Bake for 40-50 minutes, until the sweet potato is tender when pierced with a paring knife or skewer.
4: Add the cabbage to a medium skillet over medium heat. Add the barbecue sauce and sauté until the cabbage starts to soften, about 3 minutes.
5: Add the chopped chicken and stir just to incorporate. Remove the pan from the heat.
6: Once the sweet potato is cool enough to handle, slice it in half lengthwise and scoop out the flesh with a spoon until a ¼-inch (6 mm) layer remains.
7: Fill the sweet potato skins with the chicken and cabbage filling, drizzle with barbecue sauce, and top with the sliced green onions.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:jalapeño、cream cheese (2oz)、cheddar cheese (½cup)、boneless, skinless chicken breasts、salt、flour (2cups)、eggs、bread crumbs (2cups)、oil (1cup)
instructions:
0: Dice a jalapeño. Then add it in a medium bowl and mix with cream cheese and cheddar cheese.
1: Salt your chicken breasts. Cut a pocket into the side of each chicken breast. Stuff the pockets evenly with the jalapeño mixture. Press the edges of the chicken together to seal the pocket.
2: Separate the flour, eggs, and bread crumbs into 3 separate bowls.
3: Dip the stuffed chicken in the flour, then the egg, then the bread crumbs, coating it evenly.
4: Heat the oil in a large pan over medium heat. Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
5: Fry the chicken until golden brown on both sides.
6: Transfer the chicken to a baking dish, then bake for 20 minutes. Serve!
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、butternut squash (2cups)、salt (1teaspoon)、garlic (3cloves)、ground turkey (1lb)、italian seasoning (2teaspoons)、red pepper flakes (1teaspoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、spinach (2cups)、salt (1teaspoon)、ricotta cheese (15oz)、egg、parmesan cheese (¼cup)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Heat olive oil in a large pan.
1: Add the butternut squash and salt, and sauté for a few minutes.
2: Then add garlic, turkey, Italian seasoning, pepper flakes, and black pepper, and stir until meat is fully cooked.
3: Add in spinach and salt until the spinach is wilted.
4: In a large bowl, add ricotta, egg, cheese, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Mix well.
5: Add the cooked squash mixture into the bowl. Mix until evenly blended.
6: Cook a box of jumbo shell pasta al dente. Set aside in a bowl covered in olive oil to prevent sticking.
7: Heat butter in a medium pan. Once melted, add in flour.
8: Cook the flour until it turns light brown.
9: Add milk to the pan and stir continuously until the sauce thickens.
10: Add a pinch of salt and pepper.
11: In a casserole dish, sheet the sauce on the bottom.
12: Stuff each jumbo shell pasta with the stuffing and place on top of the sauce.
13: Bake at 400°F (200°C) covered for 30 minutes.
14: Sprinkle parmesan cheese and bake again for 5 minutes until the cheese melts.
15: Garnish with parsley.
16: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:rotisserie chicken (1cup)、BBQ sauce (⅛cup)、whole wheat pita bread、shredded mozzarella cheese (1handful)、red onion (1handful)、fresh cilantro
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: In a small bowl, combine chicken and bbq sauce well. Set aside.
2: Place pita bread on a baking sheet lined with parchment and spread bbq sauce over it.
3: Add the chicken to the pita and sprinkle with mozzarella and red onion, to taste.
4: Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until cheese is melted and chicken is heated through.
5: Garnish with fresh cilantro, slice, and serve.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:green bell pepper、red bell pepper、onion、olive oil、salt、pepper、chicken breast、parchment paper
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Place bell peppers and onions into mixing bowl and thoroughly coat with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
2: Tear off a sheet of parchment paper, large enough to fold into a packet.
3: Place bell peppers and chicken breast on top of parchment paper. Season with the fajita seasoning.
4: Fold the edges of the parchment paper widthwise 2-3 times then twist the ends until fully closed.
5: Bake for 20-25 minutes or until internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cauliflower (1medium head)、mushroom (5oz)、olive oil (1 ½tablespoons)、medium yellow onion、garlic (2cloves)、ground cumin (2teaspoons)、smoked paprika (1 ½teaspoons)、chili powder (2tablespoons)、soy sauce (2tablespoons)、salt、pepper、corn tortilla、tomato、avocado、tomato salsa、fresh cilantro、lime wedge
instructions:
0: Cut the cauliflower in half and break it into small florets.
1: Place the florets in a food processor and pulse until they break down to rice-size pieces. Remove from the processor and set aside.
2: Add the mushrooms to the food processor and pulse until broken down to rice-size pieces.
3: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic to the pan and cook for about 4 minutes, until fragrant and the onion is translucent.
4: Add the cauliflower, mushrooms, cumin, smoked paprika, chili powder, soy sauce, salt, and pepper and stir. Cook for about 10 minutes, until the cauliflower and mushroom mixture is tender and the water released from the mushrooms has evaporated.
5: Add the cauliflower “meat” to the tortilla, along with your favorite toppings. Serve with a lime wedge.
6: If you have leftovers, the cauliflower “meat” will keep refrigerated in an airtight container for about 2 days.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:skirt steak (1lb)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、salt、pepper、chili powder (1teaspoon)、cumin (1teaspoon)、onion、garlic (4cloves)、bell peppers、jalapeño pepper、butter (1tablespoon)、large tortillas、mexican blend cheese (2cups)、guacamole、sour cream、salsa
instructions:
0: Season skirt steak with olive oil, salt, pepper, chili powder, and cumin.
1: Cook on high heat for roughly 3 minutes each side, for medium-rare.
2: Let the steak rest for 10 minutes.
3: While the steak is resting, sauté onion and garlic until slightly translucent. Add bell peppers, jalapeño, salt, and pepper, cook slightly.
4: Slice the steak into strips.
5: Mix the steak into the pepper mix. Remove from heat and set aside.
6: In a clean pan, melt butter. Lay the tortilla on the buttered pan, add cheese, fajita mixture, more cheese, then top with another tortilla and pat it down.
7: Flip the quesadilla over and cook the other side until it’s golden.
8: Remove from pan and cut into quarters or eighths. Repeat these steps with the remaining tortillas.
9: Serve immediately with sour cream, salsa, and guacamole.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium potatoes、olive oil (4tablespoons)、medium onion、garlic (2cloves)、celery (2stalks)、frozen corn (1cup)、broccoli (1cup)、carrots、mushroom (1cup)、canned chickpea (1cup)、fresh parsley (½cup)、dried thyme (1teaspoon)、dried rosemary (1teaspoon)、fresh rosemary (1sprig)、fresh thyme (1sprig)、salt、pepper、flour (2tablespoons)、vegetable stock (2cups)、nutritional yeast (¼cup)、soy milk (2tablespoons)、refrigerated pie crust
instructions:
0: Bring a large pot of water to boil over high heat and add the potatoes. Cook in gently boiling water for 10-15 minutes, until they are tender and can easily be pierced with a fork.
1: Drain the potatoes in a colander.
2: Divide the potatoes into two medium bowls and mash half of them. Set aside.
3: Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat until the oil is shimmering.
4: Add the onion and garlic, and sauté until the onion is translucent, about 2 minutes.
5: Add the celery, corn, broccoli, carrot, mushrooms, chickpeas, parsley, dried thyme, and dried rosemary. Add salt and pepper to taste, and stir.
6: Add the fresh rosemary and thyme sprigs. Stir and cook over medium heat for about 15 minutes, until the vegetables are tender but still slightly firm.
7: Remove the rosemary and thyme sprigs.
8: Sprinkle the flour over the vegetables and mix well.
9: Pour in half of the vegetable stock and stir.
10: Add the nutritional yeast and stir well.
11: Pour in half of the remaining vegetable stock and cook for about 2 minutes while continuing to stir.
12: Incorporate the mashed potatoes and enough of the remaining stock to reach your desired consistency.
13: Add the diced potatoes and stir.
14: Pour the vegetable mixture into a 9-inch (23-cm) baking dish.
15: Mix 2 tablespoons olive oil and 2 tablespoons soy milk in a small mixing bowl.
16: Brush the outside edges of the baking dish with the mix using a brush or your fingers.
17: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
18: Place the pie crust dough over the top of the baking dish, pressing the edges to make it stick.
19: Brush the top of the dough lightly with the oil-soy milk wash.
20: Make a small X-shaped incision on the top of the crust.
21: Bake for about 45 minutes or until the pie crust is golden.
22: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bacon (16slices)、butter (1tablespoon)、garlic (4cloves)、heavy cream (2cups)、grated parmesan cheese (½cup)、fresh parsley (¼cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、black pepper (½teaspoon)、rotisserie chicken、lasagna noodles、mozzarella cheese (6slices)、spinach (1cup)
instructions:
0: Over a long sheet of saran wrap, lay 8 of the bacon strips down back to back. Lifting up every other strip, fold about 1-inch (2 cm) the bacon back on itself. Lay another slice of bacon perpendicular to the strips and fold the flaps back over the horizontal strip of bacon. Repeat with the rest of the bacon until a tight weave has formed. Set aside in the fridge.
1: In a medium saucepan, add the butter and garlic over medium heat, cooking until aromatic, about 30 seconds.
2: Add the cream, and bring to a boil.
3: Add in the Parmesan, parsley, salt, and pepper, stirring constantly until the cheese has melted and there are no lumps remaining.
4: Pour half of the mixture over the shredded chicken, reserving the other half to use a sauce in the end.
5: Mix the chicken with the sauce until thoroughly combined.
6: On a separate sheet of saran wrap, lay down the lasagna noodles, overlapping them slightly.
7: Spread the chicken mixture over the noodles, making sure that you leave about a 1-cm (½ inch) gap at the bottom so the noodles have room to roll on themselves.
8: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
9: Place the cheese slices evenly across the chicken, then press the spinach into a row centered between the cheese slices.
10: While one hand keeps the spinach flat, use the other hand to lift the saran wrap up and over, causing the noodles to roll on themselves. Make sure to roll tightly until the entire thing has come together into a neat rolled bundle.
11: Transfer the lasagna roll to the bottom of the bacon weave, and repeat the saran wrap rolling process until the bacon has tightly and completely wrapped the lasagna roll.
12: Unwrap and transfer to a baking tray.
13: Bake for about 25 minutes until the bacon is starting to get crispy but not too dark.
14: Cool for about 15 minutes, then transfer the roll to a cutting board.
15: Slice generous 1-inch (2 cm) thick portions, then serve with the remaining alfredo sauce.
16: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chickpeas (15oz)、sweet potato、garlic (1clove)、chili powder (1teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、BBQ sauce (¼cup)、cornmeal (¼cup)、scallions (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
1: In a large bowl, microwave chickpeas for 1 minute, or until softened.
2: Peel the cooked sweet potato, and add it to the bowl of chickpeas, along with the garlic, chili powder, and salt. Mash until chickpeas are finely mashed. Add cornmeal and scallions, and set aside.
3: For the barbecue sauce: In a medium-size bowl, combine tomato paste, water, maple syrup, apple cider vinegar, chili powder, garlic powder, and salt. Mix to combine.
4: Add barbecue sauce to the mashed chickpea mixture and mix until thoroughly combined.
5: Using a ½ cup (120 ml) measuring cup, portion 5 patties from the mixture. Place onto a lightly greased parchment-lined sheet pan.
6: Bake for 40 minutes, or until firm and browned, flipping over halfway through.
7: Serve with the remaining barbecue sauce and favorite fixins.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、pepper (2teaspoons)、onion powder (1tablespoon)、kosher salt (4teaspoons)、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、baby spinach (8oz)、sun-dried tomato (1cup)、canola oil (2cups)、panko breadcrumbs (2cups)、large eggs、all purpose flour (1cup)
instructions:
0: Make the chicken rolls: Butterfly the chicken breasts and season on both sides with 1 teaspoon of pepper, the onion powder, 2 teaspoons of salt, and the garlic powder.
1: Place a chicken breast between 2 sheets of plastic wrap and pound with a meat mallet, rolling pin, or heavy pan until about ¼ inch (6 mm) thick.
2: Remove the top sheet of plastic wrap and place a handful of baby spinach over the center of the chicken breast, then cover with ¼ cup (50 G) of sun-dried tomatoes. Starting from the bottom, tightly roll the chicken, using the plastic wrap to help. Wrap the chicken roll tightly in plastic wrap to secure. Repeat with the remaining ingredients.
3: Chill the chicken rolls in the fridge for 30–60 minutes.
4: Make the béchamel sauce: Melt the butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add the garlic and shallot and cook until softened and the onions are beginning to caramelize and become very fragrant, about 5 minutes. Stir in the spinach, sun-dried tomatoes, and diced tomatoes and cook until the spinach is wilted, about 3 minutes. Add the heavy cream and flour and stir to incorporate. Add the salt and pepper and bring to a boil. Stir in the Parmesan cheese and cook until the sauce thickens slightly, 5–7 minutes. Remove the pot from the heat and stir in the lemon juice.
5: Heat 2–3 (5 - 7 cm) inches of oil in a large heavy-bottomed pan over medium heat until it reaches 325°F (170°C).
6: Add the panko to a shallow dish and stir in 1 teaspoon of salt and ½ teaspoon pepper. Add the eggs to a separate shallow dish. Add the flour to a third shallow dish and stir in the remaining teaspoon of salt and ½ teaspoon pepper.
7: Remove the chicken rolls from the fridge and coat in the flour, then the eggs, then the bread crumbs.
8: Fry the breaded chicken rolls in the hot oil for about 5 minutes per side, or until the outside is an even golden brown and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C). You may need to work in batches, so as not to overcrowd the pan. If a good color is achieved and the chicken’s center is still not to temperature, place the chicken on a wire rack set over a baking sheet and finish cooking in the oven at 325°F (170°C) until the proper temperature is reached. Once the proper internal temperature is reached, place the rolls on a baking sheet lined with paper towels and a wire rack to cool slightly before slicing and serving.
9: Slice the chicken rolls and serve over a bed of spaghetti with the béchamel sauce and a green salad alongside.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground beef (2lb)、kosher salt (2tablespoons)、black pepper (1tablespoon)、ground cumin (1tablespoon)、chilli powder (1tablespoon)、smoked paprika (1tablespoon)、cayenne (1teaspoon)、large onion、red bell pepper、garlic (6cloves)、chipotle peppers in adobo sauce、tomato paste (12oz)、beef broth (2cups)、chopped tomato (12oz)、black beans (15oz)、red kidney bean (15oz)、apple cider vinegar (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, mix the flour, cornmeal, baking powder, and salt. Mix and make a little well in the center.
1: Add the milk, eggs, honey into the well, beat the eggs and liquid first, and then combine with the rest of the dry ingredients. Set aside until chili is almost finished.
2: In a large pot at medium high heat, add the beef, season with salt, pepper, cumin, chili powder, smoked paprika, cayenne, and cook until it is a deep brown color.
3: Add the onion, red bell peppers garlic, and chopped chipotles, and a pinch of salt. Cook until caramelized and soft, about 10 minutes.
4: Add the tomato paste and cook until the tomato paste gets dark and starts sticking to the bottom slightly.
5: Add in the canned diced tomatoes, beef broth, black beans, kidney beans, and apple cider vinegar (optional). Stir until all is well incorporated. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low to a simmer,
6: Scoop and shape the cornbread batter into golf ball sized dumplings and place in the simmering chili.
7: Put a lid on the Chili and steam/simmer the dumplings 20 minutes or until the dumplings are cooked through.
8: Serve with cheddar cheese, sour cream, and sliced scallions.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cremini mushroom (8oz)、cannellini bean (15oz)、small yellow onion、panko breadcrumbs (1 ¼cups)、fresh parsley (½cup)、garlic (3cloves)、dried rosemary (1teaspoon)、vegan worcestershire (1teaspoon)、soy sauce (1tablespoon)、ground nutmeg (¼teaspoon)、liquid smoke (½teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, combine the mushrooms, beans, onion, bread crumbs, parsley, garlic, dried rosemary, Worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, nutmeg, liquid smoke, salt, and pepper. Mix well with a fork, mashing the beans a bit to form a paste.
1: Heat the canola oil in a large pot over medium-high heat.
2: Roll the “meatball” mixture and into golf ball-sized balls. Place the balls in the pot and cook for 1 minute on each side until browned.
3: Add the vegetable broth, coconut milk, Worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, and flour, and gently stir until evenly combined.
4: Bring the liquid to a boil, then add the pasta. Stir constantly until the pasta is cooked and the liquid has reduced to a sauce that coats the noodles and meatballs, 7-8 minutes.
5: Garnish with parsley.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、yellow onion、garlic (2cloves)、black beans (1can)、corn (1can)、enchilada sauce (1 ½cups)、lime、salt (1teaspoon)、cumin (1teaspoon)、chili powder (½teaspoon)、zucchinis、shredded cheddar cheese (½cup)、sour cream、fresh cilantro
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
1: In a pan over medium heat, add the oil and the onions and cook until the onions are translucent.
2: Add the garlic and stir to combine.
3: Add the black beans, corn, 1 cup (290 g) of enchilada sauce, lime juice, salt, cumin, and chili powder, and stir until combined. Cook until just simmering. Set aside.
4: Cut off the end of each zucchini then using a vegetable peeler, peel each zucchini into wide strips.
5: Place 4-5 zucchini strips on a plate and spoon a large spoonful of filling at the bottom of the strips.
6: Fold the ends of the zucchini over the filling and continue to roll, tightly.
7: Transfer the zucchini rolls to a baking dish.
8: Spoon over the remaining enchilada sauce and top with cheese.
9: Bake for 15-20 minutes or until cheese is melted.
10: Serve with sour cream and cilantro.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil、medium yellow onion、green bell pepper、garlic (2cloves)、chili powder (½teaspoon)、cumin (½teaspoon)、paprika (½teaspoon)、salt、textured vegetable protein (1cup)、vegetable broth (1cup)、tomato sauce (15oz)、vegan worcestershire sauce (1teaspoon)、soy sauce (1tablespoon)、brown sugar (1teaspoon)、yellow mustard (2teaspoons)、hamburger buns
instructions:
0: In a medium skillet, heat a drizzle of olive oil over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook for 2-3 minutes, until semi-translucent.
1: Add the bell pepper and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until the onion is translucent.
2: Add the garlic, chili powder, cumin, paprika, and salt and cook 2-3 minutes more, until the garlic is soft and fragrant. Season with salt.
3: Add the textured vegetable protein, vegetable broth, and tomato sauce and stir well until combined. Cover and cook for 15 minutes, until most of the liquid has been absorbed.
4: Remove the lid and add the Worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, brown sugar, and yellow mustard. Mix to combine and cook for 3-4 more minutes, until the remaining liquid has been absorbed.
5: Serve on hamburger buns.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:dried whole wheat penne (4oz)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、yellow onion、red pepper flakes (¼teaspoon)、garlic (2cloves)、diced tomato (¾cup)、kosher salt (½teaspoon)、ground black pepper (¼teaspoon)、shredded rotisserie chicken (1cup)、baby spinach (1cup)
instructions:
0: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil over high heat and cook the pasta according to the package instructions. Reserve ¾ cup (175 ml) of pasta cooking water, then drain the pasta in a colander and place the pot back on the stove over medium heat
1: To the pot, add the olive oil, onion, red pepper flakes, and garlic. Cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes. Add the tomatoes and reserved pasta water, and simmer until reduced by half, about 4 minutes. Season with the salt and pepper.
2: Add the pasta back to the pot, along with the shredded chicken and spinach, and stir to combine and wilt the spinach.
3: Store the leftovers in the fridge for the rest of the week.
4: *Vegan/Vegetarian Substitution: Omit the shredded chicken.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breast (1 ¼cups)、orange、garlic (1teaspoon)、soy sauce (1tablespoon)、salt (1pinch)、pepper (1pinch)
instructions:
0: Combine all marinade ingredients with the chicken breast and leave to marinade in the fridge for 20 minutes.
1: Coat the chicken breast first in flour, then eggs, and finally panko breadcrumbs.
2: In a medium-sized saucepan heat the oil to 325˚F (170°C),
3: Deep fry the breaded chicken for about 3-4 minutes until the coating is golden brown and the chicken is cooked through.
4: In a small frying pan, combine the chicken stock, orange zests, orange juice, and sugar, then stir.  Bring the mixture to a boil.
5: Mix the cornflour with the water, then add the mixture to the pan to thicken the sauce.
6: Add the chicken to the frying pan and coat with the orange sauce.
7: Serve on top of rice and add toppings of your choice.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:spaghetti (12oz)、shiitake mushroom cap (3cups)、olive oil (3tablespoons)、smoked paprika (½teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (¼teaspoon)、cashews (½cup)、olive oil (¼cup)、unsweetened non-dairy milk (⅓cup)、garlic (3cloves)、nutritional yeast (1 ½tablespoons)、lemon juice (1 ½tablespoons)、pepper (½teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、paprika (¼teaspoon)、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
1: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
2: Toss shiitake mushrooms, oil, smoked paprika, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl.
3: Arrange mixture on parchment paper-lined baking sheet and bake for 7 minutes. Flip the mushrooms and continue baking for 7-8 minutes, or until mushrooms are crispy and brown.
4: Cool mushroom slices on baking sheet.
5: For the sauce, combine cashews, olive oil, garlic cloves, nutritional yeast, milk, lemon juice, pepper, salt, and paprika in a blender or food processor. Blend until smooth and creamy.
6: Drain water from pasta and return pasta to pot.
7: Add the sauce and stir until pasta is well-coated.
8: Mix in mushroom bacon.
9: Top with parsley.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken
instructions:
0: Remove the chicken’s backbone by using a pair of kitchen scissors. Turn it over and flatten it down to spread the chicken out as much as possible.
1: Blend together all of the marinade ingredients in a food processor and spread half of it over the chicken.
2: Cover and marinate in the fridge for at least 3 hours or overnight.
3: Roast in the centre of a preheated oven for 60 minutes at 200°C (400°F), or until the thickest part of the thigh is 75°C. Once the chicken is cooked through, allow to rest for 10 minutes before serving.
4: Simmer the other half of the marinade for 2-3 minutes to make the Peri Peri sauce.
5: Use as a dip for your chicken or mix some into mayonnaise or hummus!
6: To make Peri Peri Chips, just shake some smoked paprika, chili powder, garlic powder and white pepper into your chips!
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsalted butter (4tablespoons)、green chillis、large onion、garlic (1tablespoon)、ginger (1tablespoon)、tomato puree (1 ½cups)、ground coriander (1teaspoon)、paneer masala (1tablespoon)、red bell pepper、salt (1teaspoon)、heavy cream (2cups)、paneer cheese (14oz)
instructions:
0: Melt the butter in a 5qt-pot over medium heat.
1: Add chili, and cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the onion and saute until translucent, about 5 minutes. Add the crushed garlic and ginger and cook for 2-3 minutes, until fragrant. Stirring occasionally. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and cook until the onion is completely softened, about 10 minutes. Stir occasionally to make sure bottom doesn’t burn.
2: Add the tomato puree. Stir well and cover again. Cook until tomato looks like it’s almost separating, and is reduced in volume by half, about 10 minutes.
3: Add the coriander and paneer masala. Stir well. Add the red bell pepper and cook until the pepper is half-cooked, about 5 minutes. Add the salt, cover again, and cook for another 5 minutes.
4: Add the heavy cream. Stir well, then add the cubed paneer and cover. Cook for 25 minutes all the ingredients are tender.
5: Garnish with cilantro and serve with naan or rice.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、ground turkey (1lb)、onion (1cup)、green bell pepper (1cup)、salt、pepper、tomato (2cups)、garlic (3cloves)、dried thyme (½teaspoon)、dried basil (½teaspoon)、dried oregano (½teaspoon)、medium spaghetti squash、shredded mozzarella cheese (1cup)、green onion
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Heat the olive oil over medium heat in a large skillet.
2: Add the turkey and cook until browned, about 5-6 minutes.
3: Add the onion, bell pepper, salt, and pepper. Cook for 5-6 minutes.
4: Add the tomatoes, garlic, thyme, basil, and oregano. Cook for 2-3 minutes.
5: Add the spaghetti squash. Cook for 4-5 minutes until most of the liquid has cooked off.
6: Add half of the mozzarella and stir until cheese has melted, about 1-2 minutes.
7: Remove from heat and ladle the mixture into a baking dish.
8: Bake for 20 minutes.
9: Carefully remove then add the remaining mozzarella cheese.
10: Bake for an additional 10 minutes.
11: Carefully remove and allow to cool for 5-10 minutes.
12: Garnish with green onions, if desired and serve.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flax meal (1tablespoon)、water (3tablespoons)、olive oil (3tablespoons)、mushrooms (8oz)、soy sauce (1tablespoon)、smoked paprika (½teaspoon)、small onion、garlic (2cloves)、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、lentils (1 ½cups)、oats (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: To make the flax egg, combine the flax meal and water in a small bowl and stir. Set aside.
2: In a large saucepan, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat.
3: Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the mushrooms and cook until most of the juices have evaporated, 7-8 minutes.
4: Add the soy sauce and paprika and cook for 2-3 more minutes. Set aside in a large bowl.
5: Heat another tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook for 3-5 minutes, until semi-translucent. Add the garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Add the salt and pepper and cook for another 2 minutes.
6: Transfer the onion to a food processor, then add the lentils, oats, and flax egg. Pulse until chunky, about 10-15 pulses.
7: Transfer the lentil mixture to the bowl with the mushrooms. Mix well, using your hands if needed, then shape into 5 patties. Place on a baking sheet and cover with plastic wrap, then freeze for 20 minutes.
8: While the patties are freezing, prepare the fries. In a medium bowl, toss the potatoes, a drizzle of olive oil, the paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper until well-coated.
9: Spread the fries on a baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes.
10: Remove the patties from freezer. In a large saucepan, heat the remaining tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add 2-3 patties, careful not to overcrowd the pan. Cook for 5 minutes, then flip and cook for 5 minutes on other side. Repeat with the remaining patties.
11: To assemble the burgers, top each bun with a patty, then layer on dijon mustard, tomato slices, and arugula.
12: Serve the fries with ketchup.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cauliflower (1head)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、red pepper flakes (¼teaspoon)、sea salt (½teaspoon)、shredded parmesan cheese (¼cup)、large egg
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 450˚F (240˚F). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: Add the cauliflower to the bowl of a food processor and pulse until it becomes the size of rice. Transfer the cauliflower to a microwave-safe bowl and microwave on high for 3 minutes, or until it begins to steam. Remove the cauliflower and place on a clean kitchen towel. Wrap the towel around it and squeeze out as much liquid as possible; wait for the cauliflower to cool a bit if it's too hot to handle. 
2: Transfer the cauliflower to a large bowl and add the oregano, garlic powder, red pepper flakes, salt, Parmesan, and egg. Stir to combine. 
3: Transfer the mixture to the baking sheet and use your hands to form it into a round disk, ½-inch (1 cm) thick and 10-inches (25 cm) in diameter. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the crust begins to brown. 
4: Top the crust with your desired toppings and bake for another 10 minutes. 
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:yellow onion、red bell pepper、yellow bell pepper、green bell pepper、flank steak (1 ½lb)、taco seasoning (2tablespoons)、garlic (4cloves)、lime、diced tomato with green chilli (10oz)、flour tortilla、fresh cilantro、cotija cheese
instructions:
0: Place onions, peppers, and whole flank steak in the slow cooker. Top with taco seasoning, garlic, lime, and diced tomatoes.
1: Cover and cook on high for 4 hours or on low for 8 hours.
2: Remove steak from the slow cooker.
3: Optional: broil steak for 4-5 minutes until crisp for added texture.
4: Slice steak across the grain into thin strips.
5: Add the steak back into the slow cooker and combine with other ingredients.
6: Plate with tortillas of your choice and garnish with cilantro and cotija (optional).
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium zucchinis、oil (1tablespoon)、medium shrimp (1lb)、salt (1teaspoon)、black pepper (½teaspoon)、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、garlic (3cloves)、low-sodium chicken broth (¼cup)、lemon、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Using a coarse cheese grater, slide the zucchini down the grater, shaving of long strips. Rotate the zucchini constantly, grating all sides, until you reach the seeds in the center.
1: Heat the oil over medium-high heat in a large, nonstick skillet.
2: Add the shrimp in and season with the salt, black pepper, red pepper, and garlic.  Sauté the shrimp, until they evenly begin to show a pink color, about 3 minutes.
3: Pour in the chicken broth and lemon juice, and let the liquid come to a simmer.
4: Add the zucchini noodles and stir until everything is combined and the shrimp are fully cooked.
5: Sprinkle with chopped fresh parsley leaves and serve.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cooking oil (1tablespoon)、white onion、garlic (2cloves)、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、dried sage (½teaspoon)、almond milk (1 ½cups)、pumpkin puree (15oz)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、nutmeg (¼teaspoon)、whole wheat pasta (½box)
instructions:
0: Heat the oil in a medium pot over medium heat. Add the onion, garlic, red pepper flakes, and dried sage and cook until onions are translucent, stirring occasionally.
1: Add the almond milk, pumpkin puree, salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Stir until a smooth, creamy sauce forms. Heat through.
2: Add the cooked pasta and and stir to coat.
3: Serve warm.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:oil (2teaspoons)、onion (½cup)、garlic (2cloves)、red bell pepper (⅓cup)、green bell pepper (⅓cup)、yellow bell pepper (⅓cup)、ground beef (1lb)、taco seasoning (1tablespoon)、jumbo shell (1lb)、enchilada sauce (1cup)、mexican blend cheese (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: In a skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat and cook onions, garlic, and peppers until translucent.
2: Add ground beef and taco seasoning, and cook until browned.
3: Fill cooked shells with beef and place in a baking dish.
4: Pour enchilada sauce over the stuffed shells and cover with cheese.
5: Bake for 15 minutes or until cheese is browned.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ricotta cheese (½cup)、fresh spinach (¼cup)、fresh parsley (2tablespoons)、grated parmesan cheese (2tablespoons)、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (¼teaspoon)、marinara sauce (¼cup)、no-boil lasagna noodles、shredded mozzarella cheese (½cup)
instructions:
0: In a small bowl, mix the ricotta, spinach, parsley, one tablespoon of Parmesan, salt, and pepper until combined.
1: In the glass container, spread a layer of tomato sauce. Top the tomato sauce with the lasagna noodles.
2: Cover the noodles with a layer of the ricotta mixture, then mozzarella.
3: Continue with another layer of noodles, ricotta, tomato sauce, then mozzarella. Repeat.
4: Cover the top layer of lasagna noodles with more tomato sauce and a layer of mozzarella and Parmesan.
5: Place the lid on the glass container, without sealing it closed.
6: Microwave for 7 minutes or until the cheese is melted through.
7: Remove from the microwave carefully, the container will be hot!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:diced beef (1lb)、plain flour (½cup)、olive oil、onion、carrots、celery (2stems)、tomato puree (2tablespoons)、garlic (2cloves)、fresh rosemary (1pinch)、chopped tomato (1cup)、red wine (½cup)、beef stock (1 ¼cups)、large potatoes、butter (2tablespoons)、salt、pepper、fresh thyme、gruyère cheese (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 180°C (350˚F).
1: Add salt and pepper to the flour and use it to coat the diced beef. Brown off beef in a deep ovenproof pan with olive oil. Remove from pan.
2: Add more oil and fry the onions until translucent. Add the carrots and celery and fry for another 3-5 minutes. Add the garlic and fry for 2 minutes together with the beef.
3: Add in the tomato puree and rosemary and fry for a further 2-3 minutes. Add the chopped tomato and cook for 2 minutes.
4: Add the red wine and allow to reduce slightly. Add the beef stock and allow to reduce for 10 minutes.
5: Cover the pot with a lid and cook for 2 hours.
6: Remove and cover the top of the stew with thinly-chopped peeled potatoes, arranged so they are overlapping slightly.
7: Cover with melted butter, salt, pepper, and thyme and cook for a further 45 minutes at 200°C (400˚F) with the lid off.
8: Remove from oven once potatoes are cooked and cover with the grated gruyere. Grill on high for 5-10 minutes until cheese is bubbling.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butternut squash (2cups)、onion、garlic (3cloves)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、salt、pepper、brown sugar (1tablespoon)、grated parmesan cheese (2oz)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚C).
1: Add the diced butternut squash, chopped onion, whole garlic cloves, olive oil, salt, and pepper to a baking sheet, tossing until fully coated.
2: Bake until the squash is golden brown and tender, about 30 minutes.
3: While the squash is in the oven, make the dough.
4: When the squash is finished cooking, add it to the food processor along with the brown sugar and Parmesan cheese. Pulse until it becomes smooth. Set aside to chill.
5: Rinse the bowl of the food processor.
6: To the bowl of a food processor, add the flour, eggs, and olive oil, and pulse until the dough comes together into a large ball and swirls around the processor.
7: Remove the dough, wrap in plastic wrap, and rest it the refrigerator for 30 minutes.
8: Cut 2 ounces (55 g) of pasta dough from the ball and roll out into large, wide, thin sheets of pasta.
9: Lay a sheet over an empty ice cube tray, and press the dough down gently into each of the holes.
10: Fill each hole with a tablespoon of the butternut squash filling. Place a second sheet on top of the ice cube tray. Press down on all the sides of the raviolis. Flip the ice cup tray over to release the pasta and cut off any excess dough.
11: Separate each ravioli with a knife or cutting tool.
12: Gently place a few raviolis into boiling salted water and cook until the raviolis float and firm up slightly, 2-3 minutes. Scoop out the ravioli and set aside briefly to cook a new batch or dump out the water and start the hazelnut brown butter sauce.
13: In a pan, add 3 tablespoons of the butter, sage leaves, and hazelnuts. Cook until the butter browns deeply, the nuts are heated through, and the sage is fried and crispy. Turn off the heat and add the lemon juice and season to taste.
14: Swirl in 2 more tablespoons more of chilled butter, to thicken the sauce. Add the cooked raviolis back in and toss gently to coat the pasta.
15: Serve the pasta with brown butter sauce.
16: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cream cheese (8oz)、shredded mozzarella cheese (1 ½cups)、spinach (5oz)、artichoke heart (16oz)、grated parmesan cheese (½cup)、sour cream (¾cup)、milk (1cup)、frozen ravioli (20oz)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375ºF (190ºC).
1: In a large bowl, mix together the cream cheese, mozzarella, spinach, artichoke hearts, Parmesan cheese, sour cream, and milk.
2: Pour a third of the spinach artichoke mixture in a large glass baking dish and spread it evenly over the bottom.
3: Line the tray with half of the frozen ravioli, spread more sauce over the top, then add the rest of the ravioli and cover with the remaining sauce.
4: Bake for 30–35 minutes, or until browned.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:water (6qt)、beef shank (2lb)、scallions、fresh ginger (8slices)、star anise (6pods)、vegetable oil (½cup)、garlic (6cloves)、red chiles、medium white onion、rock sugar (1piece)、spicy bean paste (3tablespoons)、dark soy sauce (½cup)、rice wine (½cup)、light soy sauce (½cup)、medium tomatoes、white pepper (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、dried bay leaf、flour noodle (2bundles)、bok choy (2cups)
instructions:
0: Fill a large pot with about 6 quarts (5 ½ L) of water and add the beef shank, 3 scallions, 5 slices of ginger, and 3 star anise pods. Cover, bring to a boil over high heat, and cook for 5 minutes.
1: Remove the meat from the pot, rinse in cold water, and cut into thick slices. Discard the cooking liquid.
2: In a wok or large pan over medium-high heat, pour in the vegetable oil and add the remaining 3 scallions, 3 ginger slices, the garlic, red chiles, remaining 3 star anise pods, the onion, rock sugar, and spicy bean paste. Cook until the onions start to become translucent.
3: Add the sliced beef.
4: Add the dark soy sauce, for color, stir, then add the rice wine.
5: Pour in the light soy sauce, for flavor, then add the tomatoes. Stir fry for 8-10 minutes.
6: Fill the same large pot about a quarter of the way with water and heat over medium-high heat. Add the stir-fried meat, vegetables, and cooking liquid.
7: Add more water until the meat is just covered, then add the white pepper, salt, and bay leaves. Cover and reduce the heat to low and simmer for at least 2 hours, until the meat becomes tender. Remove the bay leaves and star anise before serving.
8: Bring a large pot of water to boil over high heat and cook the flour noodles according to the package instructions. Remove the noodles from the water.
9: Add the bok choy to the boiling water. Cook for 3 minutes, then remove.
10: To assemble the soup, place a generous amount of noodles in the bottom of a bowl. Then, add bok choy, meat, and broth. Garnish with scallions, cilantro, and red chilies.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all-purpose flour (1cup)、baking soda (1teaspoon)、soy milk (1 ½cups)、cauliflower (1head)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 450ºF (230ºC). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, and soy milk, and whisk until smooth.
2: Add the cauliflower florets to the batter and toss until fully coated.
3: Transfer the coated cauliflower to the baking sheet and bake for 10 minutes, or until the coating looks dry.
4: Meanwhile, in a medium saucepan over high heat, combine the soy sauce, agave, sesame oil, rice vinegar, garlic, ginger, and cornstarch, and stir until the mixture comes to a boil. Turn off the heat and let sit for 10 minutes to thicken.
5: Remove the cauliflower from the oven and transfer to a large bowl to cool for 5 minutes. Leave the oven on.
6: Add the sauce to the bowl and toss the cauliflower until completely coated, then return to a parchment-lined baking sheet and bake for another 10 minutes.
7: Top the cauliflower with chives and sesame seeds, and serve over rice, if desired.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:coriander seed (2tablespoons)、mustard seed (2tablespoons)、red pepper flakes (1tablespoon)、dill weed (1tablespoon)、allspice (1tablespoon)、salt (1tablespoon)、dried bay leaves
instructions:
0: In a small bowl, combine the coriander seeds, mustard seeds, red pepper flakes, dill weed, allspice, salt, and bay leaves.
1: Add the spice mix to a large pot with 3 quarts of water, then add the potatoes. Bring to a boil and cook for 15 minutes.
2: Add the corn and boil for 10 minutes. Add the sausage and cook for another 5 minutes.
3: Remove a potato from the pot and check to see if it's fully cooked. If not, continue to cook them until the potatoes are done.
4: Stir in the shrimp and lemon juice. Place the lid on the pot and cook for 3 minutes, or until the shrimp are pink and cooked through.
5: Drain the ingredients from the pot. Serve the shrimp boil on a newspaper-lined table, sprinkled all over with parsley, with cocktail sauce and garlic butter on the side.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bone-in short ribs (2lb)、baby potato (1lb)、salt (1pinch)、onion、garlic (4cloves)、baby carrots (1lb)、green beans (1lb)
instructions:
0: In a bowl, mix BBQ sauce, brown sugar, cayenne pepper, cumin, oregano, and ½ teaspoon of salt until well combined.
1: Place bone-in short ribs in the bottom of a 6-quart (6 liters) slow cooker.
2: Add the spice mix over the meat.
3: Throw in the baby potatoes and add a pinch of salt, then add onion, garlic, and baby carrots.
4: Cover and cook on low heat for 7-8 hours, or high for 3-4 hours.
5: Add green beans during the last 30 minutes of cooking time.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (4tablespoons)、yellow onion、bell peppers、garlic (6cloves)、salt、pepper、eggplant (1lb)、yellow squashes、medium zucchinis、tomato paste (12oz)、dried oregano (1tablespoon)、fresh thyme (2tablespoons)、diced tomato (28oz)、ricotta cheese (30oz)、shredded mozzarella cheese (1cup)、fresh basil (¼cup)、fresh parsley (½cup)、egg、japanese eggplants、zucchinis、yellow squashes、roma tomatoes、lasagna noodle
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Add 2 tablespoons of olive oil to a skillet on medium-high heat. Once warmed, add the onion, bell peppers, 4 minced garlic cloves, salt, and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, until golden brown and caramelized.
2: Add the eggplant, yellow squash, zucchini, tomato paste, dried oregano, and 1 tablespoon of thyme, and more salt and pepper. Cook until the vegetables are soft and the tomato paste deepens in color and starts to stick to the bottom.
3: Add the diced tomatoes and bring the mixture to a simmer. Cook on low for at least 30 minutes. Set aside to prepare the rest of the lasagna layers.
4: In a large bowl, mix together the ricotta, mozzarella, basil, parsley, salt, pepper and egg. Set aside.
5: To a bowl, add the sliced Japanese eggplant, yellow squash, zucchini, Roma tomatoes, garlic, 1 tablespoon thyme, salt, pepper, and 2 tablespoons olive oil, and gently toss to combine.
6: In a 9x13-inch (23x33 cm) glass baking pan, add a layer of the ratatouille to the bottom. Top with lasagna noodles, and spread a layer of the ricotta mixture, then shingle alternating slices of the marinated vegetables. Repeat with another layer of ratatouille, noodles, ricotta, and on the top shingle the vegetables.
7: Bake for 30 minutes, or until the cheese and sauce are bubbling slightly and the sliced vegetables on top have browned to your liking.
8: Slice and serve.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:extra firm tofu (14oz)、lemon、yogurt (1cup)、garlic (6cloves)、ginger (1tablespoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、cumin (2teaspoons)、garam masala (2teaspoons)、paprika (2teaspoons)
instructions:
0: Remove tofu from packaging and drain.
1: Place tofu on a couple of paper towels and find a heavy object to place on top of tofu, leave it there for 20 minutes.
2: Slice the tofu into bite-sized pieces.
3: Combine the marinade ingredients in a bowl then add the tofu.
4: Mix until evenly coated. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour.
5: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)
6: Place the marinated tofu pieces on bamboo skewers, then place them over a baking tray lined with parchment paper. Make sure there is space underneath the tofu to help distribute the heat more evenly.
7: Bake for about 15 minutes, until slightly dark brown on the edges.
8: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat, and sauté the onions, ginger, and garlic until tender but not browned.
9: Add the spices for about 30 seconds to release their aromatics and flavor, stirring constantly.
10: Add the tomato sauce and water, then bring to a boil and cook for about 5 minutes.
11: Pour in the cream and mix in the tofu, cooking for another 1-2 minutes.
12: Serve with rice and naan bread.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:panko breadcrumbs (2cups)、grated parmesan cheese (¾cup)、plain flour (⅓cup)、lemon  zest、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、dried parsley (1tablespoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、chicken breasts、salt、pepper、egg yolk、asparagus (¾cup)、cherry tomato (1cup)、olive oil (2teaspoons)、lemon juice (½lemon)、grated parmesan cheese (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、dried parsley (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Prepare the chicken coating by mixing together the breadcrumbs, parmesan, flour, lemon zest, garlic powder, parsley, salt, and pepper in a bowl. Set aside.
1: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C (350˚F).
2: Cut the chicken into large nuggets and season with salt and pepper.

8: Bake for 10 more minutes or until chicken is cooked through and vegetables are cooked but still firm.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:shrimp (1lb)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、broccoli (1cup)、green beans (1cup)、carrot (1cup)
instructions:
0: Mix together all sauce ingredients in a small bowl.
1: Heat oil over a nonstick pan and add shrimp stirring until cooked.
2: Pour sauce in pan and stir to coat meat.
3: Once the sauce is bubbling, add the veggies to the pan and stir again to coat.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:water (6cups)、cauliflower florets (1head)、milk (1cup)、butter (2tablespoons)、garlic (1clove)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、cooked pasta (1lb)、vegetarian parmesan cheese、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Boil the water over medium high heat. Add a large pinch of salt.
1: Add the cauliflower florets.
2: Cover the pot and boil for 5-7 minutes, or until cauliflower is soft.
3: With a slotted spoon, add the cooked cauliflower to a blender.
4: Add the milk, butter, garlic, salt, and pepper and blend until smooth.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:small shallot、fresh parsley (2tablespoons)、fresh chives (1tablespoon)、egg、mayonnaise (2tablespoons)、dijon mustard (2teaspoons)、fresh lemon juice (2teaspoons)、worcestershire sauce (½teaspoon)、cayenne pepper (1pinch)、fresh lump crab meat (1lb)、fine sea salt、freshly ground black pepper、panko breadcrumbs (1cup)、all purpose flour (2tablespoons)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、tartar sauce、lemon wedge
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, whisk together the shallot, parsley, chives, egg, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, and cayenne if using.
1: Add the crabmeat, season with salt and pepper and stir to combine.
2: Add the breadcrumbs and mix just to combine.

4: Coat the cakes lightly with flour, and shake off any excess.
5: In a large skillet set over medium heat, melt the butter.

7: Serve warm with tartar sauce and lemon wedges.
