instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breast、pepper、salt、flour、egg、panko breadcrumb、oil、onion (½cup)、chicken stock (⅔cup)、soy sauce (1 ½tablespoons)、sake (1 ½tablespoons)、mirin (1 ½tablespoons)、sugar (½tablespoon)、eggs、rice、scallion、nori
instructions:
0: First, salt and pepper the chicken breast, dredge in flour, then egg and coat in panko.
1: Deep-fry until chicken is done, brown and crispy. Slice and set aside.
2: In a small pan over medium heat, add onions, stock, soy sauce, sake, mirin, and sugar. Bring to a boil.
3: Add the sliced fried chicken, pour in the eggs around the chicken. Cover with a lid and cook until eggs are at your desired doneness.
4: Slide the egg and chicken over cooked rice, garnish with chopped scallions and shredded nori.
5: Nutrition  Calories: 6078 Fat: 513 grams  Carbs: 284 grams Fiber: 9 grams  Sugars: 24 grams  Protein: 96 grams
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:mushrooms (8oz)、garlic (1clove)、salt (½teaspoon)、black pepper (½teaspoon)、fresh thyme、beef tenderloin (12oz)、oil (2tablespoons)、english mustard (2tablespoons)、sliced ham (¼lb)、puff pastry (1sheet)、egg wash
instructions:
0: In a food processor, place mushrooms, garlic, salt, pepper, and thyme and blend into a fine paste (about 30-60 seconds).
1: Transfer to a medium-sized frying pan, being sure to spread it evenly across the bottom of the pan.
2: Cook the mushrooms over medium-low heat while stirring frequently. After about 7-10 minutes the mushroom mixture should shrink to half the original volume and begin to form a paste.
3: NOTE: The goal here is to cook off the bulk of the water inside the mushrooms. This’ll keep the puff pastry from being too mushy at the end.
4: At this point, remove the mushroom mixture from the heat and set it aside.
5: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
6: Liberally season the outside of the tenderloin pieces with salt and pepper.
7: In another medium-sized frying pan, heat 2 tablespoons of neutral oil over high heat. Once the oil has begun to smoke, quickly sear the tenderloin pieces on both sides (45-60 seconds per-side).
8: Once seared, transfer the meat to a plate or cutting board to rest.
9: Using a basting brush, generously paint the mustard over the resting pieces of beef, making sure to coat both sides.
10: To assemble the Wellingtons, lay out a piece of puff pastry on a lightly floured surface. Place a piece of ham in the center of the pasty.
11: Next, layer about 1 tablespoon of the mushroom mixture on the center of the ham using the back of a spoon to flatten the paste to about the size of the tenderloin pieces.
12: Place one of the mustard-coated beef fillet on top of the mushroom mixture, then top the piece of beef with another spoonful of the mushroom mixture, making sure to pat it down flat across the top of the meat.
13: Layer with another piece of ham and close the the Wellington by folding the puff pastry over the center of the meat.
14: Using your hands, carefully seal the edges of the pastry then transfer SEAM-SIDE DOWN to a baking tray lined with parchment paper.
15: Lightly brush the outside of each Wellington with egg wash.
16: Using the back of a paring knife, lightly score the tops of the pasty in a checkered pattern, being careful not to pierce the pastry.
17: Bake the Wellingtons in a 400˚F (200˚C) oven until the pastry is fully cooked and golden brown (about 20 minutes).
18: Allow each Wellington to rest at least 10 minutes before cutting into it.
19: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless strip steaks、salt、pepper、canola oil (3tablespoons)、asparagus (1bunch)
instructions:
0: Season the steaks on all sides with the salt and pepper.
1: Heat oil in a pan or a skillet over high heat until smoking.
2: Sear the steaks for about a minute to a minute and a half on each side, depending on the thickness of your steak for medium-rare. If you would like your steak rarer or more well-done, cook your steak shorter or longer accordingly.
3: In the same pan, cook the asparagus with salt and pepper until tender but still slightly crunchy. Remove from heat.
4: After the steaks have rested for about 5 minutes, slice, then serve with the asparagus!
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flank steak (1lb)、soy sauce (½cup)、garlic (3cloves)、ginger (1tablespoon)、honey (2tablespoons)、lime、sriracha sauce (1teaspoon)、bell pepper、carrot、zucchini、asparagus (16stalks)、red onion、sesame seed、toothpick
instructions:
0: In a baking dish with the steak, mix the soy sauce, garlic, ginger, honey, lime juice, and Sriracha sauce (optional).
1: Lightly massage the marinade into the steak and cover. Refrigerate 1-4 hours.
2: Place toothpicks in a bowl and pour water over toothpicks until completely submerged. Water will prevent toothpicks from burning.
3: Once marinated, cut the steak into 8 equal rectangles. You may need to pound the steak thinner if using a thicker cut.
4: Place a few slices of each of the vegetables on a slice of steak, making sure they are all about the same length.
5: Roll the steak up over the vegetables and secure it with a toothpick.
6: In a small saucepan over medium heat, pour in the leftover marinade and bring to a boil.
7: Boil for about one minute, take off the heat, and set aside to use as a glaze.
8: In a grill pan or on the grill over medium high heat, place your steak roll-ups and cook for 2-3 minutes.
9: Flip the roll over and use a heat-safe brush to brush the glaze on each roll.
10: Cook for about one minute longer and remove from heat. Top with sesame seeds.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cauliflower (1head)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、garlic (2cloves)、medium yellow onion、frozen corn (1cup)、shredded carrot (1 ½cups)、black beans (15oz)、all-purpose flour (¼cup)、chili powder (1teaspoon)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、whole milk (2cups)、diced tomato (1cup)、shredded mozzarella cheese (1cup)、frozen tater tot (28oz)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Cut the head of cauliflower in half, remove the stem, and chop into small pieces. Set aside.
2: Heat the oil in a large cast-iron skillet over medium heat.  Add the garlic and onion and cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
3: Add the corn, carrots, black beans, and 2 cups (600 g) of cauliflower and cook, stirring often, for another 3 minutes, until the corn starts to brown around the edges.
4: Add the flour, chili powder, and salt and stir until the vegetables are evenly coated.
5: Add the milk and diced tomatoes and cook, stirring constantly, until thickened, about 3 minutes.
6: Add the mozzarella cheese and stir until melted.
7: Turn off the heat and arrange the tater tots on top of the vegetable mixture.
8: Transfer to the oven and bake until browned and bubbling, about 30 minutes.
9: Garnish the casserole with tomato, red onion, jalapeño, and cilantro, if using.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bacon (3strips)、maple syrup (2tablespoons)、butter (1tablespoon)、yellow onion、sweet potato (2lb)、cinnamon (¼tablespoon)、nutmeg (¼teaspoon)、cayenne pepper (¼teaspoon)、salt、pepper、chicken broth (3cups)
instructions:
0: Lay 3 slices of bacon on a greased pan.
1: Bake for 20 minutes at 400°F (200°C), flip once halfway through.
2: Dab off any extra oil and brush maple syrup on both sides of the bacon.
3: Bake for an additional 3-5 minutes (until the bacon is crispy).
4: Cut up the bacon into small pieces and set aside for garnishing the soup later.
5: Melt 1 Tbsp. of butter. Add in the onion, stir, and cook on medium heat until fragrant.
6: Add in the sweet potatoes, chicken broth, and spices. Cover and bring to a boil.
7: Let simmer for 15-20 minutes until the potatoes have softened. Add 2 tbsp of maple syrup and stir.
8: Then blend with an immersion blender or transfer to a blender and blend in batches until smooth and well-combined.
9: Serve up and garnish with heavy cream (optional), the maple bacon, and a sprinkle of cinnamon (optional).
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large shrimp (1lb)、red bell pepper、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、low sodium soy sauce (1tablespoon)、sesame oil (2tablespoons)、salt (½teaspoon)、green onion (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Heat 1 tablespoon of sesame oil in a large, nonstick skillet over medium heat.
1: Pour in the shrimp and season with ¼ teaspoon of the salt.
2: Fry the shrimp for 1 minute on each side.
3: Remove the shrimp from the pan and pour in the remaining 1 tablespoon of oil.
4: Toss in the red bell pepper, remaining ¼ teaspoon of salt, and red pepper flakes and sauté for a few minutes until they begin to soften.
5: Add in the soy sauce and sauté about 1 more minute.
6: Toss the shrimp back into the pan and mix until everything is well incorporated and the shrimp is fully cooked, about 1 minute.
7: Divide the mixture evenly between 4 bowls and top with green onion.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:asparagus (½lb)、olive oil、salt、pepper、garlic (1clove)、chicken breast、fresh mozzarella cheese、tomato、fresh basil (3leaves)、parchment paper
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Place asparagus into mixing bowl and thoroughly coat with olive oil, salt, pepper, and garlic.
2: Tear off a sheet of parchment paper, large enough to fold into a packet.
3: Place chicken breast on top and season with salt and pepper. Place mozzarella, tomato, and basil on top.
4: Fold the edges of the parchment paper widthwise 2-3 times then twist the ends until fully closed.
5: Bake for 20-25 minutes or until internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:fresh basil leaves (2cups)、olive oil (½cup)、grated parmesan cheese (½cup)、almond butter (1tablespoon)、lemon juice (1tablespoon)、garlic (2cloves)、lemon zest (2teaspoons)、kosher salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Add the basil, olive oil, Parmesan, almond butter, lemon juice, garlic, lemon zest, salt, and pepper to a blender. Blend until smooth and set aside.
1: Cook the pasta according to the package instructions.
2: Drain and transfer the pasta to a large serving bowl.
3: Add the grape tomatoes, yellow tomatoes, red onion, and mozzarella balls to the pasta.
4: Pour the pesto sauce over the pasta.
5: Toss the ingredients together.
6: Serve warm in a bowl.
7: Enjoy!

Adapted from The Minimalist Kitchen by Melissa Coleman. Copyright © 2018 Oxmoor House. Reprinted with permission from Time Inc. Books, a division of Meredith Corporation. New York, NY. All rights reserved.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (8tablespoons)、garlic (2cloves)、fresh parsley (2tablespoons)、boneless, skinless chicken breasts、flour (1cup)、eggs、panko breadcrumbs (2cups)、oil、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
1: In a bowl, add the butter, garlic, and parsley and mix until fully combined.
2: Shape butter into a log and wrap in plastic wrap. Freeze for 15 minutes.
3: On a cutting board, slice the chicken breasts in half horizontally.
4: Wrap in plastic wrap and pound until the chicken is ⅛-inch (3 mm) thick.
5: Divide the butter into fourths.
6: Season with salt and pepper. Place a portion of butter on the flattened chicken breast and roll it up, creating a log.
7: Coat the rolled chicken in flour followed, by eggs and bread crumbs. Repeat once more.
8: Cover the chicken in plastic wrap and chill for 15 minutes while the oil is heating.
9: Fry in oil for 3-4 minutes, until edges are golden brown.
10: Bake for 20-25 minutes.
11: Let rest for 5 minutes before serving.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (5tablespoons)、medium yellow onion、garlic (1clove)、green pepper、vegan butter (2teaspoons)、oyster mushroom (10oz)、paprika (¼teaspoon)、onion powder (1 ¼teaspoons)、garlic powder (1 ¼teaspoons)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、soy sauce (1tablespoon)、vegan worcestershire (1tablespoon)、carrot、vegetable broth (1cup)、lemon juice (½tablespoon)、nutritional yeast (¼cup)、tomato paste (½teaspoon)、large potato、large hoagie rolls、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: In a large pan, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat.
1: Add the onion and sauté for about 3 minutes until translucent.
2: Add the garlic and cook for about 2 minutes, until fragrant.
3: Add the green pepper. Stir and sauté for about 5 minutes until tender.
4: Transfer the sautéed vegetables to a bowl and set aside.
5: Melt the vegan butter in the pan.
6: Add the mushrooms and stir to coat in the butter.
7: Add the paprika, ¼ teaspoon onion powder,  ¼ teaspoon garlic powder, ½ teaspoon black pepper, and ½ teaspoon salt. Stir well. Sauté for about 7 minutes until the mushrooms are dark brown and reduce in size by half.
8: Add the green pepper, onion, and garlic mixture back to the pan and stir.
9: Add the soy sauce and Worcestershire sauce. Stir well. Continue to sauté for about 7 minutes until the liquid has thickened.
10: In the meantime, place the carrot, vegetable broth, remaining 3 tablespoons of olive oil, the lemon juice, nutritional yeast, remaining teaspoon of onion powder, remaining teaspoon of garlic powder, the tomato paste, remaining ½ teaspoon of salt, and remaining ½ teaspoon of pepper in a food processor. Blend until it forms a smooth and homogenous sauce.
11: Add the potato and blend until homogenous.
12: Fill the hoagies with the mushroom mixture.
13: Top the mushroom mixture with the vegan “cheese”, and parsley. Serve immediately.
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、green onion (1cup)、fresh spinach (15oz)、garlic (4cloves)、feta cheese (1cup)、ricotta cheese (½cup)、fresh dill (¼cup)、fresh parsley (¼cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、phyllo dough (8sheets)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: In a large pan over medium heat, cook the green onions and garlic in the olive oil until soft.
2: Add half the spinach, giving time for some to cook down before adding the rest.
3: Once the spinach has cooked down, transfer to a medium mixing bowl to cool slightly.
4: Add the feta, ricotta, egg, dill, parsley, salt and pepper, and mix until evenly spread.
5: Set in refrigerator.
6: Lay out one sheet of phyllo dough on a dry surface. Using a pastry brush, coat evenly with olive oil.
7: Add another sheet of phyllo dough on top of the oiled sheet and repeat the oiling process. Continue until there is a stack of 4 oiled sheets. Repeat process on a new stack with remaining 4 sheets.
8: Cut your dough into 4 sections using a pizza cutter.
9: With a single section, add a spoonful of your spinach mix and begin folding over your pastry, brushing each fold with oil. Repeat this process for the remaining sections.
10: Bake in a preheated oven for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:hot italian sausage (1lb)、ground beef (1lb)、seasoned breadcrumb (1cup)、fresh parsley (⅓cup)、salt (2teaspoons)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、onion powder (1teaspoon)、shredded parmesan cheese (⅓cup)、eggs、milk (½cup)、shredded mozzarella cheese (½cup)、spaghetti (⅓lb)、marinara sauce、shredded parmesan cheese、fresh basil
instructions:
0: In a bowl, add the Italian sausage, ground beef, bread crumbs, parsley, salt, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, Parmesan, eggs, and milk, and mix until well combined.
1: Line a large glass bowl with plastic wrap, and spray thoroughly with cooking spray.
2: Spread the meat mixture along the bottom and sides of the bowl, about ½-inch (1 cm) thick.
3: Sprinkle mozzarella in the base of the meat mixture, then top the spaghetti with sauce on top.
4: Using the plastic wrap, form the meat into a large ball, ensuring there are no holes or cracks.
5: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
6: Place ball on a foil-lined baking sheet.
7: Bake for 40 minutes.
8: Place a large spoon full of marinara in the center of a plate. Top with the spaghetti-stuffed meatball, marinara, Parmesan, and basil.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:spaghetti squash、oil (2tablespoons)、salt、pepper、marinara sauce (1jar)
instructions:
0: Use a fork to pierce holes down the side of the spaghetti squash. Microwave for 5 minutes.
1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
2: When the squash is cool enough to touch (5-10 minutes), slice the squash open, length-wise, with a sharp knife.
3: Scoop out the seeds and drizzle the squash with oil. Season with salt and pepper.
4: Roast the squash cut-side down for 40 minutes, until easily pierced with a knife.
5: In a large bowl, gently mix together the ground turkey, onion, parsley, parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper. Form meatballs, and transfer to a greased baking sheet.
6: Bake in the oven at 400°F (200°C) for 20 minutes, until fully cooked.
7: Using a fork, pull the strands from the cooled spaghetti squash and transfer to serving dish.
8: Top with hot marinara sauce, and a sprinkle of chopped parsley.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、salt、pepper、oil (3tablespoons)、portobello mushroom (1lb)、large white onion、large red bell pepper、garlic (4cloves)、fresh rosemary (2teaspoons)、diced tomato (14.5oz)、red wine (½cup)、low sodium chicken broth (¾cup)、fresh basil
instructions:
0: Season the chicken breasts on both sides with salt and pepper.
1: Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium high heat.
2: Place 4 pieces of the chicken in the skillet and sear until until golden-brown, about 1-3 minutes on each side. Transfer the chicken to a plate and repeat searing with the remaining chicken pieces. Set aside.
3: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in the empty skillet.
4: Add the mushrooms and stir occasionally until most of the moisture has evaporated from the pan, about 8 minutes.
5: Transfer the mushrooms to a plate and set aside.
6: Heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of oil in the pan.
7: Add the onions and bell peppers and season with salt and pepper. Stir occasionally until the onions and peppers have softened, about 2 minutes.
8: Add in the garlic and rosemary and stir until the garlic is fragrant.
9: Add in the tomatoes, red wine, and broth and stir until the sauce has thickened slightly.
10: Add the mushrooms and chicken back into the sauce and bring to a low simmer.
11: Cover and let cook until the chicken registers 165°F (74°C), about 5-8 minutes.
12: Serve topped with basil.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、fresh spinach (5cups)、artichoke heart (¾cup)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、cream cheese (¼cup)、grated mozzarella cheese (⅓cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Slice into the chicken several times, about ½ cm (¼ inch) apart, but only cut about 85% of the way through, leaving the bottom intact.
2: Cook the spinach on a medium heat until it is slightly wilted, then add the artichoke.
3: Stir in the garlic powder and cream cheese, and cook for a minute or two.
4: Sprinkle over the mozzarella and stir until melted.
5: Allow to cool to the touch and then fill each segment of the chicken breast with about 1 teaspoon of the mixture.
6: Bake in the centre of the oven for 18-22 minutes until the chicken is cooked through and the juices run clear.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pork shoulder (2lb)、seasoned salt (1tablespoon)、cumin (1tablespoon)、kidney bean (1can)、tomato (½cup)、onion、red enchilada sauce (½cup)、cornbread mix (1box)、cheddar cheese
instructions:
0: Place the pork shoulder, seasoned salt, cumin, kidney beans, tomato, onion, and enchilada sauce in a 7-quart (6 ½ liters) slow cooker. Mix thoroughly.
1: Cook on high for 3 hours.
2: Dollop prepared cornbread evenly over mixture. Cook an additional hour.
3: Serve and top with cheddar cheese if desired.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breast (1lb)、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、all-purpose flour (2cups)、eggs、seasoned breadcrumbs (2cups)、lasagna noodle (1box)、mozzarella cheese、marinara sauce (24oz)
instructions:
0: Lightly season the chicken breast with salt and pepper, then slice it into strips about ½ inch (1 cm) in thickness.
1: Dredge each piece of chicken in flour followed by egg and bread crumbs.
2: Quickly fry chicken strips in ½ inch (1 cm) of oil over medium heat, cooking for about 30 seconds each side to color the breading. Set cooked strips aside to drain on paper towels. (NOTE: The chicken will NOT be fully cooked after this stage.)
3: On a clean surface, assemble the roll-ups. Start by laying a cooked lasagna noodle flat. Using a spoon, spread marinara sauce on one end of the noodle. Next, add a slice of mozzarella cheese on top of the sauce followed by a piece of chicken. Starting from the end with the sauce on it, roll up the noodle like a sleeping bag towards the un-sauced side.
4: Place each roll-up into a large casserole dish that has been lightly covered with nonstick cooking spray.
5: Pour remaining sauce over roll-ups, then generously cover with mozzarella cheese.
6: Bake at 350˚F (180˚C) for 20 minutes until cheese is melted and edges of lasagna noodle are slightly crisped.
7: Serve and garnish with parsley.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:mac 'n' cheese (1box)、broccoli (1cup)、grated cheddar cheese (½cup)、pepper
instructions:
0: Prepare 1 box of Mac 'N' Cheese according to instructions on box.
1: Add cooked broccoli, cheddar cheese, and pepper stir until fully incorporated.
2: Top with desired garnish. Serve immediately.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:salmon (12oz)、egg、olive oil (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Mix breading ingredients together in large bowl. Set aside.
1: *NOTE: You can crush almonds by pulsing them in a food processor or high-speed blender, or by carefully cutting almonds with a sharp knife.
2: Whisk egg in a separate bowl.
3: Dredge the salmon in the egg, then the breading mixture.
4: Heat olive oil in a skillet on medium heat.
5: Once the pan is ready, add the salmon and let cook on one side for 3-4 minutes until golden brown. Flip and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes on the other side.
6: Serve salmon with a side of your favorite veggies. We used asparagus.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flour tortillas、refried bean (16oz)、spanish rice (1cup)、shredded mexican cheese blend (1cup)
instructions:
0: Assemble the burritos by microwaving the flour tortilla for 20 seconds, and begin to layer burrito starting with refried beans, followed by the cooked rice and cheese.
1: Fold in the left and right sides of the tortilla and roll it up from the bottom, tucking the bottom edge under the filling. Wrap in parchment paper and label. Freeze up to 1 month.
2: To reheat from frozen, wrap the burrito in a damp paper towel and microwave for 2-3 minutes, flipping halfway or until the center is hot. Let stand 1 minute before eating.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:rack of lamb (2 ½lb)、salt、pepper、olive oil (5tablespoons)、garlic (8cloves)、breadcrumb (¾cup)、fresh flat-leaf parsley (¼cup)、fresh rosemary (1 ½tablespoons)、grated parmesan cheese (½cup)、whole grain dijon mustard (1 ½tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Season lamb generously with salt and pepper.
2: Heat a cast iron over medium high heat.
3: To the hot pan, add in 4 tablespoons of the the olive oil, along with the lamb and garlic. Sear all sides of the lamb until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Remove browned lamb, and place cooked lamb onto a baking sheet.
4: Remove garlic and add to food processor with along with the breadcrumbs, parsley, parmesan, rosemary, and 1 tablespoon of olive oil. Pulse until combined. Pour onto a large plate.
5: Brush the top and sides of the lamb with mustard.
6: Coat the top and sides of the lamb with the breadcrumb mixture and roast in oven for 20-25 minutes.
7: Allow to rest before slicing.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pizza dough、alfredo sauce (3tablespoons)、mozzarella cheese (½cup)、cooked chicken (½cup)、roma tomato
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C).
1: Roll out dough to about 10-12 inches (25-30 cm) in diameter.
2: Top pizza with alfredo sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, and tomatoes.
3: Bake in oven for 15-20 minutes, or until crust is crispy and cheese is melted and turning golden brown.
4: Garnish with parsley and cut into 8 slices.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:broccoli (1head)、rigatoni (3 ½cups)、sun-dried tomato (2cups)、fresh pesto (⅔cup)、grated parmesan cheese (½cup)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Separate the head of broccoli into individual florets, coat in olive oil, salt, and pepper, then roast for 20 minutes at 350°F (180°C).
1: Cook the rigatoni in boiling salted water for 8-10 minutes until al dente, then drain, saving some of the pasta water.
2: Place the pasta back in the pot with about 50ml (¼ cup) of the pasta water.
3: On a low heat, add the tomatoes, broccoli, pesto, and parmesan, and stir until combined and the cheese has melted.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:linguine (8oz)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、large sweet onion、garlic (2cloves)、dried rosemary (1tablespoon)、dried thyme (1tablespoon)、smoked paprika (1teaspoon)、salt、pepper、large shrimp (1lb)、white wine (1cup)、lemon juice (1teaspoon)、parmesan cheese
instructions:
0: Bring a large pot of water to a boil.  Generously salt the water.
1: Cook pasta for 8-9 minutes, or until al dente, and drain.
2: In a skillet over medium heat, add olive oil.  Add the onion and cook until lightly browned and softened, about 3-4 minutes.
3: Add garlic, rosemary, thyme, smoked paprika, salt and pepper. Stir and cook an additional 2 minutes.
4: Add the shrimp and let them cook for 3 minutes. Flip and cook for another 3 minutes.
5: Add the white wine and lemon juice. Cook until the wine has reduced.
6: Add the cooked pasta to the skillet and serve.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:russet potatoes、olive oil (2tablespoons)、salt、pepper、garlic (4cloves)、italian seasoning (1teaspoon)、freshly grated parmesan cheese (½cup)、top sirloin steaks、fresh parsley (2tablespoons)、garlic butter (4tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚F).
1: Place potatoes in a single layer onto one of a greased baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil, and season with salt, pepper, garlic, Italian seasoning, and Parmesan, gently tossing to combine.
2: Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until golden brown and crisp, tossing occasionally.
3: Preheat oven to broil.
4: Season steaks with salt and pepper, to taste, and place onto the opposite side of the prepared baking sheet in a single layer.
5: Place into oven and broil until the steak is browned and charred at the edges, about 4-5 minutes per side for medium-rare, or until desired doneness.
6: Serve immediately with garlic butter, and top with parsley. Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken thighs、salt、pepper、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、dried thyme (1tablespoon)、dried parsley (1tablespoon)、butter (2tablespoons)、carrots、yellow onion、celery (4stalks)、cremini mushroom (½lb)、garlic (5cloves)、wild rice (2cups)、chicken broth (8cups)、grated parmesan cheese (2cups)、heavy cream (1cup)、fresh thyme (1tablespoon)、sour cream (½cup)、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, combine the chicken thighs with the salt, pepper, garlic powder, dried thyme, dried parsley, and olive oil. Toss until well coated.
1: In a Dutch oven over medium-high heat, add the chicken and cook until it’s golden brown on one side, then flip, and cook the other side, about10 minutes total. Remove the chicken and set aside.
2: To the pan, add the butter, carrots, onions, celery, mushrooms, and garlic. Season with salt and pepper, stir, and cook until the veggies are soft. Scoop out and set aside.
3: Add the wild rice and the chicken broth to the pot. Bring to a boil, reduce to a simmer, and cook the rice for 45 minutes, or until tender.
4: Once the rice is cooked, stir in the Parmesan, vegetables, heavy cream, and fresh thyme. Bring to a boil. Stir in the sour cream.
5: Add the chicken back to the pan.
6: Serve the chicken over the rice and garnish with grated Parmesan and fresh parsley.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、onion、garlic (3cloves)、green bell pepper (½cup)、red bell pepper (½cup)、yellow bell pepper (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: Heat a large ovenproof skillet over medium heat and add the oil. Sauté the onion, garlic, and bell peppers until soft, about 5 minutes.
2: Combine the chili powder, paprika, cayenne, cumin, garlic powder, oregano, salt, and pepper in a dish, and use the mixture to season the flank steak with  on both sides. Lay the steak flat on a cutting board with the grain running up and down. Place the sautéed onions and peppers in the middle of the steak, leaving an inch or so on both ends. Cover the onions and peppers with a layer of cheese.
3: Tightly roll up the meat from left to right; this will ensure that you cut against the grain when you slice the meat. Stick toothpicks through the sides of the roll to help it hold its shape and use a sharp knife to cut in between the toothpicks.
4: Return the skillet to high heat, add the steak, and sear  until a nice crust has developed, about 3 minutes. Flip and repeat with the other side. Transfer the skillet to the oven and bake for 10 minutes, or until cooked to your preference.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chickpeas (15.5oz)、oats (1 ½cups)、shredded carrot (½cup)、red onion (½cup)、egg、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、olive oil (1teaspoon)、lemon、olive oil (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: In a food processor, combine chickpeas, oats, carrots, red onion, egg, salt, pepper, garlic powder, and olive oil. Blend just until combined.
1: Add lemon juice and blend again until well-combined.
2: Scoop out a handful of the mixture and form into patties.
3: Heat a tablespoon of olive oil over medium-high heat.
4: Cook the patty 4-5 minutes on each side, or until golden brown.
5: Assemble with your favorite burger toppings.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:honey (⅓cup)、low sodium soy sauce (¼cup)、garlic (4cloves)、ginger (1tablespoon)、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、black pepper (½teaspoon)、skins on chicken breast、baby carrot (2cups)、red bell pepper、broccoli floret (2cups)、salt
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, mix together the soy sauce, honey, garlic, ginger, red pepper, and black pepper.
1: Place the chicken breasts directly on the bottom of the slow cooker, sprinkle with a bit of salt, and pour on the honey sauce.
2: Cook the chicken for 1½ hours on high.
3: Toss in the carrots, broccoli, and bell peppers. Using tongs, mix the chicken and veggies around the slow cooker so that everything is mixed and coated with the honey sauce.
4: Cook on high for another 1½ hours.
5: Remove the chicken from the slow cooker and place, skin-side up, on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
6: Broil for 2-3 minutes, until the skin is golden and crispy. (optional)
7: Serve on plates with the veggies, chicken, and a spoonful of the leftover honey sauce.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:carrot (2cups)、baby potato (2cups)、yellow squash (1cup)、zucchini (1cup)、olive oil、salt、pepper、fresh oregano (1tablespoon)、garlic (3cloves)、radish (½cup)、mixed greens salad
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: On a baking sheet lined with parchment paper, add carrots, potatoes, yellow squash, and zucchini.
2: Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt, pepper, oregano, and garlic, and mix to evenly coat the coat the vegetables. *Note: You may need to quarter the potatoes if they are too thick so they roast faster.
3: Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the vegetables are golden brown.
4: Make the chimichurri dressing: combine the cilantro, parsley, garlic, salt, pepper, olive oil, lime juice, and red wine vinegar in a food processor and blend until smooth.
5: Add a large handful of greens to a large bowl. Top with the roasted vegetables and sliced radishes.
6: Pour over the chimichurri dressing and toss until evenly distributed.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:parchment paper、chicken breast、asparagus (5oz)、roma tomato、pesto (2tablespoons)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Fold the parchment paper in half, then open up.
2: Trim the ends of the asparagus and lay them on one half of the parchment paper.
3: Drizzle on oil and sprinkle on salt and pepper.
4: Lay the chicken on the asparagus, season with salt and pepper, and spread on the pesto. Top with tomato slices.
5: Fold the parchment paper over the chicken, and cinch the paper together by folding it over itself along the edges.
6: Bake for 25-30 minutes or until internal temperature of chicken reaches 165˚F (75˚C).
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (3tablespoons)、carrot (1cup)、medium yellow onion、ground beef (2lb)、dried oregano (1 ½teaspoons)、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、black pepper、garlic (4cloves)、dry red wine (½cup)、crushed tomato (28oz)、fresh basil (½cup)、salt、savoy cabbage (1large head)、egg、whole milk ricotta cheese (2cups)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
1: Heat the olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the carrot and onion, and cook until the vegetables have softened slightly, 8-10 minutes.
2: Add the beef and season with the oregano, red pepper flakes, and pepper. Use a wooden spoon to break the beef into smaller pieces, and cook until browned, about 10 minutes.
3: Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, 2-3 minutes.
4: Deglaze the pan with red wine, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom of pan.
5: Once the wine has reduced by half, stir in the crushed tomatoes. Cook until sauce has thickened, stirring frequently, about 10 minutes.
6: Stir in the basil, then remove the sauce from the heat and let cool.
7: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Working in batches, add the cabbage leaves, using tongs to submerge them in the water. Cook until the leaves have softened and are flexible, 1-2 minutes. Drain well and pat dry with a paper towels.
8: Stir the egg into the cooled meat sauce.
9: Place the largest cabbage leaf on the bottom of a 9-inch (23-cm) round baking dish. Line the exposed sides and bottom of the pan with more cabbage leaves.
10: Spoon in ¼ of the meat sauce, spreading evenly. Dollop ¼ of the ricotta on top of the sauce. Cover with cabbage leaves. Repeat with the remaining sauce, ricotta, and cabbage to make 3 more layers.
11: Fold any overhanging cabbage leaves toward the center of the pan.
12: Bake on the middle rack of the oven for 1 hour, until lightly browned on top. Let cool for 20 minutes.
13: To serve, place a serving plate over the baking dish and invert the chou farci onto the plate. Remove the pan, then slice into wedges and serve.
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:whole chicken (4lb)、kosher salt、freshly ground black pepper
instructions:
0: Remove the giblets from the chicken cavity. Pat the chicken dry all over with paper towels, including the cavity.
1: Generously season the entire chicken with salt and pepper. With the tip of a toothpick, poke the skin of the chicken all over, creating at least 20 tiny holes.
2: Transfer the chicken to a rimmed baking dish and let sit in the refrigerator, uncovered, for 8-12 hours.
3: Preheat the oven to 450˚F (230˚C).
4: Remove the chicken from the refrigerator and let it warm to room temperature for 1 hour.
5: Truss the chicken legs. Using butcher’s twine, tie the legs together, then slip the twine under each leg, pull up to the top of the chicken, and flip the bird over. Pull the twine under the wings, loop around the neck, and then tie to secure and cut off any excess twine. Flip the bird over again and tuck the wings under the breasts.
6: Set the chicken, breast-side up, on a roasting rack set over a roasting pan.
7: Roast for 1 hour, or until a meat thermometer inserted in the thickest part of the chicken reaches 165˚F (75˚C).
8: Let the chicken rest at room temperature for 20 minutes.
9: To carve, remove the twine. Using a sharp knife, cut between the leg and the breast. When you reach the joint, bend it back and cut right through. Twist off the wings. To remove the breasts, cut straight down along the keel bone. Then, angling your knife outward, remove the breast. Break the legs down into thighs and drumsticks, if desired. Pull off the oysters from the underside of the chicken.
10: If you’d like, make chicken stock from the carcass. Add the carcass to a large pot with onions, celery, carrots, garlic, and other aromatics of your choice. Cover with water and bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 8 hours, skimming off the fat as needed. Store in the fridge for a few days or freeze for a few months.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:oil (1 ½tablespoons)、garlic (3cloves)、small onion、crushed tomato (2cups)、worcestershire sauce (1tablespoon)、cayenne pepper (½teaspoon)、cumin (½teaspoon)、paprika (½teaspoon)、tomato、fresh parsley (¼cup)、eggs、parsley、feta cheese
instructions:
0: Heat oil over medium heat, add garlic and onions and cook until onions have softened and garlic is fragrant.
1: Add the crushed tomatoes, Worcestershire sauce, cayenne pepper, cumin and paprika. Stir to incorporate.
2: Add dice tomato and cook until sauce has thickened.
3: Using a spoon, create wells for the eggs, crack an egg into each well.
4: Cover and cook for another 5-8 minutes, until the egg whites are cooked but the yolk is still a bit runny. Garnish with parsley and feta cheese.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken (3lb)、salt、pepper、olive oil (2tablespoons)、garlic (3cloves)、ginger (1tablespoon)、jalapeñoes、onion、tomato puree (1 ¼cups)、coconut milk (1cup)、chicken stock (1cup)、fresh cilantro
instructions:
0: Salt and pepper chicken.
1: In a large pot, brown chicken in olive oil. Remove chicken and set aside.
2: In the same pot, add garlic, ginger, jalapeños and onions. Cook until translucent.
3: Pour in the tomato puree, unsweetened coconut milk and chicken broth.
4: Add the chicken back to the pot. Bring to a simmer. Cover and cook for 45 - 60 minutes.
5: Serve with rice. Garnish with cilantro or parsley.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:spaghetti squash、olive oil (2tablespoons)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC).
1: With a sharp knife, slice the squash in half. If the squash is too tough, puncture in several places forming a dotted line around the squash. Microwave for 3-5 minutes to soften. Allow to cool before cutting in half.
2: Scoop out the seeds, brush with oil, and sprinkle with salt, and pepper. Bake for 40-45 minutes, or until a fork can easily pierce the skin.
3: Meanwhile, in a pan combine oil, garlic, and onion over medium heat, and sautè until onions are translucent.
4: Add mushrooms and cook for 3 minutes. Add the broccoli, asparagus, squash, tomatoes, salt, and pepper and cook until almost cooked through.
5: Add the milk/ milk alternative until warmed through. Add the vegetarian Parmesan and mix until evenly spread throughout vegetables. Add the lemon juice and stir to combine.
6: Remove squash from the oven, with a fork pull at the edges to produce that stringy “spaghetti” quality.
7: In the pan combine “spaghetti” with vegetables. Return to the squash and top with Parmesan.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:quinoa (1cup)、pinto bean (15oz)、tomato paste (¼cup)、dried oregano (1tablespoon)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、salt、black pepper、mozzarella cheese (4slices)、shredded parmesan cheese、fresh basil、tomato sauce
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: In a large bowl add the quinoa, beans, tomato, paste, and seasonings. Using a potato masher, mash the ingredients until thoroughly mixed together.
2: Take a quarter of quinoa-bean mixture and shape it into a patty using your hands. Repeat with the remaining mixture to create four patties.
3: Place the patties on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet. Top with mozzarella, and bake for 12-15 minutes.
4: Place the patties on buns, and top with tomato sauce, shredded Parmesan, and fresh basil.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:shredded chicken (2cups)、crushed pineapple (1cup)、white onion、garlic (2cloves)、smoked paprika (1teaspoon)、chili powder (1teaspoon)、salt (1 ¼teaspoons)、red onion、fresh cilantro (½cup)、corn tortillas
instructions:
0: In a large, nonstick skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
1: Toss in the onion and salt and sauté for 2 minutes.
2: Add in the chili powder, paprika, and garlic. Toast for 1 minute.
3: Add in the pineapple and chicken and mix so the chicken is well-coated and warmed through.
4: Pour the chicken mixture into a large serving bowl.
5: Toast the tortillas in the seasoned pan, about 3 minutes per side.
6: Divide the mixture evenly between tortillas, top with diced red onion and cilantro, and serve.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:mixed beef leg bones (10lb)、ginger (12oz)、large garlic (1head)、medium yellow onion (4kg)、cinnamon (8sticks)、whole black peppercorn (¼cup)、whole star anise (6pods)、beef brisket (1lb)、kosher salt、fish sauce (¼cup)、boneless sirloin steak (1lb)、flat rice noodle (1lb)
instructions:
0: Place the beef bones in a large stock pot, then add enough cold water to cover by 2 inches (5 cm). Bring the mixture to a boil over high heat and cook for 10 minutes to blanch the bones and remove any impurities.
1: Set a rack in the upper third of the oven and preheat the broiler.
2: Drain the bones in a colander and rinse under cold running water. Return the blanched bones to the stockpot.
3: Meanwhile, arrange the ginger, garlic, and onions cut-side up on a rimmed baking sheet and broil on high until the aromatics are deeply charred in spots, 5 minutes. Remove from the oven and add to the stockpot with the bones.
4: Meanwhile, combine the cinnamon sticks, peppercorns, and star anise in a medium skillet over medium-high heat and toast, shaking the pan occasionally, until the spices are darkened in spots and extremely fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the toasted spices to the stockpot.
5: Season the brisket liberally with salt and add it to the stockpot.
6: Fill the pot with enough cold water to cover everything by 1 inch (2 cm). Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce the heat to medium to maintain a gentle simmer, skimming off and discarding any fat that floats to the top as needed, until the brisket is fork-tender, 2-3 hours.
7: Using tongs, transfer the brisket to a plate and let cool completely. Refrigerate the brisket until ready to serve.
8: Continue to simmer the broth to get as much flavor out of the bones as possible, 3-4 hours more.
9: Using tongs, remove and discard the bones and aromatics. Slowly strain the broth through a fine mesh strainer set over a large pot. Skim and discard the fat from the broth, then stir in the fish sauce. Taste and add more as desired.
10: Thinly slice the brisket. Very thinly slice the raw sirloin steak against the grain.
11: Divide the noodles among 6-8 large bowls, then top with the brisket and raw steak. Ladle the hot broth over the noodles and meat and serve immediately with the bean sprouts, onion, jalapeño, Thai basil, lime wedges, hoisin sauce, and Sriracha alongside.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground beef (1lb)、medium onion、green bell pepper、garlic (3cloves)、tomato sauce (3cups)、chili powder (1tablespoon)、cumin (2teaspoons)、paprika (2teaspoons)、cayenne pepper (½teaspoon)、kidney bean (16oz)、black beans (12oz)、sour cream、cheddar cheese
instructions:
0: In a heavy bottom pot, brown the ground beef with the onions, pepper, and garlic on medium heat.
1: Add the sauce and spices and bring to a simmer.
2: Add the beans and simmer, covered, for 30 to 45 minutes.
3: Serve warm with sour cream and cheddar cheese.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:rotisserie chicken (2cups)、buffalo sauce (1cup)、celery (½cup)、red onion (¼cup)、salt、pepper、green leaf lettuce (2leaves)、blue cheese (2oz)、green onion
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, add the chicken and buffalo sauce. Stir to combine.
1: Add the celery, red onion, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine and set aside.
2: Make the Greek yogurt ranch dressing: in a small bowl, add the Greek yogurt, dried parsley, garlic powder, dried dill, onion powder, salt, pepper, and lemon juice. Stir to combine.
3: Lay each lettuce leaf flat on a plate and scoop the chicken mixture into the middle. Top with a spoonful of Greek yogurt ranch dressing. Garnish with blue cheese crumbles and sliced green onion, if desired.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:raspberry (2cups)、granulated sugar (½cup)、fresh lemon juice (2teaspoons)
instructions:
0: Make the raspberry jam: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, cook the raspberries for about 4 minutes, until they start to burst and become very fragrant. Add the sugar and cook, stirring constantly, for 10-15 minutes, until running a spoon through the jam leaves an open trail at the bottom of the pot. Stir in the lemon juice. Remove the pot from the heat and let the jam cool completely. Transfer to the refrigerator and chill for at least 2 hours or overnight.
1: Make the sliders: Preheat the oven to 325°F (160°C). Line a small baking sheet with foil, leaving enough overhang so the sides can be used as handles. Grease with nonstick spray.
2: Slice the sheet of Hawaiian rolls in half horizontally, leaving the individual rolls connected. Place the bottom half in the prepared baking sheet.
3: Layer the turkey and ham on top, making sure to fold the meat to fit inside the individual squares of the rolls, then top with the Swiss cheese.
4: Spread the raspberry jam over the top half of the rolls and place on top of the cheese layer, pressing down lightly.
5: In a small bowl, mix together the egg and melted butter. Liberally brush on top of the rolls.
6: Bake the sliders until the cheese is completely melted and the buns are toasted, 25-30 minutes. If the tops begin to brown too quickly, cover loosely with foil.
7: Remove the sliders from oven and let cool for about 10 minutes, then transfer to a serving platter. Dust lightly with powdered sugar and serve whole so the sliders can be pulled apart.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、salt、pepper、corn flour (1cup)、oil (6cups)、onion、bell peppers、soy sauce (2tablespoons)、red wine vinegar (2tablespoons)、tomato paste (2tablespoons)、sugar (2tablespoons)、chicken stock (½cup)、pineapple (1 ¼cups)
instructions:
0: Season the chicken with salt and pepper.
1: Cut into bite-size chunks.
2: Dunk each chicken piece in the egg yolk, followed by the cornflour. Set aside.
3: Heat the oil in a deep saucepan until it reaches 190°C (375°F).
4: Carefully fry the chicken pieces for around 5-6 minutes, until crispy, slightly golden in colour and cooked throughout.
5: Drain onto a plate covered in kitchen roll.
6: In a large saucepan over a medium heat, add 1 tablespoon of oil and fry the onions and peppers for 2-3 minutes.
7: Stir in the soy sauce, red wine vinegar, tomato paste, sugar, and chicken stock. Cook for a further 2 minutes.
8: Add in cornflour paste.
9: Mix until the sauce has thickened.
10: Stir in the pineapple and chicken until evenly coated with the sauce.
11: Serve with rice.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts (2lb)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (1 ½teaspoons)、all-purpose flour (½cup)、dried oregano (4teaspoons)、onion powder (4teaspoons)、dried basil (4teaspoons)、garlic powder (4teaspoons)、large eggs、panko bread crumbs (2cups)、canola oil (½cup)、deli ham (8slices)、shredded gruyère cheese (¼cup)、lasagna noodles、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Slice the chicken breasts in half into cutlets and season with salt and pepper.
2: In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, salt, pepper, 2 teaspoons oregano, 2 teaspoons onion powder, 2 teaspoons basil, and 2 teaspoons garlic powder.
3: In another medium bowl, beat the eggs.
4: In another medium bowl, combine 1½ cups (75 G) of panko bread crumbs, the remaining 2 teaspoons garlic powder, 2 teaspoons basil, 2 teaspoons onion powder, and 2 teaspoons oregano.
5: In a large skillet, heat the canola oil over medium-high heat.
6: Bread the chicken cutlets by coating in the flour mixture, then in the egg, and finally in the panko.
7: Working in batches, fry the breaded cutlets in the hot oil for 2 minutes on each side, until golden brown and cooked through. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain.
8: Make the cheese sauce: In a small saucepan over medium heat, whisk together the butter and flour. Cook until the flour is golden brown, about 2 minutes.
9: Slowly whisk in the warm milk until fully incorporated. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer until thickened, about 3 minutes.
10: Turn off the heat and whisk in the Gruyère and Swiss cheeses until completely melted. Add the salt and stir to combine.
11: Spread about ⅓ of the sauce in the bottom of a  9x13-inch (22x30 cm) baking dish. Top with 4 lasagna noodles, 4 chicken cutlets, and 4 slices of ham. 13. Repeat to make another layer and then top with the remaining sauce.
12: Sprinkle the remaining ½ cup (25 G) of panko bread crumbs and the Gruyère cheese over the top.
13: Bake for 45-50 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and crispy.
14: Garnish with chopped parsley and serve.
15: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large beef short ribs
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, add the short ribs, all vegetables, herbs and black pepper to taste for the marinade. Add the wine to cover.
1: Marinate at least 6 hours in the fridge.
2: Remove the meat from the marinade and pat dry with a towel or paper towel.
3: Strain the veggies from the wine. Reserve both the wine and veggies for later.
4: Season the meat with a generous amount of salt and pepper. Coat each side with flour and set aside.
5: In a large ovenproof pot, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat on the stovetop.
6: Preheat the oven to 350F˚(180C˚).
7: When the oil begins smoking, carefully slip ribs into the pot and sear until well-browned, 4 to 5 minutes per side. Transfer ribs to plate.
8: In the same pot, sauté the veggies from the marinade until lightly caramelized and browned, 5 to 7 minutes.
9: Add the wine in the pot, stirring to deglaze. Add tomato paste and stir to dissolve. Bring the liquid to a boil so the alcohol from the wine evaporates.
10: Add beef broth and bring it back to a boil. Add the ribs back to your pot. Spoon the liquid over the ribs to coat them.
11: Cover the pot and transfer to the middle rack of your oven.
12: Bake until meat is tender enough to be pierced easily with fork, about 2½ hours, opening the oven every 30 minutes and carefully skimming the fat from surface.
13: Serve with mashed potatoes, or another side of your choice, and garnish with chopped parsley on top.
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、medium yellow onion、garlic (2cloves)、chili powder (1teaspoon)、tomato (1cup)、canned black bean (15oz)、water (3cups)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、ground black pepper (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onion, garlic, and chili powder and cook until fragrant, about 3 minutes.
1: Add the tomatoes, black beans, water, salt, and pepper and let simmer for about 20 minutes.
2: Use an immersion blender to puree the soup until slightly chunky, or transfer half of the soup to a blender and puree, then transfer back to the pot.
3: Ladle half of the soup into a bowl and garnish with red onion, cilantro, and a lime wedge. Store the remaining soup in the fridge.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:tempeh (8oz)、olive oil、low sodium soy sauce (3tablespoons)、garlic powder (2teaspoons)、chili powder (2teaspoons)、cumin (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Cut the tempeh into a medium dice.
1: In a medium saucepan, heat a drizzle of olive oil over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the tempeh and cook for 6-8 minutes, until golden brown.
2: Add the soy sauce, garlic powder, chili powder, and cumin, stir, and cook for another 5 minutes, until all of the seasonings are well-distributed and the tempeh is browned. Remove the pan from the heat.
3: Make the avocado dressing: In a blender, combine the avocado, lime juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper and blend until smooth. Add the water 1 tablespoon at a time until your desired consistency is reached.
4: Arrange the lettuce, tomatoes, black beans, corn, cilantro, red onion, and tempeh in a large bowl and pour over the avocado dressing.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken thighs (1lb)、olive oil、salt、pepper、green beans (8oz)、carrots、cherry tomatoes (8oz)
instructions:
0: In a small bowl, combine lemon juice, olive oil, honey, and garlic. Set aside.
1: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
2: In a cast-iron skillet, brown chicken for 2-3 minutes on each side. Add olive oil, salt, and pepper. Remove from pan and set aside.
3: Add the green beans, cherry tomatoes, and carrots to the pan. Return chicken to pan on top of the vegetables.
4: Pour the sauce on top of the chicken and veggies.
5: Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the internal temperature of the chicken reaches 165˚F (75˚C).
6: Serve immediately and enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:broccoli floret (12oz)、white onion、flank steak (1 ½lb)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、wild rice (4cups)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: In a small bowl, add the salt, pepper, garlic powder, paprika, and onion powder. Stir until well combined.
2: Place broccoli, onions, and flank steak on a baking tray.
3: Coat broccoli and onions with olive oil.
4: Sprinkle seasoning mix on flank steak, broccoli, and onions until coated.
5: Bake for 15 minutes.
6: Broil for 2 minutes.
7: For medium, internal temperature of steak should reach 145°F (65°C). Let steak rest 10 minutes before cutting.

9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:puff pastry (1sheet)、alfredo sauce (¼cup)、broccoli (1cup)、shredded chicken (1cup)、shredded cheddar cheese (½cup)、egg
instructions:

1: Cut the puff pastry into six rectangles and place on a nonstick baking tray.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:mac 'n' cheese (1box)、bacon (1cup)、grated monterey jack cheese (¼cup)、grated mozzarella cheese (¼cup)、pepper
instructions:
0: Prepare 1 box of Mac 'N' Cheese according to instructions on box.

2: Top with desired garnish. Serve immediately.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:shredded chicken (2cups)、salt (1teaspoon)、onion、red bell pepper、jalapeño、shredded monterey jack cheese (2cups)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、paprika (1tablespoon)、chili powder (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、lime、red enchilada sauce (1cup)、zucchinis、fresh cilantro
instructions:
0: In a bowl mix together chicken, onion, red bell pepper, jalapeno, 1 cup of Monterey Jack (100 g), enchilada sauce, lime juice, garlic powder, chili powder, salt, pepper. Mix thoroughly and set aside until ready to use.
1: With a peeler, peel slices of zucchini vertically. Once you can no longer peel a whole slice of zucchini peel the rest into smaller strips and save for zoodles!
2: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
3: Spread chicken mixture on to a slice of zucchini and roll into a tight spiral.
4: Place in a greased springform pan and bake for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with the rest of the cheese and bake for 10 more minutes until cheese has melted.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sesame oil (3tablespoons)、rice wine vinegar (2teaspoons)、dark soy sauce (3tablespoons)、honey (4tablespoons)、bourbon whiskey (30mL)、fresh lime juice (15mL)、garlic cloves (4medium cloves)、smoked paprika (2teaspoons)、dark muscovado sugar (4tablespoons)、red chili flakes (1teaspoon)、corn flour (2teaspoons)、sesame seeds (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 150 degrees celsius.
1: Mix together the salt, pepper and sugar for the rub and apply liberally over the ribs.
2: Wrap entirely in foil and bake in the oven for 2 hours at 150 degrees celsius / 300 degrees Fahrenheit.
3: In a saucepan, combine all of the sauce ingredients and bring to a boil then immediately reduce the heat until the sauce thickens and then set aside.
4: Remove the ribs from the oven and unwrap from the foil. Brush a generous amount of the BBQ sauce over both sides of the ribs and place back in the oven for a further 10 minutes.
5: Remove from the oven, brush more bbq sauce on and sprinkle with sesame seeds.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flank steak (1lb)
instructions:
0: Combine steak and all marinade ingredients in a large plastic storage bag or bowl.  Toss to coat.  Marinade at least 1 hour or up to 24.
1: Remove meat from marinade, discard.
2: Heat a grill, grill pan or large saute pan to high heat.  Cook to desired doneness.  Allow the meat to rest at least 10 minutes before thinly slicing against the grain.
3: To prepare the sauce, combine mayo, chipotles, lime juice and salt.  Stir to combine.
4: Heat a saute pan to medium heat.
5: Place one corn tortilla in the pan, sprinkle about ¼ cup (25 G) cheddar cheese on top.  Cover with a second corn tortilla.  Cook just until the cheese is melted, flipping once.  The tortillas should be soft and pliable, not crispy.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium sweet potato、white bean (15oz)、small onion、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、red pepper flakes (1teaspoon)、nutritional yeast (⅓cup)、fresh parsley (⅓cup)、lemon juice (1tablespoon)、seasoned bread crumbs (½cup)、salt、black pepper、canola oil、chipotle mayo (4tablespoons)、red onion、avocado
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: In a large bowl, add the roasted sweet potato, white beans, onion, parsley, lemon juice, and seasonings.
2: Using a potato masher, mash the ingredients until thoroughly mixed together.
3: Once mashed, add the bread crumbs and mix them in.
4: In a pan, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat. Add the patties and cook for 3 minutes on each side. Transfer to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet and bake for 10 minutes.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large red bell peppers、small red onion、ground beef (½lb)、feta cheese (3oz)、kalamata olives、fresh parsley leaf (¼cup)、fresh mint leaf (¼cup)、kosher salt、black pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (205°C).
1: Cut the tops off of the bell peppers, then scrape out the seeds and white pith. Save the pepper tops and set them aside.
2: In a medium mixing bowl, combine all the remaining ingredients, season with salt and pepper, and stir together so that everything is thoroughly mixed.
3: Divide the beef mixture in half and stuff it into the peppers, then place the tops of the peppers back on top.
4: Transfer the peppers to a baking sheet or oven-safe skillet, then bake in the preheated oven until the meat is cooked through and the peppers are soft and starting to shrivel, 40 to 45 minutes.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:fresh basil (1cup)、fresh arugula (1cup)、lemon juice (½lemon)、olive oil (⅓cup)、water (½cup)、garlic (2cloves)、pepper (1teaspoon)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、almond meal (1 ¼cups)、vegan spaghetti (1lb)、pasta water (⅓cup)
instructions:
0: Combine basil, arugula, lemon juice, water, and olive oil to a blender and blend for 5-10 seconds.
1: Add garlic, salt, pepper, and almond meal to the blender and blend until completely incorporated.
2: Boil salted water and cook spaghetti according to packaging instructions.
3: When draining the pasta, reserve ⅓ to 1 cup (80 to 235 ml) of water.
4: Once drained, return the pasta to the pot, and stir in the pesto, adding reserved pasta water until the sauce reaches desired consistency.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsalted butter (7tablespoons)、flour (¼cup)、milk (3cups)、water (2cups)、elbow macaroni (1lb)、cream cheese (4oz)、shredded sharp white cheddar cheese (1 ¼cups)、shredded fontina cheese (1 ¼cups)、shredded havarti cheese (1cup)、smoked gouda cheese (1cup)、cayenne pepper (¼teaspoon)、salt、pepper、garlic (1clove)、ritz cracker (1 ½cups)、fresh basil leaf
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: In a large pan, melt 4 tablespoons of butter over medium heat. Whisk in the flour, reducing heat to medium-low, cooking for 1 minute.
2: Gradually whisk in the milk and water. Add the macaroni and cook over medium-high heat until boiling. Stir frequently for 8 to 10 minutes, until the pasta is al dente.
3: Remove the pan from the heat and add the cream cheese, cheddar cheese, fontina, Gouda, and cayenne, and season with salt and pepper. Stir until fully combined.
4: Transfer the mixture to a grease baking dish.
5: In a medium skillet, melt the remaining 3 tablespoons of butter over medium-low heat. Add the garlic and cook for 30 seconds, stirring frequently.
6: Add the crushed crackers and stir to combine. Toast the crumbs until browned, stirring for 3 to 5 minutes. Remove the pan from the heat.
7: Sprinkle the toasted crumbs over the macaroni and cheese, and bake for 15 to 20 minutes.
8: Remove from the oven and rest for 5 minutes.
9: Serve with fresh basil
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、salt (1tablespoon)、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、smoked paprika (1tablespoon)、onion powder (1tablespoon)、chili powder (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、cayenne pepper (½teaspoon)、bacon (20slices)、BBQ sauce (1cup)、cheddar cheese (10slices)、green bell peppers、red onion、red bell peppers
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Cut each chicken breast in half crosswise, then cut the larger half again horizontally, creating 3 cutlets. Transfer to a large bowl.
2: In a small bowl, combine the salt, garlic powder, smoked paprika, onion powder, chili powder, black pepper, and cayenne pepper. Stir to combine.
3: Pour the spice mix over the chicken cutlets and toss to coat completely in the seasoning. Set the chicken aside.
4: Arrange the bacon slices in a 9x5-inch (23x13-cm) loaf pan, making sure the bottom and sides are fully covered, and that the strips hang over the sides.
5: Layer in 4 seasoned chicken cutlets, 2 tablespoons of barbecue sauce, 5 slices of cheddar cheese, 4 more chicken cutlets, another 2 tablespoons of barbecue sauce, the green pepper, onion, 2 tablespoons of barbecue sauce, the red pepper, 5 remaining cheese slices, and the remaining chicken. Then, wrap the overhanging strips of bacon over the top of the loaf.
6: Cover the loaf with foil and bake for 1 hour. Then remove the foil, drain any excess fat, and bake for another 30 minutes uncovered, making sure the chicken is cooked through and the bacon is brown and crispy.
7: Remove the bacon loaf from the oven and turn on the broiler. Invert the loaf onto a wire rack set atop a baking sheet and baste the loaf with the remaining barbecue sauce.
8: Broil for 5 minutes, until the glaze dries slightly.
9: Slice and serve with rolls or other barbecue party food.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:water (4cups)、full bodied red wine (1bottle)、spaghetti (1lb)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、garlic (4cloves)、red pepper flakes (1teaspoon)、butter (2tablespoons)、freshly grated parmesan cheese (1cup)、flatleaf italian parsley (½cup)
instructions:
0: Measure ¼ cup (60 ml) of wine and set aside.
1: Combine the water and the remainder of the bottle of wine in a large pot and bring to a boil.
2: Once boiling, add spaghetti and cook (stirring frequently) until al dente, about 7 minutes.
3: Reserve ¼ cup (60 ml) of the cooking liquid and drain the spaghetti. Set aside.
4: In a large skillet, heat the olive oil on medium heat. Add the garlic and red pepper flakes and cook for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5: Add the reserved cooking liquid and reserved wine to the skillet and bring to a simmer. Add the pasta and toss to coat with the sauce.
6: Add the butter and stir until it melts into the pasta.
7: Add salt and pepper, parmesan, and parsley. Stir to combine.
8: Serve on its own or top with more parmesan and parsley and open up another bottle of wine!
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flank steak (1lb)、green bell pepper、yellow bell pepper、red bell pepper、red onion、olive oil、salt、pepper、chili powder、garlic powder、cumin (1teaspoon)、lime、fresh cilantro、whole grain tortillas
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C).
1: Lay the flank steak in the middle of a baking sheet. Arrange the bell peppers and red onion around it. Drizzle everything with olive oil and season with salt, pepper, chili powder, garlic powder, and cumin.
2: Using your hands, rub the seasoning into the vegetables, then into the steak. Flip the steak and season the other side.
3: Squeeze the lime juice over the top of the steak and veggies.
4: Cook for 12 minutes, or until the meat has reached your desired doneness.
5: Transfer the steak to a cutting board and let it rest for 10 minutes, then slice it into pieces, going against the grain.
6: Fill up a warm tortilla with the steak, bell peppers, and onion.
7: Garnish with cilantro, and serve.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken stock (3cups)、saffron thread (1pinch)、shrimp (½lb)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、freshly ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、chorizo (1 ½cups)、medium yellow onion、garlic (3cloves)、paprika (1teaspoon)、arborio rice (1 ½cups)、diced tomato (14 ½oz)、mussels (½lb)、frozen peas (½cup)、lemon、fresh parsley leaves (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Add the chicken stock to a microwave-safe liquid measuring cup and microwave on high power for 3 minutes, until hot. Stir in the saffron threads and set aside.
1: On a cutting board, pat the shrimp dry with paper towels. Season with 1 teaspoon of salt and the pepper on both sides and set aside.
2: Heat the olive oil in a 12-inch (30 cm) cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat until it begins to shimmer. Add the chorizo and cook, stirring, until browned in spots, 3 minutes. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 3 minutes. Add the garlic and paprika and cook, stirring, until aromatic, about 30 seconds. Add the rice and stir until lightly toasted, 1 minute.
3: Add the tomatoes and reserved chicken stock and stir to combine. Reduce the heat to low and cover the pan with a lid. Cook without stirring until the rice is al dente, 15 minutes.
4: Remove the lid and arrange the shrimp, mussels, and peas on top of the rice. Cover and increase the heat to medium-high. Cook until the shrimp are opaque and the mussels are open, 5 minutes. Discard any mussels that do not open.
5: Remove the lid and pour the lemon juice over the paella. Sprinkle with the remaining teaspoon of salt and the parsley and serve.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:broccoli (½cup)、carrot、onion、olive oil、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 475°F (240°C).
1: In a bowl, combine all ingredients for the meatballs. Mix until all ingredients are incorporated.
2: Using your hands or a spoon, roll a bit of the meat mixture in between your hands until a meatball is formed. Place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
3: Next to the meatballs, spread assorted veggies and lightly with drizzle oil, salt, and pepper.
4: Bake at for 15 minutes, or until meatballs are cooked through and vegetables are soft.
5: In a microwave-safe bowl, add all the ingredients for the orange sauce.
6: Stir orange sauce until well combined.
7: Microwave for 1 minute, stirring at 30 seconds.
8: Put veggies and meatballs over a bowl of rice and pour the sauce as desired.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:potatoes、toscana sausages、italian tomatoes、onion、green chilli、butter (1tablespoon)、oil (2tablespoons)、mozzarella cheese (7oz)、parmesan cheese、milk (1cup)、fresh parsley (¼cup)、green onion (¼cup)、salt (3teaspoons)、pepper (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Peel the potatoes and put in a large pan with water along with the sausages. Cook until the potatoes are tender enough to be mashed.
1: Drain and mash the potatoes. Set aside. Chop the sausages and set aside.
2: In a large pan, add the butter, ½ grated onion, mashed potatoes, and milk. Mix until it becomes a puree. Season with salt and pepper. Set aside.
3: In a large pan, put the oil, chopped onion, green chilli and mix until the onion is transparent.
4: Add the chopped sausage, tomatoes, and salt. Cook until the tomatoes are soft and become a sauce. Sprinkle in the parsley and green onions. Mix gently. Set aside.
5: Preheat the oven to 200ºC (400ºF).
6: In a large, oven-safe casserole dish, smooth a layer of half the potato puree, a layer sausage sauce, mozzarella, then the remaining potato puree.
7: Sprinkle the top with parmesan cheese and chopped parsley.
8: Bake for 35 minutes or until the cheese is melted and the top layer is turning it is golden.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、onion powder (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、lemon juice (6tablespoons)、bacon (6strips)、asparagus (12stalks)、greek yogurt (1cup)、fresh parsley (3tablespoons)、fresh dill (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: On a cutting board, slice chicken lengthwise into 1-inch (2 cm) thick slices. Take each slice of chicken and cut it in half lengthwise leaving about 1 inch (2 cm) uncut on one end of the strip.
1: Cut off part of the uncut end of the chicken so you do not have a thick spot in the middle of your longer chicken strip.
2: Place chicken strips in a bowl. Add ½ teaspoon salt, pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, and 3 tablespoons lemon juice and mix to combine.
3: Transfer to the refrigerator.
4: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
5: On a cutting board, slice each piece of bacon lengthwise creating 12 strips in total.
6: Wrap the cut strip of bacon around the asparagus.
7: Wrap a marinated chicken strip around the bacon-wrapped asparagus. Repeat with remaining ingredients.
8: Place each bacon chicken asparagus twist on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
9: Bake for 10 minutes.
10: Turn up the heat to broil, and broil for 10 minutes. Flip the twists over, and broil for an additional ten minutes.
11: In a bowl add the Greek yogurt parsley, dill, ½ teaspoon salt, and 3 tablespoons lemon juice. Stir until well combined.
12: Remove bacon asparagus twists from baking sheet, and let cool. Serve with herb yogurt dipping sauce.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flax meal (2tablespoons)、water (6tablespoons)、olive oil、carrot、celery (1stalk)、onion (½cup)、cremini mushroom (2cups)、garlic (3cloves)、red bell pepper (½cup)、tomato paste (2tablespoons)、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (¼teaspoon)、dried parsley (1tablespoon)、dried thyme (½teaspoon)、soy sauce (1tablespoon)、vegan worcestershire (1tablespoon)、lentils (2cups)、brown rice (¾cup)、quick-cook oats (¾cup)、ketchup (¼cup)、maple syrup (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: To make the flax eggs, combine the flax meal and water in a small bowl and mix well. Set aside for at least 10 minutes.
1: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2: In a large saucepan, heat a bit of olive oil over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the carrot and celery and cook until lightly browned, 2-3 minutes.
3: Add the onion and mushrooms. Cook another 3-4 minutes, until the onions are semi-translucent.
4: Add another drizzle of olive oil to the pan, then add the garlic, bell pepper, and tomato paste. Cook for 2 more minutes, until the tomato paste is slightly browned.
5: Add the salt, pepper, parsley, and thyme, and cook for 1 more minute, until fragrant.
6: Add the soy sauce and Worcestershire sauce and cook for 2 more minutes, or until the vegetables are tender. Remove the pan from the heat.
7: In a food processor, add the lentils, brown rice, oats, flax eggs, and sautéed vegetables. Pulse 10-12 times until the mixture is slightly chunky.
8: Transfer the mixture to a parchment paper-lined loaf pan and smooth the top with a spatula.
9: To make the glaze, combine the ketchup and maple syrup in a small bowl. Brush half of glaze on top of loaf, reserving the other half for later.
10: Bake the loaf for 45-50 minutes, or until an fork inserted in the middle comes out clean.
11: Brush with the remaining glaze, then slice and serve.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (3tablespoons)、Tasty Zesty Spice Blend (1package)、panko breadcrumbs (¾cup)、large eggs、boneless skinless salmon fillets、asparagus (1lb)、kosher salt (1 ½teaspoons)、fresh ground black pepper (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C). Grease a baking sheet with 1 tablespoon olive oil.
1: In a medium bowl, mix together the zesty seasoning and bread crumbs. In a separate medium bowl, beat the eggs.
2: Coat the salmon fillets in the egg, then the bread crumb mixture. Lay the salmon on the prepared baking sheet.
3: In another medium bowl, toss the asparagus with 1 tablespoon of olive oil, the salt, and pepper. Lay asparagus beside the salmon. Drizzle everything with the remaining tablespoon olive oil, then season with more salt to taste.
4: Bake for 10–12 minutes, until the salmon and asparagus are slightly golden. Switch the oven to broil and toast for 1-2 minutes until the breadcrumbs are a dark golden brown.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:rack of lamb、fresh thyme (3sprigs)、fresh rosemary (2sprigs)、garlic (3cloves)、salt (1tablespoon)、pepper (1tablespoon)、chilli powder (1tablespoon)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、lemon、red wine (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350ºF / 175ºC.
1: Chop thyme, rosemary, and garlic together, then place in a large bowl. Add salt, pepper, chilli powder, olive oil, and lemon juice; mix well, then set aside.
2: If necessary, trim off some extra fat on the rack of lamb, then cut lamb into 4 pieces. (You can also ask your butcher to prep it for you!)
3: Place lamb in the spice mixture, then rub the spice mixture onto the lamb using your hands, covering all sides. Cover and chill in the fridge for 30 minutes.
4: Heat oil in a large cast iron or skillet.  Sear all sides of the lamb until meat is dark brown and crispy. When it’s almost done, pour in red wine then remove from the heat.
5: Roast the lamb in the oven for 10-15 minutes or until the internal temperature reaches 145˚F / 63˚C
6: Serve with roasted veggies.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:farro (3 ½cups)、lentils (1 ½cups)、grape tomato (1cup)、cucumber (1cup)、yellow bell pepper (½cup)、red bell pepper (½cup)、fresh parsley (⅓cup)、olive oil (⅓cup)、red wine vinegar (2tablespoons)、lemon juice (2tablespoons)、dijon mustard (1teaspoon)、garlic (1clove)、italian seasoning (1teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (¼teaspoon)、fresh arugula
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, combine the farro, lentils, tomatoes, cucumber, yellow pepper, red pepper, and parsley.
1: In a liquid measuring cup or small bowl, combine the olive oil, red wine vinegar, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, garlic, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper, and whisk until well-combined.
2: Pour the vinaigrette over the farro salad and toss until well-combined.
3: Distribute the farro salad into airtight containers with the arugula, if using. Refrigerate for up to 5 days.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
