ingredients:corn (4ears)、olive oil (4tablespoons)、salt (1tablespoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、flank steak (2lb)、smoked paprika (1tablespoon)、brown sugar (2tablespoons)、chili powder (2teaspoons)、onion powder (2teaspoons)、ground cumin (2teaspoons)、chipotle powder (2teaspoons)、garlic powder (2teaspoons)、canola oil、red fresno chilies、avocado、red onion、cherry tomato (1cup)、jalapeñoes、honey (1tablespoon)、lime juice (½cup)
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, drizzle the corn with 2 tablespoons of olive oil and season with salt and pepper to taste. Massage the corn until fully coated. Set aside.
1: In a small bowl, combine the paprika, salt, brown sugar, chili powder, onion powder, cumin, garlic powder, chipotle powder, and black pepper and mix together.
2: Sprinkle the dry rub all over both sides of the flank steak. Rub in the spices.
3: On a heated grill or grill pan greased with canola oil, add the seasoned flank steak and cook until it begins to char slightly, about 3 minutes each side. Remove from the grill and let rest for at least 15 minutes to cool and keep the juices inside.
4: Add the seasoned corn to the grill pan. Cook until charred slightly, 3-5 minutes per side. Remove the corn from the grill and set aside to cool.
5: Set a small bowl upside-down inside a large bowl. Stand the corn cobs on the small bowl and cut off the kernels. Remove the small bowl.
6: Add the chiles, avocado, red onion, cherry tomatoes, jalapeños, lime juice, honey, salt, pepper, and the remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil. Mix to combine.
7: Cut the meat into ½ inch (1 cm) slices.
8: Top with the corn salad and serve.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、medium yellow onion、large carrot、large red bell pepper、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、cumin (2teaspoons)、chili powder (2tablespoons)、smoked paprika (1 ½teaspoons)、cinnamon (¼teaspoon)、garlic (4cloves)、salt、pepper、diced tomato (28oz)、black beans (15oz)、kidney bean (15oz)、pinto bean (15oz)、frozen corn (1cup)、lime juice (1tablespoon)、vegetable broth (2cups)
instructions:
0: In a large Dutch oven, heat the olive oil over medium heat until shimmering. Add the onion, carrot, and bell pepper and stir. Cook for about 8 minutes, until the vegetables are tender.
1: Add the oregano, cumin, chili powder, smoked paprika, cinnamon, garlic, salt, and pepper. Stir and cook for about 2 minutes, until fragrant.
2: Add the tomatoes, black beans, kidney beans, pinto beans, and corn and stir to combine.
3: Add the lime juice and vegetable broth and stir. Increase the heat to high and bring the chili to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer uncovered for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
5: In the meantime, prepare the cornbread batter: In a medium bowl, whisk the egg and milk until well-combined.
6: In a large bowl, combine the cornmeal, flour, brown sugar, salt, baking powder, and baking soda.
7: Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and whisk until smooth. Add the melted butter and stir to combine. Add the jalapeño and stir to incorporate.
8: Remove the chili from the heat. Pour the cornbread batter over the chili and use a spatula to smooth the top and make sure it covers the chili completely.
9: Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the cornbread is fully cooked and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Let cool for about 10 minutes.
10: Garnish the cornbread with sliced jalapeño and chopped cilantro.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:russet potatoes、canola oil、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、cod fillets (2lb)、freshly ground black pepper、all-purpose flour (2 ½cups)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、beer (1bottle)、fresh parsley、lemon、tartar sauce、ketchup、malt vinegar
instructions:
0: Add the potatoes to a bowl of cold water to remove excess starch and prevent discoloration.
1: Pour oil to a depth of 6 inches (15 cm) in a large heavy pot. Heat over medium-high heat until oil reaches 325˚F (160˚C).
2: Drain the potatoes and blot dry thoroughly with paper towels.
3: Working in batches, fry the potatoes in the hot oil for about 5 minutes, or until pale golden. With a slotted spoon or spider, transfer to a wire rack to drain. Season with salt.
4: Increase the heat to high. When the oil temperature reaches 375˚F (190˚C), return the fries to the pot and fry until golden brown. Transfer to the rack to drain again and season with more salt.
5: Reduce the heat to medium-high to let the oil temperature reduce to 350˚F (180˚C).
6: Pat the cod fillets dry with a paper towel. Season all over with salt and pepper.
7: Add 1 cup (125 G) of flour to a plate. Dredge the cod in the flour, shaking off any excess.
8: In a large bowl, whisk to combine the remaining 1½ cups (185 G) of flour, 1 teaspoon salt, and baking powder. Gradually add the beer, whisking until smooth.
9: Dip the dredged cod in the batter, turning to coat completely.
10: Fry the cod in the hot oil until golden brown on all sides, 3-5 minutes. Transfer to a wire rack to drain for 3 minutes. Season with salt.
11: Garnish the fish and chips with parsley and serve with lemon wedges, tartar sauce, ketchup, and malt vinegar.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:oil (2tablespoons)、raw shrimp (1lb)、chesapeake bay seasoning (2teaspoons)、sausage (6oz)、water (½cup)、yellow onion、red bell pepper、green bell pepper、zucchini、corn (½cup)、carrot、garlic (2cloves)、chicken broth (¼cup)、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (¼teaspoon)、fresh parsley、rice
instructions:
0: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
1: Add shrimp to skillet and season with Chesapeake Bay seasoning.
2: Cook shrimp 3-4 minutes, or until opaque. Remove from skillet and set aside.
3: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
4: Add sausage to skillet.
5: Cook until browned, turning links frequently.
6: Reduce heat to medium-low and add water to skillet.
7: Cover and simmer for 12 minutes. Remove from skillet and set aside.
8: Add onions and bell peppers to the same skillet and cook for 2 minutes.
9: Add chopped sausage, zucchini, corn, and carrot and cook for additional 2 minutes.
10: Stir in shrimp and garlic.
11: Pour chicken stock into pan and stir until well-incorporated.
12: Add salt and pepper.
13: Remove from heat.
14: Top with parsley and serve over rice if desired.
15: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil、medium white onion、kosher salt、garlic (3cloves)、parsnip (2cups)、butternut squash (3cups)、paprika (1teaspoon)、dried oregano (2teaspoons)、ground cumin (2teaspoons)、allspice (¼teaspoon)、chipotle powder (1 ½teaspoons)、cannellini bean (28oz)、fresh cilantro (¼cup)、vegetable broth (4cups)、shredded cheddar cheese
instructions:
0: In a large, heavy-bottomed pot, heat a drizzle of olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion, season with salt, and cook until the onion starts to sweat and become translucent, 3 minutes. Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, 2 minutes more.
1: Add the parsnips and butternut squash and season with salt, paprika, oregano, cumin, allspice, and chipotle powder. Stir to coat the vegetables with the spices. Cover and cook for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking, until the vegetables begin to soften.
2: Add the cannellini beans, cilantro, and vegetable broth. Increase the heat to medium-high and bring to a boil for 2 minutes. Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 15 minutes, until the chili is thickened and the vegetables are cooked through.
3: Ladle the chili into bowls and top with cilantro and cheddar cheese.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium zucchinis、medium potatoes、medium carrots、medium eggs、butter (⅓cup)、milk (⅔cup)、nutmeg (⅛teaspoon)、dried basil (½teaspoon)、dried thyme (½teaspoon)、salt、pepper、all-purpose flour (1cup)、shredded cheddar cheese (1 ½cups)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350ºF (180ºC). Line a 10-inch (25-cm) springform pan with parchment paper.
1: Carefully slice the zucchini, potatoes, and carrots very thinly with a mandoline or a sharp knife. Watch your fingers!
2: In a large bowl, combine the eggs, melted butter, and milk, and whisk until combined.
3: Add the nutmeg, basil, thyme, salt, pepper, and flour, and whisk well.
4: Add the sliced veggies to the batter and stir well until the slices are well-coated.
5: Add half of the vegetables slices to the prepared pan and flatten with a spoon.
6: Sprinkle the cheese over the vegetables.
7: Top with the rest of the vegetables and cover the pan with aluminum foil.
8: Bake for about 1½ hours, until the vegetables are fully cooked and tender.
9: Let cool for at least 10 minutes, and release the springform, slice, and serve.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、halloumi cheese (8oz)、cherry tomato (2cartons)、fresh basil (4leaves)、salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (2teaspoons)、olive oil (⅓cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat your oven to 350˚F / 175˚ C
1: Turn the block of halloumi on its side and cut it into three to four even slices. Set aside.
2: Pour the olive oil, salt, and pepper into a large plastic bag. Put the tomatoes and chicken in and massage until everything is evenly coated in the seasoned oil.
3: Dump everything onto a foil lined baking sheet. Top the chicken with the large basil leaves and then the slices of halloumi.
4: Bake for 15 minutes at 350˚, then turn on the broil setting and cook for another 10 minutes or until the cheese is golden brown and the chicken is cooked. (note: oven times vary, especially broil so keep an eye on it!)
5: Take the chicken out and let it rest on a plate and continue to cook the tomatoes for 10 more minutes back on 350˚ F. (They will become super sweet and have a great concentrated tomato flavor!)
6: Meanwhile, add the olive oil, garlic, salt, pepper, and lemon juice to a blender and blitz for 30 seconds. Next add the basil and blitz until it's the consistency of pesto, about 30 seconds.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:fusilli pasta (1lb)、fresh basil leaf (2cups)、garlic (1clove)、pine nuts (¼cup)、extra virgin olive oil (½cup)、water (¼cup)、salt、pepper、grated parmesan cheese (½cup)
instructions:
0: Cook fusilli ( or rotini) in boiling salted water until it’s al dente. Reserve 1 cup (235 ml) of the pasta water before draining.
1: Add basil, garlic, pine nuts, salt, and pepper to a food processor or blender and pulse to start to break up the ingredients. Add water and a splash of the olive oil to get things started.
2: Scrape down the sides of processor bowl to ensure everything is being incorporated evenly.
3: Put the top back on, turn on the food processor, and slowly drizzle the remaining olive oil through the hole on the top of the food processor until emulsified in the sauce.
4: Pour the pesto into a bowl, then stir in the parmesan. (The heat of the food processor will start to melt the cheese, so adding it afterwards retains a nice texture)
5: Drain the pasta and transfer to large bowl or pan.
6: Add pesto and a splash of pasta water, stirring to incorporate.
7: Add parmesan and another splash of pasta water.
8: Top off with more cheese and basil before serving.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:extra firm tofu (14oz)、low sodium soy sauce (3tablespoons)、tomato sauce (¼cup)、chili powder (2teaspoons)、garlic powder (2teaspoons)、cumin (1teaspoon)、black pepper (½teaspoon)、cayenne (1pinch)、olive oil、small corn tortillas
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400ºF (200ºC).
1: Use your hands to crumble the tofu into a medium bowl. Add the soy sauce, tomato sauce, chili powder, garlic powder, cumin, pepper, and cayenne and stir until well-combined.
2: Add a drizzle of olive oil to a large baking sheet. Transfer the tofu to the baking sheet, using a spatula to spread it out as much as possible.
3: Bake for 20-25 minutes, stirring halfway through, until golden brown and slightly crispy.
4: Fill the tortillas with the tofu, lettuce, tomato, shredded cheese, and guacamole.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:vegetable oil (6cups)、small shallot、fresh parsley leaf (¼cup)、garlic (6cloves)、chickpeas (2cans)、ground cumin (1teaspoon)、ground coriander (1 ½teaspoons)、freshly ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、all purpose flour (6tablespoons)、extra virgin olive oil (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Make the falafel: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: Heat the vegetable oil in a large pot over medium-high heat until it reaches 375°F (190°C).
2: Add the shallot, parsley, and garlic to a blender and pulse until coarsely chopped. Add the chickpeas, cumin, coriander, pepper, salt, flour, and olive oil and blend until combined, but still slightly chunky, 15–20 pulses, scraping down the sides of the blender as needed. Transfer the mixture to a large bowl and rinse out the blender.
3: Scoop the falafel mixture into 2-tablespoon portions and gently roll into balls, then flatten slightly. Place on the prepared baking sheet. You should have about 12 balls.
4: Working in batches, fry the falafel balls in the hot oil for 2–4 minutes, until dark golden brown. Transfer to paper towel-lined plate to drain, then arrange on a serving platter, garnish with parsley, and set aside while you make the dips.
5: Make the roasted red pepper hummus: Add the chickpeas, roasted red peppers, tahini, garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, paprika, pepper, and salt to the blender. Purée until smooth, adding the water 1 tablespoon at a time until the desired consistency is reached. Transfer to a serving bowl and rinse out the blender.
6: Make the tzatziki sauce: Add the cucumber, yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, dill, mint to the blender. Purée until mostly smooth, but still with some texture. Transfer to a serving bowl and top with more dill.
7: Serve the falafel, hummus, and tzatziki with pitas, red onion, cherry tomatoes, and cucumber.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、salt、ground pepper、broccoli (2heads)、carrots、red bell pepper
instructions:
0: In a large nonstick skillet, heat a small amount of cooking oil. Add chicken. Season with salt and pepper and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Remove from pan and set aside.
1: Add carrots and broccoli and cook for 1 minute. Add bell pepper and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes. Remove ingredients from pan and set aside.
2: Add orange juice, soy sauce, honey, rice vinegar, garlic, ginger, and cornstarch. Whisk. Simmer until sauce starts to thicken, about 5 minutes.
3: Add chicken back into pan.
4: Serve over cooked veggies.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:fresh cilantro (½small bunch)、white onion、red bell pepper、green bell pepper、garlic (4cloves)、ground cumin (½teaspoon)、dried oregano (½teaspoon)、canola oil (¼cup)、pimento-stuffed spanish olives、tomato sauce、dried adobo seasoning (2teaspoons)、Sazón with culantro and achiote seasoning (2packets)、pigeon peas (1can)、water (3cups)、medium grain white rice (3 ⅓cups)
instructions:
0: To the bowl of a food processor, add the cilantro, culantro, onion, red and green bell peppers and garlic. Pulse until combined. Add the cumin and oregano and pulse a few more times to incorporate. The sofrito should have the consistency of a tapenade.
1: Heat ¼ cup of canola oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. When the oil is shimmering, add the sofrito and fry, stirring constantly, until deepened in color but not brown, about 3 minutes. Add the olives, tomato sauce, adobo seasoning, Sazón seasoning, pigeon peas, and water, and stir to combine.
2: Bring the mixture to a boil, then add the rice. Cook for 15–20 minutes, until the liquid is fully evaporated and the rice around the edges of the pot looks dry.
3: Stir, then reduce the heat to low, cover, and cook the rice for another 30 minutes, stirring every 10 minutes, until the rice is tender and fluffy.
4: Serve the arroz con gandules warm alongside dishes of your choice.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:oil (1tablespoon)、garlic (1tablespoon)、chicken thighs、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、onion (1cup)、bell pepper (½cup)、sweet paprika (2tablespoons)、chili flakes (¼teaspoon)、chicken broth (½cup)、crushed tomato (15oz)、sour cream (½cup)、flour (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Heat oil over medium, add garlic, chicken, salt and pepper. Stir and cook until the chicken has some color.
1: Add the onion and bell pepper, cook until onions have slightly softened.
2: Add the sweet paprika, chili flakes, chicken broth and crushed tomatoes. Simmer covered for 40 minutes.
3: Take a ladle of the sauce and add to sour cream in a separate bowl. Mix until well combined. Add flour to the mix and stir.
4: Once it is well combined, add the mix to the pot. Stir in the mix, cover and simmer for an additional 5 minutes or until it has thickened.
5: Serve with pasta, rice or potatoes.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pasta (2cups)、onion (¾cup)、marinara sauce (1cup)、fresh basil (⅓cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、mozzarella cheese
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC).
1: Take two sheets of aluminum foil (about 12x12-inch, 30x30 cm) and stack them on top of each other.
2: Fold one side of the foil about ⅓ of the way across sheet, repeat for opposite side.
3: Pinch the corner to form a point and then flatten it to the short side of the foil, forming a raised corner. Repeat for all four sides, and make four of these.
4: Add all of the ingredients to one of the foil boats, then stir.
5: Bake for 12 minutes.
6: Allow to cool for 10 minutes.
7: Eat or pack into tupperware and refrigerate 3-5 days.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large carrot、cherry tomato (1 ½cups)、yellow bell pepper、large carrot、medium red onion、yellow bell pepper、asparagus、medium red onion、olive oil (3tablespoons)、asparagus (10spears)、salt、olive oil (3tablespoons)、pepper、salt、garlic (4cloves)、pepper、fresh thyme (4sprigs)、garlic (4cloves)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200˚C).
1: Prepare the vegetables.
2: Place cherry tomatoes, carrots, yellow bell pepper, red onion, and asparagus evenly on a baking tray. (Try not to let the vegetables overlap too much, so that they roast properly.)
3: Season with olive oil, salt, and pepper to taste.
4: Add garlic cloves and sprigs of thyme on top of the vegetables. Bake vegetables for 15 minutes.
5: Roast vegetables for 15 minutes.
6: Bring back the tray and push vegetables to the side to make room for the steak. Place the steak in the middle of the pan and season both sides with salt and pepper.
7: Top the steak with a sprig of thyme and a clove of garlic. Place back in oven for 10 more minutes or until desired doneness is reached.
8: Allow the steak to rest for 5-10 minutes. Plate the vegetables and top with cut steak.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、small yellow onion、garlic (2cloves)、fresh thyme (1teaspoon)、arborio rice (1 ½cups)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper、dry white wine (½cup)、butternut squash (4cups)、vegetable broth (4cups)、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: To prep cut off both ends of the butternut squash and poke 10-15 air vents with a fork. Microwave on high for 3-4 minutes.
1: Peel the skin off of the squash. The skin should peel right off! Once peeled, cut into 1x1-inch (2x2-cm) cubes.
2: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
3: In a large dutch oven or oven-safe pot, sauté onion in olive oil for 3-4 minutes or until semi-translucent. Add garlic and sauté for 2 more minutes.
4: Add the thyme and cook for 2 minutes, until fragrant.
5: Add arborio rice and sauté until lightly toasted, then stir in salt, pepper and white wine.
6: Stir in butternut squash and and vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
7: Cover pot and transfer to oven. Bake for 15-20 minutes, until liquid is absorbed.
8: Garnish with parsley and serve immediately
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、large white onion、lean ground beef (1lb)、pepper (½teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (2teaspoons)、paprika (2teaspoons)、diced tomato (14oz)、fresh spinach (6cups)、russet potatoes、mozzarella cheese (13slices)、fresh parsley (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat until shimmering. Add the onion and cook until golden, about 5 minutes.
1: Add the ground beef and break apart, then cook for 3 minutes until the meat is no longer pink. Add the pepper, salt, garlic powder, paprika, and tomatoes. Mix thoroughly.
2: Add the spinach and cook until just wilted, about 2 minutes. Remove the pan from the heat, cover, and set aside until ready to use.
3: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
4: Peel the potatoes and cut into ⅛-inch (3 mm) thick slices.
5: In a 9x5-inch (23x13-cm) loaf pan, arrange overlapping potato slices on the bottom of the pan so the entire bottom is covered. Line the perimeter of the pan with overlapping potato slices.
6: Place 2 slices of mozzarella over the bottom layer of potatoes. Cut 5 slices of mozzarella in half. Place 2 half slices of cheese against the potatoes on both of the longer sides of the pan and one half on both of the shorter sides. Place one half in each of the corners of the pan.
7: Spread ⅓ of the beef mixture on top of the cheese. Arrange another layer of overlapping potato slices over the beef mixture. Place 2 more slices of cheese on top of the potatoes.
8: Spread another third of the beef mixture over the cheese, then add another layer of potatoes. Place 2 more slices of cheese on top of the potatoes. Spread the rest of the beef mixture on top of the cheese.
9: Tuck potato slices around the sides of the pan until all of the gaps are filled. Place the last 2 slices of cheese on top of the beef mixture. Cover the cheese with overlapping potato slices.
10: Bake for 90 minutes, until the top is golden brown and crisp. Let cool a bit.
11: Place a cutting board over the loaf pan and invert the loaf.
12: Slice and garnish with parsley.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground beef (2lb)、salt、pepper、medium yellow onion、garlic (3cloves)、fresh spinach (2cups)、puff pastry (2sheets)、cheddar cheese (8slices)、egg、sesame seed
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: In a medium 8-inch (20-cm) cast-iron skillet, press down half of the ground beef with a spatula to mold into a patty. Season with salt and pepper.
2: Place the cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat and sear the patty until browned, about 4 minutes on each side.
3: Remove the patty from the skillet and set aside. Repeat with remaining beef.
4: Return the pan to low heat and add the onion. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the onion is caramelized, about 20 minutes.
5: Add the garlic and spinach, stirring until the spinach is cooked down, about 5 minutes.
6: Lay one sheet of puff pastry on a baking sheet and top with 1 patty.
7: Layer 4 slices of cheese over the patty, then top with the caramelized onion mixture.
8: Top with the remaining 4 slices of cheese and the other patty.
9: Cover with the other sheet of puff pastry.
10: Trim the edges of the pastry with a knife and discard.
11: Crimp the edges of the pastry, then press with a fork to seal.
12: Brush the top and sides of the pastry with the beaten egg and sprinkle with sesame seeds.
13: Bake for 30 minutes, or until the pastry is golden brown and cooked through.
14: Slice and serve with additional toppings of your choice.
15: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray、extra firm tofu (14oz)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、all-purpose flour (½cup)、cornstarch (1tablespoon)、milk (½cup)、apple cider vinegar (1teaspoon)、dijon mustard (1teaspoon)、bread crumbs (½cup)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、onion powder (1teaspoon)、nutritional yeast (1tablespoon)、ground cumin (1teaspoon)、cayenne (¼teaspoon)、olive oil、honey mustard dipping sauce
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 425ºF (220ºC). Grease a baking sheet with nonstick spray.
1: Wrap the tofu in a clean dish towel and place a heavy object, such as a cast-iron skillet, on top. Press the tofu for 20 minutes to remove excess liquid.
2: Flip the tofu block on its side and slice in half lengthwise. Season all over with salt and pepper.
3: Cut each piece of tofu lengthwise into quarters so you have 8 equally-sized pieces.
4: In a medium bowl, combine the flour and cornstarch. Mix with a fork.
5: In a separate medium bowl, combine the milk, apple cider vinegar, and Dijon mustard. Whisk with a fork until combined.
6: In another medium bowl, combine the bread crumbs, salt, pepper, garlic powder, paprika, onion powder, nutritional yeast, cumin, and cayenne. Mix with a fork until combined.
7: Take a piece of tofu and coat it in the flour mixture, followed by the milk mixture, then back into the flour mixture, back into the milk mixture, and finally, in the bread crumbs.
8: Place on the prepared baking sheet and repeat with the remaining tofu sticks.
9: Using a brush, coat each tender with an even layer of olive oil.
10: Bake for 30-35 minutes, flipping halfway through, until golden brown and crispy. Brush with more olive oil, if necessary.
11: Serve with honey mustard dipping sauce.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、onion、red pepper、yellow pepper、green pepper、salt、pepper、shredded cheddar cheese (½cup)、pepper jack cheese (4oz)、cream cheese (4oz)、boneless, skinless chicken breasts、chili powder (1tablespoon)、cumin (1tablespoon)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Heat olive oil in a pan over high heat. Cook the peppers, onion, salt, and pepper until soft and slightly caramelized. Remove from heat.
1: Add the cheddar, pepper jack, and cream cheese to the pan, stirring until evenly incorporated.
2: Season chicken with the salt, chili powder, cumin, and garlic powder, evenly rubbing the spices over the chicken.
3: Slice a pocket in the chicken horizontally and fill the pocket with a heaping spoonful of the fajita mixture.
4: Repeat for all chicken breasts and remove any excess fajita mixture from the pan.
5: Heat pan over medium heat. If needed, add  olive oil.
6: Cook the stuffed chicken until chicken is cooked through and cheese is melted, about 7 minutes on each side.
7: Serve with salsa, sour cream, and guacamole!
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bell peppers、olive oil (2tablespoons)、medium onion、garlic (3cloves)、zucchinis、eggplant、medium tomatoes、dried thyme (½teaspoon)、dried rosemary (½teaspoon)、dried basil (½teaspoon)、salt、pepper、all purpose flour (½cup)、vegetarian parmesan cheese (½cup)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、butter (6tablespoons)、quinoa (2cups)、fresh basil
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: Cut the top off of each pepper and remove the seeds and ribs. Transfer to a baking dish. Bake for 20 minutes, until softened.
2: Heat the oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add the onion and cook for about 2 minutes, until softened and translucent.
3: Add the garlic and cook for about 1 minute, until fragrant.
4: Add the zucchini, eggplant, tomatoes, thyme, rosemary, basil, salt, and pepper and stir to combine. Cover, reduce the heat to medium, and simmer for about 30 minutes, until very tender but not mushy, stirring occasionally.
5: In a small bowl, combine the flour, Parmesan, and oregano. Add the butter and mix with your fingers until the butter has broken down into small pieces and the mixture is crumbly.
6: Fill each pepper with the quinoa and vegetables, then top with the crumble mixture.
7: Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the tops are golden brown. Garnish with fresh basil.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bone-in beef short rib (2lb)、kosher salt (3teaspoons)、freshly ground black pepper (3teaspoons)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、yellow onion (1cup)、carrot (1 ½cups)、garlic (2cloves)、tomato paste (2tablespoons)、port or red wine (2cups)、crushed tomato (28oz)、beef stock (1cup)、dijon mustard (1tablespoon)、bay leaves、fresh thyme (6sprigs)、water (1cup)、pappardelle pasta (2lb)、fresh parsley、grated parmesan cheese
instructions:
0: Pat the short ribs with paper towels to remove any excess moisture, then season generously with 2 teaspoons kosher salt and 2 teaspoons pepper.
1: Add the olive oil to a Dutch oven or large, heavy-bottomed pot and heat over high heat until shimmering. Add half the short ribs and sear on each side until deep brown, about 7 minutes total. Remove from the pan and set aside. Repeat with the remaining short ribs.
2: Discard all but 1 tablespoon of rendered fat from the pot. Add the onion, carrot, garlic, 1 teaspoon of salt, and 1 teaspoon of pepper. Sauté over medium heat until the vegetables are softened, about 5 minutes.
3: Add the tomato paste and sauté for a few more minutes, until darkened and thickened.
4: Pour in the wine and use a wooden spoon to scrape any browned bits, or fond, from the bottom and sides of the pan. Reduce the liquid by half, about 15 minutes.
5: Add the crushed tomatoes, beef stock, mustard, bay leaves, and thyme to the pot. Stir to combine.
6: Add the short ribs, making sure the meat is submerged. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover. Simmer for about 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Add up to 1 cup (240 ml) of water as needed if the sauce gets too thick. Skim excess fat off the top as needed. The short ribs are done when the meat pulls apart easily.
7: Discard any bones that the meat has fallen off of, as well as the bay leaves and thyme stems. Transfer the short ribs to a cutting board. Pull out any remaining bones and discard. Using two forks, shred the meat, then return to the pot.
8: Add salt and pepper to taste. Simmer for 15 minutes over low heat.
9: Cook the pasta according to the package instructions. Plate the pasta in shallow bowls and ladle a scoop of ragù on top. Garnish with finely chopped parsley and freshly grated Parmesan cheese.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground beef (12oz)、kosher salt、freshly ground black pepper、vegetable oil (1tablespoon)、cheese (2slices)、hamburger buns、topping of your choice
instructions:
0: Divide the beef into 2 patties, each about ¾-inch (2 cm) thick and 3 ½ inches (9 cm) in diameter.  Transfer the patties to a plate or a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
1: Remove the patties from the fridge and season on both sides with salt and pepper.
2: Heat a large cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat. Add the oil to the pan and swirl to evenly coat. Place the patties in the skillet and cook, undisturbed, on the first side for 5 minutes, until a brown crust forms.
3: Flip the patties, top each with a slice of cheese (optional), and cook, undisturbed, until the patties are browned on the other side, the cheese is melted, and the meat is cooked through, about 5 minutes more for medium-well doneness.
4: Remove the patties from the pan and transfer to a clean cutting board. Let rest for about 5 minutes.
5: Place the burger patties on buns and serve with your favorite toppings and sauces.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground beef (2lb)、onion (1cup)、garlic (3cloves)、grated parmesan cheese (1 ½cups)、eggs、panko breadcrumbs (1cup)、salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (1 ½teaspoons)、worcestershire sauce (2teaspoons)、milk (½cup)、fresh parsley (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: In a large bowl, mix together beef, cooked onions and garlic, Parmesan, eggs, panko, salt, pepper, Worcestershire, milk and parsley. Set aside.
2: In another bowl, make the glaze by mixing ketchup, brown sugar, mustard powder, onion powder, paprika, and tomato paste. Reserve half of the glaze in a separate bowl for after the meatloaf is cooked. Set aside.
3: In a large bowl, mash cooked potatoes, butter, salt, pepper, milk and parmesan to desired consistency. Set aside.
4: Line a bundt pan with slices of bacon and use a pastry brush to spread a layer of glaze on the inside of the bacon.
5: Add ⅔ of the meat to the bottom of the bundt pan and spread up the sides and up the middle of the pan making a “bowl” for the mashed potatoes.
6: Add the mashed potatoes into the “bowl” and smooth out. Top the mashed potatoes with the remaining meat, smooth out, coat the top with the raw meat glaze, and fold the slices of bacon over the top of the meat. Cover with foil and bake for 1 hour, remove the foil after 30 minutes and carefully drain some of the fat before putting it back into the oven.
7: Place a cooling rack on top of the bundt pan and flip over onto a baking sheet. Remove the bundt pan and coat the meatloaf with the reserved glaze.
8: Broil on high for 3-5 minutes or until the glaze has caramelized.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:new potato (2lb)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、lemon juice (4tablespoons)、garlic (4cloves)、fresh thyme (2tablespoons)、salt、pepper、honey (2tablespoons)、ginger (2teaspoons)、salmon fillets、asparagus (1lb)、lemon (1slice)、fresh thyme (4sprigs)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Cover a sheet pan with aluminum foil and spray with nonstick cooking spray.
2: Spread out your potatoes on the pan and drizzle with 1 Tbsp. olive oil and 1 Tbsp. lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper and sprinkle ½ Tbsp. thyme, and 1 clove minced garlic over the potatoes.
3: Bake for 15 minutes, flip, then bake for another 10 minutes.
4: In the meantime, create your salmon glaze. Combine 2 Tbsp. lemon juice, 2 Tbsp. honey, 2 tsp ginger, 2 cloves minced garlic, and 1 Tbsp. thyme. Set aside.
5: Take the potatoes out of the oven and push them to the top or side of your pan. (Don’t cramp them — Make sure to still space them out a bit.)
6: Place your salmon fillets on the pan. Season both sides with salt and pepper and brush on the glaze onto both sides, then top with lemon slices and sprigs of thyme.
7: Place your asparagus on the pan and top with 1 Tbsp. olive oil, 1 Tbsp. lemon juice, salt and pepper, 1 clove minced garlic, and ½ Tbsp. of thyme.
8: Bake for 8-10 minutes. (The salmon should flake easily with a fork when it’s ready.)
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:elbow macaroni (½lb)、apple cider vinegar (3tablespoons)、kosher salt (1 ½teaspoons)、whole milk (½cup)、sugar (3tablespoons)、mayonnaise (1cup)、white onion (¼cup)、carrot (1cup)、freshly ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、scallions
instructions:
0: Drain the macaroni and transfer to a large bowl. While the pasta is still hot, mix in the apple cider vinegar and set aside to cool for 10 minutes.
1: In a small bowl, mix together 1 teaspoon of salt, ½ cup (120 ml) of milk, the sugar, and ½ cup (120 G) of mayonnaise.
2: Toss the mayonnaise mixture with the slightly warm macaroni until well coated. Refrigerate for 1 hour, or up to 4 hours, until fully cooled.
3: To the cooled macaroni, add the remaining ½ cup (120 G) of mayonnaise, the onion, and carrots. If the pasta appears a bit dry, add up to ¼ cup (60 ml) more milk. Season with the remaining ½ teaspoon of salt and the pepper.
4: Garnish with the scallions before serving.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cauliflower (1medium head)、mushroom (5oz)、olive oil (1 ½tablespoons)、medium yellow onion、garlic (2cloves)、ground cumin (2teaspoons)、smoked paprika (1 ½teaspoons)、chili powder (2tablespoons)、soy sauce (2tablespoons)、salt、pepper、large flour tortilla、shredded mexican cheese blend、onion、green pepper
instructions:
0: Cut the cauliflower in half and break it into small florets.
1: Place the florets in a food processor and pulse until they break down to rice-size pieces. Remove from the processor and set aside.
2: Add the mushrooms to the food processor and pulse until broken down to rice-size pieces.
3: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic to the pan and cook for about 4 minutes, until fragrant and the onion is translucent.
4: Add the cauliflower, mushrooms, cumin, smoked paprika, chili powder, soy sauce, salt, and pepper and stir. Cook for about 10 minutes, until the cauliflower and mushroom mixture is tender and the water released from the mushrooms has evaporated.
5: Heat a tortilla over low heat in a large, greased skillet.
6: Sprinkle the tortilla with a layer of cheese, then add a layer of cauliflower “meat”, caramelized onions and peppers, and another layer of cheese.
7: Top with another tortilla and cook for about 4 minutes, until the bottom layer of cheese has melted and the bottom tortilla is golden brown.
8: Carefully flip the quesadilla and cook for another 4 minutes, until all of the cheese has melted.
9: Repeat.
10: Slice each tortilla into wedges and serve.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:garlic (3cloves)、asparagus (15spears)、olive oil (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、penne pasta (8oz)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 425˚F/220˚C.
1: In a large pot, bring 4 quarts of water to a rolling boil.
2: Remove the woody ends of the asparagus and discard. Cut the remaining spears into quarters and place on a baking sheet. Drizzle olive oil, salt, and pepper over the asparagus and toss so each piece is evenly coated. Bake for 10 minutes.
3: In the boiling water, cook the penne for 10–12 minutes, or until al dente, and drain.
4: Using a blender or food processor, blend basil, pine nuts, garlic, and olive oil until it becomes a paste. Add in Parmesan and salt and blend.
5: In a large bowl, combine cooked pasta, sun-dried tomatoes, roasted asparagus, and pesto (about 3 hefty tablespoons). Toss together and serve hot or cold, and top with Parmesan cheese.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:skin-on chicken leg quarter (4lb)、kosher salt、black pepper、fresh thyme (3sprigs)、bay leaves、fresh parsley stems (¼bunch)、red burgundy wine (3cups)、bacon (1cup)、large carrots、large white onion、cremini mushroom (½lb)、cremini mushroom (½lb)、garlic (5cloves)、tomato paste (2tablespoons)、all-purpose flour (2tablespoons)、brandy (¼cup)、extra virgin olive oil (2tablespoons)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、pearl onion (8oz)、sugar (1pinch)、fresh parsley (¼cup)、baguette
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, season the chicken with salt and pepper. Toss until well coated.
1: Tie the thyme sprigs, bay leaves, and parsley stems together with kitchen twine to make a bouquet garni.
2: Add the bouquet garni to the bowl with the chicken. Pour the wine over the chicken. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or, even better, overnight.
3: In a large Dutch oven, cook the bacon over medium-low heat until the fat has rendered and the bacon is crisp, 15 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer the bacon to a paper towel-lined plate, leaving any excess fat in the pot.
4: Remove the chicken from the marinade, reserving the liquid, and place on a paper towel-lined sheet pan. Pat the chicken with more paper towels until completely dry.
5: Heat the bacon fat over medium heat until nearly smoking. Working in batches, add the chicken legs skin-side down in a single layer and cook until well browned, 5 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the pot and set aside.
6: Add the carrots, onion, sliced mushrooms, and garlic to the pot. Cook until the vegetables are softened and lightly browned, about 10 minutes.
7: Stir in the tomato paste and cook for 3 minutes, until darkened and fragrant. Then, sprinkle in the flour and cook for another minute, until incorporated.
8: Pour the brandy into the pot and cook, scraping up any browned bits at the bottom of the pot, until the liquid has evaporated, 2 minutes.
9: Add the reserved marinade, including the bouquet garni. Stir to incorporate, then bring to a boil and cook until the liquid is reduced by half, about 15 minutes. 
10: Return the chicken and half the cooked bacon to the pot. Cover, reduce the heat to low, and simmer for 1 hour, until the chicken is tender and the sauce has thickened.
11: Meanwhile, heat the olive oil and butter in a large, preferably nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add the pearl onions and a pinch of salt and sugar. Cover, reduce the heat to low, and cook for 15 minutes, shaking the skillet often to move the onions around.
12: Uncover, add the quartered mushrooms, and increase the heat to medium-high. Continue to cook until all the vegetables have softened, 5-8 minutes. Add the onions and mushrooms to the coq au vin.
13: Sprinkle with chopped parsley and the reserved bacon. Serve with crusty bread.
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、olive oil、salt、pepper、mozzarella cheese (8oz)、tomato (1cup)、tomato、fresh basil (15leaves)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: In a saucepan, heat balsamic vinegar and honey over high heat. Stir until sauce reduces to ⅓ cup (80 ml). Set aside.
2: On a cutting board, slice the chicken breasts in half horizontally.
3: Cover chicken with a piece of plastic wrap. Using the rough side of a metal mallet, pound the chicken until ½-inch (1 cm) thick. Repeat with remaining breasts.
4: Drizzle olive oil over pieces of chicken and season with salt and pepper.
5: Place 2 slices of mozzarella on each piece of chicken. Spoon ¼ cup (50 g) of diced tomatoes on each piece of chicken. Place 3 pieces of basil on each piece of chicken.
6: Roll up the chicken, making sure the ingredients are tucked under the breast and not pushed out the sides.
7: Place the roll-ups in a greased baking dish. Drizzle each roll-up with more olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
8: Bake for 15 to 20 minutes, until internal temperature reaches 160˚F (71˚C).
9: Place one slice of mozzarella on each roll-up. Broil for 5 to 10 minutes until the mozzarella has melted over the chicken.
10: Let chicken rest for 10 minutes. Place a basil leaf and slice of tomato on each piece of chicken. Drizzle with balsamic reduction.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:plain yogurt (¾cup)、lemon juice (2tablespoons)、ginger (1tablespoon)、Schwartz® garlic granules (1tablespoon)、garam masala (1tablespoon)、cayenne (½teaspoon)、turmeric (1teaspoon)、salt (2teaspoons)、boneless skinless chicken thighs (1 ½lb)
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, mix together the yogurt, lemon juice, ginger, garlic granules, garam masala, cayenne, turmeric, and salt. Add the chicken thighs and toss to coat.
1: On the Instant Pot Sauté setting, melt the butter. Add the onion and cook until caramelized, stirring occasionally, 15–17 minutes. Remove half the onion and set aside for garnish. Push the CANCEL button to turn off Sauté mode.
2: Add the chicken and the marinade to the Instant Pot, then toss to combine with the onions. Add the bay leaves, rice, salt, saffron, and water. Gently stir to combine. Make sure all ingredients are submerged below the liquid.
3: Put the cover on the Instant Pot. Be sure the pressure valve is set to “Sealing.” Use the manual setting to set the timer for 8 minutes.
4: When the timer goes off, turn pressure valve to “Venting” to release pressure quickly. 
(Be sure to read all Instant Pot instructions carefully for safety. Be sure Instant Pot is turned off and unplugged before carefully removing the cover.)
5: Using a silicone spatula, fluff up the rice and fold to carefully combine. Serve garnishes with the reserved caramelized onions, cilantro, mint, and sliced jalapeño.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:fresh cilantro (1small bunch)、fresh culantro (1small bunch)、red bell pepper、small green bell pepper、garlic (1medium head)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、ground cumin (½teaspoon)、canola oil (1 ¼cups)、pimento-stuffed spanish olives、ground beef (1lb)、kosher salt (½teaspoon)、dried adobo seasoning (2teaspoons)、sazon goya seasoning powder (1 ¼teaspoons)、tomato sauce (1can)、very ripe plantains、shredded mozzarella cheese (3cups)、large eggs
instructions:
0: To the bowl of a food processor, add the cilantro, culantro, onion, red and green bell peppers, garlic, oregano, and cumin. Pulse until combined. The sofrito should have the consistency of a tapenade.
1: Heat ¼ cup (60 ml) of canola oil in a large pan over medium heat. Once the oil is shimmering, add the sofrito and fry, stirring constantly, until deepened in color but not brown, about 3 minutes. Add the olives to the pan and stir to combine.
2: Add the ground beef to the pan and cook until no longer pink, about 7 minutes. Season with the ½ teaspoon salt.
3: Add 1 teaspoon of adobo seasoning, the Sazón seasoning, and the tomato sauce and stir to combine. Cook, stirring occasionally, until most of the liquid is absorbed into the meat, about 7 minutes. Transfer the beef mixture to a medium bowl with a slotted spoon, discarding any excess liquid. Wipe out the pan with a paper towel and set aside.
4: Peel the plantains, cut in half crosswise, then slice each half lengthwise to get 4 thin slices.
5: Heat the remaining cup of canola oil in the same pan over medium-high heat until the oil starts to shimmer. Test one plantain slice in the oil--if it bubbles and sizzles, the oil is ready.
6: Fry the plantains in batches until they are lightly browned on the edges and tender in the centers, 4–5 minutes, turning occasionally with a fork. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain. Season on both sides with salt.
7: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
8: Arrange a single layer of plantains in the bottom of an 8-inch square baking dish. Using a slotted spoon, top with about half of the meat mixture. Sprinkle 1 cup of mozzarella over the meat sauce. Repeat with more plantains, the remaining meat sauce, and another cup of mozzarella. Finish with the remaining plantains.
9: In a medium bowl, beat the eggs with the remaining teaspoon of adobo seasoning.
10: Pour the egg mixture over the plantains, then cover the baking dish with foil.
11: Bake the pastelón until the eggs are set and the cheese is bubbly, about 25 minutes. Remove from oven and turn the oven to broil. Uncover the dish and sprinkle the remaining cup of mozzarella over the top. Broil for 5 minutes, or until cheese on top is golden brown. Let rest for 10 minutes before serving.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:fresh basil (2cups)、fresh arugula (2cups)、olive oil (⅓cup)、walnuts (⅓cup)、lemon juice (1tablespoon)、salt (¾teaspoon)、garlic (2cloves)、pepper (¼teaspoon)、water (2tablespoons)、medium zucchini、white bean (15oz)、sun-dried tomato (¾cup)、pine nuts (¼cup)、quinoa (3 ½cups)
instructions:
0: In a food processor, combine the basil, arugula, ⅓ cup (80 ml) olive oil, the walnuts, lemon juice, ¾ teaspoon salt, the garlic, ¼ teaspoon pepper, and the water, and pulse until smooth. Set aside.
1: Heat the remaining tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the zucchini and cook for 3-4 minutes, until slightly tender. Season with salt and pepper and cook for another 2 minutes, until lightly browned.
2: Add the white beans and sun-dried tomatoes and cook for 3-4 more minutes, until the beans begin to crisp. Add the pine nuts and cook for 2-3 more minutes, until toasted.
3: Transfer the zucchini mixture to a medium bowl with the quinoa. Add the pesto and stir until well-combined.
4: Distribute the quinoa between 4 airtight containers and refrigerate for up to 5 days.
5: Nutrition  Calories: 1407 Fat: 109 grams  Carbs: 135 grams Fiber:  23 grams  Sugars: 18 grams  Protein: 39 grams
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil、large eggplant、salt、pepper、red bell pepper、yellow bell pepper、small white onion、garlic (2cloves)、yellow squash、zucchini、fresh thyme (1tablespoon)、roma tomatoes、lemon、white quinoa (1cup)、water (2 ½cups)、fresh basil (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Heat a bit of olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the eggplant, season with salt and pepper, and cook, stirring occasionally, until golden brown and softened, 5-10 minutes. Remove from the pan and drain on paper towels.
1: Heat more oil in the pan, then add the bell peppers. Cook, stirring occasionally, until softened, 2-3 minutes.
2: Add the onion and garlic and cook, stirring, until the onions are soft and golden, about 3 minutes. Remove the peppers and onions from the pan.
3: Add the yellow squash and zucchini, season with salt and pepper, and cook squash have cooked down a bit, about 5 minutes.
4: Add the thyme and tomatoes, season with more salt, then add the lemon juice. Increase the heat to high and cook until mixture is sizzling. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the tomatoes start to release their juices, about 2 minutes. 
5: Return the eggplant and pepper mixture to the pan, stir to combine, then remove the pan from the heat.
6: Add the quinoa and water to a large skillet and stir to combine. Bring to a boil, then cover and reduce the heat to low. Simmer until the liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes.
7: Spoon the vegetables over quinoa and sprinkle the basil on top. Serve warm.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、garlic (3cloves)、shallot、green lentil (1 ½cups)、egg、tomato paste (1tablespoon)、fresh italian parsley (¼cup)、grated parmesan cheese (⅓cup)、whole wheat breadcrumbs (1tablespoon)、italian seasoning (1 ½tablespoons)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
1: Heat a large skillet over medium heat then add 1 tablespoon of olive oil, shallot and garlic and sauté for 2-3 minutes, or until slightly golden brown then remove from heat.
2: To a food processor, add the garlic and shallot, lentils, egg, 1 teaspoon of olive oil,  tomato paste, parsley, Parmesan, bread crumbs, Italian seasonings, salt, and pepper and pulse, mixing until just combined.
3: Transfer the mixture to a medium-sized bowl.
4: Use a cookie dough scoop to scoop out balls of mixture then carefully form into balls.
5: Arrange on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
6: Bake for 10-15 minutes.
7: Remove meatballs from oven and allow to cool for 5-10 minutes.
8: Serve with spaghetti.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray、olive oil (1tablespoon)、medium yellow onion、garlic (3cloves)、ground cumin (1teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、chili powder (¼teaspoon)、ground beef (1lb)、kosher salt (3teaspoons)、black beans (1can)、enchilada sauce (2cups)、medium flour tortillas、shredded mexican cheese blend (2cups)、fresh cilantro (¼cup)、cotija cheese
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Grease a 9 x 13-inch baking dish with nonstick spray.
1: Heat the olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook, stirring often, until beginning to soften, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic, cumin, paprika, and chili powder and cook, stirring constantly, until aromatic, about 30 seconds.
2: Add the ground beef and cook, breaking up with a wooden spoon, until the beef is browned and cooked through, about 5 minutes. Add the salt and black beans and continue cooking until warmed through, about 3 minutes. Remove the pan from the heat.
3: Add 1 cup of enchilada sauce to the bottom of the prepared baking dish and use a spatula to spread evenly.
4: Scoop ½ cup of the beef mixture onto the lower half of a tortilla, then roll up. Place the rolled tortilla seam side-down in the baking dish. Repeat with the remaining beef and tortillas, arranging in a row.
5: Top with the remaining cup of enchilada sauce. Sprinkle the shredded Mexican cheese  on top.
6: Bake until the cheese has melted, about 10 minutes.
7: Top the enchiladas with the cilantro and Cotija cheese, if desired, and serve immediately.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pineapple、water (½cup)、sugar (½cup)、rice wine vinegar (½cup)、chile flake (2tablespoons)、salt (½teaspoon)、minced garlic (1tablespoon)、salmon fillets
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
1: Cut pineapple in half lengthwise, cutting from root through the leaves.
2: Hollow out the pineapple by slicing around the perimeter, leaving a ½ inch (1 ¼ cm) border.
3: Slice the pineapple inside the cut border, and scoop out with a spoon. Repeat with the other half and set aside, as this will be the serving bowl for the salmon.
4: Add pineapple and water to a blender and blend until smooth.
5: Pour the pineapple purée into a saucepan over medium heat.
6: Add the sugar, rice wine vinegar, chile flakes, salt, and garlic to the pan and bring to a simmer. Stir frequently until sauce becomes lighter in color and slightly thickens.
7: In a small bowl, combine the cornstarch with the water to make a slurry. Add the slurry to the sauce and until sauce has thickened, 4-7 minutes. Remove the pan from the heat.
8: Place the salmon on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet and cover each fillet with the sauce.
9: Bake for 12-15 minutes, depending on your desired doneness.
10: Serve the salmon the pineapple bowls over rice with more pineapple sweet chile sauce on the side.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:wide rice noodle (½lb)、palm sugar (¼cup)、fish sauce (¼cup)、tamarind paste (¼cup)、oil (1tablespoon)、boneless, skinless chicken breast (6oz)、garlic (2cloves)、shallots、pickled turnip (1teaspoon)、egg、tofu (4oz)、green onion (½bunch)、bean sprout (½cup)、lime、peanut、red thai chile
instructions:
0: Soak rice noodles in room temperature water 30 minutes prior to cooking.
1: In a small saucepan over medium-high heat, whisk together palm sugar, tamarind paste, and fish sauce. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and reduce for 5 minutes until the sauce thickens and coats the back of a wooden spoon. Remove sauce from heat and set aside.
2: Heat a cast-iron pan or wok over high heat.
3: Add oil and chicken and cook for about two minutes until nearly cooked through and nicely seared on all sides.
4: Add minced garlic, shallots, and turnips to the chicken and stir to incorporate.
5: Move the chicken to the side of the pan and add the egg. Break the egg up with a spatula or wooden spoon and stir to scramble.
6: Add soaked rice noodles and stir to evenly incorporate all ingredients, stirring for 1 to 2 minutes.
7: Add 2 or 3 tablespoons of the reduced sauce and stir.
8: Add tofu, Chinese chives or green onions, and bean sprouts. Stir to incorporate and remove from heat.
9: Serve immediately with lime, peanuts, more sprouts and chives, and red chiles, if desired.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、low flat buttermilk (1cup)、sriracha sauce (¼cup)、panko breadcrumbs (1cup)、all-purpose flour (1cup)、salt (½teaspoon)、black pepper (¼teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、seasoning salt (½teaspoon)、canola oil (3tablespoons)
instructions:
0: On a cutting board, slice each chicken breast into strips.
1: In a bowl, combine the buttermilk and Sriracha and mix to combine. Add the chicken strips and submerge in the buttermilk mixture. Cover with plastic wrap. Or toss all of the ingredients into a resealable bag. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
2: Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚C).
3: In a shallow dish, add the Panko, flour, salt, pepper, paprika, and seasoning salt and mix to combine.
4: Dip the chicken strips in the panko mixture, ensuring they are fully coated.
5: Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper and brush with canola oil.
6: Transfer the chicken to the baking sheet, and bake for 10 minutes. Flip the chicken over, and bake for an additional 10 minutes. If desired, broil for 2-3 minutes to crisp up at the end.
7: Transfer the chicken to a paper towel-lined plate to remove extra grease.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、French's spicy brown mustard (1 ½tablespoons)、maple syrup (2tablespoons)、apple cider vinegar (1tablespoon)、orange juice (1tablespoon)、kosher salt (1 ½teaspoons)、paprika (½teaspoon)、salmon (1lb)、olive oil (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、peach、avocado、fresh cilantro leaves (¼cup)、jalapeño、lime、salt (1pinch of)
instructions:
0: Place butter, French’s Spicy Brown Mustard, maple syrup, apple cider vinegar, orange juice, ½ teaspoon salt, and paprika in a small pot. Heat over low heat and whisk until butter has fully melted and the sauce starts to simmer. Continue simmering for a few minutes until sauce reduces to a glaze. Remove from heat and set aside.
1: Rub salmon with olive oil and sprinkle evenly with 1 teaspoon salt. Drizzle with a bit of the glaze.
2: Heat an oiled grill pan (or heat up a grill) over high heat. When hot, place the salmon flesh-side down into the pan. Cook until the salmon has clear grill marks, then carefully flip to cook on the other side. Brush with more glaze. Once salmon is cooked to your liking, remove from pan.
3: For salsa, lightly toss peach, avocado, jalapeño, cilantro, lime juice, and pinch of salt in bowl.
4: Top the salmon fillets with the peach-avocado salsa and serve immediately.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:carrots、butternut squash (1cup)、broccoli floret (1 ½cups)、oil (2tablespoons)、small whole chicken (4lb)、salt、black pepper、fresh thyme leaf (1leaf)、fresh thyme sprigs (3sprigs)、butcher's twine
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
1: In a large, ovenproof skillet or frying pan, mix together the carrots, squash, and broccoli, and coat with the oil. Spread the veggies into 1 even layer.
2: Place the chicken on top of the veggies.
3: Season the bird on all sides and in the cavity with salt, pepper, and fresh thyme leaves. While seasoning the bird, make sure that enough seasoning has fallen onto the veggies below to give them good flavor.
4: To truss the chicken, fold the wingtips underneath the breasts so that they fit snugly. Using a piece of butcher’s twine, tie the legs together so the bird holds a nice shape.
5: Bake for 1 hour, or until a thermometer inserted into the thickest part of the breast reads 160°F (70°C).
6: NOTE: Once resting out of the oven, the temperature will continue to rise to a safe 165°F (75°C).
7: Let the chicken rest for at least 15 minutes once out of the oven, so that all of the juices in the meat can settle and the internal temperature has time to finish rising.
8: Carve the bird as desired.
9: Serve on a plate with the veggies, and fresh thyme sprigs for garnish.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:shredded chicken (2cups)、black beans (1cup)、corn (1cup)、salsa (1jar)、shredded cheese blend (1cup)、large flour tortillas
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: In a large pan over medium heat, cook the chicken, beans, corn, and salsa.
2: In a springform pan, lay down one tortilla, then top with chicken mixture and cheese.
3: Layer another tortilla on top and continue to stack until pan is full.
4: Top with more cheese.
5: Bake for 30 minutes or until cheese is melted.
6: Top with sour cream, guacamole, and salsa.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cayenne pepper (2tablespoons)、paprika (2tablespoons)、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、mustard powder (1tablespoon)、black pepper (1tablespoon)、onion powder (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, combine cayenne pepper, paprika, garlic powder, mustard powder, black pepper, and onion powder, and mix well.
1: In a large bowl, place chicken and pat dry. Add 5 tablespoons of the spice mix and salt, and mix well, making sure all the chicken is fully coated. Cover with plastic wrap and rest in the fridge for at least 30 minutes, up to 24 hours.
2: In a small saucepan, combine canola oil, 2 tablespoons of the spice mix, and brown sugar over medium heat and stir until the brown sugar dissolves, about 2-3 minutes. Set aside.
3: In a medium-size bowl, add the buttermilk and hot sauce, and mix well.
4: Dredge each piece of chicken into the flour, shaking off any excess. Dip them into the buttermilk mixture, then back into the flour.
5: Heat oil to 325°F (170°C) in a deep pot.
6: Fry 3-4 chicken pieces at a time, making sure to not overcrowd the pot, for 10-12 minutes, until golden brown and crispy.
7: Transfer the fried chicken to a wire rack over a baking sheet and brush with the spicy oil Dust with the remaining spice mixture.
8: Place on a slice of white bread and top with dill pickle.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cashews (1cup)、boiling water (3cups)、water (¾cup)、medium onion、nutritional yeast (3tablespoons)、garlic (3cloves)、dried rosemary (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、lemon juice (1teaspoon)、fettuccine pasta (1box)、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: In a medium heatproof bowl, pour the boiling water over cashews and let sit for 15 minutes, then drain.
1: In a blender or food processor, combine the soaked cashews, water, onion, nutritional yeast, garlic, rosemary, pepper, salt, and lemon juice. Blend until smooth.
2: Pour the sauce over the cooked pasta and toss to coat.
3: Garnish with parsley.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cremini mushroom (10oz)、white onion、oil (2tablespoons)、salt、pepper、garlic (4cloves)、dried oregano (1 ½teaspoons)、tomato paste (¼cup)、crushed tomato (28oz)、vegetable broth (2cups)、chickpeas (15oz)、fresh basil
instructions:
0: In a food processor, pulse the mushrooms and onions until broken into uniformly fine pieces, about 10 pulses, scraping down the sides of the bowl as needed.
1: Heat the oil in a large skillet set over medium-high heat.
2: Pour the mushrooms and onions into the skillet and season with salt and pepper. Sauté until the veggies have released moisture and softened, about 8 minutes.
3: Add the garlic and oregano. Sauté until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
4: Push the veggies to the sides of the pan and add the tomato paste, slowly mixing in the veggies from the side until a uniform paste has formed.
5: Add the crushed tomatoes and stir until well combined and thick.
6: Add the vegetable stock and stir until the sauce has thickened slightly. Reduce the heat to medium-low if it is bubbling  and popping too much.
7: While the sauce simmers, place the chickpeas in the food processor and pulse until broken into fine pieces, about 10 pulses.
8: Pour the chickpeas into a fine mesh strainer and submerge in a medium bowl filled with water.
9: Shake the strainer for 1 minute to remove starches from the chickpeas.  You’ll know when to remove the strainer when the water has become very cloudy from the starches.
10: Transfer the chickpeas to the sauce and stir for at least 1 minute to give the chickpeas time to cook.
11: Use the sauce as desired for pasta, veggie noodles, calzones, etc..
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (1tablespoon)、medium onion、garlic (1clove)、carrots、celery (4stalks)、rotisserie chicken、white long grain rice (1cup)、cream of chicken soup (1can)、chicken stock (3cups)、salt、pepper、breadcrumb (1cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
1: In a skillet, melt butter, and cook onion, garlic, carrots, and celery until tender.
2: Transfer to a 9" x 13" (23 cm x 33 cm) disposable casserole dish, or split among 2 smaller dishes.
3: Add chicken, rice, soup, stock, salt, and pepper. Mix thoroughly, and cover with foil.
4: Bake for 30 minutes. Remove foil, top with bread crumbs if desired, and bake an additional 10 minutes. Or, bake for 30 minutes, let cool completely, cover, and freeze up to 2 months.
5: To reheat, let thaw in the refrigerator during the day. Bake as directed above.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large chicken breast (1breast)、baby swiss cheese (1slice)、provolone cheese (1slice)、ham (1thin slice)、baby spinach leaf (5leaves)、flour (½cup)、eggs、breadcrumb (⅔cup)、oil、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Cut a pocket into the side of the chicken breast.
1: Season chicken with salt and pepper.
2: Stack the two cheeses and spinach on top of the ham and roll up tightly.
3: Stuff the chicken with the roll and press the edges of the chicken together to create a seal.
4: Place the flour, eggs, and bread crumbs into 3 separate bowls.
5: Being careful to keep the chicken from opening, dip the stuffed chicken in the flour, shaking off the excess. Then dip the floured chicken into the egg, then breadcrumbs, then egg and breadcrumbs again. Coat evenly and shake off any excess breading.
6: Heat oil in a cast iron pan over medium heat and preheat oven to 375ºF (190°C).
7: Fry the chicken until golden brown on both sides.
8: Once the chicken is fried, place into a baking dish and bake for 20 minutes, or until the internal temperature of the chicken reaches a minimum of 165ºF (75ºC).
9: Enjoy!
10: Nutrition  Calories: 5805 Fat: 524 grams  Carbs: 191 grams Fiber: 10 grams  Sugars:11 grams  Protein: 89 grams

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:egg、white pepper (1teaspoon)、salt (1 ½teaspoons)、chicken breasts、cornstarch (½cup)、flour (¼cup)、vegetable oil、oil (1tablespoon)、garlic (2teaspoons)、ginger (1tablespoon)、chili flakes (½teaspoon)、rice wine (1tablespoon)、soy sauce (1 ½tablespoons)、vinegar (5tablespoons)、water (1 ½tablespoons)、sugar (3 ½tablespoons)、orange zest (1tablespoon)、scallion
instructions:
0: Combine the egg, white pepper and salt in a mixing bowl. Add the cubed chicken breast, make sure it’s coated with the egg mixture.
1: In another bowl, combine corn starch and flour. Add the coated chicken to the flour mixture. Stir to coat.
2: Working in batches, fry the coated chicken until golden and done. Remove with a slotted spoon and set aside.
3: In a large pan or wok, add oil, garlic, ginger and red chili flakes. Stir fry until fragrant.
4: Add rice wine and stir for a few seconds. Proceed to add all of the other sauce ingredients, including soy sauce, vinegar, water, sugar and orange zest.
5: Add the fried chicken. Stir to coat in sauce. Thicken the sauce with the cornstarch slurry.
6: Garnish with chopped scallions and serve with rice.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:water (2tablespoons)、butter (8tablespoons)、lemon (2teaspoons)、fresh thyme (1sprig)、shrimp (½lb)、garlic (2cloves)、shallot、orzo (1cup)、chicken stock (2cups)、salt、pepper、spinach (4cups)、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Over low heat, add water to your saucepan and slowly incorporate the butter, a few tablespoons at a time. Whisk together to make sure the water and butter combine and doesn’t separate.
1: Add the lemon zest and sprig of thyme and give it a stir. Add the shrimp and poach for eight to 10 minutes. Remove shrimp and set aside. Discard the sprig of thyme.
2: In the same saucepan and over low heat, add garlic, shallots and the orzo. Salt and pepper to taste. Stir until all the liquid has been absorbed.
3: Pour in the chicken stock and cook until the orzo is al dente. Stir occasionally to make sure nothing is sticking to the bottom of the saucepan.
4: Once the orzo is al dente, add the spinach. Stir in until just wilted. Remove from heat.
5: Serve the spinach and orzo, place a few shrimps on top and garnish with chopped parsley.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、small yellow onion、red bell pepper、green bell pepper、unsweetened coconut milk (½cup)、fish sauce (1 ½teaspoons)、lemon juice (1tablespoon)、freshly ground black pepper (1teaspoon)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、sugar (½tablespoon)、curry powder (2teaspoons)、maggi (1tablespoon)、jumbo shrimp (1lb)、brown rice、fresh cilantro leaf
instructions:
0: Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until starting to soften, about 5 minutes.
1: Add the remaining tablespoon of butter and the red and green bell peppers. Cook until slightly softened, 3–4 minutes.
2: Add the coconut milk, fish sauce, lemon juice, pepper, salt, sugar, curry powder, and maggi and mix well. Bring to boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes, until the flavors start to meld together.
3: Add the shrimp and cook for 3–4 minutes, until pink and opaque.
4: Serve the curry with brown rice and garnish with cilantro.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sushi rice (2cups)、seasoned rice vinegar (¼cup)、sushi grade nori (4half sheets)、smoked salmon (4oz)、cream cheese (4oz)、small cucumber
instructions:
0: Season the sushi rice with the rice vinegar, fanning and stirring until room temperature.
1: On the rolling mat place one sheet of nori with the rough side facing upwards.
2: Wet your hands and grab a handful of rice and place it on the nori. Spread the rice evenly throughout the nori without smushing the rice down.
3: Arrange, in a horizontal row 1 inch (2 cm) from the bottom, smoked salmon, cream cheese, and cucumber.
4: Grabbing both nori and the mat, roll the mat over the filling so the extra space at the bottom touches the other side, squeezing down to make a nice tight roll. Squeeze down along the way to keep the roll from holding its shape.
5: Transfer the roll onto a cutting board. Rub a knife on a damp paper towel before slicing the roll into six equal portions.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:soy sauce (¼cup)、Frank's Red Hot Original Sauce (½tablespoon)、brown sugar (2tablespoons)、chili oil (1tablespoon)、rice vinegar (2tablespoons)、vegetable oil (1tablespoon)、ginger (2tablespoons)、garlic (4cloves)、ground pork (1lb)、cornstarch (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, Frank’s Red Hot Original, brown sugar, chili oil, and rice vinegar until sugar dissolves. Set aside.
1: In a skillet or wok, heat the vegetable oil over high heat. Add ginger and garlic and let sizzle for one minute. Add ground pork and quickly start stir-frying. Continually toss the pork until almost no pink remains in the meat. Pour in the sauce, bring to a simmer, and continue stirring the pork. Pour in the dissolved cornstarch. Stir until sauce thickens slightly, then remove from heat.
2: Assembly: Pile rice noodles in each bowl. Spoon pork with sauce on top of noodles. Place carrots and cucumbers in small piles. Garnish with scallions, cilantro, and peanuts. Serve with lime wedges on the side.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:onion、garlic (3cloves)、ground beef (1lb)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、tomato sauce (15oz)、cumin (1teaspoon)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、chili powder (1teaspoon)、kidney bean (15oz)
instructions:
0: Heat oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until translucent.
1: Add the garlic and cook for two minutes.
2: Add the ground beef and season with salt and pepper. Break up the beef with a wooden spoon, cooking until browned.
3: Add in the tomato sauce, cumin, oregano, and chili powder. Stir until combined.
4: Reduce the heat to low, cover and simmer for 1 hour.
5: Remove lid and stir in kidney beans.
6: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
7: In a bowl, add the butter, garlic, parsley, and Parmesan. Stir until combined.
8: Place the dinner rolls in a baking dish. Use a knife to carve a circle in the top of each roll. Press down the bottom of the bun to create a denser bottom layer.
9: Brush the rolls with the garlic butter and bake for 5 minutes, or until lightly toasted.
10: Spoon the chilli into the holes of the toasted rolls.
11: Sprinkle with cheddar cheese and bake for another 5 minutes, or until cheese has melted.
12: Serve topped with sour cream and green onions.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:baby gold potatoes、butter (2tablespoons)、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、garlic (3cloves)
instructions:
0: For the Garlic Smashed Potatoes - Boil potatoes in a medium pot for 15-20 minutes or until tender.
1: Place boiled potatoes on a parchment covered oven tray and smash each potato down leaving the skin intact.
2: Mix melted butter, garlic, salt and pepper and brush mixture onto potatoes.
3: Bake at 425˚F (220˚C) for 15-20 minutes or until crispy.
4: Garnish with thyme.
5: For the Herb Crusted Salmon - In a small bowl combine parsley, chives, dill, olive oil, garlic, salt, pepper and lemon juice.
6: Place salmon and asparagus on parchment covered oven tray.
7: Drizzle with olive oil and garnish with salt and pepper.
8: Spoon herb mix onto salmon fillets and coat evenly.
9: Bake at 425˚F (220˚C) for 12-14 minutes.
10: For the Chocolate Peanut Butter Skillet Brownie - In a medium mixing bowl, combine brownie mix, oil, water, and an egg and stir until evenly mixed.
11: Transfer mix into skillet.
12: Spoon softened peanut butter into skillet and mix in using a knife.
13: Bake at 350˚F (180˚C) for 10-15 minutes or until toothpick comes out of the brownie clear.
14: If desired, garnish with ice cream.
15: Nutrition  Calories: 1723 Fat: 143 grams  Carbs: 49 grams Fiber: 10 grams  Sugars: 11 grams  Protein: 76 grams
16: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken (2cups)、broccoli (2cups)、red bell pepper (½cup)、shredded cheddar cheese (2cups)、green onion (½cup)、Campbell’s® Cream of Chicken Soup (1can)、crescent rolls (2cans)、large egg、fresh rosemary (½tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
1: In a large bowl, combine the chicken, broccoli, bell peppers, cheddar cheese, green onions, and Campbell’s® Cream of Chicken Soup. Mix well.
2: Place a baking sheet–size sheet of parchment paper on a large cutting board. Unroll the crescent roll dough and arrange next to one another so the long sides are touching. Press the seams together to make one large sheet of dough.
3: Spoon the chicken cheese filling in a horizontal mound across the center of the crescent roll dough, leaving 4–5 inches of space above and below the filling.
4: Starting from the bottom left of the dough sheet, slice a strip of dough diagonally at a 45-degree angle from the filling to the edge. Repeat every 2 inches along the bottom. Repeat with the top dough, cutting in the opposite direction from the bottom.
5: Starting from the left side, fold the first dough strip on the bottom over the filling, then fold over the first dough strip on the top, crossing over the bottom strip. Repeat with the remaining strips to create a braid effect. Pinch the dough together on the left and right sides to seal in the filling.
6: Use the parchment to carefully transfer the braid onto a baking sheet.
7: In a small bowl, whisk together the egg and rosemary. Brush the egg wash evenly over the braid.
8: Bake for 25–30 minutes, or until the braid is cooked through and deep golden brown.
9: Remove from the oven and let rest for 10 minutes before slicing with a serrated knife and serving.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:extra firm tofu (14oz)、low sodium tamari (3tablespoons)、maple syrup (2tablespoons)、rice vinegar (1 ½tablespoons)、fresh ginger (½teaspoon)、garlics、toasted sesame oil (½tablespoon)、grapeseed oil (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Drain the tofu, then wrap in a clean dish towel and place a heavy object, such as a cast iron pan, on top. Press the tofu for 20–30 minutes, until the towel is soaked through.
1: Place the pressed tofu back in its container and wrap with reusable wrap. Freeze for at least 6 hours, up to overnight.
2: Remove the tofu from the freezer and place in a microwave-safe bowl over a kitchen towel. Defrost in the microwave until completely thawed and the towel is soaked through, 10–15 minutes.
3: Wrap the tofu in a clean kitchen towel and press again for another 20–30 minutes, until the dish towel is soaked through and the tofu is half its original thickness.
4: While the tofu is pressing, make the marinade: In a medium bowl, whisk together the tamari, maple syrup, rice vinegar, ginger, garlic, sesame oil, and ¼ cup (60 ml) grapeseed oil.
5: Tear the tofu into bite-size pieces that resemble chicken tenders or nuggets. Add the tofu to the marinade and stir to coat. Marinate for at least 30 minutes at room temperature, or up to 1 hour, stirring halfway through.
6: Heat the remaining tablespoon of oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the tofu and cook for 4–5 minutes, until browned on one side, basting with some of the marinade. Flip the tofu and cook for another 4–5 minutes, until browned on the other side.
7: Serve the tofu as desired.
8: Nutrition
Calories: 338
Fat: 27 grams 
Carbs: 12 grams 
Protein: 15 grams 
Fiber: 1 grams 
Sugar: 9 grams
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (3tablespoons)、medium yellow onion、garlic (4cloves)、ground beef (1lb)、salt (1teaspoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、tomato sauce (15oz)、tomato paste (3oz)、ricotta cheese (15oz)、fresh basil (½cup)、large egg、parmesan cheese (½cup)、lasagna noodles、shredded mozzarella cheese (2cups)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
1: Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a large pot over high heat. Add the onion and garlic. Cook until starting to brown, stirring occasionally, 3-4 minutes.
