2: Add the beef, salt, and pepper. Cook until all of the moisture has evaporated and the meat is starting to brown on the edges, breaking the meat up as you stir, 10-12 minutes.
3: Add the tomato sauce and tomato paste, then reduce the heat to medium and bring the sauce to a simmer. Cook it down until the mixture becomes thick, about 15 minutes. Remove the pot from the heat and set aside.
4: In a small bowl, combine the ricotta, basil, egg, and Parmesan. Stir until smooth. Set aside.
5: Grease a large oven-safe metal bowl with the remaining tablespoon of olive oil, then lay about 25 lasagna noodles along the sides and bottom of the bowl, fanning them out in an overlapping pattern. The ends of the noodles should hang over the sides of the bowl.
6: Slice the remaining lasagna noodles in half crosswise. These will serve as the layers between the meat and the cheese mixtures.
7: Sprinkle half of the mozzarella into the bottom of the bowl on top of the noodles. This will help bind the noodles together when cooked. Spread half of the meat mixture evenly over the mozzarella, then lay half of the cut noodles over the sauce.
8: Spread all of the ricotta mixture over the noodles, then layer with the rest of the noodles, then the rest of the mozzarella, and the rest of the meat sauce.
9: Fold the edges of the lasagna noodles hanging over the sides of the bowl back towards the center, creating another overlapping pattern.
10: Cover with foil and bake for about 45 minutes, until cooked through.
11: Meanwhile, make the béchamel: In a saucepan over medium heat, melt the butter. Add the flour and cook, whisking continuously, for about 2 minutes until a paste forms.
12: Add the hot milk and continue to whisk as the sauce thickens and comes to a boil. Season with salt and pepper and add the Parmesan. Reduce the heat to low, and cook, still whisking, for 2-3 minutes more.
13: Invert the lasagna dome onto a cutting board.
14: Pour the béchamel sauce over the dome and top with basil.
15: Slice the dome, then top with more Parmesan and basil, if desired.
16: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:water (3tablespoons)、whole milk (3tablespoons)、bread flour (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Make the starter: In a small pot over low heat, combine the water, milk, and flour. Stir continuously until a loose paste forms. Remove the pot from the heat and transfer the mixture to a small bowl. Cover with plastic wrap, pressing it directly onto the surface of the starter, and refrigerate for 1 hour, or until cool.
1: Make the dough: In a large bowl, add 2½ cups (300 g) of flour, the sugar, salt, and yeast, and whisk to combine.
2: In a large measuring cup, whisk together the milk, egg, butter, and chilled starter mixture.
3: Gradually pour the milk mixture into the bowl of dry ingredients, using your hands to combine. The dough will be very sticky at this point. If the dough is too wet to knead, gradually add ¾ cup (90 g) of flour, a few tablespoons at a time, until you can knead the dough into a loose ball. Continue to knead the dough for 20 minutes.
4: Cover your hands with the vegetable oil and form the dough into a taut ball. Place the dough into a clean large bowl. Cover with a towel and let rise in a warm place until doubled in size, 60-90 minutes.
5: Transfer the dough to a clean surface and press out to a 9-inch (23 cm) square.  Divide the dough into 9 equal squares.
6: Flatten a portion of dough into a circle. Place 2 tablespoons of pulled pork in the center. Pinch the edges of the dough together to seal. Gently roll the dough into a ball and place in a greased 9-inch (23 cm) square baking dish. Repeat with the remaining dough. Cover with a towel and let rise for 45 minutes.
7: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
8: Brush the buns with the egg and milk mixture.
9: Bake the buns for 25 minutes, or until golden brown.
10: Let the buns sit in the pan for 10 minutes.
11: Invert the buns onto a serving plate, and pull apart.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breast (1 ½lb)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、freshly ground black pepper (1teaspoon)、dry pancake mix (2cups)、cayenne (⅛teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、buttermilk (1cup)、water (½cup)、vegetable oil (4cups)
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, season the chicken with 1 teaspoon of salt and ½ teaspoon of black pepper. Set aside while you make the batter.
1: In a large bowl, whisk together the pancake mix, remaining teaspoon of salt, remaining ½ teaspoon pepper, the cayenne, paprika, and garlic powder. Add the buttermilk and ⅓ of the water and whisk to incorporate. Add the remaining water, ⅓ at a time, and whisk until no lumps remain.
2: Add the chicken to the batter and toss to coat completely.
3: Heat the vegetable oil in a large, heavy-bottomed pot over medium-high heat until it reaches 350°F (180°C). Set a wire rack inside a baking sheet and place nearby.
4: Working 4–5 pieces at a time, fry the battered chicken in the hot oil for 2–3 minutes, or until golden brown and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C). Remove from the oil and let drain on the wire rack while you repeat with the remaining chicken.
5: Make the dipping sauce: In a small bowl, whisk together the Dijon, pancake syrup, vegetable oil, salt, and pepper until well combined.
6: Serve the chicken bites warm with the sauce alongside for dipping.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、red pesto (2tablespoons)、fresh basil (1handful)、mozzarella cheese (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Slice into the chicken several times, about 1 cm (½ inch) apart, but only cut about 85% of the way through, leaving the bottom intact.
2: Cook the red pesto and basil on a medium heat until the basil is just wilted.
3: Sprinkle over the mozzarella and stir until melted.
4: Allow to cool to the touch, and then fill each segment of the chicken breast with about 1 teaspoon of the mixture.
5: Bake in the centre of the oven for 18-22 minutes until the chicken is cooked through and the juices run clear.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:lamb shanks (6lb)、kosher salt、freshly ground black pepper、canola oil (2tablespoons)、medium carrots、medium white onion、celery (2stalks)、garlic (20cloves)、tomato paste (2tablespoons)、red wine (1cup)、chicken stock (4cups)、orange、lemon、fresh rosemary (5sprigs)、fresh thyme (10sprigs)、bay leaves、brussels sprouts (1lb)、red pearl onion (1lb)、olive oil、yukon gold potato (3lb)、white pepper、unsalted butter (½cup)、sour cream (1cup)、heavy cream (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Season the lamb shanks all over with salt and pepper.
2: Heat the canola oil in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
3: Sear 2 lamb shanks at a time until a dark brown crust forms on one side, 3-5 minutes. Sear the other sides of the meat until evenly browned. Remove the shanks from the pan and set aside. Remove all but 2 tablespoons of fat from the pan.
4: Add the minced carrots, onion, celery, and minced garlic to the pot. Season with salt and pepper, and cook until the vegetables are deeply caramelized, 15-20 minutes.
5: Add the tomato paste and cook until it browns and is aromatic, 5 minutes.
6: Add the red wine and scrape the bottom of the pot to release the flavorful browned bits stuck to the bottom. Cook until the wine reduces by half and thickens slightly, 3 minutes.
7: Add the chicken stock, orange juice, lemon juice, rosemary, thyme, and bay leaves. Stir and bring to a boil.
8: Return the lamb shanks to the Dutch oven, cover, and place in the oven for 2 hours, turning the shanks halfway through, until the lamb is tender and the braising liquid has thickened.
9: About halfway through the lamb cooking time, add the oblique-cut carrots, Brussels sprouts, red pearl onions, and whole garlic cloves to a baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Toss to combine. Roast in the oven for 1 hour, or until the vegetables are tender.
10: Right after the potatoes finish boiling, drain and transfer to a large bowl. Season with plenty of salt and a bit of white pepper, and mash the potatoes until as smooth as possible.
11: Fold in the butter, sour cream, and heavy cream until smooth and light.
12: Make the citrus gremolata: In a small bowl, combine the parsley, lemon zest, flaky salt, garlic, chives, horseradish, and orange zest.
13: To serve, scoop mashed potatoes onto a plate. Add roasted vegetables and a lamb shank. Top with the braising liquid and citrus gremolata.
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:warm water (1cup)、organic sugar (2tablespoons)、instant yeast (1tablespoon)、all purpose flour (3cups)、baking soda (1teaspoon)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、vegetable oil (2tablespoons)、sesame oil (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Make the bao buns: Add the warm water, sugar, and yeast to a liquid measuring cup. Whisk to combine, then set aside to bloom, five minutes.
1: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt. Make a well in the center. Add the yeast mixture and vegetable oil to the well and stir with a wooden spoon until a soft dough begins to form. Transfer the dough to a clean surface and knead until smooth and elastic, about 3 minutes. Keep extra flour nearby in case the dough sticks to the surface or your hands. Shape into a ball.
2: Lightly grease a clean large bowl with 1 tablespoon of sesame oil. Place the dough in the bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and let rise in a warm place until doubled in size, about 2 hours.
3: Meanwhile marinate the tofu: In a medium bowl, whisk together the scallions, ginger, garlic, sugar, five-spice, soy sauce, rice wine, and dark soy sauce.
4: Add the tofu to a separate medium bowl and pour the marinade over. Cover with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator for 1 hour.
5: Make the pickled vegetables: Prepare the cucumber, red pepper, daikon, carrot, yellow pepper, and jalapeños and set aside while you make the brine.
6: In a large pot or deep pan over high heat, combine the water, sugar, rice vinegar, and salt. Stir until the sugar dissolves, then bring the mixture to a boil.
7: Add the vegetables the brine. Stir to submerge, then remove the pot from the heat. Let sit while you sear the tofu and bake the buns, about 1 hour, then drain.
8: Once the bao dough has risen, turn it out onto a floured surface. Divide the dough in half, then cut each half into 2 ounce pieces. Roll each piece into a ball.
9: Working 1 at a time, flatten a ball with your palm on a lightly floured surface. Use a small rolling pin or wooden dowel to roll the dough out to a 5-inch round. Brush the top with sesame oil, fold it in half, and transfer it to a square of parchment paper set on a baking sheet. Repeat with the remaining dough. Cover the bao buns with a kitchen towel and let rest for 10 minutes.
10: Bring a pot of water to a boil and set a bamboo steamer on top. Working in batches, transfer a few of the folded dough rounds at a time to the steamer, making sure the buns are not too crowded. Cover the steamer and steam the buns for 8-10 minutes, until the buns puff up and form a skin on the outside. Very carefully, lift the lid and remove the buns from the steamer. Repeat with the rest of the buns, keeping the steamed buns warm as they finish by covering with a towel.
11: Sear the tofu: Remove the tofu from the marinade and pat dry with paper towels. Reserve the marinade.
12: Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over high heat. Add the tofu and sear on one side until deep brown in color, about 5 minutes. Flip and cook on the other side until deep brown, 5 minutes more. Remove the tofu from the pan.
13: Pour the reserved marinade into the skillet on medium heat and reduce until thick and syrupy, about 5 minutes. Return the tofu to the pan and stir to coat with the glaze. Remove the pan from the heat.
14: To serve, slather the inside of the bao buns with hoisin sauce, then add the pickled vegetables, glazed tofu, sliced scallions, and sesame seeds.
15: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

ingredients:water (3cups)、kosher salt、polenta (1cup)、milk (1cup)、grated parmesan cheese (½cup)、unsalted butter (1tablespoon)、pepper
instructions:
0: Make the polenta: Bring salted water to boil in a medium pot over medium-high heat. Pour in the polenta and stir for 2 minutes. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring every 10 minutes to make sure the polenta isn’t sticking or burning.
1: Right before serving, stir the milk, Parmesan, and butter into the polenta. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
2: Meanwhile, make the mushrooms: Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the shallots and sweat until softened and slightly translucent, about 2 minutes.
3: Season with salt, then add the thyme leaves and mushrooms. Cook until the mushrooms are caramelized and softened, about 5 minutes.
4: Pour in the sherry to deglaze the pan and stir to loosen any browned bits from the bottom. Cook off the alcohol, about 1 minute. Add the vegetable stock and season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, then let the liquid reduce for about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat.
5: Make the gremolata: In a small bowl, combine the garlic, parsley, and lemon zest. Season with salt to taste.
6: Divide the hot polenta between serving bowls and top with the mushrooms and gremolata.
7: Nutrition, all included

instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C).
1: In a large bowl, mix together the crushed tomatoes, water, olive oil, basil, oregano, garlic, salt, pepper, and fusilli.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:gammon joint (3 ¾lb)、onions、pineapple juice (3qt)
instructions:
0: Place the gammon joint in a large pot and add the onions and pineapple juice. Bring to a boil over high heat.
1: Once boiling, reduce the heat to medium, cover, and simmer for 70 minutes. (Gammon joints need to cook for 40 minutes per kilo (2 ¼ lbs), so if you are using a smaller or large gammon joint, adjust the cooking time accordingly.)
2: Once cooked, carefully remove the gammon joint from the pan and place on a baking sheet to cool slightly.
3: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
4: Make the glaze: in a small pan over a medium heat, combine the Dijon mustard, pineapple juice, and maple syrup and bring to a boil. Cook for 10 minutes, or until slightly reduced and glossy.
5: Carefully remove the skin from the gammon joint, using a small paring knife to help ease the fat away from the skin. Be sure to leave a small layer of fat on top of the gammon.
6: Score the fat in a diamond pattern and push a clove into each cross section.
7: Liberally brush the gammon joint with the glaze, making sure to reserve at least half of the glaze.
8: Roast the gammon joint for 40 minutes, glazing again halfway through.
9: Carve and serve.
10: Enjoy!

instructions:

ingredients:garlic (2cloves)、fresh ginger (1tablespoon)、sesame oil (1tablespoon)、honey (1tablespoon)、soy sauce (¼cup)、chicken breast、quinoa (½cup)、chicken stock (1 ½cups)、sliced carrot (½cup)、snap pea (½cup)、shredded red cabbage (½cup)、bell pepper (½cup)、broccoli floret (½cup)、egg、salt、avocado、scallion、toasted sesame seed
instructions:
0: In a small measuring cup, mix together the garlic, ginger, sesame oil, honey, and soy sauce. Whisk to combine.

2: Heat a tablespoon of oil in a small pot over medium heat. Cook the chicken until golden brown on one side, then flip and cook the other side until the chicken reaches an internal temperature of at least 165°F (75°C), about 10 minutes total. Remove the chicken breast from the pan. Let rest for 5 minutes, then slice.
3: Add the quinoa and chicken stock to the same pot. Stir the quinoa and bring to a boil on high heat. Then, reduce the heat to low and place a strainer over the simmering quinoa.

5: Cover the pot and cook for 20 minutes.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:instant corn masa flour (1cup)、water (1cup)、dried california chiles、salt (2 ½teaspoons)、garlic (1clove)、medium tomatoes、dried oregano (½teaspoon)、skirt steak (½lb)、all-purpose meat seasoning (½teaspoon)、corn oil (2cups)
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, mix the masa flour and ½ cup (120 ml) of water together with your hands. Once combined, add the rest of the water and knead until the dough forms a smooth ball.
1: Heat a large pan or griddle over medium-high heat.
2: Pat the dough out into 6 flat circles.
3: Fry the dough, turning frequently, until just lightly brown about 5 minutes.
4: Once the dough is cooked, shape the sopes by pinching the sides up to form a wall around the edge. Set aside to cool.
5: Rip the stems off the dried chiles and discard the seeds. Rinse the chiles, if necessary.
6: Add the chiles to a small pot of water and bring to a boil over high heat. Once boiling, remove the pot from the heat.
7: Transfer the chiles and their cooking liquid to a blender and add 1 teaspoon of salt and the garlic. Blend until smooth. Set aside.
8: Add the tomatoes to a small pot of water and bring to a boil. Cook until the tomato skins split, then remove from the heat and drain, reserving ½ cup (120 ml) of the tomato water.
9: Transfer the tomatoes to a blender with the reserved cooking liquid, oregano, and ½ teaspoon of salt. Blend until smooth. Set aside.
10: Heat a large pan or griddle over medium-high heat. Add the skirt steak and season with the meat seasoning and remaining teaspoon of salt. Cook the meat, flipping frequently until seared and cooked through, about 10 minutes.
11: Transfer the meat to a cutting board and cut into small pieces. Set aside.
12: Heat the corn oil in a deep, large pan over high heat.
13: Dip the sopes in the chile sauce, turning to coat completely.
14: Once the oil is hot, fry the sopes, flipping frequently, until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Drain the sopes on paper towels or a wire rack.
15: To serve, fill the sopes with refried beans, carne asada, shredded lettuce, tomato sauce, Mexican crema, and queso fresco.
16: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instructions:
0: Thinly sliced the potatoes, roughly ¼-inch (5mm) thick.
1: Remove stems from kale and cut into ¾ inch-1 inch (2 cm) pieces.
2: For the Béchamel sauce, add butter and garlic to a saucepan on medium heat and sauté until aromatic.
3: Add flour and mix until mixture browns slightly.
4: Add milk, salt, and pepper and simmer on low heat until mixture thickens.
5: In a medium-sized oven dish, lay a hefty bed of kale adding olive oil, salt, and pepper and gently mixing.
6: Starting from one side layer your potatoes across the kale covering the entire dish.
7: Gently press the potatoes and kale mixture down to make more room in the dish.
8: Drizzle half of the Béchamel sauce across all of the potatoes.
9: Repeat the process and add another layer of kale, olive oil, salt, pepper, and potatoes and cover with remaining sauce.
10: Garnish to taste with parmesan, Gruyère, and bread crumbs
11: Bake at 350°F (180°C) for 30 minutes covered. Remove cover and bake an additional 30 minutes.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bread crumbs (½cup)、milk (½cup)、garlic (1clove)、egg、salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (½teaspoon)、ground chicken (1lb)、vegetable oil (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Meatballs: In a medium bowl, stir together bread crumbs and milk. Let sit for 5 minutes. Add in garlic, egg, salt, and pepper, then stir until well-combined. Stir in ground chicken. Combine well, but do not overmix. With oiled hands, roll the meat into golf-size balls.
1: Pour 1 tablespoon vegetable oil into a skillet over medium heat. Add meatballs and brown on all sides. Remove meatballs from the pan (meatballs will not be fully cooked through at this time). Wipe the pan out to make the sauce.
2: Sauce: Heat vegetable oil and butter in the same skillet over medium heat. Add onions and sauté until translucent, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and ginger, then let sizzle for a minute or two. 
3: Stir in McCormick Ground Cumin, McCormick Paprika, 1½ teaspoons garam masala, cayenne, and salt. Let spices heat through until fragrant, about 2 minutes. Add crushed tomatoes and bring sauce to a simmer, then take off the heat.
4: Let the sauce cool for 5–10 minutes. Blend sauce until smooth, adding a tablespoon or two of water if it is too thick to blend.
5: Pour the sauce back into the skillet. Whisk in the butter, cream, and 1 teaspoon garam masala. Add the meatballs to the sauce and stir to coat. Cover and cook for 5 minutes, or until meatballs are fully cooked through.
6: Garnish with cilantro. Serve with rice and lime wedges.
7: Enjoy!

7: Enjoy!

0: In a plastic bag, place chicken thighs and 3 tablespoons of the olive oil.  Add the chipotle powder, garlic powder, cumin, and salt. Seal the plastic bag and massage the meat until fully coated. Transfer to the refrigerator to marinate for at least 1 hour, or overnight.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、onion、red bell pepper、cooked chicken (2cups)、taco seasoning、fresh cilantro (1tablespoon)、lime
instructions:
0: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the onion and red bell pepper, and cook, stirring occasionally, until caramelized. Add the chicken, taco seasoning packet, cilantro, and lime juice, and mix thoroughly. Remove from heat, cover, and refrigerate until ready to use.
1: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the onion, red bell pepper, and green bell pepper, and cook, stirring occasionally, until softened. Add the paprika, cumin, cayenne pepper, salt, and pepper, and mix thoroughly. Remove from heat, cover, and refrigerate until ready to use.

Add the tomato, taco seasoning packet, cilantro, and lime juice, and mix thoroughly. Remove from heat, cover, and refrigerate until ready to use.
3: Heat butter in a pan over medium-low heat. Add the onion, and cook, stirring occasionally, until caramelized. Add the tomatoes, eggs, salt, and pepper. Fold the eggs and cook until they are no longer wet. Remove from heat, cover, and set aside.
4: Generously spray a sheet tray with cooking oil spray.
5: Place the tortillas so half of the tortilla is hanging over the edge of the pan. Place 6 tortillas around the border of the sheet tray and one tortilla in the middle, covering the exposed sheet tray.
6: Sprinkle half of the cheddar cheese and half of the mozzarella cheese over the tortillas.
7: Scoop the chicken mixture over the tortillas in the upper-left corner of the tray. Spread the mixture so that it fills ¼ of the sheet tray.
8: Scoop the onion and pepper mixture over the tortillas in the upper-right corner of the tray. Spread the mixture so that it fills ¼ of the sheet tray.
9: Scoop the beef mixture over the tortillas in the lower-right corner of the tray. Spread the mixture so that it fills ¼ of the sheet tray.
10: Scoop the egg mixture over the tortillas in the lower-left corner of the tray. Spread the mixture so that it fills ¼ of the sheet tray. Top with cooked bacon.
11: Place the tostadas over the fillings.
12: Sprinkle the rest of the cheese over the tostadas.
13: Place the last flour tortilla over the cheese.
14: Fold over the tortillas so they cover up the fillings and touch the center tortilla.
15: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
16: Place another sheet tray on top of the crunch-wrap. Place an oven-proof weight, like a cast-iron skillet, on top of the sheet tray.
17: Bake for 20 minutes. Remove weight and sheet tray. Bake for an additional 15 minutes until the tortillas are golden and crisp.
18: Flip the crunch-wrap onto a cutting board.
19: Slice and serve with salsa and sour cream.
20: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:skirt steak (1lb)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、olive oil (1 ½tablespoons)、beef broth (¼cup)、dijon mustard (2tablespoons)、unsalted butter (1tablespoon)、capers in brine (1 ½tablespoons)、rice、broccoli
instructions:
0: Cut steak in half crosswise. Season with the salt and pepper.
1: Heat the olive oil in a nonstick or stainless steel pan over medium heat for 1 minute. Add 1 portion of steak and cook until a golden brown crust has formed, 4-5 minutes per side. Transfer the seared steak to a plate and repeat with the remaining portion of steak. If the pan is getting too dry, add a bit more olive oil. Let the steaks rest for 3 minutes.
2: After the steak has rested, transfer to a cutting board and pour any accumulated meat juices from the plate back into the pan and return to medium heat.
3: Add the beef broth and scrape up any brown bits from the bottom of the pan. Add the mustard and butter and stir until combined. Stir in the capers and cook until the sauce thickens slightly, 1-2 minutes.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instructions:
0: Remove all leaves and cut the cauliflower into small florets.
1: Place the florets in a food processor and blend until they are a rice-like texture. Be careful not to over process or it may turn mushy. Set aside, and drain excess moisture with a towel, if desired.
2: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, cook onions, bell peppers, mushrooms, salt, and pepper until vegetables are tender but not soft.

5: Fold the eggs into the rice.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instructions:
0: To make the Berbere Braised Lamb, heat the vegetable oil in a large pan over medium-high heat until oil is lightly shimmering. Add the lamb to the pot, season with salt and pepper, and brown on all sides, for about 10 minutes. Remove the lamb from the pot.
1: To the same pot, add the red onions and cook until brown, for about 15-20 minutes. Stir in the ghee, garlic, ginger, paprika, cayenne, fenugreek, nutmeg, cardamom, cloves, cinnamon, allspice, and tomato paste.
2: Pour in the beef stock, stirring well to incorporate. Bring the sauce to a boil and return the lamb to the pot. Reduce heat to medium-low, so the sauce is at a gentle simmer, and cover and cook for 1 hour, stirring occasionally until the lamb is tender.
3: To make the Jeweled Vegetable Pilau, use a separate large, shallow pot, melt the ghee over medium heat. Add the sliced red onions and cook until soft and slightly caramelized, for about 20 minutes.
4: Add the cabbage, carrots, garlic, and ginger, and sauté until vegetables have softened and cooked down.
5: Season with salt, pepper, ground cumin, curry powder, and cardamom.
6: Stir in the rice and add the water. Add the bay leaf, cinnamon stick, and star anise. Reduce the heat to low and cook for 20-25 minutes until water is absorbed and rice is slightly fluffy.
7: Discard the bay leaf, cinnamon stick, and star anise. Stir the rice well before transferring to a large serving platter. 
8: Create a small well in the middle of the rice, and spoon the lamb over the top.
9: Serve garnished with scallions, cashews, and pomegranate seeds.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:salmon fillet、fresh parsley (1cup)、walnuts (½cup)、garlic (1tablespoon)、pepper、lemon juice (¼cup)、olive oil (½cup)
instructions:
0: Mix together parsley, walnuts, garlic, 3 tbsp lemon juice, olive oil, and pepper. Stir until fully incorporated. Set aside.
1: Mix together pepper, salt, and cayenne pepper. Rub filet of salmon with seasonings.
2: In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil. Place salmon skin side down. Cook for 5 minutes. Flip salmon, then cook for another 5 minutes
3: Pour ¼ cup (60 ml) lemon juice over salmon. Cook for 3 more minutes until lemon juice has reduced. Remove salmon from heat.
4: Spread the parsley walnut mixture over salmon. Serve immediately.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (1tablespoon)、stewing beef (2.2lb)、salt (3teaspoons)、pepper (3teaspoons)、onion、celery (1stalk)、carrot、dark beer (3cups)、tomato puree (2tablespoons)、bay leaves、juniper berries、parsley
instructions:
0: Heat half of the butter in large pot or Dutch oven.
1: Add the beef, in batches, browning all sides of the meat. Season with 1 teaspoon of salt and pepper. Transfer the beef to a bowl and set aside. Clean the pot.
2: In the same pan, heat remaining butter, then add in the onion, celery, and carrot. Cook until softened.
3: Add in the beer.
4: With a wooden spatula, scrape off the browned bits on the bottom of the pan to further flavour the stock.
5: Add in the seared beef, tomato purée, bay leaves, juniper berries, and 2 teaspoons each of salt and pepper.
6: Bring the stew to a boil, cover, and simmer for 2-4 hours, until the beef becomes tender.
7: Serve topped with parsley.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、burger buns
instructions:
0: Place the chicken breasts in the bottom of the slow cooker.
1: Cover the chicken with ketchup, apple cider vinegar, brown sugar, salt, pepper, paprika, cayenne, garlic powder, and Worcestershire sauce. Mix well.
2: Cover, and cook on high for 3 hours or on low for 6 hours.
3: In a large bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, apple cider vinegar, sugar, salt, and pepper.
4: Add both kinds of cabbage and carrots to the bowl and gently toss with the dressing.
5: Shred the chicken breasts with 2 forks in the slow cooker.
6: Serve on a burger bun with slaw.
7: Also great for BBQ Pulled Chicken Pizza, BBQ Pulled Chicken Nachos, and BBQ Pulled Chicken Mac ’n’ cheese.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、lean ground beef (½lb)、McCormick® hamburger seasoning (2teaspoons)、kosher salt、dijon mustard (1tablespoon)、worcestershire sauce (1 ½teaspoons)、water (¼cup)、all purpose flour、unbaked canned biscuits、american cheese (3slices)、nonstick cooking spray、egg beaten、white sesame seed、ketchup
instructions:
0: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the ground beef, hamburger seasoning, and salt. Cook, breaking up the meat with a wooden spoon, until browned, 5–7 minutes. Drain off some of the excess fat, then return the skillet to the heat.
1: Add the mustard, Worcestershire sauce, and water. Bring to boil and cook until the liquid is reduced by half. Remove the pan from the heat.
2: On a lightly floured surface, roll out a biscuit into a 5-inch round. Add 2 American cheese quarters to the center and top with 3 tablespoons of the beef mixture. Wrap the biscuit dough around the filling and pinch the edges together to seal tightly. Set seam-side down on a parchment-lined baking sheet and repeat with the remaining ingredients.
3: Heat the grill to 375°F (190°F) and spray the grates with nonstick spray.
4: Brush the burger bombs with the egg wash and sprinkle sesame seeds on top.
5: Add the burger bombs to the hot grill over indirect heat and cook for 20–25 minutes, until the biscuits are golden brown and cooked through.
6: Serve with ketchup.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flour (1 ½cups)、eggs、salt (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Create a small mountain of flour and, using a spoon, begin building a hole in the middle. It should end up looking like a small volcano.
1: Gradually add eggs in the volcano’s hole, and carefully incorporate eggs and flour.
2: Once all ingredients have been mixed, knead the dough by pulling, stretching, and folding for about 3-5 minutes, or until it turns elastic and semi-easy to mold.
3: Mold the dough into a sphere, and wrap it in plastic wrap and rest for 30 minutes, or until the dough becomes more relaxed, elastic, and much easier to mold.
4: Cut the dough in four pieces. Grab the first one, and keep the other wrapped, or cover them with a slightly wet towel to keep them fresh.
5: Flatten the first piece, and run it through the widest setting of your pasta maker. Increase the thinness number by one level each time you run the pasta through the machine.
6: Once you can see your fingers through the dough, proceed to cut the fettuccine, or any shape you wish.
7: In a pot with boiling water and salt, cook the pasta for 2 minutes or until it feels tender to the bite.
8: Serve with your favorite pasta sauce.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:farro (1 ½cups)、water (3cups)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)
1: Make the farro: In a medium pot, combine the farro and water, then bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 20-25 minutes, until the water is absorbed and the farro is tender.
2: Make the roasted veggies: Cut the potatoes in half. Arrange on half of a baking sheet and spread the carrots on the other half. Drizzle with olive oil, then season with the garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Toss until well coated.
3: Bake for 10 minutes.
4: Remove the baking sheet from the oven and add the broccoli. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt, garlic powder, and pepper. Bake for another 15-20 minutes, until all of the veggies are fork tender.
5: Make the marinated tofu: In a small bowl, combine the olive oil, thyme, oregano, garlic, salt, and pepper. Add the tofu and stir until well coated. Set aside for 10 minutes.
6: Spread out the tofu on half of a baking sheet. Bake for 20 minutes, then remove from oven and flip.
7: Make the roasted chickpeas: Add the chickpeas to the other side of the baking sheet with the tofu. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt, paprika, and chili powder. Toss until well coated.
8: Bake for another 15 minutes, until the chickpeas are crispy.
9: Make the lemon tahini dressing: In a liquid measuring cup, combine the tahini, water, olive oil, lemon juice, and salt and whisk until well combined.
10: To assemble the grain bowl, top the farro with the roasted veggies, tofu, and chickpeas. Drizzle with the tahini dressing.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large spaghetti squash、salt、pepper、olive oil、boneless, skinless chicken breasts、garlic (3cloves)、roma tomatoes、spinach (8oz)、marinara sauce (24oz)、fresh basil (½cup)、red pepper (¼teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
1: With a sharp knife, slice the squash in half. (If the squash is too tough - puncture in several places forming a dotted line around the squash. Microwave 3-5 minutes to soften. Allow to cool before cutting in half - following the dotted line).
2: Scoop out the seeds, brush with oil, salt, and pepper, and place face down on a baking tray. Bake for 35-40 minutes or until a fork can easily pierce the skin.
3: Heat olive oil in a large pan. Add chicken breasts (seasoned with salt and pepper) and garlic, and fully cook.
4: Add tomatoes and spinach. Cook until spinach has wilted. Add marinara sauce.
5: Stack the basil leaves and roll them up. Cut into slices and add to pan.
6: Add crushed red pepper, and stir until the ingredients are fully incorporated.
7: Once the squash has finished roasting, remove from the oven and let it sit for a few minutes before turning over and pulling at it with a fork. (Careful, there will be some steam!)
8: Shred the inside of each squash, being careful not to poke through the skin. Pour the sauce over the shredded squash, top with fresh basil, and serve.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:yellow onion、olive oil (2tablespoons)、great northern beans (1can)、garlic (4cloves)、cumin (2teaspoons)、ground cloves (¼teaspoon)、dried oregano (1 ½teaspoons)、cayenne pepper (½teaspoon)、mild green chillis (1cup)、veggie broth (3cups)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、fresh parsley (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: In a slow cooker, combine all ingredients except the parsley.
1: Set to low heat for 8-10 hours. Keep in mind that the longer you cook, the spicier the chili will become! (Adjust the amount of chilis accordingly)
2: Sprinkle parsley over top, stir, and serve.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flour (8cups)、baking soda (8teaspoons)、salt (1teaspoon)、water (4cups)、ghee (¾cup)、oil
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, and salt, and mix until fully incorporated.
1: Slowly add the water until the mixture forms a dough.
2: Divide the dough into roughly 12 loyas (balls), cover with a dish towel, and let rest for about 30 minutes.
3: Sprinkle each ball with flour and flatten or roll out into a circle roughly 5 inches (12-cm) in diameter.
4: Spread ghee on each round and make a cut from the center out to the edge, then roll to make a cone.
5: Press the peak and flatten the center of the cone. Let rest for another 30 minutes.
6: On a floured surface, roll each ball into a circle roughly 8 inches (20-cm) in diameter.
7: Heat a tawah or flat frying pan over medium-high heat. Coat with oil and place a round of dough on the pan.
8: Cook the dough until light brown, watching carefully, about 5 minutes. Then flip and cook on the other side, about 3-4 minutes more. Repeat with the remaining dough rounds.
9: Break up the cooked roti with your hands or serve whole.
10: Serve the fried roti with the fillings.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:soy sauce (½cup)、rice wine vinegar (¼cup)、light brown sugar (3tablespoons)、garlic (2cloves)、cornstarch (2teaspoons)、oil (1tablespoon)、vermicelli rice noodle (4oz)、boneless, skinless chicken thighs (1 ½lb)、salt、pepper、snap peas (1 ½cups)、radish、scallions、fresh cilantro、sesame seeds (2teaspoons)
instructions:
0: In a small bowl or liquid measuring cup, add the soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, brown sugar, garlic, and cornstarch. Whisk to combine. Set aside.
1: Heat a wok or large skillet with 3 inches (7 cm) of oil to 400˚F (200˚C).
2: Pull the rice noodles apart into eight portions.
3: Place one portion of noodles on a slotted spoon and carefully dip into the oil. The noodles will immediately fry. Once puffed up, remove the noodles and transfer to a wire rack to drain. Repeat with the remaining noodles.
4: Season the chicken with salt and pepper.
5: Heat a wok or large skillet with 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the chicken and cook, stirring occasionally, until browned and cooked through, about 5 minutes.
6: Add the teriyaki sauce to the chicken and bring to a boil. Cook until the sauce has reduced by one third and the chicken is fully coated.
7: Serve the chicken over the rice noodles with snap peas, radish slices, scallions, cilantro, and sesame seeds.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:carrot (1cup)、green peas (1cup)、garlic (6cloves)、shrimp (½lb)、ham (½lb)、rice (2 ½cups)、eggs、soy sauce (5tablespoons)
instructions:
0: In a large pan with olive or vegetable oil at medium heat, stir the green peas and carrots until both begin to soften.
1: Add garlic, shrimp, and ham, cook until the shrimp turns slightly pink, about 2 minutes.
2: Move the ingredients to a corner of the pan and add the rice and eggs, mix well.
3: Toss all ingredients together and add soy sauce.
4: Serve and enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flour tortillas、refried bean (16oz)、spanish rice (1cup)、rotisserie chicken (1cup)、shredded mexican cheese blend (1cup)
instructions:
0: Assemble the burritos by microwaving the flour tortilla for 20 seconds, and begin to layer burrito starting with refried beans, followed by the cooked rice, rotisserie chicken, and cheese.
1: Fold in the left and right sides of the tortilla and roll it up from the bottom, tucking the bottom edge under the filling. Wrap in parchment paper and label. Freeze up to 1 month.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:extra virgin olive oil (2tablespoons)、unsalted butter (4tablespoons)、garlic (4cloves)、large raw shrimp (1 ¼lb)、Holland House® White Cooking Wine (½cup)、red pepper flakes (⅛teaspoon)、fresh lemon juice (2tablespoons)、kosher salt、freshly ground black pepper、fresh parsley (¼cup)、dried fettuccine noodles (1lb)
instructions:
0: In a large pan, melt together the olive oil and 2 tablespoons of butter over medium heat. Add the garlic and sauté for 30–60 seconds, until fragrant.
1: Add the shrimp to the pan in a single layer. Cook for 1–2 minutes on one side, until just beginning to turn pink, then flip. Add the Holland House® White Cooking Wine and red pepper flakes. Bring to a simmer and cook for 2–3 minutes, or until the wine reduces by about half and the shrimp are cooked through.
2: Add the lemon juice and remaining 2 tablespoons of butter and stir until the butter melts. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Fold in ¼ cup chopped parsley.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:yukon gold potato (5lb)、hard-boiled eggs、celery (2stalks)、sweet onion (½cup)、sweet relish (1cup)、dill relish (1cup)、mayonnaise (½cup)、miracle whip (½cup)、hot sauce (2tablespoons)、dijon mustard (⅓cup)、inglehoffer stone ground mustard (¼cup)、Chicken/Vegetable Bouillon (4teaspoons)、garlic powder (½tablespoon)、celery seed (1teaspoon)、salt、pepper、paprika、fresh chive
instructions:
0: Rinse potatoes and place them in a pot. Fill the pot with cold water, making
1: sure potatoes are covered and add the chicken or vegetable bouillon Bring the pot to boil and lower the heat to medium. Cook until potatoes are tender. (You can stick a fork into the middle of a potato to test it.) Drain off water and let potatoes cool to room temperature.
2: Dice potatoes and eggs into small cubes and add to a large mixing bowl

4: along with the relish. Gently mix everything together with a wooden spoon.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (4tablespoons)、fresh thyme (1tablespoon)、fresh rosemary (1tablespoon)、shrimp (10oz)、flour (3tablespoons)、milk (25oz)、onion、fresh parsley (1cup)、green onion (½cup)、salt、pepper、nutmeg (1teaspoon)、lime、cooked pasta (10oz)
instructions:
0: In a large pan, add the butter, thyme and rosemary. Stir.
1: Add the shrimp and cook for 3 minutes. Take them out of the pan and set aside.
2: Sprinkle the flour and mix until it becomes slightly brown.
3: Pour the warm milk slowly while mixing.
4: Add salt, pepper, and ground nutmeg. Stir and add the chopped onion. Cook for 5 minutes.
5: Add the fresh parsley and green onion (or chives). Blend everything with a mixer.

7: Stir in the pasta. Serve right away.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium yellow onion、medium carrots、tuscan kale (1package)、extra virgin olive oil (3tablespoons)、kosher salt、black pepper、white wine (½cup)、whole chicken (3lb)、fresh rosemary (8sprigs)、fresh thyme (8sprigs)、lemon
instructions:
0: Arrange an oven rack in the center of the oven, then preheat to 425˚F (220˚C).
1: Toss the onion, carrots, and kale in a 12-inch (30 cm) cast iron skillet with 2 tablespoons of olive oil, salt, and pepper until well coated. Pour the white wine over the vegetables.
2: Season the chicken all over with salt and pepper, then brush with the remaining tablespoon of olive oil. Stuff the rosemary, thyme, and lemon inside the cavity, tie the legs closed with kitchen twine, and tuck the wings underneath the bird. Place the chicken, breast-side up, on top of the vegetables in the skillet.
3: Roast the chicken for 1 hour, rotating the pan halfway through cooking. The chicken is done when it is golden brown, the skin is crispy, and an instant-read thermometer inserted into the thigh registers 165˚F (70˚C). Remove from the oven and let the chicken rest for 15 minutes.
4: Carve the chicken, then plate alongside the vegetables. Pour the pan drippings over the top and serve immediately.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:thick cut bacon (4slices)、white onion (10oz)、kosher salt、garlic (4cloves)、cayenne (1pinch)、all purpose flour (3tablespoons)、chicken stock (4cups)、red potato (1 ¼cups)、fresh yellow corn kernels (4large ears)、red bell pepper (1cup)、heavy cream (¾cup)、fresh chive
instructions:
0: Turn the Instant Pot to sauté mode and set the time for 20 minutes. Add bacon to the pot and cook until crispy and the fat has rendered, stirring occasionally to prevent burning, 10–12 minutes. Transfer the bacon to a baking sheet or plate lined with paper towels and set aside until ready to serve. Leave the rendered fat behind in the pot.
1: To the Instant Pot, add the onion and season with salt. Sauté for 3 minutes, until translucent. Add the garlic and cayenne, if using, and sauté for 2 minutes, until fragrant.
2: Whisk in the flour, making sure to break up any clumps. Cook for 3 minutes, until the flour is light golden in color. Turn off sauté mode by pressing cancel.
3: Pour in the chicken stock to deglaze the pot, scraping the bottom with a wooden spoon to loosen any browned bits. Add the potatoes and corn.
4: Secure the lid of the Instant Pot and set the valve to sealing. Select pressure cooking and set the timer for 10 minutes. Manually release the pressure from the Instant Pot after the cooking time has elapsed and let vent naturally for 15 minutes. Be careful when releasing the valve, as hot steam will come out. Remove the lid of the Instant Pot carefully, as the soup will be very hot.
5: Stir in the red bell pepper and heavy cream.
6: Ladle the warm soup into bowls and top with the bacon and chives.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:fresh basil leaves (1cup)、pine nuts (⅓cup)、garlic (2cloves)、olive oil (½cup)、kale (1cup)、shredded parmesan cheese (1cup)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 425ºF (220ºC).
1: Make the pesto: Add the basil, pine nuts, garlic, olive oil, kale, Parmesan, salt, and pepper to a blender, and blend until smooth.
2: Add the butternut squash and beets to ¼ of a baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Toss to coat.
3: Add the tofu to another ¼ of the baking sheet and brush with pesto.
4: Bake for 10 minutes, then remove from the oven.
5: Flip the tofu, then add the cauliflower and broccoli to another ¼ of the baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Toss to coat.
6: Bake for 10 minutes, then remove from the oven.
7: Add the kale to the remaining ¼ of the baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
8: Bake for 10 minutes, until the kale is crispy and all of the vegetables are tender.
9: Add the quinoa to a bowl. Top with the tofu and vegetables and drizzle with pesto.
10: Nutrition  Calories: 1766 Fat: 126 grams  Carbs: 118 grams Fiber:  26 grams  Sugars: 22 grams  Protein: 63  grams
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cooking oil (1tablespoon)、chicken breasts、Tasty™ Fiery seasoning mix (2tablespoons)、yellow bell pepper、orange bell pepper、medium red onion、fresh spinach (1 ½cups)、whole milk (3cups)、rotini pasta (½lb)、mozzarella cheese (½cup)、parmesan cheese (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Heat the oil in a large pot over high heat. Add chicken and 2 tablespoons Tasty™ Fiery Seasoning Mix and stir to coat. Cook until the chicken is no longer pink, 5–6 minutes, then remove from the pot.
1: Add the yellow and orange bell peppers, and red onion to the pot and toss well to combine. Cook until the onion is translucent, 5–7 minutes.
2: Return the chicken to the pot with the milk and pasta. Be sure to stir occasionally to prevent the pasta from sticking together. Cook for about 20 minutes, until the pasta is al dente and the liquid has reduced to a thick sauce that coats the pasta.
3: Add the spinach, mozzarella, and parmesan cheeses and stir until melted.
4: Serve warm.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、ground black pepper、ground cumin、onion、cherry tomato (½can)、water (⅖cup)、chickpeas (½can)、zucchini、harissa paste (1tablespoon)、honey (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Season the chicken with pepper and cumin powder to taste.
1: On a medium-low heat, cook the chicken in some oil with the onion for 3 to 4 minutes stirring and turning occasionally.
2: Add the cherry tomatoes, the water, the chickpeas, the harissa paste, the honey and the courgette.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pasta (2cups)、cherry tomato (1cup)、pesto (¾cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、parmesan cheese
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC).
1: Take two sheets of aluminum foil (about 12x12-inch, 30x30 cm) and stack them on top of each other.
2: Fold one side of the foil about ⅓ of the way across sheet, repeat for opposite side.
3: Pinch the corner to form a point and then flatten it to the short side of the foil, forming a raised corner. Repeat for all four sides, and make four of these.
4: Add all of the ingredients to one of the foil boats, then stir.
5: Bake for 12 minutes.
6: Allow to cool for 10 minutes.
7: Eat or pack into tupperware and refrigerate 3-5 days.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:top sirloin steak (1 ½lb)、kosher salt、freshly ground black pepper、chipotle pepper in adobo sauce (2cans)、vegetable oil (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: On a cutting board, season the steak with salt and pepper on both sides.
1: Place the steak in a zip-top bag and add the chipotle peppers, then toss to coat.
2: Refrigerate for at least 2 hours, up to overnight.
3: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
4: Add the steak to the pan and cook for 5 minutes per side.
5: Remove the steak from the pan and rest on a cutting board for 10 minutes. Cut into bite-size pieces.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.

instructions:
0: Combine soy sauce, honey/agave, lemon juice, garlic powder, sesame seed, ginger, and garlic. Mix until combined.

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chuck roast (1 ½lb)、salt、pepper、oil (1tablespoon)、white onion、carrots、garlic (2cloves)、beef broth (2cups)、flour (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Pat the chuck roast dry with paper towels. Season on all sides with salt and pepper.
1: Put the Instant Pot on “Saute”. Once it says “Hot”, add the oil.
2: When the oil is shimmering, add the chuck roast. Sear the meat until brown, about 3-5 minutes per side.
3: Add the onion, carrots, and beef broth to the pot. Mix around until evenly distributed.
4: Set the pressure knob to “Sealing” and close the lid until it beeps. Tip: Closing the lid can be tricky. Have the pressure knob at 11 o’clock and turn right.
5: Select “Manual” and increase to 50 minutes. It will say “On” in a few seconds. Note: the Instant Pot will need to warm up for 5-10 minutes. Steam will be released and a few minutes later, the time will start counting down.
6: After the time has expired,  let the pot roast rest in the pot for 10 minutes. It will count up and read “L 0:10”.
7: Using a towel or mit, release the pressure knob from “Sealing” to “Venting”. After the steam has been released, carefully take out the roast and veggies and transfer to a plate or cutting board, only leaving the liquid in the pot. Cover the roast and veggies with foil.
8: Set the Instant Pot to “Saute” and once the liquid comes to a boil, add the flour. Whisk until mixed in and sauce has thickened, about 1-2 minutes.
9: Hit “Cancel” and remove the pot. Pour the sauce into another small bowl and cover to keep warm. Then clean out the Instant Pot.
10: Place the cauliflower florets in the pot. Pour in the beef broth.
11: Seal the lid and set the pressure knob to “Sealing”.
12: Select “Manual” and set time to 5 minutes.
13: Once time is up, using a towel or mit, release the pressure knob from “Sealing” to “Venting”. After steam has been released, carefully remove pot and dump out the liquid.
14: Using a potato masher or fork, mash the cauliflower until smooth.
15: Add the salt, pepper, garlic, and sour cream. Stir until everything is combined.
16: Serve with pot roast and gravy.
17: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (12tablespoons)、flour (2 ¼cups)、chicken stock (1 ½cups)、salt、fresh rosemary (1tablespoon)、fresh thyme (1tablespoon)、frozen mixed vegetable (2cups)、turkey breast (2cups)、baking soda (1 ½teaspoons)、buttermilk (¾cup)、heavy cream (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
1: In a 10-inch (25 cm) cast iron skillet, melt 4 tablespoons of butter over medium heat. Add the ¼ cup (30 g) of flour, and cook, stirring constantly, until smooth.
2: Add the chicken stock and salt to taste. Cook until the stock has reduced and thickened.
3: Add in the rosemary, frozen vegetables, turkey, and additional salt, and stir until fully mixed. Remove from the heat.
4: Add remaining flour, baking soda, 8 tablespoons of butter, and pinch of salt to a bowl. Using a wooden spoon or your hands, mix together until the butter is the size of peas.
5: Add the buttermilk and mix until the dough barely comes together, about 1 minute.
6: Place the dough on a floured countertop and gently form into a 1½-inch (4 cm) thick layer.
7: Use a 3-inch (6 cm) round cutter to cut 10-12 biscuits, rerolling the dough as needed.
8: Place the biscuits on the turkey in the cast iron skillet. Brush the top of the biscuits with heavy cream (optional).  Bake for 20-25 minutes, until biscuits are golden brown.
9: Serve immediately.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:broccoli head (1head)、cheddar cheese (2cups)、cream cheese (6oz)、ham (1cup)、onion powder (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Finely chop the broccoli florets, and then transfer to a large bowl.
2: Add the cheddar, cream cheese, ham, onion powder, and mix evenly until combined. Set aside.
3: In a bowl, mix together the salt, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, and paprika, then stir to combine.
4: Place the chicken breasts on a cutting board and slice across horizontally, making sure not to cut all the way through.
5: Season both sides of the chicken liberally with the spice mix.
6: Place each chicken breast on a double layer of plastic wrap, then cover with more plastic wrap.
7: Use a meat pounder to thinly pound the chicken breast and form into a rectangular shape.
8: Repeat with the remaining chicken breasts.
9: Lay down two of the flattened chicken breasts into a greased loaf pan lined with parchment paper, slightly overlapping them.
10: Place the ham slices evenly across the bottom and sides, hanging the ham over the sides of the loaf pan.
11: Spread broccoli mixture evenly on top of the ham, pressing it flat into the edges of the pan.
12: Fold over the flaps of ham to completely seal the mixture.
13: Place the third flattened chicken breast on top. Use a fork to tuck in the edges, creating a seal.
14: Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the loaf looks slightly brown and red on top.
15: Cool the loaf in the pan. Release any juices from the pan. Remove the chicken loaf using the parchment paper.
16: Slice into 1-inch (2-cm) slices, and serve!
17: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:coconut oil (1tablespoon)、Gourmet Garden Garlic Stir-In Paste (2teaspoons)、Gourmet Garden Ginger Stir-In Paste (1tablespoon)、red curry paste (1tablespoon)、unsweetened coconut milk (1can)、fish sauce (1 ½teaspoons)、sugar (½teaspoon)、yellow onion、red bell pepper、zucchini (6oz)、shrimp、Gourmet Garden Lightly Dried Cilantro (½teaspoon)、Gourmet Garden Lightly Dried Basil (½teaspoon)、rice
instructions:
0: Melt coconut oil in a large saucepan over medium-low heat. Add Gourmet Garden Garlic Stir-In Paste and Gourmet Garden Ginger Stir-In Paste. Stir and let sizzle for a minute. Add red curry paste. Stir and let sizzle for 1–2 minutes, until fragrant. Stir in coconut milk, fish sauce, and sugar. Bring to a very light simmer. Let simmer for 3 minutes.
1: Add onions and cook for 5 minutes. Add red bell pepper and cook for another 5 minutes. Add zucchini and cook for 5 more minutes or until tender. (If liquid doesn’t slightly submerge vegetables, cover with a lid while cooking.)
2: Add shrimp and cook for about 3 minutes, just until cooked through and no longer translucent.
3: Stir in Gourmet Garden Lightly Dried Cilantro and Gourmet Garden Lightly Dried Basil. Serve with rice and garnish each plate with a little more cilantro and basil. 
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ketchup (2cups)、brown sugar (½cup)、molasses (¼cup)、apple cider vinegar (½cup)、worcestershire sauce (1teaspoon)、kosher salt (1tablespoon)、black pepper (2teaspoons)、smoked paprika (2teaspoons)
instructions:
0: Make the smoke bombs: Add the wood chips to a bowl and cover with water. Let soak for 1 hour, then drain. Place 1 cup of the damp wood chips on a piece of aluminum foil and fold into a packet. Poke multiple holes in the top with a toothpick or fork. Repeat with the remaining wood chips, creating 4 packets total.
1: Make the sauce: Add the ketchup, brown sugar, molasses, apple cider vinegar, Worcestershire, salt, pepper, and smoked paprika to a small pot over medium heat, whisking to combine. Once the sauce begins to boil, reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes. Remove from the heat and let cool to room temperature.
2: Make the rub: In a medium bowl, whisk together the brown sugar, salt, pepper, cumin, onion powder, paprika, cayenne, ground mustard, and garlic powder.
3: On a large cutting board, pat the ribs dry with paper towels. If necessary, remove the membrane on the bone-side of the ribs by using a paring knife to gently loosen and pulling it up in one sheet.
4: Generously season the ribs all over with the dry rub.
5: Wrap the ribs in aluminum foil until completely covered.
6: Preheat the grill to 300°F (150°C) with the lid closed.
7: Place the foil-wrapped ribs over indirect heat and close the lid. Cook for 2½ hours, until the meat is tender and starting to pull away from the bone, flipping every 30 minutes.
8: Remove the ribs from the grill and let rest for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, carefully remove the grates and place the smoke bombs over the flames. Close the lid and let smoke build up for 10 minutes.
9: Unwrap the ribs and discard the foil.
10: Baste one side of the ribs with the sauce and place directly on the grill, sauce side down. Baste the other side, now facing up. Continue to flip and baste every 5 minutes for 15 minutes total.
11: Remove the ribs from the grill and serve with extra barbecue sauce.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium white potatoes、white onion、italian seasoning (1tablespoon)、lemon juice (1teaspoon)、garlic (2cloves)、salt (1teaspoon)、fettuccine pasta (12oz)、raw cashew (½cup)、nutritional yeast (1teaspoon)、truffle oil (¼teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Boil 4 cups (945 ml) of water in a small pot.
1: Cut a quarter of an onion into cubes. Peel and chop the potatoes into ½ inch (1 cm) cubes.
2: Add onion and potatoes to pot and boil for 10 minutes, or until soft.
3: Remove potatoes and onion from the pot. Make sure to save the water.
4: Begin cooking fettuccine pasta in a separate pot.
5: In a blender, combine 1 cup (235ml) of the water used to boil the veggies, raw cashews, veggies, lemon juice, and seasonings. Blend until creamy. Add more of the boiling water if the mixture is too thick.
6: Add salt to taste and garlic.
7: NOTE: Adding 1 tsp of nutritional yeast, and ¼ tsp truffle oil will really make this dish pop with cheesy flavor!
8: Pour the sauce over the cooked pasta and serve.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bacon (5strips)、medium yellow onion、fresh spinach (2cups)、chicken breasts、salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (1teaspoon)、ham (10slices)、swiss cheese (12slices)、all-purpose flour (3cups)、large eggs、panko breadcrumbs (3cups)、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: In a medium cast iron skillet or pan, cook the bacon until almost brown, about 5 minutes.
1: Add the onions and cook, stirring, until caramelized, about 10 minutes.
2: Add the spinach and cook until wilted, about 3 minutes. Remove the pan from the heat.
3: Place a chicken breast on a piece of plastic wrap. Cover with more plastic wrap and pound until thin. Repeat with remaining chicken breasts.
4: Lay out a large piece of plastic wrap and layer the chicken on the plastic so the edges are overlapping slightly.
5: Season with salt and pepper.
6: Layer the ham, Swiss cheese, and bacon-carmelized onion mixture over the chicken.
7: Roll the chicken into a log tightly wrap in plastic, twisting the ends to seal.
8: Refrigerate for 1 hour to set.
9: Add the flour, eggs, and panko to 3 separate baking sheets or other wide, shallow dishes. Roll the chicken in the flour, then in the egg, and finally in the panko. Coat once more in the egg, then panko.
10: Transfer the chicken roll to a greased baking sheet and bake at 375° (190 celsius) for 40 minutes, until golden brown.
11: Make the creamy Dijon sauce: in a small pot over medium heat, melt the butter. Add the garlic and cook until aromatic. Add the flour and cook until starting to brown. Whisk in the milk, then add the mustard and season with salt and pepper. Add the Parmesan and cook until the sauce is thickened.
12: Slice the chicken roll and serve with the sauce and fresh parsley.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pasta (2cups)、carrot (½cup)、broccoli (½cup)、alfredo sauce (¾cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Take two sheets of aluminum foil, about 12x12-inch (30x30 cm) and stack them on top of each other.
1: Fold one side of the foil about ⅓ of the way across sheet, repeat for opposite side.
2: Pinch the corner to form a point and then flatten it to the short side of the foil, forming a raised corner. Repeat for all four sides, and make four of these.
3: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC).
4: Add all of the ingredients to one of the foil boats, then  stir.
5: Bake for 12 minutes.
6: Allow to cool for 10 minutes.
7: Eat or pack into tupperware and refrigerate 3-5 days.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、salt (1teaspoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、onion powder (1teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、flour (1cup)、eggs、seasoned bread crumbs (3cups)、oil、tomato sauce (1cup)、mozzarella cheese (8oz)、grated parmesan cheese (¼cup)、fresh basil
instructions:
0: In a food processor, add the chicken, salt, pepper, oregano, garlic powder, onion powder, and paprika, and pulse until thoroughly combined, with no large chunks.
1: Spread the mixture evenly into the bottom of a plastic wrap-lined, 10-inch (25 cm) cake pan. Fold over the excess saran wrap on top, and press it into a flat shape. Freeze until completely frozen solid, 2-4 hours.
2: In 3 separate shallow dishes, distribute the flour, eggs, and bread crumbs.
3: Unwrap the frozen chicken disc and dip it in the flour, shaking off any excess.
4: Submerge it into the eggs, then cover it completely with the bread crumbs, pressing the bread crumbs into the chicken.
5: Freeze for 15 minutes.
6: Preheat oven to broil.
7: Add oil to a large, deep pan halfway up the side to 400°F (200°C).
8: Carefully lower the chicken disc into the oil with tongs, making sure it doesn’t splash. If the bottom is getting more color than the top, flip the patty extremely carefully and fry the other side until a deep golden brown.
9: Remove the chicken disc from the oil and transfer to a wire rack. Blot with paper towels to remove excess oil.
10: Add the tomato sauce to the fried chicken disc, spreading it in an even layer.
11: Lay the mozzarella over the sauce, then sprinkle with Parmesan over the top.
12: Broil for 5-8 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and golden brown.
13: Top with basil, slice, and serve.
14: Nutrition  Calories: 2086 Fat: 149 grams  Carbs: 134 grams Fiber: 8 grams  Sugars: 10 grams  Protein: 50 grams
15: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:Frank’s Red Hot Original (2tablespoons)、oranges、garlics、chipotle peppers、brown sugar (2tablespoons)、apple cider vinegar (¼cup)、salt (1tablespoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、paprika (1tablespoon)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、cinnamon (¼teaspoon)、boneless pork shoulder (3lb)
instructions:
0: In a blender, add Frank’s Original Red Hot, orange juice, garlic, chipotle peppers, brown sugar, apple cider vinegar, salt, pepper, paprika, dried oregano, and cinnamon. Blend on high until smooth.
1: Place pork shoulder in Instant Pot. Pour marinade over pork and turn with tongs to coat.
2: Put the cover on the Instant Pot. Be sure the pressure valve is set to “Sealing.” Use the manual setting to set the timer for 40 minutes.
3: When the timer goes off, turn the pressure valve to “Venting” to release pressure quickly. **Be sure to read all Instant Pot instructions carefully for safety.** Be sure Instant Pot is turned off and unplugged before carefully removing the cover.
4: Transfer pork from the pot to a bowl. Use two forks to shred the pork. Pour some of the cooking liquid over the carnitas and toss to coat.
5: Serving options: Build carnitas on top of nachos or tacos.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:fresh basil (3cups)、pine nuts (¾cup)、vegetarian parmesan cheese (¾cup)、garlic (3cloves)、olive oil (¾cup)、ricotta cheese (½cup)、salt、pepper、medium zucchinis、medium yellow squashes、large carrots、large eggplant、butter (1tablespoon)、puff pastry (1sheet)、rice (2cups)、dried oregano (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Combine the basil, pine nuts, Parmesan, garlic, ½ cup (120 ml) of olive oil, ricotta, salt, and pepper in a food processor and puree until blended and smooth. Set aside.
1: Using a vegetable peeler, peel the zucchini, yellow squash and carrots into ribbons.
2: Cut the eggplant lengthwise into thin slices, then slice in half lengthwise.
3: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
4: Grease a 9-inch (23 cm) tart dish with butter using a piece of parchment paper.
5: Lay the puff pastry in the tart dish and delicately press it flat against the bottom and up the sides. Crimp any dough hanging over the edges and prick the bottom all over with a fork.
6: Lay a piece of parchment paper over the pastry and pour the rice evenly on top. The rice helps keep the bottom of the crust from rising while baking.
7: Parbake the crust for about 15 minutes, until the puff pastry starts to cook.
8: Carefully lift the parchment paper to remove the rice (save for using in other recipes or discard). Increase the oven temperature to 400°F (200°C).
9: Spread the ricotta pesto mixture evenly on the bottom of the tart.
10: Starting from the outside, line the walls of the tart with the veggie ribbons, alternating veggies, until the entire shell is filled.
11: Sprinkle the oregano on top and brush with olive oil. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
12: Bake for 35-40 minutes, until the veggies are tender.
13: Let cool for a few minutes.
14: Slice and serve.
15: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:duck breasts、sea salt (4teaspoons)、pepper (4teaspoons)、garlic (8cloves)、fresh rosemary (4sprigs)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 180˚C (350˚F).
1: Lightly score the duck skin with a sharp knife. Make sure not to cut through to the flesh.
2: Season each side of the duck breast with 1 teaspoon of salt and pepper each.
3: Fry the duck breast skin side down on medium heat for 3 to 4 minutes with the garlic and rosemaries. Flip and fry the other side  for 1 minute.
4: Put the duck breast in the oven for 6-8 minutes for medium rare; 10 minutes for medium well. Rest for 6 minutes before serving.
5: For the mashed potato, chuck all the ingredients in the boiled potato, mix well.
6: For the Red Wine Jus, use the pan you fried the duck breasts in. Take out the rosemary stalks, crush the garlic with a fork.
7: Fry the garlic for a minute or two on medium low heat. Add in the flour and fry for another minute or until all the fat in the pan have binded to the flour.
8: Add in the rest of the ingredients, mix well and keep simmering on a low heat for 10 minutes or until it becomes a glossy thick sauce.
9: To impress your guests with your presentation game, pipe the mashed potato with a piping bag into a golf ball size mound. Shape using the back of a spoon.
10: Place the duck breast, drizzle with the jus and decorate with orange zest and rosemary.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cremini mushroom (1lb)、shiitake mushroom (1lb)、extra virgin olive oil (⅓cup)、kosher salt、freshly ground black pepper、dijon mustard (2teaspoons)、honey (1tablespoon)、lemon juice (¼cup)、frozen peas (1cup)、small shallot、garlic (2cloves)、lemon、fresh parsley leaves (1cup)、arugula (5oz)、parmesan cheese (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Line 2 baking sheets with reusable baking mats or parchment paper.
1: Spread the cremini mushrooms in an even layer on 1 baking sheet and the shiitake mushrooms on the other. Drizzle ⅓ cup (80 ml) olive oil over the mushrooms, dividing evenly. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Toss well to coat evenly.
2: Roast the mushrooms for 20-25 minutes, stirring halfway through, until crisp and tender. Remove from the oven and set aside. Leave the oven on.
3: Meanwhile, make the dressing: In a small bowl, whisk together the mustard, honey, and lemon juice. Slowly drizzle in the remaining ½ cup (120 ml) olive oil, whisking constantly, until the dressing is emulsified and thickened. Season with salt to taste. Set aside.
4: Scatter the peas, shallot, garlic, and lemon zest over the baking sheets with the mushrooms. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
5: Return the baking sheets to the oven for 5 minutes, until the peas are warmed through and the shallots are softened.
6: Sprinkle the roasted vegetables with parsley and set aside to cool slightly.
7: Place the arugula in a large serving bowl. Add the vegetables and half of the dressing and toss well. Top with the shaved Parmesan and serve with the remaining dressing on the side.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:rice vinegar (¼cup)、soy sauce (⅓cup)、brown sugar (⅓cup)、vegan worcestershire (¼cup)、tamarind paste (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Soak the rice noodles in room-temperature water for 30 minutes prior to cooking.
1: Make the sauce: in a small saucepan over medium-high heat, whisk together the rice vinegar, soy sauce, brown sugar, Worcestershire sauce, and tamarind paste.
2: Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low. Simmer for 5 minutes, stirring constantly, until the sauce thickens and coats the back of a wooden spoon. Remove the sauce from the heat and set aside.
3: Heat a large cast-iron pan or wok over high heat. Add the peanut oil, scallions, chiles, and garlic. Stir, and cook for about 2 minutes until scallions soften.
4: Add the carrots, stir to incorporate, and cook for about 1 minute. Add the bean sprouts and stir to incorporate.
5: Add soaked rice noodles and stir to evenly distribute all ingredients, then stir for 1-2 minutes to heat the noodles through.
6: Add the sauce and stir to combine.
7: Add the tofu, stir to incorporate, and remove the pan from the heat.
8: Serve immediately with peanuts, bean sprouts, scallions, and red chiles, if desired.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:young green jackfruit (20oz)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、yellow onion、garlic (3cloves)、chili powder (1teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、cumin (1teaspoon)、liquid smoke (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、vegetable stock (1cup)、vegan bbq sauce (¾cup)、red onion、tomato、lettuce、burger bun (4buns)
instructions:
0: Preheat your oven to 400ºF (200ºC).
1: Drain and rinse the jackfruit, then cut the jackfruit into smaller pieces, removing the core.
2: Add the olive oil, onions, garlic, salt, and pepper to a large frying pan or skillet over medium-high heat. Sauté until the onions are tender and become translucent.
3: Add the jackfruit, chili powder, paprika, cumin, liquid smoke, salt, pepper, and liquid smoke, and stir.
4: Add the vegetable stock, cover, and cook another 10-15 minutes, until the jackfruit is soft enough that it can be mashed.
5: Mash the jackfruit with potato masher or a couple of forks, until it looks pulled or shredded.
6: Spread an even layer of pulled jackfruit across a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
7: Bake for 25 minutes.
8: Remove from oven and pour over the vegan BBQ sauce and stir to combine.
9: Place back in the oven for 10 more minutes.
10: Build your burger, top with dressings of your choice.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cranberry sauce (1cup)、orange marmalade (¼cup)、extra virgin olive oil (2teaspoons)、fresh ginger (1teaspoon)、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、bones in pork chops、canola oil (2tablespoons)、fresh parsley (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: In a medium bowl, mix together the cranberry sauce, orange marmalade, olive oil, ginger, red pepper flakes, 1 teaspoon of salt, and ½ teaspoon of pepper. Set aside.
2: Season the pork chops on both sides with the remaining teaspoon of salt and ½ teaspoon of pepper.
3: Heat the canola oil in a large cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat. When the oil is shimmering, sear the pork chops in batches until golden brown on both sides, about 2 minutes per side. Sear the fat side of the pork chops until lightly browned and some of the fat has rendered, about 1 minute more.
4: Turn off the heat then arrange all of the pork chops in the pan. Spoon the cranberry mixture over the chops, spreading in an even layer.
5: Transfer the pan to the oven and bake for 5–7 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 140°F (60°C). Let rest for 5 minutes.
6: Transfer the pork chops to plates and garnish with the parsley. Serve with your favorite sides.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:peanut butter (½cup)、siracha (1tablespoon)、lime、water (¼cup)、medium zucchinis、green onions、kosher salt
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, combine the peanut butter, Sriracha, lime juice, and water. Use a fork or whisk to mix until smooth.
1: Using a vegetable peeler, shave the zucchini into wide ribbons. You should have about 8 cups (990 grams) of zucchini ribbons total.
2: Add the zucchini ribbons and light parts of the green onions to the sauce and toss until coated. The sauce may seem thick at first, but the zucchini will release some water and thin the sauce a bit. Season with salt to taste.
3: Divide the noodles between serving bowls. Garnish with the dark scallion parts.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cooking oil、white mushroom (24oz)、medium onion、garlic (3cloves)、whole wheat breadcrumbs (1cup)、quick-cook oats (½cup)、fresh parsley (¼cup)、grated parmesan cheese (2tablespoons)、dried oregano (½teaspoon)、dried rosemary (½teaspoon)、dried thyme (½teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、cayenne (½teaspoon)、eggs
instructions:
0: In a skillet over medium heat, add cooking oil or water and mushrooms. Cook down until mushrooms begin to brown, stirring occasionally.
1: Add the onion and cook until onions are translucent. Add the garlic and stir until fragrant. Transfer to a large bowl.
2: To the mushroom mixture, add breadcrumbs, oats, parsley,  Parmesan, oregano, rosemary, thyme, salt, pepper, and cayenne, and stir to combine.
3: Add eggs and mix well.
4: Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, or overnight.
5: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
6: When ready, use your hands to form 1-inch (2-cm) balls from the mushroom mixture. Place in rows on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
7: Bake for 20 minutes, or until golden, flipping halfway.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breast (1lb)、salt、white pepper、water (2tablespoons)、cornstarch (1 ½teaspoons)、soy sauce (¼cup)、brown sugar (2tablespoons)、fresh ginger (1teaspoon)、garlic (1teaspoon)、honey (1tablespoon)、sesame oil (1teaspoon)、mirin (1tablespoon)、cooking oil (2tablespoons)、bell pepper (1cup)、carrot (1cup)、short grain rice (4cups)、eggs、panko breadcrumbs (2cups)、scallion (1cup)
instructions:
0: In a large measuring cup, combine water and cornstarch. Stir until combined and add soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, garlic, honey, sesame oil, and mirin. Mix well.
1: Season sliced chicken breast with salt and pepper, then pour ¼ cup (60 ml) of the sauce over the sliced chicken just until covered, and set aside. Mix the sauce with the sliced chicken, cover, and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
2: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, pour the rest of the sauce and stir occasionally as it comes to a boil. Once boiling, reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened. Set aside in a bowl.
3: In the same skillet, add 1 tablespoon cooking oil and raise heat back to medium-high. Place sliced chicken pieces in the pan and cook for 3 minutes, flip, and cook an additional 3 minutes. Pour 1 tablespoon of the reduced sauce over the chicken and stir. Remove from the pan and set aside.
4: Add the remaining cooking oil into the skillet and add the julienned vegetables. Season with salt and white pepper, and cook 3-4 minutes or until vegetables have softened. Add back the chicken and gradually add just enough sauce to coat the chicken and vegetables.
5: Take ⅓ cup (65 g) of cooked rice and flatten out on a piece of plastic wrap. Layer the cooked chicken and vegetables in the center of the rice and wrap the rice around the fillings.
