Form into a square shape and repeat with the remainder of the rice and filling. Chill rice balls in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.
6: Dip the rice ball in beaten eggs, then coat with panko. Shake off any excess bread crumbs.
7: Heat ½ inch (1 cm) oil in a skillet to 350˚F (180˚C) and fry for 3 minutes on each side or until golden and crispy. Move to a cooling rack, and season with salt.
8: Cut in half and serve with the remaining sauce for dipping.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium shrimp (1lb)、salt、pepper、large eggs、soda water (1 ½cups)、cake flour (2cups)、oil、panko bread crumbs (3cups)
instructions:
0: Pat the shrimp dry with paper towels, then transfer to a medium bowl and season with salt and pepper.
1: In a separate medium bowl, whisk the eggs and soda water until combined. Add the cake flour and gently whisk, making sure the batter is still clumpy. Do not overmix.
2: Heat the oil in a large pot until it reaches 350˚F (180˚C).
3: Add the panko bread crumbs to a shallow bowl.
4: Using a slotted spoon, dip the shrimp in the tempura batter, then toss in the panko, making sure to fully coat.
5: Fry the shrimp in the hot oil, 5-6 at a time, until golden brown, about 2-3 minutes. Transfer to a wire rack to drain.
6: Make the glaze: Heat the oil in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and ginger and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds, stirring frequently.
7: Add the soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, brown sugar, and red pepper flakes. Stir until the mixture begins to simmer.
8: In a small bowl, combine the water and cornstarch. Add the cornstarch slurry to the saucepan and stir to combine. Cook until the glaze is reduced by half and looks thick and syrupy, about 5 minutes.
9: Transfer the shrimp to a large bowl and pour the glaze over. Toss the shrimp gently to coat with the glaze.
10: Serve the shrimp over rice and garnish with scallions.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium eggplants、cumin (1teaspoon)、chili powder (½teaspoon)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、smoked paprika (1teaspoon)、cayenne pepper (½teaspoon)、brown sugar (1tablespoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、vegetarian barbecue sauce (1 ½cups)、buns、coleslaw
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Place the eggplant on a non-stick baking sheet and prick all over with a fork. Bake for 20 minutes, until the skin is wrinkled. Reduce the oven temperature to 180°F (80°C).
2: Transfer the eggplant to a large bowl and cover. Let cool and sweat for 10-15 minutes, until the skin peels off easily, and they are cool enough to handle.
3: Trim the stems from the eggplant and remove the skin completely. Tear the eggplant flesh into thin strips and set aside.
4: In a small bowl, combine the cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, paprika, smoked paprika, cayenne, brown sugar, salt, and pepper and mix well.
5: Add the eggplant strips to a non-stick baking sheet and sprinkle with the spice mix. Mix well with your hands to coat.
6: Bake for 45-50 minutes, until the ends of the eggplant strips start to dry out.
7: Increase the oven temperature to 250°F (120°C)
8: Pour the barbecue sauce over the eggplant and toss well to coat.
9: Bake for 15 minutes more, until the sauce has been absorbed by the eggplant.
10: Pile the eggplant on the buns and top with coleslaw, if desired.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cream cheese (8oz)、spinach (¼cup)、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、shredded mozzarella cheese (1cup)、ground beef (½lb)、ground pork (½lb)、egg、parsley (½cup)、bread crumbs (½cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、marinara sauce (2cups)、fettuccine (½lb)
instructions:
0: Mix cream cheese, spinach, garlic powder, and mozzarella until smooth.
1: Mix ground beef, pork, egg, parsley, breadcrumbs, salt, and pepper until evenly combined.
2: Take a golf ball-sized handful of the meatball mixture and press it flat in the palm of your hand.
3: Place a spoonful of the spinach dip in the center of the meat and fold the edges over the dip, sealing it and rolling into a ball.
4: Repeat with the remaining meat and dip.
5: In a pan over medium-high heat, sear meatballs for about a minute, then flip.
6: Add the marinara sauce and mix.
7: Cook for about 15 minutes, until meatballs are cooked through and sauce is thick.
8: Serve with fettuccine.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:mac 'n' cheese (1box)、ground beef (½lb)、grated cheddar cheese (¼cup)、red kidney bean (1cup)、green chilli (4oz)、chili powder (2teaspoons)
instructions:
0: Cook 1 box of Mac 'N' Cheese according to instructions on box.
1: Add cooked ground beef, cheddar cheese, kidney beans, green chilis, and chili powder, stir until fully incorporated.
2: Top with desired garnish. Serve immediately.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、medium yellow onion、garlic (1clove)、medium tomato、cremini mushroom (1 ½lb)、chili powder (½tablespoon)、smoked paprika (½teaspoon)、ground cumin (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、lime、fresh cilantro (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Make the mushroom filling: Heat the olive oil in a medium pan over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, until caramelized, about 3 minutes.
1: Add the tomato and mushrooms and stir. Add the chili powder, smoked paprika, cumin, pepper, and salt and stir thoroughly. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes.
2: Add the lime juice and cilantro and stir to combine. Transfer to a medium bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until ready to use.
3: Make the onion and pepper filling: Heat the olive oil in a medium pan over medium heat. Add the onion, red bell pepper, and green bell pepper and cook until softened, about 8 minutes.
4: Add the lime juice, paprika, cumin, salt, and pepper, and mix thoroughly. Continue cooking until the vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a medium bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until ready to use.
5: Make the tofu filling: Heat the olive oil in a medium pan over medium heat. Add the onion, garlic and red bell pepper and cook until caramelized, about 5 minutes. 
6: Add the tofu, smoked paprika, chili powder, cumin, soy sauce, lime juice and cilantro and mix thoroughly. Cook until the red bell pepper is tender, about 8 minutes. Transfer to a medium bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until ready to use.
7: Make the black bean and corn filling: Heat the olive oil in a medium pan over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook until caramelized, about 3 minutes. 
8: Add the tomato, corn, black beans, paprika, chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper and mix thoroughly. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 8 minutes. Transfer to a medium bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until ready to use.
9: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
10: Generously grease a baking sheet with nonstick spray.
11: Place 6 tortillas around the sides of the pan so half of the tortilla is hanging over the edge Place 2 tortillas in the middle, covering the exposed pan.
12: Sprinkle half of the cheddar cheese and half of the Monterey Jack cheese over the tortillas.
13: Scoop the black bean and corn filling onto the tortillas in the upper-left corner of the tray. Spread the mixture so that it fills ¼ of the sheet tray.
14: Scoop the onion and pepper filling over the tortillas in the upper-right corner of the tray. Spread the mixture so that it fills another ¼ of the sheet tray.
15: Scoop the mushroom filling over the tortillas in the lower-left corner of the tray. Spread the mixture so that it fills another ¼ of the sheet tray.
16: Scoop the tofu mixture over the tortillas in the lower-right corner of the tray. Spread the mixture so that it fills the remaining ¼ of the sheet tray.
17: Sprinkle the rest of the cheese over the fillings.
18: Place the remaining 2 tortillas over the cheese in the center of the pan.
19: Fold the overhanging tortillas onto the pan so they cover the fillings and touch the center tortillas.
20: Place another baking sheet on top. Place an oven-proof weight, such as a cast-iron skillet, on top of the sheet tray.
21: Bake for 20 minutes. Remove the weight and top baking sheet. Bake for another 15 minutes, until the tortillas are golden and crisp.
22: Flip the quesadilla onto a cutting board.
23: Slice and serve with salsa and sour cream.
24: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs、herb sea salt (2tablespoons)、olive oil (3tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and set a wire rack inside.
1: Pat the chicken thighs dry with a paper towel. Generously season the chicken on both sides with the herb salt, rubbing underneath the skin. Let sit for 15-20 minutes to draw out the moisture from the chicken skin, which will result in crispier chicken.
2: After resting, pat the chicken thighs dry once more to remove any excess moisture. Drizzle the olive oil under the skin and rub into the chicken.
3: Place the chicken thighs skin-side up on the wire rack. Bake for 30 minutes, until the skin is crispy and the internal temperature reaches 155-160˚F (68-71˚C).
4: Let the thighs rest for 15 minutes to bring the internal temperature to 165˚F (75˚C) and to let the juices settle.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:milk (3cups)、large eggs、all-purpose flour (2cups)、yellow cornmeal (3cups)、salt (3teaspoons)、baking powder (3teaspoons)、baking soda (1teaspoon)、unsalted butter (10tablespoons)、nonstick cooking spray、olive oil (2tablespoons)、large yellow onion、ground beef (2lb)、salt (1tablespoon)、black pepper (2teaspoons)、paprika (2teaspoons)、garlic powder (2teaspoons)、chili powder (2teaspoons)、cumin (2teaspoons)、crushed tomato (28oz)、shredded mexican cheese blend (1cup)、sour cream、scallion
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: In a liquid measuring cup or medium bowl, whisk the eggs and milk until well-combined.
2: In a large bowl, add the flour, cornmeal, salt, baking powder, and baking soda, and whisk to combine.
3: Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients, then pour in the wet ingredients and whisk until smooth. Add the melted butter and stir to combine.
4: Grease a 9x13-inch (23x33-cm) glass baking dish with nonstick spray and line with parchment paper.
5: Pour the cornbread batter into the pan, smoothing the top with a spatula.
6: Bake for 25 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean. Let cool for about 10 minutes.
7: In a large pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, stirring frequently, about 5 minutes.
8: Add the ground beef and break apart with a wooden spoon into small pieces. Add the salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, chili powder, and cumin. Cook, stirring frequently, until the ground beef is cooked through, about 5 minutes. 
9: Add the crushed tomatoes and stir. Simmer for 10 minutes.
10: Using the bottom of a utensil with a handle that is about 1-inch (2 cm) in diameter, poke multiple holes in the cornbread.
11: Pour the chili over the cornbread and smooth the top with a spatula. Sprinkle the cheese over the chili.
12: Bake for 3 minutes, or until the cheese is melted.
13: Slice and serve with sour cream, scallions, and cilantro. 
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium beet、large russet potato、large egg、grated parmesan cheese (½cup)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、whole wheat flour (1 ½cups)、salted butter (½cup)、fresh sage (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
1: Add the beet to an oven-safe dish and pour in enough water to come ¾ of the way up the beet. Cover the dish tightly with foil and set aside.
2: Poke the potato all over with a fork and place in the center of a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
3: Place both the beet and potato in the oven and roast for 45 minutes, until fork tender. Remove from the oven and let cool until safe to handle.
4: Gently rub the beet to remove the skin. (If you’d like, wear rubber gloves to protect your hands from being dyed by the beet juice.) Trim any remaining stem from the beet after peeling, then roughly chop.
5: Transfer the beet to a food processor, along with the egg, Parmesan, and salt. Puree until completely smooth. Set aside.
6: Peel the skin from potato and grate through the small holes of a box grater, or press through a potato ricer, if you have one.
7: In a large bowl, combine the potato and the beet mixture. Fold gently to combine, being careful not to over mix.
8: Add the flour, ½ cup (60 grams) at a time, and fold until the dough comes together. You may not need to use the full 2 cups.
9: Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead gently until a pliable dough is formed that is tender but not sticky when handled. Divide into 8 portions. Roll a dough portion into a ½-inch (1 ¼ cm) thick rope. Cut the rope into 1-inch (2.5 cm) pieces. Repeat with the remaining dough.
10: If desired, roll each piece of gnocchi over the tines of a fork to create ridges.
11: Bring a medium pot of well-salted water to a boil over high heat.
12: Working in batches, drop 8-10 gnocchi into the boiling water and cook until they begin to float. Once they start floating at the surface, let cook for 30 seconds more, then transfer from the water with a slotted spoon to a plate and set aside.
13: In a medium pan, melt 2 tablespoons of butter until just beginning to bubble. Add 1 tablespoon of sage and half of the gnocchi, to avoid overcrowding the pan. Sauté for about 1 minute per side until the gnocchi are lightly toasted and well coated with butter and sage. Repeat with the remaining butter, sage, and gnocchi.
14: Serve immediately with Parmesan cheese for garnish.
15: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breast (1.5lb)、ranch seasoning (1packet)、onion、celery (3ribs)、tomato sauce (14oz)、crushed tomato (14oz)、garlic (2tablespoons)、white bean (1can)、buffalo sauce (½cup)、chicken broth (2cups)
instructions:
0: Combine all ingredients in a crockpot.
1: Cook on high for 4 hours or low for 8 hours.
2: Remove chicken and shred, then return to the crockpot for 10 minutes.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:broccoli (2small heads)、olive oil (¼cup)、cayenne pepper (½teaspoon)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、salt、pepper、fettuccine (1lb)、hummus (1cup)、lemon  zest (1lemon)、lemon juice (1lemon)、butter (2tablespoons)、grated parmesan cheese (¾cup)、basil (¼cup)、parsley (¼cup)、red pepper flakes (1pinch)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 450ºF (230˚C).
1: Place the broccoli florets on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet and drizzle with olive, cayenne, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper, and stir to combine.
2: Bake for 15 to 20 minutes, tossing halfway through, until lightly charred.
3: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil over high heat. Add the pasta and cook until al dente. Before draining through a colander, reserve 1 cup (240 ml) of the pasta water.
4: Return the pasta to the pot.
5: Add the hummus, ½ cup (120 ml) of the pasta cooking water, lemon zest, lemon juice, butter, and Parmesan and toss until a creamy sauce forms. Thin the sauce with more pasta cooking water, a little at a time, as needed.
6: Add the basil, parsley, red pepper flakes, and remaining reserved water.
7: Add the broccoli to the pasta, and toss gently with salt, and pepper. Serve immediately with extra Parmesan, basil and parsley on top.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:vegetable oil (1tablespoon)、boneless skinless chicken breast (1lb)、Tasty™ Savoury Seasoning Mix (1package)、small yellow onion、chicken stock (4cups)、cherry tomato (1cup)、pasta (8oz)、bite-size mozzarella cheese balls (1cup)
instructions:
0: Heat the oil in large high sided skillet over medium-high heat. Add the cubed chicken and 1 tablespoon of the seasoning mix. Cook, stirring often for 5 minutes or until browned and fully cooked. Remove chicken from the pan and transfer to a large bowl. Set aside.
1: Add the onion to the skillet and cook for 3 minutes or until softened and translucent.
2: Add the stock, tomatoes and remaining seasoning mix to the skillet, bring to boil and stir to release browned bits from bottom of skillet. Stir in the uncooked pasta and cook for 15 to 20 minutes, stirring occasionally until the pasta is fully cooked.
3: Return the chicken to skillet. Stir in the mozzarella and cook for 2 minutes or until thel chicken is heated through. Sprinkle with chopped basil if desired and serve immediately.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:spaghetti squash、oil、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Using a fork or knife, carefully poke holes along the middle of the squash.
1: Microwave for 5 minutes so the squash softens and is easier to cut.
2: Cut in half horizontally and scoop out the seeds.
3: Drizzle olive oil, salt, and pepper.
4: Place in the Instant Pot and secure the lid until you hear the beep. Tip: Closing the lid can be tricky. Have the pressure knob at 11 o’clock and turn right.
5: Set the pressure knob on the top of the lid to Sealing. Select “Manual” and reduce to 7 minutes. It will say “On” in a few seconds. Note: the Instant Pot will need to warm up for 5-10 minutes. Steam will be released and a few minutes later, the time will start counting down.
6: While the squash is cooking, prepare the shrimp. Place the shrimp in a bowl and add the minced garlic, onion powder, parsley, oregano, basil, salt, and pepper. Mix until combined. Refrigerate until ready to cook.
7: Once the 7 minutes is up, let the squash rest in the pot for 5 minutes. It will count up and read “L 0:05”.
8: Using a towel or mit, release the pressure knob from “Sealing” to “Venting”. After the steam has been released, carefully take the squash out of the pot and let it rest in a bowl.
9: Drain the excess liquid and clean the pot.
10: To cook the shrimp, select “Saute” on the Instant Pot. Once it says “Hot”, add the oil. When the oil is shimmering, add the shrimp in a single layer (cook in batches if necessary). Cook for 3-5 minutes per side or until opaque.
11: Press “Cancel” and remove the shrimp.
12: Using a fork, shred the inside of the squash.
13: Serve the spaghetti squash and shrimp together. If desired, top with parmesan cheese and fresh parsley.
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:canola oil (2tablespoons)、medium white onion、garlic (2cloves)、curry powder (2tablespoons)、vegetable broth (2cups)、potato (3lb)、fresh scallion (½cup)、fresh parsley (2teaspoons)、pepper、chickpeas (15oz)、ghee (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Heat the oil in a large stockpot over medium-high heat and add the onion and garlic. Sauté until soft, about 2-3 minutes.
1: Add the curry powder mixture to the pot.
2: Add half of the vegetable broth and potatoes, and stir to combine.
3: Add the scallions and parsley. Season with pepper. Cook until the sauce is thick and the potatoes are almost tender, about 20 minutes.
4: Add the chickpeas and remaining vegetable broth, and mix.
5: Add the ghee and flour mixture to the pot and stir to incorporate.
6: Cook on medium-low heat until the potatoes and chickpeas are tender and the sauce thickens, about 20 minutes.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:yellow squash、red onion、red bell pepper、asparagus (½lb)、salmon fillets
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
1: In a small bowl, mix together the honey, soy sauce, ginger, salt, and pepper until combined. Set aside.
2: On a parchment-lined baking sheet, arrange the yellow squash, red onion, bell pepper, asparagus, and salmon fillets in rows in an even layer.
3: Drizzle oil on the yellow squash, red onion, bell pepper, and asparagus, and season with salt and pepper.
4: Pour the honey ginger sauce over the salmon fillets.
5: Bake for 15 minutes, until the salmon is cooked and the veggies have softened slightly.
6: Plate salmon with veggies on the side and serve.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:3-pound chicken、scotch bonnet or habanero peppers、garlic (4cloves)、fresh thyme (1tablespoon)、ground allspice (1tablespoon)、onions、light brown sugar (1tablespoon)、nutmeg (½tablespoon)、minced ginger (½tablespoon)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、lime juice (2tablespoons)、white vinegar (½cup)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Prepare the chicken by removing the backbone using a pair of kitchen shears or a sharp knife. Transfer the chicken to a baking sheet and and flatten it down to spread the chicken out as much as possible.
1: In a blender or food processor, combine the peppers, garlic, thyme, allspice, onions, brown sugar, nutmeg, ginger, olive oil, lime juice, vinegar, salt, and pepper. Blend until smooth.
2: Pour the marinade over the chicken. Cover with foil or plastic wrap and marinate in the fridge for at least 3 hours or overnight.
3: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
4: Remove the foil or plastic wrap and roast the chicken for 45-50 minutes, until cooked through. Rest for 10 minutes on a cutting board before carving and serving.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、large yellow onion、garlic (3cloves)、tomato paste (2tablespoons)、panko breadcrumbs (1cup)、whole milk (1cup)、ground beef (2lb)、large eggs、fresh parsley (½cup)、worcestershire sauce (1tablespoon)、dried thyme (½teaspoon)、kosher salt (1tablespoon)、freshly ground black pepper (1teaspoon)、ketchup (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Line a rimmed baking sheet with foil.
1: Heat the olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook, stirring often, until softened and golden brown, about 7 minutes. Add the garlic and cook, stirring constantly, until aromatic, about 1 minute. Add the tomato paste and cook, stirring often, until the tomato paste turns deep red in color, about 2 minutes. Remove the pan from the heat and let the onion mixture cool to room temperature.
2: In a large bowl, stir together the panko and milk. Add the ground beef, eggs, parsley, Worcestershire sauce, thyme, salt, pepper, and the onion mixture and use your hands to combine. Do not overmix!
3: Shape the beef mixture into a 10 x 5-inch loaf on the prepared baking sheet. Brush the top and sides with ketchup.
4: Bake the meatloaf until the top is browned and the internal temperature reaches 160°F (70°C), about 50 minutes.
5: Slice and serve.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:green beans (24oz)、water (¼cup)、kosher salt (¾teaspoon)、unsalted butter (4tablespoons)、Tasty McCormick® Savory Spice Blend (1 ½tablespoons)
instructions:
0: In a large pan over high heat, combine the green beans, water, and ¼ teaspoon salt. Cover and steam for 5–7 minutes, until the green beans are just barely tender.
1: Remove the lid and add the remaining ½ teaspoon salt, the butter, and Savory spice blend. Cook, tossing every 30 seconds, until the green beans are tender and charred in a few spots, 1–2 minutes.
2: Serve immediately.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、salt、pepper、garlic (4cloves)、greek oregano (1tablespoon)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、ricotta cheese (½cup)、frozen spinach (2cups)、feta cheese (1cup)、green onion (½cup)、eggs、fresh dill (2tablespoons)、phyllo dough (1package)、butter (1cup)、red onion (1cup)、kalamata olive (½cup)、tomato (1cup)
instructions:
0: Season the chicken breasts with the salt, pepper, garlic, greek oregano, and olive oil.
1: Place the chicken breasts in a large skillet on medium-high heat with a tablespoon of oil. Cook until the first side is a dark golden brown, about 5 minutes. Flip the chicken and cook the other side until equally brown, about 5 minutes. Turn the heat to low and cook the chicken until it’s cooked through about 10 more minutes. Set the chicken aside to cool and then slice it.
2: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
3: To a bowl, add the ricotta, chopped frozen spinach, feta cheese, chopped green onion, beaten eggs, dill, and pepper, and stir to combine.
4: Place the butter into a large shallow dish. Take about 5 sheets of the thin phyllo dough and dip it in the butter.
5: Place the buttered phyllo into a 9 inch (23 cm) springform pan. Make sure the dough complete covers the sides and hangs over the edges of the pan. Use as many sheets as needed to create a even layer all around.
6: Spread half of the feta spinach mixture on the bottom of the springform pan on top of the phyllo dough. Shingle one layer of the sliced cooked chicken, and spread the other half of the spinach feta mixture. Make sure each layer is tightly pressed.
7: Place the chopped tomatoes on the outer rim of the pie. Place a ring of chopped red onion, and then place chopped kalamata olives in the center.
8: Fold the phyllo dough from the edges of the pan to the center and cover the top of the pie with 3 more batches of buttered phyllo.
9: Cover the pie with aluminum foil and bake for 1 hour. Remove the aluminum foil cover and cook for about 20 more minutes, until the top is golden brown.
10: Let rest at room temperature for at least 30 minutes.
11: Remove the pie from the springform pan, slice, and serve.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:prime rib (8lb)、kosher salt、freshly ground black pepper
instructions:
0: On a cutting board, thoroughly blot the prime rib with paper towels to absorb any moisture.
1: Generously season the prime rib all over with salt and pepper.
2: Place the prime rib in dish with tall sides and set in the refrigerator uncovered to rest for at least 2-4 hours, or overnight.
3: Transfer the prime rib to a roasting rack set inside a roasting pan and let come to room temperature for 1 hour before roasting.
4: Preheat the oven to 450˚F (230˚C).
5: Roast the prime rib for 30 minutes.
6: Reduce the oven temperature to 325˚F (160˚C).
7: Continue roasting the rib for 11 minutes per pound, until the internal temperature of the roast reaches 120˚F-125˚F (45-50˚C), for medium rare.
8: Remove the rib from the oven, tent with foil, and let rest for 30 minutes.
9: Transfer the roast to a cutting board and carve.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cauliflower (1medium head)、mushroom (5oz)、olive oil (1 ½tablespoons)、medium yellow onion、garlic (2cloves)、ground cumin (2teaspoons)、smoked paprika (1 ½teaspoons)、chili powder (2tablespoons)、soy sauce (2tablespoons)、salt、pepper、rice、corn、black bean、avocado、pico de gallo、lime wedge、fresh cilantro
instructions:
0: Cut the cauliflower in half and break it into small florets.
1: Place the florets in a food processor and pulse until they break down to rice-size pieces. Remove from the processor and set aside.
2: Add the mushrooms to the food processor and pulse until broken down to rice-size pieces.
3: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic to the pan and cook for about 4 minutes, until fragrant and the onion is translucent.
4: Add the cauliflower, mushrooms, cumin, smoked paprika, chili powder, soy sauce, salt, and pepper and stir. Cook for about 10 minutes, until the cauliflower and mushroom mixture is tender and the water released from the mushrooms has evaporated.
5: Add the rice to a bowl and top with cauliflower “meat” and your favorite toppings. Serve with a lime wedge and garnish with cilantro.
6: If you have leftovers, the cauliflower “meat” will keep refrigerated in an airtight container for about 2 days.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:spaghetti squash、olive oil (2tablespoons)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400ºF (200ºC).
1: With a sharp knife, slice the squash in half. If the squash is too tough, puncture in several places forming a dotted line around the squash. Microwave for 3-5 minutes to soften. Allow to cool before cutting in half.
2: Scoop out the seeds, brush with oil, and sprinkle with salt, and pepper. Bake for 40-45 minutes, or until a fork can easily pierce the skin.
3: Meanwhile, in a blender combine basil, olive oil, vegetarian Parmesan cheese, garlic, pine nuts, and salt. Set aside.
4: In a pan add the olive oil and garlic over medium-high heat, sautè 30 seconds-1 minute, add in mushrooms and cook for 3 minutes. Add asparagus and stir until cooked.
5: Remove squash from the oven, with a fork pull at the edges to produce that stringy “spaghetti” quality until you’ve completed both of them.
6: In the mushroom and asparagus pan combine “spaghetti” and pesto and mix. Return to the squash and serve with or without plates. Garnish with parmesan.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:tempeh (16oz)、cornstarch (¼cup)、paprika (1teaspoon)、garlic (4cloves)、ginger (4teaspoons)、sesame oil (2tablespoons)、rice wine (2tablespoons)、soy sauce (4tablespoons)、oil (¼cup)、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、tomato paste (1tablespoon)、vegetable broth (¼cup)、rice vinegar (1tablespoon)、honey (1tablespoon)、sesame seed
instructions:
0: Chop the tempeh into chicken nugget-sized pieces and transfer to a mixing bowl.
1: Add the cornstarch, paprika, ginger, garlic, sesame oil, rice wine, and soy sauce to the bowl. Mix until incorporated. Cover and chill in fridge for 1 hour minimum.
2: Add oil to a pan on medium-high heat and pan-fry tempeh until browned on both sides. Remove from pan.
3: In the same pan, add in oil and sesame oil on medium-high heat.
4: Add the garlic, ginger, and red pepper flakes, and cook until golden brown and aromatic, about 1 minute.
5: Add the tomato paste and vegetable broth, and stir until incorporated.
6: Add the soy sauce, rice vinegar, and honey, and stir until all are incorporated.
7: Add the cornstarch slurry (mix the cornstarch with the water in a small bowl until paste forms) into sauce mixture and stir until sauce thickens.
8: Return the tempeh to the pan and allow to incorporate with the sauce. Top with sesame seeds (optional).
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:dijon mustard (3tablespoons)、fresh thyme (2teaspoons)、fresh rosemary (2teaspoons)、kosher salt (½teaspoon)、ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、pork tenderloin (1 ½lb)、olive oil (3tablespoons)、broccolini (2bunches)、medium carrots、honey (2tablespoons)、lemon、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190˚C).
1: In a small bowl, stir together the mustard, thyme, rosemary, salt, and pepper.
2: Dry the pork tenderloin thoroughly with paper towels, then season with salt and pepper.
3: Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a square pan over medium-high heat. Add the tenderloin and cook, rotating 90˚ every 3-4 minutes, until golden brown all over (the tenderloin will not be cooked through at this point), about 12 minutes total. Remove the pan from the heat and use tongs to transfer the tenderloin to a cutting board.
4: Brush the mustard mixture evenly over the top and sides of the tenderloin.
5: Add the broccolini to the pan, and toss with the oil until coated evenly. Push the broccolini to the sides of the pan, just enough to make room for the tenderloin, then return the pork to the pan.
6: Transfer the pan to the oven and roast, tossing the broccolini halfway through cooking, until an instant-read thermometer inserted in the thickest part of the pork reads 160°F (70˚C) and the broccolini is tender, 23-25 minutes.
7: While the pork cooks, heat the remaining tablespoon of olive oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Add the carrots, season with salt and pepper, and cook, tossing, until barely tender, about 6 minutes. 
8: Drizzle with the honey and continue cooking, tossing often, until the honey is reduced to a thick glaze and the carrots are tender, 2 to 4 minutes more. Remove the skillet from the heat.
9: Transfer the square pan to a rack and let the pork and broccolini rest for 10 minutes. Place the tenderloin on a cutting board and cut into ½-inch (1-cm) thick slices.
10: Divide the pork and vegetables among 4 serving plates. Serve each with a lemon wedge and sprinkle with parsley.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:jumbo pasta shell (12shells)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、white onion (½cup)、green chile (¼cup)、chicken (1cup)、cumin (½teaspoon)、garlic (½tablespoon)、pepper、salt、ricotta cheese (1cup)、queso fresco (½cup)、monterey jack cheese (½cup)、fresh scallions (1tablespoon)、green enchilada sauce (10oz)
instructions:
0: Bring water to a boil. Cook the pasta shells until al dente. Drain, rinse with cold water, and set aside to cool.
1: Pour the oil in a pan, then add the onions and cook on medium heat until softened. Add the green chiles, chicken, and spices and stir to combine. Cook on low heat for an additional 3-4 minutes.
2: Place chicken mixture in a bowl. Add ricotta, queso fresco, and monterey jack and stir until all ingredients are well combined.
3: Stuff each shell with a large spoonful of the mixture.
4: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
5: Coat the bottom of a baking dish with a thin layer of green enchilada sauce. Place the pasta shells in the dish in a single layer.
6: Cover with the rest of the enchilada sauce and some additional queso fresco and monterey jack.
7: Bake for 30 minutes (or until the cheese has melted and the sauce begins to bubble around the edges). Top with scallions.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bread flour (3cups)、sugar (1teaspoon)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、instant yeast (2teaspoons)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、water (1cup)、crushed tomato (1can)、mozzarella cheese (1ball)、fresh basil leaves、flaky sea salt
instructions:
0: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the dough hook, combine the flour, sugar, salt, instant yeast. Start mixing on low speed. Stream in the olive oil and water and mix for 2 minutes, until the flour is incorporated.
1: Increase speed to medium, and mix for 6–8 minutes more, until the dough is smooth and elastic.
2: Lightly grease a large bowl with olive oil. Transfer the dough to the bowl, cover with a kitchen towel, and let rest for 1½ hours.
3: Turn the risen dough onto a clean surface and shape into a ball, pulling the edges round and tight across the surface of the dough ball. Return to the bowl, cover, and let rest for another 30 minutes.
4: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
5: Drizzle the surface with oil and turn out the dough. Divide the dough into 2 equal portions. Liberally grease a baking sheet with olive oil. Place a portion of dough on the pan and stretch to fit the baking sheet. Repeat with the remaining portion of dough, or reserve for a later use.
6: Top the dough with the crushed tomatoes and mozzarella.
7: Bake the pizza for 15–20 minutes, until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8: Top the pizza with flaky salt and basil.
9: Use scissors to cut, then serve.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:mussels (2lb)、unsalted butter (3tablespoons)、yellow onion、garlic (3cloves)、red pepper flakes (1teaspoon)、kosher salt、white wine (1cup)、fresh parsley (1bunch)、bread
instructions:
0: To clean mussels, scrub them with a stiff brush under cold running water to remove any grit. Discard any mussels with cracked or broken shells, or that do not close.
1: In a large lidded pot over medium-high heat, stir butter until melted. Add the onion and cook, stirring frequently, until it has softened and started to brown, 6-8 minutes.
2: Add the garlic and cook for 30 seconds, stirring constantly.
3: Add the red pepper flakes and season with salt. Stir to combine.
4: Add the mussels and stir until completely coated. Add the white wine and stir.
5: Put the lid on the pot and cook until the mussels have opened, 3-5 minutes. Discard any shells that don’t open after 5 minutes.
6: Add the parsley and stir. Serve with bread.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:soy sauce (½cup)、rice vinegar (2tablespoons)、sesame oil (2tablespoons)、red pepper powder (2tablespoons)、garlic (8cloves)、grated ginger (1tablespoon)、onion (1cup)、baby back ribs (3lb)
instructions:
0: Combine marinade ingredients in a bowl.
1: Pour marinade over ribs and let them marinate for at least four hours.
2: After marinating, place ribs on baking dish. Reserve the marinade for later.
3: Bake ribs at 325°F (160°C) for two and a half to three hours.
4: Pour the leftover marinade into a saucepan, add the honey, and bring to a boil to form a glaze. Set aside.
5: After two and half to three hours, remove the ribs from the oven. Pour the glaze over the ribs and broil for 5 to 10 minutes.
6: Cut up the ribs, sprinkle sesame seeds over, and garnish with scallions.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:Italian sausage (1lb)、yellow onion、bell pepper (1 ½cups)、garlic (3cloves)、marinara sauce (3cups)、lasagna noodles、pepperoni (6oz)、fresh basil leaf (1cup)、mozzarella cheese (3cups)、ricotta cheese (3cups)
instructions:
0: Over medium-high heat, cook Italian sausage until browned, then remove from pan and set aside.
1: In the same pan, cook onion until translucent, then add bell peppers and garlic. Cook until the veggies are soft, about 10 minutes. Set aside.
2: Preheat oven to 375ºF (190ºC).
3: In a 9 x13-inch (23cm x 33cm) baking dish, begin to assemble the lasagna by spreading a thin layer of sauce on the bottom of the pan.
4: Then, layer ingredients in the following order: noodles, ricotta, sausage, veggies, mozzarella, sauce, noodles, ricotta, pepperoni, basil, mozzarella, sauce, noodles, marinara, mozzarella, veggies, sausage, and pepperoni.
5: Place pan on a sheet tray and bake for 45-55 minutes, or until bubbling and starting to brown around the edges.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsalted butter (4tablespoons)、extra virgin olive oil (1cup)、large carrots、leek、large yellow onion、red bell pepper、small fennel bulb、green bell pepper、celeries、garlic (4cloves)、garlic (3cloves)、salt、freshly cracked pepper、tomato paste (6oz)、dried basil (1tablespoon)、dried oregano (1tablespoon)、dried thyme (1tablespoon)、cayenne (1teaspoon)、dry white wine (2cups)、fish stock (4cups)、crushed italian tomato (15oz)、bay leaves、sea scallop (½lb)、shrimp (½lb)、squid (½lb)、halibut fillet (½lb)、manila clam (½lb)、mussel (½lb)、sourdough bread、fresh parsley (½bunch)
instructions:
0: In a large pot over medium heat, melt together 2 tablespoons of butter and 2 tablespoons of olive oil. Add the carrot, leek, onion, red bell pepper, fennel, green bell pepper, celery, and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Stir and cook until the vegetables are softened, about 15 minutes.
1: Scoop half of the matignon (sautéed minced vegetables) from the pan and set aside. Stir the tomato paste, basil, oregano, thyme, and cayenne into the remaining vegetables and cook until the tomato paste starts to brown, about 10 minutes.
2: Next, add half of the white wine to deglaze the pan, stirring to loosen any bits stuck to the bottom of the pot.
3: Add the fish stock, crushed tomatoes, and bay leaves. Stir together, bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes.
4: In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium-high heat. Season all of the seafood with salt and pepper.
5: Add the scallops to the pan and sear the first side until golden brown, 3 minutes. Flip and sear on the other side for another 3 minutes. Remove from the pan and set aside. Wipe out the pan if needed.
6: Add more olive oil as needed, then add the shrimp to the pan and cook for 3 minutes on one side. Flip  and cook on the other side for 3 minutes more. Set aside.
7: Add more olive oil and the squid to the hot pan and sauté until cooked, 5 minutes.
8: Add more olive oil and the halibut to the hot pan, along with the crushed garlic and remaining 2 tablespoons of butter. Sear the halibut on one side, then flip and cook on the other side for 3 minutes. Baste the fish with the melted garlic butter as the second side cooks. Remove from the pan and set aside.
9: Add the clams and mussels to the pan, pour in the remaining cup of white white, then cover the pot and steam for 5 minutes, until the shellfish pop open. Remove the pan from the heat.
10: Transfer all of the cooked seafood, along with the leftover shellfish steaming liquid and reserved matignon, to the simmering stew; or plate the seafood and reserved matignon artfully in wide bowls and pour the hot stew over the top.
11: Serve with grilled sourdough bread and garnish with parsley.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:hot dogs、thin slices of cheddar cheese、all-purpose flour (1cup)、yellow cornmeal (1cup)、sugar (¼cup)、baking powder (4teaspoons)、salt (¼teaspoon)、black pepper (⅛teaspoon)、milk (1cup)、egg、jalapeño、peanut or vegetable oil (1qt)、mustard
instructions:
0: Place a hot dog on a slice of cheese, then roll the cheese slice around it. Push a wooden skewer through the cheese-wrapped hot dog, then place seam side down on a baking sheet. Repeat with the remaining hot dogs. Freeze for 20 minutes.
1: In a large bowl, add the dry ingredients and stir to combine. Once fully combined, mix in the milk, egg, and jalapeño. Stir until the batter is smooth and without lumps. You may need to add 1 or 2 tablespoon of flour; the batter should be thick enough to cling to the hot dog. Pour it into a tall glass for easier dipping.
2: Heat the oil in a large pot until it reaches 350°F (180°C).
3: Holding the tip of the skewer, take a frozen hot dog and dip it fully into the batter, lifting it out, then rotating it to let excess batter drip off. Using tongs, carefully place the battered dog into the hot oil. Hold it fully submerged for 30-60 seconds until a crust forms, then rotate it so that it fries evenly. Cook for 3-5 minutes, or until golden brown. Repeat with the remaining hot dogs. Serve with mustard for dipping.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:eggplant、marinara sauce (1cup)、tomato、fresh basil、mozzarella cheese、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、garlic (2cloves)、olive oil、panko breadcrumbs (¼cup)、grated parmesan cheese (2tablespoons)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
1: Cut eggplant lengthwise, keeping it connected at the stem.
2: In a baking dish, place marinara sauce and spread to cover the bottom.
3: Place the eggplant directly on the sauce.
4: Slice the tomato and mozzarella into thin slices. Alternate tomatoes, basil, and cheese in each eggplant slice.
5: Sprinkle salt, pepper, garlic, and olive oil, and cover with foil and bake for 50 minutes until eggplant is tender.
6: In a small bowl, combine panko, cheese, salt, and pepper.
7: Place the panko mixture on top of the eggplant and bake uncovered for another 5 minutes. Or until the bread crumbs are golden brown.
8: Cut into your desired size pieces.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、ground beef (1lb)、garlic (2cloves)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (¼teaspoon)、crushed tomato (1can)、rigatoni (1lb)、parmesan cheese (1cup)、mozarella (1cup)
instructions:
0: Boil the rigatoni in salted boiling water until just underdone or al dente.
1: Drain the pasta and place in a bowl with a little olive oil so the pasta doesn't stick together. Set aside.
2: Preheat oven to 400°F/200°C.
3: In a pan, heat the olive oil and add the ground beef.
4: Break up and stir the beef until brown.
5: Add in the garlic, salt, and pepper. Stir until combined.
6: Add in the crushed tomatoes and simmer until thickened, about 20 minutes.
7: Sprinkle the prepared pasta with the parmesan cheese and mix.
8: In a springform pan, place the rigatoni noodles standing up to fill the pan.
9: Pour the sauce over the noodles and bake at 400°F/200°C for 15 minutes.
10: Sprinkle the pie with the mozzarella cheese and bake for another 15 minutes at the same temperature.
11: Slice and serve!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:onion (2cups)、celery (2cups)、red pepper (2cups)、carrot (2cups)、fire-roasted tomato (15oz)、red kidney bean (15oz)、chickpeas (15oz)、black beans (15oz)、corn (15oz)、taco seasoning (1package)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Saute onions, celery, red peppers, and carrots in a pan. Salt and pepper to taste.
1: Mix in package of taco seasoning.
2: Add fire-roasted tomatoes, kidney beans, chickpeas, black beans, and corn.
3: Simmer for 15 minutes.
4: Preheat oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
5: Prepare boxed cornbread mix according to box instructions, then fold in the cheese.
6: Spread cheesy cornbread batter over chili.
7: Bake at 375˚F (190˚C) for 20 minutes.
8: Let cool for a few minutes, then garnish with sour cream and cilantro
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:tofu (28oz)、lemon juice (2tablespoons)、nutritional yeast (3tablespoons)、fresh basil (¼cup)、garlic (3cloves)、pepper (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375º F (190º C).
1: In a food processor combine tofu, lemon juice, nutritional yeast, basil, garlic, salt, and pepper, blend until smooth, then set aside and rinse out food processor.
2: In the food processor combine walnuts, garlic, oil, liquid smoke, soy sauce, smoked paprika, oregano, rosemary, and pepper, blend until well mixed, then set aside and rinse out food processor.
3: In the food processor chop up mushrooms so that they are in small chunks.
4: In a large pan cook mushrooms so that liquid is released and evaporated, about 6-8 minutes. Clear out a circle in the middle, add onion and oil, sautè onion until translucent, add walnut mixture and mix well.
5: In a large sauce pan cook lasagna noodles for half of time required.
6: In a 9x9 inch (23x23 cm)  lasagna pan add 2 cups (520 g) of red sauce to cover the bottom, then layer 4 half-cooked lasagna noodles, then spread ricotta mixture over top, followed by “meat” mixture, and then more red sauce. Repeat until finished. Cover with Aluminum foil.
7: Bake in oven for 25 minutes, remove aluminum foil and bake for 5 more minutes.
8: Allow to cool about 10-15 minutes then cut into ninths, serve.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chickpeas (15oz)、garlic (3cloves)、olive oil (¼cup)、lemon、tahini sauce (2tablespoons)、ground cumin (1teaspoon)、salt
instructions:
0: Combine chickpeas, garlic, lemon juice, tahini, cumin, and salt in a blender and blend until smooth.
1: Slice eggplants into four 1-inch (2 ½ cm) slices. Sprinkle eggplant slices with salt and let sit for 20-30 minutes, then pat dry.
2: In a small bowl, stir together oil, paprika, garlic powder, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper.
3: Brush each side of the eggplant slices with the oil and spice mixture.
4: Heat a pan or grill on medium-high heat and cook each eggplant slice for 3-4 minutes per side.
5: Build your burger with the hummus sandwiched between two eggplant slices.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:all purpose flour (3tablespoons)、sweet paprika (2 ½teaspoons)、cayenne (½teaspoon)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、shrimp (1 ½lb)、canola oil (¼cup)、unsalted butter (12tablespoons)、garlic (24cloves)、lemon、fresh parsley (¼cup)
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, combine the flour, paprika, cayenne, and salt. Add the shrimp to the bowl and toss to coat evenly with the spices.
1: Add the canola oil and 8 tablespoons of butter to a 12-inch (30 cm) cast-iron or heavy-bottomed skillet over medium heat. When the butter begins to foam, add 10–12 shrimp to the pan and cook for 3–4 minutes on one side. Flip, season lightly with salt, and cook for 2–3 minutes on the other side, until the shells are crispy and the shrimp is pink and opaque. Remove from pan and set on a serving dish. Add 1–2 more tablespoons of butter to the pan and repeat with remaining shrimp.
2: Once the shrimp are cooked, add the remaining 4 tablespoons of butter and the garlic to the pan and sauté briefly, about 1 minute, until fragrant but still somewhat pungent. Remove the pan from the heat.
3: Squeeze the lemon juice all over the shrimp.
4: Pour the garlic butter over the shrimp, then garnish with parsley. Serve immediately.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、onion (1cup)、garlic (2cloves)、ground turkey (1lb)、salt (½teaspoon)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、zucchini、diced tomato (1cup)、orange bell peppers、rice (1 ½cups)
instructions:
0: In a large skillet, heat the oil and cook onions and garlic for 3 minutes, or until they start to soften. Add the ground turkey to the pan, followed by salt, pepper, and oregano. Stir and cook for 3-4 minutes.
1: Then add zucchini and diced tomatoes. Cook until zucchini has begun to soften and remove from heat.
2: Cut the top off of the bell pepper low enough that the stem remains attached and remove the seeds. Save the top!
3: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
4: Carefully, carve out your desired jack-o’-lantern face using a steak knife or paring knife. Repeat for the rest of the bell peppers.
5: Place carved bell peppers in a baking dish and spoon in a layer of cooked rice in the bottom followed by the turkey mixture, and top with mozzarella cheese. Put the top of the bell pepper back on top.
6: Bake for 35 minutes or until peppers are tender and the cheese has melted.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bolognese sauce (18oz)、water (1cup)、fresh egg pasta (1lb)、grated cheddar cheese (1.75oz)、fresh basil (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 200°C/400°F/Gas Mark 6.
1: Mix all of the meatball ingredients together into a large bowl, then form into 14 golfball-sized balls.
2: Combine the full jar of sauce and half a jar of water together in a large bowl.
3: Stir in the spaghetti until it’s fully coated in the sauce.
4: Spread the coated spaghetti into a casserole dish then top with the meatballs.
5: Cover and bake in the centre of the oven for 18-20 minutes.
6: Sprinkle over the cheese and grill/broil for a further 5-7 minutes uncovered, until the cheese is melted and stringy and the top of the meatballs are brown.
7: Sprinkle over the basil and serve immediately.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (¼cup)、lemon juice (2tablespoons)、dried oregano (1tablespoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、zucchinis、cremini mushroom (3cups)、medium red onions、red bell peppers、yellow bell peppers
instructions:
0: Preheat grill to medium heat.
1: Combine the oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper, stirring until mixed.
2: Slide a zucchini slice down the skewer, followed by pieces of mushroom, red onion, and peppers, until there is a 1-inch gap at the top of the skewer. Brush each skewer liberally with the oil mixture.
3: Repeat with the remaining skewers and vegetables.
4: Grill the skewers for 12-18 minutes with the lid closed, flipping halfway.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:onions、garlic cloves (2cloves)、chicken breasts、tomatoes、korma paste (2tablespoons)、basmati rice (1cup)、chicken stock cube、water (2 ¼cups)、raisin (½cup)、pine nuts (⅜cup)、spinach (¼cup)、yogurt、coriander (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Fry sliced onions and garlic in oil until softened.
1: Add sliced chicken breasts and fry until no longer pink.
2: Add tomatoes, fry for a couple minutes.
3: Add korma pasta, stir in and cook for 30 seconds.
4: Add the rice and cook for 30 more seconds.
5: Add stock cube, raisins and 500ml (2 ¼ cups) water.
6: Cover with foil and cook for 15 minutes. Check chicken, if dry 5 minutes in and add more water if necessary.
7: Uncover, stir in pine nuts and spinach until wilted.
8: Serve with yogurt and coriander.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pizza dough (1tube)、pizza sauce (1cup)、mozzarella cheese (1 ½cups)、desired pizza topping
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
1: Cut pizza dough into 12 square pieces and place in a greased muffin tin.
2: Place a spoonful of pizza sauce and some cheese into the bottom of each cup.
3: Fill with your favorite pizza toppings and combinations!
4: Bake for 20-25 minutes or until fully baked. If the tops are getting too brown too quickly, cover the pan with foil and put back into the oven for the remainder of the cooking time.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:fresh spinach (3cups)、fresh basil (1cup)、pine nuts (¾cup)、parmesan cheese (¼cup)、garlic (3cloves)、salt、lemon juice (¼cup)、olive oil (½cup)、whole wheat pasta (1box)、cherry tomato (2cups)、mozzarella cheese (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: In a blender or food processor, add the spinach, basil, pine nuts, parmesan, garlic, salt, lemon juice, and olive oil.
2: Blend until you reach a creamy consistency. Set aside.
3: Add the pasta to a large bowl then add the tomatoes. Pour the pesto onto the pasta and mix well to combine.
4: Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and top with mozzarella.
5: Cover with foil and bake for 10-15 minutes.
6: Carefully remove and allow to cool for 5 minutes.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pork shoulder (3lb)、onion、garlic (3cloves)、paprika (2teaspoons)、salt (1tablespoon)、tomato sauce (3cups)、light brown sugar (1cup)、apple cider vinegar (¾cup)
instructions:
0: Put all of your ingredients in a crock pot.
1: Cook on low for 8 hours or high for 4 hours, until fork-tender.
2: Shred with two forks and combine with the sauce on the bottom of the pot.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cauliflower (1large head)、olive oil (4tablespoons)、lemon juice (2tablespoons)、dried basil (1teaspoon)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、fresh thyme (1teaspoon)、dried rosemary (1teaspoon)、onion powder (1teaspoon)、garlic (2cloves)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: Remove the green leaves from the cauliflower stem with a knife.
2: Place the cauliflower core-down on a cutting board and trim 2 sides so they become flat.
3: Cut the cauliflower in half and then cut each half in two to get 4 “steaks”.
4: Rinse and dry the cauliflower steaks.
5: In a small bowl, combine the olive oil, lemon juice, basil, oregano, thyme, rosemary, onion, and garlic, plus salt and pepper to taste. Mix well.
6: Place the cauliflower steaks on the baking sheet and brush generously with the oil mixture.
7: Bake for about 25 minutes, flipping halfway, until tender.
8: Serve as desired, such as on a sandwich with pesto and red pepper, or with barbecue sauce and roasted potatoes, or with vegan mushroom gravy and lentils.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bone-in lamb roast with fat cap (8lb)、garlic (12cloves)、olive oil (½cup)、whole grain mustard (⅓cup)、lemon、fresh rosemary (10sprigs)、fresh thyme (10sprigs)、sea salt (1 ½tablespoons)、freshly ground black pepper (1tablespoon)、dry white wine (¾cup)、yukon gold potato (2 ½lb)、flaky sea salt
instructions:
0: 2-3 hours before roasting, prepare the lamb. Use a small, sharp knife to make 15 to 20 incisions, each about 2 inches (5 cm) deep, through the fat cap on top of the meat. Thinly slice 3 cloves of garlic and use your fingers to press the slices into the incisions.
1: In a blender, combine the remaining 9 garlic cloves, the olive oil, mustard, lemon juice, rosemary leaves, thyme leaves, salt, and pepper. Blend until a paste forms.
2: Spread the paste evenly all over the lamb. Let marinate at room temperature for 2 to 3 hours.
3: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
4: Place the lamb on a roasting rack in a roasting pan and pour the wine into the bottom of the pan. Roast for 15 minutes.
5: Remove the pan from the oven and reduce the heat to 325°F (160°C).
6: Arrange the potatoes, cut side down, in the roasting pan and place the lamb on the rack on top. Roast for 2 hours, tossing the potatoes and basting the lamb with the roasting liquid halfway through.
7: Transfer the potatoes to a platter, baste the lamb again with the remaining pan juices, and return the lamb to the oven. Continue to roast, basting often, until an instant-read thermometer inserted into thickest part of the leg reaches 130°F (for medium-rare), 45 minutes to 2 hours more, depending on thickness. (As a general rule, the lamb should roast 20 minutes per pound for medium-rare).
8: Transfer the lamb to a platter and set aside to rest for 20 minutes. While the lamb rests, return the potatoes to the roasting pan, season with flaky salt, and warm in the oven until just heated through, about 20 minutes. Return the potatoes to the serving platter.
9: Carve the lamb into ½-inch (1 cm) thick slices and arrange on the platter with the potatoes, garnished with rosemary and thyme sprigs. Serve with whole grain mustard alongside.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breast (1lb)、sesame oil (1tablespoon)、zucchini、red pepper、peanuts (30g)、dried chili pods、garlic cloves、green onion (1bunch)、ginger (2tablespoons)、soy sauce (1tablespoon)、sugar (1tablespoon)、rice vinegar (1teaspoon)、water (2tablespoons)、cornstarch (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, combine chicken with all the marinade ingredients in a bowl. Let marinate for at least 10 minutes.
1: In an oiled pan, cook chicken on medium-high heat until cooked through on both sides. Remove from pan.
2: Add sesame oil, zucchini, and red pepper, and sauté in pan for 3 minutes.
3: Add peanuts and sauté for another 3 minutes.
4: Add dried chilies, garlic, ginger, and green onion, and sauté until vegetables are tender.
5: Add chicken, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sugar, and cornstarch slurry, and sauté until well mixed.
6: Garnish with more green onion and serve with rice.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:warm water (1cup)、sugar (1tablespoon)、active dry yeast (1package)、flour (3cups)、salt (1teaspoon)、shredded mozzarella cheese (3cups)、olive oil、salt、pepper、string cheese、tomato sauce、topping of your choice
instructions:
0: To a bowl or stand mixer, add the warm water, sugar, and yeast. Let the yeast proof for 5-15 minutes in a warm place until it is bubbling.
1: Preheat oven to 450˚F (230˚C).
2: Add in the flour and salt. Mix in the bowl until well combined and the dough comes together into a ball.
3: Dump the dough onto a floured surface and knead briefly to smooth out the dough and develop gluten. Form the dough into a ball and place into a new, large greased bowl. Cover with a towel and let rise for one hour or until doubled in size.
4: Remove the dough from the bowl, and cut 2-three ounce (85g) portions of the dough. Roll each portion out to a size slightly larger than a 9x13-inch (23x33 cm) baking sheet.
5: Place the first rolled dough rectangle onto the greased baking sheet. Sprinkle a thick layer of mozzarella cheese onto the dough, then place the second sheet of dough on top to cover the cheese.
6: Place string cheese into the edges of the dough, and fold the edges over the cheese, crimping the edges.
7: Brush the dough with olive oil, salt, and pepper to taste.
8: Bake for 20 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted inside.
9: Quickly top the stuffed bottom crust with sauce and any extra toppings or cheese you would like.
10: Bake until the toppings are heated through, and the cheese has started to brown 10-15 minutes.
11: Transfer the pizza to a cutting board, slice, and serve.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken thighs (2lb)、bacon (½lb)、asparagus (1lb)、red onion、garlic (4cloves)、chicken broth (6cups)、milk (1cup)、fusilli pasta (1lb)、goat cheese (8oz)、sun-dried tomato (½cup)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: In a large pot on medium-high heat, add bacon. Cook until the fat has rendered and the bacon is crispy. Remove bacon from pot and set aside. Leave bacon fat in pan.
1: Season chicken with salt and pepper and place skin-side down in the pot. Cook until the chicken gets a dark golden crispy skin. Flip and cook on the other side until the chicken is cooked through. Remove from pot and set aside.
2: Add the red onion, asparagus, and garlic to the pot and until the asparagus is almost tender. Remove from pot.
3: Add the pasta and chicken broth to the pot.
4: Bring to a boil, and cook for 9-12 minutes or until the pasta is al dente. Stir occasionally.
5: When the pasta is almost tender. Lower the heat and add in the milk, goat cheese, cooked vegetables, cooked bacon, and sun-dried tomatoes. Stir to incorporate.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium carrots、large white onion、celeries、garlic (3cloves)、raw walnut (1cup)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、dried basil (1teaspoon)、dried oregano (2teaspoons)、dried parsley (1teaspoon)、kosher salt、tomato paste (2tablespoons)、low sodium vegetable broth (2 ¾cups)、green lentil (1cup)、diced tomato (1can)、red wine (½cup)、noodle、medium zucchinis、olive oil (2tablespoons)、kosher salt、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、garlic (3cloves)、medium zucchinis、olive oil (2tablespoons)、kosher salt、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、garlic (3cloves)
instructions:
0: In a food processor, combine the carrots, onion, celery, and garlic. Pulse until finely chopped, but not mushy. Transfer the vegetables to a bowl.
1: Add the walnuts to the food processor and pulse until they reach the consistency of ground meat.
2: Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium-high heat. Add the vegetable mixture, basil, oregano, parsley, and salt. Cook for 25 minutes, stirring frequently, until caramelized and any excess moisture has evaporated. Add the tomato paste, stir to combine, and cook for 5 minutes.
3: Add the vegetable stock, lentils, ground walnuts, and tomatoes and season with salt. Reduce the heat to medium, cover, and simmer for 35 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the lentils are cooked through and walnuts have softened. Remove the lid and cook off any remaining liquid, stirring frequently, about 5 minutes.
4: Add the wine, stir, and reduce until there is no liquid at the bottom of the pot, about 10 minutes. Season with more salt to taste.
5: Trim the ends of the zucchini, then cut into noodles using a spiralizer or julienne peeler.
6: Add 2 tablespoons of olive oil, a pinch of salt, the red pepper flakes, and garlic to a large pan. Turn the heat to medium and cook for 2-3 minutes, until the garlic is fragrant.
7: Work in batches, add about 2-3 cups of zucchini noodles at a time to the pan. Season lightly with salt and cook for 45-60 seconds, tossing continuously with tongs, until warmed through. 9. Add more olive oil, 1 tablespoon at a time, if the pan looks dry.
8: Serve the zucchini noodles with the  Bolognese.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:whole wheat pasta (4cups)、broccoli floret (2cups)、yellow squash (2cups)、cherry tomato (2cups)、pesto (½cup)、shredded mozzarella cheese (1cup)、fresh basil
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
1: Combine pasta, broccoli, yellow squash, cherry tomatoes, and pesto in freezer and oven safe baking tray.
2: Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top (optional).
3: If freezing, cover baking tray with heavy duty foil or thick plastic wrap and store in the freezer for up to 3 months. When ready to enjoy, remove from freezer and let thaw.
4: Bake uncovered for 10-15 minutes.
5: Top with fresh basil and serve.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray、whole chicken、kosher salt (3teaspoons)、Tasty Hearty Spice Blend (1package)、unsalted butter (1stick)、medium white potatoes、carrots、pepper (1teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C). Grease a baking sheet with nonstick spray.
1: On a cutting board, pat the chicken dry with paper towels, including the cavity, then rub with 2 teaspoons of salt.
2: In a small bowl, combine the hearty spice blend and the softened butter and mix well. Rub the butter mixture all over the chicken, including under the skin.
3: Spread the potatoes and carrots on the prepared baking sheet and toss with remaining teaspoon of salt and pepper. Place the chicken, breast side up, on top of the vegetables.
4: Roast the chicken for 1 hour, or until the internal temperature of the thickest part of the chicken reaches 165°F (75°C). If the skin starts to brown too quickly, tent with foil or reduce the oven temperature to 375°F (190°C).
5: Let the chicken rest for 20 minutes before carving. Serve with the potatoes and carrots on the side.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ribeye steak (2 ½lb)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、olive oil (1tablespoon)、unsalted butter (1 ½tablespoons)、small shallot、capers in brine (1 ½tablespoons)、dry white wine (¼cup)、dijon mustard (2tablespoons)、heavy cream (2tablespoons)、thinly sliced chive、potato、side salad
instructions:
0: Pat the steaks dry with a paper towel. Season generously on both sides with the salt and black pepper.
1: Add the olive oil and 1 tablespoon of butter to a nonstick or stainless steel pan over medium-high heat. Sear the steaks, one at a time, until a golden brown crust forms, about 5 minutes per side. If the pan gets too dry, add a bit more olive oil. Transfer the seared steaks to a cutting board to rest.
2: Add the shallots, capers, and remaining ½ tablespoon of butter to the pan. Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the capers crisp slightly.
3: Deglaze the pan with the wine. Cook until reduced by half, about 30-60 seconds. Add the mustard and cream and adjust seasoning to taste.
4: Slice the steak into ¼-inch (6 mm) pieces and transfer to serving plates. Pour the sauce over the steak and garnish with sliced chives. Serve with roasted potatoes and a side salad.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:wheat flour (½cup)、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (¼teaspoon)、large eggs、whole wheat bread crumb (1 ½cups)、paprika (½teaspoon)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、cumin (½teaspoon)、avocados、plain yogurt (¾cup)、salt (¾teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、fresh garlic (3cloves)、lime、green cabbage (½cup)、red cabbage (½cup)、shredded carrot (½cup)、corn tortilla (1pack)
instructions:
0: Add the flour, salt, and pepper to a bowl and whisk to combine.
1: In a separate bowl, crack the eggs and whisk.
2: In a third bowl, add the bread crumbs, garlic powder, cumin, and paprika, and whisk to combine.
3: Halve the avocados, cutting from the stem to the base.
4: Preheat an oven to 350°F (180°C)
5: Remove and discard the pits. Cut each half into ½ inch (1 ¼ cm) wide slices then remove and discard the skin.
6: Working with one avocado slice at a time, dip in the flour mixture, then egg, and finally bread crumbs, making sure each are fully coated.
7: Place the avocado slices 1-inch (2 ½ cm) apart on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
8: Transfer the baking sheet to the oven and bake for 10 minutes. Flip the avocados and continue baking until golden brown, 10 to 15 more minutes.
9: In a medium bowl, mix together the yogurt, salt, pepper, garlic, and lime juice. Cover and refrigerate until you’re ready to serve.
10: Add the red and green cabbage and the carrots to a large bowl, then stir in half of the yogurt sauce until well combined.
11: Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the avocado slices cool 2 to 3 minutes before serving.
12: Place three avocado slices on a single tortilla and top with slaw and toppings of your choice.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:soy sauce (2tablespoons)、rice wine (2tablespoons)、sesame oil (1tablespoon)、ground five spice (2teaspoons)、salt (1tablespoon)、garlic (5cloves)、fresh ginger (1piece)、bean curd (2tablespoons)、bean curd liquid (¼cup)、hoisin sauce (¼cup)、honey (½cup)、boneless pork shoulder (2lb)、white rice (1cup)、large bok choys
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, combine the soy sauce, Shaoxing, sesame oil, five spice, salt, garlic, ginger, bean curd, bean curd liquid, hoisin, and honey.
1: Place the pork into the marinate, turn to coat completely, and cover with cling wrap.
2: Marinate for at least 3 hours, or preferably overnight.
3: Preheat the oven to 300°F (150°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and set a wire rack on top.
4: Transfer the pork shoulder from the marinade to the wire rack.
5: Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes until the edges are slightly charred.
6: Pour the marinade through a strainer into a medium pot.
7: Heat the marinade on medium heat until it reduces to ¼ of its original volume, about 10 minutes.
8: Glaze the pork with the reduced marinade every 15 minutes.
9: When the pork is done, slice and serve with white rice and bok choy.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground cumin (2teaspoons)、paprika (1tablespoon)、ground cardamom (1teaspoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、ground cloves (¼teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Make the pilau masala: In a medium bowl, combine the cumin, paprika, cardamom, black pepper, and cloves. Set aside.
1: Heat a large pot over medium-high heat. Add the oil and red onion and sauté for 10-15 minutes, until dark brown.
2: Add the garlic, ginger, serrano chile, pilau masala, beef stock cubes, cinnamon stick, and cilantro. Cook for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.
3: Add the beef and cook until browned, about 8 minutes.
4: Add the tomatoes and cook for 4-5 minutes, until the tomatoes have released their liquid.
5: Add the potatoes and the water. Bring to a boil and cook for 10 minutes.
6: Add the rice, stir, and cover. Reduce the heat to medium-low and cook for 20 minutes, until the rice is cooked and the liquid is absorbed.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs (2lb)、kosher salt (5teaspoons)、black pepper (2 ½teaspoons)、McCormick® Poultry Seasoning (1tablespoon)、vegetable oil (2teaspoons)、water (8cups)、small yellow onion、medium carrot、celery (1stalk)、fresh parsley (1bunch)、garlic (2cloves)、McCormick® Garlic Powder (2teaspoons)、all-purpose flour (2cups)、baking powder (1 ½teaspoons)、schmaltz (3tablespoons)、buttermilk (¾cup)
instructions:
0: Season the chicken thighs all over with 2 teaspoons of salt, 1 teaspoon of pepper, and the poultry seasoning.
1: In a large Dutch oven, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat. Place seasoned chicken, skin-side down, in the hot oil and begin to render the chicken fat, about 5 minutes. Once the skin in crispy, flip the chicken and continue cooking for 3 minutes more. Remove the chicken from pot and set aside. Pour the chicken fat into a small bowl and reserve.
2: Add the water, onion, the chopped carrot, chopped celery, and parsley stems to the pot. Return the chicken thighs to the pot and bring to a boil over medium high heat. Once boiling, reduce the heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through.
3: Remove the chicken from the pot and discard the skin and bones. Shred the meat and set aside. Strain the stock through a fine-mesh sieve and discard the vegetables.
4: Add 1 tablespoon of the reserved chicken fat to the pot over medium heat, along with the sliced carrots, sliced celery, garlic, and 2 tablespoons of flour. Stir to combine.
5: Slowly add the reserved chicken stock, 2 teaspoons of salt, 1 teaspoon of pepper, and the garlic powder. Add the shredded chicken back to the pot and bring to a simmer over low heat and continue cooking for 20 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
6: Meanwhile, make the dumplings: In a medium bowl, combine the remaining cups of flour, the baking powder, remaining teaspoon of salt, remaining ½ teaspoon of pepper, and the remaining 3 tablespoons of reserved chicken fat. Mix with a fork to combine. Add the buttermilk and mix to incorporate, then knead for 2 minutes, until the dough comes together.
7: Pull off about 1 tablespoon of dough at a time and add to the soup. Continue cooking until the dumplings are cooked through, about 10 minutes.
8: Ladle into bowls and garnish with the parsley leaves.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:milk (1cup)、double cream (⅔cup)、onion、garlic (2cloves)、bay leaves、butter (2tablespoons)、flour (¼cup)、dijon mustard (1tablespoon)、ground nutmeg (1pinch)、white bread (4slices)、butter (2tablespoons)、dijon mustard、gruyère cheese (1cup)、ham (6slices)
instructions:
0: In a saucepan, combine the milk, double cream, onion, garlic and bay leaves and heat over a medium heat until it just starts to boil.
1: Take off the heat and leave to infuse for 10 minutes.
2: Pour the milk mixture through a sieve into a jug.
3: Then, in a saucepan, gently melt the butter and add the flour. Stir together over a low-medium heat for 1 -2 minutes.
4: Gradually add the milk in three parts whilst continually stirring.
5: Continue to stir and bring the sauce to a gentle boil.
6: Take off the heat and stir in the dijon mustard and ground nutmeg.
7: Next, brush the two slices of bread with the melted butter and grill for about 5 minutes until golden brown.
8: Take out of the grill and preheat the heat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
9: Flip the slices of bread over and spread one slice with a thin layer of dijon mustard, followed by another layer of the béchamel sauce, followed by the cheese and then the ham.
10: Place the other slice of bread on top and coat with more béchamel sauce and cheese.
11: Bake for about 15 minutes, until the cheese is bubbling.
12: Serve with fresh salad!
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:water (½cup)、maple syrup (¼cup)、soy sauce (3tablespoons)、BBQ sauce (2tablespoons)、oil (1tablespoon)、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、 sriracha (1tablespoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、firm tofu (15oz)、pepper、onion、zucchini
instructions:
0: Soak wooden skewers in a shallow dish filled with water to prevent burning.
1: Place tofu on a paper towel-lined plate. Top with another paper towel and another plate. Microwave for 3 minutes.
2: Slice tofu into 9-12 cubes and set aside
3: Combine water, maple syrup, soy sauce, BBQ sauce, oil, garlic powder, Sriracha, and pepper then stir.
4: Place tofu in the marinade and refrigerate for at least 1 hour.
5: Remove tofu from marinade. Heat marinade over a low heat and cook for about 10 minutes, until it reduces and thickens.
6: Assemble skewers, alternating between tofu and veggies.
7: Heat a pan or grill and cook each skewer for 3-4 minutes per side.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sushi-grade salmon (6oz)、salt、persian cucumber (1oz)、tomato (1oz)、scallion (1oz)、onion (1oz)、short grain sushi rice (12oz)、nori
instructions:
0: Place salmon on a wire rack and season with salt on both sides. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours.
1: Take cured salmon out of the refrigerator, rinse and pat dry. Slice into cubes. Set aside in a bowl.
2: Dice the cucumber and add into the bowl with the salmon.
3: Dice the tomato and add into the bowl.
4: Slice the scallion and add into the bowl.
5: Dice the onion and add it into the bowl. Mix until combined.
6: In another bowl, combine the ingredients for the shoyu sauce. Add sugar as early as possible so all the grains are dissolved.
7: Spoon shoyu dressing on poke bowl. Mix to coat.
8: In a small bowl, add cooked rice, top with poke ingredients, and spoon additional shoyu dressing to taste.
9: Slice nori into small strips.
10: Garnish with sliced nori and serve immediately!
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、small yellow onion、garlic (4cloves)、salt (1 ¼teaspoons)、pepper (1 ½teaspoons)、young green jackfruit (20oz)、chili powder (1 ½teaspoons)、paprika (1 ½teaspoons)、cumin (1 ½teaspoons)、liquid smoke (1 ½teaspoons)、vegetable broth (1 ½cups)、barbecue sauce (1 ¼cups)
instructions:
0: Drain and rinse the jackfruit, then cut into smaller pieces, removing the core.
1: In a medium saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook for 4-5 minutes, until semi-translucent.
2: Add the garlic, salt, and pepper, and cook for 2-3 minutes, until the garlic is fragrant. Add the jackfruit, chili powder, paprika, cumin, and liquid smoke, and mix well. Add the vegetable broth, cover, and cook for 15 minutes, until the jackfruit is soft enough to be mashed.
3: Preheat the oven to 400ºF (200ºC). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
4: Mash the jackfruit with potato masher or a couple of forks, until it looks pulled or shredded.
5: Transfer the jackfruit to the baking sheet and spread in an even layer.
6: Bake for 25 minutes, until the jackfruit is slightly browned and crispy.
7: Make the coleslaw: add green and red cabbage and carrots to a large bowl. In a small liquid measuring cup, combine the mayo, mustard, apple cider vinegar, salt, and pepper, and mix until creamy. Pour the dressing over the vegetables and toss the coleslaw until the dressing is well-distributed. Set aside.
8: Remove the jackfruit from the oven, and pour the BBQ sauce over. Mix well.
