9: Return to the oven, and bake for another 10 minutes, until the edges are  slightly crispy.
10: Use a large bread knife to cut the whole sheet of slider buns in half. Remove the top and set aside. Spread the BBQ jackfruit on the bottom half of the buns, then top with coleslaw.
11: Add the top buns, then slice into 12 sliders.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:whole chicken、lemons、garlic (10cloves)、fresh rosemary (4sprigs)、salt、pepper
instructions:
0: Remove any giblets etc. from the cavity of the chicken, sometimes in a small bag.
1: Stuff chicken with 1 sprig of rosemary, 1 lemon (quartered) and 4 cloves garlic.
2: Season all sides of the chicken with salt and pepper.
3: Remove both ends of a lemon, cut in half to create very thick slices.
4: Line the bottom of the slow cooker with 4 lemon slices, 4 whole garlic cloves and a sprig of rosemary.
5: Put the chicken in the slow cooker.
6: Cut 2 garlic cloves in half and put all four pieces on top of the chicken along with the 2 remaining lemon slices.
7: Garnish with 1-2 more sprigs of rosemary. Put the lid on the slow cooker and set to high for 4 hours.
8: Place cooked chicken under the grill (broil) for 10 minutes to crisp the skin (optional).
9: Allow chicken to rest for 10 minutes before carving and serving. Leftover juices in the slow cooker are mostly lemon juice with a bit of chicken fat and can be used sparingly as a strongly flavoured sauce.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breasts、garlic (6cloves)、whole cloves、tomatoes、chipotle peppers in adobo sauce、chicken stock (½cup)、cumin (2teaspoons)、nutmeg (½teaspoon)、vegetable oil (2tablespoons)、white onions、chorizo (¼lb)、iceberg lettuce (1head)、kosher salt、black pepper、avocados、corn tortillas
instructions:
0: Place chicken in a saucepan over medium heat with enough water to cover by 1 inch (3 cm).
1: Add the smashed garlic and cloves. Simmer until the chicken is cooked through, 12-15 minutes.
2: Remove the chicken from the pot, cool slightly, then shred with two forks.
3: Place a cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat, until smoking.
4: Add the tomatoes and roll slowly around until blackened on all sides, about 6 minutes.
5: Add the seared tomatoes to a blender with chipotle peppers, chicken stock, cumin, and nutmeg. Blend until smooth.
6: Heat the vegetable oil in a large pot over medium-high heat. Add the garlic, onions, and chorizo. Cook 2-3 minutes until the onions have softened and the chorizo has rendered a little fat.
7: Add the lettuce and sauté 2-3 additional minutes, until softened.
8: Add the tomato-chili mixture and cook for 3 minutes, stirring constantly to incorporate.
9: Add the shredded chicken and bring mixture to a simmer. Simmer, uncovered, until most of the liquid has cooked off, about 10-15 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
10: Serve on warm corn tortillas with sliced avocado.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unbaked canned biscuit、marinara sauce (2tablespoons)、garlic powder (1pinch of)、dried basil (2pinches)、shredded mozzarella cheese (2tablespoons)、mini pepperonis
instructions:
0: Add the biscuit to a microwave-safe mug. MIcrowave for 30 seconds, until the biscuit starts to puff up.
1: In a small bowl, mix together the marinara sauce, garlic powder, and a pinch of basil.
2: Spoon the sauce over the par-cooked biscuit, then top with the mozzarella and mini pepperoni.
3: Loosely cover the mug with a paper towel and microwave for 30–45 seconds more, until the cheese is melted and the biscuit is cooked through.
4: Top with another pinch of basil, then let the mini pizza cool for about 5 minutes before serving.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:brown sugar (⅓cup)、onion powder (2teaspoons)、garlic powder (2teaspoons)、mustard powder (1teaspoon)、smoked paprika (2teaspoons)、pepper (1teaspoon)、dried tarragon (2teaspoons)、salt (2teaspoons)
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, add the brown sugar, onion powder, garlic powder, mustard powder, smoked paprika, pepper, tarragon, and salt and stir to combine. Use half of the spice rub to season the entire chicken. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or up to overnight.
1: Preheat the grill to 350°F (190°C).
2: Remove the chicken from the fridge and season with the remaining spice rub. our out half the can of beer. Place the half-filled can in the chicken cavity and stand it upright.
3: Grill the chicken over indirect heat for 30-40 minutes. Baste the chicken with barbecue sauce and cook for another 10-15 minutes, until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C).
4: Remove chicken from the grill and let rest for 15 minutes before carving.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:broccolini (12oz)、yellow squash (12oz)、red onion (12oz)、extra virgin olive oil (½cup)、kosher salt、freshly ground black pepper、baby spinach (6oz)、raw walnut (¼cup)、lemon zest (1tablespoon)、garlic (3cloves)、fresh lemon juice (1tablespoon)、red pepper flakes (½tablespoon)、uncooked orzo pasta (1 ½cups)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Spread the broccolini, squash, and red onion on a baking sheet. Drizzle with 2 tablespoons of olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Toss to coat.
2: Roast the vegetables for 20 minutes, until the broccolini is beginning to crisp and the squash and onions are tender. Remove from the oven and set aside.
3: While the vegetables are roasting, make the spinach pesto: In a food processor, combine the spinach, walnuts, lemon zest, garlic, lemon juice, and red pepper flakes. With the processor running, slowly stream in the remaining ½ cup of olive oil until the pesto reaches a smooth, thick, and spreadable consistency.
4: Cook the orzo according to package instructions.
5: Add ¾ cup of the pesto to the warm orzo and toss to coat. Mix in the roasted vegetables and more pesto to taste.
6: Serve warm or chilled.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、whole grain mustard (1tablespoon)、dijon mustard (1tablespoon)、dried thyme (½teaspoon)、dried rosemary (¼teaspoon)、lemon  zest (1lemon)、salt (¼teaspoon)、ground black pepper (¼teaspoon)、baby red potatoes、carrots、boneless, skinless chicken breasts、lemon、fresh rosemary (1stalk)、fresh parsley leaf (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚C).
1: In a small bowl, combine olive oil, both mustards, thyme, rosemary, lemon zest, salt, and pepper.  Whisk and set aside.
2: Cut four sheets of foil, about 14 inches (35 cm) long.
3: Divide potatoes and carrots into 4 equal portions and add to the center of each foil.
4: Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
5: Top each packet with the chicken. Using your fingers or a brush, work the mustard mixture onto the chicken. Top with lemon slices and fresh rosemary.
6: Fold the sides of the foil over the chicken, covering completely and sealing the packets closed. Place foil packets in a single layer on a baking sheet. Place into oven and bake until the chicken is cooked through and the potatoes and carrots are tender, about 30 minutes.  Cooking time may take longer depending on the thickness of the breast.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sirloin steak (2lb)、cumin (1tablespoon)、chili powder (1tablespoon)、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、green bell peppers、red bell peppers、large white onion
instructions:
0: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
1: Combine the steak, cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl and mix until the steak is evenly coated.
2: Slide a piece of steak down a skewer, followed by a piece of green pepper, red pepper, and onion. Continue until there is a 1-inch gap on the top of the skewer.
3: Repeat with the remaining skewers.
4: Grease the surface of the grill by rubbing the grates with an oiled paper towel (use tongs to grip!).
5: Grill the skewers for 10-15 minutes with the lid closed, flipping them halfway through.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:goat cheese (3tablespoons)、balsamic vinegar (2tablespoons)、small ciabatta rolls、roasted garlic hummus (½cup)、large seedless cucumber、large roma tomatoes、small red onion、fresh arugula (1cup)
instructions:
0: In small bowl, combine the goat cheese and balsamic vinegar and mix until well combined.
1: Spread about 1 tablespoon of the goat cheese mixture on the top half of each ciabatta roll.
2: Spread about 2 tablespoons of roasted garlic hummus on the bottom half of each roll.
3: On bottom half of each roll, layer 4 cucumber slices, 2 tomato slices, onion slices, and a handful of arugula.
4: Cover with the top halves of rolls. Insert a toothpick into each sandwich to secure.
5: Serve with chicken and wild rice soup.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground beef (3lb)、salt (1tablespoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (2tablespoons)、dry mustard powder (1teaspoon)、cayenne (½teaspoon)、large white onion、medium onion、large eggs、panko breadcrumbs (2cups)、milk (½cup)、fresh parsley (½cup)、worcestershire sauce (2tablespoons)、ketchup (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: In a large bowl, combine the beef, salt, pepper, garlic powder, mustard powder, cayenne, minced onion, eggs, bread crumbs, milk, parsley, and Worcestershire sauce. Mix well until evenly combined.
2: Split the meat mixture in half and place on the baking sheet. Shape each half into a “foot.”
3: Press up to form an ankle and hollow out the top to make room for “ankle bones.” Add the halved onion, cut side up, to each divot. Cut 5 toes on each foot and add the reserved slivers of onion to make “toenails.”
4: Brush around the ankles with ketchup to look like “blood.”
5: Bake for 1 hour, until the meat is cooked through.
6: Serve warm.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:marinara sauce (6tablespoons)、mozzarella cheese、fresh basil (2teaspoons)、rigatoni、parmesan cheese
instructions:
0: Add 3 tbs Marinara sauce, a handful of Mozzarella cheese and chopped fresh basil in a mug. Top with another 3 tbs Marinara sauce and the pre-cooked Rigatoni pasta.
1: Add some Parmesan cheese and then bake for 20 minutes at 400°F (205°C).
2: Enjoy in the mug itself or flip the pasta into a bowl and serve.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:spare ribs (1rack)、spring onion、red chili、rice
instructions:
0: Season the spare ribs with the salt, pepper, and 5 spice.
1: Place in the slow cooker, along with the garlic, ginger, onion, hoisin sauce, and chicken broth. Mix with your hands to combine.
2: Cook on high for 3 hours, or low for 6 hours.
3: Preheat the oven to 325°F (170°C).
4: Once the ribs are cooked, carefully remove them and place onto a tin foil-lined baking tray.
5: To prepare the BBQ sauce, take the remaining cooking juices from the slow cooker and pour into a frying pan set over a medium heat.
6: In a small bowl combine the water and corn flour, stir into the cooking juices. Add remaining BBQ sauce ingredients and reduce until a sticky BBQ sauce is achieved.
7: Brush onto the ribs on both sides and bake for 15 minutes.
8: Chop up the ribs and garnish with spring onion and red chili.
9: Serve with rice.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs and drunmsticks (2lb)、kosher salt、pepper、garlics、ground cumin (1tablespoon)、smoked paprika (1tablespoon)、harissa paste (3tablespoons)、lemon juices、yukon gold potato (1 ½lb)、extra virgin olive oil (1tablespoon)、dried parsley (1tablespoon)、greek yogurt (1cup)、fresh parsley (½cup)、honey (2tablespoons)、fresh dill (½cup)、sumac (1tablespoon)、leeks、lemon zest
instructions:
0: Marinate the chicken: Add the chicken to a large bowl and season with the salt, pepper, garlic, cumin, smoked paprika, harissa paste, and the juice of 2 lemons. Toss until the chicken is well coated, then cover with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.
1: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2: Add the potatoes to half of a baking sheet and drizzle with the olive oil. Season with salt, pepper, and the parsley and toss to coat. Arrange the marinated chicken pieces on the other side of the baking sheet.
3: Roast the chicken and potatoes for 30 minutes.
4: Meanwhile, make the sauce: In a small bowl, combine the Greek yogurt, salt, pepper, parsley, honey, dill, sumac, and remaining ¼ cup (60 ml) lemon juice. Stir well until smooth, the set aside.
5: Remove the baking sheet from the oven, toss the potatoes, then spread the leeks and lemon zest in an even layer over the potatoes.
6: Return to the oven for another 20 minutes, or until the chicken is browned and cooked through and the vegetables are tender and slightly crispy.
7: Serve the chicken over the potatoes and leeks and drizzle with the yogurt sauce.
8: Nutrition  Calories: 1562 Fat: 72 grams  Carbs: 110 grams Fiber: 44 grams  Sugars: 44 grams  Protein: 122 grams
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:milk (3cups)、elbow pasta (1cup)、shredded cheddar cheese (1cup)、shredded mozzarella cheese (1cup)、salt (1tablespoon)、pepper (2teaspoons)、cheese (8slices)、cooked bacon (½cup)、oil
instructions:
0: In a large pot or skillet, add 2 cups (470ml) of milk, pasta, salt, and pepper. Bring it to boil, stirring constantly so the milk and pasta do not burn.
1: When the liquid is evaporated halfway, add the rest of the milk. Stir until pasta is al dente. Add shredded cheeses and mix until melted.
2: Take off the heat to prevent mac ‘n’ cheese from over cooking.
3: In a oven-safe ceramic bowl, coat the inside with butter (or oil). Place sliced cheese until the bowl is fully covered.
4: Add bacon (or any desired fixins’), and add the pasta to the top.
5: Roll or spread out pizza dough to fit the bowl and place over the top.
6: In a small bowl, melt butter. Add in garlic powder, salt, and Italian seasoning, then brush on top of dough.
7: Bake in a 350°F (180°C) over for 25 minutes.
8: Carefully place a plate over the dough and flip the bowl. Use a butter knife or fork to separate from the bowl.
9: Sprinkle with parsley for garnish.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:lean top sirloin steak (2lb)、large white onion、low sodium soy sauce (½cup)、sesame oil (¼cup)、fresh ginger (2tablespoons)、garlic (4cloves)、brussels sprouts (1lb)、red bell peppers、large carrots、brown rice (2cups)
instructions:
0: Slice the top sirloin steaks into half-inch (1 ¼ cm) thick strips.
1: Place soy sauce, sesame oil, ginger, garlic, onion and meat in a large slow cooker and mix thoroughly.
2: Place the lid on top.
3: Set the slow cooker on the low setting for 3 hours.
4: Remove the onions from the slow cooker.
5: Pour in the Brussels sprouts, bell pepper, and carrots. Mix thoroughly.
6: Cook on low for 1 more hour.
7: Serve with a portion of brown rice.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、vegan butter (1tablespoon)、all purpose flour (2tablespoons)、vegetable stock (2cups)、unsweetened oat milk (2cups)、garlic powder (2teaspoons)、nutritional yeast (3tablespoons)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、black pepper (½teaspoon)、fettuccine pasta (1lb)、fresh parsley (2tablespoons)、red pepper flakes (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Melt the olive oil and butter together in a large pan over medium heat. Add the flour and toast, stirring frequently, until golden, 1–2 minutes.
1: Add the vegetable stock, oat milk, garlic powder, nutritional yeast, salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil.
2: Once the sauce is boiling, add the fettuccine. Stir to combine, then cook until the pasta is al dente, 10–12 minutes.
3: Reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer until the sauce is thickened, about 10 minutes more.
4: Divide the pasta between serving bowls and top with the parsley and red pepper flakes.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cabbage (4leaves)、ground pork (½cup)、ground beef (½cup)、onion、egg、salt (⅓teaspoon)、pepper、mozzarella cheese (4slices)、oil、water (1cup)、powdered consommé (1tablespoon)、butter (1tablespoon)、canned diced tomato (1lb)、salt、pepper、grated parmesan cheese、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Blanch the cabbage leaves in boiling water for 3 minutes, then transfer directly to a large bowl of ice water.
1: Remove the tough stem, finely dice and set aside.
2: In a medium bowl, combine the ground pork, ground beef, diced cabbage stems, onion, egg, salt, and pepper, and mix until well-combined. Divide into four equal parts.
3: Fold the mozzarella slices in half and roll them up.
4: Form each portion of meat into a patty. Add a roll of cheese to each patty and form the meat around the cheese so it is completely encased.
5: Put a meat patty on a cabbage leaf, fold in front and right side, and roll up.
6: Fold the left side inwards towards the meat filling to seal. Repeat with the remaining meat and cabbage.
7: Heat a bit of oil in a medium pan over medium heat. Add thecabbage rolls and fry for 3 minutes, until browned on one side.
8: Turn cabbage rolls over and add the water, bullion, and butter.
9: Once the water is boiling, add the canned tomatoes. Cover and cook for 15 minutes.
10: Season with salt and pepper.
11: Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and parsley, then serve.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:warm water (⅔cup)、active dry yeast (1tablespoon)、honey (1tablespoon)、bread flour (2 ½cups)、room temperature water (1 ¾cups)、olive oil (9tablespoons)、all purpose flour (3cups)、kosher salt (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, whisk together the warm water, yeast, honey, and ½ cup (60 G) bread flour. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and set in a warm place for 20–30 minutes, until the mixture is bubbly.
1: Add the room temperature water, 5 tablespoons of olive oil, remaining 2 cups of bread flour, the all-purpose flour, and salt. Mix well with a rubber spatula to combine until the dough starts to come together.
2: Turn the dough out onto a surface lightly dusted with all-purpose flour and bring together. Knead for 10–15 minutes, adding flour as needed to prevent sticking. The dough should be smooth and supple and bounce back when pressed.
3: Coat a large bowl with 1 tablespoon of olive oil and transfer the dough into the bowl. Cover with plastic wrap and let rest in a warm place for 1–2 hours, until doubled in size.
4: Remove the plastic wrap and punch the dough down.
5: Grease a 18 x 13-inch (45 x 33 cm)  baking sheet with 1-2 tablespoons of olive oil and use your hands to spread the oil all around the pan to coat. Transfer the dough to the pan and cover the dough with the same piece of plastic wrap. Let rest for 10–20 minutes so it is easier to stretch.
6: Uncover the dough. With oiled hands, gently stretch the dough to fit the size of the baking sheet. Cover with plastic wrap again and let proof at room temperature for 1–2 hours, until the dough rises to fill the pan, or refrigerate overnight. Refrigerating overnight is optional, however it will result in a better final texture and flavor. If refrigerating, let the dough come to room temperature for 30–60 minutes before proceeding, until slightly puffed.
7: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
8: Use your fingers to dimple the surface of the focaccia dough. Drizzle with the remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil.
9: Use the dill, rosemary, edible flowers, asparagus, mushrooms, cherry tomatoes, Kalamata olives, Fresno chiles, watermelon radish, chives, and radish to create a decorative gardenscape scene on the focaccia. Sprinkle all over with flaky sea salt.
10: Bake the focaccia for 15 minutes, then turn the pan and bake for another 7–10 minutes, until the bread is golden brown in the areas not covered with toppings. If the toppings are getting too dark, lightly cover the focaccia with foil for the remainder of baking.
11: Remove the focaccia from the oven and let cool in the pan for 10 minutes. Transfer to a cutting board and drizzle with more olive oil.
12: Slice and serve.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter (2tablespoons)、kimchi (1cup)、flour tortillas、sesame seed (2tablespoons)、sharp cheddar cheese (1cup)、monterey jack cheese (1cup)、vegetable oil (1tablespoon)、green onion (1bunch)
instructions:
0: Drain kimchi and roughly chop.
1: Add butter to a large skillet over medium-high heat. When melted, add kimchi.
2: Cook and stir for about 6 minutes until the edges of the kimchi start to turn a golden brown. Transfer to a bowl and let it cool down.
3: Add the kimchi, cheese, and sesame seeds to a tortilla. Fold the tortilla in half.
4: Pour oil into a large skillet over medium heat. Fry the quesadilla for about two minutes on each side, or until the tortilla has turned a golden brown and the cheese has melted.
5: Serve with a garnish of diced green onions and sesame seeds. Slice into quarters.
6: NOTE: Experiment with proteins by adding beef, pork, or chicken to the quesadillas. For even more of a Korean influence, try adding Korean BBQ-style proteins!
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bread flour (2cups)、kosher salt (¼teaspoon)、water (1cup)
instructions:
0: Make the dough: Combine the flour and salt in a medium bowl. Gradually pour in the water, stirring with chopsticks to incorporate. Once the dough comes together in a ball, knead in the bowl for 5-8 minutes, until smooth. Cover with a damp towel and let rest in the bowl for 30 minutes
1: Make the filling: In a medium bowl, combine the pork, green onion, egg, salt, five spice, Sichuan pepper, ginger, soy sauce, and sesame oil. Using chopsticks, mix until well combined.
2: Add the shrimp, wood ear mushrooms, and Napa cabbage. Mix well.
3: On a lightly floured surface, turn out the dough and knead a few times. Stretch the dough into a 1-inch (2.5 cm) thick ring, then cut to make a rope.
4: Divide the dough into 2-ounce (55 G) pieces, turning the rope 90 degrees after each cut to make triangle shapes. Lightly flour the dough portions.
5: Working 1 at a time, pat each dough portion into a flat circle, then, using a small rolling pin, roll out into a thin circle.
6: Add 1 tablespoon of the filling to the center of a dumpling wrapper. Fold the wrapper in half. Using your fingertips, make pleats to seal the dumpling. Press the edges firmly to fully seal the dumpling. Repeat with the remaining wrappers and filling.
7: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the dumplings and cook for 10 minutes, or until the filling is cooked through
8: Serve immediately with dipping sauce.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:thai fish sauce (3tablespoons)、tamarind paste (3tablespoons)、light brown sugar (3tablespoons)、lime、vegetable oil (4tablespoons)、eggs、chicken breasts、raw prawn (½lb)、spring onions、chilli、fresh coriander (⅔cup)、garlic (1teaspoon)、flat rice noodle (3 ½cups)、bean sprout (1cup)、roasted peanut (1handful)、lime wedge
instructions:
0: Combine the tamarind, fish sauce, sugar, and lime juice with 1 tbsp water and set aside.
1: Cook the eggs in 1 tablespoon of oil and set aside.
2: Add 1 tablespoon of oil to the frying pan. Sear the chicken until golden and cooked through.
3: Add the prawns to the pan, and cook for about 2 minutes or until they just turn red.
4: Tip in half of the spring onions, chili, half the coriander, and garlic. Cook for 1 minute until fragrant, then set aside
5: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in the wok, then add the noodles and bean sprouts. Stir-fry for 2 minutes until the noodles have separated and everything is heated through.
6: Add the chicken, prawns, eggs and tamarind sauce. Toss with the noodles until well-coated.
7: To serve, scatter over the roasted peanuts, remaining spring onions, coriander leaves, and lime wedges.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bacon (6slices)、bread (4slices)、mayonnaise、beefsteak tomato、boston lettuces
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: Arrange the bacon on the prepared baking sheet and place in the oven. Bake to your desired level of crispiness, 12–15 minutes. Transfer the bacon to a paper towel-lined plate to drain.
2: On a cutting board, spread a generous layer of mayonnaise over each slice of bread.
3: Layer the sliced tomato, lettuce, and bacon over the mayonnaise on 2 slices of bread. Place the other slices of bread on top. Cut the sandwiches in half on the diagonal.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:short grain white rice (2cups)、water (2cups)、sugar (1tablespoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、rice vinegar (¼cup)
instructions:
0: In a bowl wash the rice 3 times with water.
1: In a pot add rice and water and cover and bring it to boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes. Then take off heat and rest for another 15 minutes.
2: In a microwave safe bowl heat sugar, salt and vinegar for a minute or until the sugar is completely melted.
3: Transfer the rice onto a serving bowl and pour the vinegar over the rice.
4: Using a spatula fold in the vinegar and cut into the rice. Have another person fan the rice while mixing to get it down to room temperature.
5: Prep the fix-ins. Slice tuna and chop until the meat is mashed together. Transfer into a small bowl.
6: Mix in mayonnaise and sriracha sauce. Set aside
7: In a medium bowl marinate chicken with your favorite teriyaki sauce. Fully cook chicken and slice and set aside in a bowl.
8: Cut imitation crab into small pieces. Mix in mayonnaise until fully coated. Set aside.
9: Cut veggies into thin slices. Cut avocado into bite size pieces as well.
10: Set up the table: After placing your rice and fix-ins place each sushi rolling station with a bamboo rolling mat. Set out a bowl of water so the rice does not stick to your hands. Have a cutting board close by with a knife. Let’s roll.
11: On the rolling mat place one sheet of nori. There is a smooth side and a rough side. The rough side will face up.
12: Wet your hands and grab a handful of rice and place it on your nori. Spread the rice evenly throughout the nori without smushing the rice down. LEAVE SPACE AT THE BOTTOM. (This extra sliver of nori will stick onto the rice when rolling.)
13: Place the fix-in at the bottom row of the rice.
14: Grabbing both nori and the mat roll the mat over so the extra space at the bottom touches the other side.
15: Squeeze down to make a nice tight roll.
16: Grab the mat and continue rolling over the rice until your roll is complete. Squeeze down along the way to keep the roll from holding its shape.
17: Transfer your roll onto a cutting board. Have a damp towel close by for your knife. Before you cut give you knife a wipe.
18: NOTE: This will prevent the rice from sticking to the knife.
19: Cut your roll into desired sizes.
20: NOTE: Wrap mat with plastic wrap for inside out rolls.
21: Repeat steps 13-20 for your veggie roll.
22: Repeat steps 13-20 for your teriyaki chicken roll.
23: Repeat steps 13-20 for your California roll.
24: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:russet potatoes、all-purpose flour (2tablespoons)、garlic (2cloves)、grated parmesan cheese (¼cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、heavy cream (1cup)、shredded cheddar cheese (3cups)、gruyère cheese (3cups)、ham (9slices)、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
1: Using a mandolin or a sharp knife, thinly slice the potatoes lengthwise.
2: In a 13-inch (33-cm) cast iron skillet, layer slices of potatoes around the outside of the pan. Add another layer of potatoes, keeping them centered in the pan and moving clockwise until the pan is covered.
3: Top with a third of the cheddar cheese, a third of the Gruyère cheese, and half of the ham.
4: Add another layer of potato slices around the outside of the pan, then a add layer of slices around the center of the pan. Top with another third of the cheddar and Gruyère and the remaining ham slices.
5: Add a final layer of potato slices around the center of the pan
6: Top with the remaining cheddar and Gruyère cheese.
7: Cover with greased aluminum foil and bake for 40 minutes.
8: Remove the pan from the oven and increase the oven temperature to 400˚F (200˚C).
9: In a medium bowl, combine the flour, garlic, Parmesan, salt, pepper and mix well.
10: Slowly add in the cream, whisking until fully incorporated.
11: Uncover the skillet and pour the cream mixture over potatoes, spreading evenly.
12: Bake for another 10-15 minutes uncovered, until the cheese is melted and golden brown.
13: Cool for at least 30 minutes, then slice and serve.
14: Garnish with fresh parsley.
15: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:beer (24fl oz)、bratwursts、hot dog buns、cream cheese (1cup)、shredded cheese (2cups)
instructions:
0: Add beer and brats to sauce pan.
1: Cook on medium high heat for 10-15 minutes.
2: Place brats on grill and cook until done (probably another 10-15 min).
3: With 1 cup (235 ml) of beer in the pot, add cream cheese and cheddar.
4: Stir until cheese is mixed.
5: Add the cheese mixture on top of the beer brats.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:oil (1tablespoon)、garlic ginger paste (1tablespoon)、red chili、onion、tomato、chili powder (1teaspoon)、turmeric (1teaspoon)、garam masala (1tablespoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、chicken (3 ¼cups)、fresh coriander (1bunch)、parathas
instructions:
0: Heat the oil in a large saucepan over a medium heat.
1: Fry the garlic and ginger paste for a couple of minutes.
2: Stir in the chili and onion and fry for about 5 minutes, until soft.
3: Add the tomato, followed by the chili powder, turmeric, garam masala, salt, and pepper.
4: Fry for another few minutes stirring continuously.
5: Stir in the chicken and coriander and mix until evenly coated.
6: Set the pan aside.
7: In a smaller pan over medium heat, place on a paratha. Spoon on some of the chicken mix and place another paratha on top.
8: Carefully seal the sides with your fingers, being careful not to touch the pan.
9: Cook for a few minutes on each side until crisp and golden brown.
10: Slice the parathas in half and serve with chutneys, raitas, or any other dips of your choice.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium red onion、cherry tomato (10.5oz)、olive oil (3tablespoons)、kosher salt、ground black pepper、shallot (2teaspoons)、dijon mustard (1tablespoon)、worcestershire sauce (½teaspoon)、honey (1teaspoon)、extra virgin olive oil (2tablespoons)、red wine vinegar (¼cup)、boneless new york strip steak (1.25lb)、red leaf lettuce (1head)、walnuts (½cup)、gorgonzola cheese (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
1: Spread the sliced onion on half of the baking sheet and arrange tomatoes on the other half. Drizzle each side with 1 tablespoon olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Toss to coat.
2: Roast in the oven for 10-15 minutes, or until the onion is caramelized and the tomatoes are browned in spots and just beginning to burst. Remove from oven and let cool.
3: In a small bowl, whisk together the shallot, Dijon mustard, Worcestershire sauce, honey, extra-virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt, and pepper. Refrigerate until ready to use.
4: Liberally season the steak all over with salt and pepper.
5: Heat a cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat. Add the remaining tablespoon of olive oil to the hot skillet. When the oil is smoking, add the steak to the pan. Sear for 5 minutes, or until a deep golden brown crust forms. Flip the steak and cook another 5 minutes on the other side. Sear the sides of the steak until golden brown, another 3-4 minutes total.
6: Transfer the pan with the steak to the preheated oven for about 5 minutes, or until an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center of the steak reads 125-130˚F (51-54˚C) for medium-rare. Remove the steak from the oven and let rest for 10 minutes before slicing.
7: Add the lettuce to a large bowl. Add the roasted tomatoes, roasted onion, walnuts, Gorgonzola, and sliced steak. Toss well.  Divide the salad between serving bowl and drizzle over the dressing.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:zucchinis、yellow bell pepper、red onion、corn (2ears)、olive oil (¼cup)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、freshly ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、baby arugula (3cups)、cherry tomato (1cup)、crumbled goat cheese (½cup)
instructions:
0: Char the vegetables: Arrange an oven rack in the top third of the oven. Turn the oven to high broil.
1: On a rimmed baking sheet, arrange the zucchini, bell pepper, red onion, and corn. Drizzle with the olive oil and season with the salt and pepper.
2: Broil the vegetables for 8–10 minutes, until softened and nicely charred in spots. Remove from the oven and let vegetables cool enough to handle, about 20 minutes.
3: While the vegetables cool, make the dressing: In a blender or food processor, combine the olive oil, lemon juice, basil, honey, pepper, salt, and garlic and blend until fully combined and bright green in color. Transfer to a bowl or jar, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until ready to use. The dressing will keep in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.
4: Once the vegetables have cooled, cut the corn kernels from the cobs and cut the onion quarters into small pieces. Add to a large bowl with the remaining charred vegetables and the baby arugula, cherry tomatoes, and goat cheese. Drizzle with several spoonfuls of the dressing and toss well.
5: Serve the salad with the remaining dressing alongside.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:extra virgin olive oil (2tablespoons)、small onion (1whole)、celery (2stalks)、garlic (2cloves)、fresh basil (1large bunch)、canned whole peeled tomato (28oz)、salt、dried spathetti (1lb)、freshly grated parmigiano-reggiano cheese (½cup)、carrots (1cup)
instructions:
0: Dice the carrots, onion, and celery. Thinly slice half of the basil leaves. Set aside.
1: Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onion, carrots, celery, and garlic. Cook until softened but not brown.
2: Add in the whole basil leaves, garlic, and tomatoes. Bring the sauce to a simmer, cover, and cook for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally and breaking apart the larger tomatoes as they cook.
3: After 45 minutes, or when the vegetables are tender, remove the sauce from the heat and let rest for 15 minutes.
4: While the sauce is simmering, fill another large pot with water and bring to a boil. Add salt, if desired. Cook the spaghetti until al dente. Drain and rinse the pasta with lukewarm water to prevent sticking.
5: Taste the sauce and add salt, if desired. Serve pasta topped generously with sauce, grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, and the reserved sliced basil leaves.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cubed steak (1lb)、salt (1pinch)、pepper (1pinch)
instructions:
0: Season steak with a pinch of salt and pepper, then cut steak into bite-size pieces.
1: In a large bowl, combine all batter ingredients. Whisk until all ingredients are mixed through.
2: Preheat about an inch (2 cm) of oil to 350˚F (180˚C) into a heavy, high-sided skillet or pan.
3: In a medium bowl, add flour and salt. Place steak into the flour, then batter, and then into the flour again.
4: Lower the steak bites into the hot oil, being careful not to overcrowd the pan.
5: Cook each side for 4 minutes or until golden brown.
6: Transfer it onto a drying rack and season with salt.
7: Discard the oil on the pan, but leave some oil for the gravy. In the same bowl, add flour, milk, and salt, and mix until thicken.
8: Dip the steaks into the gravy.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:kosher salt (2teaspoons)、freshly ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、shrimp (1lb)、all purpose flour (1 ½cups)、large eggs、panko breadcrumbs (1 ½cups)、unsweetened shredded coconut flake (1 ¾cups)、canola oil、limes、limes、sesame oil (2tablespoons)、brown sugar (1tablespoon)、 sriracha (2teaspoons)、rice noodle (1lb)、large carrot、avocado、persian cucumber、fresh basil (1bunch)、fresh mint (1bunch)、fresh cilantro (1bunch)、scallions (1bunch)、black sesame seeds (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: In a small bowl, stir together the salt, pepper, garlic powder, and paprika.
1: Place the shrimp on a cutting board and pat dry with paper towels. Season the shrimp on both sides with the spice mixture.
2: Add the flour, eggs, and panko to 3 separate shallow bowls. Add the coconut flakes to the bread crumbs and stir to combine.
3: Dredge the shrimp in the flour, shaking off any excess. Dip the floured shrimp in the beaten egg, then into the panko mixture. Transfer the breaded shrimp to a baking sheet until ready to fry.
4: Heat 3 inches (7 ½ cm) of canola oil in a heavy-bottomed pot over medium-high heat until it reaches 350˚F (180˚C).
5: Working in batches, fry the shrimp in the hot oil until golden brown on both sides, 2-3 minutes, turning halfway through. Transfer the shrimp to a wire rack to drain.
6: In a large bowl, whisk together the lime juice, lime zest, sesame oil, brown sugar, and Sriracha. Using tongs, toss the rice noodles in the sauce until fully coated.
7: Divide the noodles between 4 bowls. Top with the carrot ribbons, avocado, coconut shrimp, cucumber, basil, mint, cilantro, and scallions. Sprinkle with black sesame seeds, if using.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breast (1lb)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、freshly ground black pepper (1teaspoon)、all purpose flour (1cup)、large eggs、panko breadcrumbs (1 ½cups)、parmesan cheese (1cup)、nonstick cooking spray、marinara sauce (1cup)、fresh mozzarella cheese (1ball)、fresh parsley (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: On a cutting board, slice each chicken breast in half horizontally, creating 2 cutlets. Place the chicken breast pieces, 1 at a time, in a large zip-top bag. Use a meat mallet to pound the chicken to ¼-inch-thick. Transfer the chicken to the cutting board and pat dry with a paper towel. Season the chicken on both sides with salt and pepper.
1: In a shallow bowl, whisk together the flour, 1 teaspoon of salt, and 1 teaspoon of pepper. In another shallow bowl, beat the eggs. Add the panko and Parmesan to a third shallow bowl and whisk to combine.
2: Coat the chicken in the flour, shaking off any excess. Then, dip in the eggs, letting any excess drip off. Finally, coat in the panko mixture, making sure all sides are covered. Transfer the chicken to a clean cutting board.
3: Preheat the air fryer to 400°F (200°C). Spray the air fryer basket with nonstick spray.
4: Place 2 of the chicken pieces in the basket and cook until golden brown, about 7 minutes. Spread ¼ cup of marinara sauce over each piece of chicken. Top with 2 slices of mozzarella. Return to the air fryer until the cheese is melted and golden brown and the internal temperature of the chicken reaches 165°F (75°C), about 5 minutes. Repeat with the remaining chicken.
5: Top with the parsley and serve immediately.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (2tablespoons)、white onion (1cup)、garlic (2cloves)、ground beef (1lb)、crushed tomato (14.5oz)、tomato paste (6oz)、light brown sugar (1tablespoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、chili powder (1tablespoon)、ground cumin (1teaspoon)、water (½cup)
instructions:
0: Heat the olive oil in a large pot with a lid over medium heat until shimmering. Add the onion and garlic and sauté for 2 minutes, until translucent.
1: Add the ground beef and cook until browned, about 7-10 minutes.
2: Add the crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, brown sugar, salt, ground pepper, paprika, chili powder, ground cumin, and stir to combine. Add water and stir. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes.
3: Set a wire cooling rack on top of a baking sheet. Place a metal 1-cup (240 ml) measuring cup upside down on top of the cooling rack.
4: In a medium non-stick skillet over medium heat, pour ⅓ cup (35 g) of Parmesan in the center of the pan and spread out into a thin circle, about 5 inches across. Without disturbing the cheese, melt for 2-3 minutes, or until golden and fully melted.
5: Once the cheese is fully melted, run a spatula along the edges of the cheese and shake the pan to loosen the cheese circle. Carefully slide the melted cheese over the inverted measuring cup to form a cheese bowl. DO NOT TOUCH, it is extremely hot. Set aside and let cool completely, about ten minutes. Repeat with the rest of the Parmesan to make 8 bowls.
6: Lightly grease a large skillet over high heat, then add the beef patties (in batches, if necessary) and season generously with salt and pepper. Cook for 2 minutes without disturbing, then flip and cook for another 3 minutes, or until the internal temperature has reached at least 165˚F (75˚C).
7: To assemble, place a bottom burger bun on a plate and put a cheese bowl on top. Lay a burger patty inside the cheese bowl and top with a spoonful of chili, a sprinkle of shredded cheddar cheese, and the top bun.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:oil (2tablespoons)、shallot、garlic (2cloves)、mushroom (2cups)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (¼teaspoon)、cream cheese (4oz)、egg yolks、fresh chives (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add shallots and garlic, cooking until translucent. Add mushrooms, salt, and pepper, cooking until mushrooms are golden brown. Remove from heat.
1: In a medium bowl, combine mushrooms, cream cheese, egg yolks, and chives, stirring until evenly incorporated. Set aside.
2: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
3: On a cutting board, season both sides of the steak with salt and pepper.
4: Cut about ¾ of the way through the steak, making the incisions 1-inch (2 cm) part.
5: Pack a spoonful of the mushrooms mixture into each cut in the steak.
6: Heat the oil in a pan over high heat. Sear the steak for about 30 seconds, then bake for 10-15 minutes, depending on how you like your steak cooked. Slice and serve.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:spaghetti squash、oil (1tablespoon)、salt、black pepper (½teaspoon)、boneless, skinless chicken thighs、green beans (½lb)、basil pesto (1cup)、cherry tomatoes (2cups)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Using a fork, pierce holes along one side of the spaghetti squash.
2: Microwave the squash for 5 minutes to make it easier to cut open.
3: Using a sharp knife, cut the squash in half lengthwise and scrape out the seeds with a spoon.
4: Transfer the squash to a roasting pan and drizzle with oil. Season the flesh with salt and pepper, and flip the squash so that the cavity faces down on the pan.
5: Bake for 40 minutes until the squash is easily pierced with a knife.
6: Once out of the oven, use a fork to pull the threads out of the spaghetti squash.
7: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat in a large, nonstick skillet. Season the chicken thighs with salt and pepper and sear them on each side for about 4 minutes.
8: Remove the chicken from the pan and allow it to rest for 5 minutes before slicing into cubes.
9: Toss the green beans into the pan and sauté until they’ve started to soften.
10: Add in the spaghetti squash, pesto, and chicken, and toss until well combined.
11: After the mixture is heated through, toss in the cherry tomatoes and give the pan one last toss to help everything come together.
12: Remove from heat and serve.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breast (2g)、onion (1cup)、celery (2stalks)、carrots、garlic (3cloves)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、chicken stock (4cups)、water (2cups)、bay leaf、fresh thyme (2sprigs)
instructions:
0: Make the soup: Add the chicken breasts, onion, celery, carrot, garlic, salt, pepper, chicken stock, water, bay leaf, and thyme to a slow cooker and cook on low for 8 hours or high for 4 hours.
1: Make the matzo balls: In a large bowl, combine the matzo meal, baking powder, salt, pepper, water, vegetable oil, and eggs. Mix well and refrigerate for 30 minutes to let the matzo meal absorb the liquid.
2: Form the matzo mixture into balls and set aside at room temperature or in the fridge until the soup is done.
3: Remove the chicken breasts from the soup, shred with 2 forks, then return to the slow cooker.
4: Add the matzo balls to the soup and cook for 30 minutes.
5: Ladle the soup and matzo balls into bowls and garnish with fresh dill.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1teaspoon)、chicken wings、soy sauce (2tablespoons)、cola soda (¾cup)、scallion
instructions:
0: Heat the olive oil in a medium nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken wings and sear for 1–2 minute per side, until just crispy.
1: Add the soy sauce and cola and increase the heat to high. Bring to boil and cook, stirring constantly, until the sauce is reduced and syrupy and the wings are warmed through and well coated, 5–7 minutes.
2: Garnish with scallions and serve immediately.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large pita、pizza sauce (¼cup)、shredded mozzarella cheese (½cup)、pepperoni (12slices)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.
1: Make the pepperoni pita pizza: Cut the pita in half crosswise to form 2 pockets and fill each pocket with 2 tablespoons of pizza sauce, ¼ cup (25 G) shredded mozzarella, and 6 pepperoni. Place on a prepared baking sheet.
2: Make the Hawaiian pita pizza: Cut the pita in half crosswise to form 2 pockets and fill each pocket with 2 tablespoons of pizza sauce, ¼ cup (25 G) shredded mozzarella, 2 tablespoons pineapple, and 2 tablespoons Canadian bacon. Place on a prepared baking sheet.
3: Make the veggie supreme pita pizza: Cut the pita in half crosswise to form 2 pockets and fill each pocket with 2 tablespoons of pizza sauce, ¼ cup (25 G) shredded mozzarella, 2 tablespoons mushrooms, 2 tablespoons green pepper, and 1 tablespoon olives. Place on a prepared baking sheet.
4: Make the BBQ chicken pita pizza: Cut the pita in half crosswise to form 2 pockets and fill each pocket with 2 tablespoons of barbeque sauce, ¼ cup (25 G) shredded mozzarella, 2 tablespoons diced chicken, and 1 tablespoon pickled jalapeños. Place on a prepared baking sheet.
5: Bake the pita pizzas for 10 minutes, until the cheese is melted.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:sushi rice (2cups)、seasoned rice vinegar (¼cup)、sushi grade nori (4half sheets)
instructions:
0: Season the sushi rice with the rice vinegar, fanning and stirring until room temperature.
1: On the rolling mat place one sheet of nori with the rough side facing upwards.
2: In a small bowl, combine tuna filling ingredients. Set aside.
3: Wet your hands and grab a handful of rice and place it on the nori. Spread the rice evenly throughout the nori without smushing the rice down.
4: Arrange, in a horizontal row 1 inch (2.5 cm) from the bottom, a large spoonful of the tuna filling.
5: Grabbing both nori and the mat, roll the mat over the filling so the extra space at the bottom touches the other side, squeezing down to make a nice tight roll. Squeeze down along the way to keep the roll from holding its shape.
6: Transfer the roll onto a cutting board. Rub a knife on a damp paper towel before slicing the roll into six equal portions.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:medium zucchinis、spinach (2cups)、fresh basil leaves (1cup)、pine nuts (½cup)、shredded parmesan cheese (¼cup)、garlic (2cloves)、olive oil (¼cup)、lemon juice (2tablespoons)、salt、pepper、cherry tomatoes (1cup)、prosciutto (2slices)、lemon wedge
instructions:
0: Use a spiralizer to cut the zucchini into zoodles. Add the zoodles to a serving bowl and set aside.
1: Make the pesto: in a food processor or blender, add the spinach, basil, pine nuts, Parmesan, garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Blend to desired consistency, adding more olive oil as needed.
2: Scoop the pesto over the zucchini noodles, then add the cherry tomatoes and prosciutto. Toss until the zoodles are well-coated.
3: Sprinkle with Parmesan and garnish with basil and lemon wedges.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:vegetable oil、large, boneless, skinless chicken breast (1 ½lb)、fine sea salt (2teaspoons)、freshly ground black pepper (2teaspoons)、barbecue sauce (1 ½cups)、pretzel buns、coleslaw (2cups)
instructions:
0: Heat a grill over medium-high heat and clean and lightly oil the hot grates.
1: Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper and place on the grill. Grill the breast for 5 minutes, then flip, brush with some of the barbecue sauce, and continue to grill until cooked through, 5-7 minutes more.
2: Transfer the chicken to a plate and set aside to cool slightly.
3: Use 2 forks to shred the chicken, add to a bowl, and toss with the remaining barbecue sauce.
4: Serve on pretzel buns with coleslaw.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:vegetable broth (1cup)、apple cider vinegar (¼cup)、soy sauce (2tablespoons)、maple syrup (1teaspoon)、liquid smoke (½teaspoon)、mustard powder (2teaspoons)、paprika (1tablespoon)、ground coriander (½teaspoon)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、ground black pepper (1teaspoon)、carrots、olive oil (1tablespoon)、hot dog buns
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, combine the vegetable broth, apple cider, soy sauce, maple syrup, liquid smoke, mustard powder, paprika, ground coriander, garlic powder, and pepper.
1: Place the carrots into a baking dish and pour the marinade on top. Let marinate for at least 30 minutes.
2: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220˚C).
3: If baking, cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake for about 40 minutes. Remove the foil and bake for another 25 minutes, until the carrots are just tender enough to be poked with a knife.
4: If grilling, heat the olive oil on a grill pan on high heat. Add the marinated carrots to the pan and spoon a bit of the marinade over. Cook for about 2 minutes on each side, until slightly charred.
5: Place the carrots in buns and add your desired toppings.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butternut squash、white onion、olive oil、salt、pepper、nutmeg、vegetable broth (1cup)、almond milk (1cup)、garlic (2cloves)、red pepper flakes (1teaspoon)、dried sage (1teaspoon)、broccoli (1head)、whole wheat pasta (8oz)、grated parmesan cheese
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Add butternut squash and onion to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet, and season with olive oil, salt, pepper, and nutmeg.
2: Roast for 25-30 minutes, or until tender.
3: Add roasted squash and onion to a food processor or blender. Add vegetable broth, almond milk, and blend until smooth.
4: In a large sauce pot over medium heat, add olive oil, garlic, red pepper flakes, and sage. Cook for about 1 minute, or until fragrant. Add squash puree and bring to a simmer, stirring occasionally.
5: Add cooked pasta and steamed broccoli and stir to combine.
6: Top with Parmesan, and serve.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (¼cup)、garlic (2cloves)、small onion、tomato (56oz)、salt (2teaspoons)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、dried basil、bay leaf、fresh basil (¼cup)、pepper、sugar
instructions:
0: In a pot over medium heat, add the olive oil and garlic. Cook for about 2 minutes or until fragrant, but not browned.
1: Add the tomatoes with their juice, and crush with the back of a spoon.
2: Add the onion and salt, and stir occasionally. Bring to a boil, then reduce to a simmer for an hour.
3: Discard the garlic and onion, then puree to the desired consistency with a food mill or immersion blender.
4: Transfer the sauce back to a pot and add the bay leaf, dried oregano, and dried basil. Bring to a simmer for about 90 minutes or until the desired thickness.
5: Discard the bay leaf, add the fresh basil and, to taste, salt, pepper, and sugar.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、medium onion、celery (2stalks)、carrots、garlic (3cloves)、salt (2teaspoons)、green beans (1cup)、tomato sauce (3cups)、water (5cups)、kidney bean (16oz)、macaroni (1lb)、parmesan cheese、fresh basil
instructions:
0: In a heavy bottom pot, combine the olive oil, onion, celery, and carrots over medium heat. Cook until the carrots soften and the onions become slightly translucent.
1: Add the garlic and salt, and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
2: Add the green beans, sauce, and water, and bring to a boil.
3: Add the beans and macaroni and cook for about 9-10 minutes until the macaroni is al dente.
4: Serve warm with Parmesan and basil.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flank steak (1 ½lb)、McCormick® Taco Seasoning Mix packet、vegetable oil (2teaspoons)、large yellow onion、green bell pepper、red bell pepper、kosher salt、flour tortillas、shredded cheese、salsa、sliced avocado
instructions:
0: Make the tacos: Slice the steak into ¼-inch (6-millimeter) thick strips.
1: Add the steak to a medium bowl with the taco seasoning and toss to coat. Let marinate in the refrigerator for 1 hour.
2: Preheat a large 12-inch (30-centimeter) cast iron skillet over high heat. When the pan is hot, add the oil. Working in batches, cook the steak for about 2 minutes per side, or until the meat is browned and just cooked through. Remove from the pan and repeat with rest of meat.
3: To the same pan, add the onions and bell peppers, then reduce the heat to medium. Cook the vegetables until tender. Season with salt, then add the meat back to the pan and toss with the vegetables.
4: Serve the fajitas in the pan with tortillas, shredded cheese, salsa, and avocado alongside.
5: Make the next-day grain bowl: Reheat the leftover fajitas in a medium pan over medium-high heat until warmed through.
6: Divide the cooked quinoa between 2 bowls. Top with the fajitas, black beans, shredded cheese, avocado, and cilantro.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:salmon fillets、olive oil (¼cup)、salt、pepper、lemon、lemons、garlic (2cloves)、fresh rosemary (3sprigs)、fresh thyme (1sprig)、asparagus (1lb)
instructions:
0: In a resealable bag or dish, add salmon, olive oil, salt, pepper, juice of one lemon, minced garlic, one thyme sprig, and one rosemary sprig.
1: Seal, mix marinade around, being careful not to bruise the fish, and allow to marinate in the refrigerator for at least one hour.
2: Preheat only half of the grill to medium-high heat for indirect grilling.
3: Slice the two remaining lemons horizontally, so that you get six slices of lemon from each one, excluding the top and bottom.
4: Bend each piece of asparagus until the woody end snaps off and discard it.
5: Oil the grill with olive oil and place lemon slices over indirect heat (the side of the grill where the burners are not on).
6: Lay salmon on top of the lemon slices and top with a sprig of rosemary on each fillet. Close the cover and grill for 20 minutes.
7: Place the asparagus spears on the grill and brush with olive oil. Grill for 5 additional minutes.
8: Sprinkle with parsley and serve.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:oil (2tablespoons)、brown onion、garlics、ginger (2tablespoons)、curry powder (2tablespoons)、garlic granules (½teaspoon)、cumin (1teaspoon)、ground tumeric (½teaspoon)、red chili flakes (¼teaspoon)、himalayan sea salt (¼teaspoon)、black pepper (¼teaspoon)、lamb shoulder (1lb)、carrot (2cups)、canned diced tomato (1.5lb)、water (1cup)、spinach (2cups)、coconut milk (½cup)
instructions:
0: To make the naan dough, combine warm water, yeast, and honey. Set aside to bloom for 10 minutes.
1: Combine plain flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.
2: To the yeast mixture, add plain yogurt, and 25g melted butter, stir until smooth. Pour into the dry ingredients.
3: Stir to combine, then dump onto a floured surface, and knead until smooth (about 2-3 minutes).
4: Place dough in a clean large bowl, greased with oil, and cover with a clean kitchen towel. Let rise at room temperature until doubled in size, about 2 hours.
5: Make the curry: heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add onion, garlic and ginger, cooking for 3 minutes, or until softened.
6: Add curry powder, garlic granules, cumin, turmeric, red chilli flakes, sea salt, and black pepper.  Stir to combine.
7: Add the diced lamb, cook, stirring occasionally for 4-5 minutes, or until the lamb is browned.
8: Add sliced carrots, tinned tomatoes, and water. Reduce heat, and cover for 40 minutes.
9: Tip in spinach and coconut milk, stirring to combine.
10: Once the naan dough has risen, dump dough onto a floured surface. Divide into 4 equal portions. Roll each portion into a ¼ inch thickness (about 25cm circle).
11: Heat a large cast-iron skillet over medium high heat. Cook naan for 2-3 minutes, or until the dough puffs up. Flip, and cook for an additional minute. Transfer naan to a medium bowl, and place another bowl on top. Repeat with remaining dough, stacking bowls between each round. Let the naan cool in the bowls to retain their shape.
12: Mix remaining melted butter with turmeric and garlic granules, brush each naan bowl with melted butter.
13: Fill naan bowls with lamb curry, and top with fresh coriander and yogurt.
14: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pork shoulder (4lb)、cider (1cup)、salt (2teaspoons)、smoked paprika (2tablespoons)、dark muscovado sugar (2tablespoons)、pepper (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Mix together all of the spices and seasoning
1: Rub it onto the pork shoulder, make sure you get really stuck in there and all over the pork.
2: Place the pork shoulder into a slow cooker and gently pour over the cider.
3: Put the lid on and cook on low for 8-12 hours.
4: Move the pork into a large bowl and shred using two forks.
5: We used toasted brioche buns and coleslaw, but you could add some bbq sauce or whatever you feel like.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken stock (4cups)、whole milk (4cups)、butter (½cup)、salt (2teaspoons)、cornmeal (2cups)
instructions:
0: In a heavy pot, add the chicken stock, butter, and milk, and bring to a simmer over medium heat. Gradually add in the grits a little at a time, stirring until creamy. Remove from the heat.
1: Add oil to a large pan over medium-high heat.
2: Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the garlic and cook until aromatic, about 30 seconds.
3: Add in the red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, green bell pepper, red onion, and Scotch bonnet pepper, and cook until onions are translucent.
4: Add in the okra and cook for 1 minute.
5: Add in the diced tomatoes and juices, jerk spice, and chicken stock, and simmer on low heat for 10 minutes.
6: Season the stew with salt and sugar.
7: Place shrimp on top of the okra stew. After two minutes, flip the shrimp and cook for 1-2 minutes, until cooked through. Sprinkle the stew with chopped parsley.
8: Serve the shrimp stew over the grits.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:1 chuck roast (3lb)、kosher salt、freshly ground black pepper、olive oil (1tablespoon)、medium yellow onion, sliced、garlic (3cloves)、beef stock (4cups)、soy sauce (1tablespoon)、sprigs of fresh rosemary、French rolls、1/2 stick of unsalted butter (4tablespoons)
instructions:
0: On a cutting board, pat the chuck roast dry with paper towels. Season on all sides with salt and pepper.
1: Set the Instant Pot to sauté and add the olive oil. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the chuck roast and brown on all sides, about 5 minutes per side. Remove the chuck roast and set aside.
2: Add the onion to the Instant Pot and cook, stirring often, until softened and golden brown, about 3 minutes. Add the garlic and cook, stirring constantly, until aromatic, about 1 minute.
3: Add the beef broth and scrape up any brown bits on the bottom of the pot. Add the soy sauce and rosemary and place the chuck roast on top.  Place the lid on the Instant Pot and set to pressure cook on high for 1 hour. Let the pressure naturally release.
4: Transfer the chuck roast to a large bowl and shred with 2 forks.
5: Meanwhile, set the Instant Pot to sauteé. Remove the rosemary sprigs and cook until the sauce is reduced by half, about 15 minutes. Transfer the sauce to a bowl.
6: Slice the French rolls open and spread ½ tablespoon of butter over each side. Add ½ cup of beef to each sandwich.
7: Serve the sandwiches with the jus on the side for dipping.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:water、small onion、garlic (4cloves)、chickpeas (15.5oz)、whole wheat breadcrumbs (½cup)、fresh parsley (2teaspoons)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、egg
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
1: In a skillet over medium heat, add cooking oil or water and onions. Cook until onions are translucent, stirring occasionally.
2: Add the garlic and stir until fragrant. Transfer to a blender or food processor.
3: To the food processor, add the chickpeas, breadcrumbs, parsley, oregano, salt, pepper, red pepper flakes, and egg. Pulse until a dough forms.
4: Use your hands to form 1-inch (2-cm) balls from the chickpea mixture. Place in rows on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
5: Bake for 20 minutes, or until golden, flipping halfway.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:red potato (1 ½lb)、medium white onion、butter (½cup)、rosemary (2teaspoons)、thyme (1teaspoon)、salt、pepper、garlic (3cloves)、whole chicken (3 ½lb)、lemon、fresh thyme、fresh rosemary、green beans (¾lb)
instructions:
0: Slice the red potatoes in half.
1: Lay the potatoes and half of the onion in the bottom of the slow cooker.
2: Cut onion in half and save for later.
3: In a bowl, mix butter, rosemary, thyme, salt, pepper, and garlic until well-combined.
4: Stuff the chicken with the other half of the onion and lemon wedge.
5: Rub the herb butter mixture all over the outside of the chicken.
6: Place the chicken on top of the potatoes and onions in the slow cooker and place a sprig of thyme and rosemary on top. Cover and cook for 4 hours on high.
7: Remove the chicken from the slow cooker and place on a baking sheet. Remove the lemon and onion from inside the chicken.
8: Add the green beans to the slow cooker. Cover and cook for 20 minutes. Broil for 2-3 minutes or until the skin is golden brown. Let the chicken rest for 10 minutes before carving.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:eggplants、onion、garlic cloves、oil、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、fresh basil (¼cup)、fresh parsley (¼cup)、vegetarian parmesan cheese (½cup)、bread crumbs (1cup)、whole milk ricotta cheese (¼cup)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、egg、marinara sauce (14oz)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 375ºF (190ºC).
1: Combine eggplant, onion, garlic, oil, salt, pepper, and oregano on a baking sheet. Bake for 30 minutes, mixing halfway.
2: In the bowl of a food processor, combine eggplant mixture, basil, parsley, Parmesan, bread crumbs, ricotta, oregano, and egg, and blend until smooth.
3: Roll the mixture into golf ball-sized balls. Transfer to a cast iron pan spacing them about 2 inches apart from each other. Bake for 20 minutes.
4: On a baking sheet, cover spaghetti squash with oil, salt, and pepper, add to oven and bake for 40 minutes.
5: Remove meatballs, add marinara sauce, and return to oven for 10 minutes.
6: Remove spaghetti squash from the oven and with a fork pull at the edges to produce that stringy “spaghetti” quality.
7: On a plate combine spaghetti with meatballs and garnish with parmesan and basil.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (6tablespoons)、yellow onion (1cup)、cremini mushroom (10oz)、garlic (6cloves)、low sodium soy sauce (2tablespoons)、dried thyme (2teaspoons)、smoked paprika (2teaspoons)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、cayenne pepper (½teaspoon)、vegan worcestershire sauce (3teaspoons)、liquid smoke (1teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (¾teaspoon)、cannellini bean (15oz)、bread crumbs (¾cup)、vital wheat gluten (⅓cup)、vegetable broth (3 ½cups)、all purpose flour (3tablespoons)、celery (1stalk)、okra (2cups)、green bell pepper、tomato (1 ½cups)、red kidney bean (15oz)、brown rice、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: In a large pot, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add ½ cup (75g) diced onion and cook for 3-4 minutes, until semi-translucent.
1: Add the mushrooms and cook for 5 minutes, until most of the juices have evaporated.
2: Add 2 cloves of minced garlic, the soy sauce, 1 teaspoon thyme, 1 teaspoon paprika, ½ teaspoon oregano, ¼ teaspoon cayenne, 2 teaspoons vegan Worcestershire sauce, ½ teaspoon liquid smoke, ½ teaspoon salt,  and ¼ teaspoon pepper and cook for another 4-5 minutes, until all of the liquid has evaporated and the spices are fragrant.
3: Add the cannellini beans to a medium bowl and mash until mostly smooth (a few lumps are okay). Then, add the mushroom mixture, bread crumbs, vital wheat gluten, and 2 tablespoons vegetable broth and mix well until combined. Use your hands to knead the mixture until cohesive, then begin to roll about a tablespoon at a time of the mixture into “meatballs”.
4: In the same large pot, heat 3 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the meatballs and cook for about 5 minutes on each side, until golden brown. Remove the meatballs from the pot and set aside.
5: Add the remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil to the pot, along with the flour. Stir the roux continuously with a wooden spoon for about 3-4 minutes, until the consistency resembles wet sand.
6: Add the remaining ½ cup (75g) diced onion, the celery, and the okra to the pot and cook for 4-5 minutes, until the onion is semi-translucent.
7: Add the remaining 4 cloves of minced garlic and the green bell pepper and cook for another 3-4 minutes, until the garlic is fragrant.
8: Add the remaining teaspoon of vegan Worcestershire sauce, ½ teaspoon liquid smoke, 1 teaspoon thyme, ½ teaspoon oregano, 1 teaspoon paprika, ¼ teaspoon cayenne, and ½ teaspoon pepper and cook for 4 more minutes, until the spices are fragrant.
9: Add the crushed tomatoes and stir until combined. Then, add the red beans and add the remaining 3½ cups (840ml) vegetable broth and stir until well combined. Simmer on low heat for 30 minutes, stirring from time to time, until the gumbo has thickened.
10: Season with salt to taste. Then, add the meatballs and stir to incorporate.
11: Serve over rice and garnish with parsley.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:large eggs、large egg yolks、grated parmesan cheese (1cup)、grated pecorino romano (½cup)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、freshly ground black pepper (1teaspoon)、dried spathetti (16oz)、bacon (4oz)
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, whisk together the eggs, egg yolks, Parmesan, Pecorino Romano, salt, and pepper.
1: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil over high heat. Add the pasta and cook until al dente according to the package instructions. Reserve ½ cup of pasta water, then drain the pasta through a colander.
2: While the pasta is cooking, add the bacon to a large pan over medium-high heat and cook, stirring occasionally, until crispy, about 8 minutes. Remove the bacon from the pan and transfer to a paper towel-lined plate. Leave the rendered bacon fat in the pan.
3: Transfer the drained pasta to the pan with the bacon fat and toss with tongs for 1 minute, until fully coated. Remove the pan from the heat and let sit for 1 minute.
4: Add 2 tablespoons of the reserved pasta water to the egg mixture and whisk to combine, then carefully pour the mixture over the pasta, quickly tossing to coat. Add the reserved pasta water, 1 tablespoon at a time, as necessary until the sauce is creamy and has the consistency of heavy cream.
5: Add the bacon and toss to combine. Serve immediately topped with more freshly ground black pepper.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bread boule、marinara sauce (1cup)、fresh mozzarella cheese (8oz)、pepperoni (6oz)、onion、fresh basil (½cup)、sausage (1cup)、green bell pepper、white cheddar cheese (1cup)
instructions:
0: Slice the top of the bread boule off and remove the insides.
1: Spread ½ cup (130 G) of the marinara on the bottom of the boule, then layer with half of the mozzarella, 5 ounces (140 G) of the pepperoni, onions, basil, sausage, peppers, the other ½ cup (130 G) of marinara, the remaining mozzarella, and half of the white cheddar, and place the cap of the bread boule on top.
2: Wrap the bread bowl in foil, then press with a heavy object for 30 minutes.
3: Preheat oven to 350°F (175˚C).
4: Remove the foil and sprinkle the remaining cheddar and pepperoni on top. Bake for 30 minutes, until cheese is golden brown.
5: Cool for 10 minutes and slice.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、onion、garlic (2cloves)、spinach (5cups)、beef sirloin flap (2lb)、salt、pepper、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、paprika (1tablespoon)、monterey jack cheese (4slices)、flour (2cups)、eggs、panko bread crumbs (3cups)、oil
instructions:
0: In a large pan, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the onion, garlic, salt, and pepper. Stir until softened, 3-4 minutes.
1: Add the spinach and stir until wilted down. Remove the pan from the heat.
2: Season the steak on all sides with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and paprika. Lay a piece of parchment paper over the cubed steak. Using a meat mallet or rolling pin, pound the steak until ¼-inch (6-mm) in thickness.
3: Remove the parchment paper. Lay the slices on Monterey Jack evenly over the cube steak. Add the sauteed spinach mixture over the cheese.
4: Gently roll up the steak, making sure to keep it as tightly wrapped as possible. Place the steak log on a sheet of plastic wrap. Wrap the steak up, tightly securing each side.
5: Refrigerate the steak for 1 hour.
6: Place the flour, eggs, and panko in three separate shallow dishes.
7: Gently unwrap the steak roll from the plastic wrap. Dip it into the flour, dusting off any excess. Dip the steak roll into the eggs, into the panko, and then back into the eggs, and back into the panko.
8: Preheat oven to 325˚F (160˚C).
9: Fill a pot with tall sides with one inch (2 cm) of oil and heat to 350˚F (180˚C).
10: Gently place the steak roll into the oil, and fry until golden brown, about 2-3 minutes.
11: Gently turn the steak over with tongs, and fry until the other side is golden brown, about 2 minutes.
12: Transfer the steak roll to a baking sheet.
13: Bake for 25-30 minutes.
14: To a small pot on medium heat melt the butter, add garlic and the flour, mix the ingredients together until a loose paste forms and cook this mixture on low until it starts to darken just a bit, about 5 minutes.
15: Add in the milk, salt, nutmeg, pepper, and whisk until smooth. Let the gravy come to a simmer, then take off the heat.
16: Once the steak Rolls are finished. rest at room temperature for at least 10 minutes. Slice into four to six slices.
17: Serve with mashed potatoes, green beans, carrots, corn and peppercorn gravy.
18: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:yellow onion、pork loin、salt、pepper、garlic (3cloves)、BBQ sauce (2cups)、sweet potatoes、olive oil、shredded carrots (1cup)、purple cabbage、green onion
instructions:
0: Layer bottom of crock pot with onion and lay pork loin on top. Season with salt, pepper, and garlic. Top with BBQ sauce.
1: Cook on high for 4 hours or low for 8 hours.
2: "Pull apart” the pork loin using two forks. Cover and let sit and move on to sweet potatoes.
3: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
4: Using a fork, poke holes down one side of each sweet potato. Microwave for 3-5 minutes, or until softened. Let sweet potatoes cool before handling.
5: Next, cut sweet potatoes in half and carve out the centers with a spoon, leaving a  rim around the outside of each sweet potato.
6: Place sweet potatoes on a baking sheet covered in parchment paper, drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
7: Bake for 20 minutes.
8: Add shredded carrots and purple cabbage to the shredded pork and combine.
9: Fill sweet potatoes with pork, drizzle with BBQ sauce, and garnish with green onion.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:McCormick® Zesty Spice Blend (2tablespoons)、kosher salt (1tablespoon)、freshly ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、boneless, skinless chicken thighs (1lb)、vegetable oil (1tablespoon)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、medium yellow onion、medium red bell pepper、garlic (3cloves)、white long grain rice (2cups)、chicken stock (4cups)、lemon、fresh basil
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 375˚F (190˚C).
1: In a small bowl, combine 1 tablespoon of the Zesty spice blend, 1 teaspoon salt, and the pepper. Coat each piece of chicken evenly with seasoning blend. Set aside.
2: In a 6-quart Dutch oven, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Working in batches, sear the chicken for 2-3 minutes on each side, until a golden brown crust forms. Transfer the chicken to a plate and set aside.
3: Reduce the heat to medium. Add the butter, onion and garlic. Cook for 2 minutes, until the onion is translucent and fragrant.
4: Add the rice and remaining tablespoon of Zesty spice blend, bell pepper and stir to coat with the butter and aromatics. Pour in the stock and stir to deglaze the pot. Add the remaining 2 teaspoons of salt. Bring to a low boil and cook for about 2 minutes.
5: Arrange the chicken pieces on top of the rice. They may sink into the stock slightly, but that is okay.
6: Cover the Dutch oven and transfer to the oven. Bake for 35 minutes, until the rice is cooked through, but not mushy, and the chicken temperature reaches 165˚F (75˚C).
7: Remove the chicken from the pot. Squeeze the juice from a lemon half into the rice and fluff with a fork, allowing some steam to escape and halt additional cooking.
8: Transfer the rice and chicken to plates and top with fresh basil. Cut the remaining lemon half into wedges and serve on the side.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cauliflower (1large head)、unbleached all-purpose flour (1cup)、cornstarch (1tablespoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、cayenne pepper (½teaspoon)、white pepper (½teaspoon)、onion powder (½teaspoon)、garlic powder (½teaspoon)、sweet paprika (½teaspoon)、old bay seasoning (¼teaspoon)、nutritional yeast (1teaspoon)、hot sauce (⅓cup)、plain unsweetened soy milk (¼cup)、dijon mustard (1tablespoon)、safflower oil (5cups)
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, combine the flour, arrowroot powder, salt, cayenne, white pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, paprika, Old Bay seasoning, and nutritional yeast.
1: In another medium bowl, combine the hot sauce, soy milk, and Dijon mustard and whisk until creamy.
2: In a large Dutch oven or heavy pot, heat the oil to 350°F (180°C). Double-line a large plate with paper towels and keep nearby.
3: Use one hand to dip a cauliflower floret into the wet mixture, then drop it into the flour mixture. Use your dry hand to coat it completely. Dip it back into the wet mixture and again in the dry mixture, keeping one hand devoted to wet and one to dry.
4: Carefully lower the twice-coated floret into the hot oil. Repeat with the remaining cauliflower until you can’t fit any more into the pot. Do not overcrowd. Fry for 4-5 minutes, until the pieces are golden. Transfer the fried cauliflower to the lined plate and continue to fry the remaining cauliflower. Serve hot.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray、unsalted butter (6tablespoons)、milk (1 ½cups)、white vinegar (1tablespoon)、sugar (1tablespoon)、large egg、all-purpose flour (1cup)、cornmeal (1cup)、baking soda (1teaspoon)、baking powder (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (1 ½teaspoons)、paprika (½teaspoon)、kosher salt (1 ½teaspoons)、freshly ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、shredded cheddar cheese (1cup)、chili (2cups)、sour cream、green onion
instructions:
0: Grease a waffle iron with melted butter or nonstick spray. Set the heat to medium.
1: In a large bowl, whisk together the melted butter, milk, vinegar, sugar, and egg. Add the flour, cornmeal, baking soda, baking powder, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper and whisk to incorporate. Fold in the cheddar cheese with a rubber spatula.
2: Pour 1 scant cup (260 G) of batter onto the waffle iron and cook until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Repeat with the remaining batter.
3: Serve the waffles warm and topped with chili, more cheddar cheese, sour cream, and green onions.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
