1: Evenly coat the tri tip with the dry rub and let rest at room temperature for 30 minutes.
2: In a small saucepan, bring glaze ingredients to a low boil over medium heat. Simmer for 3 minutes, stirring frequently.
3: Heat a charcoal or gas grill to the medium heat.
4: Grill steak for 4-5 minutes over direct heat, then flip and grill until internal temperature reaches 125°F (52°C) on a meat thermometer.
5: Brush the steak with the brown sugar glaze, then flip the steak and repeat, about 1 minute per side. Do this until you’ve used up about half the glaze then remove meat from the grill.
6: Let the steak rest for 10 minutes, then slice into ½-inch (1 cm) strips against the grain.
7: Serve with remaining glaze on the side for drizzling or dipping.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、salt、pepper、snap peas、medium carrot、sesame oil (1teaspoon)、garlic (4cloves)、fresh ginger (1tablespoon)、chicken stock (2cups)、sugar (¼cup)、chili flakes (1teaspoon)、rice vinegar (1tablespoon)、dark soy sauce (1tablespoon)、tomato paste (1tablespoon)、cornstarch (2teaspoons)、canola oil (5cups)、corn starch (1cup)、white rice、sesame seeds (1tablespoon)、scallions (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Place a chicken breast between 2 sheets of plastic wrap. Pound evenly to about ¼-inch (½ cm) thick, then season both sides with salt and pepper.
1: Place 4 snap peas and a few carrot slices at the bottom edge of the chicken, then roll up tightly and wrap in plastic wrap. Repeat with the remaining chicken and vegetables.
2: Chill the chicken rolls in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
3: Heat the sesame oil in a medium saucepan over high heat. Add the garlic and ginger and cook until they are toasty.
4: Add the chicken stock, sugar, chile flakes, rice vinegar, soy sauce, tomato paste, and cornstarch slurry and whisk to combine.
5: Cook until the sauce coats the back of a spoon and leaves a path when you run your finger through it. Remove from the heat and set aside.
6: Heat the oil in a large pot until it reaches 350°F (180°C).
7: Unwrap the chicken, then roll in the cornstarch until evenly coated.
8: Fry two chicken rolls at a time for 5 minutes on each side, or until golden brown and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C).
9: Transfer the chicken to a wire rack to drain. If the chicken is not cooked through by the time it is golden brown on the outside, bake in the oven at 325°F (170°C) until that temperature is reached.
10: Slice the chicken rolls and serve with rice alongside. Pour the sauce over the chicken and sprinkle with sesame seeds and scallions for garnish.
11: Nutrition  Calories: 3534 Fat: 359 grams  Carbs: 68 grams Fiber:  3 grams  Sugars: 17 grams  Protein: 19 grams
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pork loin、olive oil (2tablespoons)、kosher salt (1tablespoon)、McCormick® Hearty Spice Blend (3tablespoons)、brussels sprouts (3cups)、butternut squash (3cups)、large red onion
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
1: Using a sharp knife, score the fat cap of the pork loin in a crosshatch pattern. Do not cut through to the meat.
2: Using your hands, rub 2 tablespoon olive oil all over the pork. Liberally season all over with 1 tablespoon salt, plus more as needed. Rub 2 tablespoons of the McCormick® Savoury Spice Blend all over the pork.
3: Transfer the pork to a 9 x 13-inch (22 x 33 cm) baking sheet. Roast for 10 minutes, until the fat is beginning to render and brown.
4: Meanwhile in a large bowl add the Brussels sprouts, butternut squash, and red onion, 2 tablespoons olive oil, and 1 tablespoon McCormick® Savoury Spice Blend and toss to coat.
5: Remove the pork from the oven. Reduce the oven temperature to 375°F (190°C).
6: Evenly spread the vegetables on the baking sheet, turning the Brussels sprouts cut-side down. Clear a space in the center of the pan, then return the pork to the pan. It is okay if some of the vegetables are underneath the pork.
7: Return to the oven and cook for 35–50 minutes, depending on the size of the pork loin, until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C).
8: Remove from the oven and let rest for 10–15 minutes before carving the pork and serving with the vegetables.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:dry corn husk (1bag)、hot water
instructions:
0: Place the dry corn husks in a baking dish. Pour hot water over the husks to cover. Weigh the husks down so they are completely submerged and let soak for 2 hours, or until pliable.
1: Add the tomatoes, onion, guajillos, pasillas, garlic, and 4 cups (960 ml) of water to a small pot. Cover, bring to a boil, and cook for 10 minutes, or until the vegetables have softened.
2: Transfer the vegetables to a blender, Add salt and pepper to taste, the cumin, and about ½ cup (60 ml) of the cooking liquid. Blend until smooth. Set aside.
3: Heat the canola oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the pork and season with salt and pepper. Fry the pork until well-browned and most of the fat has evaporated. Drain any excess fat, if necessary.
4: Add the sauce to the pan with the pork, bring to a boil, cover, and let simmer until tender, about 1 hour. Remove from the heat and let cool.
5: In a small bowl, combine the baking soda, baking powder, and 1 tablespoon water. Stir to dissolve, then set aside.
6: Add the lard to a large bowl. With an electric hand mixer, whip the lard until light and fluffy, about 5 minutes.
7: Add the masa and baking soda mixture and mix with your hands until smooth, about 5 minutes. It should be spreadable but still hold its shape.
8: Drain the soaked corn husks.
9: Place 1 husk on a clean surface and add 1-2 tablespoons of masa to the center of the husk. Spread with the back of the spoon to about ¼ inch (¾ cm) from the edges.
10: Place 1 tablespoon of meat in the center. Roll the corn husk over the filling from left to right and fold the top down to create a little pocket. Set aside. Repeat with the remaining ingredients.
11: Place the tamales, open ends up, in a steamer basket set over a large pot of boiling water. Cover with a clean kitchen towel and the lid. Let steam for 1 hour, then turn off the heat and let the tamales rest for 1 hour more.
12: Unwrap the tamales and serve with salsa verde.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:jalapeñoes、whipped cream cheese (6tablespoons)、bacon (3slices)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
1: Make the jalapeño poppers: Halve the jalapeños lengthwise and use a spoon to scrape out the seeds and ribs. Fill each jalapeño half with 1 tablespoon of cream cheese. Wrap a halved bacon strip around each stuffed jalapeño half.
2: To make a tray for the jalapeño poppers, take a piece of aluminum foil and fold in 2 inches of each short side. Dog-ear the corners and fold up to lift the remaining sides. The tray should fill ¼ of the baking sheet. Arrange the jalapeño poppers in the tray.
3: Make the pizza: Grease the empty half of the baking sheet with nonstick spray.
4: Unroll the pizza dough and place on the greased half of the pan. Spread the sauce evenly across the dough, then sprinkle with the cheese and top with the pepperoni and sliced jalapeño.
5: Make the s’mores pie: Unfold the thawed puff pastry on a lightly floured surface. Gently roll out to remove any creases. Cut out a 6x8-inch rectangle, reserving the excess pastry for another use. Using a sharp knife, gently score a ½-inch border all the way around the pastry rectangle, being careful to not cut all the way through. Prick holes in the center of the pastry with a fork. Transfer the pastry to the remaining quarter of the baking sheet.
6: Spread the chocolate-hazelnut spread evenly over the inner rectangle of the pastry, then top with half of the marshmallows and graham crackers.
7: In a small bowl, whisk together the egg and water. Brush the egg wash over the pastry border.
8: Transfer the pan to the oven and bake for 20–25 minutes, until the pizza dough is cooked through and bacon is crispy.
9: Remove the pan from the oven. Garnish the pizza with the basil leaves. Top the s’mores pie with the remaining marshmallows and graham crackers, then drizzle with the melted chocolate.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray、pizza dough (2lb)、marinara sauce (1cup)、shredded mozzarella cheese (2cups)
instructions:
0: Grease a baking sheet with nonstick spray and lay out half of the pizza dough on the pan, stretching it to make sure the dough reaches the edges.
1: Pour the marinara sauce over the dough and spread evenly with a spoon, leaving about an inch (2 cm) at the edges.
2: Top evenly with the mozzarella.
3: On the first vertical quarter of the pan, sprinkle the cheddar and Parmesan.
4: On the second quarter, add the pepperoni and sausage.
5: In the third quarter, add the bell peppers, mushrooms, and olives.
6: On the last quarter, add the ham and pineapple.
7: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
8: Place the remaining dough over the topped pizza. Fold the bottom edge of dough over the top edge and pinch to seal the edges.
9: Brush the top with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.
10: Use a paring knife to cut 2 vents on top of the pizza.
11: Bake for 40 minutes, or until golden brown.
12: Slice and serve.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、small yellow onion、garlic (2cloves)、ground beef (1lb)、salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (1teaspoon)、fresh spinach (2cups)、large russet potatoes、large egg、onion powder (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、shredded parmesan cheese (½cup)、shredded cheddar cheese (½cup)、marinara sauce、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: In a large pan over medium heat, heat the olive oil until shimmering, then add the onion.
1: Sauté the onion until golden and translucent, about 5 minutes.
2: Add the garlic, ground beef, 1 teaspoon of salt, and ½ teaspoon of pepper. Break down with a spatula and cook until brown and cooked through.
3: Add the spinach and stir until wilted. Remove the pan from the heat and set aside.
4: Peel the potatoes and grate.
5: Place the shredded potatoes in a kitchen towel over a bowl and wring out the water.
6: In another large bowl, add the shredded potato, egg, remaining teaspoon of salt, remaining ½ teaspoon of pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, and Parmesan cheese. Mix until combined.
7: Line a small bowl with plastic wrap.
8: Place 1 cup (250 g) of the potato mixture in the bowl and use a spoon to spread the potatoes around the sides of the bowl.
9: Sprinkle cheddar cheese on top of the potatoes and add a large spoonful of the beef mixture, being careful not to overfill.
10: Pick up the sides of the plastic wrap and close the potatoes, twisting to create a sealed ball.
11: Chill for 30 minutes.
12: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
13: Place the potato balls on a greased baking sheet and bake for 35-40 minutes, or until the potatoes are crispy and brown.
14: Serve topped with marinara sauce and parsley.
15: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground beef (1lb)、salt (1teaspoon)、pepper (1teaspoon)、oil (1tablespoon)、hamburger buns
instructions:
0: Mix together the patty ingredients until evenly combined.
1: Form the beef into a round patty.
2: Repeat with the remaining beef.
3: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat.
4: Cook the burgers for 3 minutes on the first side, flip, and place the slice of comté on top.
5: Cook for 6 more minutes.
6: Assemble the burgers on the buns with caramelized onions and arugula.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:butter crackers、egg、unsalted butter (3tablespoons)、russet potatoes、unsalted butter (1tablespoon)、sour cream (1 ¼cups)、milk (½cup)、salt (1 ½teaspoons)、pepper (1teaspoon)、shredded cheddar cheese (2cups)、bacon (11strips)、green onion (½cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Place butter crackers in a food processor and blend until they are a fine, sandy texture. Transfer to a small mixing bowl.
2: Add egg and melted butter to the crumbled crackers. Stir until crumbs become a clumpy, wet sand texture. Place the cracker mixture in the base of a 9-inch (23-inch) pie dish to create the crust.
3: Use a measuring cup to smooth the surface. Once the surface is smooth, use a fork to prick the base and sides of the crust.
4: Bake for 10 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool for 10 minutes.
5: Mash russet potatoes in a large mixing bowl. Once thoroughly mashed, add butter, ¼ cup(60 gram) sour cream, milk, salt and pepper and mix together with large spoon or spatula.
6: Spread half of the mashed potatoes over the cooled cracker crust, about ¼-inch in thickness.
7: Cover mashed potatoes with a layer of cheddar cheese, making sure to save some for the top.
8: Spread the other half of mashed potatoes over the cheese layer. Sprinkle bacon bits and remaining cheese over the top.
9: Bake for 20 minutes.
10: Serve with sour cream and green onions.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:quinoa (2 ½cups)、water (2 ½cups)、baking powder (1tablespoon)、garlic powder (1tablespoon)、salt (2teaspoons)、grated parmesan cheese (¼cup)、nonstick cooking spray、pizza sauce (1cup)、shredded mozzarella cheese (2cups)
instructions:
0: Place the quinoa in a medium bowl. Add enough water to cover the quinoa, about 1½ cups (360 ml).
1: Cover with plastic wrap and soak, at room temperature, for at least 8 hours, or overnight.
2: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and lightly grease it with nonstick cooking spray.
3: Drain and rinse the quinoa.
4: Add the quinoa, 1 cup (240 ml) of water, the baking powder, garlic powder, salt, and Parmesan cheese to a food processor. Blend for about 2 minutes, or until a smooth batter forms.
5: Pour the batter onto the baking sheet, using a spatula to spread evenly.
6: Bake the crust for 15 minutes. Flip the crust, removing the parchment paper, and bake for 10 minutes more, or until golden brown.
7: Top the crust with the pizza sauce and mozzarella cheese, then add your favorite toppings.
8: Return the pizza to the oven and bake for another 5-10 minutes, or until cheese bubbling and slightly brown.
9: Cut pizza into squares and serve.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bread crumbs (½cup)、shredded pecorino romano cheese (1cup)、fresh basil (½cup)、shredded provolone cheese (⅓cup)、fresh italian parsley (½cup)、garlic (8cloves)、kosher salt、freshly ground black pepper、olive oil (¼cup)、flank steak (1lb)、canola oil (2tablespoons)、butter (1tablespoon)、medium carrot、small onion、celery (1stalk)、dry white wine (1cup)、crushed tomato (28oz)、dried bay leaves、dried oregano (1tablespoon)、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、orecchiette pasta (1lb)、fresh basil (¼cup)
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, combine the bread crumbs, pecorino Romano, ½ cup (20 g) chopped basil, provolone, parsley, 5 minced cloves of garlic, salt, pepper, and the olive oil. Stir and set aside.
1: Lay the flank steak on a cutting board. Season both sides with salt and pepper. Cover the the meat with a sheet of parchment paper. Using a meat mallet or rolling pin, pound the steak until it’s ¼ inch (6 mm) thick.
2: Remove the parchment and sprinkle the bread crumb mixture evenly over the steak.
3: Starting from the bottom, roll the meat into a log. Using butcher’s twine, tie up the roll so it holds its shape while cooking. Season with salt and pepper.
4: Heat the canola oil in a large Dutch oven over high heat. When the oil is shimmering, add the steak roll and, without moving it, cook until a dark brown crust forms on one side, about 3 minutes. Turn the roll and repeat until all sides and the ends have been seared. Remove the roll from the pan and set aside.
5: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
6: Add the butter, carrot, onion, celery, remaining 3 cloves of garlic, salt, and pepper to the pan and cook until caramelized, about 5 minutes.
7: Add the white wine and stir to loosen any brown bits from the bottom of the pot. Cook until the wine reduces and the pan is slightly dry again.
8: Add the tomatoes, bay leaves, oregano, and red pepper flakes. Stir to combine.
9: Return the beef roll to the pot. Cover and bake for 1 hour, flipping the roll halfway through (if the sauce is drying up too much, add more crushed tomatoes or water), until the beef is tender.
10: Slice the braciole and arrange on a serving platter with the sauce. Serve the braciole with orecchiette or polenta. Garnish with grated pecorino Romano and fresh basil.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:diced pineapple (20oz)、rice vinegar (1cup)、vegetable oil (1cup)、soy sauce (2tablespoons)、fresh ginger (¼cup)、ketchup (1cup)、honey (2tablespoons)、garlic (5cloves)、cornstarch (2tablespoons)、baby back ribs (3 ½lb)、salt (1tablespoon)、pepper (1tablespoon)、red bell peppers、green bell peppers、sesame seeds (2teaspoons)、fresh scallions (2tablespoons)、white rice
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 275°F (140°C).
1: Strain the pineapple juice from the can of pineapples into a large saucepan and reserve the fruit for later. Add the rice vinegar, vegetable oil, soy sauce, ginger, ketchup, honey, garlic, and cornstarch. Whisk to combine and cook over high heat for 10 minutes, or until the glaze is reduced by half and has the consistency of honey. Remove from the heat and divide the glaze in half.
2: Place the baby back ribs on a baking sheet and season with salt and pepper on both sides.
3: Brush half of the glaze all over the ribs.
4: Cover the ribs with aluminum foil, wrapping tightly.
5: Bake for 2 hours, or until the ribs are tender. Remove the ribs from the oven and increase the oven temperature to 400°F (200°C).
6: Remove the top piece of foil and add the red and green bell peppers to the baking sheet. Pour the reserved glaze over the top and toss to coat the peppers. Add the reserved pineapple over the ribs.
7: Bake for 20 minutes, until the peppers are softened.
8: Slice the ribs and garnish with sesame seeds and scallions. Serve warm with rice alongside.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:cauliflower (1head)、flank steak (¾lb)、broccoli floret (2cups)、salt (1teaspoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、soy sauce (2tablespoons)、brown sugar (2tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Remove all leaves and cut the cauliflower into small florets.
1: Place the florets in a food processor and blend until they are a rice-like texture. Be careful not to over process or it may turn mushy. Set aside, and drain excess moisture with a towel, if desired.
2: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, cook the steak until no pink is showing. Add the broccoli, salt, pepper, soy sauce, and brown sugar.
3: Cook for 4-5 minutes until most of the liquid has reduced.
4: Add the cauliflower rice, then cook for about 3-4 more minutes.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken thighs、oil、spring mix green (10oz)、roma tomatoes、large cucumber、red onion
instructions:
0: In a medium bowl, combine all the buttermilk marinade ingredients. Toss in chicken thighs and marinate for at least one hour in the refrigerator.
1: In a small bowl, combine all the ingredients for dill dressing. Cover and let sit for at least an hour in the refrigerator.
2: In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients for seasoned flour.
3: Dip chicken in flour until chicken is completely covered. Repeat for all chicken thighs.
4: Heat the oil to 350˚F (180˚C) in a deep pot. Do not fill more than ½ full with oil.
5: Carefully fry chicken for roughly 7 minutes, or until cooked through (internal temperature reaches 165˚F (75˚C)) golden brown and crispy. Drain on a paper towel.
6: Layer a couple handfuls of spring mix greens on a plate. Add sliced tomatoes, cucumbers, and red onions. Top with fried chicken. Spoon the dill dressing on top of the salad.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:yellow squashes、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、pepper (2teaspoons)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、onion powder (1teaspoon)、dried oregano (2teaspoons)、olive oil (1teaspoon)、white onion、garlic (4cloves)、ground chicken (1lb)、dried thyme (1teaspoon)、crushed tomato (28oz)、ricotta cheese (1cup)、grated parmesan cheese (1cup)、large eggs、nonstick cooking spray、fresh mozzarella cheese (16oz)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C).
1: Use a vegetable peeler to peel the yellow squash into ribbons. Add the squash to a large bowl.
2: Add 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, the garlic powder, onion powder, and 1 teaspoon oregano, and toss well until the squash is coated. Set aside.
3: Heat the olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook for 5 minutes, until fragrant.
4: Add the ground chicken, the remaining teaspoon salt, remaining teaspoon pepper, remaining teaspoon oregano, and the thyme, and cook until chicken is lightly golden brown.
5: Add the crushed tomatoes, stirring to break up, and cook for 15 minutes, or until the sauce has reduced. Remove from the heat and set aside.
6: In a medium bowl, combine the ricotta, Parmesan, and eggs and whisk until smooth.
7: Grease a 9x13-inch (22x33 cm) casserole dish with cooking spray.
8: Spread about ¼ of the ground chicken and tomato mixture in the bottom of the dish. Top with about ¼ of the squash noodles and ⅓ of the cheese mixture. Repeat with the remaining ingredients, finishing with a layer of noodles
9: Top with the fresh mozzarella cheese.
10: Bake for 30 minutes, or until the cheese is browned and melted.
11: Serve warm.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:canola oil (2qt)、shrimps、large egg whites、soy sauce (1tablespoon)、rice wine vinegar (1tablespoon)、toasted sesame oil (1teaspoon)、granulated sugar (1teaspoon)、sambal (1 ½teaspoons)、garlic (½teaspoon)、fresh ginger (½teaspoon)、kosher salt (½teaspoon)、scallions、white bread (4slices)、white sesame seeds (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat until it reaches 350°F (180°C). Set a wire rack inside a baking sheet and place nearby.
1: In a food processor, combine the shrimp, egg whites, soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, sambal, garlic, ginger, salt, and scallion whites and pulse until smooth.
2: Trim the crusts off the bread, then cut diagonally into triangles.
3: Spread 2 tablespoons of the shrimp paste evenly over each triangle of bread. Sprinkle the sesame seeds over the shrimp paste.
4: Add the shrimp toasts, 3 at a time, to the hot oil, shrimp side down. Fry until the shrimp turns pink and the sesame seeds are light golden brown, about 2 minutes. Flip the toast over and fry on the other side until the bread is golden, about 1 minute. Transfer to the wire rack and let drain for 1 minute.
5: Garnish the shrimp toast with the scallion greens and serve with soy sauce for dipping.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:dried shiitake mushroom (2cups)、filtered water (2qt)
instructions:
0: Blend dried shiitake in blender until it becomes a fine powder.
1: Pour into a pot filled with filtered water, bring to a boil, then lower the heat and simmer for 20 minutes. Keep broth warm while preparing the risotto.
2: Sauté oyster mushrooms in grapeseed oil until brown edges have formed.
3: Add thyme, garlic, and 1 tablespoon of butter to help caramelize. Once they have caramelized, salt, to taste, and reserve.
4: Sweat the shallots in olive oil until tender, about 5 minutes, then add butter and sushi rice. Toast rice while stirring frequently.
5: Add bay leaf, garlic clove, and pour white wine over toasted rice and cook until the wine has been absorbed, then continue stirring.
6: Over medium heat, add 2 cups (470 ml) of warm mushroom stock at a time, stirring occasionally and adding more stock as it gets absorbed by the rice. The rice should absorb 6-8 cups (1.4-1.9 liters) of stock. Taste the rice throughout to make sure it cooks just until it is tender, or al dente.
7: Add frozen peas and stir. Salt the risotto, to taste, and remove the garlic clove and bay leaf.
8: Add ¼ cup (60g) butter, truffle oil, rayu oil, sautéed mushrooms (optional: save some for garnish), pine nuts, and Parmesan. Stir until well incorporated.
9: Garnish with reserved mushrooms, pine nuts, wood sorrel, Parmesan, and drizzle with olive oil.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:dried penne pasta (½lb)、bacon (4strips)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、large shallot、red pepper flakes (½teaspoon)、garlic (4cloves)、vodka (3tablespoons)、crushed san marzano tomato (1can)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、freshly ground black pepper (1teaspoon)、heavy cream (½cup)、butter (1tablespoon)、grated parmesan cheese (½cup)
instructions:
0: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the penne and cook according to the package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of the pasta water, then drain the pasta and rinse under cold water.
1: Heat a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add the bacon and cook until the edges are crisp, 2–3 minutes. If bacon is not particularly fatty, add 1 tablespoon of butter and stir until melted. Add the shallot and cook until softened, 3–4 minutes. Add the garlic and red pepper flakes and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
2: Add the vodka and cook until almost completely evaporated, 1–2 minutes. Add the crushed tomatoes, pepper, and salt. Bring to a simmer, then cook for 4 minutes, or until the sauce the mixture comes to a low boil. Add the cream, reduce the heat to low, and simmer for 5 minutes, until the sauce has thickened.
3: Add the penne and remaining tablespoon of butter and stir until well coated in the sauce. If the sauce is too thick, add a splash of the reserved pasta water.
4: Remove the pan from the heat. Add the Parmesan and Romano cheeses and stir until incorporated.
5: Transfer the pasta to a serving dish and top with torn burrata, a drizzle of olive oil, pepper, and basil.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:kosher salt (2teaspoons)、ground black pepper (1teaspoon)、ground cumin (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、chili powder (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C) and line two baking sheets with parchment paper.
1: Make the DIY taco seasoning: Mix the salt, pepper, cumin, garlic powder, and chili powder together in a small bowl.
2: Add the flank steak to a baking sheet. Drizzle with 2 teaspoons of olive oil and rub to coat, then sprinkle with 2 teaspoons of the taco seasoning and rub to coat evenly. To the other baking sheet, add the green bell pepper, mushrooms, red bell pepper, red onion, and broccoli. Drizzle with 1 tablespoon of olive oil and sprinkle with 2 teaspoons of taco seasoning. Toss to coat.
3: Wrap the tortillas in foil, add to the baking sheet with veggies, and bake until the vegetables are browned and the steak is cooked to your liking, about 20 minutes.  Let rest for 5 minutes, then thinly slice the steak against the grain.
4: Make the lime crema: combine the Greek yogurt, lime juice, and zest in a small bowl.  Season with salt.
5: Serve the roasted steak and vegetables with the lime crema and your family's favorite toppings to create a DIY taco bar.
6: Note: Feel free to serve with your family’s favorite toppings to create a taco bar that’ll make everyone happy.
7: *Vegan/Vegetarian Substitution: Omit the steak and serve with 1 cup black beans for added protein.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:thai eggplants、chicken breast (6oz)、vegetable oil (1tablespoon)、coconut milk (1can)、green curry paste (2tablespoons)、fish sauce (3tablespoons)、granulated sugar (3tablespoons)、bamboo shoot strip (2oz)、kaffir lime leaves、red bell pepper (2oz)、coconut milk (1can)、fresh thai sweet basil (1cup)、white rice
instructions:
0: Cut the tops and bottoms off the eggplant and cut into quarters.
1: Thinly slice the chicken breast crosswise. Set aside.
2: Prepare the green curry paste. In a large skillet over medium heat, toast the cumin seeds and coriander seeds until golden and fragrant, about 2-3 minutes. Transfer to a pestle or bowl.
3: Add the salt and pound with a mortar until the spices are broken up. Continue pounding as you add the white peppercorns, lemongrass, kaffir lime peel, galangal, garlic, Thai green chilis, cilantro stems, Thai basil, kaffir leaves, shallots, and shrimp paste, until a coarse paste forms.
4: Heat a medium skillet over medium heat. Add vegetable oil, 2 tablespoons of green curry paste, and 3 tablespoons of basil oil (if using).
5: Add a splash of the coconut milk, stirring until it forms a paste.
6: Add the sliced chicken breast, the rest of the coconut milk, and the eggplant.
7: Season with the fish sauce and sugar. Increase the heat to medium high and bring to a boil. Once boiling, cook for 2-3 minutes.
8: Stir in the bamboo shoots, kaffir leaves, and red bell pepper, cooking for 3-4 minutes until bell peppers have slightly softened.
9: Add the Thai basil. Remove the curry from the heat and serve with white rice.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:dried elbow macaroni (1lb)、water (4cups)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、unsalted butter (3tablespoons)、shredded cheddar cheese (4cups)、whole milk (¼cup)、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Add the macaroni, water, and salt to the Instant Pot and stir to combine. Close the lid and set to pressure cook on high for 4 minutes. Once the timer goes off, set the Instant Pot to quick release.
1: Remove the lid, add the butter, and stir until melted. Add the cheddar cheese, then the milk, 1 tablespoon at a time, and stir until melted and creamy.
2: Garnish with parsley, if desired, and serve.
3: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:fish、salt and vinegar crisps (4 ½cups)、flour (¾cup)、baking soda (2teaspoons)、salt、beer (1cup)
instructions:
0: Combine 50g (1½ cups) of crushed up salt and vinegar crisps with flour, baking soda, beer, and some salt. Mix together.
1: Dip fish into batter and then coat in more crushed crisps.
2: Fry in oil.
3: Serve with your favorite dipping sauce.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:kosher salt (½teaspoon)、dried linguine (1box)、unsalted butter (½stick)、medium garlic cloves、heavy cream (1cup)、freshly ground black pepper (¼teaspoon)、grated parmesan cheese (2cups)、fresh parsley (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil over high heat. Cook the linguine according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve ¼ cup of pasta water, then drain the pasta in a colander.
1: Melt the butter in a large saucepan over medium-low heat. Add the garlic and cook, stirring often, until aromatic, about 30 seconds.
2: Add the heavy cream and simmer for 2 minutes. Add ½ teaspoon of salt, the pepper, and Parmesan and stir until the cheese has melted.
3: Add the drained pasta and 1 tablespoon of reserved pasta water to the alfredo sauce and use tongs to toss until well coated, about 1 minute. If the sauce is too thick, add more pasta water, 1 tablespoon at a time.
4: Remove the pan from the heat, top with parsley, and serve immediately.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:boneless, skinless chicken breast (1lb)、all-purpose flour (½cup)、large eggs、bread crumbs (2cups)、fresh flat-leaf parsley (2tablespoons)、garlic (1clove)、milk (2tablespoons)、kosher salt、black pepper、grated parmesan cheese (½cup)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、olive oil、lemon wedge
instructions:
0: Slice the chicken breast in half lengthwise to create thinner cutlets. Using the bumpy side of a meat mallet, pound the chicken until ¼-inch (6 mm) thick.
1: Add the flour, eggs, and bread crumbs to 3 separate, shallow dishes.
2: To the dish with the eggs, add the parsley, garlic, and milk. Season with salt and pepper. Mix with a fork to combine.
3: Add the Parmesan cheese to the bread crumbs and stir to combine.
4: Working 1 piece at a time, coat the chicken cutlets in the flour, shaking off any excess, then the egg mixture, then the bread crumbs. Set the coated chicken on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and refrigerate for 1 hour.
5: Melt the butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add enough olive oil to come ¼ inch (6 mm) up the sides of the pan. Working in batches, fry the chicken until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes per side. Add more oil as needed for subsequent batches. Drain the chicken on paper towels to absorb any excess oil. Season with a pinch of salt.
6: Serve the chicken with lemon wedges. The dish pairs well with pan-roasted potatoes and tomato salad.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:pinto bean (¾cup)、garlic (2cloves)、soy sauce (3tablespoons)、olive oil (2tablespoons)、vital wheat gluten (2cups)、nutritional yeast (⅓cup)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、onion powder (1teaspoon)、dried sage (1teaspoon)、dried rosemary (½teaspoon)、dried thyme (1teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、vegetable broth (1 ½cups)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
1: In food processor, combine pinto beans, garlic, soy sauce, and olive oil. Process until smooth.
2: In medium-sized mixing bowl, combine vital wheat gluten, nutritional yeast, garlic powder, onion powder, sage, rosemary, thyme, and pepper. Add in bean mixture and stir until combined.
3: Make a well in the the mixture and pour in vegetable broth. Mix until dough gets thick.
4: Once thick enough, use your hands to knead dough.
5: Form dough into log, approximately 10 inches (25 cm) long and 5 inches (13 cm) thick. Roll up log in parchment paper, then in aluminum foil.
6: Bake for 1 hour, flipping roast every 20 minutes.
7: Remove from oven and let rest for 10 minutes before slicing.
8: Serve with vegetarian gravy.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:yellow potatoes、medium carrot、onion、cashews (½cup)、salt (1teaspoon)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、onion powder (1teaspoon)、nutritional yeast (2tablespoons)、macaroni (16oz)、green pea (2cups)、paprika
instructions:
0: Add potatoes, carrot, and onion to a large pot or Dutch oven of boiling water. Cover and allow the vegetables to cook for 10 minutes, until the potatoes are fork-tender.
1: Remove boiled vegetables from water and reserve 1½ - 2 cups (355 - 470 ml) of the water.
2: Add potatoes, carrot, onion, cashews, and seasonings to a blender with half of the reserved water. Blend, adding a few tablespoons of water at a time until the desired consistency is achieved.
3: Pour vegetable puree over the macaroni and stir in green peas before serving.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken breasts、ball of mozzarella (5 ¼oz)、sun-dried tomato (½jar)、fresh basil leaf (1cup)、salt、black pepper、dried oregano
instructions:
0: Preheat your oven to 400°F, Gas Mark 6 (200°C.)
1: Dice the mozzarella and sun-dried tomatoes into small pieces and tear the basil leaves.
2: Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper and dried oregano.
3: Cut a very deep slit lengthways into the chicken, but do not cut all the way through - spread it out a bit if necessary to give you more room to work with.
4: Stuff to the brim with the fillings
5: Use a few cocktail sticks to hold the chicken together and place on a baking tray.
6: Pour a tablespoon of the oil from the sun-dried tomatoes jar over each chicken breast.
7: Bake in the center of the oven for 20-25 minutes until cooked through and the juices run clear.
8: Remove the cocktail sticks.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:egg、flour (1cup)、cold water (½cup)、flour、shrimps、oil
instructions:
0: Whisk the egg in a small bowl. Add 120 grams (1 cup) of flour and water. Whisk to combine. Cover with plastic wrap and transfer to the refrigerator.
1: Add flour to a shallow dish. Dip each shrimp in the flour, shaking off any excess.
2: Dip the floured shrimp into the batter.
3: Heat oil in a pot to 350°F (180˚C).
4: Fry the shrimp until they float to the top and become golden brown in color. Use a slotted spoon to transfer the shrimp to a paper towel-lined plate to drain.
5: For the mayonnaise sauce, combine mayonnaise, ketchup, honey, and vinegar.
6: Line a ramekin with plastic wrap, and mold ¼ of the rice into a patty. Repeat until you have 6 rice “buns.”
7: Heat a pan over medium-high heat and add a splash of sesame oil. Add the rice “buns” and cook until the outside is crispy, about 5 minutes.
8: Top the rice "bun" with a piece of green leaf lettuce, fried shrimps, mayonnaise sauce, and top with another rice “bun.” Repeat with remaining ingredients.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:mini watermelon、soy sauce (6tablespoons)、rice vinegar (2teaspoons)、sesame oil (1tablespoon)、lime、agave nectar (1tablespoon)、scallions、fresh ginger (2tablespoons)、white sesame seeds (2tablespoons)、red chile flakes (1teaspoon)、medium cucumber、mayonnaise (6tablespoons)、 sriracha (2tablespoons)、white rice、avocado、shelled edamame、nori sheet、pickled ginger、fresh cilantro、peanut、black sesame seed
instructions:
0: Using a sharp knife, cut around the watermelon slices rind to remove, then dice into 1-inch (2 cm) cubes.
1: Transfer 4 cups (600 g) to a medium bowl, reserving the rest for another use.
2: In a small bowl, combine the soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, lime juice, agave, scallions, ginger, white sesame seeds, and chile flakes. Mix well.
3: Pour the marinade over the watermelon cubes and stir. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and let marinate in the fridge for 1 hour.
4: Slice the cucumber into thin half moons and set aside.
5: In a small bowl, combine the mayo and Sriracha.
6: To assemble the poke bowls, start with rice as a base and top with cucumbers, avocado, edamame, nori, pickled ginger, Sriracha mayo, cilantro, and crushed peanuts.
7: Add a scoop of the marinated watermelon and use the marinade as a dressing to drizzle over the bowl.
8: Garnish with black sesame seeds, if desired.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:water、eggplant、water、small onion、celery (1stalk)、garlic (3cloves)、whole wheat breadcrumbs (1cup)、grated parmesan cheese (¼cup)、fresh parsley (2tablespoons)、fresh basil (2tablespoons)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、salt (½teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、egg
instructions:
0: In a skillet over medium heat, add cooking oil or water and eggplant. Cook until eggplant begins to brown, stirring occasionally and adding water or vegetable broth as needed. Transfer to a blender or food processor.
1: To the same skillet, add more oil or water and the onion and celery. Cook until onions are translucent, stirring occasionally.
2: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
3: Add the garlic and stir until fragrant. Transfer to the food processor with the eggplant.
4: Pulse the food processor until the eggplant mixture is mostly combined, but still chunky. Transfer to a large bowl.
5: To the bowl, add the breadcrumbs, parmesan, parsley, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper and combinel. Add the egg and mix until a dough forms.
6: Use your hands to form 1-inch (2-cm) balls from the eggplant mixture. Place in rows on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
7: Bake for 20 minutes, or until golden, flipping halfway.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:macaroni (1lb)、unsalted butter (4tablespoons)、shredded sharp cheddar cheese (8oz)、shredded parmesan cheese (8oz)、american cheese (8oz)、whole milk (12oz)、salt (1tablespoon)、mustard powder (1tablespoon)、cayenne pepper (½teaspoon)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、all-purpose flour (1 ½cups)、eggs、panko breadcrumbs (1 ½cups)、vegetable oil、ground beef (1 ½lb)、salt、pepper、red onion、tomato
instructions:
0: Prepare macaroni according to package directions. Drain the macaroni in a colander and return to the pot.
1: Add butter, cheddar cheese, Parmesan cheese, American cheese, milk, salt, mustard powder, cayenne to the pot. Turn heat up to medium-low and stir until cheeses are melted and all ingredients are well combined.
2: Remove the pot from the heat and pour onto a parchment paper-lined sheet tray. Spread evenly with a spatula, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.
3: Once cooled, use a ring mold or rounded container roughly 4-inches (10 cm) in diameter to cut out 6-8 “buns.”
4: Place flour, eggs, and bread crumbs in three separate bowls.
5: Dip each macaroni bun in flour, then egg, and finally bread crumbs, coating evenly.
6: Preheat vegetable oil to 350°F (175°C).
7: Place the macaroni buns gently in oil and fry 3-4 minutes, until golden brown. Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towel-lined plate.
8: Season hamburger patties liberally with salt and pepper. In a cast-iron skillet over high heat, sear patties to desired doneness, flipping halfway through.
9: Place burger between two mac and cheese buns and top with sliced onions and tomatoes.
10: Nutrition  Calories: 3850 Fat: 280 grams  Carbs: 197 grams Fiber:  8 grams  Sugars: 21 grams  Protein: 133 grams
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:chicken wings (1 ½lb)、kosher salt (1 ½teaspoons)、Tasty Zesty Spice Blend (1tablespoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the air fryer to 375°F (190°C).
1: In a bowl, toss the chicken wings with the salt and Tasty Zesty Spice Blend until well coated
2: Working in batches, add the chicken wings to the air fryer in a single layer and “fry” for 20 minutes, flipping halfway through.
3: Serve warm.
4: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:unsalted butter (1cup)、crumbled blue cheese (1cup)、chives (2tablespoons)、kosher salt (¼teaspoon)、freshly ground black pepper (¼teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Make the compound butter: In a medium bowl, mix together the butter, blue cheese, chives, salt, and pepper until well combined.
1: Transfer the butter to a piece of plastic wrap and roll into a log. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour, or until ready to use.
2: Make the fried onions: In a shallow bowl, combine the onions and buttermilk and let sit at room temperature for 1 hour.
3: In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, paprika, salt, and pepper. Dip the buttermilk-coated onions into the flour mixture, shaking off any excess.
4: Fill a large skillet with high sides with the canola oil. Heat the oil over medium-high heat until it reaches 375˚F (190˚C). Once the oil is hot, add the onions in batches and fry for 3 minutes, until golden brown. Transfer the onions to a wire rack to drain and season with salt.
5: Generously season the steaks all over with salt and pepper.
6: Add the olive oil to a large cast-iron or stainless-steel pan over high heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the steaks and cook, without disturbing, until a brown crust forms, about 7 minutes. Flip the steaks and continue to cook for 7 minutes more, until the steak is browned on both sides. Sear the sides of the steak to render any fat. Add the butter and thyme to the pan. Tilt the pan toward you and baste the steaks with the melted butter for 2 minutes, until the internal temperature reaches 135°F (60°C) for medium rare.
7: Serve the steak with the crispy onions and blue cheese compound butter.
8: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:basmati rice (2cups)、water (3cups)、medium white onion、slivered almonds (5tablespoons)、garlic (4cloves)、ginger、vegetable oil (6tablespoons)、golden raisin (3tablespoons)、boneless lamb shoulder (1 ½lb)、salt (1 ¼teaspoons)、plain yogurt (1cup)、saffron thread (1teaspoon)、milk (2tablespoons)、cinnamon stick、cloves、black peppercorn (½teaspoon)、cardamom seeds (½teaspoon)、coriander seeds (1teaspoon)、cumin seeds (1teaspoon)、nutmeg (1teaspoon)、cayenne pepper (¼teaspoon)、lemon、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、eggs、fresh cilantro (3tablespoons)
instructions:
0: Soak the rice in 2 cups (480 ml) of water for about 2 hours.
1: Add the chopped onion, 2 tablespoons slivered almonds, garlic, ginger, and 3 tablespoons of water to a food processor. Blend into a paste.
2: Heat the oil in a large nonstick pan over medium heat. Add the sliced onions and fry until browned and crisp, about 10 minutes. Remove from the pan with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towels.
3: Add the raisins to the pan. Stir until they become plump, about 2 minutes, then remove and drain on paper towels.
4: Add the lamb to the pan, in batches if necessary, and brown on all sides, about 5 minutes. Transfer the browned meat to a bowl and set aside.
5: Reduce the heat to medium. Add the onion paste to the pan. Cook, stirring constantly, until the paste turns light brown. If it sticks to the bottom of the pan, add a bit of water and keep stirring.
6: Return the meat and any accumulated juices to the pan. Add 1¼ teaspoons of salt, the yogurt, and 1 cup (240 ml) of water. Cover, reduce the heat to low, and simmer for 30 minutes.
7: Add the saffron threads to a small bowl with the milk and set aside.
8: Bring a large pot of water to boil and add 1½ tablespoons of salt. Drain the rice and add to pot. Boil for 5 minutes, then immediately drain and rinse.
9: In a spice grinder or mortar and pestle, finely grind the cinnamon stick, cloves, peppercorns, cardamon, coriander, and cumin.
10: Add the spices to the meat, along with the nutmeg and cayenne. Cover and continue cooking until the meat is tender, about 10 minutes. If there is too much sauce, increase the heat to high, uncover, and stir to evaporate some of the liquid (there should about 1 cup (240 g) of sauce left in the meat).
11: Preheat the oven to 300˚F (150˚C).
12: In a large Dutch oven or deep casserole dish, layer half of the rice, the meat with its sauce, and the rest of the rice. Squeeze the lemon juice over rice.
13: Using the end of a wooden spoon, poke holes all the way through the layers. Spoon a bit of the saffron and milk into each hole.
14: Distribute the butter over the rice and sprinkle over most of the fried onions, reserving some for garnish. Cover the dish with foil, then top with a lid.
15: Bake for 1 hour.
16: Remove the biriyani from the oven and set aside for at least 15 minutes.
17: Garnish with the eggs, raisins, remaining 3 tablespoons of slivered almonds, reserved fried onions, and cilantro.
18: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:flour tortillas、oil (2tablespoons)、bell peppers、large white onion、chili powder (2teaspoons)、cumin (2teaspoons)、garlic powder (1teaspoon)、salt (1teaspoon)、rotisserie chicken (2lb)、cheddar cheese (10slices)、pepper jack cheese (10slices)、sour cream、guacamole
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C). Grease a bundt pan with nonstick spray.
1: Invert a 3-inch (8-cm) diameter bowl in the center of two tortillas. Use a knife to cut around the bowl and discard the centers.
2: Invert a 2-inch (5-cm) diameter bowl in the center of two tortillas. Use a knife to cut around the bowl and discard the centers.
3: Invert a 1½-inch (4-cm) diameter bowl in the center of one tortilla. Use a knife to cut around the bowl and discard the center.
4: Heat the oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Add the bell peppers and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the onion and toss to combine.
5: Add the chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, and salt. Toss to combine.
6: Add the chicken and cook until the onions are translucent and the chicken is warmed through.
7: Place one of the tortillas with the 3-inch (8-cm) hole on the bottom of the greased bundt pan. Arrange a layer of cheddar cheese slices around the tortilla.
8: Stack the second tortilla with a 3-inch (8-cm) hole over the cheese layer. Top the tortilla with half of the fajita mixture.
9: Layer one of the tortillas with a 2-inch (5-cm) hole on top of the fajita layer. Top with a layer of Pepper Jack cheese.
10: Layer the second tortilla with a 2-inch (5-cm) hole on top of the Pepper Jack layer.  Add the remaining fajita mixture.
11: Layer the tortilla with a 1½-inch (4-cm) hole and top with the remaining cheddar and Pepper Jack.
12: Layer the last tortilla on top of the last cheese layer.
13: Cover the top of the bundt pan with a 12-inch (30 ½-cm) round cake pan or aluminum foil and bake for 45 minutes.
14: Let cool for at least 30 minutes.
15: Invert the bundt pan onto a cutting board.
16: Slice the Chicken Fajita Party Ring and top with sour cream. Serve with guacamole.
17: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:garlic (3cloves)、onion、eggplant、bell pepper、yellow squash、zucchini、tomatoes、salt、red pepper (½teaspoon)、fresh thyme (2teaspoons)、fresh parsley (2tablespoons)、fresh basil (2tablespoons)、fresh mozzarella cheese (8oz)、zucchinis
instructions:
0: Pour olive oil in a large pot, over medium-high heat. Sauté garlic and onions briefly, till aromatic. Add eggplant and cook down until softened and brown. Add bell pepper, yellow squash, zucchini and tomatoes to the mixture and reduce to simmer.
1: Stir so the vegetables are well mixed. When the vegetables are cooked through, incorporate thyme, parsley, and basil, then remove from the heat.
2: Cut zucchini in half, lengthwise, then scoop out the insides to form a boat shape. Line the bottom of the boat with sliced mozzarella, then top with the cooked ratatouille.
3: Bake the boat at 400˚F (200˚C) for 15 minutes or until the boat has softened and the tops are starting to brown. Serve immediately.
4: P.S. Leftover ratatouille is delicious on its own or with pasta.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:Tyson® Frozen Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts、italian seasoning (1teaspoon)、onion powder (1teaspoon)、kosher salt (1teaspoon)、freshly ground black pepper (½teaspoon)、Prego® Traditional Italian Sauce (1jar)、shredded mozzarella cheese (8oz)、pepperoni (15slices)、pepperoncinis (¼cup)、shredded parmesan cheese (¼cup)、garlic bread
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Add the chicken to an ungreased 9 x 11-inch baking dish. Sprinkle the Italian seasoning, onion powder, salt, and pepper over the chicken. Pour the Prego® Traditional Italian Sauce over the chicken and stir until the chicken is completely coated. Top with the mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, and pepperoncinis.
2: Bake for 20–25 minutes, or until the internal temperature of the chicken reaches 165°F (75°C).
3: Remove the chicken bake from the oven and turn the broiler on high.
4: Place the chicken bake under the broiler and broil for about 3 minutes, or until the cheese is browned (watch closely as it can burn quickly). Remove the chicken bake from the oven and let cool for about 10 minutes.
5: Garnish the pizza chicken with shredded Parmesan cheese. Serve with garlic bread.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:smoked paprika (3tablespoons)、freshly ground black pepper (2tablespoons)、kosher salt (2tablespoons)、garlic powder (2tablespoons)、onion powder (1tablespoon)、cayenne pepper (1tablespoon)、dried oregano (1teaspoon)、dried thyme (1 ½teaspoons)
instructions:
0: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
1: Make the Cajun spice mix: In a small bowl or resealable container, mix together the paprika, black pepper, salt, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne, oregano, and thyme until well combined. The spice mix will keep in an airtight container for up to 1 month.
2: Make the pasta: Cook the pasta in the boiling water according to the package instructions until al dente. Reserve ¼ cup of the pasta water, then drain the noodles.
3: While the pasta cooks, toss the shrimp in a medium bowl with 2 tablespoons of Cajun spice mix. Toss the scallops in a separate medium bowl with 1 tablespoon of the Cajun spice mix as well.
4: Heat 1 tablespoon of the olive oil in a large, deep skillet over medium-high heat until nearly smoking. Add the shrimp to the pan and cook, flipping once until they just turn pink, 2–3 minutes per side, being careful not to overcook. Transfer the shrimp back to the bowl and wipe the pan clean.
5: Heat the remaining tablespoon of olive oil in the same pan until nearly smoking. Add the scallops to the pan and sear on each side for about 2 minutes, until they are easy to flip without resistance. Transfer the scallops to the bowl with the shrimp. Wipe out the pan.
6: Melt 2 tablespoons of butter in the same pan over medium heat. Add the yellow and orange bell peppers, season with 1 tablespoon of Cajun spice mix, and cook for 7–10 minutes, until the peppers are soft and tender. Add the red bell peppers and scallions and cook for another 5 minutes, until warmed through. Transfer the vegetables to the bowl with the shrimp and scallops.
7: In the same pan (do not wipe out!), combine the remaining 2 tablespoons of butter, 2 tablespoons Cajun spice mix, and the heavy cream. Bring to a boil and cook for 7–10 minutes, or until reduced by at least half, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom of the pan.
8: Remove the pan from the heat and stir in the Parmesan cheese. Add the cooked linguine, sautéed vegetables, shrimp, and scallops and toss to coat in the sauce, adding 1–2 tablespoons of the reserved pasta water if the sauce is too thick. Garnish with the parsley.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、spinach (5oz)、all-purpose flour (2cups)、salt (1tablespoon)、water (2tablespoons)、vegetable、pesto、fresh basil
instructions:
0: Bring a large pot of water to a boil.
1: In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the spinach and cook for 5 minutes, or until wilted.
2: Add the spinach to a food processor and process until finely chopped.
3: While processing the spinach, spoon the flour in a little bit at a time until a crumbly dough forms.
4: While continuing to process, add ¼ teaspoon of salt. Then, add 1 tablespoon of water at a time until dough comes together (the amount of water necessary will vary depending on how wet the spinach is).
5: Remove the dough from the food processor and knead on a floured surface to form into a ball.
6: With a rolling pin, roll dough out into an oval, about 18 inches (46 cm) long by 12 inches (30 cm) wide, and ¼-inch (6 mm) thick.
7: With a knife or pizza cutter, cut the dough into even strips about ½ inch (1 cm) wide.
8: Roll the strips into thick noodles.
9: Once the water is boiling, add 1 tablespoon of salt and drop in the pasta.
10: Cook the pasta for 3-5 minutes, or until the noodles float to the top. Drain.
11: Toss with roasted vegetables and pesto and top with basil.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:nonstick cooking spray、vegetable oil (2tablespoons)、celery (½cup)、onion (½cup)、medium carrot、ground beef (2lb)、dijon mustard (1teaspoon)、paprika (1teaspoon)、worcestershire sauce (2tablespoons)、tomato paste (1tablespoon)、large eggs、panko breadcrumbs (1cup)、milk (½cup)、salt、tomato paste (⅓cup)、mashed potato (6cups)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C). Grease 2 8-inch (20 cm) round cake pans with nonstick spray.
1: Heat the oil in a medium pan over medium heat. Add the celery, onion, and carrot and sauté until translucent, about 10 minutes. Set aside to cool.
2: In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, Dijon mustard, paprika, Worcestershire sauce, tomato paste, eggs, panko, milk, and salt (if using). Stir to combine, add the cooled sautéed veggies, and mix until homogeneous.
3: Divide the meatloaf between the prepared pans and spread the mixture evenly.
4: Bake for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown. Let cool for 30 minutes.
5: Add 1 meatloaf layer to a serving plate. Spread a thin layer of tomato paste over the top. Add 2 cups (500 g) of mashed potatoes to the center and spread evenly. Top with the other meatloaf layer and spread with a layer of tomato paste and 2 cups (500 g) mashed potatoes. Use an offset spatula to cover the sides of the “cake” and spread the potatoes over the whole cake in an even layer.
6: Add another cup (250 g) of mashed potatoes to the top of the cake and spread evenly over the whole cake.
7: Add the remaining mashed potatoes to a piping bag fitted with a star tip. Pipe rosettes around the base and top of the cake.
8: Slice and serve.
9: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:skin-on salmon (8oz)、fine sea salt、freshly ground black pepper、lemons
instructions:
0: Heat a grill to medium-high heat.
1: Season the salmon with salt and pepper.
2: Brush the grill grates with oil and place the salmon, skin side down on the oiled grates.
3: Grill until lightly browned, 3-5 minutes, then gently flip and continue to cook until just opaque in center.
4: Add the lemon halves to the grill, cut side down and grill until lightly charred, about 2 minutes.
5: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground cumin (1tablespoon)、ground coriander (1tablespoon)、ground turmeric (1teaspoon)、ground cardamom (1teaspoon)、black pepper (1teaspoon)、ground cloves (¼teaspoon)、nutmeg (¼teaspoon)
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Make the xawaash: In a medium bowl, combine the cumin, coriander, turmeric, cardamom, black pepper, cloves, and nutmeg. Set aside.
2: Heat a medium oven-safe pan over medium-high heat. Add the vegetable oil, onion, tomato, garlic, and cinnamon stick. Cook until the onions have softened slightly, 5-6 minutes.
3: Season with salt, then add the vegetable stock cube and cilantro. Cook for 1 minute, breaking up the stock cube.
4: Reduce the heat to medium, then stir in the xawaash and soaked rice. Cook for about 3 minutes so rice grains lightly toast.
5: Pour in the hot water and increase the heat to high to bring to a boil. Cover the pot, transfer to the oven, and bake for 20 minutes. Check periodically to be sure the rice has enough water.
6: Remove the cooked rice from the oven and drizzle the red and orange food colorings on top. Gently mix so there are different colored grains.
7: Sprinkle the raisins over the hot rice, cover, and set aside.
8: To prepare the topping, mix the potatoes with the orange food coloring in a medium bowl (wear gloves to avoid stained fingers!).
9: Heat about 1 inch ( 2 cm) of oil in a large heavy-bottomed saucepan. Add the potatoes and cook for 5-6 minutes, then transfer to a baking sheet lined with paper towels to drain the excess oil.
10: In the same oil, fry the onion slices until browned and crispy, 2-3 minutes. Add the red peppers cooking for an additional minute. Drain on paper towels.
11: To assemble the rice, transfer the pilaf to a large serving platter. Top with the fried potatoes, crispy onions, and red bell peppers.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:bacon (5strips)、garlic (2tablespoons)、green onions、kimchi (1cup)、gochujang (2tablespoons)、mirin (2tablespoons)、soy sauce (1tablespoon)、toasted sesame oil (2tablespoons)、short grain rice (2cups)、shredded mozzarella cheese (½cup)
instructions:
0: Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add the bacon and cook until halfway done, 3–5 minutes.
1: Add the garlic and green onions to the center and cook until fragrant, 1–2 minutes.
2: Make some space in the middle of the pan, add the kimchi, and cook until the juices reduce and kimchi starts to turn reddish brown, about 3 minutes.
3: In a small bowl, whisk together the gochujang, mirin, soy sauce, and 1 tablespoon sesame oil. Add to the skillet and cook until well incorporated, about 1 minute.
4: Add the rice and cook, stirring occasionally, until rice is warmed through and crispy on the bottom, 3–4 minutes.
5: Transfer the rice mixture to a deep bowl and press down with spatula to compact.
6: Place a medium skillet over the bowl, then flip to invert the rice volcano. Lift the bowl. Use the back of a spoon to carefully press an indentation into the top of the volcano, then make a crevasse in the side to allow the cheese to flow out.
7: In a large liquid measuring cup, whisk together the eggs.
8: Turn the heat to medium, then pour the egg mixture over the rice volcano and top with the mozzarella cheese. Cover the pan and cook until the cheese is melted and the egg is cooked through, about 5 minutes.
9: Garnish with more scallions if desired.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ribbon pasta (1lb)、olive oil (4tablespoons)、beef chuck roast (1lb)、oxtail (1lb)、onion、carrot、celery (1stalk)、garlic (3cloves)、tomato paste (2tablespoons)、red wine (½cup)、beef stock (32fl oz)、diced tomato (28oz)、fresh thyme (3sprigs)、fresh oregano (3sprigs)、fresh rosemary (3sprigs)、bay leaves、fresh parsley
instructions:
0: Season the meat on all sides with salt and pepper.
1: Heat a large heavy pot with a lid over medium-high heat. Add a tablespoon of olive oil and brown the meat in batches until a crust forms, turning to ensure even color on all sides.
2: Once one batch is done, set aside in a bowl or plate with a lip, add another fresh tablespoon of olive oil and continue until all the meat is brown.
3: Add another tablespoon of oil to the pan and sauté the onion, carrot, celery, and garlic until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
4: Pour in the wine and let it boil off and reduce until barely any remains in the pan.
5: Next, add the browned meat back to the pan, along with the tomato paste. Stir until tomato paste is coating all the ingredients and allow the paste to toast slightly.
6: Pour in the tomatoes, stock, and herb bundle and stir, bring to a simmer and cover with a lid.
7: Allow to simmer for 3 hours, stirring occasionally. Alternatively, if your pot and lid are oven safe, cook in a 325˚F (170˚C) oven for 3 hours.
8: Remove the herb bundle and beef shank.
9: Pull the meat from the oxtail. Using a fork or tongs, discarding the bone and any extra cartilage or extra fat. Add the meat back to the ragu and stir.
10: Skim off any extra fat from the top of the ragu.
11: Cook pasta in boiling salted water until al dente. Reserve 1 cup (120 ml) of the pasta water before draining.
12: Add a few ladlefuls of ragu, the pasta, and a splash of pasta water to a large pot, gently stir to coat the pasta in the ragu.
13: Add a handful of cheese and stir to melt into the sauce.
14: Garnish with more cheese and fresh parsley before serving.
15: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground ginger (½tablespoon)、allspice (½tablespoon)、fresh thyme (½tablespoon)、fresh rosemary (½tablespoon)、salt (1tablespoon)、onion powder (½teaspoon)、pepper (½teaspoon)、cinnamon (½teaspoon)、nutmeg (¼teaspoon)、garlic powder (¼teaspoon)、paprika (¼teaspoon)、cayenne (1teaspoon)、brown sugar (1 ½tablespoons)、flour (1cup)、eggs、panko bread crumbs (1cup)、bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs (2lb)、butter (¼cup)
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350˚F (175˚C)
1: Combine all seasoning ingredients and mix well. Add 2 tablespoons of the seasoning mixture to the Panko bread crumbs, set aside. (The extra seasoning can be used and stored for 1- 2 years!)
2: Coat the chicken in flour, then egg, and finally seasoned Panko.
3: Pour melted butter into the bottom of the 9x13 (22cm x 33cm) inch pan.
4: Place each coated piece of chicken skin side down in the butter.
5: Bake for 1 hour at 350˚F (175˚C) (times and temperatures may vary depending on the oven), flipping the chicken over halfway through.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:olive oil (1tablespoon)、yellow onion、garlic (3cloves)、crushed tomato (28oz)、salt (1 ½tablespoons)、pepper (1teaspoon)、fresh basil (2sprigs)
instructions:
0: Marinara sauce: In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil. Add onion and garlic and saute for 5 minutes, until translucent.
1: Stir in tomatoes, salt, pepper, and basil. Simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Remove basil sprigs and set sauce aside.
2: In a small bowl, stir together breadcrumbs and milk and set aside. In a large bowl, whisk together egg, parmesan, salt and pepper.
3: Stir in ground beef, onions, and wet breadcrumbs. Combine well, but do not over-mix.
4: With oiled hands, roll the meat into golf-sized balls.
5: Heat a skillet with a drizzle of olive oil. Brown meatballs on all sides, then remove from pan.
6: Preheat oven to 350ºF (180º C).
7: Lay out a lasagna noodle horizontally on a cutting board. Spread a tablespoon of ricotta onto the noodle. Lay a mozzarella slice on one end of the noodle and place a meatball on top of the cheese.
8: Roll up the noodle with the meatball and cheese inside. Place meatball bomb into the baking dish, with the meatball showing. Repeat with the rest of the meatballs and noodles.
9: Ladle approximately ⅔rds of the marinara sauce into a 9x13-inch (23x33-cm) baking dish. Place the meatball rolls on top of the marinara sauce.
10: Bake dish for 25 minutes, until top is lightly browned and meatballs are cooked through completely.
11: Remove from oven, garnish with parsley and serve with reserved marinara on the side.
12: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:russet potatoes、olive oil (2tablespoons)、salt (2teaspoons)、ground beef (½lb)、taco seasoning (1tablespoon)、black beans (½cup)、tomato (½cup)、cheddar cheese (1cup)、guacamole
instructions:
0: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Carefully pierce potatoes with a fork. On a baking sheet, oil the potatoes well and sprinkle with salt.
2: Bake for about one hour. If making more potatoes, an additional 15 minutes per potato is needed.
3: In a skillet over high heat, add the ground beef with a bit of oil.
4: Add the taco seasoning, black beans, and tomatoes. You may want to drain the ground beef mixture once cooked if there’s too much liquid.
5: Once the potatoes are cooled, cut them vertically, scoop out the inside, and transfer to a bowl.
6: In the bowl with the scooped out potatoes, add the ground beef mixture and cheddar cheese. Mix well.
7: Scoop the potato mixture back into the potatoes and top with cheddar cheese.
8: Bake an additional 15 minutes until the cheese is melted.
9: Serve warm with guacamole.
10: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:warm water (1 ¼cups)、sugar (2teaspoons)、active dry yeast (2 ¼teaspoons)、all purpose flour (3 ¼cups)、cornmeal (¾cup)、kosher salt (2teaspoons)、unsalted butter (¼cup)、olive oil
instructions:
0: Make the dough: Add the warm water and sugar to a large liquid measuring cup. Sprinkle in the yeast and let bloom for 5 minutes, until foamy.
1: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, cornmeal, and salt. Add the yeast mixture and melted butter, and stir with a rubber spatula until a shaggy dough forms.
2: Turn the dough out onto a floured surface and knead for about 5 minutes, until the dough comes together into a soft ball and bounces back when pressed with a finger. Grease a large bowl with olive oil. Then transfer the dough to the bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and let rise in a warm spot until doubled in size, 1–2 hours.
3: Make the sauce: Pour the tomatoes into a fine-mesh sieve set over a bowl. Let the juices drain. Then use your hands to gently crush tomatoes and let any excess liquid drip into a bowl. Discard the juices. Transfer the crushed tomatoes to a medium saucepan and add the sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, olive oil, and garlic. Stir to combine. Bring to low boil over medium heat and cook for 15 minutes, until most of the liquid has evaporated. Remove the pot from the heat and stir in the basil. Set aside to cool while you prepare the rest of the toppings.
4: Melt the butter in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Add the mushrooms and cook, stirring occasionally, until browned, about 5 minutes. Season with salt and remove the pan from the heat.
5: Add the fennel seeds to a small dry skillet over medium heat. Toast until fragrant and starting to brown, 3–4 minutes. Transfer the fennel seeds to a cutting board and coarsely chop.
6: Add the fennel seeds to a medium bowl with the Italian sausage and mix to incorporate. Transfer the sausage to a large sheet of parchment paper. Top with another sheet of parchment and roll the sausage into a 9-inch patty.
7: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
8: . Once the dough has risen, turn out onto a lightly floured surface. Cut the dough in half. Wrap one half in plastic wrap, place in a resealable zip-top bag, and freeze for up to 1 month.
9: Generously grease a 10-inch cast iron skillet with olive oil all over the sides and bottom. Transfer the remaining dough to the pan and use your hands to press evenly against the bottom and up the sides.
10: Tear the mozzarella into pieces and evenly scatter over the dough. Top with the sautéed mushrooms, then the tomato sauce. Use the parchment to place the sausage patty on top of the sauce. Sprinkle with the Parmesan.
11: Place the skillet on a baking sheet to catch any drips. Then transfer to the oven and bake for 35–40 minutes, until the crust is lightly browned and the sausage is cooked through.
12: Let cool slightly. Then carefully remove the pizza from the skillet, slice, and serve.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:oil (2tablespoons)、yellow onion、large carrots、garlic (2cloves)、celery (3ribs)、mushroom (2cups)、salt、pepper、italian seasoning (1tablespoon)、all-purpose flour (¼cup)、lemon juice (2tablespoons)、vegetable broth (1cup)、almond milk (2cups)、broccoli floret (2cups)、rotisserie chicken (2cups)、pie crust (2crusts)、small egg
instructions:
0: In a large pot over medium heat, heat the oil. Add the onion and carrots and cook 5 minutes, or until the onions begin to turn translucent.
1: Add the garlic, celery, and mushrooms and cook another 5 minutes, or until tender.
2: Add the salt, pepper, Italian seasoning, and arrowroot starch. Stir to combine.
3: Add the lemon juice, vegetable broth, almond milk, broccoli, and chicken. Stir to combine. Add more arrowroot, if necessary, to reach desired thickness. Remove mixture from heat and allow to cool.
4: Preheat the oven to pie crust or biscuit package specification.
5: To make one family-style pie: Place one pie crust into an ungreased 9-inch (23-cm) pie dish. Fill with the vegetable mixture. Top with the second pie crust, folding under any excess crust and crimping the edges with a fork.
6: Brush the crust evenly with beaten egg. Cut a few slits in the top crust.
7: Bake according to pie crust packaging.
8: Cut and serve warm.
9: To make individual pies: Arrange 6 or more ramekins or bowls on a baking sheet.
10: Scoop the vegetable mixture into the ramekins.
11: Top each ramekin with 1 uncooked biscuit.
12: Bake according to biscuit packaging.
13: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:classic lasagna、vegetable oil (6cups)、all-purpose flour (2cups)、large eggs、italian breadcrumbs (2cups)、marinara sauce (1cup)
instructions:
0: Set a wire rack inside a baking sheet.
1: Cut the chilled lasagna into 12 equal pieces, then cut the pieces into 4 triangles, for a total of 48 pieces. Set the triangles on the wire rack and cover with plastic wrap. Freeze for at least 4 hours, until solid.
2: Heat the vegetable oil in a large heavy-bottomed pot fitted with a deep fry thermometer over medium heat until it reaches 350°F (180°C).
3: Add the flour, eggs, and bread crumbs to 3 separate shallow bowls.
4: Remove the lasagna triangles from the freezer and dredge in the flour, then the eggs, then the bread crumbs.
5: Working in batches, fry the lasagna triangles in the hot oil for approximately 1 minute, until golden brown. Transfer to a paper towel-lined baking sheet to drain and let cool for about 10 minutes.
6: Serve the lasagna bites warm with marinara sauce alongside.
7: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:canola oil、flank steak (1lb)、taco seasoning (1teaspoon)、lime juice (2teaspoons)、salt (2teaspoons)、avocados、frozen french fries (1bag)、mexican sour cream (¼cup)、flaming hot cheetos (8oz)
instructions:
0: Cut flank steak into fajita size pieces and place in bowl. Add the taco seasoning, 1 teaspoon lime juice and salt. Let marinate for 30 minutes.
1: Scoop avocado with a spoon and place in a bowl. Add 1 teaspoon lime juice, salt and mash with a fork until soft enough to whisk.
2: In a frying pan, add 1 tablespoon of canola oil and let heat for 30 seconds. Add marinated meat and let cook for 20 minutes, stirring until meat is browned.
3: In a small saucepan heat condensed cheddar cheese for 3 minutes, stir throughout.
4: Heat a pot with oil and heat to 350ºF (180ºF). Add frozen french fries and let fry until they rise to the surface. Sprinkle with salt and let oil drain from fries and set on a plate.
5: Add the rest of the guacamole, cooked meat, sour cream, hot cheetos, and warm cheddar cheese.
6: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:ground beef (2lb)、whole milk ricotta cheese (½cup)、large eggs、bread crumbs (¼cup)、fresh parsley (¼cup)、McCormick® Oregano Leaves (1tablespoon)、red pepper flakes (1teaspoon)、kosher salt (4teaspoons)、extra virgin olive oil (2tablespoons)、small yellow onion、crushed tomato (2cans)、red wine vinegar (1tablespoon)、linguine (½lb)、freshly grated parmesan cheese、hawaiian rolls、French’s® Yellow Mustard (1tablespoon)、roasted peppers、green leaf lettuce (1head)、red onion (6tablespoons)、pizza dough (1tube)、shredded low moisture mozzarella cheese (½cup)、caesar dressing、chicken stock (1cup)、unsalted butter (2tablespoons)、garlic (3cloves)、fresh basil
instructions:
0: In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, ricotta, 1 egg, the bread crumbs, parsley, 1½ tablespoons dried oregano, ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes, and 2 teaspoons salt. Mix well with your hands.
1: Using a 1-inch (2 ½ cm) scoop, portion the mixture into 46 meatballs. Roll with your hands into smooth balls.
2: Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large pot over medium-high heat. 4. Working in batches, sear the meatballs on all sides, until well browned, about 5 minutes. Remove the meatballs from the pot and set aside.
3: To the same pot, add the onion and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Add the tomatoes, 1½ teaspoons oregano, 2 teaspoons salt, ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes, and the vinegar and bring to a boil.
4: Return the meatballs to the pot with the sauce, cover, and let simmer for 45 minutes, or until the meatballs are cooked through.
5: Day 1 - Linguine and Meatballs. Cook the linguine according to the package instructions. Meanwhile, reheat 1½ cups (500 G) of sauce and 10 meatballs.
6: To serve, divide the linguine between 2 bowls and top each serving with 5 meatballs and ¾ cup sauce. Garnish with freshly grated Parmesan cheese.
7: Enjoy!
8: Day 2 - Meatball Sliders. Cut 6 meatballs in half.
9: Separate the tops and bottom buns of 6 Hawaiian rolls. Spread the yellow mustard over the bottom buns. Top with the meatballs, roasted red peppers, ½ head of torn lettuce, and 3 tablespoons of pickled red onions. Top with the top buns.
10: Enjoy!
11: Day 3 - Pizza Pockets. Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Roll the pizza dough out to an 8 x 12-inch (20 x  30 cm) rectangle and cut into 4 equal pieces. Transfer to the prepared baking sheet.
12: Spoon 3 meatballs and sauce onto the top center of each piece of dough.
13: Sprinkle 2 tablespoons shredded mozzarella across meatballs.
14: Fold the bottom half of the dough over the meatballs and crimp the edges to seal. Beat the remaining egg, then brush over the dough.
15: Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until golden brown.
16: Enjoy!
17: Day 4 - Meatball Salad. Preheat the oven to 425˚F (220˚C). Tear 2 Hawaiian rolls into small pieces and place in a small bowl. Season with salt and pepper, drizzle with 1 tablespoon olive oil, and spread in a single layer on a baking sheet. Bake for 15 minutes, until golden and crispy.
18: In a large bowl, combine the remaining ½ head of green leaf lettuce, 8 meatballs, 1 cup croutons, and 3 tablespoons pickled red onion and drizzle with Caesar dressing. Toss to combine.
19: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
ingredients:oil (1tablespoon)、red bell pepper、yellow bell pepper、white onion、salt (½teaspoon)、black pepper (½teaspoon)、garlic (3cloves)、flank steak (2lb)、spinach (1 ½cups)、shredded mozzarella cheese (⅓cup)、long toothpick
instructions:
0: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C).
1: Heat the oil in an oven-proof skillet.  Toss in the bell peppers, onions, salt, pepper, and garlic, and sauté until the veggies have softened, about 10 minutes.
2: Season the flank steak on both sides with a good pinch of salt and black pepper.
3: Sprinkle on the spinach in an even layer and top with the sautéed peppers.
4: Sprinkle the mozzarella cheese over the veggies and tightly wrap the steak into a roll.
5: Skewer the steak with toothpicks about 1½ inches (4 cm) apart so that the steak will hold its shape.
6: Slice between the toothpicks to create individual steak rolls.
7: Heat a few more tablespoons of oil in the skillet.  When the oil has begun to smoke slightly, sear the steak rolls until browned, about 2 minutes per side.
8: NOTE: To bake the entire steak roll at one time, simply sear each steak roll in a large skillet and transfer to a parchment-lined baking sheet.  Once each roll has been seared and transferred to the baking sheet, proceed with steps 10-12.
9: Transfer the skillet to the oven and bake for 10-15 minutes, or until it has reached desired level of doneness.
10: Let the steak rest for 5 minutes before removing toothpicks.
11: Enjoy!

instruction: Give the cooking plan according to the name of the dish entered.
output:
